Is kedhadì te Megbevayà ne iring daan te vulawan he inggadung diyà te pemuleey. Duen etew he neketuredu zutun ne midtembunan din umani he utew sikandin nelipey ne mid-ulì ne imbelegyè din is langun he menge azen din ne midlikù dutun ne mibpemasa zin haazà is pemuleey.
Is kedhadì te Megbevayà, ne iring daan te etew he ebpemasa te menge utew meupiya he mahal he ebelieǥen he egngezanan te perlas.
Ne ke egkeehè din is sevaha he perlas he utew pa mahal, ibelegyè din is langun he azen din ne ebpemesahan din haazà.
Ne is kedhadì te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, ne iring te laya he intaan diyà te ranew wey mekeutel te minsan hengkey he kelasi te pait.

Ne emun mezakel en he menge pait is ebpekeahuk dutun, eguyuzen te menge etew haazà diyà te ǥeunan. Ne ebpinuu zan su ed-eramen dan is memeupiya zutun te pait ne id-ahuk dan diyà te menge ambung. Ne is kenà meupiya, idtimbag dan.
Ne keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu, iring kayi is egkeulaula su ebpenhipanew is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà ne edtepizen dan is menge lalung wey menge metazeng he etew.
Ne is menge lalung, idtimbag dan diyà te hapuy. Ne sikan is menge lalung, ne ebpekekulahì dan wey ebpemekengingitel tenged te utew zan ebpemekedsendit."
Ne mid-insaan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din te, "Egkesavut niw ve heini is egkeǥiyen ku?" "Uya, Datù, egkesavut dey," ke sikandan.

Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Ne tenged kayi," ke sikandin, "ke zuen menunudlù te kesuǥuan he nekesundan te hadì tew he Megbevayà, ebpekeiring sikandin te etew he zekelà is ketiǥeyunan din diyà te valey zin. Su kenà iyan dà igkepenurù din is kinezaan, kekenà, igkepenurù din daan is beǥu."
Ne hein nepasad ni Jesus haazà is kebpenurua zin kandan kayi te menge sempità, mid-awà sikandin dutun ne

mid-ulì diyà te inged din. Ne ziyà te simbahan mibpenurù din is menge etew zutun. Nengeinuinu is menge etew he mibpemineg kandin. Ke sikandan te, "Hentei vuwa is nekepenurù kandin? Maan is metau sikandin ebaal te menge egkein-inuwan?
Anak dà sikandin te pandey. Ne si Maria is iney zin; ne menge hazi zin, ensi Santiago, si Jose, si Simon, wey si Hudas.
Ne is menge etevey zin, ne zini zaan sikandan ebpen-ubpà. Maan is metau sikandin wey maan is ebpekehimu sikandin te egkengein-inuwan he iring kayi?"

Ne tenged kayi wazè dan medtuu kandin. Ne zutun migkaǥi sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Is ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, kenà sikandin edtehuzen te menge etew ziyà te keugelingen din he inged; iyan, diyà te menge zuma he inged edtehuzen mulà sikandin," ke si Jesus.
Umba kenà mezakel is impeehè din dutun he egkein-inuwan su wazè dan kedtuu kandin.
Ne zutun he timpu nezineg ni Hadì Hirudis is tudtul mehitenged te ulaula ni Jesus.

Ne migkaǥi si Hirudis diyà te menge suluǥuen din te, "Heini si Jesus, siguradu he iyan ded si Juan Megbebewtismu he nevanhew, ne tenged kayi zuen din gehem wey zin meveeli is menge iring kayi he singyal," ke sikandin.

Ne iyan hinungdan te kegkehimetayi ki Juan, su midsawey zin si Hirudis he migkaǥi te, "Nekesupak ka te kesuǥuan su mid-esawa nu si Hirudyas," ke sikandin. Ipag ni Hirudis si Hirudyas, su esawa te hazi zin he si Felipe. Ne tenged dutun te kedsewaya kandin ni Juan impezakep ni Hirudis si Juan ne mibpirisu zin. Edhimetayan din pezem si Juan, iyan, egkehandek te menge Hudiyu su netuenan dan he ebpeneuven si Juan te Megbevayà.
Ne neuma is andew he edsilibrahan ni Hirudis is ked-enaka kandin, ne midseyawan te anak he raǥa ni Hirudyas is menge etew he nengetiǥum dutun. Ne utew nesuat si Hirudis tenged dutun.
Ne mibpesarig din haazà is midsayew. Ke sikandin te, "Buyù ka te minsan hengkey, ne ibeǥey ku kenikew."
Ne zutun tenged te impenurù te iney zin, migkeǥiyan din si Hirudis te, "Iveǥey nu kedì kayi, ǥuntaan dà, is ulu ni Juan Megbebewtismu he id-ahuk diyà te pinggan."
Ne zutun utew neseeng haazà is hadì, iyan, tenged dutun te pesarig din he nezineg te langun he menge bisita zin, midtuman din haazà is mibuyù dutun te raǥa.
Ne mibpepungelan din si Juan te ulu ziyà te pirisuwan.
Ne in-ahuk dan is ulu ni Juan te pelatu ne imbeǥey zan duen te raǥa. Ne haazà is ulu, imbeǥey zutun te raǥa ziyà te iney zin.
Ne sikan is lawa ni Juan, mibeyaan te menge sumusundan din ne inleveng dan. Ne midhendiyè dan te ki Jesus su edtudtulan dan sikandin dutun te neulaula.

Ne hein netuenan eni Jesus is nehitavù ki Juan, mid-untud dan te avang ne mid-awè dan dutun te iyan dan dà su edhendiyè dan te wazà duen etew. Iyan, hein netuenan te mezakel he menge etew, ne mid-awè dan diyà te menge inged dan is ebpemeyvey he edtelukun ki Jesus.
Ne hein nekezunggù ensi Jesus, neehè din is mezakel he menge etew. Ne utew zin nengehizuwi sikandan ne mibewian din is egkengezeruwan dutun ne nengeulian.

Ne hein mahapun en, mid-uvayan sikandin te menge sumusundan din ne ke sikandan te, "Mahapun en utew ne wazà menge inged kayi te uvey tew; deyzey ke ibpeǥenat nu en is menge etew wey zan mekehendiyà te menge inged ne egkepemasa zan is egkekaan dan."
Ne ke si Jesus te, "Iyan kew mebeǥey te egkekaan dan."
Ne ke sikandan te, "Es! Iyan dà naazen tew zini is lelima he vuuk he supas wey zezuwa he vuuk he pait."
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Uwita niw zini."

Ne zutun migkeǥiyan din is menge etew he mebpinuu zan diyà te tanà; ne migkuwa zin haazà is lelima he supas wey haazà is dezuwa he pait ne midlingahà diyà te langit ne mibpeselematan din te Megbevayà. Mibpenevìtevì din is menge supas, ne imbeǥey zin diyà te menge sumusundan din. Ne minsan pa zutun wazà maamin haazà is supas. Ne midtukid te menge sumusundan din pemeǥayi zutun is menge etew.
Ne is kada sevaha zutun te menge etew, nekekaan ne nahantey. Ne haazà is egkeenen, nesemaan pa te sepulù wey zezuwa he vinevey is nehimes te menge sumusundan din he menge tevì te supas.
Lelima he libu is kezakel zutun te menge maama he nekekaan ne wazà iragkes te ebilang is menge vahi wey menge vatà.
Ne zutun impemeuntud ni Jesus te avang is menge sumusundan din wey zan mekehuna mekerapas pehendiyà te zehipag dutun te ranew su ibpemeulì din pa haazà is mezakel he menge etew.
Ne hein nemekehipanew en haazà is menge etew, midtekezeg si Jesus diyà te vuvungan te sebsevaha zin ne mid-ampù. Ne hein mezukilem en, kemulu pa zutun si Jesus te sebsevaha zin.
Ne haazà is nemen-untud te avang, diyè dan en te lawed te ranew ne nereǥenan sikandan te zekelà he vaǥel su egkesinuǥung dan is dekelà he keramag.
Ne hein meǥaan egkepawà, midhendiyà si Jesus te kandan he ziyà sikandin ebpenggiekgiek te zivavew zutun te wahig.
Ne te kegkeahaa kandin te menge sumusundan din, utew zan neherati. "Gimukud!" ke sikandan, ne nemekeerang dan is egkengehandek.
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan, "Sarig kew," ke sikandin, "kenè kew mahandek su iyan a."
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Pedro te, "He Zatù, ke tutuu he iyan ka heeyan, pengelinteuwi nu he mekehendiyan a ne mekehipanew a kayi te zivavew te wahig."
Ne ke si Jesus te, "Hendini ka." Ne midrenà si Pedro puun dutun te avang ne midhipanew zutun te zivavew te wahig pehendiyà te ki Jesus.
Ne hein neǥezam din he utew mevendes is keramag dutun, ne netik-ew sikandin mahandek ne idteledted en sikandin. Ne segugunà sikandin nekekulahì te, "Tevangi a!"
Ne segugunà migewezi sikandin ni Jesus te egkaǥi te, "Maan is kenè ka ebpekesarig kediey? Maan is eduwazuwa ka?"
Ne mid-untud dan dutun te avang, ne mid-engked haazà is keramag.
Ne is menge zuma he menge sumusundan din dutun te avang, mid-azap dan ki Jesus he ke sikandan te, "Benar iyan he Anak ka te Megbevayà!"
Ne hein nekeuma zan en diyà layun, nekezunggù dan diyà te inged he Giniserit.
Ne nekilala si Jesus te menge etew zutun. Ne impemetukew zan is egkengezeruwan diyà te menge siringan he inged dutun. Ne nemekeuma is ebpenhated diyà te ki Jesus te menge etew he zuen daru.
Ne midhangyù dan ki Jesus he ituǥut din he mekeǥawed dan te minsan sidsid dà te kumbalè din ne nengeulian is langun he nekeǥawed dutun.
Ne zutun, duen menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he menge tigHiruselim he midhendiyà te ki Jesus. Mid-insè dan ki Jesus te,

"Is menge sumusundan nu, maan is edsupaken dan is menge tuluuwen he imbilinbilin kenitew te lukes tew? Su is menge sumusundan nu, kenè dan ebpenlùlù te menge velad dan te hustu he paaǥi te kegkaan te kenè dan pa ebpuun egkaan."
Ne mid-insà daan si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Ne sikiyu zaan, maan is, pinaaǥi te kedtumana niw te menge tuluuwen he imbilinbilin keniyu te menge apù niw, ne edsupaken niw is suǥù te Megbevaya?
Su migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, 'Tehuza niw is amey niw wey iney niw.' Ne migkaǥi zaan te, 'Ke zuen edsulà te amey zin wey iney zin, ne kinahanglan he edhimetayan.'

Ne iyan keniyu he penurù is: ke zuen etew he zuen din igketavang te iney zin wey amey zin, idtuǥut niw he egkaǥi sikandin diyà te kandan te, 'Heini is idtavang ku pezem keniyu, kenè ku igkeveǥey su imbuwis ku en heini te Megbevayà.'

Ne zutun," ke si Jesus, "sumalà is penurù niw, wazè en kinahanglan he ebeǥayan din pa te tavang is ginikanan din. Iyan heini paaǥi niw wey niw kenà metuman is Lalag te Megbevayà wey niw iyan metuman haazà is keniyu he penurù.
Tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Utew hustu is Lalag te Megbevayà he insurat te tipehuna he ebpeneuven he si Esaias. Netagnè kew zin, su ke sikandin te,
'Heini he menge etew, egkaǥi zan he edtehuzen e zan, iyan, wazà kedtuu he neseled diyà te ǥehinawa zan.
Wazà pulus te kedsimbaha zan kedì su zutun te kebpenurù dan, egkeǥiyen dan he menge suǥù ku is kandan dà he ebpeveelan te menge etew.'"
Ne zutun mid-umew ni Jesus is mezakel he menge etew zutun he med-uvey zan diyà te kandin. "Pemineg kew," ke sikandin, "wey niw mesavut.
Is igkeepesi te Megbevayà te etew, ne kenà iyan sikan is egkeenen he id-ahuk dutun te etew ziyà te vèbè din, kekenà, iyan sikan is menge mezaat he lalag he egawas he ebpuun te vèbè dutun te etew."
Ne mid-uvayan si Jesus te menge sumusundan din ne ke sikandan te, "Netuenan nu ve he nepeukan ka te menge Perisiyu tenged te menge lalag nu ǥeina?"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Ebezuten is minsan hengkey he pinemula he wazà ipemula te Amey ku he Megbevayà.
Bey-ani niw en is menge Perisiyu. Iring sikandan te menge lakap. Ne ke zuen lakap he ed-eǥaken din is sengelelakap, haazà is ebpeeǥakà, ne pudu egkeulug diyà te vitu."
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Pedro te, "Luwasa nu kenami sikan is kehuluǥan te sempitè nu ǥeina."
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Kenè niw pe ves egkesavut?
Kenè niw ves egkeisip he is id-ahuk ta ziyà te vèbè ta, ne ebpehendiyà te ǥetek ta ne zutun egawas puun te lawa ta? Ne kenà iyan haazà igkeepes te Megbevayà.
Iyan, is menge mezaat he lalag he ziyà egawas te vèbà te etew, diyà ebpuun te ǥehinawa zin, ne iyan heini utew igkeepesi kandin te Megbevayà.

Su ziyà te ǥehinawa te etew ebpuun is menge mezaat he isip he utew igkeepes te Megbevayà iring te kebunù, kedhilavet te kenè din esawa, meremerik he ulaula, kebpenakew, kedtarùtarù diyà te hukmanan, wey is kebpenudtul zin te tarù wey mezeeti is dengeg te sengeeetew.
Iyan heini menge ulaula he igkeepes te Megbevayà, iyan, kenè din igkeepes is kegkaan ta he wazè ki mekepenlùlù te velad ta sumalà is betasan te menge Perisiyu."
Ne mid-awà si Jesus dutun su edhendiyà te inged he uvey te menge inged he Tiru wey Sidun.

Ne zuen dutun nekeubpà he vahi he tigKenaan. Ne midtelavuk haazà ki Jesus su edhangyù, ke sikandin te, "He Zatù he kevuwazan ni Hadì David, kehizuwi a kenikew su zuen anak ku he vahi he egkerasey utew su edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin."
Iyan, kenà edseǥipaan ni Jesus. Ne zutun, mid-uvayan si Jesus te menge sumusundan din; ne midhangyù dan he ke sikandan te, "Ipeulì nu heeyan is bahi su kenà edsuwey kenitew he ebpekeuringer."
Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is bahi te, "Midsuǥù a te Megbevayà he iyan dà ibpetevangan kedì is kevuwazan ni Israyil he nengetazin iring te kerehidu."
Ne zutun mid-uvey haazà is bahi ne midluhud diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus is edhenduen te, "Datù, tevangi a!"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Kenà meupiya ke egkuwaan ta is egkeenen te menge vatà ne idsamak te menge asu."
Ne migkaǥi haazà is bahi te, "Benar iyan, Datù, iyan, minsan ke asu ne ebpekekaan gihapun te menge mumu he egkengeulug puun te lemisahan te teǥiasu kandin."
Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is bahi te, "Bayi," ke sikandin, "utew zekelà is kedtuu nu te Megbevayà. Ne ibeǥey ku kenikew is ebuyuen nu." Ne zutundutun neulian haazà is anak dutun te vahi.
Ne mid-awà si Jesus dutun ne mibpemeyvey te ranew he Geliliya. Midtekezeg sikandin diyà te vuvungan dutun ne mibpinuu.

Ne mibpenhendiyà te kandin is utew mezakel he menge etew. Mibpenduma zan is menge piang, menge pungkul, menge lakap, menge emew. Ne miduma zan is mezakel pa he egkengezeruwan. Ne insavuk dan haazà diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus ne nengeulian din is langun dutun te mibpevawì kandin.

Ne utew nengeinuinu is menge etew zutun te nengeehè dan. Su ebpekekaǥi en sikan is emew; ne neulian en sikan is pungkul; sikan is piang, ne ebpekehipanew en; ne sikan is nengelakap, ne ebpekeehè en. Ne midalig dan dutun is Megbevayà he edsimbahan dan te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil.

Ne mid-umew ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din, ke sikandin te, "Kehizu kayi he menge etew su tetelu en he kezukileman is wazè dan medsuwey kediey, ne wazè dan en egkekaan. Kenà meupiya he ebpekeulì sikandan te wazè dan mekekaan su kela ke luyahi sikandan diyà te zalan."
Ne migkaǥi haazà is menge sumusundan din te, "Meziyù heini te menge valey. Ne wazà kayi egkekuwaan ta te ibpekaan keniyan te utew mezakel he menge etew."
Ne mid-insà si Jesus te, "Pira he vuuk is supas niw?" Ne midtavak dan te, "Pitu he vuuk wey pira he leǥas he pait he zezeisek," ke sikandan.
Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus he mebpinuu ziyà te tanà haazà is menge etew.

Ne zutun migkuwa zin haazà is pitu he supas wey menge pait ne mibpeselamatan din te Megbevayà. Ne mibpenevìtevì din ne imbeǥey zin diyà te menge sumusundan din haazà ne intukid te menge sumusundan din ipemeǥey haazà diyà te menge etew.
Ne nemekekaan is langun he menge etew zutun ne nengehantey. Ne pitu pa he vinevey is netiǥum te menge sumusundan ni Jesus he samà dutun te menge etew.
Heepat he libu is menge maama zutun te nekekaan ne wazà iragkes te ebilang is menge vahi wey menge vatà dutun.
Ne zutun impemeulì ni Jesus haazà is menge etew. Ne mid-untud sikandin te avang ne midhendiyà te inged he Megadan.
Duen menge Perisiyu wey Sedusiyu he midhendiyà te ki Jesus su egezamen dan sikandin. Umba mid-insaan dan, ke sikandan te, "Ipeehè key te singyal he tuus he suǥù ka te Megbevayà."
Iyan, midtavak si Jesus te, "Emun edsanlep en is andew ne ebpemurawag, egkaǥi kew te, 'Meupiya is timpu keeselem.'
Ne ke egkepawà ne ebpemurawag ne zuen kivel, egkaǥi kew zaan te, 'Edrendeng guntaan.' Egketuusan niw is uzan tenged te ǥapun, iyan, kenè niw ves egketuusan is ed-ul-ulahan guntaan te Megbevayà.

Sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, utew kew mezaat; wazè en diyà te ǥehinawa niw is kebmahala te Megbevayà! Maan is ed-ehè kew te singyal? Iyan dà singyal he ibpaahà keniyu is iring duen te singyal he neulaula zuen te tipehuna he si Jonas." Ne zutun mid-ewaan din sikandan.
Ne midlayun dutun te ranew is menge sumusundan ni Jesus, ne wazè dan mekeuwit te supas su nelipatan dan.
Hein nekerapas dan en, duen sempità he impezineg kandan ni Jesus. Ke sikandin te, "Andam kew wey niw melikayi is tapey te menge Perisiyu wey Sedusiyu."
Ne wazè dan mesavut he kenà iyan is tapey te supas egkeǥiyen din, ne mibpelelelaǥè dan te, "Iyan ingkeǥiya zin kayi su wazè kiw mekeuwit te supas."
Ne nesavut ni Jesus is egkeǥiyen dan ne ke sikandin te, "Maan is egkesamuk kew te wazè kew mekeuwit te supas? Utew meluya is kedtuu niw!

Wazè bes meketaǥù diyà te isip niw he kenè ta igkesamuk is supas? Wazè niw ves metenuzi kes mibeelan ku hein mibpenevìtevì ku kes menge supas wey mekekaan sikan is lelima he libu he menge maama? Wazè niw ves daan metenuzi sikan is menge vinevey he nengepenù te midhimes niw he nengesamè dan?
Ne wazè bes daan diyà te isip niw kes pitu he vuuk he supas he impekaan ku zuen te heepat he libu he menge maama, wey sikan is menge vinevey he nehimes niw?
Maan is wazè niw mesavut he kenà supas is egkeǥiyen ku? Andam kew wey kew mekelikey te tapey te menge Perisiyu wey Sedusiyu."
Ne human mesavut te menge sumusundan din haazà he kenà iyan ebpelikayan din kandan is idtapey te supas, kekenà, iyan is ibpenurù te menge Perisiyu wey Sedusiyu.

Midhendiyà ensi Jesus te inged he uvey te inged he Sisarya Pilipus. Ne hein nekeuma zan en dutun, mid-insaan din is menge sumusundan din te, "Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, hentei e kun sumalà te ked-isipa kediey te menge etew?"

Ne midtavak dan te, "Is duma, ne iyan ke kun si Juan Megbebewtismu he nevanhew. Ne is duma, ke sikandan te, iyan ka si Elias. Ne egkaǥi is duma pa te si Jeremias ka, ne emun kenà, ne sevaha ka zuen te ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà."
Ne ke si Jesus te, "Ne sikiyu zaan, hentei e man sumalà te ked-isipa niw kediey?"
Ne zutun midtavak si Simon Pedro te, "Iyan ka sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì din te menusiyà; iyan ka sikan is Anak te wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà."
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Simon, anak ni Juan, midtuvazan ka te Megbevayà su wazè nu metueni heini pinaaǥi te etew, kekenà, impinted kenikew te Amey ku he ziyà te langit.

Ne tenged kayi egeraran ku sikew ki Pedro, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, batu. Ne iring te vatu is edtukuzan ku te iglisya ku, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is menge etew he edtuu kediey. Ne minsan is gehem te kemetayen, ne kenà ebpekezaag kandan.

Ne idsarig ku kenikew is kebayàbayà emun edhadì is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit. Ne kinahanglan he is idawey nu zini te kelibutan, indawey en he zaan te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit; ne is idtuǥut nu zini te tanà, intuǥut en he zaan te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit."
Ne zutun mibpeketelteleenan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din he kenè dan tudtula ziyà te minsan hentei he iyan sikandin sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì.

Ne puun dutun impesavut din te menge sumusundan din is imbanglis kandin. Ke sikandin te, "Kinahanglan he edhendiyà a te Hiruselim ne utew merasey is ed-ul-ulahan kedì te menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu, menge punuan he memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Edhimetayan e zan ne seled te tetelu he andew zutun, egkevanhew a."
Ne zutun insivey sikandin ni Pedro, ne ke si Pedro te, "He Nengazen, berakat he kenà tumana te Megbevayà heini is migkaǥi nu."

Ne midsinaru si Jesus diyà te ki Pedro is egkaǥi te, "Sikew is ed-iring ki Setanas, awè ka zini te kediey. Egkesanggen a kenikew su wazà diyà te isip nu is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan diyà te isip nu is egkesuatan te etew!"

Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, "Ke zuen egkesuat he edsundan kedì, kinahanglan he iawè din diyà te isip din is kandin he egkesuatan he menge ulaula, ne tianga zin is krus din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kinahanglan he edtumanen din is menge suǥù ku minsan ke iyan ibpatey zin. Ne human ebpekesunud kedì.

Su ke zuen etew he egkenuǥunan din is untung din, ebpatey ǥihapun. Iyan, ke zuen etew he edsunud kedì, minsan ke ibpatey zin pa, id-ulì te Megbevayà diyà te kandin is untung din ne kenè en sikandin ebpatey te wazà pidtemanan.

Minsan ke maangken pa te etew is tivuuk he kelibutan, wazà pulus diyà te kandin ke kenà sikandin egkeveǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan, su wazà minsan hengkey he azen he igkeliwè din wey zin maangken is untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Su Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, imbanglis kedì he mekelikù a keuzemà he edumahan te menge velinsuǥuen ku wey edsun-uzan ad te mekeǥeǥehem he anlag te Amey ku he Megbevayà. Ne zutun edsuhulan ku is langun he menge etew sumalà is mid-ulaula te uman sevaha.
Kenè niw heini lipati he zuen menge zuma tew kayi he kenà ebpatey taman te egkeehè e zan is Kakey te Menusiyà he ebpekeuma su edhadì."
Neiwas is heenem dutun he andew ne miduma ni Jesus ensi Pedro, si Santiago, wey si Juan, sikan is hazi ni Santiago, ne midtekezeg dan te metikang he vuntud he iyan dan dà.
Ne zutun te kedtengtengi zan ki Jesus, netik-ew mahalin is dagwey zin. Utew merayag is paras din iring te andew. Ne nengenamag is bisti zin te keputì.
Ne zutun netik-ew zan daan maahà si Moises wey si Elias he ebpekidlalag ki Jesus.
Ne migkaǥi si Pedro ziyà te ki Jesus te, "Utew meupiya te zini key. Ke egkesuatan nu, ebeelan ku kayi is tetelu he lawig; sevaha is kenikew, sevaha zaan is ki Moises, wey sevaha is ki Elias."

Ne te kemulu pa heini is lalag ni Pedro, neselikuvungan sikandan te ebpenganlag he ǥapun. Ne ebpuun dutun te ǥapun nezineg dan is midtik-ew megkaǥi te, "Iyan heini sikan is Anak ku he utew ku minahal; ingkesuat ku utew sikandin. Pemineǥa niw sikandin."
Ne hein nezineg heini zutun te menge sumusundan ni Jesus nekelangkeb dan su utew zan nengahandek.
Ne mid-uvayan sikandan ni Jesus ne migewezan din sikandan ne ke sikandin te, "Enew kew, kenè kew mahandek."
Ne hein mid-enew zan, ne iyan dan dà dutun maan naahà si Jesus.
Ne zutun te edtupang dan, mibeleuzan sikandan ni Jesus te, "Heini is neehè niw, kenè niw tudtula ziyà te minsan hentei taman te kenè e pa is Kakey te Menusiyà egkevanhew."

Ne zutun mid-insaan si Jesus te menge sumusundan din te, "Maan is egkeǥiyen te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he kinahanglan he edhuna edlepew si Elias, sikan is ebpeneuven dengan, ne human sikan is edhadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà?"
Ne zutun midtavak si Jesus te, "Tutuu iyan he egkehuna ebpekeuma si Elias su ed-endamen din is langun.

Iyan, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he nekeume en iyan si Elias, iyan, wazà sikandin mekilala te menge punuan. Midrasey zan sikandin sumalà is egkesuatan dan he ed-ul-ulahan dan kandin. Ne iring ded dutun te kedresaya zan kandin is ed-ul-ulahan dan dini te kedì te Kakey te Menusiyà."
Ne human mesavut dutun te menge sumusundan ni Jesus he iyan egkeǥiyen din si Juan Megbebewtismu.
Ne hein neumahan dan sikan is mezakel he menge etew, ne zuen etew zutun he mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus ne midluhud diyà te etuvangan din.
Ke sikandin te, "Datù, kehizuwi nu is anak ku. Ebevuyen sikandin ne utew merasey is egkeulaula zin su layun egkeulug diyà te hapuy wey ziyà te wahig.
Impeehè ku ziyà te menge sumusundan nu, iyan, wazè dan meulii sikandin."

Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, utew zekelà is menge sayep niw! Wazè niw iyan kedtuu! Utew ves egkeuǥet is kebpekiduma ku keniyu! Utew ves egkeuǥet is kebpekeantus ku keniyu ne human kew edtuu! Ihengkayi niw heeyan is batà."
Ne midawey ni Jesus is mezaat he mulin-ulin he edlalung dutun te vatà ne impeǥuwè din ne zutundutun neulian haazà is batà.
Ne is menge sumusundan din, hein iyan dan dà engki Jesus, mid-uvayan dan sikandin. Ne ke sikandan te, "Maan is wazè dey meulii sikan is batà he edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin?"

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Wazè niw meulii tenged te utew zeisek is kedtuu niw. Tentenuzi niw he ke zuen niw kedtuu, minsan utew zà deisek iring te lisu te mustasa, egkehimu he egkekeǥiyan niw heini is buvungan he medhalin, ne ebpemineg keniyu. Minsan hengkey, ne egkehimu niw.
Iyan, sikan he kelasi te mezaat he mulin-ulin, igkepaawà pinaaǥi zà te ked-ampù wey pinaaǥi te kedsalang te kegkaan. Wazà duma he paaǥi."

Netiǥum is menge sumusundan din diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya. Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, duen timpu he ibpalad a ziyà te menge kuntada ku ne edhimetayan e zan,
iyan, seled te tetelu he andew zutun egkevanhew a." Ne zutun utew nengeseeng is menge sumusundan din.

Nekeume en si Jesus wey menge sumusundan din diyà te inged he Kepirnaum. Ne mid-uvayan si Pedro te menge menunukut te ibayad dutun te Valey te Megbevayà. Ne mid-insà sikandan te, "Is menunudlù niw, ebayad be sikandin te ebpeveyazan kandin te Valey te Megbevayà?"

Ne midtavak si Pedro te, "Uya, ebayad sikandin." Ne hein mid-ulì dutun si Pedro ziyà te valey, iyan si Jesus mid-insà kandin te, "Simon, hengkey is ked-isipa nu kayi? Penenglitan, kayi te kelibutan hentei is ebayad te sidula ziyà te hadi? Iyan be is menge mesipeg din wey ke iyan be is kenè din kezuzumahi?" Ne ke si Pedro te, "Iyan is kenè din kezuzumahi."
Ne ke si Jesus te, "Ne emun iyan heeyan, ne kenè en ebpekevayad is menge mesipeg te hadì. Ne sikita is mesipeg diyà te Megbevayà, kenà daan kinahanglan he ebeyazan ta is ebpeveyazan te valey zin.

Asal, kenà meupiya he mepauk kenita heini is menge menunukut te ibayad dutun te Valey te Megbevayà. Hendiyè ka te ranew ne pemunuwit ka. Ne zutun te vèbà te pait he egkehuna nu egkeutel, egkeehè nu is selapì. Kuwaa nu haazà is selapì ne ivayad nu kayi te edsukuten kenita he ibayad te Valey te Megbevayà."
Ne zutun he timpu midhendiyà te ki Jesus is menge sumusundan din ne mid-insè dan te, "Hentei is lavew te menge etew he edhedian te Megbevayà?"
Ne mid-umew ni Jesus is batà ne impeteliwazè din dutun te menge sumusundan din.

Ne ke si Jesus te, "Kenè niw lipati heini: kinahanglan he ed-ewaan niw ziyà te isip niw is kebpelavew ne iringi niw heini is batà, su nelevawan sikandin te langun. Su emun kenè niw ed-iringan heini, ne kenè kew egkehedian te Megbevayà.
Su is etew he ed-engkezan din is kebpelavew ne ed-iringan din heini is batà, iyan sikandin lavew te langun he edhedian te Megbevayà.
Is etew he tenged te kedtuu zin kedì edewaten din ne ebpurungan din is minsan hentei he vatà he iring kayi, ne nezawat e zin en daan.

Minsan hentei he etew he pinaaǥi kandin egkeawà is kedsarig kediey te sevaha he vatà, meupiya pa zutun he etew ke edhiketan is lieg din te zekelà he ǥelingan he vatu ne id-agbur ziyà te lawed te zaǥat kenà is silut kandin ke pinaaǥi kandin egkeawà is kedsarig te sevaha he vatà he iring kayi.

Kehizu te menusiyà, su zuen iyan menge ebpekeawà te kedsarig te menge etew. Layun egkehitavù is iring kayi, iyan, kehizu utew te etew he pinaaǥi kandin egkeawà is kedsarig kediey te minsan hentei he midtuu kedì su utew meveǥat is silut kandin te Megbevayà.

Emun iyan ebpekeawà te kedsarig nu kediey is belad nu, emun kenà, ne paa nu, tempeza nu wey itimbag! Su meupiya pa ke pungkul ka is ebeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan, kenà te zezuwa is belad nu wey paa nu he idtimbag ka ziyà te hapuy he wazà pidtemanan.

Ne emun iyan ebpekeawà te kedsarig nu kediey is mata nu, luǥita nu wey itimbag su meupiya pa ke sevaha zà is mata nu ke ebeǥayan ka te untung he wazà pidtemanan, kenà te zezuwa is mata nu ne idtimbag ka pehendiyà te hapuy te Impirnu.

Ne is menge etew he iring kayi te menge vatà, kenè niw lupiǥi is minsan sevaha kandan su venar is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebantey kandan, kenà ed-awà diyà te etuvangan te Amey ku he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.
Su siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan impekehendini ku te kelibutan su wey ku melibri is menusiyà wey kenà sikandan mesiluti tenged te menge salè dan.

Ke zuen etew he nenggatus is menge ayam din he kerehidu ne egketazin is sevaha zutun, hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan din? Iyan ed-ul-ulahan din is ed-ewaan din haazà is kesiyawan wey siyew he wazà metazin he ebpemenabtab diyà te kelendiǥan, ne ebpen-ahaan din haazà is sevaha he netazin.
Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke egketuredu zin haazà, utew sikandin egkelipey zutun te sevaha kenà dutun te kesiyawan wey siyew he wazà metazin.
Iring din ded daan is Amey tew ziyà te langit su kenè din egkesuatan he zuen minsan sevaha zà kayi te menge vatà he kenà egkelibri te silut.

Ne emun duen tumutuu he nekesalà kenikew, hendiyè ka te kandin ne keǥiya nu ziyà te kandin is salè din kenikew. Iyan, kinahanglan he itavis nu kandin. Ne emun ebpekidhusayà sikandin, ebpeked-uliey kew te meupiya he ǥehinawa.
Iyan, ke kenà ebpekidhusayà, pengehè ka te sevaha, ne emun kenà, ne zezuwa pa he tumutuu su wey mepirmahi zutun te zezuwa, emun kenà, ne tetelu haazà is kebitiyara niw.

Ne emun kenè pa sikandin ebpekidhusayà, tudtula nu ziyà te nengetiǥum he menge zuma niw he tumutuu. Ne emun kenè pa ebpekidhusayà dutun, isipa niw sikandin he iring te etew he kenà tumutuu te Megbevayà wey isipa niw zaan sikandin he iring te sevaha zuen te limbungan he menunukut te vuhis.

Ne egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he kinahanglan he is idawey niw zini te tanà, indawey en he zaan te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit ne is idtuǥut niw zini te tanà, intuǥut en he zaan te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.

Ne heini zaan is ibpesavut ku keniyu: ke zuen minsan hengkey he ebuyuen niw ziyà te Megbevayà he neuyunan te minsan dezuwa zà keniyu zini te tanà, ibeǥey heini keniyu te Amey ku he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.
Su ke zuen minsan dezuwa, ne emun kenà, ne tetelu, he egkevurun su ed-azap dan kediey, ne zutun a zaan te kandan."
Ne zutun mid-uvayan si Jesus ni Pedro te egkaǥi te, "Nengazen, kepipira ebpekesalà is duma ku zini te kediey ne ebpeseyluwen ku pa? Kepipitu zè be?"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Kenà kepipitu zà, kekenà, kepipitu egkekekepituwan.
Su is kedhadì te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, ne iring te hadì he edsusiyen din is menge utang kandin te menge suluǥuen din.
Ne zutun te kebpuuni zin pa te kedsusi kayi, mid-uwit dan diyà te kandin is sevaha he nekeutang diyà te kandin te sepulù he libu he libu he pisus.
Ne haazà, kenà ebpekevayad ne tenged dutun insuǥù dutun te hadì he ivelegyà haazà is etew wey meuripen ragkes is esawa zin wey menge anak din wey langun he azen din wey meveyazi haazà is utang din.

Ne zutun midluhud diyà te etuvangan te hadì haazà is suluǥuen he edhangyù, ke sikandin te, 'Ipaakul a kenikew; beǥayi e pa te timpu su edleǥuzan ku heini is bayad ku kenikew ne ebeyazan ku is langun.'
Ne nehizuwan haazà is etew zutun te hadì ne mibpesaylu zin ne wazè din en ipevayad dutun te utang din diyà te kandin. Ne impeulì din.

Ne zutun mid-awà haazà is suluǥuen ne neuma zin is suluǥuen daan dutun te hadì he utangan diyà te kandin haazà is iring din he suluǥuen te pira zà he pisus. Ne migewezan din haazà ne mibpekel zin te egkaǥi te, 'Beyazi nu kes utang nu kedì!'
Ne midluhud haazà diyà te etuvangan din is edhangyù diyà te kandin te, 'Ipaakul a kenikew; beǥayi e pa te timpu su wey ku meleǥuzi is bayad ku kenikew.'
Iyan, wazà mesuat haazà is etew, ne impepirisu zin haazà is utangan kandin taman te kenè pa ebpekevayad.

Ne hein netuenan te menge zuma zin he suluǥuen haazà is mid-ulaula zin dutun te utangan kandin ne nengepauk dan ne midhendiyè dan te egalen dan he hadì ne midtudtul zan haazà is langun he mid-ulaula zin.
Ne impetawag dutun te hadì haazà he suluǥuen, ne migkeǥiyan din te, 'Uripen ka he lalung! Mibpesaylu ku sikew ne in-awè kud diyà te kenikew is utang nu tenged dà te midhangyù ka kediey.
Ne maan is wazè nu mehizuwi kes duma nu he suluǥuen iring te kegkehizuwi ku kenikew?'
Ne utew nererengiti haazà is hadì ne impepirisu zin haazà is etew su edsilutan taman te kenè pa sikandin ebpekevayad dutun te langun he neutang din.
Ne," ke si Jesus te, "iring ded daan kayi is ed-ul-ulahan te Amey ku he ziyà te langit diyà te uman sevaha keniyu emun kenà tutuu is kebpesaylu niw te minsan hentei he zuma niw."
Ne hein ingkepenurù en ni Jesus haazà is langun, mid-awà sikandin diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya ne midhendiyà te Hudiya, diyà layun te wahig he Hurdan.
Utew mezakel he menge etew is nemenduma kandin, ne mibewian din is egkengezeruwan dutun ne nengeulian.

Duen menge Perisiyu zutun he midhendiyà te kandin su ebpengahaan dan te paaǥi sikandin wey zan ikesumbung. Ne mid-insaan dan sikandin te, "Intuǥut be te kesuǥuan is ked-engkezi ta te esawa ta minsan ke wazè ta utew ketezengan?"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Wazè niw ves mevasa sikan is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà

he edhenduen te, 'Dengan te kedlimbaǥa te Nengazen te langun, mibeelan din is maama wey vahi. Tenged kayi ed-ewaan te maama is amey zin wey iney zin ne ebpengesawa te vahi ne zutun egkesevaha sikandan.'
Ne tenged kayi," ke si Jesus, "kenè en maan dutun dezuwa he etew haazà is teleesawa, kekenà, sevaha zà, ne tenged kayi zaan kenà egkehimu he ipedsuwey te etew is midsevaha te Megbevayà."

Ne mid-uman med-insà is menge Perisiyu te, "Ne maan is intuǥut ni Moises diyà te maama he veǥayi zin dà is esawa zin te kemetuuzan te kebpekidsuwey emun egkesuatan din he meengkezi zin haazà is esawa zin?"

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Intuǥut ni Moises is kedsuwayi niw te esawa niw su ǥeina te edsumpeliten niw is penurù, iyan, dengan te kedlimbaǥa te langun, wazà ituǥut heini te Megbevayà is kebpekedsuwey te teleesawa.

Ne tenged kayi egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke zuen maama he ed-engkezan din is esawa zin he wazà sikandin is maama selselai zutun te esawa zin ne ed-uman ebpengesawa, ne haazà he maama, ebpekesalà dutun te nehuna he esawa zin tenged dutun te kebpengesawa zin."
Ne zutun migkaǥi is menge sumusundan ni Jesus te, "Emun iyan bes heini egkeulaula te telteleesawa meupiya pa ke kenà ebpees-eseweey is etew."

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Duen menge etew he imbanglis kandan te Megbevayà is kenà ebpekeesawa emun maama, ne kenà egkeesawa emun bahi; ne meupiya iyan haazà diyà te kandan, iyan, kenà meupiya te langun.

Su kenè en ed-iring-iring is ketezengan te etew ke maan is kenè dan ebpengesawa wey egkeesawa. Is duma, kenà ebpekeesawa wey egkeesawa su iyan en haazà kegkeetew-etew zan; ne is duma zaan tenged te migkapun; ne is duma pa, kenà ebpekeesawa wey egkeesawa su wey zan metuman is insuǥù kandan te Megbevayà tenged te kedhadì din. Sikan is ebpekezawat te kenè din kebpengesawa, wey ke kenè din kebpeesawa, ne meupiya ke edewaten din en."
Duen menge vatà he mid-uwit te menge etew ziyà te ki Jesus wey zin mezepeneti te palad din wey mepenubtuvazi. Ne midawey heini te menge sumusundan din.
Iyan, migkaǥi si Jesus dutun te, "Ipehendini niw te kediey heeyan is menge vatà; ne kenè niw zewaya su is etew he zuen din kedsarig he iring te kedsarig te vatà ne iyan ebpekepahadì te Megbevayà."
Ne midepenetan din haazà is menge vatà ne mibpenubtuvazan din ne hein nepasad din haazà, ne mid-awà dutun.
Duen menguhed he etew he mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus he ed-insà te, "He Menunudlù, hengkey is meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan ku wey a meveǥayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan?"

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Maan is id-insè nu kedì is meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan he sebsevaha zè man is ed-ulaula te meupiya ne wazè en duma, kekenà, iyan dà is Megbevayà. Ke egkesuat ka he meveǥayi ka te untung he wazè din pidtemanan, tumana nu is menge suǥù te Megbevayà."
Ne mid-insà haazà is etew te, "Hengkey he menge suǥù?" Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Kenè ka mebunù; kenè nu selselai is esawa nu; kenè ka penakew; kenè ka tarùtarù;
tehuza nu is amey nu wey iney nu; wey purungi nu is duma nu; isipa nu sikandin he iring te kenikew en he ǥehinawa."
Ne migkaǥi haazà is etew te, "Is langun keniyan, ne mibentayan ku; hengkey pa is kurang ku he ebpeveelan kedì?"

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Emun edheǥeten nu pa, ulì ka ne ivelegyè nu is langun he menge azen nu, ne is halin, ibpemeǥey nu ziyà te menge egkengeayuayu, ne edsepian ka ziyà te langit. Ne ke egkeipus nu heeyan likù ka zini wey ka mekesundan kediey."
Ne hein nezineg heini zutun te menguhed he etew, ne mid-ulì he utew mibmesakit is gehinawa zin su utew zekelà is ketiǥeyunan din.
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, "Utew mereǥen te sepian he etew is kebpesakup din te Megbevayà wey mehedii sikandin.
Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he kenè din egkehimu. Melemu pa te kemilyu is kedseled din diyà te vudsi te raǥum kenà te sepian he etew is kebpesakup din te Megbevayà wey sikandin mehedii."
Ne hein nezineg heini te menge sumusundan din utew zan neinuinu, ne ke sikandan te, "Emun kenà egkehimu te sepian, ne kenè bes egkehimu te minsan hentei is ked-angken te untung he wazà pidtemanan."
Ne zutun midtengtengan sikandan ni Jesus te egkaǥi te, "Kenà iyan egkehimu te etew; iyan, egkehimu mulà te Megbevayà he ibpaangken din is etew te untung he wazà pidtemanan su egkehimu zin is langun."
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Pedro te, "Ahaa nu man, mid-ewaan dey is langun he menge azen dey wey key mekesunud kenikew. Ne hengkey is idsuhul kenami?"

Ne midtavak dutun si Jesus te, "Benar heini is egkeǥiyen ku, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, mekeǥeǥehem a keuzemà te kedhadì ku emun egkeveǥu en is langun; ne sikiyu is menge sumusundan ku, egkehedian niw zaan is menge kevuwazan te sepulù wey zezuwa he anak ni Israyil.

Ne is minsan hentei he mid-ewaan din is baley zin, menge suled din, amey zin, iney zin, anak din, wey tanè din su edsunud sikandin kediey, egkezawat din is kenenggatus egketakep haazà is mid-ewaan din ne liyu zutun ibeǥey kandin is untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Iyan, mezakel is menge etew ǥuntaan he henduen be te zekelà is pid-etawan dan, iyan, utew minus is pid-etawan dan keuzemà. Ne mezakel zaan is etew ǥuntaan he utew minus is pid-etawan dan, iyan, keuzemà, utew zekelà is pid-etawan dan," ke sikandin.

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Is kedhadì te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, iring te etew he zuen din menge pinemula he ǥawed he egngezanan te paras. Ne midselemselem haazà is etew mebpengahà te etew he edsuhulan din he ibpeterebahu zin dutun te perasan din.

Is aney he nengeehè din, mid-uyun dan he ebeyazan din is uman sevaha kandan te sengeelad he pelata su iyan haazà neleyaman he suhul te sevaha he etew te sengeandew. Ne zutun impepuun din en haazà is menge etew he edsuhulan din ipeterebahu zutun te perasan din.
Ne hein liwazè en ebpemenahik is andew zutun, midlikù sikandin mebpengahà te etew. Ne ziyà te tiyenggiyan neehè din dutun is menge etew he wazà mibpeterebahu kandan.
Ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is menge etew te, 'Terebahu kew ziyà te perasan ku ne edsuhulan ku sikiyu te hustu.'
Ne midterebahu haazà is menge etew. Ne hein neudtu en is andew zutun, midlikù en maan haazà is etew pehendutun te tiyenggiyan. Ne iring din ded hein liwazà ebpenaug is andew.

Ne hein meǥaan en edsanlep is andew, midlikù en maan sikandin dutun te tiyenggiyan. Ne neehè din dutun is menge etew he wazè dan terebahu, ne migkeǥiyan din te, 'Maan is tekew kew en kayi ed-uubpaubpà te egkehepunan en ne kenè kew edterebahu?'
Ne midtavak dan te, 'Geina te wazà ebpeterebahu kenami.' Ne migkaǥi haazà is etew te, 'Terebahu kew ziyà te perasan ku.'
Ne hein mezukilem en migkeǥiyan dutun te etew is sineriǥan din te, 'Umawa nu sikandan is ebpemenerebahu ne suhuli nu. Iyan nu hunai te edsuhul sikan is nengehuziyan, ne human sikan is nengehuna.'
Ne sikan is nemekepuun meketerebahu hein meǥaan en edsanlep is andew, midsuhulan din te tigsengeelad he pelata.

Ne hein iyan en edsuhulan sikan is nengehuna zutun, nekeperateng dan he lavew pa te insuhul zutun te utew nengehuziyan he neketerebahu is idsuhul kandan, iyan, tigsengeelad ded daan he pelata is insuhul kandan.
Umba hein edewaten dan en haazà is suhul kandan, ne neepes dan ne migkeǥiyan dan haazà is etew he mibpeterebahu kandan te,
'Sengeuras dà is kedterebahu kayi te nengehuziyan, ne sikami, ne tivuuk he andew is ked-antus dey te utew meinit, ne imped-iiring nu zà is suhul zey te langun!'
Ne migkeǥiyan dutun te etew is sevaha kandan te, 'Geli, wazè ku sikiyu lupiǥi. Su is mid-ulaula ku ne iyan neuyunan tew he tigsengeelad he pelata is idsuhul ku te uman sevaha keniyu.
Dewata niw en heeyan is idsuhul ku keniyu ne ulì kew su egkesuatan ku he mesuhuli heini is nengehuziyan te iring te suhul ku keniyu.
Kenè be egkehimu he iyan a ebayàbayà te kediey he selapì? Egkesina kew ve kandan tenged te ketulanged ku?'"
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Is egkengehuziyan guntaan ne iyan egkengehuna keuzemà, ne sikan is egkengehuna ǥuntaan ne iyan maan egkengehuziyan keuzemà."
Ne te kedtekezeg eni Jesus diyà te Hiruselim, migkeǥiyan din sikan is sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan din he medtapid sikandan su zuen egkeǥiyen din kandan dutun te ziyè dan pa te zalan.

Ne ke sikandin te, "Netuenan niw he edhendiyè kiw te Hiruselim. Ne emun ebpekeuma kiw zutun, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ibpalad a ziyà te menge punuan he memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Ne egkeuyun dan he ebpehimetayan a,

ne ibpalad e zan daan diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu. Ne is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, ne ed-iringen e zan te velvelayen, ebuǥelen e zan, ne idransang e zan te krus su edhimetayan a. Ne seled te tetelu he andew zutun, ebenhawen a te Megbevayà."
Ne zutun mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus is esawa ni Sibidiyu zuma is dezuwa he anak din he maama. Midluhud sikandin diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus su zuen ebuyuen din.

Ne mid-insaan ni Jesus te, "Hengkey is egkesuatan nu?" Ne midtavak haazà is bahi te, "Heini is dezuwa he anak ku he sumusundan nu, egkesuatan ku he, keuzemà ke ebpinuu ke en diyà te pinuuwè nu te kedhadì, ibpepinuu nu zaan sikandan, is sevaha ziyà dapit te egkekewanan nu, ne is sevaha, diyà dapit te egkeǥivang nu."
Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is dezuwa te, "Wazè niw mesavut ke hengkey is edhengyuen niw. Egkeantus niw ve is merasey he ibpaantus kedì?" Ne midtavak dan is dezuwa te, "Uya, egkeantus dey."

Ne ke si Jesus te, "Benar iyan he ibpaantus keniyu is iring te ibpaantus kedì, iyan, kenà a iyan ebpilì ke hentei is ibpepinuu ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan ku wey ziyà te zapit te egkeǥivang ku, su iyan dà ebpekepinuu zutun sikan is etew he midteǥenahan te Amey ku he Megbevayà."
Ne hein nezineg haazà duen te zuma zan he sepulù he sumusundan, wazè dan ikesuat is mibeelan dutun te zezuwa he telehazi.

Ne tenged dutun mid-umew ni Jesus sikandan langun ne ke sikandin te, "Netuenan ta he is menge punuan te menge inged, ne utew zan memevurut wey is menge zatù dan ne edatùdatù dà sikandan is layun ebmandar te menge etew.
Iyan, sikiyu mulà, kenà egkehimu is iring kayi ziyan te keniyu. Su ke zuen sevaha keniyu he egkesuat he mekelavew, kinahanglan he suluǥuen sikandin te langun he menge zuma zin;
ne emun duen sevaha keniyu he egkesuat he iyan sikandin ebpeketikangen te langun keniyu, kinahanglan he iyan sikandin mebpekevavà te langun.

Su iring te siak, is Kakey te Menusiyà, kenà iyan inhendini ku te kelibutan is wey a metevangi te menge etew, kekenà, wey a meketavang ne wey a zaan mekepehimatey wey ku mevelukasi is mezakel he menge etew."
Ne hein ed-awè dan en diyà te inged he Hiriku utew mezakel he menge etew is nemenduma ki Jesus.

Ne zuen dezuwa he lakap he ebpimpinuu diyà te kilid te zalan. Ne hein netuenan dan he edsaǥad si Jesus dutun, mid-umew zan is egkaǥi te, "He Zatù, kehizuwi key kenikew su iyan ka sikan is netagnà he kevuwazan ni Hadì David!"

Ne nepeukan sikandan te menge etew zutun ne migkeǥiyan sikandan te menge etew he med-engked dan he ebpengumew. Iyan, nasì en mesuǥù sikandan is ebpengumew te, "He Nengazen he kevuwazan ni David, kehizuwi key!"
Ne zutun midteren si Jesus ne migkaǥi ziyà te kandan te, "Hengkey is kinahanglan niw he ed-ul-ulahan ku keniyu?"
Ne midtavak dan te, "Datù, iyan kinahanglan dey is mekeehè key."
Ne nehizuwan sikandan ni Jesus ne midampè din is menge mata zan. Ne zutundutun nepuwasan is ked-ehè dan, ne miduma zan ki Jesus.
Ne hein uvey zan en diyà te inged he Hiruselim su uvey zan te inged he Bitpagi, ne uvey zaan te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan, migkeǥiyan ni Jesus is dezuwa zutun te sumusundan din,
ke sikandin te, "Hendutun kew te inged he egkeumahan tew. Ne egkeehè niw zutun is intagkes he asnu he zuen din nati. Hekazi niw ne uwita niw zini zuma is nati zin.

Ne ke zuen ed-insà keniyu ke maan is edhekazan niw, ne ke sikiyu te, 'Egkinehenglanen heini te egalen tew he si Jesus.' Ne segugunà idtuǥut dutun te ed-insà keniyu he uwita niw haazà is asnu zuma is nati zin," ke si Jesus.
Umba egkeulaula heini is migkaǥi ni Jesus su egketuman kes netagnà te ebpeneuven te Megbevayà dengan he edhenduen te,
"Tudtuli niw is menge meǥinged diyà te Siyun te, 'Ebpekeume en guntaan is hadì niw. Kenà meinit is kedhadì din keniyu ne ed-untud sikandin te nati te asnu;'" iyan heini lalag dutun te ebpeneuven.
Ne migenat haazà is midsuǥù ni Jesus ne mid-ulaula zan is insuǥù din.
Ne hein neuwit dan en haazà diyà te ki Jesus is asnu wey nati zin, mibelhenan dan te menge kumbalè dan ne mid-untud dutun si Jesus.

Ne is utew mezakel he menge etew zutun, tenged te zekelà is kedtahud dan ki Jesus impendempas dan is impenamput dan diyà te ibayà ni Jesus. Ne is duma zutun, mibpenamped dan te menge zehunen he rasang ne in-eneb dan impendempas dutun te zalan he ibayà ni Jesus.

Ne mezakel he menge etew is midhuna ki Jesus, ne mezakel zaan is ebpemeninundug kandin, ne ke sikandan is ebpemengulahì te, "Edtehuzen tew is kevuwazan ni Hadì David. Deliǥa is nekeuma he midsuǥù te Nengazen. Sikiyu is diyà te langit, tehuza niw zaan sikandin!"
Ne hein nekeuma si Jesus diyà te Hiruselim, mibmeǥurub is menge meǥinged dutun. Ebpein-inseey zan ke, "Hentei sikandin?"
Ne midtavak is mezakel he menge etew he nemenduma ki Jesus te, "Iyan sikandin sikan is ebpeneuven te Megbevayà he si Jesus he tigNeserit diyà te Geliliya."

Ne midseled si Jesus diyà te Valey te Megbevayà ne mibpenegseg din dutun is menge limbungan he etew zutun he ebpememelegyà wey ebpememasa. Mibpemiley zin is menge lemisahan te ebpemenliwà te menge selapì wey is menge pinuuwà te menge ebpememelegyà te ibpemuhat he merepatik.

Migkaǥi sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Is baley ku, ne egngezanan he valey he elempuanan.' Ne sikiyu," ke si Jesus, "nasì niw veeli he ubpeey te ebpemenlimbung."
Ne nemenelavuk kandin dutun te Valey te Megbevayà is menge lakap wey menge piang ne nengeulian din sikandan is langun.

Nengepauk is menge lavew he memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan dutun hein neehè dan is egkengein-inuwan he mibeelan ni Jesus wey nezineg dan is menge vatà diyà te Valey te Megbevayà he ebpemenhabet egkaǥi te, "Tehuza is kevuwazan ni Hadì David!"

Ne tenged dutun migkaǥi zan diyà te ki Jesus is egkengepauk te, "Egkezineg nu ve heini is egkeǥiyen dan?" Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Egkezineg ku. Wazè niw ves mevasa sikan is insurat he tagnà te ebpeneuven te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Mibpenurù nu is menge vatà wey mehustu is kedeliǥa zan kenikew.'"
Ne mid-ewaan din sikandan ne mid-awà sikandin dutun te inged he Hiruselim ne midhendiyà te inged he Bitanya, ne zutun medhizeǥà.
Ne te nepawà dutun te ziyà ensi Jesus te zalan su edlikù dan diyà te Hiruselim, egkevitil sikandin.

Ne te uvey zutun te zalan neehè din is kayu he igira. Mibeyaan din haazà, iyan, wazà beǥas he neehè din su menge zahun dà. Ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is kayu te, "Kenè ke en mebeǥas minsan keenu." Ne wazà metegteǥaad nelay-ub haazà is kayu.
Nengeinuinu utew is menge sumusundan ni Jesus dutun hein neehè dan is nehitavù dutun te kayu. Ne ke sikandan te, "Maan is segugunà nelay-ub heini is kayu he igira?"

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Tipiǥi niw heini ziyà te isip niw he ke edsarig kew te Megbevayà te kenà duwazuwa, egkehimu niw heini is midhimu ku kayi te kayu he igira. Ne kenà kayi zà taman su minsan pa ke ekeǥiyan niw heeyan is buntud te, 'Med-awè ka keniyan ne agbur ka ziyà te zaǥat,' ne ebpemineǥen kew zin.
Emun edsarig kew te Megbevayà, ke ed-ampù kew, egkezawat niw is ebuyuen niw."

Midlikù si Jesus diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà ne mibpenurù din is menge etew zutun. Ne nemekeuma is menge lavew he memumuhat wey menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu zutun ne mid-insè dan ki Jesus te, "Heini is langun he ed-ul-ulahan nu zini te simbahan, duen nu ve ketenged te ked-ulaula kayi, wey hentei is mibeǥey kenikew te ketenged wey nu meulaula heini?"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Duen daan id-insè ku keniyu, ne emun edtevaken a keniyu, edtevaken ku zaan sikiyu ke hengkey is kediey he ketenged te ked-ulaula ku kayi te langun.

Hentei is mibeǥey ki Juan Megbebewtismu te ketenged din te kebpemewtismu? Megbevayà be wey ke etew zà?" Ne zutun mibpein-inseey sikandan is egkaǥi te, "Emun egkeǥiyen tew he Megbevayà, ed-insà sikandin ke maan is wazè tew tuuwi si Juan.
Ne emun egkeǥiyen ta he etew zà, ebpemiligru ki te menge etew su midtuu zan he ebpeneuven si Juan te Megbevayà."
Umba, iyan tavak dan dutun ki Jesus is, "Hanew ta." Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Kenè ku zaan egkeǥiyen keniyu ke hengkey is ketenged ku te kebaal kayi te langun," ke sikandin.

Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Hengkey is isip niw kayi? Duen etew he zezuwa is anak din he maama. Mibeyaan din is kakey ne migkeǥiyan din te, 'Diyè ka ǥuntaan, Mama, terebahu te perasan.'

Ne midtavak haazà is anak din te, 'Es! kenà a egkesuat.' Asal netegteǥaad dutun neisip-isip din haazà, ne mibmezaat is gehinawa zin dutun te keberawa zin te amey zin ne zutun midtuman din haazà is ebpeveelan kandin.

Ne mibeyaan daan dutun te etew is hazi ne iyan ded daan insuǥù din haazà is insuǥù din duen te sevaha he anak din. Ne mid-uya haazà is hazi zutun te migkaǥi kandin, iyan, wazè din beeli haazà is ibpeveelan kandin."

Ne ke si Jesus te, "Hentei zutun te zezuwa he telesuled is hustu he neketuman te suǥù te Amey zan?" Ne ke sikandan diyà te ki Jesus te, "Iyan haazà is kakey." Ne ke si Jesus dutun te, "Benar iyan he edhuna keniyu is menge mezaat he etew iring te menge menunukut te vuhis wey is menge vahi he ibpenapì dan is dengeg dan su edewaten sikandan te Megbevayà wey zin mehedii kenà sikiyu.

Su nekeuma si Juan, ne impeehè din keniyu is paaǥi wey kew mebmetazeng ne wazè niw sikandin tuuwi, iyan, midtuuwan mulà sikandin te menge limbungan he menunukut wey menge vahi he ebpemenapì te zengeg dan. Ne minsan te netuenan niw heini, wazè niw iniyuǥi is memezaat he ulaula ne wazè kew zaan medtuu kandin."

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Pemineǥa niw is selakew pa he sempità he egkeǥiyen ku keniyu mehitenged te ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà. Duen etew he zuen din pemuleey he mibpemulaan din te menge ǥawed he paras. Mid-alad din haazà, ne mibudsiyan din te meluag is dekelà he vatu su ebeelan din he keresà te wahig dutun te veǥas te paras. Ne midlelawig sikandin te ebpeubpaan din te ebantey zutun te perasan. Ne mibpeelimahan din haazà is perasan ne zutun midhendiyà te sengeǥinhedian.
Ne hein tiraǥun en dutun, midsuǥù din is menge suluǥuen din he ibpekuwa te vahin din dutun te perasan din.
Ne hein nemekeuma haazà is menge suluǥuen din, mibpemuǥel zutun te impemeelima zin te perasan is sevaha zutun. Ne is sevaha, midhimetayan dan, ne is sevaha pa zutun, midtuleng dan te vatu.

Ne mid-uman medsuǥù heini is etew te mezakel pa kenà is nengehuna he midsuǥù din. Iyan, iyan ded gihapun mid-ulaula zutun te impemeelima zin te perasan is mid-ulaula zan dutun te nengehuna he suǥù din.
Ne te ketepusan, midsuǥù kayi te etew is anak din, su egkeisip din is, 'Kenà egkehimu he kenè dan edtehuzen is anak ku,'

Iyan, hein naahà dutun te impemeelima zin te perasan haazà is anak din, migkaǥi zan te, 'Na, iyan en heini sikan is anak din; kuwa kew en su edhimetayan tew ne egkeangken tew en heini is perasan din.'
Ne migewezan dan haazà ne intimbag dan diyà te ǥawas dutun te perasan ne midhimetayan dan."
Ne ke si Jesus te, "Emun ebpekeuma sikan is teǥiǥaked dutun te perasan, hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan din dutun te impemeelima zin dutun te perasan?"
Ne midtavak dan te, "Iyan is: ebpenhimetayan din haazà is impemeelima zin ne ebpeelimahan din maan haazà is perasan te selakew en he menge etew he ebeǥey mulà te vahin ke egkeuma is tiraǥun."

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Siguradu nevasa niw en sikan is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Sikan is batu he himan te valey, mid-engkezan te menge pandey su kunaan dan ke wazè din pulus. Ne heini, nehimu en guntaan he vatu he iyan dà ebpekepurung te valey. Ulaula heini te Nengazen, ne igkeinuinu tew utew.'
Umba," ke si Jesus, "benar iyan he kenè kew en maan is menge Hudiyu edhedian te Megbevayà su iyan din edhedian is menge etew he edtuman te egkesuatan din.

Ne haazà he vatu, ke và dà egkeǥiya, iyan sikandin kes mibpilì he hadì, ne emun egkeuluǥan te etew haazà, egkepurung egkerupet is egkeulug dutun. Iyan, ke zuen etew he egkeuluǥan dutun te vatu ne egkepurung egkeapug is lawa zutun te egkeuluǥan."
Ne heini is menge sempità ni Jesus, nezineg te menge Perisiyu wey menge lavew he memumuhat ne nesavut dan he iyan din sikandan egkeǥiyen.
Iyan, hein ed-isipen dan en edekepa si Jesus, kenè dan egkehimu su egkehandek dan te mezakel he menge etew su midtuu is menge etew he ebpeneuven si Jesus te Megbevayà.
Ne mid-uman mebpenurù si Jesus te menge etew pinaaǥi te menge sempità.
Ke sikandin te, "Is kedhadì te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, ne iring te hadì he midtukud te zekelà he keemuran su ebpengesawa is anak din.
Midsuǥù din is menge suluǥuen din he ibpetukew sikan is menge etew he migkeǥiyan he zaan he ipetelavuk dan en dutun te keemuran. Iyan, is menge etew, wazè dan itetepian haazà is menge suluǥuen.

Ne mid-uman medsuǥù haazà is hadì te selakew en he menge suluǥuen din ne ke sikandin te, 'Keǥiyi niw sikan is menge etew he nelapè ku en is menge vaka wey menge impemelambù ku he nati, ne nelemise en is egkeenen. Ne medhendini en sikandan.'
Iyan, henduen be te wazà mekezineg haazà is menge etew. Wazè dan iniyuǥi is menge vaal zan. Is sevaha, ne ziyà te pemuleey zin ne is sevaha, ne ziyà te tindahan din.
Ne is duma he etew zutun, migewezan dan haazà is midsuǥù te hadì, ne mibpemuǥel zan ne human dan himetayi.
Ne zutun utew nepauk haazà is hadì. Midsuǥù din is menge sundaru zin ne sikan is nemumunù, mibpenhimetayan te menge sundaru ne mibinsulan dan is inged dutun te mibpenhimetayan dan.
Ne midtiǥum te hadì is menge suluǥuen din ne ke sikandin te, 'Nelemise en is keenen, iyan, sikan is ibpemetelavuk ku, kenè bes dait kayi te keemuran ku.
Umba, ikula niw is menge kersada he mezakel is menge etew zuen, ne minsan pira he etew is egkeehè niw ne ipehendini niw.'

Ne migenat haazà is menge suluǥuen din ne mid-ikul zan is menge kersada, ne is langun he etew he neuma zan, meupiya is ulaula zin se mezaat is ulaula zin, ne mid-umbita zan. Ne nepenù haazà te etew is turuǥan te hadì.
Ne zutun te kedseled te hadì su ed-ahaan din is nengetiǥum he etew, neehè din dutun is etew he wazà medsun-ud te bisti te eseweey.
Ne ke sikandin te, 'He Mama, maan is nekeaku ka he edtelavuk kayi te keemuran he wazè ka medsun-ud te bisti te eseweey?' Iyan, wazà igketavak dutun te etew.

Ne insuǥù dutun te hadì te menge suluǥuen din te, 'Bekusa niw is menge velad wey paa zin ne itimbag niw sikandin diyà te ǥawas, diyà te merusirem he utew meziyù. Ne zutun sikandin ebpekengingitel ne ebpekekulahì tenged te utew sikandin ebpekedsendit.'"
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Mezakel he menge etew is midtawag te Megbevayà wey zin egkehedii, iyan, mezelag dà is egkepilì din."
Ne zutun mid-ewaan si Jesus te menge Perisiyu su ed-uyunan dan ke hengkey is kegkepulutikahi zan ki Jesus wey mehimu he ikesumbung dan.

Ne midsuǥù dan diyà te ki Jesus is menge sumusundan dan wey menge sakup te upakat he midtukud ni Hirudis. Ne haazà is midsuǥù dan, migkaǥi ziyà te ki Jesus te, "Menunudlù, netuenan dey he metazeng ka he etew; su ibpenurù nu is tutuu he ebpeveelan kenitew te Megbevayà, ne is lalag te menge etew, kenà ebpekehalin te ibpenurù nu tenged te wazè nu ibpelavi he minsan hentei.
Umba, keǥiyi key kenikew, ke ebpekesupak ki ve te kesuǥuan tew ke ebayad ki te vuhis diyà te hadì tew he ziyà te inged he Ruma?"
Ne netuenan ni Jesus ke hengkey is mezaat he ziyà te ǥehinawa zan ne ke sikandin te, "Teruen kew, maan is egezaman a keniyu?
Ipeehè niw kediey is selapì he ibayad niw te vuhis." Ne impeehè dan kandin is selapì.
Ne mid-insà si Jesus te, "Hentei ki zagwey wey ngazan heini is nekesurat kayi?"

Ne ke sikandan te, "Dagwey wey ngazan te hadì diyà te Ruma." Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Ne emun kandin, ne iyan egkesuatan din, iveǥey niw ziya te kandin, ne iveǥey niw zaan diyà te Megbevayà is kandin he azen," ke sikandin.
Ne hein nezineg dan haazà is lalag ni Jesus, utew zan nengeinuinu ne mid-ewaan dan si Jesus ne migawas dan dutun.
Ne netegteǥaad dutun, duen menge Sedusiyu he midhendiyà te ki Jesus. Is menge Sedusiyu, ne iyan is menge Hudiyu he edtuu he kenà egkengevanhew keuzemà is minsan hentei.

Ne migkeǥiyan dan si Jesus te, "Menunudlù, impenurù dengan ni Moises he emun duen maama he zuen din esawa ne ebpatey haazà is maama, kinahanglan he ebpemeluwen te suled dutun te maama haazà is ipag din su wey mevuwad haazà is minatey pinaaǥi zutun te suled din.

Ne zengan duen dini pitu he menge maama he teltelehazi. Mibpengesawa is kakey, iyan, minatey he wazà med-anak. Ne mibpemalu haazà is bahi te hazi zutun te minatey. Ne minatey zaan haazà is hazi he wazà mevuwad; ne haazà is bahi, mibpemalu en maan te hazi zutun te minatey. Ne iring din ded daan, minatey haazà is mibpemalu zutun te vahi he wazà mevuwad. Ne henduen dà duen su pudu nekeesawa zutun te vahi haazà is teltelesuled he pudu zin ingkevalu, iyan, nemematey zan maamin he wazà mevuwad.
Ne te ketepusan, minatey zaan haazà is bahi.
Ne keuzemà te andew ke egkengevanhew en is langun, hentei is hustu he teǥiesawa zutun te vahi? Su pudu nekeesawa kandin haazà is teltelesuled."

Ne midtavak kandan si Jesus te, "Nengesayep kew utew! Iyan is wazè niw mesavut sikan is ingkengesurat he menge Lalag te Megbevayà ne wazè niw zaan mesavut he mekeǥeǥehem is Megbevayà te kebpemanhew te menge minatey.
Su emun egkengevanhew en is menge minatey ne iring en sikandan te menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ziyà te langit he kenà ebpees-eseweey is menge maama wey vahi.
Eguǥuzan ku sikiyu wey kew mevenari he egkevanhew is menge minatey. Wazè niw ves mevasa sikan is insurat he Lalag keniyu te Megbevayà?

Su minsan te minatey en dutun si Abraham, si Isaak, wey si Hakub, migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, 'Iyan a Megbevayà he ed-ezapen ni Abraham wey ni Isaak wey ni Hakub,' he ke va dà egkeǥiya, kemulu zan pa ed-azap te Megbevayà ; su is ed-azap kandin, minsan ke ebpatey, duen din pa untung."
Ne hein nezineg heini te menge mezakel he etew, nengeinuinu zan utew zutun te kebpenurù din.
Ne hein netuenan dutun te menge Perisiyu he wazà nehimu te menge Sedusiyu ziyà te ki Jesus he igkepezekepa zan kandin, midtiǥum sikandan.
Ne is sevaha zutun, menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Ne migezaman din dekepa is ketezengan ni Jesus pinaaǥi te menge insà.
"Menunudlù," ke sikandin, "hengkey is lavew he suǥù duen te kesuǥuan?"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Kinahanglan he iyan nu mahala ziyà te ǥehinawa nu is Megbevayà he Nengazen tew. Iyan nu sikandin mahala ziyà te ǥehinawa nu, isip nu, wey kedsavut nu.
Iyan heini lavew he suǥù he edhuna te langun.
Ne iring din ded daan is ikezuwa he iyan heini: 'Kinahanglan he mahala nu is duma nu; isipa nu sikandin he iring te kenikew en he ǥehinawa.'
Is tivuuk he kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin kenitew ni Moises wey is menge penurù te menge ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, kayi ebpuun te zezuwa he suǥù," ke sikandin.
Ne hein midtiǥum is menge Perisiyu, mid-insaan sikandan ni Jesus te,
"Hengkey is isip niw? Kes mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì, hentei ki kevuwazan sikandin?" Ne midtavak dan te, "Kevuwazan sikandin ni Hadì David."
"Ne emun iyan heeyan," ke si Jesus, "maan is migkaǥi si David, pinaaǥi te ked-ulini kandin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, he Nengazen din sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà? Su migkaǥi zengan si David te,
'Migkaǥi is Megbevayà diyà te Nengazen ku te, "Kayi ka pinuu te zapit te egkekewanan ku taman te kenè ku pa ibpeluhud diyà te kenikew is menge kuntada nu." '"
Ne ke si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Emun migkaǥi ni David he Nengazen din sikan is ebperetengen he ibpahadì, egkehimu ve he kevuwazan dà duen ni David?"
Ne wazà neketavak ki Jesus dutun te minsan hengkey he menge insè din, ne puunè dà dutun wazè en maan nekeaku he ebpenginginsè pa maan kandin.
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te mezakel he menge etew wey ziyà te menge sumusundan din te,
"Is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey menge Perisiyu, insarig kandan is kebpenurù te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises.
Umba, kinahanglan he ebentayan niw wey edtumanen niw is minsan hengkey he penurù dan keniyu. Iyan, kenè niw iringi mulà is ulaula zan su kenè dan edtumanen is ibpenurù dan keniyu.
Utew mezakel is mereǥen he tulumanen he ibpetuman dan te menge etew, iyan, wazà minsan hengkey he idtavang dan dutun te menge etew wey meketuman haazà is etew zutun te ibpetuman dan.

Mezakel is ed-ul-ulahan dan wey sikandan mezalig te menge etew su ibpeehè dan he edtumanen dan is suǥù te Megbevayà pinaaǥi zà te ebped-eepizen dan he insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he ibedbed dan diyà te velad dan wey ziyà te vuked dan, wey pinaaǥi te utew meluag he sidsid te kemisula zan.
Iyan egkesuatan dan he utew zan tehuza ke edtelavuk dan te keemuran; ne emun diyè dan te simbahan, egkesuatan dan he iyan sikandan ibpepinuu ziyà te ebpepinuuwan te lavew he menge etew.
Utew ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa zan ke edtehuzen sikandan te menge etew ziyà te tiyenggiyan wey ke ed-umawen sikandan he 'menunudlù.'
Kenè niw ituǥut he iyan id-umew keniyu is 'menunudlù' su teltelesuled kew is langun ne sebsevaha zà is menunudlù niw he iyan a.
Kenè niw zaan gerari te 'amey' is minsan hentei kayi te kelibutan su sebsevaha zà is Amey niw he iyan is Megbevayà diyà te langit.
Kenè niw zaan ituǥut he iyan id-umew keniyu is 'egalen' su siak is mibpilì te Megbevayà, iyan e zà egalen niw.
Ne is ed-isipen niw he lavew ziyà te keniyu, kinahanglan he egkehimu sikandin he suluǥen niw te langun.

Sikan is ebpelavew, edhimuwen te Megbevayà he egkelevawan sikandin te langun. Ne sikan is ed-isipen din he lavew kandin is minsan hentei keniyu, edhimuwen sikandin te Megbevayà he lavew te minsan hentei keniyu.

Kehizu niw te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey sikiyu is menge Perisiyu su tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Su ke zuen etew he ibeǥey zin pezem is gehinawa zin diyà te hadì tew he Megbevayà, kenè niw edtuǥutan, ne kenè niw zaan ibpeveyveyaan is gehinawa niw te Megbevayà.

Kehizu niw te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey sikiyu is menge Perisiyu su tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Edlimbungan niw is menge valu he vahi wey niw maangken is baley zutun te edlimbungan niw. Ne utew meluǥayad is ked-ampù niw he iyan paaǥi te kedtembuni niw te mezaat he mibeelan niw. Tenged kayi utew zekelà is silut keniyu te Megbevayà.

Kehizu niw te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey sikiyu is menge Perisiyu su tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Edlayun kew te zaǥat ne edhipenawen niw is meluag he tanà wey niw mekabig is etew; ne is egkekabig niw, edhimuen niw he tuwas pa he zait sikandin he edsilutan diyà te Impirnu, kenà sikiyu.

Kehizu niw, su iring kew te lakap he ed-aǥak te sengelelakap. Ibpenurù niw he ke zuen etew he ebpenaad ne ibpengumew-umew zin duen te zekelà he simbahan, egkehimu he kenè din edtumanen haazà he penaad. Ne ibpenurù niw zaan he emun iyan din ebpengum-umawen sikan is bulawan duen te simbahan, kenà egkehimu ke kenè din edtumanen haazà is penaad din.

Menge lakap kew he tulebung! Su iyan bes lavew sikan is bulawan duen te Valey te Megbevayà! Kenà egkehimu! Su sikan is bulawan, iyan igketeǥui zin te ǥehem te Megbevayà su ǥeina te nekeseled duen te Valey te Megbevayà.

Ne ibpenurù niw zaan he ke zuen etew he ebpenaad, ne ke ibpengumew-umew zin duen te vangkù he ebpemuhatan diyà te Valey te Megbevayà, egkehimu he kenè din edtumanen is penaad. Iyan, emun iyan din ebpengum-umawen sikan is impemuhat he ziyà mekesavuk te vangkù ne kenà egkehimu ke kenè din edtumanen is penaad din.
Utew kew nelakap su iyan bes lavew is impemuhat? Kenà egkehimu, su iyan igketeǥui zin te ǥehem te Megbevayà sikan is bangkù he ebpemuhatan.

Ne tenged dutun, ke zuen ebpenaad, ne ebpengum-umawen din sikan is bangkù duen te seled te Valey te Megbevayà, kenà iyan dà sikan is bangkù egkeambit din, kekenà, elin sikan is impemuhat he zuen mekesavuk te vangkù.
Iring din ded daan ke zuen etew he ebpengum-umawen din is Baley te Megbevayà, kenà iyan sikan is baley egkeambit din, kekenà, iyan is Megbevayà he zutun ed-ubpà.

Ne ke zuen etew he ebpenaad ne ebpengum-umawen din is langit, iyan tutuu he egkeumew zin sikan is pinuuwà te Megbevayà, ne emun egkeambit din sikan is pinuuwà te Megbevayà, iyan tutuu he egkeambit din is Megbevayà.

Kehizu niw te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey sikiyu is menge Perisiyu, su tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Ibeǥey niw te Megbevayà is ikepulù he vahin minsan te menge perehemut te egkeenen iring te yirbebuyna, anis, wey kuminu, iyan, kenè niw edtumanen is menge lavew pa he suǥù iring te ked-ula-ula te metazeng, kegkehizu te zuma niw, wey kedtumana niw te menge penaad niw. Kinahanglan he ibeǥey niw is ikepulù, iyan, kenè niw zaan teǥaka heini is menge lavew pa he suǥù.
Iring kew te lakap he ed-aǥak te sengelelakap. Kenè niw egkeaku te ebaal is utew zeisey he salà, iyan, egkeekuwan niw mulà te ebaal is utew zekelà he salà.

Kehizu niw te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey sikiyu is menge Perisiyu su tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Ebpurungan niw ebentayi is menge vetasan niw, iyan, diyà te isip niw wey ǥehinawa niw ne zuen keheheramham wey kelelalung. Iring kew te vasu wey pinggan he nelumpiyuwan diyà te ǥawas, iyan, meremerik is diyà te seled.
Iring kew te lakap is menge Perisiyu! Lumpiyuwi niw hunai is idseled niw zutun ne human egkelumpiyu is tasa niw wey pinggan niw.

Kehizu niw, te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey sikiyu is menge Perisiyu, su tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Iring kew te valey he vatu he iyan lungun he mibpintalan te meputì he zutun idsavuk is lawa te nemematey. Meupiya he ed-ahaan diyà te ǥawas, iyan, dutun te seled din ne menge tulan te minatey he nengeredak en.
Iring kew zutun su emun ed-ahaan kew te etew henduen be te meupiya is ulaula niw, iyan, diyà te ǥehinawa niw, dutun is kedtarùtarù wey kedsupak te suǥù te Megbevayà.

Kehizu niw te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey sikiyu is menge Perisiyu su tarù is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà! Mideyzeyanan niw is menge valey he vatu he iyan inlungun niw te menge lawa te nemematey zengan he menge metazeng wey ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà.
Ne egkaǥi kew te, 'Angin ke neetew kiw en dutun te timpu te menge kepuun tew he mibpenhimetayan dan sikan is ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà su kenè kiw mulà dutun edtampu te mibeelan dan.'
Ne venar ves iyan he iyan kew sikan is menge kevuwazan te menge etew zengan he nekevunù te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà su iring kew kandan.
Himesaza niw en is mezaat he ulaula he wazà mepasad te menge kepuun niw!
Iring kew te menge uled wey menge anak te uled su utew mezaat is ulaula niw. Ebmenmenuwen niw te kedlikey is silut keniyu ziyà te Impirnu?

Su egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ibpehendiyan ku pa te keniyu is ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà, wey menge etew he mibeǥayan te Megbevayà te ketau, wey menge menunudlù. Ne edhimetayan niw is duma kandan. Ne is duma, idransang niw ziyà te krus ne ebpemuǥelen niw is duma ziyà te seled te menge simbahan niw ne ed-elawen niw sikandan diyà te minsan hendei he inged he egkepeveyaan dan te ebpemelaǥuy.

Tenged kayi, iyan kew edsilutan te kebpemunua te langun he menge metazeng he nevunù puunè dà dutun te kedhimetayi ki Abel he metazeng he etew zengan, taman te kedhimetayi te anak ni Berekiyas he si Zacarias he mibunù niw ziyà te pid-elangan te Valey te Megbevayà wey vangkù he pemuhatà.
Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, elin kew zaan edsilutan tenged te kegkengevunù kayi te langun."

Ne zutun netenuzan ni Jesus is menge ulaula te menge meǥinged te Hiruselim ne ke sikandin te, "Igkeseeng ku sikiyu is menge meǥinged diyà te Hiruselim su ebpemunuen niw is ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà, ne is menge suluǥuen te Megbevayà he ibpehendiyan, ebpenulengen niw te vatu he edhimetayan niw. Utew zekelà is suat ku pezem he ed-uyemuwen ku sikiyu; ke và dà manuk, iring a te upa he edlekupan din is menge piyak din, ne kenè kew ebpelekup.
Ne ǥuntaan, utew mekevulungbulung heini is simbahan niw su mid-iniyuǥan kew en te Megbevayà.
Su egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he kenè ad maan keniyu egkeahà taman dutun te timpu keuzemà he ebpekekaǥi kew te, 'Deliǥa is nekeuma he midsuǥù te Nengazen.'"

Ne migawas si Jesus puun dutun te Valey te Megbevayà. Ne te ked-awè din dutun, mid-uvayan sikandin te menge sumusundan din su ibpeehè dan kandin is Baley te Megbevayà wey is menge valey he ziyà te uvey zutun.

Ne migkaǥi kandan si Jesus te, "Tengtengi niw heini is langun su egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he heini is menge vatu he imbevaley zan kayi, wazà minsan sevaha keuzemà he ebpekeuntud diyà te sevaha su egkewaǥey heeyan is langun."

Ne netegteǥaad dutun mibpinuu si Jesus diyà te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan. Ne mid-uvayan en maan sikandin te menge sumusundan din te wazè dan duma su iyan dan dà. Ne ke sikandan te, "Keǥiyi key ke keenu egkehitavù heini is langun, wey ke hengkey is egkeulaula he tuus wey zey metueni he iyan en kedlikù nu wey kegketapus kayi te timpu?"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Andam kew wey kenè kew mekesundan te teruen he etew.
Su mezakel is ebpenlepew he egamit te ngazan ku ne egkaǥi is kada sevaha zutun he iyan sikandin sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì! Ne mezakel is ebpeketuu te menge tarù dan.

Egkezineg niw ziyà te uvey niw is meǥurub tenged te ǥira ne egkezineg niw zaan is tudtul te menge ǥira ziyà te meziyù he tanà. Iyan, kenè kew mahandek su kinahanglan he egkeulaula is iring kayi te kenè pa edtepusen heini is timpu.
Ebpekidtebek is sengeinged te zuma zin he inged; ne egira is sengeǥinhedian te zuma zin he ǥinhedian. Egkehitavù is bitil wey menge linug diyà te minsan hendei.
Iyan, heini he egkehitavù, ne iring te ed-anak he sikan pa ebpuunà is belilit din.
Egkuntedahan kew te tivuuk he menusiyà tenged te menge sumusundan ku sikiyu. Ne edekepen kew te menge etew ne ibpalad kew zan diyà te edrasey keniyu ne is duma keniyu edhimetayan dan.
Dutun he timpu, mezakel is egkepenulayan ne ibpalad te kada sevaha zutun is duma zin he tumutuu wey mehimetayi ne ebpekunkuntedehè dan.
Ne zutun ebpemenlepew is mezakel he teruen he etew he egkaǥi is uman sevaha kandan he ebpeneuven sikandin te Megbevayà. Ne mezakel is egkelimbungan dan.
Ne tenged te kebpekeeneb te kelelalung te menusiyà egkeawà diyà te ǥehinawa te kezekelan dutun is kebmahala zan te zuma zan.
Iyan, sikan is kemulu pa edtuu ke egkeuma haazà is ketepusan te menge kemeresayan, iyan ebeǥayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
Ne idsangyew ziyà te tivuuk he kelibutan heini is Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keaǥi te kedhadì te Megbevayà wey metueni heini te tivuuk he menusiyà. Ne emun egkepasad en haazà ne iyan en ketepusan.

Si Daniel, sikan is ebpeneuven te Megbevayà dengan, netagnè din is egngezanan te melimezang he ebpekekaid. (Is ebpekevasa kayi te netagnè din, kinahanglan he sevuta zutun te nekevasa haazà is nevasa zin.) Ne emun egkeehè niw he ziyè en heini ebpekehitindeg te Valey te Megbevayà,
mebpelaǥuy zan is diyà te prubinsya he Hudiya pehendiyà te menge vuvungan.
Sikan is etew he egkeserengà diyà te ǥawas te valey zin, kenè en med-usik-usik pa te timpu te kedseled diyà te valey he egkuwa te minsan hengkey te azen din.
Sikan is etew he ziyà egkeserengà te pemuleey zin, kenè en med-ulì te kegkuwa te malung din.
Ne zutun he andew, kehizu utew te menge vahi he memeǥingey wey ebpemenleǥimu su utew zan egkengereǥenan he ebpelaǥuy!
Hamen kew he ed-ampù diyà te Megbevayà he kenà heini meserengà is kebpelaǥuy niw zutun te timpu te meǥenew wey zutun te Andew te Kedhimeley.
Su utew mepait is kemeresayan dutun he timpu. Wazè pa meulaula is iring kayi puun pa te kedlimbaǥa te kelibutan. Ne emun egkehitavù heini kenè en maan egkehitavù is iring din te minsan keenu.

Iyan, midterinan en te Megbevayà is timpu zutun te kemeresayan su emun wazà, egkelimas dutun is tivuuk he menusiyà. Iyan, tenged te egkehizuwan din is menge pinilì din he etew, midterinan din is timpu zutun te kemeresayan.
Ne ke zuen egkaǥi ziyà te keniyu te, 'Ahaa niw; heini en is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà,' wey ke zuen be egkaǥi te, 'Heeyan en sikandin,' kenè kew mebpemineg dutun te egkaǥi.

Su zuen ebpemenlepew he menge teruen. Ne egkaǥi is kada sevaha kandan te, 'Iyan a sikan is hadì,' ne emun kenà, ne ke sikandin te, 'Ebpeneuven a te Megbevayà.' Ne ebpemeehè dan te egkein-inuwan wey menge singyal su ibpetuu zan pezem te menge tarù dan, ke egkehimu, is menge pinilì te Megbevayà.
Kenè niw heini lipati su mibpetizeenan ku sikiyu he zaan.

Ne emun duen egkaǥi te, 'Ahaa niw, su is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà, diyè en sikandin te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew,' ne haazà is etew he egkaǥi, kenè niw pemineǥa. Ne emun duen daan egkaǥi te, 'Kayi sikandin med-eles,' haazà is egkaǥi, kenè niw zaan tuuwi.
Su siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iring is kedlikù ku te kilat he idtik-ew ibmerayag te tivuuk he langit puun te edsilaan pehendiyà te edsenlepan. Egkeahà heini te langun.
Iyan, ke hendei is egkemahù, kenà egkehimu he kenà dutun daan is menge uwak he edhurun, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kenà egkehimu he kenà egkehitavù heini is langun.

Ne emun egkeiwas haazà is timpu te kemeresayan, kenè en edsilà is andew ne kenè en daan ed-anlag is bulan. Egkengeulug is menge vituen diyà te langit, ne egkengewaleng is menge kedesenan diyà te hewhewanan.

Ne zutun, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, egkeahà diyà te langit is tuus te kebpekeuma ku. Ne zutun utew egkengeseeng is langun he menge etew zini te kelibutan. Ne egkeehè e zan is Kakey te Menusiyà diyà te menge ǥapun su ebpekeuma a. Ne utew zekelà is gehem ku wey utew merayag is ked-anlag ku.

Ne zutun edsuǥuen ku is menge velinsuǥuen ku ziyà te heepat he pesaǥi kayi te kelibutan ne ibpezaǥing is budyung ne edtiǥumen dan is menge pinilì ku he etew he ebpemuun diyà te minsan hendei kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan.
Isipa niw is ibpenurù ku keniyu pinaaǥi te sempità he kayu he igira. Dini te kenita, emun ebpeneringsing en is subpang dutun he kayu ne ebpenlumbey en, egketuenan ta he meǥaan en is gulavung.
Iring din ded daan, emun egkeehè niw he egkengetuman en is langun kayi te migkaǥi ku, egketuenan niw he meǥaan a ebpekelikù.
Tenuzi niw is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu: emun egkeehè niw he egkengetuman en heini kenè kew pa egkeamin ebpatey taman te kenè pa egkengetuman heini is langun.
Egkehanew is langit wey tanà, iyan, heini is migkaǥi ku, kenà mulà egkehanew te minsan keenu.

Is Amey tew he Megbevayà, iyan dà nesayud ke keenu egketuman heini is langun. Ne ǥawas kandin wazè en nesayud te andew wey uras ke keenu heini egkehitavù. Is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà diyà te langit, wazè dan mesayud, wey minsan siak is Anak te Megbevayà, wazà a zaan mesayud.
Ne siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, keuzemà te timpu te kedlikù ku zini te kelibutan, ebpekeiring is menge ulaula te menge etew zutun duen te menge ulaula zengan te menge etew zuen te timpu ni Noe.

Su te wazè pa medlapey is daǥat, wazà diyà te isip dan ke hengkey is egkehitavù. Iyan dà neisip te menge etew is kegkebibu ne migkaan dan ne mid-inum dan ne mibpees-eseweey zan taman te midseled en si Noe te zekelà he avang he egngezanan te arka.
Ne wazà diyà te isip te menge etew sikan is egkehitavù kandan taman te midlapey is daǥat ne nengelened sikandan. Ne iring ded dutun keǥaan is kegketik-ew te kedlikù ku te Kakey te Menusiyà keuzemà.
Dutun he timpu zuen dezuwa he maama he ziyà te pemuleey su edterebahu; egkuwaan te menge velinsuǥuen ku is sevaha zutun ne egketaǥak is sevaha.
Ne zutun duen daan dezuwa he vahi he ebpeuǥupà te kebpenggaling; ne egkuwaan te velinsuǥuen ku is sevaha ne egketaǥak is sevaha.
Purungpurung kew su kenè niw egketuenan ke keenu he andew is kedlikù ku te Nengazen niw.
Kenè niw heini lipati he emun egketuenan te teǥiǥaked te valey ke keenu ebpekeuma is tekawen dutun te valey zin, ne kenà sikandin edlipezeng. Ne zutun, kenà egkeselezan te tekawen haazà is baley.
Iring din ded daan, layun kew andam su ebpekeuma a is Kakey te Menusiyà te uras he kenà a keniyu ebperetengen.
Sikan is suluǥuen he uluwanen wey metinumanen, iyan ibpevayàbayà te egalen din te menge zuma zin he suluǥuen. Ne iyan ebpekaan te menge zuma zin he suluǥuen dutun te uras te kegkaan.
Emun ed-ulì haazà is egalen din, utew zekelà is kelipey zutun te suluǥuen ke egkeahà te egalen din he midtuman din en is langun he ebpeveelan kandin.
Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he is suluǥuen he metinumanen, idsarig kandin is langun he menge azen te egalen din.
Iyan, kehizu zin ke iyan diyà te isip din is egkeuǥet pa ed-ulì haazà is egalen din,
ne ebpemuǥelen din is menge zuma zin he suluǥuen; ne egkaan wey ed-inum duma te menge lelenguten.
Su zutun he andew te wazè din peebuta wey zutun te uras he wazè din metueni, ebpekeulì haazà is egalen din.

Ne haazà he suluǥuen, edsilutan sikandin dutun te egalen din ne ebeelan diyà te kandin is iring te ebeelan daan diyà te menge etew he tarù is kedtuu zan. Ne zutun ebpekekulahì sikandin ne ebpekengingitel tuus te utew zin kebpekedsendit."
"Dutun te kedlikù ku, is kedhadì te Megbevayà, ne iring te sempità he sepulù he raǥa he netukid te sulù su edsinuǥungen dan is ebpengesawa.
Is lelima kandan, ne tulebung; ne is duma zan he lelima, ne memetau.
Haazà is menge tulebung, mid-uwit dan is menge sulù dan, iyan, wazà gas he mid-uwit dan he teǥana ke egkeamin is gas dutun te seled te sulù dan.
Ne haazà is memetau, kada sevaha kandan mid-uwit te sulù lapik is gas he intaǥù te butilya he teǥana ke egkeamin is gas dutun te sulù dan.
Ne ǥeina te neuǥet mekeuma sikan is ebpengesawa, ebpemekezungkàdungkè dan en dutun is edtaǥad he ebpemekelipezeng.
Ne hein metaneb en dutun is kezukileman ne nezineg dan is ed-umew te, 'Heini en sikan is ebpengesawa; sinuǥunga niw en sikandin.'
Ne nepukew haazà is sepulù he raǥa ne midsusi zan is menge sulù dan ne mibpurungan dan.
Ne zutun migkaǥi haazà is menge tulebung dutun te menge memetau te, 'Beǥayi key te gas su egkengeevukan en is kenami he menge sulù.'
Ne midtavak haazà is memetau te, 'Kenà egkehimu su kenà egkampet kenitew te langun is gas he neuwit dey. Hendiyè kew te tindahan wey kew mekepemasa te gas.'

Ne zutun migenat haazà is menge tulebung su ebpemasa zan te gas, ne hein nehaus dan en nekeuma sikan is ebpengesawa. Ne haazà is lelima he menge raǥa he memetau, miduma zan kandin te edseled dutun te valey he zutun is eseweey. Ne hein nekeseled dan en dutun ne midlekevan haazà is baley.
Ne netegteǥaad dutun nekeuma zaan haazà is menge zuma zan he raǥa; ne ziyè dan dà te ǥawas is egkaǥi te, 'He Nengazen, he Nengazen, puwasi key.'
Ne midtavak haazà is ebpengesawa te, 'Kenè ku sikiyu egkekilala.'"
Ne ke si Jesus te, "Iring dutun, kinahanglan he andam kew su wazè niw metueni ke hengkey he andew wey ke hengkey he uras is kedlikù ku.
Is kedhadì te Megbevayà ne iring daan te etew he edhipanew. Te wazè pa sikandin megenat, midtiǥum din is menge suluǥuen din su idsarig din kandan is selapì din wey zan ikepetiǥayun.

Mibahin din kandan sumalà is egkeveleveg te uman sevaha kandan te ebpetiǥayun. Is sevaha, mibeǥayan din te lelima he libu he pisus; ne is sevaha, mibeǥayan din te zezuwa he libu; ne is sevaha pa, nengkelibu he pisus is imbeǥey zin dutun. Ne zutun migenat haazà is etew he edhipanew.
Ne sikan is suluǥuen he mibeǥayan te lelima he libu he pisus, impetiǥayun din haazà is kandin, ne netiǥayun te lelima pa he libu.
Iring din ded daan sikan is suluǥuen he mibeǥayan te zezuwa he libu he pisus, su netiǥayun daan te zezuwa pa he libu.
Iyan, sikan is suluǥuen he mibeǥayan te nengkelibu he pisus, mid-awà dutun ne inleveng din diyà te tanà haazà is selapì dutun te egalen din.
Ne hein neuǥet dutun, mid-ulì haazà is egalen dan su edsusiyen din haazà is selapì din.

Ne midtelavuk kandin sikan is suluǥuen din he mibeǥayan te lelima he libu he pisus ne indata zin haazà is selapì ragkes sikan is genansya he lelima he libu. Ne ke sikandin te, 'Mibeǥayan a kenikew te lelima he libu he pisus; ne heini zed is genansya he lelima he libu he pisus.'

Ne migkaǥi haazà is egalen din te, 'Utew meupiya is baal nu! Metinumanen ka he suluǥuen! Ne ǥeina te egkeseriǥan ka te zeisey he selapì idsarig ku kenikew is dekelà. Seled ka zini wey ka mekeambit te kelipey ku.'

Ne midtelavuk daan kandin sikan is mibeǥayan din te zezuwa he libu he pisus ne ke sikandin te, 'Datù, mibeǥayan a kenikew te zezuwa he libu he pisus. Ahaa nu, heini zed daan is genansya he zezuwa he libu he pisus.'

Ne migkaǥi haazà is egalen din te, 'Utew meupiya is baal nu! Metinumanen ka he suluǥuen! Geina te egkeseriǥan ka te zeisey he selapì, idsarig ku kenikew is dekelà. Seled ka zini wey ka medlipey te kelipey ku.'

Ne midtelavuk daan sikan is suluǥuen he mibeǥayan din te nengkelibu he pisus. Ke sikandin te, 'Datù, netuenan ku he wazè nu kehizu su edreǥunen nu is kenè nu pinemula, ne ebpenggenansya ka te wazè nu ipetiǥayun.
Ingkehandek ku sikew umba inleveng ku ziyà te tanà is selapì nu. Ahaa nu; heini zed sikan is selapì nu.'
