Ne midtavak haazà is egalen din te, 'Utew mezaat is baal nu! Peǥulen ka he suluǥuen! Netuenan nu ves he edreǥunen ku is kenè ku pinemula ne ebpenggenansya a te wazè ku ipetiǥayun?
Maan is wazè nu ipeutang heeyan is selapì ku wey mepursintuwi wey medekelà is bali zin wey ku mezawat kayi te kedlikù ku?'
Ne zutun migkaǥi sikandin diyà te selakew en he suluǥuen te, 'Kuwaa nu heeyan is nengkelibu he pisus keniyan te kandin ne iveǥey nu ziyà te nekekuwa te sepulù he libu.
Su sikan is egkeseriǥan te insarig kandin, ed-umanan pa. Iyan, sikan is kenà egkeseriǥan, edhewien diyà te kandin minsan is deisek he insarig kandin.
Ne heini is wazè din pulus he suluǥuen, itimbag niw ziyà te merusirem he utew meziyù diyà te ǥawas. Dutun ne ebpekekulahì wey ebpekengingitel tenged te utew ebpekedsendit.'
Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, dutun te kedlikù ku he utew zekelà is gehem te ked-anlag ku wey edumahan ad te langun he menge velinsuǥuen ku, ebpinuu ad is edhadì.
Ebpekeetuvang kedì is tivuuk he menusiyà. Ne zutun edtepizen ku sikandan te zezuwa he vahin iring te kedtepiza te bekidu zuen te menge kambing wey menge kerehidu.
Idtapid ku is iring te menge kerehidu ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan ku, ne sikan is iring te menge kambing, idtapid ku ziyà te zapit te egkeǥivang ku.

Ne zutun, siak is hadì, egkeǥiyan ku is menge etew ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan ku te, 'Sikiyu is midtuvazan te Amey ku he Megbevayà, kayi kew su iyan kew edhedian ku. Su is kedhadì ku keniyu, inteǥana en dengan puun pa te kedlimbaǥa te kelibutan.
Su hein nevitil a, impekaan a keniyu; ne hein nemezahan a, impeinum a keniyu; minsan wazà a keniyu mekilala, midawat a keniyu ziyan te valey niw.
Hein wazè ku ugelingen mibeǥayan a keniyu; hein nezeruwan a, mid-elimahan a keniyu. Hein nepirisu a, midlauy a keniyu.'
Ne ed-insaan a zutun te menge etew he metazeng he ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan ku te, 'Nengazen, keenu zey sikew maahà he nevitil wey nemezahan ne impekaan dey wey impeinum dey sikew?
Keenu zey sikew zewata ziyà te valey zey te wazè dey sikew mekilala? Keenu ka megkinahanglan te ugelingen nu, ne mibeǥayan dey sikew?
Keenu zey sikew melauy he egkezeruwan wey ziyà te pirisuan?'

Ne zutun, siak is hadì, edtavak a te, 'Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke mid-ulaula niw heini ziyà te minsan sevaha kayi te menge suled ku, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, menge tumutuu kedì, minsan ke utew minus is pid-etawen din, neulaula niw en heini ziyà te kedì.'

Ne zutun egkeǥiyan ku is menge etew he ziyà te zapit te egkeǥivang ku te, 'Sikiyu is midrewakan te Amey ku he Megbevayà, awè kew kayi! Su zutun kew te regreg he wazè din pidtemanan he inteǥana he zaan ki Setanas he iyan idsilut kandin duma te menge velinsuǥuen din!
Su zengan nevitil a, iyan, wazà a keniyu ipekaan; nemezahan a, ne wazà a keniyu ipeinum.
Wazè ku egkepemenehikan ne wazà a keniyu zewata ziyà te valey niw. Egkinahanglan a te ugelingen, iyan, wazà a keniyu meveǥayi. Nezeruwan a, ne ziyà a te pirisuan, iyan, wazà a keniyu leuya.'
Ne ed-insè dan te, 'Nengazen, keenu zey sikew maahà he egkevitil, ebpekeinum, wazà egkepemenehikan, wazà ugelingen, nezeruwan, wey ziyà te pirisuan ne wazè dey sikew metevangi?'
Ne zutun edtavak a is hadì te, 'Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke wazè niw tevangi is minsan sevaha kayi te utew minus is pid-etawan din, siak is wazè niw metevangi.'
Ne heini he menge etew," ke si Jesus, "id-awà kayi su edsilutan sikandan te silut he wazè din pidtemanan; iyan, is menge metazeng mulà, ebeǥayan sikandan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan."
Ne hein nepasad ni Jesus haazà is kebpenurù din dutun te langun, migkaǥi sikandin diyà te menge sumusundan din te,

"Netuenan niw he mekezuwa zà guntaan ne egketuman en sikan is pista he egngezanan te Pista te Kedlevayi. Ne zutun, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ibpalad a ziyà te menge etew wey e zan ikeransang te krus," ke sikandin.
Ne zutun is menge punuan he memumuhat wey is ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu, midtiǥum dan diyà te turuǥan ni Keyipas he lavew he memumuhat
su ebpengahaan dan is paaǥi wey zan mezakep si Jesus he kenà egketuenan te mezakel he menge etew.
"Deyzey nasì," ke sikandan, "ke kenè tew sikandin edekepen dutun te timpu te pista su kela ke edsinamuk is menge etew."
Ne hein diyà si Jesus te inged he Bitanya, diyà sikandin te valey ni Simun te it-iten he neulian en.

Ne mid-uvey ziyà te kandin is bahi he zuen din pelenahan he mibeelan puun te vatu he egngezanan te elebastru he midteǥuan haazà is pelenahan te mehemut he agwa he utew mahal. Ne impetiǥis din haazà is agwa ziyà te ulu ni Jesus te kemulu pa zutun egkaan si Jesus.
Ne hein naahà haazà dutun te menge sumusundan din ne nengepauk dan. Ke sikandan te, "Maan is mid-us-usikan din heeyan is agwa?
Meupiya pa ke imbelegyè din heeyan te utew mahal wey ikeveǥey is halin diyà te egkengeayuayu!"
Ne netuenan ni Jesus haazà is migkaǥi zan, ne ke sikandin te, "Pesegdana niw en heini is bahi. Utew meupiya heini is mid-ulaula zin dini te kedì.
Layun niw egketevangi is egkengeayuayu su kenè niw mulà sikandan egkesuwey, iyan, siak, meǥaan ku en sikiyu egkesuwey.
Mid-egwahan e zin su wey meteǥana is lawa ku zutun te kedlevenga kedì.
Tenuzi niw he kenà sikandin egkelipatan. Su minsan hendei idsangyew heini is Meupiya he Tudtulanen dini te tivuuk he kelibutan, egketudtul zaan heini is mid-ula-ula zin dini te kedì."
Ne te iyan daan haazà he timpu, sevaha zuen te sepulù wey dezuwa he sumusundan, sikan is migngezanan ki Hudas he tigKeriyuti, midhendiyà sikandin te menge punuan he memumuhat.
Ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Pira is idsuhul niw kedì ke pinaaǥi kedì igkepalad diyà te keniyu si Jesus?" Ne mibilang dan dutun is ketluan he elad he pelata ne imbeǥey zan diyà te ki Hudas.
Ne puun dutun mibpengahà si Hudas te paaǥi ke ebmenmenuwen din te ed-akal si Jesus su wey mezakep dutun te menge etew.

Ne zutun te nehuna he andew te Pista te Kegkeena te Supas he Wazè Din Tapey, mid-uvayan si Jesus te menge sumusundan din ne ke sikandan te, "Hendei is baley he egkesuatan nu he edhilutuan dey wey meteǥana is idlavung nu kayi te Pista te Kedlevayi?"

Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus he medhendiyè dan te inged, diyà te etew he zaan he migkaǥi zin kandan ne keǥiyi zan haazà is etew he egkaǥi is menunudlù tew te, "Meǥaan en is kebpatey ku; dini key edlavung te menge sumusundan ku su Pista te Kedlevayi heini."
Ne mid-ulaula te menge sumusundan ni Jesus haazà is insuǥù din kandan ne midteǥana zan is idlavung dan dutun te Pista te Kedlevayi.
Ne te kegkezukilem dutun, si Jesus wey sikan is sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din, diyè dan te lemisahan.
Ne hein egkaan dan en dutun migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Duen egkeǥiyen ku keniyu. Iyan is: sevaha kayi te keniyu is ed-akal kedì wey a mehimetayi."
Ne utew nengeseeng haazà is menge sumusundan din, ne zutun mid-insà kandin is kada sevaha zutun te, "Nengazen, iyan e ve egkeǥiyen nu?"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Sevaha kayi te edtuǥen kedì iyan ed-akal kedì.
Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ebpatey a sumalà te netagnà duen te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà, iyan, kehizu utew zuen te etew he ed-akal kedì. Meupiya pa ziyà te kandin ke wazè en sikandin ianak."
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Hudas, kes ed-akal kandin te, "Menunudlù, iyan e ve ed-akal kenikew?" Ne ke si Jesus te, "Uya, iyan ka."

Ne zutun te kemulu zan pa egkaan, mid-amì si Jesus te supas, ne mibpeselematan din te Megbevayà ne mibpenevìtevì din ne impemeǥey zin diyà te menge sumusundan din. Ke sikandin te, "Iyan heini lawa ku; dewata niw wey keena niw."
Ne zutun mid-amì din is tasa he midteǥuan te vinu te paras, ne mibpeselematan din daan te Megbevayà ne induwal zin diyà te kandan. Ke sikandin te, "Pudu kew kayi inum.
Su lengesa ku heini he ibpetiǥis wey mepelisi is mezakel he menge etew wey mepesaylu is menge salè dan. Tuus heini te paaǥi te kegkelibri he midtukud te Megbevayà.
Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he kenè ku en maan ed-inumen is binu taman dutun te timpu keuzemà he ed-iinumey kiw te veǥu en he vinu emun edhadì en is Amey ku he Megbevayà."
Ne zutun migkanta zan te kedalig te Megbevayà ne hein nepasad haazà migawas dan ne midhendiyè dan te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan.

Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Is langun te sikiyu, ne edluyahan is kedsarig niw kediey ǥuntaan te mezukilem tenged te egkehitavù kedì; su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Edhimetayan ku is ed-elima te menge kerehidu ne ebpekedsusuwey is menge kerehidu.'
Iyan, emun egkevanhew ad, edhuna a keniyu ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya."
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Pedro ziyà te kandin te, "Minsan ke edluyahan is kedsarig kenikew kayi te langun he menge zuma ku ne kenà mulà edluyahan is kedì, minsan egkemenumenu."
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te ki Pedro te, "Benar is egkeǥiyen ku kenikew he te kenè pe kan ebpengukarà is manuk, ne ketetelu ke en ebpekekaǥi he kenà a kenikew egkekilala!"
Ne migkaǥi si Pedro te, "Minsan pa ke edhimetayan a zuma kenikew kenà a egkaǥi he wazè ku sikew mekilala!" Ne iring ded daan dutun is menge pesarig dutun te zuma he menge sumusundan ni Jesus.
Ne kebpekeuma zutun eni Jesus diyà te Gitsimeni, migkeǥiyan din is menge sumusundan din te, "Kayi kew zà pinuu su edlaus key ziyà su ed-ampù a."
Ne miduma zin si Pedro wey sikan is dezuwa he anak ni Sibidiyu. Ne zutun utew neseeng sikandin wey mibmesakit utew is gehinawa zin.
Ne migkaǥi sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Utew mesakit is gehinawa ku. Henduen be te egkevidtew en. Kayi kew zà ne kenè kew medlipezeng."

Ne midlaus si Jesus diyà te uvey zà dutun ne midlangkeb sikandin ne mid-ampù, ke sikandin te, "Amey ku, ke egkehimu zà ne kenè nu en kediey ipeseǥazi heini is merasey he imbanglis nu kediey, iyan, kenà egkesunud is kediey he egkesuatan, kekenà, iyan egkesunud is kenikew he egkesuatan."
Ne hein midlikuan din haazà is tetelu he menge sumusundan din, nekelipezeng dan, ne migkeǥiyan din si Pedro te, "Wazè niw ve metigker he kenè kew medlipezeng te minsan sengeuras dà?
Kenè kew lipezeng, kekenà, ampù kew wey kew mekelikey te menge penggezam keniyu. Edsunud is gehinawa niw, iyan, is lawa niw ne meluya."
Ne midlikù si Jesus ne mid-ampù med-uman, ke sikandin te, "Amey ku, emun kenè en egkehimu he id-awà sikan is kedresaya kedì ne iyan egkesunud is kenikew he egkesuatan."
Ne zutun midlikuan din sikan is menge sumusundan din ne neehè din he nemekelipezeng dan en maan su wazè dan maantus is kebpemetpetayi kandan te tuzug.
Ne midlikù si Jesus ne mid-ampù med-uman te iketelu ne in-uman din in-ampù kes in-ampù din.
Ne zutun midlikuan din sikandan ne migkaǥi te, "Kemulu kew ves nehurep he ebpemenhidhizeǥà? Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan en heini timpu he ibpalad a ziyà te menge lalung he etew.
Enew kew su heini en sikan is etew he ed-akal kedì. Kuwa kew en, su edsinuǥungen tew."

Ne te kemulu pa zutun egkaǥi si Jesus, nekeuma si Hudas is sevaha zuen te sepulù wey zezuwa he epustul. Duma zin is mezakel he menge etew he nengeǥumeenan te menge ubpit wey menge lagkut. Menge suǥù haazà te menge punuan te memumuhat wey menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu.

Si Hudas, is giya zan pehendiyà te ki Jesus, migkaǥi zin he zaan ke hengkey is tuus te kegketueni zan ki Jesus. Ke sikandin te, "Is etew he edhezekan ku, ne iyan en ebpen-ahaan niw. Ne zekepa niw en."
Ne hein nekeuma si Hudas, segugunè din mid-uvayi si Jesus ne migkaǥi te, "Na! Menunudlù!" Ne zutun midhezekan din si Jesus.
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandin te, "Pekezilepeti nu, Mama, is ed-ul-ulahan nu." Ne midakep dutun te menge etew si Jesus ne mibpekehemenan dan te egawed.
Ne sevaha zutun te zuma ni Jesus, nekehulavut te sundang din, ne midtibas din is suluǥuen te lavew he memumuhat ne netenaan haazà diyà te telinga, ne nesapla haazà is telinga zin.
Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà te, "Iǥumè nu heeyan is ubpit nu su sikan is utew meǥaan he ebpenggumaan, gumaan daan is ibpatey zin.
Wazè nu ve metueni he emun ebpetavang a te Amey ku he Megbevayà ne edliblibuwen is ibpehendini zin he velinsuǥuen din?
Iyan," ke si Jesus, "emun ebpetavang a kandin ne kenà egketuman sikan is nengetagnà dengan dutun te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà; ne kinahanglan he egkeulaula haazà sumalà is netagnà," ke sikandin.

Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is menge etew te, "Tulisan e ve? Su maan is neǥumeenan kew te menge ubpit wey menge lagkut is edakep kedì? Kada andew ne egkeahà a keniyu is ebpenurù te menge etew ziyà te Valey te Megbevayà, ne maan is wazà a keniyu zutun dà dekepa?

Iyan, guntaan, human en egkeulaula heini is langun kayi su egketuman sikan is menge tagnà he insurat dengan te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà." Ne hein nekaǥi en ni Jesus haazà, mid-ewaan sikandin dutun te menge sumusundan din su nemelaǥuy zan is langun.

Ne zutun, haazà is menge etew he midakep ki Jesus, mid-uwit dan sikandin diyà te ki Keyipas he lavew he memumuhat. Ne zutun, daan en he netiǥum is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey is menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu.

Si Pedro, midtinundug, asal kenà utew ed-uvey ne zutun te nekeuma zan en diyà te valey te lavew he memumuhat ne ziyè dà medtaman si Pedro te lama. Ne hein nekeseled en sikandin dutun te lama, mibpesahugsahug sikandin mebpinuu zuen te menge guwardya su ed-ahaan din ke hengkey en is egkeulaula ki Jesus.
Ne is menge punuan te memumuhat wey is langun he nengetiǥum he ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu, ebpen-ehè dan te salà he id-ulug dan ki Jesus su wey zan mehimetayi.
Iyan, minsan pa te mezakel is teruen he ebpenistiǥus te menge ulaula ni Jesus ne wazè dan dutun egkeahà he zait he igkehimetayi kandin. Ne hein neuǥet, duen dezuwa he mid-etuvang
he egkaǥi te, "migkaǥi heini he etew te, 'Egkerundus ku is dekelà he simbahan te Megbevayà ne seled te tetelu he andew ne igkepehitindeg ku.'"
Ne zutun midhitindeg sikan is lavew he memumuhat dutun ne migkeǥiyan din si Jesus te, "Tutuu ve heini is menge sumbung dan mehitenged kenikew? Hengkey is igketavak nu?" ke sikandin.

Ne wazà medtavak si Jesus. Ne mid-uman megkaǥi haazà is lavew he memumuhat te, "Tangdù ka su kayi ka te etuvangan te Megbevayà he wazè din kemetayen. Emun iyan ka sikan is Anak te Megbevayà, sikan is mibpilì din he ibpahadì, keǥiya nu," ke sikandin.

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Iyan heeyan sumalà is migkaǥi nu ne egkeǥiyan ku sikiyu is langun he siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, keuzemà egkeahà a keniyu is diyà ebpinuu te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà. Ne egkeahà a zaan keniyu ziyà te menge ǥapun is ebulus he ebpuun diyà te langit," ke sikandin.

Ne haazà is lavew he memumuhat, mibpemindas din is kumbalè din he tuus te utew sikandin nepauk dutun te migkaǥi ni Jesus, ne ke sikandin te, "Uvag en kun Anak te Megbevayà! Nekesupak en heini te Megbevayà! Wazè en kinahanglan he zuen pa tistiǥus su sikiyu is langun, nezineg niw en heini is menge lalag din he utew supak te Megbevayà!
Hengkey is hukum niw?" Ne midtavak is menge zuma zin te, "Dekelà is salè din; kinahanglan he edhimetayan."
Ne zutun mibpengilevan dan is ulu ni Jesus; ne mibuǥel zan. Ne is duma, midtabpì kandin
he egkaǥi te, "Sikew is mibpilì bes te Megbevayà, tegnaa nu ke hentei is neketabpì kenikew," egkaǥi zan.
Ne si Pedro, diyà te lama is ebpimpinuu. Ne zuen suluǥuen he vahi he mid-uvey ziyà te kandin is egkaǥi te, "Sikew, duma ka zaan ni Jesus he tigGeliliya."
Iyan, mibarew haazà ni Pedro is migkaǥi zutun te vahi, ne nekezineg dutun is langun te kebarew zin. Ke sikandin te, "Kenè ku egkesavut heeyan is egkeǥiyen nu."

Ne migawas si Pedro pehendiyà te pultahan dutun te lama. Ne zuen sevaha pa he suluǥuen he vahi he nekeahà kandin ne migkaǥi haazà is bahi ziyà te menge etew zutun te, "Duma heini ni Jesus he tigNeserit!"
Ne utew mezesen is kebarew zutun ni Pedro. Ke sikandin te, "Kenè ku egkekilala heeyan he etew."
Ne hein netegteǥaad dutun, mid-uvayan si Pedro zuen te menge etew he nerivurun dutun, ke sikandan te, "Tutuu iyan he zuma ke zin daan su egketuusan tenged te kegkaǥi nu."
Ne zutun mid-amin-amin si Pedro te sapà, ke sikandin te, "Siluti a te Megbevayà ke tarù heini is lalag ku he kenè ku egkekilala heeyan he etew." Ne zutundutun, mid-ukarà is manuk.

Ne human metenuzi ni Pedro sikan is migkaǥi kandin ni Jesus he, "Te kenè pe kan ebpengukarà is manuk, ne ketetelu ke en ebpekekaǥi he kenà a kenikew egkekilala." Ne zutun migawas si Pedro ne nekelelendag.
Ne hein nepawà dutun is langun he menge punuan te menge memumuhat wey menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu, mid-uyunan dan ke ebmenmenuwen dan is paaǥi wey iketuǥut kandan is kedhimetayi ki Jesus.
Mibakus dan si Jesus te kedina ne inhated dan sikandin diyà te ki Pilatu he iyan gubirnedur zutun.

Ne si Hudas, sikan is mid-akal ki Jesus, utew nekedsendit hein netuenan din he edhimetayan duen te menge etew si Jesus su nekaǥi zan he zait is ulaula ni Jesus he igkehimetayi kandin. Ne midhendiyà sikandin te menge punuan he memumuhat wey menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu su id-ulì din pezem sikan is ketluan he vuuk he selapì.

"Nekesalà a," ke sikandin, "su sikan is etew he migkaǥi niw he zait is ulaula zin he igkehimetayi kandin, wazè din salà ne iyan a mibpalad kandin diyan te keniyu." Ne midtavak dan te, "Wazè dey lavet keniyan; kenikew zà heeyan he samuk."
Ne haazà is selapì, insimburà ni Hudas dutun te simbahan ne mid-awà dutun su netaǥù diyà te ǥehinawa zin is kedhiket, ne zutun mibitey sikandin.

Ne is menge punuan te memumuhat, hein nekuwa zan sikan is selapì, migkaǥi zan te, "Ebpekesupak kiw te kesuǥuan ke id-ulug tew heini ziyà te teleǥuey te selapì kayi te simbahan su imbayad heini wey mehimetayi is etew."

Ne tenged dutun mibivitiyara zan ke hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan dan dutun. Ne zuen tanà he migngezanan te tanà te ebpendiyun, ne mibpemasa zan haazà dutun te selapì su wey mehimu he penlevengà te menge etew he kenà Hudiyu.
Ne tenged kayi migngezanan dan haazà he tanà te Tanà te Lengesa, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, tanà he nepemasa te selapì he imbayad te kedhimetayi te etew .

Ne netuman dutun sikan is netagnà dengan te ebpeneuven te Megbevayà he si Jeremias su ke sikandin te, "Nekuwa zan kes ketluan he vuuk he selapì he iyan bali zin he neuyunan te menge etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil.
Ne impemasa zan te tanà te ebpendiyun sumalà is intelaan kedì te Nengazen." Iyan heini nekaǥi zengan ni Jeremias.

Ne zutun hein diyè en si Jesus te etuvangan te gubirnedur is ed-imbistigahan, mid-insà ki Jesus haazà is gubirnedur te, "Hadì ke ve te menge Hudiyu?" Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Uya, iyan is migkaǥi nu."
Iyan, dutun te migkaǥi en te menge punuan te menge memumuhat wey menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu ziyà te ki Pilatu is sumbung dan mehitenged ki Jesus ne wazà haazà tevaka ni Jesus.
Umba mid-insaan sikandin ni Pilatu te, "Maan is wazè nu tevaka heini is langun he menge sumbung dan mehitenged kenikew?"
Iyan, wazà medtavak si Jesus te minsan hengkey; ne tenged kayi neinuinu utew is gubirnedur.
Ne iyan neleyaman ni Pilatu is: kada tuig, emun Pista en te Kedlevayi, edlibriyen din is sevaha he pirisu ke edhengyuen te menge etew.
Ne zuen nevantug he etew he mibpirisu he egngezanan ki Berabas.
Ne hein nevurun en dutun is menge etew, ne mid-insà si Pilatu te, "Hentei zapit is egkesuatan niw he edlibriyen ku, iyan be si Berabas wey ke iyan be si Jesus he migeraran he Pinilì te Megbevayà?"
Su netuenan ni Pilatu he iyan hinungdan ke maan is insumbung si Jesus te menge punuan is kegkesina zan kandin.

Ne te kemulu pa si Pilatu ebpimpinuu zutun te valey he ebpenhusayan, nekeuma is surat te esawa zin he egkaǥi te, "Kenè nu hileveti heeyan he etew su wazè din salà. Nerasey a utew ǥeina te mezukilem su mideetan a tenged kandin," ke sikandin.
Iyan, is menge punuan he memumuhat wey is menge ebmeǥurangen, migkeǥiyan dan is menge etew zutun he iyan dan hengyua he melibri si Berabas ne si Jesus, ibpehimetayan.
Ne mid-uman med-insà kandan haazà is gubirnedur te, "Hentei zapit kayi te zezuwa is egkesuatan niw he edlibriyen ku?" Ne ke sikandan te, "Iyan si Berabas."
Ne migkaǥi si Pilatu te, "Ne emun iyan heeyan, ebmenmenuwen ku si Jesus he migeraran he Pinilì te Megbevayà?" Ne migkaǥi sikandan is langun te, "Iransang te krus!"
Ne ke si Pilatu te, "Maan? Duen be mezaat he mid-ulaula zin?" Iyan, mid-iseg dutun is keǥurub dutun te menge etew he ebpememensag te, "Iransang te krus!"

Ne zutun nesavut ni Pilatu he wazè en pulus te menge lalag din su ebpuunè en edsinamuk is menge etew, ne tenged dutun, migkuwa sikandin te wahig ne mibpenlùlù te velad din dutun te etuvangan te menge etew, ne ke sikandin te, "Keniyu he salà heini. Is lengesa kayi te etew, ne ziyè dà te keniyu he velad; lumpiyu is kedì."
Ne midtavak is langun he menge etew te, "Uya, kenami en he salà is kedhimetayi kayi wey salà daan te menge kevuwazan dey!"
Ne zutun midlibri ni Pilatu si Berabas. Ne impevuǥel zin si Jesus ne insuǥù din te menge sundaru he iransang dan si Jesus diyà te krus.
Ne zutun impeseled si Jesus te menge sundaru zutun te turuǥan te gubirnedur. Ne netiǥum diyà te kandin is tivuuk he kumpeniya te menge sundaru.
Midlevasan dan si Jesus ne migkumbelaan dan sikandin te meriǥà he kumbalà su uvag kun hadì.

Ne zutun mibengkulè dan te zuǥiyen he ǥawed he igkuruna zan ki Jesus ne insuup dan haazà diyà te ulu zin. Ne is kewanan he velad din, impeǥawed dan te tuked ne midluhud dan diyà te etuvangan din is edtahud kun uvag kandin. Ne ke sikandan te, "Kumusta, Hadì te menge Hudiyu!"
Ne mid-ilevan dan ne midsekelew zan haazà is tuked ne imbadas dan diyà te ulu zin.
Ne hein nepezè dan en he ebaleyvaley kandin midluwasan dan duen te kumbalà he meriǥà ne insun-ud dan kandin is daan he kumbalè din. Ne zutun mid-uwit dan sikandin su idransang dan diyà te krus.
Ne ziyà te zalan he ibayè dan nesinuǥung dan is etew he tigSirini he egngezanan ki Simon. Ne mibpeǥes dan haazà ipetiang duen te krus he edtiangen ni Jesus.
Ne nekeuma zan diyà te migngezanan te Gulguta, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, Tulan te Ulu.
Ne ibpeinum dan pezem si Jesus te vinu he mid-emutan te utew mepait, iyan, hein neǥezaman din en haazà ne wazè din leusa te ed-inum.
Ne inransang dan sikandin diyà te krus; ne zutun midripa zan ke hentei is ebpekeangken te menge ugelingen din.
Ne te kegkepasad dan dutun mibpinuu zan su ed-ahaan dan sikandin ke egkemenumenu.
Ne ziyà te zivavew te ulu zin, impezeket dan is surat he iyan sikan is hinungdan te insumbunga kandin he edhenduen te, "Iyan heini si Jesus, sikan is Hadì te menge Hudiyu."
Ne zuen dutun dezuwa he tulisan he inransang dan daan. Impasek is krus te sevaha zutun diyà dapit te egkekewanan din, ne impasek is krus te sevaha ziyà te egkeǥivang din.
Ne is menge etew zutun he sumeseǥazà, ebpemenangàtangà is ed-engitan dan si Jesus.

Ke sikandan te, "Na! Kunaan nu ke egkeǥevè nu sikan is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà ne egkevangun nu te seled te tetelu he andew. Libriya nu kun is keugelingen nu. Emun tutuu ka he Anak te Megbevayà, penaug ka keniyan te krus."
Ne iring din ded daan is mid-ulaula kandin te menge punuan te memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan su mibaleyvaley zan sikandin,
ke sikandan te, "Nelibri zin is duma, iyan, is keugelingen din, kenè din egkelibri. Hadì bes sikandin te menge tig-Israyil. Ipepenaug keniyan te krus ne egkesundanan human.

Edsarig kun sikandin te Megbevayà ne egkeǥiyen din daan he Anak sikandin te Megbevayà. Ed-ahaan ta ǥuntaan ke edlibriyen sikandin te Megbevayà ke tutuu he igkesuat sikandin te Megbevayà," ke sikandan.
Ne minsan sikan is menge tulisan he inransang diyà te pesikilizè din, ne midsumpalit dan daan sikandin.
Ne te neudtu en is andew zutun, midtik-ew mebmerusirem is tivuuk he kelibutan seled te menge tetelu he uras.

Ne hein liwazè en he ebpenaug is andew, ingkulahì ni Jesus is utew mezaǥing he lalag he edhenduen te, "Ili, Ili, lama sebektani?" he ke và dà egkeǥiya, "He Megbevayè ku, maan is ed-iniyuǥan a kenikew?"
Ne zutun, is duma he etew he ebpemenhithitindeg dutun te uvey, hein nezineg dan haazà, ke sikandan te, "Pemineg kew su ebpengumawen din si Elias, is sevaha zuen te ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà."
Ne sevaha zutun te menge etew is migaanggaan megkuwa te ispungha ne intereb din diyà te sukà ne midtiyuk din te zeisek he kayu ne impaahuk din diyà te vèbà ni Jesus wey zin haazà mesupsup.
Iyan, migkaǥi is menge zuma zutun te etew te, "Pesegdana nu su ed-ahaan ta ke edlepew si Elias su edlibriyen sikandin."
Ne zutun, migkulahì si Jesus med-uman ne naawà is gehinawa zin.

Ne zutundutun, is manggad he utew mekepal he ingkurtina ziyà te seled te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, neliwazà mevindas puun te zivavew pehendiyà te zizalem. Ne midlinug ne mibpemeka is dezekelà he vatu.
Ne zuen menge surung he penlevengà he zutun nengepuwasan, ne nengevanhew is mezakel he menge tumutuu te Megbevayà,
ne mid-awè dan dutun te penlevengà. Ne zutun te kegkevanhew zaan ni Jesus, nemenriǥuriǥu haazà is nengevanhew ziyà te inged he Hiruselim ne mezakel is nemekeahà kandan dutun te kebpenriǥuriǥu zan.

Sikan is menge sundaru wey sikan is kepitan dan he mibantey ki Jesus, hein midtik-ew medlinug wey hein nengeehè dan is duma pa he nengehitavù dutun ne nengehandek dan. Ke sikandan te, "Tutuu ves iyan he Anak sikandin te Megbevayà!" egkaǥi zan.
Ne zuen daan dutun mezakel he menge vahi he ebantey ziyà te meziyù dutun. Menge tigGeliliya sikandan he miduma ki Jesus pehendiyà te Hiruselim su edtavang dan kandin.
Ne zutun si Maria Megdelina, wey si Maria, sikan is iney ni Santiago wey ni Jose, ne elin daan sikan is esawa ni Sibidiyu.
Ne hein mahapun en dutun, nekeuma is sepian he ebpuun te Erimetiya. Iyan ngazan din si Jose; ne sumusundan daan sikandin ni Jesus.
Midhendiyà sikandin te ki Pilatu is edhangyù he egkuwaan din is lawa ni Jesus. Ne zutun insuǥù ni Pilatu is lawa ni Jesus he ikeveǥey ziyà te ki Jose.
Ne migkuwa haazà ni Jose ne mibukusan din te veǥu he malung he meputì.

Ne zuen surung he penlevengà ni Jose he sikan pa mepasad he ingkalut diyà te kelendiǥan te paǥang. Ne zutun iseled ni Jose is lawa ni Jesus. Ne midlekevan din haazà is surung te zekelà he vatu ne mid-ewaan din.
Ne si Maria Megdelina, wey sikan is sevaha he Maria, dutun dan ebpimpinuu is ebantey zutun te surung.
Ne zutun te sunud he andew he Sebadu, midhendiyà te ki Pilatu is menge punuan he memumuhat wey is menge Perisiyu.
Ne ke sikandan diyà te kandin te, "Datù, netenuzan dey he migkaǥi zuen te teruen he etew hein uuyag pa, he emun ebpatey, egkevanhew zed seled te tetelu he andew.

Umba, meupiya ke ebpeventayan nu te menge sundaru sikan is surung taman te iketelu he andew su kela ke tekawa is lawa zin te menge sumusundan din, ne egkeǥiyen dan diyà te menge etew he nevanhew sikandin. Ne ed-iseg ebmezaat is ebpekesunud he kedlimbungi zan te menge etew."
Ne midtavak si Pilatu te, "Egkehimu. Dumaha niw pehendutun is menge sundaru, ne purungi niw peventayi haazà is surung."
Ne mibeyaan dan haazà ne midtuusan dan sikan is inlekeb he vatu zutun wey metuusi zan ke edwelengen te minsan hentei. Ne intaǥak dan haazà is menge sundaru zutun he ibpevantey zan.

Ne hein neiwas haazà is Andew te Kedhimeley te meǥaan egkepawà dutun te andew he Duminggu, midhendiyà te penlevengà ensi Maria Megdelina wey kes duma zin, he Maria zaan is ngazan, su ed-ahaan dan sikan is surung.
Ne zutun netekewtekew medlinug te utew mezesen. Ne zuen ebpuun diyà te langit he velinsuǥuen te Nengazen. Ne mibpenaug haazà ne in-awè din kes batu he inlekeb dutun te surung ne mid-untuzan din.
Is dagwey zin, ne ebpekesirang su utew merayag, ne utew zaan meputì is ugelingen din.
Ne nengehandek utew sikan is ebantey zutun he menge sundaru ne nengetentanan dan is wazà memekewaleng he ebpengerkeren.
Ne sikan is menge vahi, migkeǥiyan sikandan dutun te velinsuǥuen te, "Kenè kew mahandek. Netuenan ku he ebpen-ahaan niw si Jesus, sikan is inransang te krus.
Wazè en dini su nevanhew en sumalà is migkaǥi zin keniyu. Hendini kew wey niw ahaa is midsevukan kandin.

Ne ǥègaani niw veyai is duma he menge sumusundan din. Ne keǥiya niw ziyà te kandan he nevanhew en sikandin ne edhuna keniyu ziyà te Geliliya ne ziyè niw sikandin egkeuma. Ne kenè niw lipati heini is migkaǥi ku keniyu," ke sikandin.
Ne zutun, migaanggaan haazà is menge vahi med-awà dutun te surung. Nengehandek dan, iyan, nepenù is gehinawa zan te kelipey. Ne ebpelelaǥuy zan su ibpenudtul zan diyà te menge sumusundan he zuma.
Ne netekewtekew zan te nesinuǥung sikandan ni Jesus. Ne ke sikandin te, "Mebmelinawen kew." Ne mid-uvey zan diyà te kandin. Ne mid-azap dan kandin is egawed te paa zin.
"Kenè kew egkehandek," ke si Jesus, "beyai niw is menge suled ku ne keǥiyi niw he medhendiyè dan te Geliliya ne ziyè e zan egkeuma," ke sikandin.

Ne hein neipus haazà is menge vahi, migenat daan is duma zutun te menge sundaru he impevantey zutun te surung. Midhendiyè dan te inged ne midtudtul zan ziyà te menge punuan he memumuhat is langun he neulaula.
Ne is menge punuan, mibpekibitiyara te menge ebmeǥurangen. Ne zutun mibeǥayan dan haazà is menge sundaru te zekelà he selapì.
Ne migkeǥiyan dan te, "Iyan niw tudtula te menge etew is: hein mezukilem nekelipezeng kew ne nekeuma is menge sumusundan ni Jesus ne midtakew zan is lawa zin.
Ne emun egkezineg heini te gubirnedur, edlelaǥan dey para kenè kew zin mepeuki."
Ne midawat te menge sundaru haazà is selapì, ne midtuman dan haazà sumalà is migkaǥi kandan. Ne kemulu ǥuntaan iyan edtudtulen te menge Hudiyu haazà is impepenudtul te menge punuan diyà te kandan.
Ne haazà is sepulù wey sevaha he menge sumusundan ni Jesus, midhendiyè dan te Geliliya, duen te vuvungan he migkaǥi kandan ni Jesus.
Ne zutun neehè dan sikandin. Ne minsan te nezuwazuwa is duma kandan he edtuu mehitenged te kegkevanhew zin, dutun te kegkeahaa zan kandin, mid-azap dan kandin.
Ne mid-uvayan sikandan ni Jesus, ne ke sikandin te, "Imbeǥey kedì is ke ǥehem te kebayàbayà diyà te langit wey zini te tanà.

Umba, penhipanew kew en diyà te minsan hendei wey niw metukid te ebpesavut is langun he menge etew ziyà te langun he menge inged. Ne penurua niw he medsundan dan kedì. Pemewtismuwi niw sikandan wey metueni he nekidsevaha zan te Amey tew he Megbevayà, wey siak is Anak din, wey is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.

Penurua niw sikandan he tumana zan sikan is langun he insuǥù ku keniyu. Ne kenè niw lipati he layun a eduma keniyu taman te kenè pa egketapus heini is timpu." Is Meupiya He Tudtulanen Te Keaǥi Ni Jesu Kristu Sumalà Is Keguǥuza Ni

Si Esaias, is tipehuna he ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, insurat din is Lalag te Megbevayà duen te Anak din, ne iyan haazà puunà te Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keaǥi ni Jesu Kristu he Anak te Megbevayà. Migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, "Duen keuzemà ibpehuna ku kenikew he etew he ibpepenudtul ku he meǥaan ka ebpekeuma.

Diyà sikandin te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew. Ne zutun egkezineg sikandin te menge etew he edangep kandin is egkaǥi te, 'Meǥaan ebpekeuma is Nengazen. Hiǥewani niw is ibayè din; tendanga niw is dalan he ed-ikulen din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, endami niw is kebpekeuma zin .'"

Ne netuman haazà diyà te ki Juan, sikan is migeraran ki Megbebewtismu, su ziyà sikandin te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew ne midweliyan din daan is menge etew. Ke sikandin te, "Iniyuǥi niw is memezaat he ulaula ne mebpebewtismu kew su wey metueni he mid-iniyuǥan niw en is memezaat he ulaula niw, ne human egkepesaylu te Megbevayà is menge salè niw," ke si Juan.

Ne zutun, mezakel he menge etew is midangep kandin he ebpemuun diyà te menge inged te tivuuk he prubinsya he Hudiya wey minsan is menge etew he ebpemuun diyà te inged he Hiruselim. Ne haazà he menge etew, intangdù dan is menge salè dan ne mibewtismuwan sikandan ni Juan diyà te wahig he Hurdan.
Ne heini si Juan, kukumbalà te midhavel he vulvul te kemilyu ne vevakes te lundis he neǥangu. Ne is keuyaǥan din ne terapan wey teneb.

Ne zutun midweliyan ni Juan is menge etew, ke sikandin te, "Duen etew he ebpekeuma he ed-ilis kediey. Iyan sikandin utew lavew kenà siak su minsan is kebpul-ut dà te menge sepatus din, kenè e pa zait he suluǥuen din.
Wahig is ibewtismu ku keniyu, iyan, haazà he etew is ed-ilis kediey, iyan ibewtismu zin keniyu sikan is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, ibeǥey zin keniyu is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ."

Ne zutun te timpu te kebpemewtismu ni Juan, nekeuma ziyà te ki Juan si Jesus is ebpuun diyà te inged he Neserit he ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya. Ne mibewtismuwan sikandin ni Juan diyà te wahig he Hurdan.
Ne te egaun en si Jesus dutun te wahig, segugunè din naahà is langit he nepuwasan ne is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, edlugtanà diyà te kandin he iring te merepatik.
Ne zutun nezineg is Megbevayà diyà te langit he egkaǥi te, "Minahal ku sikew he anak ku. Utew ku en sikew igkelipey."
Ne segugunà dutun, impehendiyà si Jesus te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew.

Ne zutun mekeubpà si Jesus seled te kepatan he andew, ne migezaman sikandin ni Setanas ke ebpekesalè be. Ne zuen daan dutun menge ebpekekaid he menge langgam, iyan, mibeyaan si Jesus te menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà ne mid-elimahan dan sikandin.
Ne hein impezakep en ni Hadì Hirudis si Juan, midlikù si Jesus diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya ne impesavut din dutun te menge etew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ebpuun te Megbevayà.
Ne ke sikandin te, "Iyan en heini timpu he egketuman sikan is nengetagnà dengan su meǥaan en edhadì keniyu is Megbevayà. Iniyuǥi niw en is memezaat he ulaula ne tuu kew te Meupiya he Tudtulanen."
Ne sevaha he andew zutun, te edhipanew si Jesus diyà te veyvey te ranew he Geliliya, ne neehè din ensi Simon wey is hazi ni Simon he si Andres he ebpenlaya zutun te ranew su menge menlelaya sikandan.
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Menunuǥes kew ves te pait? Duma kew kedì ne etew mulà is egkekuwa niw wey zan mekesundan kedì."
Ne zutundutun mid-engked dan is ebpenlaya ne miduma zan kandin.

Ne midlaus medhipanew ensi Jesus ne zutun te kedhipanew zan en, naahà ni Jesus ensi Santiago wey is hazi ni Santiago he si Juan he menge anak ni Sibidiyu he ebpurungan dan is menge laya zan diyà te avang dan.
Ne te naahà ni Jesus sikandan, mid-umew zin sikandan he meduma zan kandin, ne zutun mid-ewaan dan is amey zan wey is menge sinuhulan dan he menlelaya zutun te avang ne miduma zan ki Jesus.
Ne midhendiyè dan te inged he Kepirnaum, ne hein neume en is andew he Sebadu he iyan Andew te Kedhimeley ne midseled si Jesus diyà te simbahan te menge Hudiyu ne mibpenurù din is menge etew zutun.

Ne haazà is menge etew, hein nezineg dan is kebpenurù din, utew zan nengeinuinu su is kebpenurù din, ne kenà iring te kebpenurù te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan te menge Hudiyu su zekelà mulà is gehem ni Jesus te kebpenurù.
Ne zutun te kemulu pa ebpenurù si Jesus, netekew zan te nekeuma zutun te simbahan is maama he edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin.

Ne hein neehè din si Jesus, mibensag sikandin is egkaǥi te, "Sikew, Jesus he tigNeserit, hengkey is lavet nu kenami te menge mulin-ulin? Kela ke iyan inhendini nu is edezeetan key kenikew. Egkekilala ku sikew; iyan ka kes hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà!"
Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin te, "Med-engked ka ne awè ka keniyan te kandin!"
Ne zutundutun midhimu te mezaat he mulin-ulin he mevidbid haazà is etew ne impepengulahì din te mezaǥing. Ne mid-awà haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin puun dutun te etew.

Ne utew nengeinuinu is langun he menge etew zutun, ne tenged dutun mibpelelelaǥè dan te, "Hengkey vuwa heini? Kela ke veǥu en heini he tuluuwen su maan is utew sikandin mekeǥeǥehem te kebayàbayà te minsan menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne ebpemineg kandin."
Ne pinaaǥi zutun segugunà nekeeneb is bentuǥan ni Jesus diyà te tivuuk he prubinsya he Geliliya.
Ne mid-awà ensi Jesus dutun te simbahan ne midhendiyè dan te valey eni Simon wey ni Andres. Ne miduma zaan kandan si Santiago wey si Juan.
Ne egkezeruwan dutun is enuǥang he vahi ni Simon ne edhidhizeǥà su edetengen. Ne te kebpekeuma ni Jesus dutun te valey, migkeǥiyan dan si Jesus he egkezeruwan is enuǥang ni Simon.
Ne mibeyaan sikandin ni Jesus ne migewezan din diyà te velad ne impeenew zin. Ne zutundutun ne naawà is dateng din ne midsuba sikandin te ibpekaan din engki Jesus.
Ne hein edsanlep en is andew zutun, is langun he egkengezeruwan wey is ebpenlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin, mibpen-uwit sikandan te menge etew ziyà te ki Jesus.
Ne utew mezakel he menge etew zutun te inged is netipun diyà te lama te valey he zutun si Jesus.

Ne zuen mezakel he egkengezeruwan dutun te migkelingulingu he menge zaru is nengeulian ni Jesus. Mezakel zaan he menge mezaat he mulin-ulin is impemaawè din puun dutun te menge etew. Ne haazà is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, wazà tuǥuti ni Jesus he mekekaǥi sikandan su nekilala zan ke hentei si Jesus.
Ne hein egkepkepawè en, ne mid-enew si Jesus ne mid-awà diyà te valey ne midsivey sikandin diyà te wazà duen etew su ed-ampù.
Ne hein nepawà dutun mibpen-ahà ni Simon wey te menge zuma zin ke hendei si Jesus.
Ne hein neturedu zan, migkaǥi zan diyà te kandin te, "Ebpen-ahaan ka te langun he menge etew."
Iyan, migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Edhendiyè kiw te menge zuma he inged su wey ku meweliyi zaan su umba midhendini a su edweliyan ku is menge etew."

Ne mid-eneb eni Jesus is langun he menge inged diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya ne midwali sikandin diyà te menge simbahan te menge Hudiyu zutun. Ne impemaawè din is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin puun dutun te edlelungen dan.

Ne zuen sevaha he it-iten he etew he mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus. Ne haazà he etew, midluhud sikandin diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus is ed-akul kandin he egkaǥi te, "Emun meupiya zà te ǥehinawa nu ne egkeulian a kenikew kayi te utew meremerik he egezamen ku."
Ne nehizuwan sikandin ni Jesus ne midampè din te egkaǥi te, "Utew meupiya te ǥehinawa ku; meulii ka."
Ne zutundutun nahanewhanew zutun te etew haazà is it-it din.

Ne zutun mibeleuzan sikandin ni Jesus te, "Kenè nu zè pa tudtula ziyà te minsan hentei he etew heini is nehimu zini te kenikew, kekenà, hendiyè ka ǥuntaan te memumuhat he midhimu te Megbevayà wey zin maahà he neulian ka ne iveǥey nu kandin is ibpemuhat wey nu metuman sikan is insuǥù dengan ni Moises su wey metueni te langun he menge etew he tutuu iyan he neulian ke en." Ne zutun impehipanew sikandin ni Jesus.

Iyan, hein mid-awà dutun haazà is etew, midtudtul zin haazà is nehimu ziyà te kandin diyà te minsan hentei. Ne tenged dutun kenè en maan si Jesus ebpekepeǥawaǥawa ke edhendutun te menge inged su egkeamur-amur is mezakel he menge etew. Diyè dà si Jesus edriǥuriǥu te menge unayan. Ne midangep kandin is menge etew he ebpemuun diyà te minsan hendei he inged.
Ne nepipira pa zutun he menge andew, midlikù si Jesus diyà te inged he Kepirnaum. Ne nezineg te menge etew he ziyà si Jesus te valey zin.

Ne nengetiǥum sikandan dutun te valey. Utew mezakel is menge etew zutun ne tenged kayi wazè dan en ed-ereǥan minsan diyà te zeringdingan he uvey te ǥemawan. Ne impesavut kandan ni Jesus is Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun, duen nemekeuma he menge etew he ed-uwit te sevaha he etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa zin. Ebintingen haazà is etew te heepat he zuma zin.

Ne kenè dan ebpekeuvey ziyà te ki Jesus tenged te utew mezakel he menge etew he nengeamur-amur zutun. Ne zutun mibudsiyan dan is atep he renged ni Jesus ne hein meluag en haazà is budsi, ne midteyuntun dan diyà te ki Jesus haazà is etew he impehizeǥà diyà te zuyanè din.
Ne si Jesus, hein nesavut din he zekelà is kedsarig dan kandin, migkeǥiyan din haazà is etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa zin te, "Mama, nepesaylu en is menge salè nu."
Ne zuen ebpimpinuu zutun he menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan ne hein nezineg dan haazà is migkaǥi ni Jesus, neepes dan ne neisip dan is,
"Tekew en egkaǥi heini he etew he ebpekepesaylu sikandin te salà. Edsupaken din is Megbevayà su hentei is ebpekepesaylu te menge salà, kekenà, iyan dà is Megbevayà?"
Ne zutun nesavut ni Jesus he iyan haazà diyà te isip dan ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Maan is egkeisip niw is iring keniyan?

Su hendei zapit is egkehimu te etew zà duen? Iyan be is kebpesaylu te salà kayi te etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa zin, wey ke iyan is kegkeulii kandin wey sikandin mekeenew ne mekuwa zin is duyanè din ne mekehipanew?

Pinaaǥi te kebewii ku ǥuntaan kayi te etew, ibpeehè ku keniyu he siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, duen ku keǥehem dini te lumpad te kebpesaylu te salà." Ne zutun migkeǥiyan din haazà is etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa te,
"Sikew, Mama, enew ka; kuwaa nu heeyan is duyanè nu ne ulì ka."

Ne zutun, haazà is etew, mid-enew sikandin ne migkuwa zin haazà is duyanè din ne midlawang puun dutun te valey ne naahà haazà te langun he menge etew zutun. Ne is menge etew, hein neehè dan haazà ne utew zan nengeinuinu ne midalig dan is Megbevayà. Ne ke sikandan te, "Wazè tew pa keenu maahà is iring kayi!"
Ne neipus haazà, ne mid-awà dutun si Jesus, ne midhendiyè en maan te veyvey te ranew, ne nengetiǥum diyà te kandin is mezakel he menge etew ne mibpenurù din sikandan.

Ne hein nepasad haazà is kebpenurù din ne midlaus si Jesus, ne ziyà te ibayè din duen upisina te menunukut te vuhis. Ne zutun neehè din is anak ni Alpiyu he si Levi he menunukut te vuhis he ebpimpinuu zutun. Ne migkeǥiyan din te, "Sunud ka kedì." Ne zutun midhitindeg si Levi ne midsunud ki Jesus.
Ne hein egkaan si Jesus wey menge sumusundan din diyà te valey ni Levi mezakel is menge menunukut te vuhis wey menge mesinupaken he etew he nemengaan duma kandan su mezakel is nemekesundan kandin.

Ne zuen dutun daan menge Perisiyu he menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Ne hein neehè dan he egkaan si Jesus duma zutun te menge mesinupaken wey menunukut te vuhis, nenginginsà sikandan duen te menge sumusundan ni Jesus, ke sikandan te, "Maan is egkaan si Jesus wey ed-inum duma te menge limbungan he menge menunukut te vuhis wey menge mesinupaken?"

Nezineg haazà ni Jesus ne midtavak sikandin pinaaǥi te sempità, ke sikandin te, "Sikan is wazè din daru, ne kenà egkinahanglan he ebewian, kekenà, iyan dà sikan is duen din daru. Siak, wazà a medhendini wey ku ikepeengked te ed-ulaula te mezaat is menge metazeng, kekenà, iyan is menge mesinupaken te Megbevayà."

Ne sengeandew zutun, edsalang te kegkaan is menge Perisiyu wey is menge sumusundan ni Juan Megbebewtismu su edtumanen dan is tuluuwen te menge Hudiyu. Ne zuen menge etew he midhendiyà te ki Jesus ne ke sikandan te, "Is menge sumusundan ni Juan Megbebewtismu wey is menge sumusundan te menge Perisiyu, edsalang dan te kegkaan su wey zan mepurungi is ked-azap dan te Megbevayà . Ne maan man is kenà mulà edsalang te kegkaan is kenikew he menge sumusundan?"

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Penenglitan ke zuen eseweey, is menge zuma zutun te ebpengesawa, kenè dan egkeisip he edsalang dan te kegkaan ke kemulu zan pa zuma haazà is ebpengesawa. Ne zutun te timpu he ibpaawà diyà te kandan sikan is ebpengesawa, human dan edsalang egkaan. Ne iring din ded daan is menge sumusundan ku su te kemulu e pa zini te kandan, kenè dan edsalang te kegkaan."

Ne zutun insempità ni Jesus is kenà kebpeked-amur te veǥu he penurù din wey te zaan he tuluuwen. Ke sikandin te, "Is beǥu he manggad he wazè pa megkenseng, kenà meupiya he idapi ziyà te kumbalà he merunut en he manggad su emun ebpìpian, egkenseng haazà is beǥu ne egkevindas is merunut en he manggad ne tuwas pa he meluag is kegkevindas din.

Ne iring din ded daan is binu he sikan pa ebeeli he idtaǥù diyà te teleǥuey he lundis te kambing. Kenà egkehimu he ziyà itaǥù te zaan he teleǥuey su ebetu haazà is teleǥuey ne egkeulaan haazà is binu ne egkezeetan daan haazà is teleǥuey. Kinahanglan he is binu he sikan pa ebeeli, ne ziyà idtaǥù te veǥu he teleǥuey."

Ne zutun te sevaha he andew he Sebadu ingkevayà eni Jesus is pemuleey. Iyan haazà andew he insuǥù dengan te Megbevayà te menge Hudiyu he wazà etew he ibpevaal zutun he andew su iyan Andew te Kedhimeley. Ne mibpengetù is menge sumusundan ni Jesus te trigu zutun.
Ne zutun migkeǥiyan si Jesus te menge Perisiyu te, "Is menge sumusundan nu, edsupaken dan is insuǥù kenitew te Megbevayà su maan is edlegtey zan guntaan kayi te Andew te Kedhimeley?"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Kenà egkehimu he wazè niw mevasa ziyà te ingkesurat dengan kes mid-ulaula ni Hadì David. Sikandin wey is menge sundaru zin, midlised sikandan su nengevitil zan.

Ne tenged dutun midseled si David diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà ne migkaan din is egkeenen he insavuk diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà. Ne impekaan din daan dutun is menge zuma zin. Iyan lavew he memumuhat dutun si Ebiyatar. Supak te kesuǥuan haazà is kegkeena zan dutun su iyan dà ebpekekaan dutun he egkeenen is menge memumuhat.
Ne minsan pa zutun wazè dan mekesalà . Iyan aney he midlimbag te Megbevayà is etew ne human din insuǥù is Andew te Kedhimeley, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, mahal is etew, kenà is Andew te Kedhimeley .
Umba, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan a zuen keǥehem te egkaǥi ke hengkey is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan te etew emun Andew te Kedhimeley."
Ne mid-uman medseled si Jesus duen te simbahan te menge Hudiyu, ne zuen dutun etew he minatey is menge uǥat te zivaluy he velad din.

Ne zuen menge kuntada ni Jesus dutun ne mibentayan dan si Jesus su ed-ahaan dan ke ebewian din haazà is etew zutun te andew su Andew te Kedhimeley haazà. Su emun ebewian ni Jesus haazà is etew ne idsumbung dan he midsupak din is Andew te Kedhimeley.
Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is etew he nezeetan is belad din te, "Hengkayi ka, Mama, te teliwazà."

Ne zutun mid-insaan din haazà is menge kuntada zin te, "Hendei zapit is intuǥut kenitew zuen te kesuǥuan tew he ed-ul-ulahan tew kayi te Andew te Kedhimeley? Iyan be is kedtavang te etew he edlised wey ke ebpesipelahan be is etew? Iyan be is kedtevangi ta te etew su wey kenà mebpatey wey ke edhimetayan te ve is etew?" Ne wazè dan meketavak dutun.

Ne te ebpenlangulangu si Jesus dutun te mezakel he menge etew, utew zin egkepeuki sikandan ne utew zaan mibmesakit is gehinawa zin su haazà is menge etew, wazè dan kehizu. Ne zutun migkeǥiyan din haazà is etew he nezeetan is belad din te, "Ketenga nu, Mama, is belad nu." Ne migketeng dutun te etew haazà is belad din ne segugunà neulii.
Ne is menge Perisiyu, nemen-awè dan dutun te simbahan. Ne sikandan wey is menge sakup te upakat he midtukud ni Hadì Hirudis, mibpelelelaǥè dan ke hengkey is paaǥi he mehimu zan he mepatey si Jesus.

Ne zutun mid-awà si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din ne midhendiyè dan te veyvey te ranew. Ne nemenduma ki Jesus is utew mezakel he menge etew he ebpuun diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya. Ne is duma kandan, diyà ebpemuun te prubinsya he Hudiya,

wey ziyà te inged he Hiruselim, wey ziyà te prubinsya he Idumiya, wey ziyà te tanà he zehipag te wahig he Hurdan wey ziyà te menge inged he siringan dutun diyà te inged he Tiru wey Sidun. Utew mezakel he menge etew is midhendiyà te ki Jesus su nezineg dan is menge tudtul mehitenged te menge egkengein-inuwan he mibeelan din.
Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din he megkuwa zan te avang su wey zin meuntuzi emun egkelipitlipit sikandin te utew mezakel he menge etew.
Mezakel is nengeulian din en he egkengezeruwan ne tenged kayi, is egkengezeruwan dutun, ebpenlietliet dan en is edteǥel ed-uvey diyà te ki Jesus wey zan mekezampà kandin su wey zan meulii.
Ne is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, hein neehè dan si Jesus, ne nemenluhud sikandan diyà te etuvangan din is ebpemengulahì he egkaǥi te, "Iyan ka iyan kes Anak te Megbevayà!"
Ne zutun midawey ni Jesus haazà is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin ne migkeǥiyan din sikandan he kenè dan ipesavut he Anak sikandin te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun midtekezeg si Jesus diyà te vuvungan dutun ne mid-umew zin sikan is nengepilì din he mehimu he sineriǥan din. Ne mid-uvey zan diyà te kandin.
Ne intezù ni Jesus dutun is sepulù wey zezuwa he medumazuma kandin wey zin ikepehipanew sikandan te kebpesavut te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
Ne mibeǥayan din sikandan te ǥehem wey zan mevuǥew is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he edlalung te menge etew.

Iyan heini menge ngazan te sepulù wey zezuwa he etew he nengepilì ni Jesus: si Simon he migeraran din ki Pedro, wey si Santiago he anak ni Sibidiyu wey is hazi ni Santiago he si Juan. Heini is dezuwa, migeraran din ki Buwenirgis, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, mezilapet he etew. Ne elin daan dutun si Andres, si Felipe, si Bartolome, si Mateo, si Tomas, si Santiago he anak ni Alpiyu, wey si Tediyu. Ne elin daan si Simon is sevaha te upakat dengan he egngezanan te Kenenista. Ne elin daan mibpilì ni Jesus si Judas he tigKeriyuti, sikan is mid-akal kandin. Ne neipus haazà is kebpilia ni Jesus kandan, ne mid-ulì sikandin.
Ne zutun ensi Jesus, wazè dan en timpu minsan te kegkaan su utew mezakel is menge etew he nengeamur-amur ziyà te kandin.
Ne hein nezineg te menge kezumahan ni Jesus is egkeulaula zin ne mibeyaan dan sikandin su kunaan dan ke neliveg.

Ne zuen dutun menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he ebpuun diyà te inged he Hiruselim ne ke sikandan te, "Heini he etew, mid-ulinan sikandin ni Endedaman, sikan is egalen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne tenged kayi igkepeǥuwè din puun te menge etew is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin."

Ne zutun, migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is menge etew he med-uvey zan diyà te kandin ne zuen menge sempità he impenurù din kandan. Ke sikandin te, "Kenà egkehimu he ebuǥawen ni Setanas is duma zin he mezaat he mulin-ulin.
Penenglitan ke zuen hadì ne ebpetebtebekà is menge sakup din, meǥaan egkeawà is gehem din te kedhadì.
Ne ke zuen edlingahaan te sengevelayan ne ebpekunkuntedahà is menge sakup din, meǥaan egkevengkag is upakat dan.
Umba ke egkuntedahan ni Setanas is menge sakup din, kenà egkeuǥet is keǥehem din te kebayàbayà, kekenà, meǥaan egkeawà ne egkehanew.

Nezaag ku en si Setanas umba ebpekepaawà a te menge sakup din su wazà minsan hentei he ebpekeseled te valey te mezesen he etew he ed-aǥew te menge azen dutun te mezesen he etew emun kenè din egkehuna egkevakus haazà is mezesen he etew. Kinahanglan he ebekusen din edhunai, ne human din egkeaǥew is menge azen dutun te mezesen he etew.
Tentenuzi niw heini," ke si Jesus, "he egkepesaylu pa te Megbevayà is menge etew te minsan hengkey he menge salè dan wey minsan hengkey he kedsumpalit dan kandin,
iyan, sikan is edsumpalit te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, kenè en egkeawà diyà te kandin haazà is salè din ne kenè en egkepesaylu te minsan keenu."
Umba migkaǥi ni Jesus haazà su is menge menunudlù, migkaǥi zan he mezaat he mulin-ulin is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he ed-ulin ki Jesus.
Ne nekeuma zutun is iney ni Jesus wey is menge hazi ni Jesus he menge maama. Ne ziyè dan dà te ǥawas dutun te valey ne migkeǥiyan dan is menge etew he ipeǥawas dan si Jesus.
Ne utew mezakel is menge etew he ebpememinuu zutun he nekeliǥuy ki Jesus. Ne migkeǥiyan si Jesus te menge etew te, "Diyà te ǥawas is iney nu wey menge hazi nu ne ibpeliǥawang ke zan."
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Duen ku pa ibpaahà keniyu he iney ku wey menge suled ku."
Ne nenlangulangu si Jesus dutun te menge etew he nekelingut kandin ne ke sikandin te, "Heini zed is iney ku wey menge suled ku
su is minsan hentei he edtuman te egkesuatan te Megbevayà, iyan daan iney ku wey menge suled ku he maama, wey menge etevey ku."

Ne sevaha he andew zutun diyà te veyvey te ranew mid-uman penurua ni Jesus is menge etew. Ne utew mezakel is menge etew he nengeamur-amur ziyà te kandin, ne tenged kayi mid-untud sikandin diyà te avang he uvey zutun te veyvey ne zutun mebpinuu. Ne is menge etew, diyè dan dà te veyvey is ebpememineg kandin.
Ne mezakel is impenurù ni Jesus kandan pinaaǥi te menge sempità.
Ke sikandin te, "Duen etew he midhendiyà te pemuleey zin su ebpemula.
Ne zutun te kebpemula zin, duen benì he nengeulug diyà te zalan, ne heini migkaan te menge tagbis.
Duen daan benì he nengeulug he nemekeuntud diyà te utew menipis he tanà he nekeapid dutun te menge vatu. Ne haazà, petuluy zà midtuvù su menipis haazà is tanà.
Asal hein mid-andew, neǥangu petuluy haazà is menge pinemula su mevavew zà is nesenevan te zalid dan.
Ne zuen daan dutun benì he nengeulug diyà te tanà he menge zuǥiyen is menge sagbet dutun. Ne mibmemelayat haazà is sagbet ne mibpengulembezan haazà is menge pinemula ne wazà mekepemeǥas.

Ne zuen daan benì dutun he ziyà mengeulug te meupiya he tanà ne haazà, midtuvù, ne midekelà ne nemeǥas mulà. Duen dutun menge pinemula he mibeǥas te tigketluan, ne zuen daan mibeǥas te tigkeneman. Ne zuen daan mibeǥas te tignenggatus."
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Kinahanglan he sevuta niw heini is nezineg niw."

Ne hein wazè en utew etew zutun su iyan dan dà is menge sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan ni Jesus wey is kenà utew mezakel he menge etew, mid-insaan dan si Jesus ke hengkey is ibpesavut din dutun te menge sempità.

Ne ke si Jesus te, "Sikiyu is menge sumusundan ku, ibpesavut en keniyu te Megbevayà sikan is in-eles dengan mehitenged te kedhadì din, iyan, is menge zuma he menge etew, ibpenurù kandan pinaaǥi te menge sempità.

'Su zutun ebpurung dan edtengteng, iyan, kenè dan egkeahà, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, ebpemineg dan, iyan, henduen be te wazè dan mekezineg su kenè dan edsevuten. Su emun egkesavut dan ed-engkezan dan is memezaat he ulaula zan ne egkepesaylu sikandan te Megbevayà!'"
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Egkesavut niw ve heini is sempità he migkaǥi ku? Emun kenè niw heini egkesavut kenè niw zaan egkesavut is duma he menge lalag ku he pinaaǥi te sempità.
Duen te sempitè ku, is kehuluǥan te kebpemula te etew, ne iyan is kedsengyawa te Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne is benì, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he zuen nemekezineg duen, iyan, midlepew si Setanas ne midhimu zin he melipati zuen te nekezineg sikan is lalag he nezineg dan.
Ne sikan is benì he ziyà meketanà te menipis he tanà he zivavew te vatu, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he is nemekezineg duen, ne utew zan egkesuati te ebpemineg, ne edtuuwan dan.
Iyan, kenà egkeheǥet is kedtuu zan ne kenà egkeuǥet, ke egkeumahan sikandan te samuk wey ke kemeresayan be tenged te kedewata zan te Lalag te Megbevayà, edlikù dan diyà te zaan he ulaula zan.
Ne sikan is benì, he ziyà mengeulug te tanà he zuǥiyen is menge sagbet dutun, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he nezineg te menge etew,
iyan, egkelipatan dan tenged te menge seeng dan kayi te kelibutan wey te kegkesuat dan te selapì wey te mezakel pa he menge azen, ne kenà ebpulus diyà te kandan is Lalag te Megbevayà.

Ne sikan is benì he ziyà meketanà te meupiya he tanà, iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he nezineg te menge etew ne midtuu zan; ne is Lalag te Megbevayà, ne ebpulus diyà te kandan. Is duma, ne ebpulus te zeisek diyà te kandan, ne is duma, ne ebpulus te malù dekelà, ne is duma, ne ebpulus te utew zekelà diyà te kandan."
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Ke edtemtem is etew te sulù, kenà egkehimu he ebpelengkevan din te revan wey ke idsihung din be te vangkù he hizeǥaan su idsavuk din diyà te selevukà.
Ne iring din ded daan is minsan hengkey he in-eles guntaan ne ibpeǥawaǥawa zed keuzemà ne is minsan hengkey he penurù ku he kenè niw egkesavut guntaan ne egkesavut niw keuzemà.
Kinahanglan he sevuta niw heini is nezineg niw."
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Purungi niw pemineǥa is penurù ku keniyu su sumalà is kebpurung niw kebpemineg, ibeǥey keniyu te Megbevayà is kedsavut, asal zekelè pa is ibpesavut din keniyu.

Su is etew he edewaten din is ibpesavut kandin te Megbevayà, ed-umanan pa te Megbevayà is kedsavut din, iyan, is etew he kenè din edewaten is ibpesavut te Megbevayà, id-awà diyà te kandin is deisek he nesavut din en."
Ne impelaus ni Jesus is egkeǥiyen din, ke sikandin te, "Is kedekelà te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne iring te etew he mid-ezek te venì diyà te pemuleey zin.

Wazè din hanew ke egkemenumenu haazà is kedtuvù dutun te pinemula zin, kekenà, ebpeseseǥazen din dà. Edlipezeng sikandin te mezukilem ne ebaal te maandew ne kada andew edtuvù ne edekelà haazà is menge pinemula zin.
Su iyan idtuvù te pinemula haazà is tanà. Edtuvù haazà is pinemula ne edlepew is dahun din ne human edlepew is beǥas din ne zutun human egkeayun te kegkelutui.
Ne emun egkelutuan en haazà, edreǥunen dutun te teǥitanà su iyan en tiraǥun."
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Hengkey is meupiya he ebpetug-iringan tew te kedhadì te Megbevayà? Hengkey is meupiya he egemiten tew he sempità?
Is ked-iseg kebmahabet te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne iring te pinemula he utew zeisek is lisu zin he ibpemula haazà diyà te tanà.
Ne edtuvù ne edekelà ne egkehimu he iyan utew zekelà te langun he menge pinemula. Dezekelà is menge subpang din ne ebpekesesalag is menge tagbis dutun."
Pinaaǥi te mezakel he menge sempità impesavut ni Jesus is Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te kandan sumalà is netuenan din he egkesavut dan.
Pudu menge sempità is impezineg ni Jesus diyà te menge etew, iyan, emun iyan dan dà te menge sumusundan din, ne ibpesavut din kandan is kehuluǥan dutun te menge sempità he penurù din.
Ne hein midsanlep en is andew zutun, migkeǥiyan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din te, "Edhendiyè kiw te ziyà layun."

Ne zutun mid-ewaan dan is mezakel he menge etew ne is menge sumusundan ni Jesus, mid-untud dan duen te avang he sikan is mibpinuuwan ni Jesus ne migenat dan. Ne zuen daan duma zutun he menge etew he nemen-aavang is eduma kandan.
Ne hein diyè dan en te lawed ne midtekewtekew mebpengeramag te utew mevendes ne egkeselikuvungan en te vaǥel haazà is avang ne egketeǥuan en te wahig.

Ne si Jesus, nekelipezeng diyà te huziyan he zulung dutun te avang he mid-uulunà. Ne migunggel sikandin dutun te menge sumusundan din he ke sikandan te, "Egkelavu kiw en! Kenè nu ve ebeliyen ke egkeǥerè kiw?"
Ne zutun nepukew si Jesus ne mid-enew ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is keramag wey vaǥel he med-engked dan. ||||| + 1.5 SECs ||||| Ne mid-engked haazà is keramag ne mibmelinew utew haazà is wahig.
Ne migkeǥiyan din is menge sumusundan din te, "Maan is egkengehandek kew? Wazè niw pe be kedsarig kedi?"

Ne zutun, utew nengeherati haazà is menge sumusundan din ne mibpein-inseey sikandan he egkaǥi is kada sevaha kandan te, "Hengkey heini vuwa he etew? Maan is minsan is keramag wey menge vaǥel ne ebpemineg kandin!"
Ne nekezunggù ensi Jesus diyà layun dutun te ranew, ne iyan haazà is nezungguan dan tanà te menge etew he Geresinen.
Ne zutun te kedrenà ni Jesus dutun te avang, midsinuǥung sikandin te etew he ziyà ebpuun te menge surung he penlevengà. Midsuukan haazà te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin
umba ziyà ed-ubpà te menge penlevengà. Ne utew mezesen sikandin ne tenged dutun kenè en egkevakus te minsan kedina.

Su neuǥet en, layun ebekusen is menge velad din wey paa zin, iyan, kada kebekusa kandin dutun, ne edrupeten din is pusas he ibpusas kandin, ne ebpemidtawen din dà is kedina he ibakus kandin. Wazè en ebpekeeǥen kandin tuus te utew mezesen.
Umba, te maandew wey mezukilem, dutun sikandin edriǥuriǥu te menge penlevengà wey menge vuntud ne edtulung ebpengulahì ne ebpemelian din is lawa zin te vatu.
Ne hein nepentawan dutun he etew si Jesus diyà te meziyù, mibpelelaǥuy is edsinuǥung ki Jesus ne mid-azap kandin.

Ne si Jesus, migkeǥiyan din haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin te, "Awè ka keniyan te etew!" Ne zutun nengulahì haazà is etew he ke sikandin diyà te ki Jesus te, "Ey! Sikew is anak te utew lavew he Megbevayà, ebmenuwen a kenikew? Edhengyuen ku kenikew he peseriǥa a kenikew he kenè e pa kenikew siluti su kayi ki te etuvangan te Megbevayà!"
Ne mid-insaan ni Jesus haazà is etew te, "Hentei is ngazan nu?" Ne midtavak dutun haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin te, "Iyan ngazan ku si Liblibuwen su utew key mezakel is nemenuuk kayi te etew."
Ne haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin, mibpenigudu medhangyù sikandin diyà te ki Jesus he kenè din segseǥa sikandan diyà te meziyù he tanà.
Ne te uvey zutun duen utew mezakel he menge vavuy he ebpemenuwal ziyà te kelendiǥan.
Ne sikan is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, midhangyù dan diyà te ki Jesus te, "Ipehendutun key te menge vavuy wey key mekesuuk diyà te kandan."

Ne midtuǥutan ni Jesus sikandan. Ne zutun nemengguwà haazà is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin puun dutun te etew ne midsuuk sikandan duen te menge vavuy. Haazà is menge vavuy, menge zezuwa he libu sikandan, ne nemelelaǥuy zan petupang dutun te utew mesilid he kelendiǥan ne mid-agbur zan diyà te ranew zutun ne nengelened dan maamin.

Ne zuen menge maama he ebpemen-elima zutun te menge vavuy, ne nemenhendiyè dan te inged is ebpemelelaǥuy wey ziyà te menge uvey zutun he unayan su ibpesavut dan ke hengkey is nehitavù. Ne hein nezineg haazà te menge etew, ne nemenhendiyè dan te ki Jesus su ed-ahaan dan ke hengkey is neulaula.

Ne hein nemekeuma zan, neehè dan kes midsuukan te edliblibuwen he menge mezaat he mulin-ulin. Neehè dan dutun he midsul-ub en te ugelingen ne hustu en is ked-isip-isip din ne tenged dutun utew zan en nengeinuinu.
Ne is menge etew he zutun he zaan, midtudtul zan dutun te menge etew is neulaula zutun te midsuukan te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin wey is neulaula zuen te menge vavuy.
Ne haazà is menge etew, midhengyuan dan si Jesus he med-awè en dutun te menge inged dan.
Ne hein ed-untud en si Jesus duen te avang, sikan is etew he neulian te kedsuuki kandin te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, midhangyù sikandin he eduma ki Jesus.

Iyan, wazà medtuǥut si Jesus he meduma kandin haazà is etew, kekenà, migkeǥiyan din te, "Ulì ke en ne tudtula nu te kezuzumahi nu is utew zekelà he utew meupiya he midhimu te Nengazen diyà te kenikew wey is hizu zin kenikew."

Ne zutun migenat haazà is etew, ne midtukid din is menge inged diyà te prubinsya he Dikepulis, ne mibpenudtul zin is langun he meupiya he midhimu ni Jesus diyà te kandin. Ne nengeinuinu is langun he menge etew zutun.
Ne midlayun ensi Jesus he ed-untud te avang. Ne hein nekezunggù dan nengeamur-amur zutun te veyvey is utew mezakel he menge etew he mid-uvey zan diyà te kandin.

Ne zutun nekeuma zaan is etew he egngezanan ki Hayru. Pengulu si Hayru te sevaha he simbahan te menge Hudiyu. Ne hein neehè din si Jesus ne mid-uvey sikandin diyà te kandin ne midluhud diyà te etuvangan din.
Ne midhengyuan din si Jesus te, "Is anak ku he vahi he edraǥaraǥe en, ne edluwàluwè en te ǥehinawa. Edhengyuan ku sikew he hendiyè ka te valey ku wey nu penemsama wey meulii ne meuyag."
Ne midumahan sikandin ni Jesus. Ne zutun te ziyè dan te zalan egkengelipitlipit dan en su mezakel is nemenduma kandin he menge etew.
Ne zuen dutun bahi he utew en nerasey su midsepulù en wey zezuwa he tuig is kegkevusbusi kandin ne kenà ed-engked.
Ne haazà is daru zin, ne mezakel en he ebpemenambar is midtambar zutun ne naamin en is selapì din he insuhul zin te ebpemenambar kandin, iyan, nasì dà sikandin egkeurat kada edtembari.

Nezineg dutun te vahi is tudtul mehitenged ki Jesus ne mibpenlietliet en daan sikandin dutun te mezakel he menge etew is edteǥel ed-uvey ziyà te egkeiniyuǥan ni Jesus su wey mekeǥawed te và dà kumbalà ni Jesus.
Su iyan diyà te ǥehinawa zin is: "Minsan ke mekeǥawed e zà te kumbalè din ne egkeawè en heini is daru ku."
Ne te neǥewezan din dutun is kumbalà ni Jesus, ne mid-engked haazà is kegkevusbusi kandin ne netuenan din dutun he haazà is egezamen din, ne naawè en diyà te kandin.
Ne si Jesus, netuenan din dutun he zuen neulaula te ǥehem din ne midteren is ebpenlangulangu zutun te mezakel he menge etew is mid-insà te, "Hentei is migawed te kumbalè ku?"
Ne migkaǥi is menge sumusundan din te, "Es, mezakel utew he menge etew is ebpenlietliet diyan te kenikew ne maan is ibpenginginsè nu pa maan ke hentei is migawed te kumbalè nu?"
Ne zutun, ebpenlenglenguwen ni Jesus ke hentei is nekeǥawed dutun te kumbalè din.

Ne haazà is bahi, utew nahandek su netuenan din en ke hengkey is nehitavù diyà te kandin dutun te kegewezi zin te kumbalà ni Jesus. Ne mid-uvayan din si Jesus te egkerkeren ne midluhud diyà te etuvangan din ne midseysey zin is langun mehitenged dutun te zaru zin.
Ne zutun, migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Bayi, umba neulian ka te zaru nu su midsarig ka kedì. Ulì ke en ne mebmelinawen is kebpekesavuk nu ne kenè ke en maan mezeruwi."

Ne te kemulu pa si Jesus egkaǥi zutun ne zuen nemekeuma he ebpuun diyà te valey ni Hayru. Ne migkaǥi zan diyà te ki Hayru te, "Kenè nu en bigbigata te eduma pa maan si Jesus su kenè niw en egkesepenan is gehinawa zuen te anak nu."
Iyan, si Jesus, wazè din itetenged haazà is migkaǥi te menge etew, kekenà, migkaǥi ziyà te ki Hayru te, "Kenè ka meseeng, kekenà, sarig ke zà kediey."
Ne zutun iyan dà impelaus ni Jesus he eduma kandan ki Hayru, si Pedro, si Santiago, wey si Juan he suled ni Santiago.
Ne hein nekeuma zan en dutun te valey ni Hayru, ne naahà ni Jesus dutun he egkengeǥisaweg is menge etew, ne nezineg din is ebpemenlelendag wey ebpemenineǥew.
Ne midseled ensi Jesus dutun te valey ne migkeǥiyan din sikandan te, "Maan is egkengeǥisaweg kew? Maan is ebpemenineǥew kew? Wazà mebpatey heeyan is batà, kekenà, midlipezeng!"

Ne te kegkezineǥa zan dutun te migkaǥi ni Jesus ne và dan dà mid-engiti sikandin. Ne zutun impaawà ni Jesus is menge etew zutun te valey. Iyan dà wazè din ipaawà is amey wey iney zutun te vatà wey is tetelu he menge sumusundan din. Ne miduma zin sikandan dutun te mibperey-asan te vatà.
Ne hein dutun dan en, migewezan ni Jesus is belad dutun te vatà ne ke sikandin te, "Telita kumi," he ke và dà egkeǥiya te, "Bayi, enew kad!"
Ne mid-enew haazà is batà ne segugunà midhiphipanew. Menge sepulù en wey zezuwa is penuiǥen dutun te vatà. Utew nengeinuinu is iney wey amey zutun te vatà.
Ne mibeleuzan sikandan ni Jesus he kenè dan penudtula ke hengkey is neulaula. Ne migkeǥiyan din daan sikandan he ipekaan dan haazà is anak dan.
Ne mid-awà si Jesus dutun te inged ne mid-ulì diyà te inged din, diyà te Neserit. Ne nemenduma kandin is menge sumusundan din.

Ne zutun te andew he Sebadu he iyan mahal he Andew te Kedhimeley, mibpenurù ni Jesus is menge etew ziyà te seled te simbahan te menge Hudiyu. Mezakel he menge etew is nengetiǥum dutun, ne utew zan nengeinuinu is ebpememineg ki Jesus. Ke sikandan te, "Iyan sikandin sikan is pandey. Is iney zin, ne si Maria ne menge suled din ensi Santiago, si Jose, si Hudas, wey si Simon. Is menge etevey zin, ne kayi zà daan te inged tew. Maan is metau sikandin? Hendei zin buwa mekuwa is ketau zin? Maan is ebpekehimu sikandin te menge egkein-inuwan?" Ne zutun, wazè dan dewata is ibpenurù ni Jesus.

Ne zutun, migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Is ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, kenà sikandin edtehuzen te menge kezuzumahi zin wey te menge zuma he etew zuen te keugelingen din he inged, iyan, diyà te zuma he menge inged edtehuzen mulà sikandin," ke sikandin.
Umba, wazà egkein-inuwan he ingkepaahà ni Jesus dutun he inged. Pira zà dutun he egkengezeruwan is midepenetan din te velad din ne nengeulian sikandan.
Ne utew neinuinu si Jesus su wazà medtuu kandin is menge etew zutun he inged. Ne zutun midtukid ni Jesus te ebpenurù is menge siringan he inged dutun.

Ne midtiǥum din sikan is sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din su ibpehipanew zin. Mibpemahinbahin din sikandan te tigduwazuwa. Ne mibpemeǥayan din daan sikandan te ǥehem te kebpeguwà te mezaat he mulin-ulin.
Ne midteleenan din sikandan he ke edhipanew zan, iyan dan dà uwita is tuked dan ne kenè dan med-uwit te keenen, kemuyut, wey minsan selapì.
Idtuǥut kandan is kedsesepatus, iyan, kenè dan med-uwit te ed-ilisan dan he ugelingen.
Ne ke si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Emun ebpekeuma kew ziyà te sengeinged kinahanglan he is egkepemenehikan niw he valey ne zutun kew zà uliulì taman te ked-awè niw zutun.
Ne ke zuen inged he kenè kew zuen igalewǥalew wey kenè dan ebpemineǥen is ibpesavut niw, ne tektaka niw is eliyavuk diyà te menge paa niw he iyan laǥuy he edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà."
Ne zutun, nenhipanew haazà is menge sumusundan ni Jesus ne impesavut dan he kinahanglan he iniyuǥi te menge etew is memezaat he ulaula.
Ne mezakel is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpenlalung te menge etew he impemaawè dan ne mezakel zaan is egkengezeruwan he mibpenheplasan dan te lana ne nengeulian.

Ne nezineg ni Hadì Hirudis is tudtul kayi te mid-ulaula eni Jesus su nevantug en si Jesus diyà te minsan hendei zutun. Ne zuen menge etew he migkaǥi te, "Heini si Jesus, ne iyan si Juan Megbebewtismu he nevanhew umba zuen din gehem wey zin meveeli is menge iring kayi he singyal."

Ne migkaǥi is duma te, "Iyan si Jesus sikan is ebpeneuven dengan he si Elias." Ne migkaǥi is duma pa te, "Ebpeneuven iyan si Jesus he iring te menge tipehuna he ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà," edhenduen dan.

Iyan, hein nezineg ni Hadì Hirudis haazà is egkeǥiyen dan, kunaan din ke nevanhew si Juan, ne ke sikandin te, "Heini si Jesus, ne iyan ded si Juan Megbebewtismu he mibpepungelan ku te ulu ne nevanhew sikandin."

Ne heini si Hadì Hirudis, iyan hinungdan he ingkepehimetayan din si Juan su migkeǥiyan sikandin ni Juan he supak te kesuǥuan is ked-eǥawa zin te esawa te suled din su si Hadì Hirudis, mid-esawa zin is ipag din he si Hirudyas he esawa te suled din he si Felipe. Ne tenged dutun te migkaǥi ni Juan, impezakep sikandin ni Hirudis ne mibpirisu zin.
Ne si Hirudyas, nepeukan din si Juan, ne ebpehimetayan din pezem, iyan, wazà ituǥut ni Hadì Hirudis.

Ne si Hadì Hirudis, egkehandek sikandin ki Juan su netuenan din he metazeng he etew si Juan he ed-ulinan te Megbevayà. Umba wazè din ituǥut he mehimetayi. Egkesuatan ni Hirudis te ebpemineg is kebpenurù ni Juan, iyan, ingkeliveg din haazà is penurù.

Asal neuma is kedsilibra te andew te ked-enaka ki Hirudis. Ne zutun naahà human ni Hirudyas is paaǥi wey zin ikepehimetayi si Juan. Midtukud ni Hadì Hirudis is dekelà he keemuran ne mibpemesuǥuan din is menge punuan wey is menge egalen te menge sundaru wey is menge sepian diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.

Ne sikan is anak he vahi ni Hirudyas, midseled dutun te keemuran ne midsayew ne utew ingkelangan ni Hadì Hirudis wey sikan is ebpemengaan duma kandin. Ne tenged dutun migkeǥiyan sikandin ni Hadì Hirudis te, "Buyù ka kedì te minsan hengkey ne ibeǥey ku kenikew."
Ne utew mezesen is pesarig ni Hadì Hirudis dutun te midsayew su ke sikandin te, "Minsan hengkey is ebuyuen nu kedì, minsan ke liwazè pa kayi te ginhedian ku ne ibeǥey ku."
Ne zutun miguwà haazà is raǥa ne midhendiyà te iney zin ne mid-insà ke hengkey is meupiya he ebuyuen din. Ne midtavak haazà is iney zin te, "Iyan nu vuyua is ulu ni Juan Megbebewtismu."
Ne zutun migaanggaan en maan medseled haazà is raǥa ne migkeǥiyan din si Hadì Hirudis te, "Iyan ebuyuen ku ǥuntaan dà is iveǥey nu kediey is ulu ni Juan Megbebewtismu he id-ahuk diyà te pinggan."

Ne zutun utew neseeng si Hirudis, iyan, tenged te utew mezesen is pesarig din he nezineg daan haazà is pesarig din dutun te menge etew he nemenelavuk dutun te keemuran, ne ingkevensahi zin ke kenè din edtumanen haazà is pesarig din.
Ne midsuǥù din dutun is sundaru he ipehendiyà te pirisuwan su ibpepungelan din si Juan Megbebewtismu. Ne midhendiyà haazà is sundaru ne mibpungelan din te ulu si Juan Megbebewtismu.
Ne is ulu ni Juan, in-ahuk te pinggan ne mid-uwit dutun te sundaru ne imbeǥey zin dutun te raǥa. Ne haazà is raǥa, imbeǥey zin haazà is ulu ziyà te iney zin.
Ne hein netuenan heini te menge sumusundan ni Juan, midhendutun dan te pirisuwan. Ne migkuwa zan is lawa ni Juan ne inleveng dan.
Ne is menge epustul ni Jesus, nekelikù dan diyà te kandin, ne midtudtul zan diyà te kandin is langun he mid-ulaula zan wey impemenurù dan.

Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus sikandan te, "Edhendiyè kiw zè pa te tanà he wazà duen etew su wey kiw mekehimeley," ke sikandin. Umba migkaǥi ni Jesus heini su mezakel utew he menge etew is ebpemekedtetelevukè dà diyà te kandin. Ne wazà timpu zan minsan te kegkaan.
Ne zutun mid-untud dan te avang su edhendiyè dan te tanà he wazà duen menge etew.

Ne hein egenat dan en naahà sikandan te mezakel he menge etew ne netuenan dutun te menge etew he iyan haazà ensi Jesus. Ne zutun, haazà is menge etew, nemelelaǥuy zan he ebpuun te langun he menge inged dutun, ne nemeyvey zan he edhuna ziyà te egketendangan dutun te avang he mid-untuzan eni Jesus.

Ne hein migaun si Jesus puun dutun te avang ne neehè din he nengeamur-amur zutun is utew mezakel he menge etew. Ne nehizuwan din sikandan su henduen be sikandan te menge ayam he kerehidu he wazà ed-elima kandan. Utew zan mekehizuhizu. Umba, mezakel is impenurù din kandan dutun.
Ne hein mahapun en dutun mid-uvayan sikandin te menge sumusundan din ne ke sikandan te, "Mahapun en utew ne wazà menge inged kayi te uvey tew.
Ipeǥenat nu en is menge etew wey zan mekehendiyà te menge inged wey menge unayan wey zan mekepemasa te egkekaan dan."

Iyan, migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Iyan kew mebeǥey te egkekaan dan." "Es!" ke sikandan, "minsan pa ke utew zekelà is selapì tew, minsan dezuwa he ǥatus he vuuk he selapì he dinaryu ne kenè pa ereg he ibpemasa te egkekaan kayi te utew mezakel he menge etew."
Ne migkaǥi zutun si Jesus te, "Susiya niw ke sengemenu is naazen tew he egkekaan." Ne hein nesusi zan en, ke sikandan diyà te ki Jesus te, "Lelima zà he vuuk he supas wey zezuwa he vuuk he pait."
Ne zutun impepundukpunduk ni Jesus is menge etew he impemepinuu zin dutun te perekpek.
Ne nememinuu zan ne tignenggatus wey kelimahan he etew is kada punduk.

Ne migkuwa zutun ni Jesus haazà is lelima he supas wey haazà is dezuwa he pait ne midlingahà diyà te langit ne mibpeselematan din te Megbevayà. Ne mibpenevìtevì din is lelima he supas, ne minsan pa zutun kenà egkeamin haazà is edtevien din . Ne imbeǥey zin diyà te menge sumusundan din haazà is nengetevì wey zan ikepemeǥey zutun te menge etew. Ne iring ded daan haazà is kebpenebtevia zin dutun te zezuwa he pait.
Ne mibpemengaan dan dutun ne pudu zan nengehantey.
Ne haazà is egkeenen, nesemaan pa te sepulù wey zezuwa he vinevey is nehimes te menge sumusundan din he menge tevì te supas wey pait.
Ne lelima he libu is kezakel zutun te menge maama zà he nemekekaan te menge supas ne wazà iragkes te ebilang is menge vahi wey menge vatà .

Ne impemeuntud ni Jesus te avang is menge sumusundan din wey zan mekehuna mekelayun pehendiyà te zehipag dutun te ranew pehendiyà te inged he Bitsayda su ibpemeulì din pa haazà is mezakel he menge etew.
Ne hein nekehipanew en haazà is menge etew, midtekezeg si Jesus diyà te vuvungan su mid-ampù.
Ne hein mezukilem en dutun, haazà is nemen-untud te avang, meziyù dan en su ziyè dan en te lawed dutun te ranew, ne si Jesus, kemulu pa sikandin dutun te vuvungan te sebsevaha zin.

Ne netuenan ni Jesus he utew edlised haazà is menge sumusundan din he ebpemegsey su egkesinuǥung dan is mevendes he keramag. Ne hein meǥaan egkepawà, midtelukun si Jesus kandan is edhipanew ziyà te wahig. Henduen be te edhuna sikandin kandan, iyan,
hein naahà sikandin dutun te menge sumusundan din is edhipanew ziyà te wahig, nekehuyab is gehinawa zan su kunaan dan ke ǥimukud sikandin. Ne nemen-eerang sikandan
su pudu zan is nemekeahà kandin, utew nengehandek. Ne zutun migkaǥi ziyà te kandan si Jesus te, "Sarig kew; kenè kew mahandek su iyan a heini," ke sikandin.
Ne midruran sikandin dutun te avang dan ne mid-engked haazà is keramag. Ne utew zan si Jesus ingkeinuinu.
Su minsan neehè dan haazà is egkein-inuwan he mibeelan ni Jesus dutun te supas wey pait, wazè dan pa mesavut ke hentei sikandin su mezesen is isip dan.
Ne hein nekeuma zan diyà layun dutun te ranew nekezunggù dan diyà te inged he Giniserit.
Ne migaun dan puun dutun te avang ne zutun nekilala si Jesus te menge meǥinged dutun.
Ne migègeenan dan ipemetukew is egkengezeruwan diyà te menge siringan he inged. Ne minsan hendei zan egkezineg he zutun si Jesus, ne ebintingen dan is duen din daru su ed-uwiten dan diyà te kandin.

Ne minsan hendei sikandin ebpevayà, ke ziyè be te menge inged wey menge unayan be, ne zutun gihapun egkeuma zin is egkengezeruwan he ed-uwiten diyà te kandin. Idsavuk dan is egkengezeruwan diyà te lugar he ebelegyaan ne edhengyuan dan si Jesus he minsan bà dà mekeǥawed haazà is egkengezeruwan te minsan sidsid dà te kumbalè din. Ne minsan hentei he nekeǥawed te kumbalà ni Jesus dutun, ne neulian.
Ne sevaha he timpu nemekeuma ziyà te ki Jesus is menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he ebpuun sikandan diyà te Hiruselim.
Neehè dan he is duma zutun te menge sumusundan ni Jesus, edsupaken dan is tuluuwen te menge Perisiyu su ebpemengaan dan he wazè dan mebpenlùlù te menge velad dan.
Su is menge Hudiyu, lavew en is menge Perisiyu, kenè dan egkaan ke kenè dan egkelùluan is menge velad dan su iyan haazà betasan he imbilinbilin te menge ǥin-epuan dan dengan.

Ne emun ebpekeulì dan he ebpuun te mirkadu ne ebpirikan dan edhunai te wahig is lawa zan ne human dan egkaan. Ne mezakel pa is neleyaman dan he tuluuwen iring te kebpenlùlù te menge inumà wey menge kuzen wey menge edtengelan he ǥalang.

Ne tenged kayi haazà is menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan, mid-insaan dan si Jesus te, "Maan is midlipatan en te menge sumusundan nu is imbilinbilin he tuluuwen te ǥin-epuan tew su maan is tekew zan en egkaan ne kenè dan ebpenlùlù?"

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Sikiyu is akal zà is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà, utew hustu is Lalag te Megbevayà he insurat te tipehuna he ebpeneuven he si Esaias. Netagnè kew zin su ke sikandin te, 'Heini is menge etew,' egkaǥi is Megbevayà, 'egkaǥi zan he edtehuzen e zan, iyan, wazà kedtuu he neseled te ǥehinawa zan.
Wazà pulus te kedsimba zan kedì su ibpenurù dan he menge sugù ku is kandan dà he ebpeveelan te menge etew.'
Is kesuǥuan te Megbevayà," ke si Jesus, "midlipatan niw en, ne iyan niw edtumanen is imbilinbilin he vetasan he midhimuhimu zà te menge etew."
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Utew kew metau te paaǥi te ked-engkezi niw te insuǥù te Megbevayà wey niw mepurungi te edtuman is kesuǥuan he mibeelan te etew.

Sikan is Lalag te Megbevayà he insuǥù kenitew zengan ni Moises, edhenduen te, 'Tehuza niw is amey niw wey iney niw.' Ne migkaǥi zin daan dutun he, 'Ke zuen edsulà te amey zin wey iney zin, kinahanglan he edhimetayan.'

Ne iyan keniyu he ibpenurù is: ke zuen etew he zuen din igketavang te iney zin wey amey zin, edtuǥutan niw haazà is etew ke egkaǥi zutun te menge ǥinikanan din te, 'kurban', he ke và dà egkeǥiya, 'Heini is idtavang ku pezem keniyu, kenè ku igkeveǥey su imbuwis ku ziyà te Megbevayà.'
Ne pinaaǥi zutun kenè niw idtuǥut he edtevangan dutun te etew is amey zin wey iney zin.
Ne pinaaǥi kayi te nepengevilin niw he menge vetasan, ed-iniyuǥan niw is Lalag te Megbevayà ne kenà ebpulus diyan te keniyu. Ne mezakel pa is menge ulaula niw he iring kayi."
Ne impeuman ipeuvey ni Jesus is menge etew ziyà te kandin ne ke sikandin te, "Langun te sikiyu, pemineǥa niw heini is menge lalag ku ne sevuta niw he
is egkehimu he igkeepesi te Megbevayà te etew, kenà iyan is keuyaǥan he ebpekeseled diyà te vèbè din, minsan ke wazà sikandin mebpenlùlù, kekenà, iyan is menge lalag he egawas puun diyà te vèbè din.
Is minsan hentei keniyu, sevuta niw heini is menge lalag ku."
Ne hein mid-awà si Jesus dutun te menge etew ne midseled diyà te valey, ne mid-insaan sikandin te menge sumusundan din ke hengkey is kehuluǥan duen te migkaǥi zin.
Ne ke si Jesus te, "Iring kew ves te menge zuma he etew su maan is wazè niw ǥeina mesavut he is egkekaan te etew, ne kenà egkehimu he igkeepesi kandin te Megbevayà

su is egkeenen din, ne ziyè dà ebpekevayà te ǥetek din ne zutun ed-awà diyà te kandin; kenà diyà ebpekevayà te ǥehinawa zin." (Ne pinaaǥi kayi te menge lalag ni Jesus, egketuenan ta he is minsan hengkey he egkekaan, idtuǥut kenitew he egkeenen tew.)

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus med-uman te, "Is egkehimu he igkeepesi te Megbevayà te etew ne iyan is egawas he ebpuun diyà te ǥehinawa zin. Su ziyà te ǥehinawa zin ebpuun is memezaat he isip, is kedhilavet te kenè din esawa, kebpenakew, kebpemumunù, kegkesina, kebpesipala, kebpenlimbung, is memahawag he ulaula, kegkeima, kedèdeeti te zengeg te menge zuma zin, kebpelavew zin wey is kedlalunglalung.
Heini is memezaat he ulaula, diyà ebpuun te ǥehinawa te etew ne iyan igkeepesi kandin te Megbevayà."

Ne mid-awà si Jesus dutun te prubinsya he Geliliya ne midhendiyà te menge inged he uvey te inged he Tiru. Ne te kebpekeuma zin dutun ne mibpemenahik diyà te sevaha he valey. Ne kenè din pezem egkesuatan he metueni te menge etew ke hendei sikandin medateng, iyan, wazà haazà iyan mehitavù is egkesuatan din su segugunà nekeeneb haazà is tudtul te kebpekeuma zin.
Ne zuen dutun sevaha he vahi he zuen din anak he raǥaraǥa he edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne hein nezineg din he nekeuma si Jesus ne midhendutun ne midluhud diyà te etuvangan din.
Ne midhangyù he vewii ni Jesus is anak din he edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne haazà is bahi, ne kenà Hudiyu su tigPinisya ziyà te prubinsya he Sirya. Is kineǥiyan din ne Gerisyahanen.
