Ne migkeǥiyan sikandin ni Jesus te, "Idhuna ibpekaan is menge vatà su kenà meupiya ke egkuwaan ta is egkeenen te menge vatà ne idsamak te menge asu." Ne iyan ibpesavut ni Jesus dutun is: edhunaan din te edtavang is menge Hudiyu, ne human is kenà menge Hudiyu.
Ne migkaǥi haazà is bahi te, "Benar, Datù, heeyan, iyan, is asu, egkehimu zaan he ebpenelisimen din is egkengeulug he mumu puun dutun te egkeenen te vatà."
Ne si Jesus, migkaǥi ziyà te kandin te, "Geina te iyan heeyan lalag nu, ulì ke en su is anak nu, mid-ewaan en sikandin te mezaat he mulin-ulin."
Ne hein nekeuma haazà is bahi ziyà te valey zin, neehè din he edhidhizeǥà haazà is anak din he mid-ewaan en te mezaat he mulin-ulin he edlalung kandin.
Ne zutun te ked-ulì ni Jesus, ne ziyà sikandin mebayà te inged he Tiru wey ziyà te prubinsya he Dikepulis, ne human diyà te ranew he Geliliya.
Ne zuen menge etew he mid-uwit dan diyà te ki Jesus is etew he vengel wey ngulit pa ke egkaǥi. Ne midhangyù dan si Jesus he zempaa zin haazà wey meulii.

Ne zutun mid-aǥak ni Jesus haazà is bengel he ngulit su idsivey zin dutun te menge etew ne intiyuk din is tezù din dutun te telinga te vengel ne midhames din te ileb din is tezù din ne indazas din dutun te zilà te etew.
Ne midlingahà si Jesus diyà te langit ne migeǥehinawa te mezalem ne ke sikandin te, "Ipata!" he ke và dà egkeǥiya, "Mepuwasi!"
Ne zutundutun nepuwasan is kedineg dutun te etew ne naawà is kegkevisekeg te zilè din ne metandang en is kegkaǥi zin.
Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Jesus is menge etew zutun he kenè dan penudtula haazà is neehè dan he mibeelan din, iyan, nasì wazà meeren is tudtul zan mehitenged dutun te neehè dan.
Utew zan haazà ingkeinuinu ne ke sikandan te, "Utew meupiya is kebeeli zin kayi te langun su edhimuwen din minsan is kenà ebpekezineg he mekezineg ne sikan is kenà ebpekekaǥi ne ebpekekaǥi!"

Ne nepipira pa he menge andew zutun nengeamur-amur en maan diyà te ki Jesus is utew mezakel he menge etew. Ne hein neeminan dan en te lutù, mid-umew ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din, ne ke sikandin te,
"Kehizu kayi te menge etew su tetelu en he kezukileman is wazè dan medsuwey kenitew ne wazè dan en egkekaan.
Ne emun ibpeulì ku sikandan te wazè dan mekekaan kela ke luyahi sikandan diyà te zalan, su is duma kandan ne meziyù is ed-ubpaan."
Ne midtavak haazà is menge sumusundan din te, "Meziyù heini te menge valey. Ne wazè tew egkekuwaan te ibpekaan kayi te utew mezakel he menge etew."
Ne ke si Jesus te, "Pira he vuuk is supas niw?" Ne ke sikandan te, "Pitu he vuuk."

Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is menge etew he mebpememinuu zan diyà te tanà, ne migkuwa zin haazà is pitu he vuuk he supas ne mibpeselematan din te Megbevayà, ne zutun mibpenevìtevì din. Ne minsan pa zutun kenà egkeamin haazà is edtevien din . Ne indata zin dutun te menge sumusundan din wey zan ikepemeǥey zutun te menge etew.
Ne zuen daan dutun pira he leǥas he zeisek he pait ne hein nepeselematan din en insuǥù din he ipemeǥey zaan haazà dutun te menge etew.
Ne pudu nengehantey haazà is menge etew he nemekekaan dutun. Ne is nesamà dutun te menge tinevì he supas wey pait, ne pitu he vinevey.
Menge heepat he libu is kezakel zutun te menge etew he nengehantey zutun.
Ne impemeulì ni Jesus sikandan. Ne zutun, si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din, mid-untud dan te avang ne midhendiyè dan te tanà he Delmenuta.

Ne hein nekeuma zan en, midhendiyà te ki Jesus is menge Perisiyu ne mibpekidlewanè dan kandin. Migkeǥiyan dan sikandin he mebpaahà sikandin te singyal he egkein-inuwan he tuus he suǥù sikandin te Megbevayà. Umba migkaǥi zan haazà su egezaman dan sikandin.

Ne haazà, inmesakit te ǥehinawa ni Jesus ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Sikiyu is menge zuma ku he menge Hudiyu, maan is egkinahanglan kew he mekeehè kew te egkein-inuwan he singyal ne human kew edtuu? Benar utew is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he wazà singyal he ibpaahà keniyu."
Ne zutun mid-ewaan eni Jesus haazà is menge etew. Mid-untud dan en maan te avang su edlayun dan dutun te ranew.
Sengevuuk dà he supas is dutun te kandan su nelipat is menge sumusundan din he ed-uwit te supas he egkelutù dan.

Ne zutun duen sempità he impezineg kandan ni Jesus. Ibpesavut din he likayi zan is menge mezaat he vetasan te menge etew. Ke sikandin te, "Andam kew wey niw melikayi is tapey te menge Peresiyu wey is tapey te menge sakup ni Hadì Hirudis."
Wazè dan mesavut he kenà iyan is tapey te supas egkeǥiyen din ne mibpelelelaǥè dan te, "Iyan ingkeǥiya zin kayi su wazè kiw mekeuwit te lutù tew he supas."
Ne netuenan ni Jesus ke hengkey is diyà te isip dan ne ke sikandin te, "Maan is egkesemukan kew te wazè kew mekeuwit te supas? Kenè kew pe bes ebpekesavut? Henduen te wazè niw isip.
Duen niw mata, iyan, henduen be te kenè kew ebpekeahà. Duen niw telinga ne henduen be te kenè kew ebpekezineg. Nengelipatan niw ve sikan is mid-ulaula ku?

Su hein mibpenevìtevì ku sikan is lelima he vuuk he supas he impekaan duen te lelima he libu he menge maama, pira he vinevey is nengepenù niw te nengesamà he menge tinevì he supas?" Ne zutun midtavak dan te, "Sepulù wey zezuwa."

Ne mid-uman med-insà si Jesus te, "Ne hein mibpenevìtevì ku sikan is pitu he vuuk he supas he impekaan duen te heepat he libu he menge etew, pira he vinevey zutun is nengepenù niw te nengesamà he tinevì?" Ne midtavak dan te, "Pitu he vinevey."
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Ne egkesavut niw human buwa he kenà supas is igkeseeng tew."
Ne nekeuma zan diyà te inged he Bitsayda ne zuen menge etew zutun he mid-uwit dan diyà te ki Jesus is sevaha he lakap. Ne midhengyuan dan si Jesus he zempaa zin haazà wey meulii.
Ne mid-aǥak ni Jesus haazà is lakap pehendiyà te ǥawas dutun te inged. Ne mid-ilevan ni Jesus is menge mata zutun te lakap ne midampè din, ne mid-insaan din ke zuen be egkeehè din.
Ne nenlangulangu haazà is lakap ne ke sikandin te, "Egkeehè ku is menge etew he henduen be te menge kayu he ebpenhiphipanew."
Ne zutun mid-umanan dempaa ni Jesus haazà is mata zutun te lakap. Ne zutun mibpurung mebpenlangulangu haazà is lakap ne egkemelmeleǥan din en is menge etew te ed-ahà su mibmeupiye en is mata zin.
Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is etew he medtandang en med-ulì ne kenè en mebpenuluytuluy pa maan minsan dutun te inged.

Ne zutun, midlaus si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din su edhendiyè dan te menge inged he ziyà te uvey te inged he Sisarya Pilipus. Ne zutun te ziyè dan te zalan mid-insaan din is menge sumusundan din te, "Hentei e kun sumalà te ked-isipa kediey te menge etew?"

Ne midtavak dan te, "Duen egkaǥi he iyan ka si Juan Megbebewtismu he nevanhew ne zuen daan egkaǥi he iyan ka sikan is tipehuna he si Elias, ne egkaǥi is duma pa he sevaha ka zuen te menge tipehuna zengan he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà."
Ne zutun mid-insaan din sikandan te, "Ne sikiyu zaan, hentei e man sumalà is ked-isipa niw kediey?" Ne zutun midtavak si Pedro te, "Iyan ka sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì din te menusiyà."
Ne zutun migkeǥiyan sikandan ni Jesus he kenè dan tudtula haazà diyà te minsan hentei.

Ne zutun impesavut ni Jesus te menge sumusundan din is imbanglis kandin. Ke sikandin te, "Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, mezakel is menge kemeresayan he ibpaantus kediey. Edsumpeliten a te menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu wey te menge punuan he memumuhat wey te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Edhimetayan e zan ne seled te tetelu he andew zutun egkevanhew a."
Ne mibpurungan din seysaya is egkeulaula zin. Ne hein nezineg ni Pedro haazà, ne insivey zin si Jesus ne migkeǥiyan din te kenà haazà egkehimu is egkeulaula ni Jesus.

Ne zutun midsineruwan ni Jesus haazà is menge sumusundan din ne migkeǥiyan din si Pedro te, "Sikew is ed-iring ki Setanas, awè ka zini te kediey, su wazà diyà te isip nu is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan diyà te isip nu is egkesuatan te etew!"

Ne zutun impeuvey ni Jesus diyà te kandin is menge etew wey menge sumusundan din. Ne ke sikandin te, "Ke zuen egkesuat he edsundan kedì, kinahanglan he iawè din diyà te isip din is kandin he egkesuatan he menge ulaula, ne tianga zin is krus din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kinahanglan he edtumanen din is menge suǥù ku minsan pa ke iyan ibpatey zin . Ne human ebpekesunud kedì.

Su ke zuen etew he egkenuǥunan din is untung din, ebpatey ǥihapun. Iyan, ke zuen etew he minsan ibpatey zin pa ne edsunud kedì wey edsangyew te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, id-ulì te Megbevayà diyà te kandin is untung din ne kenè en sikandin ebpatey te wazà pidtemanan.
Minsan ke maangken pa te etew is tivuuk he kelibutan, wazà pulus diyà te kandin ke kenà sikandin ebeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Su wazà minsan hengkey he azen he igkeliwè din wey zin maangken is untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Is minsan hentei he igkeeled e zin wey igkeeled din is ibpenurù ku kayi te timpu he mezakel is menge etew he lalung wey edsumpalit te Megbevayà, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, igkeeled ku zaan sikandin keuzemà ke edlikù a he edumahan a te menge velinsuǥuen ku wey edsun-uzan ad te mekeǥeǥehem he anlag te Amey ku he Megbevayà."

Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Tentenuzi niw heini: duen menge zuma tew kayi he kenà ebpatey taman dutun te timpu he ibpaahà te Megbevayà is kedhadì din he utew zekelà is gehem din te kebayàbayà te menusiyà."

Neiwas is heenem dutun he andew, ne miduma ni Jesus ensi Pedro, si Santiago, wey si Juan ne midtekezeg dan te utew metikang he vuvungan he iyan dan dà. Ne zutun te kedtengtengi zan ki Jesus netik-ew mahalin is dagwey zin.
Is kumbalè din ne henduen te ebpenerètà he vulan su utew meputì. Wazà meputì he pinìpian dini te kelibutan he ebpekeiring dutun.
Ne zutun netik-ew zan daan maahà si Elias wey si Moises he ebpekidlalag ki Jesus.
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Pedro ziyà te ki Jesus te, "Utew meupiya te zini key. Ebeelan dey is tetelu he lawig; sevaha is kenikew, sevaha zaan is ki Moises, wey sevaha is ki Elias," ke sikandin.
Utew zan nengehandek umba wazà metentenuzi ni Pedro ke hengkey haazà is nekaǥi zin.
Ne neselikuvungan sikandan te ǥapun ne nezineg dan is midtik-ew megkaǥi he ebpuun dutun te ǥapun te, "Iyan heini sikan is Anak ku he utew ku minahal. Pemineǥa niw is menge lalag din."
Ne zutun mibpenlangulangu haazà is menge sumusundan, iyan, wazè en dutun egkaahà he zuma he etew su iyan dà si Jesus maan duma zan dutun.
Ne zutun te kedtupang dan, mibeleuzan sikandan ni Jesus te, "Taman te kenè e pa ebenhawen is Kakey te Menusiyà, kenè niw penudtula sikan is neulaula he neehè niw ǥeina."
Ne midtuman dan haazà is lalag kandan ni Jesus, iyan, mibpein-inseey zan is tetelu ke hengkey is ibpesavut ni Jesus te kegkaǥi zin he ebenhawen sikandin.
Ne mid-insaan dan si Jesus te, "Maan is egkeǥiyen te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he edhuna edlepew si Elias, sikan is ebpeneuven dengan ne human sikan is edhadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà?"

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Tutuu iyan he edhuna ebpekeuma si Elias su ed-endamen din is langun, iyan, maan is netagnà dengan dutun te ingkesurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, mezakel is memerasey he egkeantus ku ne edsumpeliten a.
Netuman en sikan is kedlepew ni Elias, ne midrasey zan en sikandin sumalà is egkesuatan dan he ed-ul-ulahan diyà te kandin su iyan heini tagnà he egkevasa ta ziyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà."
Ne hein neumahan eni Jesus sikan is duma he menge sumusundan din, neehè dan he edlingutan te mezakel he menge etew ne ebpekidlewanà kandan is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan.
Ne hein naahà te menge etew he ebpelingguma si Jesus, utew zan nengeinuinu su wazè dan peebuta haazà is kebpekeuma ni Jesus, ne zutun migaanggaan dan medsinuǥung diyà te kandin.
Ne nenginginsà si Jesus dutun te menge sumusundan din te, "Hengkey is egkelewenaan niw?"
Ne midtavak is sevaha zutun te menge mezakel he etew te, "Is anak ku he maama, ne kenà ebpekekaǥi su edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne mid-uwit ku zini su wey mevewii.

Kada kedresaya kandin te mezaat he mulin-ulin ne ebpekelagkut diyà te tanà ne eburvuraan is bèbè din ne ebpekekeǥetket te menge ngipen din ne egkevidbid sikandin. Ne midhangyù ku is menge sumusundan nu he vewii zan, iyan, kenè dan egkehimu."

Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, wazè niw iyan kedtuu te Megbevayà. Utew ves egkeuǥet is kebpekiduma ku keniyu. Utew ves egkeuǥet is kebpekeantus ku keniyu ne human kew edtuu. Ihengkayi niw heeyan is batà."

Ne zutun, mid-uwit dan diyà te ki Jesus haazà is batà. Ne sikan is mezaat he mulin-ulin, hein neehè din dutun si Jesus, midhimu zin he mevidbid haazà is batà ne nekelagkut diyà te tanà ne nelilidlilid ne miburàburà is bèbè din.
Ne zutun mid-insaan ni Jesus is amey zutun te vatà te, "Sengemenu en keluǥayad is kegezama zin keniyan?" Ne midtavak haazà is amey zutun te vatà te, "Puun pa te zeisey pa sikandin he vatà.

Su is mezaat he mulin-ulin, layun din edhimuwa he mekeagbur ziyà te hapuy wey ziyà te wahig su edhimetayan din. Ne emun duen egkehimu nu, ne ikehizu key kenikew ne iawè nu ziyà te kandin heeyan is egezamen din."
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Maan is id-insè nu ke zuen egkehimu ku? Ibeǥey te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey he ebuyuen te etew he zuen din kedtuu te Megbevayà."
Ne zutun, midhabet megkaǥi haazà is amey zutun te vatà te, "Edtuu a, iyan, deisek pa; heǥeta nu pa is kedtuu ku!"

Ne naahà ni Jesus he ed-iseg ebmezakel is menge etew zutun, su zuen mezakel he ebpemelelaǥuy pehendutun, ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin te, "Sikew is mezaat he mulin-ulin he igkevengel wey igkeemew te menge etew, awè ka keniyan te edlelungen nu he vatà. Ne kenè ke en medlikù diyà te kandin!"

Ne zutun, haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin, impekulahì din haazà is batà ne midhimu zin he mevidvid ne mid-awè en diyà te kandin. Ne haazà is batà, ne henduen be te minatey su kenè en edwaleng, ne egkaǥi is menge etew zutun te, "Minatey en."
Iyan, migewezan sikandin ni Jesus diyà te velad ne impeenew zin ne zutun midhitindeg haazà is batà.

Ne hein nekeulì ensi Jesus diyà te valey he midetengan dan ne wazà dutun duma he etew, kekenà, iyan dan dà, ne mid-insaan sikandin te menge sumusundan din te, "Maan is wazè dey meulii sikan is batà he edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin?"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Is iring duen he mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne kenà igkepaawà ke kenà pinaaǥi zà te ked-ampù su wazà duma he paaǥi."
Ne zutun mid-awè dan dutun ne midlaus dan ne ziyè dan mebayà te prubinsya he Geliliya. Ne kenà egkesuat si Jesus he metueni te menge etew ke hendei sikandin

su wey kenà sikandin mesemuki is ebpenurù te menge sumusundan din. Ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, duen timpu he ibpalad a ziyà te menge kuntada ku ne edhimetayan e zan, iyan, seled te tetelu he andew zutun egkevanhew a."
Ne haazà is migkaǥi ni Jesus, wazà mesavut dutun te menge sumusundan din, ne egkehandek dan daan he ed-insà kandin ke hengkey is ibpesavut din dutun.
Ne nekeuma ensi Jesus diyà te inged he Kepirnaum ne hein diyè dan en te valey, mid-insaan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din te, "Hengkey sikan is egkelewenaan niw ǥeina ziyà te zalan?"
Iyan, wazè dan medtavak su egkeeled dan su iyan egkelewenaan dan ke hentei is lavew kandan te menge sumusundan.

Ne zutun mibpinuu si Jesus ne impeuvey zin haazà is sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan din ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Is minsan hentei keniyu he egkesuat he mekelavew, kinahanglan he isipa zin he utew minus is pid-etawan din ne ebpevayàbayà sikandin te langun he menge zuma zin."
Ne zutun migkuwa ni Jesus is batà ne impeteliwazè din dutun te menge sumusundan din. Ne zutun midsepipi zin haazà is batà.

Ne migkeǥiyan din sikandan te, "Is etew he tenged te kedtuu zin kedì, edewaten din ne ebpurungan din is minsan hentei he vatà he iring kayi, ne nezawat e zin en daan. Ne is minsan hentei he edawat kediey, nezawat din en daan is Amey ku he Megbevayà he midsuǥù kedi."

Ne migkaǥi si Juan diyà te ki Jesus te, "Duen etew he neuma zey he ebewian din is menge etew he edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne egemiten din is ngazan nu zutun te kebpemawì din. Ne midawey zey su kenà ebpekiduma kenitew."

Ne ke si Jesus te, "Kenè niw zewaya is ed-ulaula te iring dutun su ke zuen etew he egkehimu zin is egkein-inuwan he vaal pinaaǥi te kegemita zin te ngazan ku, kenà sikandin leledayà egkehimu he kuntada ku.
Su is etew he kenè tew kuntada, ne edtavang kenitew.

Utew venar is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke zuen etew he ebeǥayan kew zin te minsan sengetasa zà he wahig ne iyan din ibeǥayi keniyu is tenged te sumusundan ku sikiyu te mibpilì te Megbevayà, kenà egkehimu he kenà sikandin edsuhulan te Megbevayà tenged dutun te mid-ulaula zin.

Iyan, ke zuen minsan hentei he pinaaǥi kandin egkeawà is kedsarig kediey te minsan sevaha kayi te menge vatà he edtuu kediey, meupiya pa zutun he etew ke inhiket diyà te lieg din is zekelà he ǥelingan he vatu ne in-agbur sikandin diyà te lawed te zaǥat, kenà is silut kandin ke pinaaǥi kandin egkeawà is kedsarig te minsan sevaha kayi te menge vatà .

Emun iyan igkeawà te kedsarig nu kedì is belad nu, tempaza nu heini wey itimbag su meupiya pa ke pungkul ka is ebeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan kenà te zezuwa is belad nu ne idtimbag ka ziyà te Impirnu he zutun kenà egkeevukan is hapuy.
Is menge tagkey zutun, ne wazè dan kemetayen ne kenà egkeevukan is hapuy.

Ne emun iyan igkeawà te kedsarig nu kedì is paa nu, tempaza nu wey itimbag su meupiya pa ke pungkul ka is ebeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan kenà te zezuwa is paa nu ne idtimbag ka ziyà te Impirnu.
Is menge tagkey zutun, ne wazè dan kemetayen ne kenà egkeevukan is hapuy.
Ne emun iyan igkeawà te kedsarig nu kedì is mata nu, luǥita nu wey itimbag su meupiya pa ke sevaha zà is mata nu ke edhedian ka te Megbevayà kenà te zezuwa is mata nu ne idtimbag ka ziyà te Impirnu.
Is menge tagkey zutun, wazè dan kemetayen ne kenà egkeevukan is hapuy.
Umba egkeǥiyen ku heini su is langun, edtimusan te hapuy.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su meupiya is timus su ibmetaam te egkeenen, iyan, ke egkeawà duen te timus is taam din, wazè en paaǥi he ebpekelikù pa ebpekeuman is taam din. Ne iring din ded daan kinahanglan he iring te timus is menge ulaula niw wey kew mehimu he ibmeupiya te menge etew ne kinahanglan he mebmelinawen is kedepitè niw te kada sevaha keniyu."

Ne mid-awà si Jesus dutun te inged he Kepirnaum ne midhendiyà te prubinsya he Hudiya. Ne zutun midrapas sikandin te wahig he Hurdan. Ne utew en maan mezakel is menge etew he nengeamur-amur ziyà te kandin. Ne ǥeina te iyan layun ed-ul-ulahan din is kebpenurù, ne mibpenurù din daan haazà is menge etew.
Ne zutun, duen menge Perisiyu he mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus su ebpengahaan dan is paaǥi te kedsumbunga kandin. Ke sikandan te, "Idtuǥut be te kesuǥuan is ked-engkezi ta te esawa ta?"
Ne insà daan is intavak ni Jesus dutun, ke sikandin te, "Hengkey man is insuǥù kenitew ni Moises he egkevasa ta zuen te kesuǥuan mehitenged te kebpekidsuwey?"
Ne midtavak dan te, "Intuǥut ni Moises diyà te maama he suwayi zin is esawa zin, asal kinahanglan he ebeǥayan dutun te maama is esawa zin te kemetuuzan he midsuwayan din."
Ne ke si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Umba intuǥut ni Moises is kedsuwayi niw te esawa niw su ǥeina te edsumpeliten niw is penurù,
iyan, is Megbevayà, dutun te kedlimbaǥa zin te menusiyà, mibeelan din is maama wey vahi.
Umba ed-ewaan te maama is amey zin wey iney zin su ebpekidsevaha te esawa zin.
Ne sikandan is teleesawa, kuwinta kenè en maan dezuwa he etew, kekenà, nesevehe en sikandan.
Ne zutun haazà is dezuwa he etew he midsevaha te Megbevayà, kenè en egkehimu he ebpekedsuwey," ke si Jesus.
Ne is menge sumusundan ni Jesus, hein diyè dan en maan te valey he midetengan dan, in-uman dan iinsà kandin is kebpekidsuwey te esawa.
Ne ke si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Ke zuen maama he ebpengesawa te sengevevahi su mid-engkezan din is esawa zin, ebpekesalà sikandin dutun te mid-engkezan din he esawa.
Ne is bahi zaan, ke ebpekidsuwey te esawa zin ne ebpeesawa te sengememaame en, ebpekesalà sikandin dutun te midsuwayan din he esawa zin."
Ne zutun, duen menge etew he ebpen-uwit diyà te ki Jesus te menge zezeisey he vatà su ebpezepenetan dan te palad ni Jesus, iyan, midawey haazà te menge sumusundan din.

Ne hein netuenan ni Jesus haazà is mid-ulaula te menge sumusundan din, wazè din ikesuat, ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Ipehendini niw te kediey heeyan is menge vatà ne kenè niw zewaya su is etew he zuen din kedsarig he iring te kedsarig te vatà ne iyan ebpekepahadì te Megbevayà.
Benar is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke zuen etew he kenà iring is kedsarig din te Megbevayà te kedsarig te zeisey he vatà, ne kenà egkehedian haazà is etew te Megbevayà."
Ne zutun midsekepu zin haazà is menge vatà ne mibpendepenetan din te palad din is menge purù dan ne midtuvazan din sikandan.

Ne zutun te edlaus en edhipanew ensi Jesus, nekesaut kandan is sevaha he maama ne midluhud haazà diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus. Ne ke sikandin te, "He Menunudlù, utew meupiya is menge ulaula nu. Hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan ku wey a meveǥayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan?"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Maan is egkaǥi ka he meupiya is ulaula ku te sebsevaha zà is meupiya is menge ulaula zin ne iyan is Megbevayà.

Netuenan nu en sikan is menge suǥù te Megbevayà he imbilinbilin kenitew he iyan is: kenè ka mebunù; kenè nu selselai is esawa nu; kenè ka mebpenakew; kenè ka medtarùtarù diyà te hukmanan; kenè ka medlimbung; ne tehuza nu is amey nu wey iney nu."
Ne midtavak haazà is maama ziyà te ki Jesus te, "Menunudlù, is langun keniyan, mibenteyanan ku ne wazè ku mesupak puun pa te vatè e pa."

Ne si Jesus, midtengtengan din haazà is etew su ingkehizu zin ne ke sikandin te, "Duen nu pa kurang; iyan is: ulì ka ne ivelegyè nu is langun he azen nu, ne is halin, ipemeǥey nu ziyà te egkengeayuayu ne edsepian ka ziyà te langit. Ne ke egkeipus nu heeyan, likù ka zini wey ka mekesundan kediey."
Ne hein nezineg dutun te etew haazà is migkaǥi ni Jesus, ne utew mibmesakit is gehinawa zin ne mid-awà dutun is utew neseeng su zekelà is ketiǥeyunan din.

Ne zutun mibpenlangulangu si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Utew mereǥen te sepian he etew is kebpesakup din te Megbevayà wey mehedii sikandin te Megbevayà," ke sikandin.

Ne is menge sumusundan din, hein nezineg dan haazà is migkaǥi ni Jesus, utew zan ingkeinuinu. Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Utew mereǥen te etew is kebpesakup din te Megbevayà wey sikandin mehedii.
Kenè din egkehimu su melemu pa te langgam he kemilyu is kedseled din diyà te vudsi te raǥum kenà te sepian he etew te kebpesakup din te Megbevayà wey sikandin mehedii."

Ne hein nezineg haazà te menge sumusundan din, mid-iseg is kegkeinuinu zan. Ne ke sikandan te, "Emun kenà egkehimu te sepian, ne kenè bes egkehimu te minsan hentei is ked-angken te untung he wazà pidtemanan."
Ne zutun midtengtengan sikandan ni Jesus te egkaǥi te, "Kenà iyan egkehimu te etew, iyan, egkehimu mulà te Megbevayà he ibpaangken din is etew te untung he wazà pidtemanan su egkehimu zin is langun."
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Pedro te, "Ahaa nu man, mid-ewaan dey en is langun he menge azen dey wey key mekesunud kenikew."

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Kenè niw lipati he is minsan hentei he mid-ewaan din is baley zin, is menge suled din he vahi wey maama, is iney zin wey amey zin, anak din, wey menge tanè din su edsunud sikandin kediey wey idsangyew zin is Meupiya he Tudtulanen,

haazà he etew, egkezawat din is kenenggatus edtekepa haazà is mid-ewaan din he menge valey, menge suled din he maama wey vahi, iney zin, menge anak din, wey menge tanà ne liyu zutun ibeǥey kandin keuzemà is untung he wazà pidtemanan. Asal te zini pa sikandin te kelibutan, egkeseǥazan din is memereǥen he pesipala kandin.

Mezakel is menge etew ǥuntaan he henduen be te zekelà is pid-etawan dan, iyan, utew minus is pid-etawan dan keuzemà. Ne mezakel zaan is etew ǥuntaan he utew minus is pid-etawan dan, iyan, keuzemà, dekelà is pid-etawan dan," ke sikandin.

Si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din, hein diyè dan en te zalan pehendiyà te inged he Hiruselim, midhunahuna si Jesus. Is menge sumusundan din, ne nengeinuinu ne nesemukan is gehinawa zan su maan is edhendiyà si Jesus te Hiruselim. Ne zuen daan menge etew he edtinundug ne nengehandek sikandan. Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Jesus is sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din he medtapid dan ne impesavut din dutun ke hengkey is egkehitavù kandin.

Ke sikandin te, "Netuenan niw he edhendiyè kiw te Hiruselim ne emun ebpekeuma kiw zutun, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ibpalad a ziyà te menge punuan he menge memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Ne egkeuyun dan he ebpehimetayan a ne ibpalad e zan daan diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu.
Ne is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, ed-iringen e zan te velvelayen; ebpengilevan e zan, ne ebuǥelen e zan ne edhimetayan e zan ne seled te iketelu he andew zutun ebenhawen a te Megbevayà."
Ne zutun mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus is dezuwa he anak ni Sibidiyu he si Santiago wey si Juan, ne ke sikandan te, "He Menunudlù, duen dey idhangyù diyà te kenikew."
Ne ke si Jesus te, "Hengkey is egkesuatan niw?"
Ne ke sikandan te, "Iyan edhengyuen dey he keuzemà ke ebpinuu ke en diyà te pinuuwè nu te kedhadì, ipepinuu key zaan, is sevaha ziyà te egkekewanan nu ne is sevaha ziyà te egkeǥivang nu."
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Wazè niw mesavut ke hengkey is edhengyuen niw. Egkeantus niw ve is merasey he ibpaantus kedì? Ne egketigker niw ve is kemereǥenan he ibpetigker kediey?"
Ne midtavak dan te, "Uya egkeantus dey." Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Benar iyan he ibpaantus keniyu is iring te merasey wey is kemereǥenan he ibpaantus daan kediey,
iyan, kenà a iyan ebpilì ke hentei is ibpepinuu ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan ku wey ziyà te zapit te egkeǥivang ku su iyan dà ebpekepinuu zutun is etew he midteǥenahan te Amey ku he Megbevayà."
Ne hein nezineg haazà dutun te sepulù he zuma zan he sumusundan, wazè dan ikesuat haazà is midhimu eni Santiago wey ni Juan.
Ne tenged dutun mid-umew ni Jesus sikandan langun ne ke sikandin te, "Netuenan ta he is menge punuan te menge inged, ne utew memevurut. Edatùdatù dà sikandan is layun ebmandar te menge etew.
Iyan, sikiyu mulà, kenà egkehimu is iring kayi zini te keniyu. Ke zuen sevaha keniyu he egkesuat he mekelavew, kinahanglan he suluǥuen sikandin te langun he menge zuma zin.
Ne emun duen sevaha keniyu he egkesuat he iyan sikandin metikang te langun keniyu, kinahanglan he mebpekevavà sikandin te langun keniyu.

Su siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, kenè ku iyan inhendini te kelibutan is wey a metevangi te menusiyà, kekenà, wey a meketavang te menusiyà ne wey a zaan mebpehimatey su wey ku mevelukasi is mezakel he menge etew."

Ne nekeuma zan diyà te inged he Hiriku, ne hein ed-awà ensi Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din dutun, utew mezakel is menge etew he nemenduma kandin. Ne zuen lakap dutun he mekelilimus he egngezanan ki Bertimeo he anak ni Timiyu. Ne ebpimpinuu haazà is mekelilimus dutun te kilid te zalan.
Ne hein nezineg din he iyan ensi Jesus he tigNeserit haazà is edsaǥad, ne mibpekezaǥing sikandin is ed-umew te, "He Jesus he kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David, kehizuwi a kenikew!"
Ne midawey haazà is lakap te mezakel he menge etew zutun te, "Engked ka!" Iyan, nasì en ebpekezaǥing sikandin he egkaǥi te, "He kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David, kehizuwi a kenikew!"

Ne zutun te kegkezineǥa ni Jesus kayi te ebpengumew, midteren sikandin ne migkaǥi te, "Ipehendini niw heeyan is etew." Ne zutun migkeǥiyan te menge etew haazà is lakap te, "Na, hitindeg kad su ibpehendiyè ke zin."
Ne zutun midhitindeg sikandin ne midluwas din is divavew he kumbalè din ne midhendiyà te ki Jesus.
Ne mid-insaan sikandin ni Jesus te, "Hengkey is egkesuatan nu he ebeelan ku?" Ne midtavak haazà is lakap te, "Iyan egkesuatan ku is mekeahà is menge mata ku."
Ne ke si Jesus te, "Is kedsarig nu kediey, iyan igkeulii te menge mata nu. Genat kad." Ne segugunà nekeahà haazà is menge mata zutun te lakap ne miduma sikandin ki Jesus dutun te hipenawan din.

Ne hein uvey zan en diyà te inged he Hiruselim su ebpekeuma zan en diyà te inged he Bitpagi wey inged he Bitanya he ziyà te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan, midsuǥù ni Jesus is dezuwa te menge sumusundan din.
Ke sikandin te, "Hendutun kew te inged he egkeumahan tew ne emun ebpekeuma kew zutun, ne egkeehè niw is intagkes he asnu he nati he wazè pa meuntuzi; hekazi niw ne uwita niw zini.
Ne ke zuen ed-insà keniyu ke maan is egkuwaan niw haazà is asnu, keǥiyi niw te, 'Egkinehenglanen heini te egalen tew he si Jesus ne id-ulì dà kan.'"
Ne zutun migenat haazà is dezuwa, ne neehè dan haazà is nati he asnu ziyà te kilid te zalan su intagkes diyà te uvey te ǥemawan te sevaha he valey.
Ne hein edhekazan dan en, duen menge etew zutun he mid-insà kandan te, "Ebmenuwen niw heeyan? Maan is edhekazan niw?"
Ne haazà is dezuwa, midtudtul zan is impekaǥi kandan ni Jesus ne midtuǥutan sikandan dutun te menge etew.
Ne mid-uwit dan haazà is nati ziyà te ki Jesus ne mibelhenan dan te kumbalè dan ne mid-untud si Jesus.

Ne zutun, is mezakel he menge etew, tenged te zekelà is kedtahud dan ki Jesus, impendempas dan is impenamput dan diyà te ibayà ni Jesus, ne is duma, impendempas dan daan dutun is menge zehunen he rasang he mibpemadtì dan diyà te menge keyuwen.

Mezakel he menge etew is midhuna ki Jesus ne mezakel zaan is ebpemeninundug kandin he ebpemengulahì he nengelipey he egkaǥi te, "Ebpeselematan tew is Megbevayà! Deliǥa is nekeuma he midsuǥù te Nengazen!
Deliǥa is ebpekeuma he hadì he iyan kes ed-ilis duen te hadì he kepuun tew he si David! Deliǥa is Nengazen!"

Ne hein nekeume en ensi Jesus diyà te Hiruselim midseled sikandin diyà te lavew he simbahan te menge Hudiyu he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà. Ne hein neehè din is langun dutun te seled te simbahan, mid-awà sikandin dutun. Ne ǥeina te mahapun en midhendiyà te inged he Bitanya zuma is menge sumusundan din.
Ne nepawà dutun te ziyè en ensi Jesus te zalan su edlikù dan diyà te Hiruselim he ebpuun te Bitanya, nevitil sikandin.

Ne nepantew zin dutun is kayu he zehunen he egngezanan te igira. Ne midhendutun si Jesus su ed-ahaan din ke zuen beǥas dutun. Iyan, hein dutun en, neehè din he wazà beǥas, kekenà, tekew he menge zahun, su haazà, kenè pa timpu te hustu he kebpemeǥas.
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Puun guntaan, kenè ke en egkekeenan te veǥas nu." Nezineg haazà is lalag din dutun te menge sumusundan din.

Ne zutun te nekeuma si Jesus diyà te Hiruselim, ne midseled en maan sikandin diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà. Ne mibpenegseg din is menge limbungan he etew zutun he ebpemelegyà wey ebpememasa. Mibpemiley zin is menge lemisahan dutun te ebpemenliwà te menge selapì wey is menge pinuuwà te ebpemelegyà te ibpemuhat he merepatik.
Ne wazè din ituǥut te minsan hentei he ed-uwiten dan is menge ǥelemiten dan he zutun ebayà te lama te simbahan.

Ne mibpenurù din is menge etew zutun, ke sikandin te, "Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Is baley ku, ne egngezanan he valey he elempuanan te langun he menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei he ginhedian.' Ne sikiyù," ke si Jesus, "nasì niw veeli he ubpeey te ebpemenlimbung."

Ne nezineg haazà te menge punuan he memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan is mibeelan ni Jesus. Nengehandek dan ki Jesus su utew nengesuat is mezakel he menge etew te kebpenurù din. Ne tenged kayi ebpen-ahaan te menge punuan is paaǥi he metuǥuti sikandan he igkepehimetayan dan si Jesus.
Ne zutun te midsanlep en is andew, mid-awà ensi Jesus dutun te inged.
Ne hein nepawà, midlikù dan dutun te inged ne ziyà te ibayè dan neehè dan kes kayu he igira he nepurung en meǥangu, minsan is dalid din.
Ne netenuzan haazà ni Pedro ne ke sikandin diyà te ki Jesus te, "Ahaa nu man! Neǥangu heeyan is kayu he igira he midrewakan nu."
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, "Sarig kew te Megbevayà.

Benar is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he minsan hentei he egkeǥiyan din heeyan is buvungan te, 'Awè ka keniyan ne umpak ka ziyà te zaǥat,' ne kenà sikandin eduwazuwa, kekenà, neheǥet diyà te ǥehinawa zin he egketuman is migkaǥi zin, ne haazà is migkaǥi zin ne egketuman.
Umba, egkeǥiyan ku sikiyu he minsan hengkey is ebuyuen niw ziyà te Megbevayà, heǥeta niw ziyà te ǥehinawa niw he kenè en ebperis, ne egkezawat niw haazà is ebuyuen niw.

Ne emun ed-ampù kew ziyà te Megbevayà, ke zuen egkepeukan niw he minsan hentei, peseyluwa niw, ne is Amey niw he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit, ebpeseyluwen kew zin daan te menge kebpekesupak niw kandin.
Su emun kenè kew ebpesaylu te zuma niw, is Amey niw he ziyà te langit, kenè kew zin daan ebpeseyluwen te menge kebpekesupak niw."

Ne nekeuma zan en maan diyà te Hiruselim ne si Jesus, diyà edriǥuriǥu te seled te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà. Ne midhendiyà te kandin is menge punuan he memumuhat, wey is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan, wey is menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu.
Ne mid-insè dan ki Jesus te, "Heini is langun he ed-ul-ulahan nu zini te simbahan, duen nu ve ketenged te ked-ulaula kayi, wey hentei is mibeǥey kenikew te ketenged wey nu meulaula?"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Duen daan id-insè ku keniyu ne emun egketavak a keniyu, edtevaken ku zaan sikiyu ke hengkey is ketenged ku te ked-ulaula ku kayi te langun.
Hentei is mibeǥey ki Juan Megbebewtismu te ketenged din te kebpemewtismu? Megbevayè be wey ke etew zà? Tevaka a."
Ne zutun mibpein-inseey sikandan is egkaǥi te, "Emun egkeǥiyen tew he Megbevayà, ne ed-insà sikandin ke maan is wazè tew tuuwi si Juan.

Ne emun egkaǥi kiw he etew zà, ne egkepeukan kiw te menge etew." (Umba migkaǥi zan heini su nahandek dan te menge etew su midtuu is langun he menge etew he ebpeneuven si Juan Megbebewtismu te Megbevayà.)
Umba, iyan tavak dan dutun ki Jesus is: "Hanew ta." Ne ke si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Kenè ku zaan egkeǥiyen keniyu ke hengkey is ketenged ku te kebaal kayi te langun."

Ne impenurù en maan ni Jesus is menge sempità. Ke sikandin te, "Duen etew he zuen din tanà he mibpemulaan din te ǥawed he paras. Mid-alad din haazà, ne mibudsiyan din te meluag is dekelà he vatu su ebeelan din he keresà te wahig dutun te veǥas te paras. Ne midlelawig te ed-ubpaan te ebantey zutun te perasan. Ne mibpeelimahan din haazà is perasan ne zutun midhendiyà te sengeǥinhedian.
Ne hein neume en is tiraǥun dutun, midsuǥù din is sevaha he suluǥuen din he ibpekuwa te kandin he vahin dutun te neraǥun.
Iyan, hein nekeuma haazà is suluǥuen din, migewezan dutun te impemeelima zin ne mibuǥel zan ne impeulì dan sikandin he wazà uwiten.
Ne haazà is teǥiǥaked te perasan, midsuǥù en maan te sevaha pa he suluǥuen din, iyan, haazà is suluǥuen, mibpelian dan diyà te ulu ne mid-eled-eled dan.

Ne haazà is teǥiǥaked, midsuǥù din pa zutun is selakew pa he suluǥuen din, ne haazà is suluǥuen, midhimetayan dan. Mezakel pa zutun is sunudsunud he midsuǥù din, ne is duma zutun, mibpemuǥel zan, ne is duma, midhimetayan dan.
Ne te ketepusan dutun, iyan dà nesamà sikan is minahal zin he anak. Ne haazà midsuǥù din diyà te kandan su egkeisip din is: 'Kenà egkehimu he kenè dan edtehuzen is anak ku,' ke sikandin.
Iyan, hein nekeuma haazà is anak dutun te teǥiǥaked, migkaǥi haazà is impemeelima te, 'Na! Iyan heini anak din; kuwa kew en su edhimetayan tew wey tew maangken heini is perasan din!'
Ne zutun migewezan dan sikandin ne midhimetayan dan ne intimbag dan diyà te ǥawas te perasan."

Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Ne ǥeina te iyan haazà mid-ulaula zutun te impemeelima te perasan, hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan kandan dutun te teǥiǥaked? Ebeyaan din haazà is menge etew ne ebpenhimetayan din ne ebpeelimahan din haazà is perasan din te selakew en maan he menge etew."

Ne ke si Jesus en maan te, "Siguradu nevasa niw en sikan is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Sikan is batu he himan te valey he vatu, mid-engkezan te menge pandey su kunaan dan ke wazè din pulus. Ne heini, nehimu en guntaan he vatu he iyan dàebpekepurung te valey.
Ulaula heini te Nengazen ne igkeinuinu tew utew.'"

Ne zutun, haazà is menge punuan te menge Hudiyu, nesavut dan he iyan sikandan ebpesumbingayan ni Jesus dutun te sempità he migkaǥi zin, ne ed-isipen dan en pezem edekepa si Jesus, iyan, wazè dan mehimu haazà is ed-isipen dan su nahandek dan te mezakel he menge etew. Ne zutun nepesagdan dan si Jesus ne mid-ewaan dan.
Ne midsuǥù dan is duma zutun te menge Perisiyu wey te menge sakup te upakat he midtukud ni Hirudis su wey zan mepulutikahi si Jesus he meveeli zan te sumbung.

Ne hein nekeuma haazà is menge suǥù, migkaǥi zan diyà te ki Jesus te, "Menunudlù, netuenan dey he metazeng ka he etew. Is lalag te menge etew, kenà ebpekehalin te ibpenurù nu tenged te wazè nu ibpelavi he minsan hentei, kekenà, tutuu is ibpenurù nu he ibpeveelan kenitew te Megbevayà. Umba, keǥiyi key kenikew, ebpekesupak ki ve te kesuǥuan tew ke ebayad ki te vuhis diyà te hadì tew he ziyà te inged he Ruma?"

Ne netuenan ni Jesus he akal haazà is netaǥù diyà te ǥehinawa zan, ne ke sikandin te, "Maan is egezaman a keniyu? Ipeehè niw kediey ke memenumenu is selapì he ibayad niw te vuhis diyà te hadì he ziyà te Ruma."
Ne impeehè dan dutun ki Jesus is sengeelad he selapì. Ne ke si Jesus te, "Hentei ki zagwey wey ngazan heini is nekesurat kayi?" Ne midtavak dan te, "Ngazan wey zagwey te hadì diyà te Ruma."
Ne ke si Jesus te, "Ne emun kandin ne iyan egkesuatan din, iveǥey niw ziyà te kandin, ne iveǥey niw zaan diyà te Megbevayà is kandin he azen." Ne utew zan ingkeinuinu haazà is migkaǥi ni Jesus.
Ne zuen daan menge Sedusiyu he midhendiyà te ki Jesus. Ne is menge Sedusiyu, iyan kes menge Hudiyu he edtuu he kenà egkengevanhew keuzemà is minsan hentei.

Ne migkaǥi zan diyà te ki Jesus te, "Menunudlù, impenurù dengan ni Moises he penenglitan, ke zuen maama he zuen din esawa ne ebpatey haazà is maama ne wazà mevuwad, kinahanglan he ebpemeluwen te suled dutun te maama haazà is ipag din su wey mevuwad haazà is minatey pinaaǥi zutun te suled din.
Ne zengan duen pitu he menge maama he teltelehazi. Mibpengesawa sikan is kakey, iyan, minatey he wazà med-anak.
Ne mibpemalu zutun te ikezuwa haazà is ipag dan ne minatey zaan ne wazà mevuwad. Ne iring din ded haazà is iketelu.
Ne henduen dà duen su naamin haazà is pitu ikevalu zutun te vahi ne wazà mevuwad. Ne te huziyan dutun, minatey zaan haazà is bahi.
Ne keuzemà te kegkevanhew te menge etew, hentei is hustu he esawa zutun te vahi? Su haazà is pitu he teltelehazi, pudu zan man nemekeesawa zutun te vahi."

Ne zutun, midtavak ni Jesus sikandan te, "Umba ves nengesayep kew su wazè niw mesavut sikan is ingkesurat he Lalag te Megbevayà, ne wazè niw zaan mesavut he mekeǥeǥehem sikandin te kebpemanhew te menge minatey.

Su zutun te kegkevanhew te etew he nemematey, wazè en ebpengesawa he maama ne wazè en daan bahi he ebpeesawa su egkengeiring en pudu is menge etew te velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà diyà te langit ne kenè dan ebpees-eseweey.

Ne mehitenged te menge minatey he ebenhawen, wazè niw ve mevasa ziyà te libru he insurat dengan ni Moises kes egkeregreg he sagbet he zutun mibpaahà kandin is Megbevayà? Su minsan te minatey en dutun si Abraham wey si Isaak wey si Hakub, migkaǥi is Megbevayà diyà te ki Moises te, 'Iyan a Megbevayà he ed-ezapen ni Abraham wey ni Isaak wey ni Hakub,'
he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kemulu zan pa ed-azap te Megbevayà, su is ed-azap kandin minsan ke ebpatey, duen din pa untung. Umba utew kew nengesayep."

Ne zuen dutun sevaha he menunudlù te kesuǥuan he nezineg din is kebpekidlewanè dan ki Jesus ne hein nesavut din he utew tutuu is menge tavak ni Jesus kandan, mid-insà sikandin te, "He Menunudlù, hendei zapit is edhuna zuen te langun he kesuǥuan?"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Iyan heini is edhuna: 'Pemineg kew, sikiyu is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil. Is Megbevayà tew he Nengazen te langun, sebsevaha zà sikandin he Megbevayà.
Kinahanglan he iyan nu sikandin mahala ziyà te ǥehinawa nu is Megbevayà he Nengazen tew. Iyan nu sikandin mahala ziyà te ǥehinawa nu, isip nu, kedsavut nu wey tivuuk he ulaula nu.'
Ne is ikezuwa, iyan heini: 'Kinahanglan he mahala nu is duma nu; isipa nu sikandin he iring te kenikew en he ǥehinawa.' Wazè en insuǥù kenitew he ebpekelavew kayi te zezuwa."
Ne zutun migkaǥi haazà is menunudlù te kesuǥuan diyà te ki Jesus te, "Tutuu iyan. Nevenaran a keniyan te egkeǥiyen nu he sebsevaha zà is Megbevayà ne wazè en duma pa he Megbevayà.

Ne is kebmahala ta te Megbevayà he Nengazen diyà te ǥehinawa ta, diyà te isip ta, diyà te kedsavut ta wey ziyà te tivuuk he ulaula ta, wey is kebmahala ta te zuma ta he iring en sikandin te keugelingen ta he ǥehinawa, ne lavew pa heini kenà te langun he menge pemuhat he edtutungen wey menge halad."

Ne nesavut ni Jesus he utew hustu haazà is migkaǥi zutun te menunudlù ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Benar heeyan; meseyun ka ebpekepahadì te Megbevayà." Ne zutun wazè en maan nekeaku pa he egezam ki Jesus pinaaǥi te minsan hengkey he insè.

Ne te ebpenurù si Jesus te menge etew ziyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, mid-insà sikandin te, "Maan is egkehimu he ibpenurù te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he is ebpeebuten he hadì, kevuwazan dà ni Hadì David?

Umba id-insè ku heini su mid-ulinan si Hadì David te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne migkaǥi, ke sikandin te, 'Migkaǥi is Megbevayà diyà te Nengazen ku te, "Kayi ka pinuu te zapit te egkekewanan ku taman te kenè ku pa ibpeluhud diyà te kenikew is menge kuntada nu." '"

Ne impelaus ni Jesus haazà is egkeǥiyen din te, "Emun migkaǥi ni David he Nengazen din is ebperetengen he ibpahadì, kenà egkehimu he kevuwazan dà duen ni Hadì David." Ne utew nengesuat is mezakel he menge etew zutun te kebpenurù kandan ni Jesus.

Ne zutun te kebpenurù din, ke sikandin te, "Andam kew limbe wey kew kenà mekeiring te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan su iyan dà egkesuatan dan is kedhiphipanew he memelayat is kemisula he edtehuzen sikandan te menge etew emun diyè dan te mirkadu.
Ne emun diyè dan te simbahan, egkesuatan dan he iyan sikandan ibpepinuu ziyà te ebpepinuuwan te lavew he menge etew. Ne egkesuatan dan daan he utew zan metahud ke edtelavuk dan te keemuran.

Ne heini is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan, edlimbungan dan is menge valu he vahi wey zan maangken is menge valey zutun te menge vahi. Ne utew meluǥayad is ked-ampù dan he iyan idtambun dan te mezaat he vaal zan. Ne utew edekelà is silut te Megbevayà kandan keuzemà."

Ne sevaha he timpu zutun he ziyà ebpimpinuu si Jesus te seled dutun te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, ne ziyà sikandin te uvey te teleǥuey te halad he selapì. Ne ebantey sikandin te menge etew he edsavuk te halad dutun te teleǥuey. Ne mezakel is menge sepian dutun he utew zekelà he selapì is insavuk dan dutun.
Ne nekeuma zutun is balu he vahi he utew egkeayuayu. Ne inhalad din is dezuwa he selapì he tumbaǥa he utew zeisey is bali zin.

Ne zutun mid-umew ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din he med-uvey zan diyà te kandin ne ke sikandin te, "Benar is egkeǥiyen ku he haazà is balu he vahi, sumalà is ked-isipa te Megbevayà, utew lavew is inhalad din te langun he inhalad kayi te zuma he menge etew.

Su is menge zuma he nemenhalad kayi, subra zà te ketiǥeyunan dan is inhalad dan. Iyan, heeyan is egkeayuayu he vahi, minsan pa te edlisedlised sikandin te igkeuyag din, inhalad din is namànamè en he ketiǥeyunan din."

Ne zutun te ked-awà ni Jesus dutun te zekelà he simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà migkaǥi ziyà te kandin is sevaha te menge sumusundan din te, "Ahaa nu heini is simbahan. Utew zezekelà is menge vatu he imbevaley kayi ne utew meupiya is kegkeveeli zin."
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandin te, "Heeyan is dekelà he simbahan, he vatu is imbevaley zuen, wazà keuzemà minsan sevaha he vatu he ebpekeuntud diyà te sevaha su egkewaǥey heeyan is langun."
Ne hein diyè dan te vuvungan he egngezanan te Ulivuwan, egkepantew zan sikan is dekelà he simbahan. Ne mid-insaan si Jesus eni Pedro, Santiago, Juan, wey Andres dutun te wazè dan duma,
ke sikandan te, "Keǥiyi key ke keenu egkehitavù heini is langun wey ke hengkey is egkeulaula he tuus he iyan en timpu he egketuman sikan is langun he migkaǥi nu ǥeina."
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Mebpekevantey kew wey kenè kew mekesundan te teruen he etew
su mezakel is ebpemenlepew he egamit te ngazan ku he egkaǥi is kada sevaha zutun he iyan sikandin sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì. Ne mezakel is ebpeketuu te menge tarù dan.

Ne emun egkezineg niw ziyà te uvey niw is meǥurub tenged te gira ne egkezineg niw zaan is tudtul te menge gira ziyà te meziyù he tanà, kenè kew mahandek su kinahanglan he egkeulaula is iring kayi te kenè pa edtepusen heini is timpu.

Su ebpekidtebek is sengeinged te zuma zin he inged ne egira is sengeǥinhedian te zuma zin he ǥinhedian. Egkehitavù is linug diyà te mezakel he menge inged ne zuen menge inged he ebitilen. Iyan, heini he egkehitavù, ne iring te ed-anak he sikan pa ebpuunà is belilit din.

Ne sikiyu, kinahanglan he purungi niw endama is gehinawa niw, su edekepen kew te menge etew ne ed-uwiten kew zan diyà te hukmanan ne ebuǥelen kew ziyà te menge simbahan dan. Ebpekeetuvang kew te menge gubirnedur wey menge hadì tenged te kedtuu niw kediey wey niw ikewali is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te kandan.
Su te kenè pa egketapus haazà is timpu, kinahanglan he ihuna ipesavut is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te menge etew ziyà te langun he menge ǥinhedian.

Ne zutun te kedekepa keniyu su ed-uwiten kew ziyà te hukmanan, kenè niw igkesamuk ke hengkey is egkeǥiyen niw su emun dutun kew en, iyan niw egkekaǥi is ibpekaǥi keniyu te Megbevayà su is menge lalag he egkekaǥi niw zutun ne kenè en keniyu, kekenà, lalag he ibpekaǥi keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.

Ne zutun he timpu zuen menge etew he ibpehimetayan dan is menge suled dan. Ne zuen daan menge amey he ibpehimetayan dan is menge anak dan. Ne zuen menge etew he egkuntedahan dan wey ibpehimetayan dan is menge lukes dan.
Egkuntedahan kew te langun tenged te sumusundan ku sikiyu. Iyan, sikan is edhamen te kedtuu zin kedì taman te ketepusan dutun te menge kemeresayan, ebeǥayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.

Ne is egngezanan te melimezang he ebpekekaid, emun egkeehè niw he ziyè en haazà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà he wazà ituǥut kandin, ne sikan is diyà te prubinsya he Hudiya, mebpelaǥuy zan pehendiyà te vuntud. (Is ebpekevasa kayi te tagnà dengan mehitenged kayi, kinahanglan he sevuta zin.)
Ne sikan is etew he egkeserengà diyà te ǥawas te valey zin, kenè en med-usik-usik pa te timpu te kedseled diyà te valey he egkuwa te minsan hengkey te azen din.
Sikan is etew he ziyà egkeserengà te pemuleey zin, kenè en med-ulì pa ziyà te valey zin te kegkuwa te malung din.
Ne zutun he andew, kehizu utew te menge vahi he memeǥingey wey ebpemenleǥimu su utew zan egkengereǥenan he ebpelaǥuy .
Iampù niw ziyà te Megbevayà he kenà heini mekeserengà is kebpelaǥuy zutun te timpu te meǥenew.

Su wazè en ebpekerepeng te kemeresayan he egkehitavù dutun he andew. Ne puun pa te aney en kedlimbaǥa te kelibutan wazè pa meeǥiyi is iring dutun. Ne emun egkehitavù en haazà ne kenè en egkehitavù pa maan is iring dutun minsan keenu.

Midterinan en te Nengazen haazà is timpu te kemeresayan su emun wazà, ne egkelimas dutun is tivuuk he menusiyà. Iyan, tenged te hizu zin te menge pinilì din he menge etew, midterinan din haazà is timpu te kemeresayan.
Ne ke zuen egkaǥi keniyu te, 'Ahaa niw, heini en kes hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà,' wey ke zuen be egkaǥi te, 'Heeyan en sikandin,' ne kenè kew mebpemineg dutun te egkaǥi.

Su ebpenlepew is teruen he etew he egkeǥiyen dan he iyan sikandan sikan is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà wey ke egkeǥiyen dan be he ebpeneuven sikandan te Megbevayà. Ne ebpemeehè dan te egkengein-inuwan wey menge singyal su ibpetuu zan pezem te menge tarù dan, ke egkehimu, is menge pinilì te Megbevayà.
Umba mebpekevantey kew su midtudtul ku en keniyu heini is langun he egkehitavù te wazè pa meulaula.
Ne emun egkeiwas haazà is timpu te kemeresayan, kenè en edsilà is andew ne kenè en daan ed-anlag is bulan.
Ne egkengeulug is menge vituen diyà te langit ne egkengehuyung is menge kedesenan diyà te hewhewanan.
Ne zutun, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, egkeahà a ziyà te menge ǥapun is ebpekeuma he utew zekelà is gehem ku wey utew merayag is ked-anlag ku.
Ne zutun edsuǥuen ku is menge velinsuǥuen ku pehendiyà te heepat he pesaǥì kayi te kelibutan. Ne edtiǥumen dan is menge pinilì ku he etew he ebpuun te minsan hendei kayi te lumpad te kelibutan.
Isipa niw heini is impenurù ku keniyu pinaaǥi te sempità he kayu he igira. Dini te kenita, emun ebpeneringsing en is subpang din ne ebpenlumbey en, egketuenan ta he meǥaan en is gulavung.
Ne iring din ded daan, emun egkeehè niw he egkengetuman en is langun kayi te migkaǥi ku, egketuenan niw he meǥaan a ebpekelikù.
Tenuzi niw is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu: he emun egkeehè niw he egkengetuman en heini kenè kew pa egkeamin ebpatey taman te kenè pa egkengetuman heini is langun.
Egkehanew is langit wey tanà, iyan, heini is migkaǥi ku, kenà mulà egkehanew te minsan keenu.

Is Amey tew he Megbevayà, iyan dà nesayud ke keenu egketuman heini is langun. Ne ǥawas kandin wazè en nesayud te andew wey uras ke keenu heini egkehitavù. Is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà diyà te langit, wazè dan mesayud wey minsan siak is Anak te Megbevayà, wazà a zaan mesayud.
Ne tenged kayi, mebpekevantey kew ne taǥamtaǥam kew su kenè niw heini egketuenan ke keenu.

Su iring a te sevaha he etew he midhipanew he wazè din teleena ke keenu ed-ulì. Is menge suluǥuen din ne impevantey zin te menge azen din. Ne mibpemeǥayan din is kada sevaha kandan te ketengdanan he ed-ul-ulahan dan dutun te kedhipanew zin. Ne migkeǥiyan din is etew he impevantey zin te ǥemawan he kenà sikandin medlipezeng.
Umba, purungpurung kew su wazè niw metueni ke keenu a ebpekeuma is teǥiǥaked te valey, ke mahapun be, ke liwazè be te kezukileman, wey ke egkepkepawè be wey ke edsilè en be is andew.
Kinahanglan he kenè ku sikiyu egkeumahan he nekelipezeng dutun te kedtekewtekew ku kedlikù.
Heini is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu, egkeǥiyen ku zaan diyà te langun he etew he mebpekevantey is kada sevaha."

Mekezuwa pa zutun, egketuman is Pista te Kedlevayi wey Pista te Kegkeena te Supas he Wazè Din Tapey. Is menge punuan he memumuhat wey is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan, ebpengahaan dan is paaǥi wey zan mezakep si Jesus he kenà egketuenan te mezakel he menge etew wey mehimetayi.
Ne ke sikandan te, "Kenè tew edekepen sikandin te timpu te pista su kela ke edsinamuk is menge etew."

Ne sevaha he timpu zutun he ziyà si Jesus te inged he Bitanya, diyà sikandin te valey ni Simon te it-iten he neulian en. Ne zutun te egkaan dan, nekeuma is bahi he ed-uwit te pelenahan he mibeelan puun te vatu he elebastru he midteǥuan haazà is pelenahan te mehemut he agwa he mahal utew su lunsey he nardu. Ne mid-uvayan si Jesus dutun te vahi ne midrupet din haazà is bivig dutun te pelenahan ne imbusbus din diyà te ulu ni Jesus haazà is agwa.
Ne is duma he etew he nekeahà dutun, wazè dan ikesuat haaza, ne mibpelelelaǥè dan te, "Maan is mid-us-usikan din heeyan is agwa te wazà pulus?

Mahal utew heeyan su is bali zin, ne subra he tetelu he ǥatus he elad he selapì. Meupiya pa pezem ke imbelegyà, ne is halin, igkepemeǥey ziyà te egkengeayuayu." Ne midsawey zan haazà is mid-ulaula zutun te vahi.
Ne migkaǥi zutun si Jesus te, "Pesegdana niw sikandin. Maan is edsewayen niw sikandin? Utew meupiya heini is mid-ulaula zin dini te kediey.
Layun niw egketevangi is egkengeayuayu su kenè niw mulà sikandan egkesuwey, iyan, siak, meǥaan ku en sikiyu egkesuwey.
Sumalà is egkehimu kayi te vahi ne midhimu zin en dini te kedì. Mid-egwahan e zin he zaan wey meteǥana is lawa ku te kedlevenga kedì.
Tenuzi niw he kenà sikandin egkelipatan. Su minsan hendei idsangyew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen dini te tivuuk he kelibutan, egketudtul zaan heini is mid-ulaula zin kedì."
Ne zutun, si Hudas he tigKeriyuti, sevaha zutun te sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din, midhendiyà sikandin te menge punuan he memumuhat su ibpalad din si Jesus diyà te kandan.

Ne hein netuenan dutun te menge punuan ke hengkey is inhendutun din, ne utew zan nengesuat. Ne mibpesarig sikandan he ebeǥayan dan si Hudas te selapì. Ne puun dutun mibpengahà si Hudas te paaǥi te ked-ekali zin ki Jesus.

Ne zutun neume en is nehuna he andew te Pista te Kegkeena te Supas he Wazè Din Tapey. Iyan haazà andew te kedlepaa te menge Hudiyu te ibpemuhat he nati he kerehidu he egkeenen dan dutun te Pista te Kedlevayi. Ne zutun mid-insaan si Jesus te menge sumusundan din te, "Hendei is egkesuatan nu he valey he edhilutuan dey wey zey meteǥana is idlavung nu te Pista te Kedlevayi?"
Ne midsuǥù ni Jesus is dezuwa zutun te menge sumusundan din ne migkeǥiyan din te, "Hendiyan kew te inged ne egkeuma niw is maama he ed-uwit te umuy he nepenù te wahig.

Tundug kew kandin pehendiyà te valey he edselezan din, ne keǥiyi niw is teǥiǥaked dutun te valey te, 'Ibpeinsà te zatù tew kenikew ke hendei he ruǥu sikandin egkaan duma te menge sumusundan din kayi te Pista te Kedlevayi.'
Ne zutun ibpeehè din keniyu is meluag he ruǥu ziyà te zivavew zutun he zaan en nehimani. Ne zutun niw teǥenaha is idlavung tew."
Ne haazà is menge sumusundan din, migenat dan pehendutun te inged ne langun duen te migkaǥi ni Jesus ne iyan en iyan neehè dan ne zutun dan teǥenaha is idlavung te Pista te Kedlevayi.
Ne hein mezukilem dutun, si Jesus wey is sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan din, nekeuma zan dutun te valey.
Ne te ziyè dan te lemisahan su kemulu zan pa egkaan, migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Duen egkeǥiyen ku keniyu. Iyan is: sevaha keniyu kayi te ebpemengaan guntaan he zuma ku is ed-akal kedì wey a mehimetayi."
Ne zutun utew nengeseeng haazà is menge sumusundan ni Jesus, ne is kada sevaha zutun, mid-insè dan kandin te, "Kela ke iyan a?"
Ne ke si Jesus te, "Iyan is sevaha keniyu te sepulù wey zezuwa he ebpekidtuǥen kedì kayi te edtengelan.
Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ebpatey a sumalà te netagnà duen te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà, iyan, kehizu utew te etew he ed-akal kedì. Meupiya pa ziyà te kandin ke wazè en sikandin ianak."

Ne zutun te kemulu zan pa egkaan, mid-amì si Jesus duen te supas, ne mibpeselematan din diyà te Megbevayà ne mibpenevìtevì din haazà ne impemeǥey zin dutun te menge sumusundan din. Ne ke sikandin te, "Iyan heini lawa ku; keena niw."
Ne mid-amì din dutun is tasa he midteǥuan te vinu he paras ne mibpeselematan din daan te Megbevayà ne induwal zin diyà te kandan. Ne pudu sikandan mid-inum dutun.
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Iyan heini lengesa ku he ibpetiǥis wey mepelisi is mezakel he menge etew. Tuus heini te paaǥi te kegkelibri he midtukud te Megbevayà.
Benar is egkeǥiyen ku he puun guntaan, ne kenà ad maan ed-inum kayi te vinu taman dutun te timpu keuzemà he ed-iinumè kiw te veǥu en he vinu emun edhadì is Megbevayà."
Ne zutun migkanta zan te kedalig te Megbevayà ne hein nepasad haazà, migawas dan ne midhendiyè dan te vuvungan dutun he egngezanan te Ulivuwan.

Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is menge sumusundan din te, "Is langun te sikiyu, edluyahan is kedsarig niw kediey su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Edhimetayan ku is ed-elima te menge kerehidu ne ebpekedsusuwey is menge kerehidu.'
Iyan," ke si Jesus, "dutun te kegkevanhew ku, edhuna a keniyu ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya."
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Pedro ziyà te kandin te, "Minsan ke edluyahan is kedsarig kenikew kayi te langun he menge zuma ku ne kenà mulà edluyahan is kedì, minsan egkemenumenu."
Ne ke si Jesus diyà te ki Pedro te, "Benar is egkeǥiyen ku he te kenè pe kan ed-ukarà is manuk te kezezuwa ǥuntaan te mezukilem ne ketetelu ke en ebpekekaǥi he kenà a kenikew egkekilala."

Ne wazà mevenari zutun si Pedro, ke sikandin te, "Minsan pa ke edhimetayan a zuma kenikew ne kenà a egkaǥi he wazè ku sikew mekilala." Haazà he lalag, iyan daan pesarig dutun te menge zuma zin he menge sumusundan.
Ne nekeuma ensi Jesus diyà te lugar he migngezanan te Gitsimeni. Migkeǥiyan din is menge sumusundan din te, "Kayi kew zà pinuu taman te ebpekepasad a is ed-ampù."
Ne zutun miduma zin si Pedro, si Santiago, wey si Juan, ne midlaus dan pa ziyà te egkehunaan dutun. Utew neseeng sikandin wey mibmesakit utew is gehinawa zin.
Ne migkaǥi sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Utew mesakit is gehinawa ku. Henduen be te egkevidtew en. Kayi kew zà ne kenè kew medlipezeng."
Ne midlaus pa sikandin diyà te egkehunaan dutun ne midlangkeb diyà te tanà ne mid-ampù diyà te Megbevayà he ke egkehimu pa ne kenè en kandin ipeseǥazan haazà is merasey he imbanglis kandin.

Ke sikandin dutun te ked-ampù din te, "Amey ku, egkehimu nu is minsan hengkey ne emun egkehimu zà ne kenà a kenikew ipehimetayi, iyan, kenà egkesunud is kediey he egkesuatan, kekenà, iyan egkesunud is kenikew."

Ne midlikù si Jesus ne neehè din haazà is tetelu he sumusundan din he nemekelipezeng, ne migkeǥiyan din si Pedro te, "Simon, nekelipezeng ke ve? Wazè nu ve metigker he kenè ka edlipezeng te minsan sengeuras dà?"
Ne migkeǥiyan sikandan ni Jesus te, "Kenè kew lipezeng, kekenà, ampù kew wey kew mekelikey te menge penggezam keniyu. Edsunud pezem is gehinawa niw, iyan, meluya is lawa niw."
Ne zutun midlikù si Jesus ne mid-uman med-ampù te iyan ded gihapun sikan is in-ampù din.

Ne zutun midlikuan din haazà is menge sumusundan din, ne neehè din he nemekelipezeng dan su wazè dan maantus is kebpemetpetayi kandan te tuzug. Ne zutun wazè dan egketuenan ke hengkey is ibpengetezengan dan diyà te ki Jesus.

Ne netegteǥaad pa zutun midlikuan din en maan sikandan te iketelu, ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Kemulu kew ves nehurep he ebpemenhidhizeǥà? Netengkaan en heeyan su iyan en heini timpu he siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ibpalad a ziyà te menge lalung he etew.
Enew kew su heini en sikan is etew he ed-akal kedì. Edsinuǥungen tew."

Ne zutun te kemulu pa egkaǥi si Jesus, nekeuma si Hudas is sevaha zuen te sepulù wey zezuwa he menge epustul. Duma zin is menge etew he nengeǥumeenan te ubpit wey lagkut. Menge suǥù haazà te menge punuan te memumuhat wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu.

Si Hudas, is giya zan diyà te ki Jesus, migkaǥi zin he zaan ke hengkey is tuus te kegketueni zan ki Jesus, ke sikandin te, "Is etew he edhezekan ku, ne iyan en ebpen-ahaan niw. Ne zekepa niw en ne purungi niw ventayi ke ed-uwiten niw."
Ne zutun te kebpekeuma ni Hudas, segugunè din mid-uvayi si Jesus ne migkaǥi te, "Na! Menunudlù!" Ne midhezekan din.
Ne midakep dutun te menge etew si Jesus ne mibpekehemenan dan te egawed.
Iyan, sevaha te zaan he etew zutun, midhulavut din is sundang din ne midtibas din is suluǥuen te lavew he memumuhat ne netenaan haazà diyà te telinga ne nesapla haazà is telinga zin.
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge edakep kandin te, "Tulisan e ve? Su maan is neǥumeenan kew te menge ubpit wey lagkut is edakep kedì?
Kada andew ne zuma a keniyu ziyà te Valey te Megbevayà is ebpenurù ne wazà a keniyu zutun dà dekepa. Iyan, egkeulaula heini su egketuman sikan is menge tagnà diyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà."
Ne zutun mid-ewaan sikandin te menge sumusundan din su mibpemelaǥuy zan.
Ne zuen dutun kenakan he ebmemalung dà is midtelukun ki Jesus. Ne edekepen pezem haazà dutun te menge etew,
iyan, midleǥuwat ne nekepelaǥuy sikandin is wazè en seseberen din su netaǥak haazà is malung din he neǥewezan dutun te menge etew.

Mid-uwit dan si Jesus diyà te valey ni Keyipas he iyan lavew he memumuhat, ne zutun netiǥum he zaan is menge punuan he memumuhat, menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan, wey is menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu.

Ne si Pedro, midtinundug daan asal kenà utew ed-uvey ne ziyè dà medtaman te lama zutun te valey te lavew he memumuhat. Ne mibpinuu sikandin dutun is ed-amur ziyà te menge guwardya ne midhizazang diyà te hapuy zutun.
Ne is menge punuan te memumuhat wey is langun he nengetiǥum he ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu, ebpen-ehè dan te salà he id-ulug dan ki Jesus su wey zan mehimetayi, iyan, wazè dan egkeahà.
Mezakel is menge teruen he midsumbung te menge vaal ni Jesus, iyan, wazà mengeuyun haazà is ebpemenistiǥus dutun.
Ne zutun duen menge teruen he etew he mid-etuvang ne migkaǥi zan is sumbung dan mehitenged ki Jesus,

ke sikandan te, "Nezineg dey heeyan he etew he egkaǥi te, 'Edrundusen ku heini is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà he vineelan te etew ne seled te tetelu he andew ebpekevangun ad te veǥu he kenà bineelan te etew,'" ke sikandan.
Iyan, haazà is ebpemenumbung, kenà daan egkeuyun haazà is kedsumbunga zan ki Jesus.
Ne zutun, midhitindeg diyà te teliwazà is lavew he memumuhat ne migkeǥiyan din si Jesus te, "Tutuu ve heini is menge sumbung dan mehitenged kenikew? Hengkey is igketavak nu?"
Ne wazà si Jesus medtavak. Ne mid-uman megkaǥi haazà is lavew he memumuhat te, "Iyan ke ve kes mibpilì he ibpahadì he Anak te Megbevayà?"

Ne zutun midtavak si Jesus te, "Iyan a, ne keuzemà, egkeahà a keniyu is Kakey te Menusiyà he ziyà ebpinuu te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà. Ne egkeahà a zaan keniyu ziyà te menge ǥapun is ebulus he ebpuun diyà te langit."

Ne zutun, haazà is lavew he memumuhat, mibpemindas din is kumbalè din he tuus te utew sikandin nepauk dutun te migkaǥi ni Jesus . Ne ke sikandin te, "Wazè en kinahanglan he zuen pa tistiǥus su sikiyu is langun,
nezineg niw en is menge lalag din he utew supak te Megbevayà. Hengkey is hukum niw?" Ne zutun migkaǥi is langun he menge zuma zin te zekelà is salà ni Jesus ne kinahanglan he edhimetayan.

Ne is menge zuma zutun, mid-ilevan dan si Jesus, ne mibedbed dan is mata zin ne midsumbag dan te egkaǥi te, "Tegnaa nu ke hentei is midsumbag kenikew!" Ne migewezan sikandin te menge sundaru zutun ne mibpenabpì dan sikandin.
Ne si Pedro, kemulu pa zutun te lama te valey ne zuen bahi he suluǥuen te lavew he memumuhat he mid-uvey ziyà te kandin.
Ne hein neehè din si Pedro is edhizazang midtengtengan din ne migkaǥi te, "Sikew, duma ka zaan ni Jesus he tigNeserit."

Ne si Pedro, mibarew zin haazà te, "Wazè ku hanew ke hengkey is egkeǥiyen nu ne kenè ku zaan egkesavut ke hengkey is ibpesavut nu." Ne migawas si Pedro zutun pehendiyà te pultahan te lama. Ne zutun mid-ukarà is manuk.
Ne neehè en maan si Pedro dutun te vahi ne mid-uman megkaǥi haazà is bahi ziyà te menge etew zutun te, "Heini he etew, duma eni Jesus."

Iyan, hein nezineg haazà ni Pedro mibarew zin pa. Ne hein netegteǥaad dutun, is menge etew he nerivurun dutun, migkeǥiyan dan si Pedro te, "Tutuu iyan he zuma ke zin. Egketuusan su tigGeliliya ka zaan."
Ne zutun, mid-amin-amin si Pedro te sapà, ke sikandin te, "Siluti a te Megbevayà ke tarù is lalag ku he kenè ku egkekilala heeyan he etew is egkeǥiyen niw."

Ne zutundutun mid-ukarà is manuk te ikezuwa ne human metenuzi ni Pedro sikan is migkaǥi kandin ni Jesus he ke sikandin te, "Te kenè pe kan ed-ukarà is manuk te kezezuwa, ne ketetelu ke en ebpekekaǥi he kenà a kenikew egkekilala." Ne zutun nekelelendag si Pedro su utew mibmesakit is gehinawa zin.

Ne kegkepawè dà dutun, is menge punuan te menge memumuhat wey is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey is menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu, wey is langun he menge menhuhusey, neuyun dan ke hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan dan ki Jesus, ne zutun mibakus dan sikandin ne inhated dan diyà te gubirnedur he Rumanu he si Pilatu.
Ne si Pilatu, mid-insaan din si Jesus te, "Hadì ke ve te menge Hudiyù?" Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Uya, iyan is migkaǥi nu."
Ne is menge punuan te memumuhat, mezakel is menge sumbung dan mehitenged ki Jesus.
Ne tenged dutun mid-uman med-insà si Pilatu ki Jesus te, "Wazè nu ve igketavak kayi te mezakel he menge sumbung dan mehitenged kenikew?"
Iyan, wazà medtavak si Jesus te minsan hengkey he insà kandin ne tenged dutun neinuinu utew si Pilatu.
Iyan neleyaman ni Pilatu is: kada tuig emun Pista en te Kedlevayi, edlibriyen din is sevaha he pirisu he edhengyuen te menge etew.
Ne zuen dutun pirisu he egngezanan ki Berabas, ne haazà si Berabas wey is menge zuma zin, ne midsukul zan te gubirnu ne nekepatey sikandin te etew zutun te kedsinamuk dan.
Ne hein mid-uvey ziyà te ki Pilatu is menge etew su edhengyuen dan he libriya zin is sevaha he pirisu sumalà is neleyaman din,
migkaǥi si Pilatu te, "Egkesuatan niw ve he edlibriyen ku keniyu is hadì te menge Hudiyu?"
Iyan ingkeǥiya ni Pilatu zutun su netuenan din he iyan ketezengan ke maan is insumbung si Jesus te menge punuan te memumuhat su egkesina zan kandin.
Iyan, is menge punuan he memumuhat, migkeǥiyan dan is menge etew he iyan dan hengyua he edlibriyen si Berabas. Ne iyan haazà mid-ulaula zutun te menge etew.
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Pilatu te, "Ne emun iyan heeyan, ebmenmenuwen ku heeyan is etew he migeraran he hadì te menge Hudiyu?"
Ne nememensag haazà is menge etew te, "Iransang te krus!"
Ne ke si Pilatu te, "Maan? Duen be mezaat he mid-ulaula zin?" Iyan, mid-iseg is keǥurub dutun te menge etew he ebpememensag te, "Iransang te krus!"
Ne zutun midlibri ni Pilatu si Berabas wey zin mepenunuat is gehinawa zutun te menge etew. Ne impevuǥel zin si Jesus ne insuǥù din te menge sundaru he iransang diyà te krus.
Ne zutun impeseled si Jesus te menge sundaru zutun te turuǥan te gubirnedur. Ne midtiǥum dan is tivuuk he kumpeniya te menge sundaru.
Ne migkumbelaan dan sikandin te meriǥà he kumbalà su ebelvelayen dan sikandin he uvag kun hadì. Ne zutun mibengkulè dan te zuǥiyen he ǥawed ne insuup dan diyà te ulu zin.
Ne edtahud dan uvag kandin, ke sikandan te, "Kumusta ka is hadì te menge Hudiyu!"
Ne layun dan edlegkuta is ulu zin te tuked ne mid-ilevan dan, ne midluhuzan dan kun uvag.

Ne hein nepezè dan en he ebaleyvaley kandin, midluwasan dan duen te kumbalà he meriǥà ne insun-ud dan kandin is daan he kumbalè din. Ne zutun mid-uwit dan sikandin pehendiyà te ǥawas dutun te inged su idransang dan te krus.

Ne ziyà te zalan duen nesinuǥung dan he etew he tigSirini he egngezanan ki Simon, he amey ni Alejandro wey ni Rufo. Heini si Simon, diyà ebpuun te unayan ne edhendiyà te inged. Ne mibpeǥes dan ipetiang dutun te krus he edtiangen ni Jesus.
Ne mid-uwit dan si Jesus diyà te migngezanan te Gulguta, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, tulan te ulu.
Ne ibpeinum dan pezem si Jesus te vinu he mid-emutan te tambar he egngezanan te mira, iyan, wazè din dewata.
Ne zutun inransang dan sikandin diyà te krus. Mibpemahinbahin dan is menge ugelingen din ne midripa zan dutun ke hengkey is egkeangken te kada sevaha kandan.
Liwazè en ebpemenahik is andew hein inransang dan si Jesus.
Insurat dan sikan is insumbunga kandin he egkaǥi te, "Is Hadì te Menge Hudiyu."
Ne zuen dezuwa he tulisan he inransang dan daan te krus. Is krus te sevaha, ne ziyè dan ipasek te zapit te egkekewanan ni Jesus, ne is sevaha zutun, ne ziyà te zapit te egkeǥivang din.
Ne pinaaǥi kayi, netuman is netagnà dengan te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, "Mid-isip sikandin he zuma te menge mesinupaken."

Ne is menge etew he sumeseǥazà dutun, ebpemenangàtangà is ed-engitan dan si Jesus, ke sikandan te, "Na! Kunaan nu ke egkeǥevè nu sikan is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà ne egkevangun nu te seled te tetelu he andew!
Libriya nu kun is keugelingen nu ne penaug ka keniyan te krus!"

Ne sikan is menge punuan te memumuhat wey sikan is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan, iring din ded daan is mid-ulaula zan kandin, su mid-engitan dan daan. Ke sikandan te, "Wey zè be! Nelibri zin is duma he etew, iyan, is keugelingen din, kenè din egkelibri.
Sikew is uvag Kristu he hadì dey te menge Hudiyu, penaug ke en keniyan te krus ne edtuuwan dey sikew!" Ne sikan daan is dezuwa he inransang diyà te pesikilizè din, ne midsumpalit dan daan kandin.
Ne hein neudtu zutun is andew, midtik-ew mebmerusirem is tivuuk he kelibutan seled te menge tetelu he uras.

Ne hein liwazè en he ebpenaug is andew zutun, ingkulahì ni Jesus is utew mezaǥing he lalag he edhenduen te, "Ili, Ili, lama sebektani," he ke và dà egkeǥiya, "He Megbevayè ku, maan is ed-iniyuǥan a kenikew?"

Ne zutun, is duma he etew he ebpemenhithitindeg dutun te uvey, hein nezineg dan haazà is lalag, ke sikandan te, "Pemineg kew su ebpengumawen din si Elias is sevaha zuen te ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà ."

Ne sevaha zutun te menge etew is migaanggaan megkuwa te ispungha ne intereb din diyà te sukà ne midtiyuk din te zeisek he kayu ne impaahuk din diyà te vèbà ni Jesus wey zin haazà mesupsup. Ne migkaǥi te, "Pesegdana niw su ed-ahaan tew ke edlepew si Elias su wey zin ikepenaug!"
Ne zutun ingkulahì ni Jesus is utew mezaging he lalag ne nevidtawan ne minatey.
Ne is manggad he utew mekepal he ingkurtina ziyà te seled te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, neliwazà mevindas puun te zivavew pehendiyà te zizalem.
Ne is egalen dutun te menge sundaru he edhithitindeg dutun te egkesineruwan ni Jesus, hein neehè din haazà is kegkevidtawi ni Jesus, ke sikandin te, "Benar he Anak heini te Megbevayà!"
Ne zutun te malù meziyù, duen daan menge vahi he ed-ahà. Ne zutun si Maria Megdelina, si Maria he iney ni Jose wey ni Santiago he zeisek. Ne elin daan dutun si Selumi.

Heini is menge vahi, layun dan ebpekiduma ki Jesus ne midtevangan dan sikandin hein diyè pa sikandin te Geliliya. Ne mezakel zaan dutun is menge vahi he nemenduma kandin te kedhendutun din te Hiruselim.

Ne hein mahapun en dutun te andew te kedteǥana he egkesunuzan te Andew te Kedhimeley, nekeuma si Jose he tig-Erimetiya. Sevaha sikandin he telehuzen he egalen te menge Hudiyu. Sevaha sikandin te menge etew he ebperateng te kegketuman te nengetagnà mehitenged te kedhadì te Megbevayà. Ne zutun, in-awè din diyà te ǥehinawa zin is kegkehandek din ne midhendiyà te ki Pilatu ne midhangyù he egkuwaan din is lawa ni Jesus.
Dutun neinuinu si Pilatu su maan is utew meǥaan is kebpatey ni Jesus, ne tenged dutun mibpesuǥuan din sikan is egalen te menge sundaru ne mid-insà ke minatey en be iyan si Jesus.
Ne hein netuenan din dutun he minatey en iyan, ne intuǥut din ki Jose te egkuwa is lawa ni Jesus.

Mibpemasa si Jose te meputì he malung ne migkuwa zin is lawa ni Jesus ne mibukusan din dutun te malung he meputì. Ne zuen surung he penlevengà he ingkalut diyà te kelendiǥan he paǥang. Ne zutun din iseled is lawa ni Jesus. Ne midlilizan din haazà te zekelà he vatu he idlekeb dutun te penlevengà.
Ne si Maria Megdelina wey si Maria he iney ni Jose, neehè dan haazà ke hendei isavuk is lawa ni Jesus.

Ne hein neiwas dutun is Andew te Kedhimeley, si Maria Megdelina, wey si Maria he iney ni Santiago, wey si Selumi, mibpemasa zan te pehemut su edhendiyè dan te penlevengà wey zan ikehaplas haazà is pehemut te lawa ni Jesus.
Ne te meselem dutun te iyan pa kedsilà te andew zutun te egkehuna he andew te simana, nemenhendutun dan te midlevengan ki Jesus.
Ne ebpein-inseey zan te, "Hentei is ebpekelilid kenitew zuen te zekelà he vatu he inlekeb duen te idselang te penlevengà?"
Iyan, hein midlingehè dan, neehè dan he nelilid en sikan is batu zutun he utew zekelà.
Ne mid-ahuk dan dutun te idselang te penlevengà ne neehè dan is ebpimpinuu he menguhed he etew ziyà te egkekewanan dan he kukumbalà te meputì he manggad. Ne zutun nekehuyab is gehinawa zan.
Ne migkaǥi haazà is etew te, "Kenè kew mahandek. Ebpen-ahaan niw si Jesus he tigNeserit, sikan is inransang te krus, iyan, wazè en dini su nevanhew en. Ahaa niw man kayi te midsevukan kandin."

Ne te kegkeipus te ked-ahaa zan dutun, ke sikandin te, "Hendiyan kew en te menge sumusundan din ne keǥiyi niw sikandan wey si Pedro he si Jesus, edhuna sikandin diyà te Geliliya ne ziyè niw sikandin egkeahà, sumalà is migkaǥi zin keniyu."
Ne zutun nemengguwè dan dutun te penlevengà is ebpemelelaǥuy su utew zan nengeinuinu wey nengehandek. Ne tenged kayi wazè dan tudtula heini ziyà te minsan hentei su nengehandek dan.

Ne te meselem pa utew zutun te andew he Duminggu hein nevanhew en si Jesus, midhuna sikandin mebpaahà diyà te ki Maria Megdelina, sikan is bahi he mibpeǥuwaan din dengan te pitu he mezaat he mulin-ulin.
Ne heini si Maria, mibeyaan din is menge sumusundan ni Jesus. Ebpemenineǥew he egkengeseeng haazà is menge sumusundan ni Jesus tenged te kedhimetayi ki Jesus.
Ne hein midtudtulan sikandan ni Maria he neehè din si Jesus su nevanhew en, wazè dan tuuwi.
Ne neiwas haazà mibpaahà si Jesus is nahalin is dagwey zin diyà te zezuwa he menge sumusundan din dutun te edhendiyà haazà is dezuwa te unayan.
Ne midlikù dan diyà te Hiruselim ne mibpenudtulan dan is menge zuma zan he neehè dan si Jesus, iyan, minsan pa zutun wazà medtuu is menge zuma zan.

Ne zutun, mibpaahà daan si Jesus dutun te sepulù wey sevaha he menge sumusundan din te timpu he egkekaan sikandan. Midsawey zin sikandan tenged te kezesen te isip dan su wazè dan medtuu te menge etew he nemenudtul he nekeahà kandin he nevanhew.
Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Jesus sikandan te, "Penhipanew kew ziyà te tivuuk he kelibutan, ne ipesavut niw is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te minsan hentei he etew he linimbag te Megbevayà.
Ne sikan is edtuu kayi wey ebpebewtismu, ebeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne sikan is kenà edtuu ne edhukuman te silut.

Ne sikan is etew he edtuu kediey, duen menge singyal he egkehimu zan. Pinaaǥi te keǥehem te ngazan ku igkepeǥuwè dan is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpenlalung te menge etew. Ne ebpekekaǥi sikandan te kineǥiyan he kenè dan egketuenan.
Ne minsan ke ebpekeǥawed sikandan te menge uled wey ebpekeinum sikandan te minsan hengkey he edhilu, kenà sikandan egkekeizan. Ne emun edempaan dan is egkengezeruwan, ne egkengeulian."
Ne te kegkeipusa te Nengazen he si Jesus dutun te menge lalag din, mibatun sikandin pehendiyà te langit, ne mibpinuu ziyà te egkekewanan te Megbevayà.

Ne zutun nemenhipanew is menge sumusundan te Nengazen he si Jesus ne impesavut dan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te minsan hendei. Ne is gehem te Megbevayà, mid-uǥup kandan su nemekehimu zan te menge egkengein-inuwan su wey memeketuu is menge etew zutun te ibpesavut dan. Is Meupiya He Tudtulanen Te Keaǥi Ni Jesu Kristu Sumalà Is Keguǥuza Ni
Minahal he Teofilo: Mezakel is migezam medsurat te ǥuǥud te langun he neulaula zini te kenami he inged mehitenged te menge vaal ni Jesus.
Insurat dan is neǥuǥud kenami te menge etew he iyan nekeahà kayi te menge vaal wey iyan midsangyew te Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne siak daan guntaan, geina te mibpurungan ku te ed-istudyu heini, puun pa te puunà kayi te nengeulaula, neisip ku he meupiya zaan ke ebpurungan ku kenikew te edsurat is keguǥuza kayi te langun.
Umba idsurat ku heini su wey nu mepurung mesavut is tutuu te langun he impenurù kenikew.

Ne heini is eguǥuzen ku kenikew, ebpuun pa zutun te timpu zengan hein iyan pa hadì si Hirudis diyà te prubinsya he Hudiya. Ne zuen dutun maama he egngezanan ki Zacarias. Ne heini si Zacarias, sevaha sikandin he memumuhat he kevuwazan te etew zengan he si Abyas. Ne is menge kevuwazan ni Abyas, menge memumuhat sikandan te Megbevayà. Ne si Zacarias, esawa zin is bahi he egngezanan ki Elisabet he kevuwazan te memumuhat dengan he si Arun.
Si Zacarias wey haazà is esawa zin, metazeng sikandan he etew su wazà igkesawey zutun te kebpurungi zan te edtuman te langun he menge tulumanen wey menge suǥù te Megbevayà.
Ne haazà is teleesawa, wazè dan anak su si Elisabet ne kenà ed-anak, ne zutun he timpu ne utew zan en menge meǥurang.
Ne neuma is timpu zutun he iyan en si Zacarias wey is menge zuma zin he kevuwazan ni Abyas ebpekepemuhat diyà te zekelà he simbahan he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun sumalà is imbilinbilin he vetasan te menge mememuhat, nepilì si Zacarias pinaaǥi te ripa su wey iyan sikandin mekeseled dutun te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà he ibpetutung te veyewà.
Ne te kemulu zin pa ed-ul-ulaha haazà, ne mezakel is menge etew ziyà te ǥawas he ebpemen-ampù diyà te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun mibpaahà kandin is belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà ne heini is belinsuǥuen, dutun edhithitindeg te egkekewanan te vangkù he tutungà te veyewà.
Ne zutun te kegkeahaa ni Zacarias kayi netentanan sikandin su utew nahandek.

Ne zutun migkaǥi kandin haazà is belinsuǥuen te, "Kenè ka mahandek, Zacarias, su nezineg te Megbevayà is ked-ampù nu ne edhimuwen din he meǥingey nu is esawa nu he si Elisabet ne ed-anak si Elisabet te maama ne iyan nu ingazan kandin si Juan.
Utew nu igkelipey heini ne utew egkengeǥalew is mezakel he menge etew emun id-anak en heini is batà,

su utew zekelà is pid-etawan din sumalà is ked-isipa kandin te Nengazen. Kenà sikandin ed-inum te vinu wey minsan hengkey he ebpekelangut. Ne puun dà dutun te kenè pa sikandin id-anak egkepurung sikandin egkeulini te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
Ne pinaaǥi te kebpenurù din," egkaǥi haazà is belinsuǥuen, "mezakel is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil he edlikù edtuu te Megbevayà he iyan ed-ezapen te menge ǥinikanan dan dengan.

Heini is anak nu, edsuǥuen sikandin he ibpehuna te kebpekeuma te Nengazen ne ed-ulinan sikandin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin iring te ked-ulini zengan te Megbevayà te ebpeneuven he si Elias. Ne is gehem din, ne iyan ded sikan is gehem ni Elias dengan. Ne pinaaǥi te menge penurù kayi te anak nu egkehimu zutun he ebpeked-uuliey te meupiya he ǥehinawa is menge amey wey te menge anak dan. Is menge etew he wazà mebpezumazuma te menge suǥù te Megbevayà, pinaaǥi te penurù kayi te anak nu ebpekedsendit dan ne zutun metazeng human is ed-isipen dan. Ne pinaaǥi kandin mezakel he menge etew is ed-endaman dan is kebpekeuma te Nengazen," lalag te velinsuǥuen.
Ne zutun midtavak si Zacarias te, "Hengkey is tuus wey ku metueni he tutuu he egketuman heini is migkaǥi nu? Su siak wey is esawa ku, utew key en meǥurang."

Ne midtavak haazà is belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà te, "Iyan a si Gabriel, sikan is suluǥuen te Megbevayà he layun diyà te etuvangan din. Midsuǥù e zin dini te kenikew wey ku ikepesavut heini is tudtul te utew meupiya he egkeulaula.

Ne egkeemew ka ne kenè ke en ebpekekaǥi taman te timpu he kenè pa heini egketuman su wazè nu tuuwi heini is migkaǥi ku kenikew he kenà duwazuwa he egketuman dutun te timpu he egkesuatan te Megbevayà," ke sikandin.
Ne is menge etew he edtaǥadtaǥad diyà te ǥawas dutun te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, nengeinuinu zan su maan is utew neuǥet si Zacarias dutun te seled.

Ne hein midlawang en sikandin dutun, ne kenè en ebpekekaǥi ziyà te kandan. Ne netuenan dan dutun he zuen impaahà kandin te Megbevayà dutun te seled te simbahan su kenè en ebpekekaǥi ne ebpenguyew-uyew zà sikandin diyà te menge etew. Ne puun dà dutun ne emew sikandin.
Ne hein neuma is timpu he zutun egkeilisan si Zacarias te menge vaal zin dutun te simbahan, mid-ulì sikandin diyà te inged din.
Ne wazà utew meuǥet dutun ne mibmeǥingey is esawa zin he si Elisabet. Ne taman te menge lelima he vulan dutun wazà si Elisabet megawasgawas diyà te valey.
Ne ke sikandin te, "Human guntaan ingkehizu a te Megbevayà su ebpekeanak e zed, ne is wazè ku kebpekeanak dengan ne kenè ku en igkeeled."

Ne zutun hein menge heenem en he vulan is keǥingayan te esawa ni Zacarias, midsuǥù en maan te Megbevayà is belinsuǥuen din he si Gabriel pehendiyà te inged he egngezanan te Neserit he ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.
Iyan mibpeveyaan kandin dutun is raǥa he egngezanan ki Maria. Ne heini si Maria, nekeǥunan te kenakan he egngezanan ki Jose. Ne heini si Jose, ne kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David.
Ne nekeuma is belinsuǥuen diyà te ki Maria ne ke sikandin te, "He Bayi, ingkehizu ka te Megbevayà ne ed-ipaten ke zin!"
Ne hein nezineg ni Maria heini, netentanan utew sikandin ne mid-isip-isip din ke hengkey vuwa haazà is kehuluǥan dutun te lalag te velinsuǥuen.
Ne migkaǥi haazà is belinsuǥuen te, "Kenè ka, Maria, mahandek su utew zekelà is gaǥew te Megbevayà kenikew.
Ebmeǥingey ka ne ebpekeanak ka te maama ne ngezani nu sikandin ki Jesus.

Utew zekelà is pid-etawan din ne egkengezanan sikandin he Anak te utew lavew he Megbevayà. Ne edhimuwen te Nengazen he Megbevayà he edhadì heini is id-anak nu iring te kedhadì dengan te kepuun din he si David.
Ne heini is anak nu, wazà pidtemanan te kedhedii zin keniyu te menge kevuwazan ni Hakub. Wazè en ketepusan te kedhadì din!"
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Maria ziyà te velinsuǥuen te, "Egkemenumenu ve heini? Su raǥe e man ne wazè e pa meuvayi te maama."

Ne midtavak haazà is belinsuǥuen te, "Is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, iyan ebpengelintau kayi ziyan te kenikew ne edlig-enan ka te ǥehem te Megbevayà. Ne tenged kayi, heini is id-anak nu, pudu metazeng is menge ulaula zin ne egkengezanan sikandin he Anak te Megbevayà.

Ne kenà iyan dà heini tudtul ku kenikew su is ayè nu he si Elisabet, minsan te utew en sikandin meǥurang ne mibmeǥingey en sikandin. Menge heenem en he vulan guntaan is keǥingayan din he zengan, iyan isip te menge etew he kenà sikandin ed-anak.
