Umba egkeulaula heini su egkehimu te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey."
Ne midtavak si Maria te, "Berakat he mehitavù kediey sumalà is migkaǥi nu su mepezumdumahan a te Nengazen." Ne zutun mid-ewaan si Maria zutun te velinsuǥuen.
Ne wazà utew zutun meuǥet mibpenines si Maria ne migaanggaan megenat su edhendiyà te sevaha he inged he vuvungan he sakup te prubinsya he Hudiya.
Ne zutun te kebpekeuma zin diyà te engki Zacarias wey Elisabet, mibpenelehuzan sikandin.
Ne hein nezineg ni Elisabet haazà is kebpenelehuzan ni Maria ne midredsà medleǥuwat haazà is batà diyà te ǥetek ni Elisabet. Ne zutun nepurung si Elisabet meulini te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.

Ne si Elisabet, tenged te utew nelipey, mibpekezaǥing is egkaǥi te, "Wazà ebpekerepeng kenikew he vahi su utew ka mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa te Megbevayà. Ne mahal zaan diyà te ǥehinawa zin heeyan is id-anak nu.
Maan buwa is utew a ingkeǥaǥew te Megbevayà su maan is ebpenumbelayan a kenikew te iney te mibpilì he hadì?
Umba netuenan ku heini su zutun te kegkezineǥa ku zà kenikew, heini is dini te ǥetek ku, nekeleǥuwat te kegkeǥalew zin.
Umba, Maria, edtuvazan ka te Megbevayà su midtuu ka he egketuman is impesavut kenikew te velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà!"
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Maria te, "Utew a ebpekezalig te Nengazen.
Utew ku ingkelipey is Megbevayà he iyan menluluwas ku.
Su siak is suluǥuen din he utew minus is pid-etawan, wazè e zin ded melipati. Ne puun guntaan egkaǥi is tivuuk he menusiyà he iyan a vahi he utew lavew is tuvad kandin te Megbevayà.
Egkekaǥi zan heini tenged te menge egkein-inuwan he mid-ulaula kediey te utew lavew he mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà. Utew lavew is ngazan din.
Puun pa te nengehuna he menge etew zengan taman en guntaan, dekelà is hizu zin diyà te minsan hentei he edtahud kandin.
Nehimu zin is menge egkein-inuwan he vaal. Nemekepelaǥuy kandin is memepelevawen, ne wazè dan meveeli is ed-isipen dan.
Duen menge lavew he hadì he mibpekevavè din is pid-etawan ne zuen daan menge etew he minus is pid-etawan he mibpeketikang din is pid-etawan.
Is menge etew he egkengeayuayu, iyan ebeǥayan din te meupiya, iyan, is menge sepian, ibpehipanew zin he wazè dan uwiten.

Is impenaad din dengan diyà te menge kepuun tew he si Abraham wey is menge kevuwazan din, wazè din lipati. Midtevangan kiw zin is menge suluǥuen din he kevuwazan ni Israyil. Ne egkehizuwan kiw zin daan te wazà pidtemanan is menge nepilì din he etew he menge kevuwazan ni Abraham," ke si Maria.
Ne menge tetelu he vulan dutun is ked-ubpà ni Maria ziyà te engki Elisabet ne human med-ulì sikandin.
Ne hein neuma is andew, ne mid-anak si Elisabet ne maama haazà is anak din.
Ne hein nezineg te menge kezumahan dan wey menge siringan dan heini is utew meupiya he mid-ulaula te Megbevayà ki Elisabet, nengelipey zan daan.

Ne hein walu en he andew is ked-enaka zutun te vatà midtuman dan is betasan dan te menge Hudiyu su emun maama is id-anak, ne zutun te ikewalu he andew edsirkunsidaren dan. Ne is menge etew zutun, egngezanan dan pezem haazà is batà ki Zacarias su iyan ngazan dutun te amey zin.
Iyan, si Elisabet, wazà mesuat dutun ne ke sikandin te, "Kenà egkehimu su Juan is igngazan kandin."
Ne migkeǥiyan dan si Elisabet te, "Maan? Wazà minsan sevaha te menge kezuzumahi niw he ebpuunan te iring keniyan he ngazan!"
Ne mid-uyawan dan is amey zutun te vatà su id-insè dan ke hentei is igngazan din dutun te anak din.
Ne zutun mid-uyew si Zacarias he veǥayi zan sikandin te edsuratan din te igngazan din, ne iyan insurat din dutun is, "Si Juan is ngazan keniyan te vatà." Ne zutun utew zan nengeinuinu.
Ne segugunà nekekaǥi en maan si Zacarias ne nekezalig sikandin te Megbevayà.

Ne is langun he menge siringan dan, hein nezineg dan heini, utew zan nengeinuinu. Ne is tudtul zutun te neulaula, segugunà nekeeneb diyà te langun he menge vuvungan he inged he sakup te prubinsya he Hudiya.

Ne wazà heini melipati te langun he nemekezineg. Ne netaǥù diyà te isip dan ke hengkey vuwa is ibpeulaula keuzemà te Megbevayà dutun te vatà ke edekelè en su utew keladu he ed-ulinan te Megbevayà haazà is batà.
Ne zutun nepurung meulini is amey zin he si Zacarias te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne migkaǥi zin haazà is impinted kandin ne ke sikandin te,
"Edeliǥen tew is Nengazen he Megbevayà tew te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil su sikitew is ed-azap kandin, mibulusan kiw zin ne midlibri kiw zin te menge kuntada tew.
Edsuǥuen din dini te kenitew is Menluluwas he kevuwazan duen te suluǥuen te Nengazen dengan he si Hadì David.
Is Megbevayà, pinaaǥi te menge ebpemeneuven din dengan,
migkaǥi zin he edtevangan kiw zin wey kiw kenà mezaag te menge kuntada tew, ne wey kiw zaan kenà mahandek te langun he egkepauk kenitew.
Migkaǥi zin daan he ingkehizu zin is menge kepuun tew ne kenè din egkelipatan is penaad din kandan.
Utew mezesen is penaad din dengan diyà te kepuun tew he si Abraham
su impenaad din he sikitew is menge kevuwazan ni Abraham, edlibriyen kiw zin wey kiw kenà mezaag te menge kuntada tew ne zutun kenè kiw egkengehandek is ed-ulaula te egkesuatan din.
Ne egkehimu he metinumanen wey metazeng is ked-ezapa tew kandin andew-andew te kemulu kiw pa zini te lumpad te kelibutan."

Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Zacarias haazà is anak din te, "Ne sikew, anak ku, iyan ka egeraran keuzemà he ebpeneuven te utew lavew he Megbevayà. Edsuǥuen ke zin he ibpehuna zuen te Nengazen tew su wey nu mekeǥiyi is menge etew he endami zan is kebpekeuma zin.
Ibpesavut nu kandan he egkeveǥayan sikandan te untung he wazà pidtemanan emun ebuyù dan te pesaylu ziyà te Megbevayà.
Su utew hihizuwen kenitew is Megbevayà. Is kedlibriya zin kenitew te silut, ne iring te kedsilà te andew emun egkepawà.

Henduen be te ziyè kiw ed-ubpà te utew merusirem su utew kiw egkengehandek te silut he iyan is wazè din ketepusan he kemetayen; iyan, emun ebpekeuma is Nengazen tew edteyawan kiw zin te ǥaǥew zin. Ne ibpeehè din kenitew is paaǥi wey ebmelinawen is ked-ubpè tew," ke si Zacarias.

Ne haazà is anak ni Zacarias, midtulin ne mid-iseg daan is ketau zin te ked-isip. Ne hein nekeiseg-iseg en is kezekelè din ne midhendiyà sikandin te tanà he kenè ed-ubpaan te etew ne zutun med-ubpà taman te neuma haazà is timpu te kebpenurù din te menge kezuzumahi zin he kevuwazan ni Israyil mehitenged te Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne hein iyan pa si Augusto hadì diyà te inged he Ruma, mibaal sikandin te velaud he mebpesinsus is langun he menge etew te seled te menge ǥinhedian he sakup din.
Ne iyan en haazà aney en he kedsinsusa te etew hein iyan pa si Sirinyu gubirnedur ziyà te prubinsya he Sirya.
Ne zutun te kedsinsus, ne kinahanglan he ziyà edsinsusa is kada etew te inged te menge kepuun din.

Umba, si Jose is dutun ed-ubpà te inged he Neserit he ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya, kinahanglan he edhendiyà te prubinsya he Hudiya, diyà te inged he Bitlihim he iyan inged he mid-enakan ki Hadì David dengan; su si Jose, kevuwazan sikandin ni Hadì David.
Ne miduma ni Jose si Maria, sikan is bahi he nekeǥunan din su ebpesinsus dan. Meǥingey zutun si Maria.
Ne hein diyè dan en te inged he Bitlihim, netuman is ked-anak ni Maria,

ne in-anak din is maama he iyan en pengenayan. Ne mibukusan din haazà is batà te malung ne impehizeǥè din diyà te selemakà te kudà su wazè dan ed-ereǥan dutun te valey he ebpehizeǥaan te etew su neenget en te etew.
Ne iyan daan haazà he kezukileman, te uvey zutun he inged duen menge etew ziyà te penebtavà su ibpepenabtab dan is menge ayam dan he kerehidu.
Ne netekew zan te mibpaahà kandan is belinsuǥuen te Nengazen ne neketayew ziyà te kandan is mekeǥeǥehem he anlag te Megbevayà ne utew zan dutun nengehandek.
Ne migkaǥi haazà is belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà te, "Kenè kew mahandek su midsuǥù a zini wey ku sikiyu mepenudtuli te utew meupiya he tudtul he iyan utew igkelipey te tivuuk he menusiyà.
Su kayi te kezukileman in-anak diyà te Bitlihim he iyan inged ni Hadì David dengan, is Nengazen he iyan kes mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì. Iyan sikandin edlibri keniyu te silut te Megbevayà.
Egketuusan niw haazà is batà su emun egkeehè niw is batà he mibukusan te malung ne impehizeǥà diyà te selemakà te kudà, ne iyan en sikandin," egkaǥi haazà is belinsuǥuen.
Ne zutundutun mibpaahà daan is utew mezakel he menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebpemendalig te Megbevayà,
ke sikandan te, "Edeliǥen tew is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit. Ne zini te lumpad te kelibutan mebmelinawen is kebpekesavuk te langun he menge etew he igkesuat te Megbevayà."

Ne zutun mid-ulì diyà te langit haazà is menge velinsuǥuen. Ne hein neipus haazà mibpelelaǥà haazà is menge ebpemepenabtab te, "Kuwà kiw en su ebpehendiyè kiw te Bitlihim su wey tew maahà heini is midtudtul kenitew te velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà."
Ne zutun nemenhipanew zan is egkengezegdeǥusu ne nekeuma zan diyà te ki Jose wey ki Maria ne neehè dan daan haazà is batà he impehizeǥà diyà te selemakà te kudà.
Ne zutun te neehè dan haazà is batà midtudtul zan engki Jose sikan is langun he midtudtul kandan te velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà mehitenged dutun te vatà.
Ne langun dutun te nekezineg kayi te tudtul te menge mibpemepenabtab, ne utew zan nengeinuinu.
Ne si Maria, wazè din melipati heini is langun he nezineg din, kekenà, mibpurungan din is-isipa.

Ne haazà is ed-elima te menge kerehidu, mid-ulì dan is utew nengelipey. Ne midalig dan is Megbevayà tenged te langun he nezineg dan wey neehè dan su netuman haazà is langun dutun te migkaǥi te velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà.

Ne is menge ǥinikanan dutun te vatà, hein nekewalu en is ked-enaka kandin ne midsirkunsidar zan sikandin sumalà is betasan dan. Ne migngezanan dan sikandin ki Jesus he iyan sikan is inngazan kandin duen te velinsuǥuen te wazè pa sikandin ikeǥingey.

Ne kepatan he andew puun dutun te ked-enaka te vatà, iyan en timpu he edtumanen ni Jose wey ni Maria is betasan te kedlumpiyu sumalà is imbilinbilin ni Moises dengan mehitenged te vahi he sikan pa med-anak. Ne mid-uwit dan haazà is batà diyà te Hiruselim ne midseled dan diyà te simbahan he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà su id-etuvang dan haazà is anak dan diyà te Megbevayà.
Iyan id-ul-ulaha zan dutun su edtumanen dan sikan is insurat dengan duen te kesuǥuan he imbeǥey te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, "Is penganey he anak he maama, ne ebpeveyveyaan te Megbevayà."

Ne si Maria wey si Jose, duen impemuhat dan dutun su sumalà is insuǥù dengan te Nengazen ne kinahanglan he zuen dezuwa he limuken ne emun kenà ne zezuwa he merepatik he ibpemuhat te sikan pa med-anak.

Ne zuen dutun maama he ed-ubpà diyà te Hiruselim he egngezanan ki Simeon. Metazeng haazà he etew he layun edsimba te Megbevayà. Kenà egkeawà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is kebperetenga zin te kegketuman te midtagnà dengan he zuen timpu he edlibriyen te Megbevayà is nengepilì din he menge etew he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil. Layun ed-ulinan si Simeon te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
Ne impesavut kandin he zaan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he kenà tekew en ebpatey taman te kenè din pa egkeahà is impenaad he etew he nepilì te Nengazen he ibpahadì din te menusiyà.

Ne zutun te mid-uwit ni Jose wey ni Maria haazà is anak dan ne midseled dan dutun te simbahan su edtumanen dan sikan is insuǥù te kesuǥuan, daan en dutun si Simeon te seled su iyan impinted kandin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
Ne hein naahà ni Simeon haazà is batà, nesepipi zin ne mibpeselematan din is Megbevayà.
Ke sikandin te, "Na, Nengazen, midtuman nu en human is penaad nu kediey. Ne egkehimu en he idtuǥut nu en he ebpatey a su wazè en human edteǥazan ku.
Neehè ku en is midsuǥù nu he iyan edlibri kenami te menusiyà te silut.
Iyan sikandin Menluluwas he imbeǥey nu he egkeahà te tivuuk he menusiyà.

Iyan sikandin idtayew te isip te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu he wazà mesayud ke hentei ka is tutuu he Megbevayà. Pinaaǥi kandin edeliǥen key is nengepilì nu he etew he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil." Iyan heini migkaǥi ni Simeon.
Ne haazà is ginikanan dutun te vatà, utew zan nengeinuinu kayi te migkaǥi ni Simeon mehitenged dutun te anak dan.

Ne in-ampù daan sikandan ni Simeon he tuvazi sikandan te Megbevayà ne migkeǥiyan din si Maria, sikan is iney zuen te vatà te, "Heini is anak nu, nepilì sikandin te Megbevayà su wey pinaaǥi kandin mevahinbahin kiw is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil. Ne is edsundan kandin ne egkelibri, ne sikan is kenà edsundan, ne edsilutan te Megbevayà. Egketuusan he sugù sikandin te Megbevayà, iyan, edsumpeliten sikandin te mezakel he menge etew,

ne pinaaǥi kandin egketuusan is menge mezaat he isip dan. Ne sikew is iney zin, tenged te egkuntedahan sikandin te mezakel, utew ebmesakit is gehinawa nu keuzemà." Iyan heini migkaǥi kandin ni Simeon.

Ne zutun te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà duen meritan he egngezanan ki Ana he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà. Anak sikandin ni Penuwil he kevuwazan ni Asir. Meǥurang en utew haazà is bahi. Hein menguhed pa sikandin, neesawa, iyan, seled te menge pitu zà he tuig te kegkeesawa zin, ne nevalu sikandin.

Ne menge keweluwan wey heepat en he tuig is kegkevalu zin. Ne layun sikandin diyà te simbahan su andew wey se mezukilem ne edsimba sikandin te Megbevayà, ne zuen timpu he kenà sikandin egkaan su wey zin utew mepurungi is ked-ampù din diyà te Megbevayà .

Ne te kemulu pa zutun te simbahan si Jose wey si Maria, nekeuma sikandin ne midalig din is Megbevayà tenged dutun te vatà. Ne impesavut din dutun ke hentei haazà is batà diyà te langun he menge etew he netiǥum dutun he hustu is kebpeebuta zan te kedlibriya te Megbevayà te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil.

Ne hein nepasad ni Jose wey ni Maria haazà is kedtumana zan te langun he insuǥù diyà te kesuǥuan he imbeǥey te Nengazen, mid-ulì dan diyà te ed-ubpaan dan diyà te inged he Neserit diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya.
Ne midekelà haazà is batà ne mibmezesen is lawa zin, ne utew sikandin metau he vatà ne midtuvazan sikandin te Megbevayà.
Ne kada tuig edhendiyà is menge ǥinikanan ni Jesus te Hiruselim su edtelavuk dan te pista he egngezanan te Kedlevayi.
Ne hein sepulù en wey zezuwa he tuig is idad ni Jesus midtelavuk dan te pista sumalà is ulaula he neleyaman dan.
Ne hein netapus haazà is pista migenat dan su ed-ulì dan, ne mibpetaǥak si Jesus diyà te inged he Hiruselim, iyan, wazà heini metueni te ǥinikanan din.

Kunaan dan ke zutun si Jesus te menge zuma zan te ebpenhipanew med-elupitpit. Ne hein sengeandew en is kedhipanew zan ne human dan meseǥipà he wazà dutun si Jesus, ne midsusi zan is menge kezuzumahi zan wey menge emiǥu zan ne neehè dan he wazà dutun iyan si Jesus. Ne zutun midlikù dan diyà te Hiruselim ne mibpengehè dan.

Ne hein tetelu en he andew is kebpengehè dan, neehè dan sikandin diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà is ebpemekibitiyara te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Ebpemineg te menge lalag dutun te menge menunudlù ne zuen daan menge insè din kandan.
Ne utew nengeinuinu is langun he nekezineg te menge tavak din te menge insà kandin su utew sikandin metau.

Ne si Maria wey si Jose, utew zan neinuinu hein neturedu zan sikandin diyà te simbahan ne migkaǥi is iney zin te, "Mama, maan is mid-ulaula nu kenami heini is utew zey igkeseeng? Su is amey nu wey siak, ne utew key neipeng is ebpen-ahà kenikew."
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Maan is ebpen-ahaan a keniyu? Wazè niw ve metueni he kinahanglan he zini a te valey te Amey ku?"
Iyan, wazè dan mesavut ke hengkey is kehuluǥan dutun te migkaǥi zin.
Miduma kandan si Jesus te ed-ulì diyà te Neserit su mepezumdumahan sikandin te ǥinikanan din. Ne wazà melipati te iney zin haazà is langun he neulaula, kekenà, netipiǥan diyà te isip din.
Ne midtulin is lawa ni Jesus ne mid-iseg is ketau zin te ked-isip. Inmeupiya sikandin te ǥehinawa te Megbevayà ne henduen ded daan is etew.

Ne zutun te ikesepulù wey lelima he tuig te kedhadì ni Hadì Tibiryu ziyà te inged he Ruma duen impesavut te Megbevayà diyà te ki Juan he anak ni Zacarias. Ne ziyà si Juan te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he menge etew. Ne zutun he timpu iyan gubirnedur ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya si Punsyu Pilatu. Ne ziyà te prubinsya he Geliliya iyan gubirnedur si Hirudis. Ne si Felipe, is hazi ni Hirudis, iyan gubirnedur ziyà te menge prubinsya he Iturya wey Terekuniti. Ne si Lisanyas, iyan gubirnedur diyà te prubinsya he Ebilinya. Ne si Anas wey si Keyipas, ne iyan menge lavew he memumuhat diyà te inged he Hiruselim.

Si Juan, mibeyaan din is langun he menge inged dutun te uvey te wahig he Hurdan ne mibpenurù din is menge etew zutun. Ke sikandin te, "Iniyuǥi niw is memezaat he menge ulaula ne mebpebewtismu kew ne ebpeseyluwen te Megbevayà is menge salè niw."

Heini is kebpenurù ni Juan, iyan kegketuman te netagnà he insurat dengan ni Esaias te ebpeneuven te Megbevayà su ke si Esaias te, "Duen etew ziyà te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew. Ne egkezineg sikandin te menge etew he edangep kandin is egkaǥi te, 'Meǥaan ebpekeuma is Nengazen. Hiǥewani niw is ibayè din; tendanga niw is dalan he ed-ikulen din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, endami niw is kebpekeuma zin .
Ne tembaki is menge zal-ug; ne emun nenlebilebi haazà is ibayà, ne petaǥa. Ne emun nengepekùpekù ne kinahanglan he tendanga, ne emun duen menge mibuketur ne kinahanglan he ebpenhayen.
Ne zutun ibpaahà te Megbevayà te tivuuk he menusiyà is edsuǥuen din he Menluluwas.'"

Ne zuen mezakel he menge etew he nemenhendiyà te ki Juan su ebpemebewtismu. Ne migkeǥiyan din sikandan te, "Iring te ulaula te uled is ulaula niw su teruen kew. Maan is edhendini kew? Kunaan niw vuwa ke ebpekeǥawas kew te silut te Megbevayà.

Emun tutuu he mid-iniyuǥan niw is memezaat he ulaula, ipeehè niw pinaaǥi te menge meupiya he vaal niw. Ne kenè niw iyan seriǥi is kevuwazan kew ni Abraham su wazà dutun pulus diyà te Megbevayà. Su egkeǥiyan ku sikiyu he emun iyan egkinehenglanen te Megbevayà, ne egkehimu he ebeelan din heini is menge vatu he kevuwazan ni Abraham.

Is ebpiley te kayu, migkayew en su ebpemilayen din en is minsan hengkey he kayu he kenà meupiya is beǥas din su wey mevinsuli, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is etew he kenà meupiya is ulaula zin, edsilutan sikandin te Megbevayà."
Ne haazà is menge etew, mid-insaan dan si Juan, ke sikandan te, "Hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan dey wey key mekelikey keniyan te egkeǥiyen nu?"

Ne midtavak ni Juan sikandan te, "Sikan is etew he zezuwa is kumbalè din, ne veǥayi zin sikan is wazè din kumbalà. Ne iring din ded daan sikan is etew he zuen din keenen, ne veǥayi zin sikan is wazà egkekaan," ke sikandin.
Ne zutun nekeuma is menge menunukut te vuhis su ebpebewtismu zaan sikandan. Ke sikandan te, "Menunudlù, hengkey is egkesuatan te Megbevayà he ed-ul-ulahan dey?"
Ne ke si Juan te, "Emun ebpenukut kew, kenè niw limbungi is menge etew te ibayad dan te vuhis. Iyan niw zà kuwaa ziyà te kandan is insuǥù keniyu te gubirnu."

Ne zutun duen menge sundaru he mid-insà diyà te ki Juan te, "Sikami, hengkey is ibpeulaula kenami te Megbevayà?" Ne midtavak si Juan te, "Engkezi niw is kebpelihendeka te menge etew wey is ked-uluǥi niw kandan te kewsa te kegkuwaa niw te selapì dan. Is sildu niw, metengkai en diyà te ǥehinawa niw."
Is menge etew zutun, hein nezineg dan haazà is kebpenurù ni Juan netenuzan dan is netagnà he hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà ne egkeisip dan he kela ke iyan si Juan.

Ne tenged kayi, migkaǥi si Juan diyà te kandan te langun te, "Duen ed-ilis kediey he utew lavew su minsan is kebpul-ut dà te menge sepatus din, kenè e pa zait he suluǥuen din. Wahig is ibewtismu ku keniyu," ke si Juan, "iyan, haazà is migkaǥi ku, ebewtismu zaan keniyu. Is edtuu, ne ebewtismuwan din te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Ne is kenà edtuu, ne iyan din ibewtismu kandan is hapuy.

Geina te ibpedsivayè din te edtapid is menge metazeng wey is menge lalung he etew, iring sikandin te ebpalid te parey he id-awè din is ukap dutun te parey. Ne haazà is parey ederengdengen, iyan, is ukap, edtutungen din diyà te hapuy he kenà egkeevukan," ke si Juan.

Ne sevaha he andew zutun hein neketapus is langun he menge etew he ebpemebewtismu, mibpebewtismu zaan si Jesus diyà te ki Juan. Ne zutun mid-ampù si Jesus ne te kemulu pa sikandin ed-ampù nepuwasan is langit ne midlugtanà diyà te kandin is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he henduen te merepatik. Ne nezineg dutun is Megbevayà he egkaǥi ziyà te langit he ke sikandin te, "Minahal ku sikew he Anak ku. Utew ku en sikew igkelipey." Utew pa mezakel is impenurù ni Juan dutun te menge etew su ibpesavut din kandan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Migkaǥi ni Juan diyà te menge etew he mezaat is ulaula ni Gubirnedur Hirudis su mid-aǥew zin is ipag din he si Hirudyas he esawa te hazi zin he si Felipe. Ne kenà iyan dà mezaat he ulaula ni Hirudis haazà is nekaǥi ni Juan su mezakel pa zutun is utew memezaat he vaal zin. Ne kenà dutun dà taman te memezaat he ulaula zin he mibeelan din, kekenà, impepirisu zin pa si Juan.
Ne hein menge ketluan en he tuig is penuiǥen ni Jesus ne mibpuunan din is ebpeveelan kandin te Megbevayà. Iyan diyà te isip te menge etew he anak sikandin ni Jose. Ne si Jose, anak ni Hili.
Ne si Hili, anak ni Matat; ne si Matat, anak ni Levi; ne si Levi, anak ni Milki; ne si Milki, anak ni Hani; ne si Hani, anak ni Jose.
Ne si Jose, anak ni Metatyas; ne si Metatyas, anak ni Amos; ne si Amos, anak ni Nahum; ne si Nahum, anak ni Isli; ne si Isli, anak ni Nagey.
Ne si Nagey, anak ni Maat; ne si Maat, anak ni Metatyas; ne si Metatyas, anak ni Simi; ne si Simi, anak ni Jose; ne si Jose, anak ni Huda.
Ne si Huda, anak ni Huwanan; ne si Huwanan, anak ni Risa; ne si Risa, anak ni Surubebil; ne si Surubebil, anak ni Selatil; ne si Selatil, anak ni Niri;
ne si Niri, anak ni Milki; ne si Milki, anak ni Adi; ne si Adi, anak ni Kusam; ne si Kusam, anak ni Ilmudam; ne si Ilmudam, anak ni Iyir;
ne si Iyir, anak ni Josue; ne si Josue, anak ni Eliezer; ne si Eliezer, anak ni Hurim; ne si Hurim, anak ni Matat; ne si Matat, anak ni Levi.
Ne si Levi, anak ni Simeon; ne si Simeon, anak ni Huda; ne si Huda, anak ni Jose; ne si Jose, anak ni Hunan; ne si Hunan, anak ni Iliyakim.
Ne si Iliyakim, anak ni Miliya; ne si Miliya, anak ni Meinan; ne si Meinan, anak ni Metata; ne si Metata, anak ni Natan; ne si Natan, anak ni David;
ne si David, anak ni Isai; ne si Isai, anak ni Ubid; ne si Ubid, anak ni Buus; ne si Buus, anak ni Salmun; ne si Salmun, anak ni Nasun.
Ne si Nasun, anak ni Eminadab; ne si Eminadab, anak ni Admin; ne si Admin, anak ni Arni; ne si Arni, anak ni Isrum; ne si Isrum, anak ni Piris; ne si Piris, anak ni Huda;
ne si Huda, ne anak ni Hakub; ne si Hakub, anak ni Isaak; ne si Isaak, anak ni Abraham; ne si Abraham, anak ni Tari; ne si Tari, anak ni Nakur.
Ne si Nakur, anak ni Siruk; ne si Siruk, anak ni Ragaw; ne si Ragaw, anak ni Pilig; ne si Pilig, anak ni Ibir; ne si Ibir, anak ni Sile;
ne si Sile, anak ni Keynan; ne si Keynan, anak ni Erpaksad; ne si Erpaksad, anak ni Sim; ne si Sim, anak ni Noe; ne si Noe, anak ni Lamik;
Ne si Lamik, anak ni Metusalin; ne si Metusalin, anak ni Inuk; ne si Inuk, anak ni Harid; ne si Harid, anak ni Meheleliyil; ne si Meheleliyil, anak ni Keynan;
ne si Keynan, anak ni Inus; ne si Inus, anak ni Sit; ne si Sit, anak ni Adan; ne si Adan, ne anak te Megbevayà.

Ne hein nebewtismuwan en si Jesus, mid-awà sikandin dutun te wahig he Hurdan. Nepurung sikandin meulini te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne mid-uwit sikandin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin pehendiyà te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew.

Ne zutun, seled te kepatan he andew, migezaman si Jesus ni Setanas ke ebpekesalè be. Ne te zutun he menge andew wazà minsan hengkey he nekaan ni Jesus, ne zutun te ikekepatan en he andew utew nevitil si Jesus.
Ne migkeǥiyan sikandin ni Setanas te, "Emun tutuu iyan he Anak ka te Megbevayà pengelinteuwi nu he mevaluy he egkeenen heini is menge vatu."
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Kenà iyan dà igkeuyag te menusiyà is egkeenen.'"
Ne zutun mid-uwit si Jesus ni Setanas diyà te utew metikang ne te sengeperè dà dutun impeehè din is langun he ǥinhedian dini te kelibutan.

Ne migkaǥi si Setanas te, "Is kebayàbayà kayi te langun he menge ǥinhedian wey is langun kayi he ketiǥeyunan, ibeǥey ku kenikew. Impeveyveyaan kediey heini is langun ne egkehimu he ibeǥey ku zaan diyà te minsan hentei he egkesuatan ku.
Langun kayi ne ibeǥey ku kenikew emun ed-azap ka kedì."

Ne zutun midtavak si Jesus te, "Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Iyan niw zà ezapa is Nengazen he Megbevayè niw. Ne is duma pa he ngazan he megbevayà, kenè niw tumana is suǥù din.'"

Ne zutun mid-uwit si Jesus ni Setanas diyà te inged he Hiruselim. Ne miduma zin diyà te utew metikang he limbuvungan te valey he egngezanan te Valey te Megbevayà. Ne migkeǥiyan din te, "Emun tutuu iyan he Anak ka te Megbevayà, umpak ka
su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Ebpetevangan ka te Megbevayà te menge velinsuǥuen din
ne edtemukan ke zan su wey kenà egkerudruzan is minsan paa nu te vatu.'"
Ne midtavak kandin si Jesus te, "Duen daan insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, 'Kenè kew mebaal te paaǥi he igezam niw te ǥehem te Nengazen he iyan Megbevayè niw.'"
Ne hein netuenan ni Setanas he kenè din bes egkepenulayan si Jesus, ne mid-ewaan din dè pa.

Ne zutun mid-ulì si Jesus diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya ne zekelà diyà te kandin is gehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Ne segugunà nekeeneb diyà te langun he menge inged dutun is tudtul mehitenged ki Jesus.
Ne nenurù sikandin diyà te menge simbahan te menge Hudiyu zutun te menge inged ne nemekezalig kandin is langun he menge etew.

Ne zutun midhendiyà si Jesus te Neserit, sikan is inged he zutun en sikandin medekelà. Ne zutun te andew he Sebadu he iyan Andew te Kedhimeley midseled si Jesus te simbahan su iyan betasan din. Ne midhitindeg su ebesahan din is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne induwal zan kandin is belesahan he menge surat ni Esaias, sikan is ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà. Mibekar zin haazà ne neehè din ne mibasa zin is insurat he edhenduen te,

"Mid-ulinan a te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he ebpuun te Megbevayà. Ne mibpilì a te Nengazen su wey ku ikepesavut te menge egkengeayuayu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne mibpeveyaan din kedì is menge etew wey ku sikandan metudtuli he egkengevelukasan is nengevihag ni Setanas, ne egkengeulian is nengelakap wey zan mekeahà ne egketevangan is egkengereǥenan.
Midsuǥù e zin daan wey ku metudtul he iyan heini tuig he ibpeehè din is gaǥew zin te menusiyà."
Ne zutun midlulun ni Jesus haazà is belesahan ne induwal zin diyà te miduwal kandin ne mibpinuu su ebpenurù. Ne is langun he menge etew zutun, midtengtengan dan sikandin su ebpemineg dan.
Ne ke sikandin te, "Heini is netagnà he insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he mibasa ku, ne netuman en guntaan dini te etuvangan niw."
Ne haazà is menge etew he nevurun dutun, nevenaran sikandan te menge penurù din, iyan, utew zan nengeinuinu su utew sikandin metau he edseysey. Ne ke sikandan te, "Kenè be anak heeyan ni Jose?"

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Siguradu ebpekekaǥi kedì is duma keniyu te erubasa he edhenduen te, 'Sikew is mememawì, hunai nu vewii is kenikew he lawa, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, emun tutuu ka he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà ne ipeehè nu is gehem nu zini te inged nu . Su nezineg dey is egkengein-inuwan he mibeelan nu ziyà te inged he Kepirnaum, ne beeli nu zaan kayi te keugelingen nu he inged.'
Iyan," ke si Jesus, "utew venar is egkeǥiyen he is ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, kenà sikandin ebpemineǥen te menge etew ziyà te keugelingen din he inged.

Tutuu heini is egkeǥiyen ku he iring heini is ulaula niw ǥuntaan te timpu zengan hein kaazen pa ni Elias he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà; wazà ipeuzan te Megbevayà dini seled te tetelu he tuig wey heenem he vulan, ne nesuǥat te zekelà he vitil is langun he menge inged dini te kenitew. Ne mezakel is menge zuma tew he Hudiyu he menge valu he vahi he nengereǥenan dutun te vitil.

Iyan, wazà minsan sevaha kandan he mibpeveyaan ki Elias te Megbevayà wey zin metevangi, kekenà, nasì sikandin suǥua te Megbevayà diyà te inged he Seripta ziyà te prubinsya he Sidun wey zin metevangi is balu he vahi zutun he kenà Hudiyu.

Ne iring din ded daan is sevaha he neulaula. Dengan te kaazen daan ni Elisio te sevaha zuen te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà, mezakel is menge Hudiyu he ebpen-it-iten. Ne wazà Hudiyu he mibewian ni Elisio, kekenà, iyan is etew he kenà Hudiyu he si Naaman he tigSirya," ke si Jesus.
Ne is menge etew zutun te simbahan, hein nezineg dan haazà is migkaǥi ni Jesus ne utew zan nengepauk.
Nemenhitindeg dan ne migewezan dan si Jesus ne mid-uwit dan pehendiyà te pangpang dutun te puntur te vuvungan he zutun benguna haazà is inged dan su ed-uluǥen dan pezem dutun si Jesus te pangpang.
Iyan, nenelektelek dà si Jesus diyà te kandan ne mid-awà sikandin dutun.
Ne midlaus si Jesus pehendiyà te Kepirnaum he inged he sakup te Geliliya. Ne zutun te Andew te Kedhimeley mibpenurù din is menge etew ziyà te simbahan.
Ne is menge etew, hein nezineg dan haazà is kebpenurù din, utew zan nengeinuinu su zekelà is gehem ni Jesus te kebpenurù.
Ne te kemulu pa ebpenurù si Jesus, duen maama zutun te simbahan he edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne hein neehè din si Jesus, mibensag sikandin is egkaǥi te,

"Sikew, Jesus he tigNeserit, hengkey is lavet nu kenami te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin? Kela ke iyan inhendini nu is edezeetan key kenikew. Egkekilala ku sikew; iyan ka sikan is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà!"

Ne zutun midawey ni Jesus haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin ne ke sikandin te, "Med-engked ka ne awè ka ziyan te kandin!" Ne zutun mibpengelinteuwan duen te mezaat he mulin-ulin he mekebadas diyà te tanà dutun te etuvangan te langun he menge etew haazà is edlelungen din. Ne mid-awà sikandin ne wazè din mekeizi haazà is etew he midlalung din.

Ne utew nengeinuinu is langun he menge etew zutun ne neked-iinseey zan is egkaǥi te, "Hendei ebpuun heini is gehem ni Jesus te kebayàbayà? Su utew mekeǥeǥehem is kedsuǥua zin te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he med-awè dan ne ebpemineg dan kandin!"
Ne zutun pinaaǥi kayi nekeeneb haazà is bentuǥan ni Jesus diyà te langun he menge inged he uvey zutun.

Ne te ked-awà ni Jesus dutun te simbahan, midhendiyà te valey ni Simon. Ne egkezeruwan dutun is enuǥang he vahi ni Simon ne utew meinit is lawa zin. Ne midhangyù dan ki Jesus he vewii zin haazà is bahi.
Ne mid-uvayan ni Jesus haazà, ne mibpengelinteuwan din he maawà haazà is dateng din. Ne zutundutun neulian haazà is bahi. Ne zutun mid-enew ne midsuba sikandin te ibpekaan din engki Jesus.

Ne hein edsanlep en is andew, is langun he menge etew he zuen duma zan he egkezeruwan, mibpen-uwit dan diyà te ki Jesus haazà is egkengezeruwan. Ne edempaan dà ni Jesus is kada egkezeruwan dutun ne egkeulian en.

Ne minsan sikan is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, impemaawè din dutun te menge etew he edlelungen dan. Nemekekulahì haazà is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he egkaǥi te, "Iyan ka iyan sikan is Anak te Megbevayà!" Iyan, impeengked sikandan ni Jesus su wazè din ituǥut he zuen egkeǥiyen dan su netuenan dan he iyan sikandin kes mibpilì te Megbevayà he hadì.

Ne hein egkepkepawè en mid-awà si Jesus dutun te inged ne midsiveysivey zutun te wazè din duma he etew. Iyan, mibpemengahà sikandin te menge etew, ne hein neturedu zan, midhangyù dan kandin he kenè pa sikandin med-awà dutun te inged dan.

Iyan, migkeǥiyan din sikandan te, "Is Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keaǥi te kedhadì te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he ibpenudtul ku ziyà te menge etew ziyà te menge zuma he inged su iyan heini insuǥua kediey te Megbevayà."
Ne zutun midlaus si Jesus ne midweliyan din is menge etew zutun te menge simbahan te menge Hudiyu ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya.
Sevaha he andew te ziyà si Jesus te veyvey te ranew he egngezanan te Giniserit, utew mezakel he menge etew is nengetipun su ebpememineg dan te Lalag te Megbevayà he ibpenurù din.
Ne naahà ni Jesus is dezuwa he avang diyà te veyvey he wazà dutun mid-untud su midrenà dutun is menge teǥiǥaked su edlumpiyuwan dan is menge laya zan.

Ne mid-untud si Jesus dutun te sevaha he avang he ǥaked ni Simon ne impehalin din ki Simon haazà is avang te malù ebpekeziyù dutun te veyvey. Ne mibpinuu si Jesus dutun te avang ne mibpenurù din is utew mezakel he menge etew.
Ne hein nekepasad si Jesus is ebpenurù, migkeǥiyan din si Simon te, "Begsaya niw heini is avang pehendutun te mezalem ne penlaya kew zutun ne ebpekeutel kew te menge pait."
Ne midtavak si Simon te, "Tivuuk he kezukileman is kebpenlaya zey ne wazè dey neutel he minsan sevaha, iyan, emun iyan heeyan lalag nu ne ed-uman key ebpenlaya."
Ne zutun mibpenlaya zan en maan ne hein mibuwat dan haazà is laya ne nevenbenaran sikandan te utew mezakel he menge pait he neutel su samè dà kenà mevindas haazà is laya te kegkepenù din.

Ne migkapey zan is menge zuma zan dutun te sevaha he avang wey zan mekeuǥup. Ne hein nekeuma haazà is menge zuma zan, impen-ahuk dan is pait dutun te zezuwa he avang ne samè dà kenà melavu haazà is menge avang tenged te utew nepenù.
Ne si Simon Pedro, hein neehè din is neulaula, nekeluhud diyà te ki Jesus is egkaǥi te, "Datù, deyzey ke ebpekeziyuan a kenikew su utew a mekesesalà."
Iyan ingkekeǥiya zin kayi su utew neherat is mata zin te nengeutel zan he pait. Ne henduen ded daan haazà is menge zuma zan.

Elin daan nengeinuinu zutun is menge anak ni Sibidiyu he si Santiago wey si Juan he menge zuma ni Simon te ebpenlaya. Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te ki Simon te, "Kenè ka mahandek. Menlelaya ka te pait, iyan, puun guntaan iyan ku ibpeveelan kenikew is kebpen-ahà te etew wey mehimu he menge sumusundan ku."
Ne zutun mid-uwit dan haazà is menge avang dan diyà te ǥeunan, ne mid-ewaan dan dutun is langun ne midsundan dan ki Jesus.

Ne sevaha he andew ne ziyà si Jesus te sevaha he inged ne neuma zin is etew he nepurung en meeneb te menge it-it. Haazà is it-iten, hein neehè din si Jesus, mid-uvey ziyà te kandin ne midluhud ne midungul diyà te etuvangan din is egkaǥi te, "Datù, emun meupiya zà te ǥehinawa nu ne egkeulian a kenikew kayi te utew meremerik he egezamen ku."
Ne zutun midampà sikandin ni Jesus te egkaǥi te, "Utew meupiya te ǥehinawa ku; meulii ka!" Ne segugunà nehanewhanew zutun te etew haazà is it-it din.

Ne zutun mibeleuzan sikandin ni Jesus te, "Kenè nu heini zè pa tudtula ziyà te minsan hentei he etew, kekenà, hendiyè ka ǥuntaan te memumuhat he midhimu te Megbevayà wey zin maahà he neulian ka. Ne iveǥey nu kandin is ibpemuhat wey nu metuman sikan is insuǥù dengan ni Moises su wey metueni te langun, he tutuu iyan he neulian ke en."

Iyan, minsan pa zutun, nekeeneb diyà te meziyù is bentuǥan ni Jesus ne tenged dutun utew mezakel he menge etew is ebpemenhendutun te kandin wey zan mezineg is kebpenurù din ne wey zaan meulii sikandan te menge zaru zan.
Iyan, duen menge timpu he ed-ewaan din haazà is mezakel he menge etew ne edhendiyà sikandin te tanà he wazà dutun duma zin he etew ne zutun ed-ampù diyà te Megbevayà.

Sevaha he andew he ebpenurù si Jesus, duen ebpemimpinuu he mezakel he menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he midtelavuk dutun. Diyà haazà ebpemuun te langun he menge inged he sakup te Geliliya wey sakup te Hudiya. Ne zuen daan duma zan dutun he ebpemuun te Hiruselim. Ne zutun te ki Jesus is gehem te Megbevayà su wey zin mevewii is menge etew.
Ne zutun nekeuma is menge etew he ed-uwit te etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa zin he impehizeǥà te zuyanà. Idseled dan pezem dutun te valey su wey zan ikesavuk diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus.

Ne ǥeina te nepurung mehasek is menge etew zutun te valey ne wazè dan ikevayà sikandin dutun. Diyè dan mebayà te atep ne mibudsiyan dan is atep he renged ni Jesus ne haazà is duyanà he zutun is etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa zin, midteyuntun dan dutun te teliwazà te menge etew he zutun si Jesus.
Ne hein nesavut ni Jesus he zekelà is kedsarig dan kandin, migkeǥiyan din heini is etew te, "Mama, nepesaylu en is menge salè nu."

Ne zutun, is menge Perisiyu wey is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan, neisip dan diyà te ǥehinawa zan is: "Hentei heini he etew is edsupak te Megbevayà? Megbevayà sikandin uvag su hentei is ebpekepesaylu te menge salà, kekenà, iyan dà is Megbevayà."
Ne nesavut ni Jesus is diyà te isip dan ne migkeǥiyan din sikandan te, "Maan is egkeisip niw is iring keniyan?
Hendei zapit is egkehimu te etew zà duen, iyan be is kebpesaylu te salà kayi te etew wey ke iyan is kegkeulii kayi te etew su wey mekeenew ne mekehipanew?

Pinaaǥi te kebewii ku ǥuntaan kayi te etew, ibpeehè ku keniyu he siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, duen ku keǥehem dini te lumpad te kebpesaylu te salà." Ne zutun migkeǥiyan din haazà is etew he minatey is divaluy he lawa, ke sikandin te, "Sikew, Mama, enew ka, ne kuwaa nu heeyan is duyanè nu ne ulì ka!"
Ne zutundutun mid-enew haazà is etew zutun te etuvangan dan te langun ne migkuwa zin haazà is impehizeǥaan kandin ne mid-ulì is edalig te Megbevayà.
Ne is langun he menge etew zutun ne nengeherat is mata zan, ne utew zan nengeinuinu ne midalig dan is Megbevayà, ne ke sikandan te, "Heini is neehè tew ǥuntaan, ne utew egkein-inuwi!"
Ne hein neipus haazà, ne mid-awà dutun si Jesus ne neehè din is sevaha he menunukut te vuhis he egngezanan ki Levi he ebpimpinuu ziyà te upisina zin. Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus te, "Mama, sunud ka kedì."
Ne zutun ne mid-ewaan ni Levi is minsan hengkey zutun ne midsunud ki Jesus.

Ne zutun midtukud te zekelà he keemuran si Levi ziyà te valey zin su zutun si Jesus. Ne mezakel is nemenelavuk dutun he menge menunukut te vuhis he menge zuma ni Levi, ne zuen daan menge zuma he menge etew he nemengaan duma kandan.

Ne zuen menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he nekeahà kayi te menge etew. Ne migkeǥiyan dan is menge sumusundan ni Jesus te, "Maan is egkaan kew wey ed-inum kew zuma te menge limbungan he menunukut te vuhis wey te menge mesinupaken?"
Ne iyan midtavak dutun si Jesus, ke sikandin te, "Sikan is wazè din daru, ne kenà egkinahanglan he ebewian, kekenà, iyan dà is duen din daru.
Siak, wazà a medhendini wey ku ikepeiniyug te ked-ulaula te mezaat is menge metazeng, kekenà, iyan is mesinupaken te Megbevayà."

Ne zuen menge etew he migkaǥi ziyà te ki Jesus te, "Is menge sumusundan ni Juan Megbebewtismu wey is menge sumusundan te menge Perisiyu, ne layun dan ed-ampù wey edsalang dan he egkaan su wey zan mepurungi is ked-azap dan te Megbevayà . Iyan, is kenikew he menge sumusundan, kenè dan mulà edsalang he egkaan, kekenà, kada andew egkaan dan wey ed-inum dan."
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, "Penenglitan, ke zuen eseweey, is menge zuma te ebpengesawa, kenà egkehimu he ibpesalang sikandan te kegkaan ke kemulu zan pa zuma haazà is ebpengesawa.
Ne zutun te timpu he ibpaawà diyà te kandan sikan is ebpengesawa, human dan edsalang egkaan, su egkeseeng dan."

Ne zutun insempità ni Jesus is kenà kebpeked-amur te veǥu he penurù din wey te zaan he tuluuwen te menge Hudiyu, ke sikandin te, "Wazà etew he ebindas te veǥu pa he kumbalà su idapi zin te kumbalà he tuǥak en. Su emun ebeelan din is iring kayi, ne nezezeetan din dà is beǥu, ne haazà is daan he kumbalà, kenà ed-engayan te veǥu he indapi zutun.

Ne iring din ded daan," ke si Jesus, "is binu he sikan pa ebeeli he idtaǥù diyà te teleǥuey he lundis te kambing. Kenà egkehimu he ziyà idtaǥù te zaan he teleǥuey su ebetu is teleǥuey ne egkeulaan haazà is binu ne egkezeetan daan is teleǥuey.
Kinahanglan he sikan is binu he sikan pa ebeeli, diyà idtaǥù te veǥu en he teleǥuey.
Ne sikan is etew he nekeinum te zaan he vinu, kenè en sikandin ed-inum duen te vinu he sikan pa ebeeli su ke sikandin te, 'Iyan meupiya is daan he vinu.'"
Ne zutun te sevaha he andew he Sebadu, ingkevayà eni Jesus is pemuleey. Ne mibpengetu haazà is menge sumusundan din te menge trigu ne mibpengusu zan haazà ne mibpengaan dan is menge veǥas dutun.
Ne zutun duen menge Perisiyu he migkaǥi te, "Maan is edsupaken niw is insuǥù kenitew te Megbevayà he wazà ibpevaal emun Andew te Kedhimeley?"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Kenà egkehimu he wazè niw mevasa ziyà te ingkesurat dengan kes mid-ulaula ni Hadì David. Sikandin wey is menge sundaru zin ne nengevitil sikandan.

Ne wazà sikandin mekesalà minsan midseled diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà ne migkaan din is egkeenen he insavuk diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà ne impekaan din daan dutun is menge zuma zin. Supak te kesuǥuan is kegkeena zan dutun su iyan dà ebpekekaan dutun he egkeenen is menge memumuhat."
Ne impelaus ni Jesus haazà is lalag din, ke sikandin te, "Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan a zuen keǥehem te egkaǥi ke hengkey is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan te etew emun Andew te Kedhimeley."
Ne sevaha pa zutun he andew he Sebadu, midseled si Jesus duen te simbahan te menge Hudiyu ne nenurù sikandin. Ne zuen dutun etew he minatey is menge uǥat te kewanan he velad din.

Ne zuen dutun menge etew he Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Ne mibentayan dan si Jesus su ed-ehaan dan ke ebewian din be haazà is etew zutun te andew su Andew te Kedhimeley. Iyan ibpurungi zan ibentayi ki Jesus su wey zan mekeahà te paaǥi te kedsumbunga zan kandin he midsupak din is Andew te Kedhimeley.

Ne si Jesus, netuenan din ke hengkey is netaǥù diyà te isip dan ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is etew he nezeetan is belad din te, "Mama, hitindeg ka ne uvey ka zini." Ne midhitindeg haazà is etew ne mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus.

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù, ke sikandin te, "Hengkey is isip niw? Hendei zapit is intuǥut kenitew zuen te kesuǥuan tew he ed-ul-ulahan tew kayi te Andew te Kedhimeley? Iyan be is kedtavang te etew he edlised wey ke ebpesipelahan be is etew? Iyan be is kedtavang te etew su wey kenà mebpatey wey ke edhimetayan be?"

Ne mibpenlangulangu si Jesus dutun te langun he menge etew ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is etew he nezeetan is belad din te, "Ketenga nu, Mama, is belad nu." Ne migketeng dutun te etew is belad din ne segugunà neulii.
Ne zutun, ne utew nengepauk haazà is menge Perisiyu wey haazà is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan ne mibpelelelaǥè dan ke hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan dan ki Jesus.
Ne sevaha he andew zutun midhendiyà si Jesus te vuvungan su ed-ampù diyà te Megbevayà. Ne mid-ampù sikandin dutun te tivuuk he kezukileman.
Ne hein nepawà dutun ne miburun din is menge sumusundan din ne mibpilì din dutun is sepulù wey zezuwa ne migeraran din haazà he menge epustul.
Is menge etew he nengepilì din dutun iyan ensi Simon he sikan is migeraran din ki Pedro, wey sikan is hazi ni Simon he si Andres, si Santiago wey si Juan, si Felipe wey si Bartolome,
si Mateo wey si Tomas, si Santiago he anak ni Alpiyu wey sevaha he etew he egngezanan ded daan ki Simon he nevantug tenged te utew mezesen sikandin he edtuman te imbilinbilin he kesuǥuan,
ne elin daan si Hudas he anak te sevaha he etew he egngezanan daan ki Santiago wey is sevaha pa he egngezanan ki Hudas he tigKeriyuti. Heini he Hudas, iyan kes mid-akal ki Jesus.

Ne hein neipus ni Jesus is kebpilia zin kandan midtupang sikandin duma haazà is nengepilì din. Midteren dan dutun te patag ne nengevurun dutun is mezakel he menge sumusundan din wey is medmezakel he menge etew he ebpemuun diyà te menge inged he sakup te Hudiya wey ziyà te inged he Hiruselim. Ne zuen daan menge etew he ziyà ebpemuun te menge inged he Tiru wey Sidun he ziyà te veyvey te zaǥat. Iyan tuyù dutun te menge etew is ebpemineg dan te kebpenurù ni Jesus wey ebpemevawì daan sikandan kandin te menge zaru zan.
Ne mibewian din is langun he menge etew he ebpenlelungen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin zutun ne nengeulian sikandan.
Ne mezakel zutun te menge etew is egkesuat he egawed diyà te ki Jesus, su zuen gehem he ebpuun diyà te kandin ne pinaaǥi zutun egkengeulian is langun te sikandan.
Ne mibpenlangulangu si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din ne migkaǥi sikandin te, "Utew kew zeyzey is menge ayuayu su iyan kew en edhedian te Megbevayà!
Utew kew zeyzey is egkengevitil ǥuntaan su ebpekehentayen kew keuzemà te Megbevayà! Utew kew zeyzey is egkengeseeng guntaan su egkengelipey kew keuzemà.

Utew kew zeyzey emun egkuntedahan kew te menge etew ne kenè kew zan edewaten he zuma zan, ne ebpeel-elezan kew zan, ne egkeǥiyen kew zan he memezaat is ulaula niw tenged te midsundan kew kedì te Kakey te Menusiyà. Iyan heini kes mid-ulaula zengan te menge kepuun dan diyà te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà. Medlipey kew utew emun egkehitavù heini ziyan te keniyu su utew zekelà is suhul keniyu te Megbevayà he ebpeebuten niw ziyà te langit.
Iyan, kehizu niw te menge sepian guntaan su emun egkehanew is menge ketiǥeyunan niw wazè en duma pa he igkelipey niw keuzemà.
Kehizu niw te layun egkengehantey ǥuntaan su zuen timpu keuzemà he egkengevitil kew! Kehizu niw te egkengelipey ǥuntaan su zuen timpu keuzemà he utew kew egkengeseeng.

Kehizu niw te edtehuzen guntaan te langun he menge etew su iyan heeyan mid-ulaula zengan te menge kepuun dan diyà te menge kenà tutuu he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà. Umba edtehuzen kew te menge etew su iring kew zutun te menge kenà tutuu he ebpeneuven ne edsilutan kew zaan te Megbevayà.
Iyan egkeǥiyen ku keniyu te menge sumusundan ku he ebpemineg kediey ǥuntaan is: kinahanglan he kenà mezaat is gehinawa niw ziyà te menge kuntada niw, kekenà, purungi niw is egkengeepes keniyu.
Penubtuvazi niw te meupiya is ebpenrawak keniyu. Iampù te Megbevayà is ebpesipala keniyu.

Emun duen etew he edtebpien din is enaping nu, ne keǥiyi nu he egkehimu pa ke elin din edtebpien is divaluy. Ne emun duen etew he edluwasen din is kumbalè nu ne keǥiyi nu te egkehimu pa ke elin din egkuwaan is kemising nu.
Emun duen ebuyù diyà te kenikew, iveǥey nu ziyà te kandin is ebuyuen din, ne emun duen etew he ed-eǥawen din is menge azen nu ne kenè nu hewia.
Is meupiya he egkesuatan nu he ed-ul-ulahan te zuma ziyà te kenikew, ne iyan nu ul-ulaha ziyà te kandan.

Kenè nu isipa he edsuhulan ka te Megbevayà emun iyan nu zà igkesuat is menge etew he igkesuat ke zan daan su minsan is menge mesinupaken he etew, ne igkesuat dan daan is menge etew he egkesuat kandan.
Ne ke iyan nu zà ebpurungan is menge etew he ebpurungan ke zan daan, kenè nu isipa he edsuhulan ka te Megbevayà su minsan is menge mesinupaken he etew, ne ebpurungan dan daan is ebpurung kandan.

Ne emun iyan nu zà ibpeutang is etew he netuenan nu he ebpekevayad te ibpeutang nu kandin, kenè nu isipa he edsuhulan ka te Megbevayà su minsan is menge mesinupaken he etew, ibpeutang dan is menge zuma zan he mesinupaken emun egketuenan dan he ebpekevayad dutun te ibpeutang.

Iyan penurù ku keniyu is: kenà imezaat te ǥehinawa niw is menge kuntada niw, kekenà, meupiya is ul-ulaha niw ziyà te kandan. Ke zuen etew he ed-utang keniyu, kenè niw itaǥù diyà te ǥehinawa niw he kinahanglan he beyazi kew zin. Emun edtumanen niw heini, igkepeehè niw he menge anak kew te utew lavew he Megbevayà. Ne utew zekelà is suhul zin keniyu su minsan is menge etew he memezaat is ulaula wey is menge kenà ebpeselamat kandin, egkehizuwan din sikandan gihapun.
Iring te nehizu kenitew is Amey tew he Megbevayà, mehizu kew zaan te zuma niw.

Kenè kew medsawey te zuma niw ne kenè kew zaan edsewayen te Megbevayà. Is duma niw he nekesalà, kenè niw keǥiya he meupiya ke edsilutan su wey kenè kew mesiluti te Megbevayà. Mebmepeseyluwen kew te zuma niw ne ebpeseyluwen kew te Megbevayà te menge salè niw.

Mebeǥey kew ziyà te menge zuma niw ne is Megbevayà, ebeǥayan kew zin daan. Is kezekelà te ibeǥey niw ne iyan daan kezekelà te ibeǥey keniyu te Megbevayà. Ne is ibeǥey zin keniyu, ne utew subra su henduen te utew edhesheseka wey utew ebpenpenua ne egkepeuluwan pa."
Ne impezineg ni Jesus is sempità, ke sikandin te, "Is etew he lakap, kenà egkehimu he ed-aǥak te sengelelakap daan, su pudu zan is dezuwa, egkeulug diyà te vitu.
Is ebpepenurù, kenè din isipa he lavew sikandin he edtehuzen kenà te ebpenurù kandin. Ne emun wazè en igkepenurù kandin te ebpenurù, human ebpekedrepeng sikandan is ebpepenurù wey is ebpenurù."

Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Sikew is layun edsawey te zuma nu, maan is edsawey ka te salà te zuma nu he iring dà te pesek he nekeahuk te mata zin. Ne sikew, duen nu salà he iring kezekelà te vatang he nekevuta te mata nu ne ebpesegdanen nu?

Ne egkeǥiyan nu pa sikandin he id-awè nu haazà is nekepesek kandin, iyan, nepesek mulà is kenikew he mata te vatang he ebpesegdanen nu! Utew tarù is ulaula nu! Ihuna nu iawà is batang he nekepesek kenikew ne human ka ebpekeahà. Ne zutun melemu nu zà igkeawà haazà is nekepesek te zuma nu."
Ne ke si Jesus en maan te, "Is kayu he wazè din erat, meupiya is beǥas din ne kenà ebpemeǥas te mezaat. Is kayu he zuen din erat, mezaat is beǥas din ne kenà ebpemeǥas te meupiya.
Egketuusan is kada kayu pinaaǥi te veǥas din, su is banag ne kenà ebpemeǥas te paras ne is seǥà ne kenà ebeǥas te igira.

Ne iring din ded daan te etew," ke si Jesus, "su emun meupiya is ulaula zin he etew, memeupiya zaan is nemeketaǥù diyà te ǥehinawa zin; meupiya zaan is kebpemèbè din. Iyan, ke mezaat is ulaula zin he etew, memezaat daan is nemeketaǥù diyà te ǥehinawa zin, ne mezaat daan is kebpemèbè din. Su is egketaǥù te ǥehinawa te etew, iyan daan egkekaǥi zin."
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Maan is egkeǥiyen niw he iyan a egalen niw, iyan, kenè niw edtumanen is menge sambag ku keniyu.
Is minsan hentei he sumusundan ku he nekezineg te menge sambag ku ne ebpezumdumahan din, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he

iring sikandin te etew he ebevaley te melig-en diyà te zivavew te zekelà he vatu. Memezalem is bangbang din he mibpesekan din te tukud. Ne nepasad haazà is baley ne mibagyu ne midalem is wahig ne nesuǥat haazà is baley te meseleg he wahig, iyan, wazà merundus su neviǥeran man.

Ne is etew he ebpemineg dà te menge sambag ku, iyan, kenè din ebpezumdumahan, ne iring sikandin te etew he ebevaley ziyà te pantad. Ne hein nepasad din haazà is baley zin ne mibagyu ne nesuǥat haazà is baley zin te utew meseleg he wahig ne nerundus haazà is baley he nepurung mewaǥey."
Ne hein nekeipus dutun si Jesus he ebpenurù te menge etew ne midhendiyà sikandin te inged he Kepirnaum.
Ne zuen dutun etew he kenà Hudiyu he kepitan te nenggatus he sundaru he zuen din suluǥuen he maama he utew zin minahal. Ne heini is suluǥuen ne egketigbak is egkezeruwan su edluwàluwè en te ǥehinawa.

Ne hein neventuǥan haazà is egalen din mehitenged ki Jesus, midsuǥù din is pira he vuuk te ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu wey zan mehengyui si Jesus he medhendutun su wey zin mevewii haazà is suluǥuen dutun te kepitan.
Ne mibeyaan dutun te menge ebmeǥurangen si Jesus ne midhangyù dan kandin, ke sikandan te, "Engayan he tevangi nu sikandin
su sikitew is menge Hudiyu, ne mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin; mibpehitindeg sikandin te sevaha he simbahan tew."

Ne zutun miduma si Jesus kandan ne hein ebpelingguma zan en dutun te valey te egalen te menge sundaru ne impesinuǥung din ensi Jesus te menge zuma zin wey zan mekaǥi ziyà te ki Jesus is lalag din he edhenduen te, "Datù, kenè nu en semuka is gehinawa nu te kedhendini te valey ku su kenà a zait he ebigatbigat kenikew he medhendini ke pa maan.
Su utew zekelà is pid-etawan nu ne minsan is kedsinuǥung ku kenikew, ne kenà a zait. Utew ka mekeǥeǥehem ne minsan ke egkaǥi ke zà te, 'Meulii sikandin,' ne egkeulian en is suluǥuen ku.

Netuenan ku heini su iring te zuen ebayàbayà kedì ne zuen daan menge sundaru he ebeyveyaan ku. Ne edsuǥuen ku is sevaha he medhipanew ne edhipanew en. Ne edtewaǥen ku is sevaha pa he medhendini ne edhendini en. Ne edsuǥuen ku zaan is suluǥuen ku ke zuen ebpeveelan ku ne ebeelan din. Ne iring din ded daan diyan te kenikew su is egkeǥiyen nu ne egkehimu en."

Ne te nezineg ni Jesus heini, ne utew neinuinu. Ne midlingì ne migkaǥi ziyà te mezakel he menge etew he nemenduma kandin te, "Wazè ku pa meuma is etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil he iring kayi he utew mezesen is kedtuu zin!"
Ne mid-ulì haazà is menge midsuǥù dutun te egalen te menge sundaru ne hein nekeuma zan diyà te valey, neulian en haazà is suluǥuen te kepitan.
Ne nepiraan pa maan dutun midhendiyà si Jesus te inged he egngezanan te Nain. Ne utew mezakel is menge etew he nemenduma kandin ragkes te menge sumusundan din.

Ne hein ebpekeuma zan en dutun te idselang dutun te inged ne nesinuǥung dan is menge etew he ebpuun dutun te inged he edlanting te minatey su idleveng dan. Maama haazà is minatey he iyan dà anak dutun te meritan he valu. Mezakel is menge etew zutun te inged he miduma zutun te vahi he eduma te edleveng.
Ne is Nengazen he si Jesus, hein neehè din haazà is bahi he edsineǥew ne midtavang is gehinawa zin ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is bahi te, "Ayà, kenè ka sineǥew."
Ne mibeyaan din is edlentingen ne migewezan din. Ne nemeketeren haazà is edlanting dutun te minatey ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is edlentingen te, "Mama, enew ka!"
Ne zutundutun mid-enew haazà is minatey ne mibpekidlalag kandan. Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is iney zutun te nevanhew he kuwaa zin en haazà is anak din.

Ne is langun he nemekeahà dutun, ne utew zan nengehandek ne nezalig dan is Megbevayà, ke sikandan te, "Heini en te kenitew is utew lavew he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà!" Ne ke sikandan daan te, "Mibulus en is Megbevayà su wey kiw melibri is menge nengepilì din he etew!"
Ne haazà is tudtul te mid-ulaula ni Jesus, ne segugunà nekeeneb diyà te tivuuk he menge inged te prubinsya he Hudiya wey ziyà te zuma pa he menge inged he nekepeǥilid dutun.
Ne hein nezineg te menge sumusundan ni Juan Megbebewtismu is tudtul mehitenged kayi te langun, midtudtulan dan si Juan.

Ne zutun midtawag ni Juan is dezuwa te menge sumusundan din ne midsuǥù din diyà te ki Jesus. Iyan insuǥua zin dutun su ibpeinsè din ke iyan en be iyan si Jesus sikan is netagnà dengan is kebpekeuma zin dini te kelibutan he impesavut ni Juan wey ke zuen pe be ebpeebuten he liyu ki Jesus.

Ne hein nekeuma zan diyà te ki Jesus migkaǥi zan te, "Iyan impekehendini zey te kenikew su midsuǥù key ni Juan Megbebewtismu su ibpeinsè din ke iyan ke en be iyan kes impesavut din he ibpehendini te Megbevayà wey ke zuen pe be ebpeebuten liyu kenikew?"

Ne zutun he andew, mezakel is menge etew he nengeulian ni Jesus te menge zaru wey ebpenggezamen dan. Impemeǥuwè din dutun te menge etew is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpenlalung kandan ne midhimu zin he mekeahà is mezakel he menge lakap.

Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is menge suǥù ni Juan te, "Likù kew en diyà te ki Juan ne tudtula niw ziyà te kandin is nengeehè niw he mid-ulaula ku wey ke hengkey is nezineg niw he migkaǥi ku. Iyan niw tudtula kandin he tenged kedì ne ebpemekeehè en is menge lakap ne ebpemekehipanew en is menge piang; nengeulian en is menge it-iten wey ebpemekezineg en is menge vengel. Mibanhew ku is nemematey wey impesavut ku ziyà te menge egkengeayuayu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
Utew zeyzey is etew he kenà eduwazuwa he iyan a sikan is midsuǥù te Megbevayà."

Ne hein migenat en haazà is menge suǥù ni Juan ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te mezakel he nengetiǥum he menge etew, ke sikandin te, "Hein midhilesung niw si Juan diyà te tanà he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew, hengkey is inhilesunga niw kandin? Iyan be ed-ahaan niw is etew he iring te sagbet he egkewaleng te keramag? Kenà iyan haazà su kenà egkehalinhalin is gehinawa ni Juan .
Midhilesung niw ve is etew he utew meupiya is bisti zin? Kenà daan, su is menge etew he memeupiya is bisti wey utew meupiya is kebpekesavuk, ne ziyè dà egkeahà te turuǥan te hadì.
Ne hengkey is inhilesunga niw? Ed-ehè kew ve te etew he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà? Iyan haazà tutuu he ed-ahaan niw su ebpeneuven iyan si Juan. Iyan, kenà te ebpeneuven dà

su iyan daan si Juan sikan is kegketuman te netagnà he insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà su migkaǥi zutun is Megbevayà te, 'Duen etew he edsuǥuen ku. Ibpehuna ku sikandin kenikew wey zin mehiǥewani is ibayè nu.'" Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te,

"Tentenuzi niw he si Juan Megbebewtismu, wazà minsan hentei he etew te minsan keenu he timpu he nekelavew kandin, iyan, ke edhadì keuzemà is Megbevayà, is minsan hentei he etew zutun he edhedian te Megbevayà, minsan utew minus is pid-etawan din, lavew pa sikandin kenà si Juan guntaan."

Ne hein nezineg heini is menge penurù ni Jesus te langun he menge etew zutun wey te menge mesinupaken he menge menunukut te vuhis, migkaǥi zan he utew hustu is menge ulaula te Megbevayà. Umba migkaǥi zan heini su iyan si Juan kes mibpemewtismu kandan.
Iyan, is menge Perisiyu wey is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan te menge Hudiyu, wazè dan mulà pezumdumahi is egkesuatan te Megbevayà he ibpeulaula kandan ne wazè dan daan mebpebewtismu ki Juan.
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, iyan ebpetug-iringan ku keniyu is menge vatà.

Su is menge vatà, ne ebpememimpinuu ziyà te tiyenggiyan is ebevaleyvaley. Ne ebpeum-umawà sikandan is egkaǥi te, 'Edtemburan dey sikiyu ne kenè kew edsayew, ne edlelendag key ne kenè kew zaan edtampu.'
Ne hein neehè niw si Juan Megbebewtismu, is edsalang egkaan, ne kenà daan ed-inum te vinu ne migkaǥi niw he midsuukan sikandin te mezaat he mulin-ulin.

Ne siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, wazà a medsalang megkaan ne mid-inum a mulà te vinu ne nengeinuinu kew ne migkaǥi niw he vuleǥuk a wey pereinum te vinu. Ne ke sikiyu te emiǥu a te menge lalung he etew iring te menunukut te vuhis wey menge mesinupaken.
Iyan," ke si Jesus, "pinaaǥi te menge ulaula te menge etew he tutuu is kedsarig dan te Megbevayà egketuusan ta he utew metau sikandin."
Ne zuen dutun Perisiyu he mid-umbita zin si Jesus he ibpekaan diyà te valey zin. Ne midhendiyà si Jesus. Ne hein nekeuma en si Jesus dutun, ne mibpinuu is egkaan.

Ne zutun he inged duen bahi he mezaat is dengeg din. Ne hein netuenan kayi te vahi he zutun egkaan si Jesus te valey te Perisiyu, midhendutun sikandin is ed-uwit te meputì he pelenahan he vatu he elebastru he midteǥuan te mehemut he agwa he mahal utew.

Ne mid-uvayan din si Jesus ne midluhud diyà te uvey te paa zin ne mibpeniǥis is luhè din ne nengeulug diyà te paa ni Jesus. Ne mibpunasan din te vulvul zin ne midhezekan din. Ne zutun mibusbusan din haazà is paa ni Jesus duen te agwa he utew mehemut.

Ne naahà heini zutun te Perisiyu he mid-umbita ki Jesus, ne neisip din is, "Angin ke tutuu he ebpeneuven heini te Megbevayà ne kenà ebpekeeles kandin is meremerik he ulaula kayi te vahi ne wazè din pezem ituǥut he meǥewezi is lawa zin kayi te vahi."
Ne zutun impezineg ni Jesus dutun te Perisiyu heini is lalag, ke sikandin te, "He Simon, duen egkeǥiyen ku kenikew." Ne ke si Simon te, "Hengkey?"

Ne ke si Jesus te, "Iyan heini is sempità. Dengan duen sevaha he etew he ebpeutang te selapì. Ne zuen dutun dezuwa he etew he nekeutang diyà te kandin. Is sevaha, ne lelima he ǥatus is neutang din ne is sevaha, ne kelimahan dà is kandin he neutang.

Ne hein kenà ebpekevayad haazà is dezuwa he utangan, ne migkaǥi haazà is neutangan dan he kenè dan en beyazi haazà is utang dan." Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Hendei zapit dutun te zezuwa he etew he nekeutang is lavew he utew mahal diyà te ǥehinawa zin haazà is neutangan dan?"

Ne ke si Simon te, "Iyan buwa lavew he utew zekelà is gehinawa zin te etew he neutangan dan sikan is dekelà is utang din he wazè en peveyazi kandin." Ne ke si Jesus te, "Benar, su iyan sikandin utew lavew he zekelà is gehinawa zin dutun te etew he neutangan dan."

Ne midsinaru si Jesus dutun te vahi ne migkeǥiyan din si Simon te, "Sikan is sempitè ku, ne iring kayi te vahi. Su mibpemenahik a zini te valey nu, iyan, minsan pa te iyan betasan tew is ebeǥey ki te ibpepenlùlù te paa te meǥeliyug ta ne wazà a kenikew veǥayi. Ne heini is bahi mulà, midlùlùan din is menge paa ku te menge luhè din ne midterepuwan din te menge vulvul zin.

Ne minsan te iyan betasan tew te kegalewǥalew is kedhezeki ta te meǥeliyug ta, ne wazà midhazek kedì te kebpekeuma ku. Ne heini is bahi, puun pa te kebpekeuma ku midtulungan din hezeki is menge paa ku.
Ne wazè nu zaan itisi is ulu ku te lana, iyan, heini is bahi, mahal he mehemut he agwa is imbusbus din dini te menge paa ku!

Umba migkaǥi ku heini kenikew su egketuusan ta kayi te vahi he mezakel is menge ulaula zin he mezaat he nengepesaylu en te Megbevayà su utew a mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin. Ne ke zuen etew he zeisek dà is menge ulaula zin he mezaat he nepesaylu te Megbevayà, wazè din utew ǥehinawa te Megbevayà."
Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is bahi te, "Bayi, nepesaylu en te Megbevayà is menge salè nu."
Ne is menge etew zutun he egkaan duma ki Jesus, neisip dan is, "Hentei heini etawa he minsan is menge salà, ne ebpeseyluwen din en?"
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus dutun te vahi, ke sikandin te, "Na, ulì ke en, Bayi, ne mebmelinawen en is kebpekesavuk nu. Nelibri ke en te silut tenged te midsarig ka te Megbevayà."

Nepipira pa zutun he andew ne mibeyaan ni Jesus is mezakel he menge inged, dekelà wey se zeisek, ne impesavut din te menge etew zutun is Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te kedhedii te Megbevayà te menusiyà. Ne sikan is sepulù wey zezuwa he sumusundan din, miduma zan daan kandin.

Ne zuen daan menge vahi zutun he eduzumazuma kandin. Ne heini he menge vahi, neulian din dengan te menge zaru wey is duma kandan ne mibpeǥuwaan din te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he edlalung kandan. Is sevaha zutun te menge vahi ne si Maria Megdelina, sikan is mibpeǥuwaan ni Jesus te pitu he menge mezaat he mulin-ulin.

Ne elin daan dutun te menge vahi si Juana he esawa ni Kusa. Si Kusa, ne sineriǥan ni Hadì Hirudis. Ne zutun daan si Susana wey mezakel pa he menge zuma he vahi he nemenduma su midtevangan dan ensi Jesus pinaaǥi te menge ketiǥeyunan dan.

Ne zutun he timpu layun duen menge etew he egkengetiǥum diyà te ki Jesus he ebpemuun diyà te langun he menge inged. Ne hein nengetiǥum is utew mezakel he menge etew impezineg kandan ni Jesus is sempità, ke sikandin te,
"Duen etew he midhendiyà te pemuleey zin su ebpemula. Ne haazà is benì din, duen dutun nengeulug diyà te zalan ne nengeǥiekan te etew ne migkaan te menge tagbis.
Ne zuen daan benì din he nengeulug he nemekeuntud diyà te menipis he tana he nekeapid te vatu ne midtuvù haazà, iyan, petuluy zà neǥangu su nemezahan haazà is tanà.

Ne zuen daan dutun benì din he nengeulug diyà te tanà he menge zuǥiyen is menge sagbet dutun. Ne hein mibmelayat haazà is menge pinemula, mibmelayat daan haazà is menge sagbet ne mibpengulembezan dan haazà is pinemula.
Ne zuen daan benì din he ziyà mengeulug te meupiya he tanà ne midtuvù ne mibpemeǥas mebpurung te tignenggatus." Ne ke si Jesus te, "Sevuta niw heini is nezineg niw."
Is menge sumusundan ni Jesus, in-insè dan ke hengkey is kehuluǥan dutun te sempità.

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Sikan is in-eles dengan mehitenged te kedhadì te Megbevayà, ibpesavut ku en keniyu te menge sumusundan ku, iyan, is menge zuma he menge etew he kenè dan edsundan kedì, ibpenurù ku kandan pinaaǥi te menge sempità su wey minsan edtengteng dan, kenè dan ebpekeahà ne minsan ebpemineg dan ne kenè dan ebpekesavut."
Ne ke si Jesus te, "Ibpesavut ku keniyu is kehuluǥan kayi te sempità. Haazà is benì, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà.

Ne haazà is benì he ziyà mengeulug te zalan, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he nezineg te menge etew ne zutun ebpekeuma si Setanas ne edhimuwen din he egkelipatan dan haazà is lalag he nezineg dan su wey kenè dan meketuu ne kenà melibri te silut.

Ne haazà is benì he ziyà mengeulug te menipis he tanà he zivavew te vatu, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he is nemekezineg duen, ne utew zan egkesuati te ebpemineg ne edtuuwan dan. Iyan, kenà egkeheǥet is kedtuu zan ne kenè en utew egkeuǥet dutun emun egezaman ni Setanas is kedtuu zan, ne edlikù dan diyà te zaan he ulaula zan.

Ne haazà is benì he ziyà mengeulug te tanà he zuǥiyen is menge sagbet dutun, ne iyan is Lalag te Megbevayà he nezineg te menge etew, iyan, tenged te menge seeng dan wey is suat dan te selapì, wey is menge kelipey he kayi te kelibutan, egkelipatan dan is nezineg dan ne kenà ebpulus diyà te kandan is Lalag te Megbevayà.

Ne haazà is benì he ziyà mengeulug te meupiya he tanà, ne iyan egkeǥiyen dutun is Lalag te Megbevayà he nezineg te menge etew ne midawat dan, ne midtuman dan haazà, ne mibpeniguduwan dan te edtuman taman te mibpulus te zekelà is Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te kandan."

Ne zuen pa sempità he migkaǥi ni Jesus, ke sikandin te, "Is etew he edtemtem te sulù, ne kenà egkehimu he ebpelengkevan din te revan wey ke idsihung din be te vangkù he hizeǥaan su idsavuk din diyà te selevukà. Ne emun duen etew he edseled ne egketeyawan."

Ne ke si Jesus maan te, "Ne iring din ded daan is minsan hengkey he in-eles guntaan su ibpeǥawaǥawa zed keuzemà, ne is minsan hengkey he penurù ku he kenè niw egkesavut guntaan, ne egkesavut niw zed keuzemà.

Umba, purungi niw te ebpemineg is ibpenurù ku su is etew he edewaten din is ibpesavut kandin te Megbevayà, ed-umanan pa te Megbevayà is kedsavut din, iyan, is etew he kenè din edewaten is ibpesavut te Megbevayà, id-awà diyà te kandin haazà is kunaan din ke nesavut din en."
Is iney ni Jesus wey is menge hazi zin, ne edhendiyè dan te kandin, iyan, wazè dan meuvayi su nepurung en sikandin melingut te mezakel he etew.
Ne zuen etew zutun he midtazem ki Jesus, ke sikandin te, "Keniyà te ǥawas is iney nu wey is menge hazi nu ne ebpengahaan ke zan."

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge etew zutun te, "Duen ku pa iney wey menge hazi su is langun he ebpemineǥen dan is Lalag te Megbevayà ne ebpezumdumahan dan, iyan daan sikandan iney ku wey menge suled ku."
Sengeandew zutun ne mid-untud si Jesus wey is menge sumusundan din te avang. Ne ke sikandin te, "Kuwa kew en su edlayun kiw ziyà layun." Ne zutun migenat dan is ed-aavang.
Ne zutun te ked-aavang dan ne nekelipezeng si Jesus. Ne nesuǥat haazà is ranew te mevendes he keramag ne egketeǥuan en te wahig haazà is avang dan ne amaama zan kenà melavu.

Ne mid-uvayan dan si Jesus ne mibpukew zan, ke sikandan te, "He Zatù, egkengeǥerè kiw en!" Ne nepukew zutun si Jesus ne mid-enew ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is keramag wey haazà is menge zekelà he vaǥel he mebpeeneng-eneng dan, ne zutun ne mibmelinew utew haazà is ranew.

Ne migkaǥi dutun si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, "Maan is wazè niw kedsarig kediey?" Ne utew zan nengeinuinu wey nengehandek. Ne zutun neked-iinseey sikandan te, "Hentei heini vuwa he etew? Maan is minsan keramag wey vaǥel ne ebpemineg te lalag din?"
Ne zutun midlaus dan is ed-aavang taman te nekezunggù dan diyà te tanà he iyan ed-ubpaan te menge etew he Geresinen he ziyà te zehipag te prubinsya he Geliliya.

Ne zutun te kegaun ni Jesus neuma zin is etew he zaan he meǥinged dutun te inged te menge Geresinen. Ne midsuukan sikandin te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne haazà is etew, neuǥet en utew he wazè din seseberen. Kenà ed-ubpà diyà te valey, kekenà, diyà ed-ubpà te penlevengà he menge surung. Kenà kepipira zà uwita haazà is maama zutun te ebpemekaid kandin. Ne minsan pa te layun sikandin edhiketan ne ibpenagkes te kedina ne ebentayan pa te menge etew, iyan, melemu zin dà he ebpemidtawen is kedina ne ed-uwiten sikandin dutun te mezaat he mulin-ulin pehendiyà te tanà he wazà ubpai te menge etew. Ne hein neehè din si Jesus, mid-erang ne midlangkeb diyà te etuvangan din is egkaǥi he utew mezaǥing te, "Sikew, Jesus he Anak te utew lavew he Megbevayà, ebmenuwen a kenikew? Ebpengemuyù a kenikew he kenè e pa kenikew siluti!" Nekaǥi zin heini su migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin he ibpaawà diyà te kandin.

Ne mid-insaan ni Jesus haazà is etew te, "Hentei is ngazan nu?" Ne midtavak te, "Iyan ngazan ku si Liblibuwen." Umba nekaǥi zin heini su utew zan mezakel is mezaat he mulin-ulin he nemen-ulin dutun te etew.
Ne haazà is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, midhangyù dan ki Jesus he kenè din pa sikandan iagbur ziyà te vitu he wazà pidtemanan te kezalem din.

Ne zutun te kenà utew meziyù, duen layud he menge vavuy he ebpemenuwal ziyà te kelendiǥan. Ne midhangyù ki Jesus haazà is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he zutun dan ipehalin te menge vavuy. Ne midtuǥutan sikandan ni Jesus.

Ne iyan dà haazà, ne mid-awè dan dutun te maama ne midhalin dan dutun te menge vavuy. Ne haazè dà ne nemelelaǥuy haazà is menge vavuy petupang dutun te utew mesilid he kelendiǥan ne mid-agbur zan diyà te ranew ne naamin dan mengelened.

Ne zuen menge maama he ebpemen-elima zutun te menge vavuy; ne hein neehè dan is nehitavù, ne henduen dan te midhiyup he vulvul is nemelaǥuy ne mibpenudtul zan diyà te inged wey ziyà te menge unayan is neulaula.

Ne is menge etew he nekezineg dutun te tudtul, ne nemenhendutun dan te ki Jesus su ed-ahaan dan. Ne neehè dan dutun kes neulian he ziyà mebpinuu te etuvangan ni Jesus he midsun-ud en te ugelingen, ne hustu en is ked-isip-isip din. Ne tenged dutun utew zan en nengeinuinu.

Ne sikan is menge etew he nekeahà ki Jesus te kebewii zin dutun te etew, ne mibpenudtulan dan is menge etew he sikan pa mekeuma ke nemenumenu is kegkeulii zutun te etew he midlalung te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin.

Ne zutun, haazà is langun he menge etew he meǥinged dutun te tanà te menge Geresinen, ne midhangyù dan ki Jesus he med-awà sikandin dutun te kandan su utew zan ingkehandek sikandin. Ne iyan dà haazà, ne mid-untud ensi Jesus te avang su egenat dan.
Ne zutun, haazà is etew he veǥu he neulian, midhangyù sikandin ki Jesus, ke sikandin te, "Egkesuat a he eduma kenikew." Iyan, wazà ipezuma ni Jesus, kekenà, impeulì din. Ke si Jesus te,

"Ulì ke en ne tudtula nu ke hengkey is utew meupiya he midhimu te Megbevayà kenikew." Ne zutun, mid-ulì haazà is maama ne mibpenudtul zin duen te langun he menge meǥinged dutun ke hengkey is midhimu ni Jesus diyà te kandin.
Ne hein nekezunggù ensi Jesus dutun te ebpuunan dan ne utew nengeǥalew is utew mezakel he menge etew he nengetiǥum dutun su edtaǥad dan kandin.

Ne zutun duen maama he egngezanan ki Hayru he pengulu te sevaha he simbahan te menge Hudiyu. Ne mid-uvey heini ziyà te ki Jesus ne midluhud diyà te etuvangan din is edhangyù kandin he zumahi zin sikandin diyà te valey zin.

Su zuen budtung he anak din he raǥaraǥa he menge sepulù pa wey zezuwa is penuiǥen din, ne egkezeruwan ne edluwàluwè en te ǥehinawa. Ne miduma kandin si Jesus. Ne zutun te kedhipanew zan ebpenelektelek dan dà su egkengelipitlipit dan te utew mezakel he menge etew zutun.
Ne zuen dutun bahi he utew en nerasey su midsepulù en wey zezuwa he tuig is kedlengesahi kandin ne kenà ed-engked. Ne wazà minsan hentei he nekeulì kandin.
Ne mibpenlietliet medhendiyà te egkeiniyuǥan ni Jesus ne midsengkawad din kevita is sidsid te kumbalà ni Jesus. Ne zutundutun ne mid-engked is kegkevusbusi kandin.

Ne redsà dutun ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Hentei is migawed kedì?" Ne is menge etew zutun, pudu mibarew he wazè dan mekeǥawed. Ne migkaǥi si Pedro te, "Datù, maan is ebpenginginsè ke pa te iring keniyan, te hanu man mezakel utew he menge etew is edlilipitlipit diyan te kenikew."
Iyan, migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Duen iyan migawed kedì su neǥezam ku he zuen etew he neulian te zaru pinaaǥi te ǥehem ku."

Ne hein nesavut dutun te vahi he netuenan ni Jesus haazà is mid-ulaula zin, mid-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus is egkerkeren su utew nahandek. Midluhud sikandin diyà te ki Jesus, dutun te etuvangan te langun he menge etew. Ne midtudtul zin ke hengkey is ketezengan ke maan is migawed sikandin te kumbalà ni Jesus ne midtudtul zin daan he segugunà dutun neulii is daru zin.
Ne migkaǥi kandin si Jesus te, "Bayi, umba neulian ka te zaru nu su midsarig ka kedì. Ulì ke en ne mebmelinawen is kebpekesavuk nu."

Ne te kemulu pa si Jesus egkaǥi zutun ne zuen nekeuma he ebpuun diyà te valey ni Hayru. Ne migkaǥi diyà te ki Hayru te, "Kenè nu en bigbigata te eduma pa maan si Jesus su kenè niw en egkesepenan is gehinawa zuen te anak nu."
Ne hein nezineg ni Jesus haazà ne migkaǥi sikandin te, "Kenè ka meseeng, kekenà, sarig ke zà kedì, ne egkeuyag is anak nu."
Ne hein nekeuma zan diyà te valey ni Hayru, ne wazà ipemeseled ni Jesus is menge etew. Iyan din dà dutun impeseled ensi Pedro, si Juan, si Santiago, wey is menge ǥinikanan dutun te vatà.

Ne zutun, is langun he menge etew he nerivurun dutun, egkengeǥisaweg sikandan ne ebpemenineǥew su nengeseeng. Ne migkeǥiyan sikandan ni Jesus te, "Kenè niw sineǥawi su wazà mebpatey heeyan is batà, kekenà, midlipezeng dà!"
Ne te kegkezineǥa zan dutun te migkaǥi ni Jesus, ne và dan dà mid-engiti su netuenan dan he minatey en iyan haazà is batà.
Ne mid-uvayan ni Jesus haazà is batà ne migewezan din diyà te velad ne mid-umew zin he ke sikandin te, "Bayi, enew kad."
Ne zutundutun nekesunggud is gehinawa zutun te vatà ne mid-enew. Ne migkaǥi si Jesus dutun te ǥinikanan te vatà he ipekaan dan haazà is anak dan.
Ne utew ingkeinuinu te ǥinikanan dutun te vatà haazà is midhimu ni Jesus. Ne migkeǥiyan sikandan ni Jesus he kenè dan tudtula haazà ziyà te minsan hentei.

Ne midtiǥum ni Jesus sikan is sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din. Ne kada sevaha kandan, mibeǥayan din te ǥehem su wey zan mevewii is egkengezeruwan wey ikepemeǥuwè is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin.
Ne zutun ne impehipanew zin sikandan su wey zan ikepesavut is Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keaǥi te kedhadì te Megbevayà ne wey zan daan mekepemawì te minsan hengkey he egezamen te etew.

Ne midteleenan din sikandan he ke sikandin te, "Kenè kew uwit te menge azen niw te kedhipanew niw; minsan tuked, ne kenè niw uwita; kenè kew kekempilù, kenè kew lulutù, kenè kew uwit te selapì, ne minsan is ed-ilisan, ne kenè niw zaan uwita.
Ke hendei is baley he zuen egalewǥalew keniyu ne zutun kew zà uliulì taman te kegenat niw.
Ne emun duen inged he wazà dutun etew he egalewǥalew keniyu, ne ewai niw ne penektaka niw is menge eliyavuk diyà te menge paa niw he iyan laǥuy he edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà."

Ne zutun migenat haazà is menge sumusundan ne mibpesusuwayè dan ne midtukid dan is menge inged te ebayà te ebpenudtul te Meupiya he Tudtulanen ne mibpemewian dan daan is egkengezeruwan diyà te kada inged.
Ne heini is nengeulaula eni Jesus, nezineg ni Gubirnedur Hirudis diyà te prubinsya he Geliliya ne ingkesamuk te ǥehinawa zin su zuen egkaǥi he iyan si Jesus si Juan Megbebewtismu he nevanhew.

Ne zuen daan egkaǥi he mibpeetew mebpeuman si Elias, kes ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, ne iyan en si Jesus. Ne zuen daan egkaǥi he nevanhew is sevaha zuen te menge ebpeneuven dengan ne iyan si Jesus.
Neisip ni Hirudis is: "Si Juan, ne mibpepungelan ku en te ulu, iyan, hentei etawa heini is egkeǥiyen dan?" Ne mibpen-ahà sikandin te paaǥi wey zin maahà si Jesus.
Ne mid-ulì sikan is sepulù wey zezuwa he epustul ni Jesus ne midtudtul zan kandin is langun he mid-ulaula zan. Ne zutun miduma zin sikandan he iyan dan dà pehendiyà te inged he Bitsayda.

Ne netuenan te nerivurun he mezakel he menge etew he midhipanew ensi Jesus ne nemenelukun dan. Ne migalewǥalew sikandan ni Jesus ne impesavut din kandan is mehitenged te kedhadì te Megbevayà ne mibpemewian din daan is menge etew zutun te minsan hengkey he ebpenggezamen dan.

Ne hein mahapun en mid-uvayan si Jesus te sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din. Ke sikandan te, "Ipeǥenat nu en is menge etew wey zan mekehendiyà te menge unayan wey menge inged su wey zan mekepen-ahà te egkekaan dan wey egkehizeǥaan dan su wazà egkekuwa zan dini te wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew."

Iyan, midtavak si Jesus te, "Iyan kew mebeǥey te egkekaan dan." Ne midtavak haazà is menge sumusundan din te, "Lelelima zà he vuuk he supas wey zezuwa he zezeisek he pait is naazen tew he egkeenen. Kela ke egkesuatan nu he edhipanew key te kebpemasa te ibpekaan tew kayi te utew mezakel he menge etew," egkaǥi zan.

Menge lelima he libu he menge maama is nengetiǥum dutun ne zuen daan menge vahi wey vatà . Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, "Ipemepinuu niw sikandan he mebpundukpunduk he tigkelimahan is sengepunduk."
Ne zutun impemepinuu zan haazà is langun he menge etew.

Ne migkuwa zutun ni Jesus haazà is lelima he supas wey haazà is dezuwa he pait ne midlingahà diyà te langit ne mibpeselematan din te Megbevayà. Ne mibpenevìtevì din. Ne minsan pa zutun kenà egkeamin haazà is edtevien din . Ne imbeǥey zin diyà te menge sumusundan din haazà is nengetevì wey zan ikepemeǥey zutun te menge etew.
Ne is kada sevaha zutun te menge etew, nekekaan ne nahantey. Ne haazà is egkeenen, ne nesemaan pa te sepulù wey zezuwa he vinevey is nehimes he menge tevì te supas te menge sumusundan din.

Sengeandew zutun ne ed-ampù si Jesus he sebsevaha zin diyà te Megbevayà ne is menge sumusundan din, diyè dan te uvey zin. Ne ke sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Hentei e kun sumalà te ked-isipa kediey te menge etew?"
Ne midtavak dan te, "Iyan ke kun si Juan Megbebewtismu he nevanhew, ne zuen daan egkaǥi te iyan ka si Elias, ne zuen pa egkaǥi te sevaha ka zuen te menge tipehuna he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà."
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Ne sikiyu zaan, hentei e man sumalà is ked-isipa niw kediey?" Ne midtavak si Pedro te, "Iyan ka sikan is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì din te menusiyà."
Ne zutun mibpeketelteleenan sikandan ni Jesus he kenè dan tudtula haazà diyà te minsan hentei.

Ne ke sikandin daan te, "Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, kinahanglan he mezakel is menge kemeresayan he ibpaantus kediey. Edsumpeliten a te menge ebmeǥurangen te menge Hudiyu wey te menge punuan he memumuhat wey te menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Edhimetayan e zan ne seled te tetelu he andew zutun egkevanhew a."

Ne mid-uman si Jesus megkaǥi diyà te kandan te langun, ke sikandin te, "Ke zuen egkesuat he edsundan kedì ne kinahanglan he iawè din diyà te isip din is kandin he paaǥi ne tianga zin te kada andew is krus din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kinahanglan he edtumanen din is menge suǥù ku minsan pa ke iyan ibpatey zin. Ne human ebpekesunud kedì.

Su ke zuen etew he egkenuǥunan din is untung din, ebpatey ǥihapun. Iyan, ke zuen etew he minsan ibpatey zin pa is kedsunud din kedì, id-ulì te Megbevayà diyà te kandin is untung din ne kenè en sikandin ebpatey te wazà pidtemanan.
Minsan ke maangken pa te etew heini is tivuuk he kelibutan, wazà pulus diyà te kandin ke kenà sikandin egkeveǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan ne edsilutan pa sikandin.

Is minsan hentei he igkeeled e zin wey igkeeled din is ibpenurù ku, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, igkeeled ku zaan sikandin keuzemà ke edlikù a he zekelà is gehem te ked-anlag ku wey edsun-uzan ad te mekeǥeǥehem he anlag te Amey ku he Megbevayà wey te anlag te menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà.
Tentenuzi niw heini," ke si Jesus, "duen menge zuma tew kayi he kenà ebpatey taman te timpu he ibpaahà kandan te Megbevayà is keǥehem din te kedhadì."
Ne menge sengesimana puun dutun te kegkaǥi kayi ni Jesus, miduma zin ensi Pedro, si Santiago, wey si Juan ne midtekezeg dan te vuvungan su wey mekeampù diyà te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun te ked-ampù ni Jesus, netik-ew mahalin is dagwey zin ne mibpengenamag te keputì is ugelingen din ne ebpekesirang te mata.
Ne netekewtekew mekepeǥawaǥawa is dezuwa he maama he ebpekidlalag kandin he iyan si Moises wey si Elias, kes menge tipehuna he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà.
Midsun-uzan daan sikandan te mekeǥeǥehem he anlag, ne iyan imbitiyara zan ki Jesus is mehitenged te meǥaan din en kedhimuwa te suǥù te Megbevayà su edhimetayan sikandin diyà te Hiruselim.
Ne si Pedro wey is menge zuma zin, ne nemekelipezeng dan ne hein nepukew zan neehè dan is mekeǥeǥehem he anlag ni Jesus wey haazà is dezuwa he maama he zuma ni Jesus.

Ne hein ed-awè en diyà te kandin haazà is dezuwa, migkaǥi si Pedro te, "Nengazen, utew meupiya te zini key. Ebeelan dey is tetelu he lawig; sevaha is kenikew, sevaha zaan is ki Moises, ne sevaha is ki Elias." Wazà metentenuzi ni Pedro he nengekaǥi zin heini is lalag.
Ne zutun te kemulu pa egkaǥi si Pedro, neselikuvungan sikandan te ǥapun ne utew zan nengehandek is tetelu he sumusundan dutun te kegkeselikuvungi kandan te ǥapun.
Ne nezineg dan is midtik-ew megkaǥi he ebpuun dutun te ǥapun te, "Iyan heini Anak ku he mibpilì ku he ibpahadì. Pemineǥa niw is menge lalag din."
Ne hein mid-engked haazà is egkaǥi ne iyan dà maan dutun si Jesus neehè dan. Ne puun dutun he timpu wazè pa minsan sevaha he etew he midtudtulan dan te neehè dan.
Ne hein mid-ilis he andew, midtupang dan dutun te vuvungan ne utew mezakel he menge etew is nemenelavuk ki Jesus.
Ne zuen maama zutun he nengumew ki Jesus, ke sikandin te, "He Zatù, ahaa nu pa kedì heini is anak ku he maama. Sebsevaha heini he anak ku!

Ahaa nu su edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin ne emun ebpekeume en is edlalung kandin ne ebpeketik-ew ebpekeerang ne egkerkeren ne eburvuraan is bèbè din ne edsiguduwan sikandin ed-eyuwa te edlalung kandin taman te egkevuǥel is lawa zin ne egkeuǥet sikandin ed-engkezi te mezaat he mulin-ulin.
Midhangyù a ziyà te menge sumusundan nu he vewii zan, iyan, wazè dan meulii."
