Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, utew zekelà is menge sayep niw; wazè niw iyan kedtuu te Megbevayà. Utew ves egkeuǥet is kebpekiduma ku keniyu! Utew ves egkeuǥet is kebpekeantus ku keniyu ne human kew edtuu. Ihengkayi nu heeyan is anak nu."

Ne hein uvey en haazà is batà diyà te ki Jesus, ne neumahan en maan dutun te edlalung kandin ne nepiley sikandin ne migkerker te utew mezesen. Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin he ewai zin haazà is edlelungen din. Ne zutundutun neulian haazà is batà. Ne migkaǥi si Jesus dutun te amey te vatà te, "Kuwaa nu en heini is anak nu."

Ne langun he menge etew zutun, ne utew nengeinuinu tenged dutun te nehimu ni Jesus pinaaǥi te zekelà he ǥehem te Megbevayà. Ne zutun te kemulu pa egkeinuinu is menge etew zutun te langun he ed-ul-ulahan ni Jesus, ne migkaǥi sikandin diyà te menge sumusundan din te,
"Kenè niw lipati heini is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu, duen timpu keuzemà he siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ibpalad a ziyà te menge kuntada ku," ke sikandin.

Ne is menge sumusundan din, wazè dan dutun mesavut is ibpesavut ni Jesus. Wazà ipesavut te Megbevayà kandan su wey kenè dan metueni. Ne wazè dan mekeaku he ed-insà kandin ke hengkey is kehuluǥan dutun.
Sevaha he andew zutun ebpelewlewanà is menge sumusundan ke hentei is lavew kandan.
Ne netuenan ni Jesus ke hengkey is diyà te isip dan, ne tenged dutun, migkuwa zin is batà ne impehitindeg din diyà te uvey zin

ne ke sikandin te, "Is etew he tenged te kedtuu zin kedì, edewaten din ne ebpurungan din heini is deisek he vatà, ne nezawat e zin en daan. Ne is minsan hentei he edawat kediey, nezawat din en daan is Amey ku he Megbevayà he midsuǥù kedì. Su is minsan hentei keniyu he ebpevayàbayà te menge zuma zin, iyan sikandin tutuu he lavew keniyu."

Ne zutun migkaǥi si Juan te, "Duen etew he neuma zey he ebewian din is menge etew he edlelungen te mezaat he mulin-ulin ne egemiten din is gehem te ngazan nu te kebpemawì. Ne midawey zey su kenà ebpekiduma kenitew."
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandin te, "Kenè niw zewaya is ed-ulaula te iring dutun su is etew he kenè tew kuntada, ne edtavang kenitew."
Ne hein egkeuvayan en is andew te kebpeewaa ki Jesus dini te kelibutan su ed-ulì en diyà te langit ne netivuuk is gehinawa zin te kedhendiyà te Hiruselim ne zutun migenat dan.
Duen menge etew he impehuna ni Jesus ne migenat dan ne midhendiyè dan te inged diyà te prubinsya he Semarya su edteǥenahan dan is egkinehenglanen eni Jesus.
Iyan, is menge meǥinged dutun, wazè dan ikesuat he edtuluy si Jesus su netuenan dan he Hudiyu sikandin he ziyà ebpetandang te inged he Hiruselim.

Ne hein netuenan ni Santiago wey ni Juan he wazà edawat kandan dutun te inged, migkeǥiyan dan si Jesus te, "Egkesuatan nu ve he ebuyù key te hapuy he ebpuun te langit he ibpetanà dini su wey meǥerà heini he menge etew?"
Iyan, si Jesus, midsinaru ziyà te kandan ne midawey zin sikandan.
Ne midlaus dan diyà te zuma he inged.
Ne zutun te kedhipanew zan, duen etew he migkaǥi ziyà te ki Jesus te, "Eduma a kenikew minsan hendei ka ebpevayà."

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandin te, "Is laku, ne zuen surung he egkeubpaan din, ne is menge tagbis, ne zuen kandan he salag, iyan, siak, is migeraran te Kakey te Menusiyà, ne wazà hustu he egkehimelayan ku."

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te sevaha he etew, ke sikandin te, "Sundan ka kedì." Iyan, migkaǥi haazà is migkeǥiyan din te, "Datù, ed-ulì e zè pa su kenè e pa ebpekezuma kenikew taman te kenè pa egketapus is umur te amey ku. Ne emun igkeleveng ku en ne human a eduma kenikew."

Ne midtavak si Jesus dutun te etew te, "Iyan nu ipeleveng te menge minatey sikan is wazà mekezawat te untung he wazà pidtemanan su iyan ku ibpeveelan kenikew is kebpenudtul te Meupiya he Tudtulanen te kedhedii te Megbevayà te menge etew."
Ne zuen pa zutun sevaha he etew he egkaǥi zaan diyà te ki Jesus te, "Datù, edsundan a kenikew, iyan, ed-ulì e pa su ibpesayud ku is bevelayan ku."

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Emun ed-eradu ka he layun ka edlilingey ne kenà heeyan meupiya. Iring din ded daan is etew he edsundan kedì wey zuen din igkelilingey ne kenà sikandin dait he edhedian te Megbevayà."
Ne hein neipus heini, duen daan kepituwan wey zewuwa he menge maama he nepilì te Nengazen he si Jesus su ibpehuna zin ibpehipanew te tigduwazuwa ziyà te langun he menge inged he ebpemeyaan din daan.

Ne migkaǥi sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Mezakel pezem is edawat te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Iring sikandan te kamet he nelutuan en. Utew meluag is kamet, iyan, deisey kiw zà is ebpemenlegtey. Iampù niw ziyà te Nengazen he suǥua zin pa ziyà te kamet din is duma pa he ebpekelegtey.
Genat kew en, iyan, andam kew su edsuǥuen ku sikiyu ziyà te menge etew he kumekaid. Iring kew te menge nati he kerehidu ne sikandan ne iring te menge erimaung.
Kenè kew med-uwit te selapì, wey kempilù, wey sepatus he ed-ilisan niw. Ne kenà utew meluǥayad is kedlelaǥi niw te etew he egkeuma niw ziyà te zalan.
Ne ke hendei is baley he ebpemenehikan niw ne penelehuzan kew. Kaǥi kew te, 'Sikiyu is meǥinged kayi, tuvazi kew te Megbevayà.'
Ne emun dait he edtuvazan is etew zutun dekelà is tuvad te Megbevayà kandan. Ne emun kenà, ne kenà sikandan edleusan edtuvazi te Megbevayà.

Ne haazà is baley he zuen etew he egalewǥalew keniyu, ne zutun kew pundu taman te kegenat niw. Ne zewata niw is minsan hengkey he ibpekaan dan wey ibpeinum dan keniyu su iring te suhul zan keniyu. Dait is edterebahu he edsuhulan. Kenè kew en penhalinhalin pa maan diyà te zuma pa he menge valey.
Ne emun ebpekeuma kew ziyà te inged ne zuen egalewǥalew keniyu, minsan hengkey is keenen dan he ibpekaan dan keniyu, ne keena niw.
Pemewii niw is egkengezeruwan dutun te inged. Ne keǥiyi niw is menge etew zutun he meǥaan en is timpu te kedhedii kandan te Megbevayà.
Iyan, emun ebpekeuma kew ziyà te inged ne wazà egalewǥalew keniyu zutun, ne peehè kew te menge etew zutun, ne ke sikiyu te,

'Minsan is menge eliyavuk kayi te inged niw he nemendeket te menge paa zey, edtektaken dey en wey niw metueni he edsilutan kew te Megbevayà .' Ne ke sikiyu zaan te, 'Kinahanglan he metueni niw he meǥaan en is timpu te kedhadì te Megbevayà.'

Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu," ke si Jesus, "he lavew pa is idsilut te Megbevayà dutun te inged emun egkeuma keuzemà is andew te kedsilut, kenà te silut din dengan diyà te menge lalung he etew he meǥinged diyà te inged he Suduma."

Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Mekehizuhizu kew keuzemà is menge tigKurasin! Mekehizuhizu kew zaan keuzemà is menge tigBitsayda. Su is menge egkein-inuwan he impeehè ku ziyan te inged niw te menge Hudiyu, angin ke midhimu ku haazà diyà te menge inged he Tiru wey Sidun he kenà menge Hudiyu is meǥinged dutun, su nekekukumbalè dan en pezem te saku ne nepen-evuwan dan en is ulu zan he tuus te ed-iniyuǥan dan is memezaat he ulaula .
Kenè niw lipati he zutun keuzemà te andew te kedsusi te Megbevayà te menusiyà, lavew is silut din keniyu kenà te menge etew ziyà te Tiru wey Sidun.
Ne sikiyu zaan," ke si Jesus, "is menge tigKepirnaum, iyan egkesuatan niw pezem is deliǥa kew te minsan hentei, iyan, igketimbag kew ziyà te Impirnu."

Ne zutun migkeǥiyan din haazà is menge sumusundan din te, "Is minsan hentei he etew he ebpemineg te ibpenurù niw, ne iring te iyan e zin nepemineg. Ne sikan is etew he kenè kew zin edseǥipaan, ne iring te iyan a wazè din seǥipaa. Ne sikan is etew he kenà edseǥipà kedì, ne iyan wazè din seǥipaa is Megbevayà he midsuǥù kedì."

Ne nepipira pa he andew zutun hein nemekeulì sikan is kepituwan he midsuǥù, utew zan nengelipey su ke sikandan diyà te ki Jesus te, "Minsan is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin ne ebpemineǥen key zan ke ibpaawè dey sikandan pinaaǥi te ǥehem te ngazan nu!"
Ne zutun migkeǥiyan sikandan ni Jesus te, "Si Setanas, is egalen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, neehè ku is kegkezaaǥa niw kandin ne utew meǥaan su iring te kilat he ebpuun te langit.

Tentenuzi niw heini he mibeǥayan ku sikiyu te ǥehem he minsan ke ebpekeǥiek kew te uled wey venayew ne kenè kew edhereǥen. Ne kenè kew zaan egkezaag te ǥehem te ukag tew he si Setanas ne wazà minsan hengkey he ebpekekaid keniyu.
Iyan, kenè niw iyan ikelipey is kebpemineǥa keniyu te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, kekenà, ikelipey niw is menge ngazan niw he impelista te Megbevayà diyà te langit."

Ne zutun midlipey si Jesus te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne mid-ampù diyà te Megbevayà, ke sikandin te, "Amey ku he Nengazen te langit wey tanà, dekelà is kebpeselemati ku kenikew su is in-eles nu su wey kenà mesavut te menge uluwanen wey uvag en memetau ne impesavut nu en diyà te menge etew he wazè dan menge hanew. Amey ku, umba ebpeselematan ku su midhimu nu heini te iring kayi su iyan egkesuatan nu tenged te ǥaǥew nu."

Ne zutun mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge etew te, "Is minsan hengkey, insarig kediey te Amey ku he Megbevayà. Wazà nesayud kedì te Anak te Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan dà is Amey ku he Megbevayà. Ne wazà daan nesayud te Amey ku he Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan e zà is Anak din wey sikan is menge etew he mibpengelinteuwan ku he mesayud dan kandin."
Ne midsineruwan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din hein iyan dan dà, ne ke sikandin te, "Deyzey kew he menge etew su nemetmetahan niw en heini is langun he edhimuwen ku.

Su tutuu is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he kenà pira zà is menge ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà dengan wey menge hadì dengan he egkesuat pezem he mekeahà kayi te nengeehè niw ǥuntaan, iyan, wazà ipaahà kandan. Ne egkesuatan dan daan he ebpemineǥen heini is nengezineg niw ǥuntaan, iyan, wazà ipepemineg kandan."

Ne zutun duen sevaha he etew he menunudlù te menge kesuǥuan te menge Hudiyu he midhitindeg su egezaman din edekepa is ketezengan ni Jesus pinaaǥi te menge insà, ne ke sikandin te, "He Zatù, hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan ku wey a meveǥayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan?"
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Hengkey is nekaǥi te kesuǥuan te Megbevayà he imbilinbilin ni Moises? Hengkey is kedsevuta nu te nengevasa nu?"

Ne midtavak haazà is etew te, "Is Megbevayà he Nengazen tew, kinahanglan he iyan tew sikandin ebmahalen dini te ǥehinawa tew. Iyan sikandin mahal zini te ǥehinawa tew, isip tew, kedsavut tew, wey tivuuk he ulaula tew. Ne kinahanglan daan he ebpurungan tew is duma tew; ed-isipen tew sikandin he iring en te kenitew he ǥehinawa."
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandin te, "Benar is nekaǥi nu. Ne iyan ul-ulaha nu ne ebeǥayan ka te untung he wazà pidtemanan."
Iyan, haazà is menunudlù te kesuǥuan, egkesuatan din pezem he meisip ni Jesus he hustu is menge ulaula zin, umba migkaǥi sikandin te, "Hentei is nekaǥi he zuma ku?"

Ne ke si Jesus te, "Duen sevaha he etew he Hudiyu he midhipanew ebpuun diyà te inged he Hiruselim he sebsevaha zin su edtupang pehendiyà te inged he Hiriku. Ne ziyà te zalan neuma sikandin te menge tulisan ne mibuǥel zan sikandin ne midlevasan dan, ne wey zan ewai hein deisek dà is gehinawa zin.
Ne te kegkeipus dutun te menge tulisan, nekeuma zutun is Hudiyu he memumuhat te Megbevayà, iyan, hein neehè din haazà is midruug he nekehidhizeǥà, mid-eliǥu zin ne midlaus te hipanew zin.

Ne iring din ded daan is nekesunud he nekeuma zutun. Hudiyu zed daan he kevuwazan ni Levi he edtavangtavang te menge memumuhat diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà, iyan, hein neehè din haazà is nekehidhizeǥà ne mid-eliǥu zin daan ne midlaus te hipanew zin.
Ne wazà utew meuǥet ne nekeuma zutun daan is sevaha he kenà Hudiyu su tigSemarya. Ne hein neehè din haazà is nekehidhizeǥà he midruug ne utew sikandin nehizu.

Ne mid-uvayan din ne mibewian din te lana wey vinu is menge palì dutun ne mibukusan din te manggad. Ne zutun mibitbit din ne in-untud din te kudè din ne mid-uwit din diyà te valey he hulevungà te menge etew ne zutun mibpurungan din elimahi.

Ne te nepawà dutun ne mibeǥey te selapì dutun te teǥiǥaked te valey ne migkaǥi te, 'Elimahi nu kedì heini is midruug te tulisan ne emun duen selapì nu pa he egkeǥastu nu kandin he liyu kayi te ibeǥey ku, ne zutun te kedlikù ku ne ed-ilisan ku ziyan te kenikew.'"
Ne ke si Jesus diyà te menunudlù te, "Hentei zutun te tetelu he etew is nehimu he hustu he zuma zutun te midruug te menge tulisan?"

Ne midtavak haazà is menunudlù te, "Iyan nehimu he hustu he zuma zutun te midruug te menge tulisan haazà is nehizu kandin he etew ne midtavang kandin." Ne ke si Jesus te, "Iyan haazà ul-ulaha nu is iring dutun."
Ne hein midlaus ensi Jesus, ne nekeuma zan diyà te sevaha he inged he zuen dutun bahi he egngezanan ki Marta. Impepemenahik ni Marta si Jesus dutun te valey zin.
Ne zuen dutun hazi ni Marta he egngezanan ki Maria. Ne mibpinuu si Maria ziyà te uvey ni Jesus su ebpurung ebpemineg te menge penurù ni Jesus.

Ne si Marta, ne iyan dà sikandin diyà te avu su ebaal te egkekaan dan ne mezakel is igkesamuk din he ebeelan din. Ne zutun mid-uvey sikandin diyà te ki Jesus he ke sikandin te, "Meupiya ve te ǥehinawa nu he iyan e zà egkeviyuviyu he ebaal te egkekaan tew? Suǥua nu si Maria he uǥupi e zin."
Iyan, migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Marta, utew mezakel is igkesemuki nu he kenà utew ebpulus.
Sevaha zà is dekelà is pulus din he iyan mibpilì ni Maria ne kenà heini igkeawà diyà te kandin."

Sengeandew, ne ed-ampù si Jesus diyà te Megbevayà. Ne te nekeipus sikandin te ed-ampù migkaǥi is sevaha zuen te menge sumusundan din, ke sikandin te, "Datù, penurua key te ked-ampù su si Juan Megbebewtismu, mibpenurù din is menge sumusundan din te ked-ampù."
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, "Iyan heini iringi niw ke ed-ampù kew; ke sikiyu te, 'Amey zey ziyà te langit, berakat he tehuza te menusiyà is ngazan nu. Berakat he medhadì ka te menusiyà.
Beǥayi key te egkeenen he egkinehenglanen dey te kada andew.
Peseyluwa key te menge salè dey su sikami, ebpeseyluwen dey is langun he nekesalà diyà te kenami. Ne ipekeziyù key kenikew te mezesen he penuley.'"
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Penenglitan is sevaha keniyu, duen emiǥu zin he edhendutun te kandin te metaneb en is kezukileman ne ke sikandin te, 'He Geli, ipesambey e pa kenikew te egkekaan.
Su zuen meǥeliyug ku he ziyà ebpuun te meziyù ne wazè ku igkepeǥana kandin.'

Ne zutun, edtavak sikandin dutun te valey zin te, 'Es! egkepeǥulan ad he ed-enew su midlekevan ku en heeyan is gemawan ne nemekelipezeng en heini is menge anak ku kayi te hulid ku. Ne kenè e en ebpekeenew he ebeǥey ziyan te kenikew te egkekaan.'

Ne haazà," ke si Jesus, "minsan ke kenà sikandin egkesuat he ed-enew he edtavang te emiǥu zin, iyan, ke kenà ed-engked haazà is edhangyù, ebpeketeǥel sikandin ebpekeenew ne ibeǥey zin kandin is langun he kinahanglan din.

Ne venar is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he penigudu kew vuyù diyà te Megbevayà ne ebeǥayan kew zin; penigudu kew pen-ahà ne ibpeturedu zin keniyu is ebpen-ahaan niw; penigudu kew penelehuzan ne ebpuwasan kew zin.
Su is langun he ebuyù diyà te Megbevayà, ebpekezawat; ne sikan is ebpen-ahà, ebpeketuredu; ne sikan is ebpenelehuzan, ebpuwasan daan te Megbevayà.
Sikiyu is menge ǥinikanan, ke zuen ebuyuen te anak niw he pait, ne kenà egkehimu he uled is ibeǥey niw.
Ne emun impis is ebuyuen din, kenà daan egkehimu he venayew is ibeǥey niw.

Ne sikiyu is menusiyà he kenà memetazeng, emun meupiya is ibeǥey niw ziyà te menge anak niw, iyan pe be is Amey tew he Megbevayà diyà te langit kenà mebeǥey keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ke ebuyuen niw."

Ne zuen timpu he mibewian ni Jesus is maama he midhimu he emew te mezaat he mulin-ulin he edlalung kandin. Ne hein impaawà ni Jesus haazà is mezaat he mulin-ulin ne segugunà nekekaǥi haazà is maama. Ne utew nengeinuinu is langun he menge etew he nengetiǥum dutun.
Iyan, duen dutun migkaǥi te, "Iyan mibeǥey kandin te ǥehem te kebpenegseg te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin si Endedaman, sikan is egalen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin."
Ne zuen pa zutun menge etew he egezaman dan si Jesus. Midhangyù dan he ibpeehè din is egkein-inuwan su ed-ahaan dan ke tutuu ve he midsuǥù sikandin te Megbevayà.

Iyan, netuenan ni Jesus ke hengkey is seled te ǥehinawa zan ne migkaǥi sikandin te, "Penenglitan ke zuen hadì ne ebpetebtebekà is menge sakup din ne meǥaan egkeawà is gehem din te kedhadì. Ne ke zuen edlingahaan te sengepemilya ne ebpekungkuntedahà is menge sakup din, ne egkevengkag haazà is pemilya.
Ne emun egketebek ni Setanas is menge sakup din egkezeetan is gehem din. Kenà egkehimu is migkaǥi niw he pinaaǥi te ǥehem ni Endedaman egkezaag ku is menge sakup din.

Emun iyan igkesegseǥa ku te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin is gehem he ebpuun diyà te ki Setanas ne hendei ves ebpuun is gehem te menge zuma niw he ebpenegseg te mezaat he mulin-ulin? Pinaaǥi te menge ulaula te menge sumusundan niw egketuusan he nengesayep kew.
Su heini is gehem ku te kebpemuǥew te mezaat he mulin-ulin, ne ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà. Ne pinaaǥi kayi egketuusan niw he iyan en heini sikan is timpu te kedhadì te Megbevayà."

Ne zutun impesavut ni Jesus he lavew he mekeǥeǥehem sikandin kenà si Setanas is egalen te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin . Ke si Jesus te, "Ke zuen mezesen he etew he nepurung meǥumeeni ne ebentayan din is baley zin, wazà ebpekeaǥew te menge azen din.

Iyan, ke zuen tuwas pa he mezesen he ebpekeuma, egkezaag din haazà is nehuna, ne ed-eǥawan din te menge ǥumaan he iyan edseriǥan dutun te etew ne ebpeneltelazen din haazà is netavan din diyà te menge sakup din."
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Sikan is kenè ku zuma, ne kuntada ku; sikan is kenà edtavang kedì, ne edsanggen kediey.

Ke ed-awà is mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpuun diyà te etew he edlelungen din, diyà ebayà te memaza he tanà su ebpen-ahà te egkeubpaan din. Ne emun wazè din egkeahà, egkaǥi sikandin te, 'Edlikù a nasì diyà te neubpaan ku.'
Ne edlikù ne egkeehè din haazà is neubpaan din he midtines en is menge vutang dutun, ne nepurung melumpiyuwi.

Ne zutun edlikù edhipanew su ebpengakat te pitu he zuma zin he menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he tuwas pa he memezaat kenà sikandin. Ne ed-ahuk dan ne ed-ubpè dan dutun te etew. Ne zutun ed-iseg pa ebmezaat is kebpekesavuk dutun te etew, kenà te nehuna he kebpekesavuk din."
Ne zutun hein neipus ni Jesus haazà is migkaǥi zin ne zuen dutun bahi he midhabet megkaǥi te, "Dekelà is kelipey te vahi he mid-anak kenikew wey nekepesusu kenikew!"
Iyan, midtavak si Jesus te, "Lavew pa he zekelà is kelipey te etew he ebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà ne ebpezumdumahan din!"

Ne zutun hein egkengehasekhasek en is utew mezakel he menge etew he ed-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus, migkaǥi sikandin diyà te kandan te, "Sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, utew mezaat is menge ulaula niw. Egkesuatan niw he meehè niw is singyal he ebpuun te Megbevayà diyà te langit he tuus he midsuǥù e zin, iyan, iyan dà singyal he ibpaahà keniyu is iring te impeulaula zengan duen te tipehuna he ebpeneuven he si Jonas.

Su si Jonas, hein nekeuma sikandin dengan diyà te inged he Ninivi, impeehè din is singyal he tuus te silut te Megbevayà diyà te menge tigNinivi. Ne iring din ded daan, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, egkehimu is penurù ku he tuus te meǥaan en is ed-ul-ulahan keniyu te Megbevayà.

Keuzemà te andew te kedhukum te Megbevayà, sikan is tipehuna he bai he ebpuun te inged he Siba, edsewayen kew zin is menge etew ǥuntaan su utew meziyù is midhipenawan din te kebpemineg dà te penurù ni Hadì Sulumun te utew metau. Ne ǥuntaan, duen lavew pa kenà si Sulumun dini te keniyu ne wazè niw zewata is penurù din.

Keuzemà te andew te kedhukum te Megbevayà, edsewayen kew is menge etew ǥuntaan te menge tigNinivi zengan su hein nezineg dan is penurù ni Jonas, mid-iniyuǥan dan is memezaat he ulaula. Ne ǥuntaan duen ebpeneuven he lavew pa kenà si Jonas dini te keniyu, ne sikiyu mulà, wazè niw zewata is penurù din."

Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, "Wazà etew he edtemteman din is sulù ne id-eles din, ne emun kenà, ne ebpelengkevan din te revan, kekenà, diyè din idsavuk te sevukà, ne emun duen etew he edseled ne egketeyawan.

Is mata te etew, ne iring te sulù diyà te lawa zin su emun merayag is ked-ehè din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, emun metazeng is ulaula zin, ne henduen be te egketeyawan is tivuuk he lawa zin. Iyan, emun lakap sikandin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, lalung sikandin, henduen be te egkezukileman is tivuuk he lawa zin.
Iring din ded daan is sulù te isip te etew, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is kedsevuta zin te hustu . Kinahanglan he kenà heini egkezaag te mezaat
he ulaula zin, ne henduen be te utew merayag is egkeulaula zin iring te egketeyawan sikandin te sulù."
Ne hein nekeipus dutun si Jesus is ebpenurù ne zuen sevaha zutun he Perisiyu he mid-umbita kandin te kegkaan diyà te valey zin. Ne midhendiyà si Jesus ne migkaan.
Ne naahà dutun te Perisiyu he migkaan si Jesus he wazè din lùlui is belad din. Ne utew sikandin neinuinu su nesupak ni Jesus is betasan te menge Perisiyu.

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandin te, "Sikiyu is menge Perisiyu, ebpurungan niw ebentayi is menge vetasan niw, iyan, diyà te isip niw wey ǥehinawa niw ne zuen keheheramham wey kelelalung. Iring kew te vasu wey pinggan he nelumpiyuwan diyà te ǥawas, iyan, meremerik is diyà te seled.

Menge wazè niw isip! Is Megbevayà he midlimbag din is gawas te lawa niw, midlimbag din daan is gehinawa wey isip niw. Ne kinahanglan he lumpiyu is gehinawa niw wey isip niw iring te ǥawas te lawa niw.
Ne sumalà is egkehimu niw, beǥayi niw is menge egkengeayuayu ne human egkehimu he egkelumpiyuwan kew egkepurungi.

Kehizu niw te menge Perisiyu su ibeǥey niw te Megbevayà is ikepulù he vahin minsan te menge perehemut te egkeenen iring te yirbebuyna wey vawing wey is langun he menge edlumbayen, iyan, is metazeng he ulaula wey is kebmahala niw te Megbevayà diyà te ǥehinawa niw, ne wazè niw isipa. Kinahanglan he iveǥey niw is ikepulù, iyan, kenè niw zaan ipeliyu heini is menge lavew pa he suǥù.

Kehizu niw te menge Perisiyu su emun diyè kew te simbahan egkesuatan niw he ibpepinuu kew ziyà te menge pinuuwà te menge egalen. Ne emun diyè kew te tiyenggiyan, utew ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa niw ke edtehuzen kew te menge etew.
Kehizu niw te menge Perisiyu su iring kew te menge leveng he kenà egketuusan ne egkeǥiekan te etew, iyan, wazè dan metueni he meremerik haazà is neǥiekan dan ."
Ne zutun duen menunudlù te kesuǥuan dutun he migkaǥi ziyà te ki Jesus te, "Datù, heeyan is menge lalag nu, ne nesuǥat key zaan keniyan."

Ne ke si Jesus te, "Sikiyu zaan is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan, kehizu niw zaan su utew mezakel is mereǥen he tulumanen he ibpetuman niw te menge etew, iyan, wazà minsan hengkey he idtavang niw kandan wey zan meketuman dutun te ibpetuman niw kandan.
Mekehizuhizu kew utew keuzemà su mideyzeyanan niw is mibpenlevengan duen te ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, iyan, menge kevuwazan kew te nememunù kandan.

Is menge kepuun niw, ne iyan mibunù, ne midhimasad niw haazà is mezaat he mid-ulaula zan su iyan kew midayandayan te midlevengan; mid-ulaula niw heini he tuus te egkesuatan niw is mezaat he vaal te menge kepuun niw.

Is Megbevayà he utew metau, migkaǥi sikandin dengan te, 'Ibpehendiyan ku pa te kandan is ebpemeneuven wey is menge epustul. Ne edhimetayan dan is duma ne is duma ebpesipelahan dan.' Umba migkaǥi heini te Megbevayà su netuenan din he sikiyu is menge Hudiyu, nesevaha is gehinawa niw te ǥehinawa te menge kepuun niw.
Umba sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, elin kew zaan edsilutan te kebpemunua te langun he menge ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà he nengevunù dengan

puunè pa te kedhimetayi ki Abel pehendiyà te kedhimetayi ki Zacarias he mibunù diyà te pid-elangan te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà wey vangkù he pemuhatà. Benar is egkeǥiyen ku he sikiyu is menge etew ǥuntaan, elin kew zaan edsilutan tenged kayi!

Mekehizuhizu kew keuzemà sikiyu is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan su ed-elangan niw is menge etew wey zan kenà metueni is hustu he ibpevayà pehendiyà te Megbevayà. Kenè kew egkesuat he ed-ikul te hustu he ibayà, iyan, ed-eǥenen niw is etew he egkesuat he ed-ikul zutun!"
Ne hein mid-awà si Jesus dutun te valey te Perisiyu, midreǥenreǥen sikandin te menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan. Mezakel is menge insè dan kandin su edteǥelen dan sikandin wey meketavak
su ebpengahaan dan is paaǥi wey mehimu si Jesus he igkesumbung dan.

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, Ne tenged kayi egkeǥiyen ku keniyu te menge sumusundan ku he kenè kew meseeng te egkeenen he igkeuyag niw. Ne kenè kew zaan meseeng te ugelingen he idsun-ud te lawa niw.
Su mibeǥayan kew te Megbevayà te ǥehinawa wey lawa he mahal utew; ne wey pe be kenà mehimu he ebeǥayan kew zin daan te egkeenen wey ugelingen?

Isipa niw is menge uwak; kenè dan ebpemula; kenè dan edraǥun ne wazè dan daan lawig he ederengdengan dan. Ne minsan pa zutun ebpengelintau is Megbevayà te egkekaan dan. Ne iyan kew pe be is etew he lavew pa he mahal ziyà te kandin kenà is menge uwak!
Ne minsan sengemenu is kegkenuǥuni te etew te untung din, wazà minsan hengkey he paaǥi he egkesumpatan din te minsan deisey zà.
Ne emun pinaaǥi te kegkeseeng niw wazè niw egkehimu te minsan kayi te utew zeisey he ebeelan, hengkey is pulus te kedseengseeng niw pa maan te zuma he ebeelan?

Ahaa niw is menge kevukazan ke hengkey is kedtuvù dan. Kenè dan edterebahu ne kenè dan daan ebpengavel. Ne minsan pa zutun, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he minsan si Hadì Sulumun dengan he utew sepian wey nevantug, ne wazà mekesusuluwan is kezagwey te menge bisti zin te kezagwey kayi te menge kevukazan.

Is sagbet, ne wazè din bali; egkeehè ta ǥuntaan ne kenè en utew egkeuǥet ne egkeǥangu en, ne ebinsulan en. Iyan, ke edhimuwen te Megbevayà he mekempet minsan heini is menge sagbet, iyan kew pe be kenè din daan meveǥayi te igkeuugelingen! Maan is utew zeisek is kedsarig niw kandin?
Kenè kew meseeng! Kenè niw iyan isipa ke hengkey is egkekaan niw wey egkeinum.

Su is iring keniyan, ne iyan igkengeseeng te menge etew he wazà medtuu te tutuu he Megbevayà, iyan, sikiyu mulà, kenè niw ikeseeng is iring dutun su is Amey niw he Megbevayà, netuenan din he egkinehenglanen niw heini is langun.
Iyan niw ul-ulaha is ibpeulaula keniyu te Megbevayà he iyan edhadì keniyu ne ibeǥey zin diyà te keniyu is langun he egkinehenglanen niw.
Sikiyu is menge sumusundan ku, kenè kew mahandek. Minsan pa te zeisey kew zà, is Amey niw he Megbevayà, egkesuatan din he medhadì kew iring te edhadì daan sikandin.

Ivelegyè niw is langun he azen niw ne ipemeǥey niw is halin diyà te menge egkengeayuayu. Pinaaǥi kayi egkehimu he zuen ketiǥeyunan niw ziyà te langit. Is menge azen niw ziyà te langit, ne kenà egkezeetan ne kenà egketerinan su wazà ebpenakew ne wazà ipes he ebpekeketket.
Ne ke hendei is egketeǥuan te ketiǥeyunan niw ne zutun daan is gehinawa niw.

Ne impezineg en maan ni Jesus is sempità, ke sikandin te, Andam kew he zaan su wey kenè kew metingkemed te minsan hengkey. Iringi niw is suluǥuen he edtaǥad te egalen dan he ebpuun te eseweey he midtelavuk din.
Su haazà is menge suluǥuen, ne layun dan ed-andam ne kenè dan ed-evukan is sulù dan ne emun ebpekeuma haazà is egalen dan ne ebpenelehuzan diyà te pultahan ne petuluy zan egkepuwasi.

Utew meupiya is kegeǥehinawa zutun te menge suluǥuen emun ebpekeuma haazà is egalen dan ne zaan dan neendami haazà is kebpekeuma zin. Benar is egkeǥiyen ku he haazà is egalen dan, ibpepinuu zin sikandan diyà te lemisahan ne iyan sikandin ebpekaan kandan.
Utew egkengelipey sikandan ke ebpekeuma is egalen dan he kemulu zan pa sikandin edteǥazi minsan ke liwazè en is kezukileman wey minsan ke egkepkepawè en be.

Ne ke si Jesus maan te, Kenè niw heini lipati he emun egketuenan te teǥivaley ke keenu ebpekeuma is tekawen ne ebpekepurung sikandin ebpekevantey ne kenà ebpekeseled dutun te valey zin haazà is tekawen.
Ne sikiyu zaan, kinahanglan he mebpekevantey kew su siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ebpekeuma a te uras he wazè niw isipa he ebpekeuma a.
Ne zutun, mid-insà si Pedro, ke sikandin te, Heini is sempità he migkaǥi nu, iyan key zè be kenikew ebpenuruen is menge sumusundan nu, wey ke elin be is menge etew?

Ne midtavak is Nengazen te, Sikan is suluǥuen he uluwanen wey metinumanen, iyan ibpevayàbayà te egalen din te menge zuma zin he suluǥuen. Ne iyan ebpekaan te menge zuma zin he suluǥuen dutun te uras te kegkaan.
Emun ed-ulì haazà is egalen din, utew zekelà is kelipey zutun te suluǥuen ke egkeahà te egalen din he midtuman din is langun he ebpeveelan kandin.
Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he is suluǥuen he metinumanen, idsarig kandin is langun he menge azen te egalen din.

Iyan, kehizu zin ke iyan diyà te isip din is menaney pa ed-ulì haazà is egalen din ne ebpemuǥelen din is menge zuma zin he suluǥuen he maama wey vahi ne iyan dà baal zin is egkaan wey ed-inum ne egkelangut.

Su zutun te andew he wazè din peebuta wey te uras he wazè din metueni, ebpekeulì haazà is egalen din. Ne haazà is suluǥuen, ebeelan diyà te kandin is iring te ebeelan diyà te menge suluǥuen he kenà egkeseriǥan ne edhimetayan sikandin te egalen din.

Ne sikan is suluǥuen he netuenan din en is ibpeveelan kandin te egalen din, iyan, wazà med-andam ne wazà medtuman te ibpeveelan kandin te egalen din, ne kenà sikandin ed-uraman te ebuǥel zutun te egalen din.

Ne sikan is suluǥuen he wazè din pa metueni is ibpeveelan kandin te egalen din, iyan, duen mid-ulaula zin he igkepeuki kandin te egalen din, ne kenà utew sikandin ebuǥelen. Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, Is etew he zekelà is insarig kandin, dekelà daan is ebperetengen diyà te kandin. Ne emun utew pa zekelà is insarig kandin ne utew en daan dekelà is ebperetengen diyà te kandin.
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, Iyan ku impehendini su wey dini te kelibutan duen hapuy, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, su wey mehukumi is menge etew . Ne ǥustu ku pezem he zaan en he neretem heini is hapuy.
Duen ibewtismu kedì he iyan is dekelà pa he menge kemeresayan he egkeulaula ku he wazè pa mengetuman. Henduen a te ed-utuk te langit taman te kenè ku pa heini egkeliyu.
Kunaan niw vuwa ke iyan impehengkayi ku te kelibutan is wey wazè en samuk te menusiyà. Iyan kenà! Su heini is kebpekehendini ku, ne zuen kebpemekedsusuwey te ǥehinawa te menge etew.
Puun guntaan tenged kedì emun duen lelima he etew ziyà te sengepeningaan, egkevahin sikandan. Ebpekigkuntada is tetelu te zezuwa. Ne iring din ded daan ebpekigkuntada haazà is dezuwa zutun te tetelu.

Ebpekigkuntada is maama te anak din he maama ne is anak, ne ebpekigkuntada te amey zin. Ne is bahi, ne ebpekigkuntada te anak din he vahi ne is anak din, ne ebpekigkuntada zaan te iney zin. Ne ke zuen bahi, ne ebpekigkuntada te ambey zin. Ne egkuntedahan daan sikandin te ambey zin.
Ne migkaǥi med-uman si Jesus diyà te menge etew te, Dini te kenitew ke egkeehè niw is kivel ziyà te edsenlepan ne ke sikiyu te, Ed-uzan heini, ne ed-uzan iyan.
Ne emun ebpengeramag he ebpuun te zapit te zivavà ne ke sikiyu te, Ebmeinit utew ǥuntaan, ne ed-andew iyan.

Tarù is ulaula niw! Su emun ed-ahaan niw is langit wey tanà egketuenan niw ke hengkey is egkehitavù te timpu, iyan, kenè niw uvag egkesavut ke hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan guntaan te Megbevayà pinaaǥi kedì.
Ne ke si Jesus te, Deyzey ke ed-isipen niw is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan.

Penenglitan duen etew he idsumbung kew zin, ne ed-uwiten kew zin diyà te hukmanan. Himuwa niw is taman te egkehimu niw su wey kew kandin mebpekidhusey te kenè kew pa ebpekeetuvang te huwis. Su emun ebpekeetuvang kew en te huwis, kela ke izata kew zin diyà te pulis ne egkepirisu kew.
Ne zutun kew ebpekeubpà taman te kenè niw pa egkeǥempusan is multa keniyu.

Ne sevaha he andew, utew mezakel he menge etew is edhahasekhasek he ed-uvey ziyà te ki Jesus. Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus, asal iyan egkeǥiyan din is menge sumusundan din, ke sikandin te, "Andam kew wey niw melikayi is tapey te menge Perisiyu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is tarù he kedtuu zan te Megbevayà.
Kunaan dan ke kenà egketuenan he tarù is kedtuu zan, iyan, is langun he midtembunan he ed-ul-ulahan te etew, ne egketuenan ded wey is minsan hengkey he nekeeles ne ibpeǥawaǥawa ǥihapun.
Is langun he ednèneesen niw te mezukilem, ne egkezineg ke maandew wey is minsan hengkey he egkegkeǥiyen niw he meeles diyà te ruǥu niw, ne egketuenan ded te mezakel he menge etew ziyà te tiyenggiyan.
Ne sikiyu is menge emiǥu ku, iyan egkeǥiyen ku keniyu is: kenè kew mahandek te menge etew zà duen su iyan dà egkepatey zan is lawa niw, iyan, is gimukud niw, kenè dan egkepatey.

Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu ke hentei is engayan he igkehandek niw. Iyan niw ikehandek is Megbevayà su kenè din iyan dà egkepatey is lawa niw su zuen din keǥehem he ebpeketimbag te ǥimukud niw ziyà te Impirnu. Uya, iyan niw sikandin ikehandek!"
Ne ke si Jesus te, "Duen tagbis he egkepemasa te etew is lelima he vuuk te dezuwa zà he tumbaǥa. Ne minsan pa zutun, is Megbevayà, kenè din id-awà diyà te isip din is minsan sevaha kandan.

Ne iyan kew pe be is minsan ke edtigselimbahan te ebilang is bulvul niw ne netuenan din en is kezakel. Umba, kenè kew mahandek su lavew kew he mahal ziyà te kandin kenà te minsan utew mezakel he menge tagbis.

Utew venar is egkeǥiyen ku," ke si Jesus, "he sikan is etew he egkaǥi ziyà te menge etew he iyan a egalen din, ne siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ed-engkenen ku zaan sikandin diyà te etuvangan te menge velinsuǥuen te Amey ku he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.
Ne sikan is etew he egkaǥi ziyà te menge etew he kenà a iyan egalen din, ne kenè ku zaan sikandin ed-engkenen diyà te etuvangan te menge velinsuǥuen te Amey ku he ziyà te langit.
Ne sikan is edsumpalit kedì te Kakey te Menusiyà, ne egkepesaylu pa; iyan, sikan is edsumpalit te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, kenè en egkepesaylu.

Ne emun tenged te kedtuu niw kedì ed-uwiten kew te menge etew ziyà te menge simbahan dan su edhukuman kew zan ne emun ed-imbistigahan kew zaan diyà te etuvangan te menge hadì wey huwis, kenè kew meseeng ke hengkey is idtavak niw kandan wey ke hengkey is paaǥi niw zutun.
Su is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, iyan ebpenurù keniyu zutun he timpu; ne egketaǥù diyà te ǥehinawa niw is ibpekaǥi zin keniyu."
Ne zuen sevaha he maama zutun te nengevurun he menge etew. Ke sikandin te, "Datù, iyan ka metau te kakey ku he vehini e zin te menge azen he kevilin dey te amey zey he minatey en."
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, "Wazè ku kelavet keniyan su kenà a iyan edhusey keniyu."
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge etew te, "Purungi niw ventayi is ulaula niw su wey wazà keleleǥed diyan te keniyu. Su is ibmeupiya te untung te etew, kenà ebpuun te mezakel he menge azen."
Ne zutun impezineg ni Jesus kandan is sempità. Ke sikandin te, "Duen etew he utew egketiǥayun su zuen tanè din he utew uuzaran.
Ne neisip dutun te etew is, 'Hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan ku kayi te langun he uzar ku? Su kenà egkeamin kayi te menge budiga ku ne wazè en egketeǥuan ku.'
Ne ke sikandin te, 'Edrundusen ku heini is menge budiga ku ne ed-uman a ebevaley te utew zekelà su wey ku zuen meteǥui te langun he egkeraǥun ku wey zuma pa he menge azen ku.

Ne zutun, geina te utew meupiya is kebpekesavuk ku he etew, kenà ad maan edterebahu su naazen ku en is minsan hengkey he egkinehenglanen ku taman te pira pa he tuig. Ne tenged kayi ebperenggey e zà is ebpurung egkaan, ed-inum, wey edlipeylipey,' ke sikandin.

Iyan, dutun migkaǥi ziyà te kandin is Megbevayà te, 'Utew ka tulebung he etew! Guntaan dà te mezukilem egkeumuran ke en ne ebpatey kad, ne hentei vuwa is ebpekeangken te langun he menge azen nu he intaǥù nu keniyan te valey nu?'"

Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus diyà te mezakel he menge etew, ke sikandin te, "Iring kayi te sepian he etew is minsan hentei he edtipig te zekelà he ketiǥeyunan, iyan, wazà diyà te kandin is minsan hengkey he igkesuat te Megbevayà."

Ne zutun he timpu zuen nemekeuma he menge etew ne mibpenudtul zan diyà te ki Jesus is mehitenged te menge etew he tigGeliliya he impehimetayan ni Gubirnedur Pilatu zutun te timpu te kebpelengesa zutun te menge etew te langgam diyà te simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà.

Ne migkaǥi kandan si Jesus te, Kunaan niw vuwa ke lavew pa he mekesesalà haazà is menge tigGeliliya, kenà is menge zuma zan he tigGeliliya, ne tenged dutun intuǥut te Megbevayà he edhimetayan sikandan.
Kenà heeyan iyan! Su egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he emun kenè niw ed-iniyuǥan is menge ulaula niw he memezaat, ebpatey kew zaan is langun, iring kandan.

Ne isipa niw zaan is sepulù wey walu he menge etew he nemematey hein nepilayan sikandan te metikang he valey ziyà te Siluwi. Kunaan niw vuwa ke iyan kandan ingkepilayi su utew lavew sikandan he mekesesalà kenà te langun he menge zuma zan he tigHiruselim.
Kenà daan. Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he emun kenè niw ed-iniyuǥan is memezaat he menge ulaula niw ne ebpatey kew zaan is langun iring kandan.

Ne zuen en maan sempità he impezineg ni Jesus kandan. Ibpenurù din he emun wazà mahalin is ulaula te etew ne edsilutan sikandin te Megbevayà . Ke sikandin te, Duen etew he zuen din pinemula he kayu he igira ziyà te pemuleey zin. Sevaha he andew zutun mid-ehè din haazà is kayu ke zuen en beǥas din he igira. Iyan, wazà mebeǥas haazà is kayu.

Ne migkeǥiyan din is impeelima zin dutun te kayu, ke sikandin te, Nemenu vuwa heini is kayu he kenè en ebeǥasbeǥas? Su tetelu en he tuig is kebperetenga ku ke ebeǥas ne kenè en iyan ebeǥas. Pilaya nu nasì su ebpekehenung dà kayi te zuma he pinemula.
Iyan, migkaǥi haazà is impeelima zutun te, Kenè te pa zè pa, Anggam, ebpilayen su ebpeseseǥazen te pa seled te sengetuig. Edhiǥewanan ku pa is pelingut ne ebukbukan ku pa te pelambù te pinemula.
Ne emun ebeǥas te ilis he tuig ne meupiya, ne emun kenà ebeǥas ne ebpilayen ku.
Ne sevaha he andew he Sebadu, diyà si Jesus ebpenurù te simbahan te menge Hudiyu.
Ne zuen dutun te simbahan bahi he nevekut su midlalung te mezaat he mulin-ulin. Ne menge sepulù en wey walu he tuig haazà is kegkevekut din ne kenè en iyan egkevulug egkeketeng te minsan deisey zà.
Ne zutun te kegkeahaa ni Jesus kandin, mid-umew zin ne ke sikandin te, Ayà, egkeulian ke en keniyan te zaru nu.
Ne midsamsam ni Jesus is peka zutun te vahi ne zutundutun ne neketeng is peka zin. Ne nekezaligdalig haazà is bahi te Megbevayà.

Ne is egalen dutun te simbahan, utew nepauk dutun te kebpemawì ni Jesus dutun te Andew te Kedhimeley. Ne ke sikandin diyà te menge etew te, Seled te heenem he andew is kedterebahu tew te sengesimana. Emun ebpevawì kew zutun he timpu ne meupiya, iyan, kenè kew pevawì guntaan te Andew te Kedhimeley!

Ne midtavak kandin si Jesus te, Tarù is menge ulaula niw! Ke zuen baka ne emun kenà ne kudà te minsan hentei keniyu, kenà egkehimu he kenè din edhekazan haazà emun Andew te Kedhimeley, kekenà, edhekazan din ne edtuyuken din pehendiyà te wahig su ibpeinum din.
Ne heini ǥuntaan is bahi he kevuwazan daan ni Abraham, ne mibakus ni Setanas te sepulù en wey walu he tuig, ne kenè niw ves ebpehekazan kayi te Andew te Kedhimeley!
Ne haazà is tavak ni Jesus, utew ingkeeled te menge kuntada zin. Ne is duma zutun he mezakel he menge etew, utew zan nengelipey te langun he menge egkengein-inuwan he mibeelan din.
Ne impenurù en maan ni Jesus is selakew en maan he sempità, ke sikandin te, Hengkey is meupiya he ebpetug-iringan te kebmezakel te menge etew he edhedian te Megbevayà?

Is kebmezakel zan te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne iring te pinemula he utew zeisey is lisu zin. Ibpemula heini te etew ziyà te kamet din ne ke edtuvù ne edekelà ne egkehimu he iring kezekelà te kayu ne egkeletunan te menge tagbis ne egkeseselaǥan dan is menge subpang din.
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, Hengkey pa is meupiya he ebpetug-iringan te kebmezakel te menge etew he edhedian te Megbevayà?

Is kebmezakel zan te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne iring daan te tapey. Su ke zuen bahi he ebaal te supas, egkuwaan din haazà is tapey ne idsahug din te sengebisin he erina. Ne ed-ensak haazà is tapey zutun te erina ne edtulin haazà is erina.
Midhipanew si Jesus pehendiyà te inged he Hiruselim ne zutun te kedhipanew zin ne mibpenuluytuluy ziyà te zuma pa he menge inged su ebpenurù te menge etew.
Ne zuen mid-insà kandin te, Datù, deisey zè be is menge etew he ebeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan? Ne midtavak si Jesus te,

Himuwa niw is taman te egkehimu niw wey kew mekeseled te meliǥet he ǥemawan he idselang dutun te valey he iyan is untung he wazà pidtemanan su egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he mezakel is egkesuat pezem he edseled dutun, iyan, kenè dan ebpekeseled.

Su edlekevan te teǥivaley haazà is gemawan. Ne emun diyè kew pa te ǥawas ebpenelehuzan kew is egkaǥi te, Puwasi key kenikew! Ne iyan dà idtavak dutun te teǥiǥaked is, Kenè ku egketuenan ke hentei kew wey ke hendei kew ebpuun.
Ne zutun edtavak kew te, Dengan migkaan key wey mid-inum key zuma kenikew ne mibpenurù ka ziyà te inged dey!
Ne edtevaken kew zin te, Kenè ku iyan egketuenan ke hentei kew wey ke hendei kew ebpuun. Sikiyu is memezaat is ulaula, awè kew en dini.

Ne zutun, ke si Jesus, utew zekelà he erang niw ne ebpemekengingitel kew tenged te utew ibmesakit pezem te ǥehinawa niw su kenè kew ebpekeragkes dutun te edhedian te Megbevayà, ne ziyà te seled, ne egkeehè niw is menge kepuun niw zengan, ensi Abraham wey sikan is anak din he si Isaak wey sikan is apù din he si Hakub wey elin daan dutun is langun he ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà.

Mezakel zaan dutun is menge etew he kenà menge zuma niw he Hudiyu he ebpemuun diyà te heepat he pesaǥi kayi te kelibutan. Ne ebpemekepinuu sikandan dutun te keemuran te langun he edhedian te Megbevayà.

Duen guntaan menge etew he kunaan niw ke egkengehuziyan su kenà menge zuma niw he Hudiyu, iyan, emun egkeume en haazà he andew ne iyan sikandan egkehuna te langun he edhedian te Megbavayà. Ne zuen daan menge etew ǥuntaan he kunaan niw ke egkengehuna, iyan, emun egkeume en haazà he andew ne iyan sikandan egkengehuziyan te langun.
Ne zutun daan he andew ne zuen menge Perisiyu he midhinguma zan si Jesus, ne ke sikandan te, Laus ke en ne kenè ke en tuluy zini te kenami su edhimetayan ke kun ni Hadì Hirudis.

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, Si Hirudis, haazà is utew metau he ed-akal, keǥiyi niw sikandin he kenè e pa ed-awà dini su ǥuntaan wey keeselem ebpenegseǥen ku pa is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin he ebpenlalung te menge etew, ne ebewian ku is egkengezeruwan. Ne mekezuwa pa ǥuntaan ne human egkeipus heini is menge vaal ku zini.

Iyan, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he kinahanglan he ednaneynaney e zè pa edlaus guntaan wey keeselem wey te mekezuwa pa su kenà egkehimu he edhimetayan a zini su is ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, ne kenà tekew en edhimetayan ke kenà diyà te seled te inged he Hiruselim.

Ne zutun netenuzan ni Jesus is menge ulaula te menge meǥinged te Hiruselim ne ke sikandin te, Igkeseeng ku sikiyu is menge meǥinged diyà te Hiruselim su ebpemunuen niw is ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà ne is menge suluǥuen te Megbevayà he ibpehendiyà, ebpenulengen niw te vatu he edhimetayan niw. Utew zekelà is suat ku pezem he ed-uyemuwen ku sikiyu; ke và dà manuk, iring a te upa he edlekupan din is menge piyak din ne kenè kew ebpelekup.

Ne ǥuntaan, utew mekevulungbulung heini is simbahan niw su mid-iniyuǥan kew en te Megbevayà. Su egkeǥiyen ku he kenà ad maan keniyu egkeahà taman dutun te timpu keuzemà he ebpekekaǥi kew te, Deliǥa is nekeuma he midsuǥù te Nengazen.

Ne sevaha maan he Andew te Kedhimeley, ne mid-umbite en maan si Jesus te sevaha he pengulu te menge Perisiyu he ziyà ibpekaan te valey zin. Ne is menge kuntada ni Jesus, mibpurungan dan sikandin bentayi ke egkesupak din is kesuǥuan.
Ne zuen dutun maama he egkezeruwan su midlevag is menge paa zin wey velad din ne mid-uvey heini ziyà te ki Jesus.

Ne si Jesus, mid-insaan din is menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan wey is menge Perisiyu, ke sikandin te, Sumalà is ibpenurù kenitew te insurat he kesuǥuan, ebpekesalè ki ve ke ebpemawì ki ke Andew te Kedhimeley?
Iyan, wazè dan tevaka si Jesus, ne zutun migewezan ni Jesus haazà is egkezeruwan ne zutundutun ne neulian. Ne impeulì sikandin ni Jesus.

Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge etew zutun te, Hengkey ve is ed-ul-ulahan niw ke zuen niw anak, ne emun kenà, ne vaka niw he egkeulug diyà te mezalem he vudsi emun Andew te Kedhimeley. Siguradu, edtevangan niw minsan ke Andew te Kedhimeley.
Ne zutun ne wazè dan meketavak.

Ne zuen daan dutun menge etew he mid-umbita zaan dutun te Perisiyu. Ne hein ebpememinuu zan en is egkaan ne naahà ni Jesus he ebpilien te menge etew is ebpinuuwan dan he meupiya he ebpinuuwan he zutun ibpepinuu is menge lavew he menge etew. Ne tenged kayi impezineg ni Jesus kandan is penurù din, ke sikandin te,
Emun egkeumbita ki ziyà te keemuran, kenè ki edhuna ebpinuu ziyà te meupiya he ebpinuuwan. Su kela ke zuen pa ebpekeuma he lavew is ked-etew zin kenè ki.

Ne egkeǥiyan ki zutun te midtukud te keemuran te, Ibpahalin ki su ebpepinuuwan dutun te lavew kenè ki, haazà is mibpinuuwan ta. Ne utew ki zutun egkeeled ke ziyè ki ibpepinuu te kenà utew meupiya he ebpinuuwan.

Iyan, ke egkeumbita ki ziyà te keemuran, kenè ki ebpemilì te meupiya he ebpinuuwan. Ne emun ebpinuu ki en, diyè ki ebpinuu te kenà utew meupiya he ebpinuuwan. Ne zutun, haazà is midtukud te keemuran, ebpekekaǥi kenita te, He Geli, kenè ka keniyan mebpinuu su kayi ka pinuu te meupiya he ebpinuuwan. Ne zutun, kenè ki egkeeled, kekenà, egketahud ki te menge etew.

Sikan is etew he ed-isipen din he lavew is pid-etawan din ne ebminusen heini te Megbevayà. Iyan, sikan is etew he ed-isipen din he minus is pid-etawan din ne ebpeketikangen te Megbevayà is pid-etawan din.

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus dutun te midtukud te keemuran te, Ne sikew zaan, Mama, emun edtukud ka te keemuran ne kenè nu iyan dà umbitaha is menge kilala nu wey is menge suled nu wey menge siringan nu he sepian su sikandan, ne neezenan dan mulà ne edsembayan ke zan ed-umbitaha ke edtukud dan te keemuran ne zutun ebpekevales dan en te meupiya he mid-ulaula nu kandan.
Iyan, emun edtukud ka te keemuran ne iyan nu umbitaha is egkengeayuayu wey is menge pigket, menge pungkul, wey is menge lakap.

Ne emun iyan heini ulaula nu ne utew zekelà is kelipey nu su kenè dan ebpekesambey he ed-umbita kenikew ne kenè dan egkevelesan is meupiya he mid-ulaula nu kandan, ne iyan is Megbevayà ebales kenikew te utew meupiya he egkeulaula zutun keuzemà te kegkengevanhew te menge etew he memeupiya is ulaula.

Ne is sevaha zutun te menge maama he ebpememinuu ziyà te uvey ni Jesus, hein nezineg din haazà is penurù ni Jesus ne migkaǥi te, Utew zekelà is kelipey te menge etew he ebpeketelavuk dutun keuzemà te keemuran he zutun ibpekaan is langun he menge etew he edhedian te Megbevayà!
Ne zutun impezineg ni Jesus kandin is sempità. Ke sikandin te, Duen sevaha he etew he midtukud te zekelà he keemuran. Ne haazà is etew, ne mezakel is menge etew he mid-umbita zin.

Ne hein netuman en haazà is keemuran ne midsuǥù din is suluǥuen din he ibpetukew en is menge etew su nengelutù en is igastu. Ne ke sikandin diyà te menge suluǥuen din te, Keǥiyi niw sikandan he medhendini zan en su naandam en is langun!

Iyan, is menge etew he mid-umbita zin, ne wazà diyà te ǥehinawa zan haazà is keemuran. Is kada sevaha zutun ne mibpemituwà te kenà ebpeketelavuk dutun. Is duma ne egkaǥi te, Kenè dà mebmezaat is gehinawa nu kedì su kenà a ebpeketelavuk su zuen tanà he veǥu ku pa he nepemasa ne edleuyen ku ǥuntaan.
Ne is sevaha pa maan dutun ne migkaǥi te, Kenè dà mebmezaat is gehinawa nu kedì su kenà a ebpeketelavuk te keemuran su zuen sepulù he vaka he sikan ku pa mepemasa ne igezam ku id-edadu!
Ne is sevaha pa he etew zutun, ne egkaǥi te, Kenà a ebpeketelavuk su sikan pa meipus is kebpeesewaa kediey ne umba kenà a ebpekehendiyan.

Ne zutun mid-ulì haazà is midsuǥù te edtukud te keemuran ne midtudtul zin diyà te egalen din haazà is langun he menge pituwà te menge etew he impeveyaan kandin. Ne haazà is egalen din, ne utew mibmezaat is gehinawa zin. Ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is suluǥuen din te, Hendiyè ka te inged ne ikula nu is menge kersada wey menge zalan dutun ne pendumaha nu zini is menge etew he egkengeayuayu, sikan is menge piang, menge pungkul, wey menge lakap. Ne zutun midhipanew haazà is suluǥuen.
Ne hein nekeulì en haazà is midsuǥù ne migkeǥiyan din haazà is egalen din te, Nemekeume en is menge etew he impeveyaan nu, iyan, wazè pa meenget heini is baley.

Ne midtavak haazà is egalen din te, Hendiyè ka te menge unayan wey vuntud ne ikula nu is menge zalan dutun ne teǥela nu is menge etew zutun he medtelavuk dan kayi te keemuran ku su wey mepurung meenget te menge etew heini is baley ku.
Benar is egkeǥiyen ku kenikew he haazà is nengehuna he mid-umbita ku, ne kenè dan ebpekekaan te minsan deisey zà kayi te ǥastu ku te keemuran!
Ne sengeandew zutun te edhipanew si Jesus ne utew mezakel is menge etew he ebpemenduma kandin. Ne midsineruwan din sikandan te egkaǥi te,

Sikan is etew he egkesuat he edsundan kediey, iyan, iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is ginikanan din, esawa zin, menge anak din, menge suled din, ne emun kenà, ne iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is keugelingen din he lawa, ne kenà egkehimu he tutuu sikandin he sumusundan ku.

Ne iring din ded daan sikan is etew he egkesuat he edsundan kediey, iyan, kenà edtiang te krus din, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, egkehandek he edtuman te menge suǥù ku su kela ke iyan ibpatey zin , ne kenà daan egkehimu he tutuu sikandin he sumusundan ku.

Penenglitan, ke zuen sevaha keniyu he ebevaley te utew metikang he valey, ne zutun te kenè pa sikandin ebpuun ne egkuwintahan din is selapì he egkeǥastu zin su wey zin metueni ke egkeveleveg din be haazà is baley he ibpehitindeg din wey ke kenà.

Su emun kenè din egkuwintahan is selapì he igkeǥastu zin ne kela ke tekew zin en ikepasek is menge tukud ne zutun dà taman. Ne is mezakel he menge etew he ebpekeahà dutun ne ebpemenggemenggemen is edsudì su haazà is baley, ne tekew en tukud he ingkepasek.
Ne ebpelelelaǥè dan te, Tumù pa ke wazè en sikandin mebulug mebpasek te ebelayen su kenè din bes egkehimu.

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, Iring din ded daan is hadì. Su is hadì he ebpekidtebek te sengehahadì ne kinahanglan he edhuna sikandin ebelansi ke ebpekezaag is sepulù he libu he menge sundaru zin te keluwaan he libu he ebpemekeuma he sundaru te kuntada zin he sengehahadì.

Ne emun egkevelansi zin he kenà ebpekesukul is menge sundaru zin, ne meupiya pa ke edsuǥuen din is menge suluǥuen din dutun te kuntada zin te meziyù pa is menge sundaru te kuntada zin su wey zan mebpehusayà te wazè pa mekevulug mekedtebek is menge sundaru zan.

Ne iring din ded daan, ke si Jesus, su sikiyu is edsundan kediey, kenè kew egkehimu he tutuu he menge sumusundan ku emun kenè egkeawà diyà te ǥehinawa niw is ked-engkezi niw te langun he egkenuǥunan niw.

Ne zutun impezineg ni Jesus is sempità su ibpesavut din he is kedsundan dan kandin ne iring te timus . Ke sikandin te, Meupiya is timus su ibmeupiya te egkeenen , iyan, ke egkeawà diyà te timus is taam din wazè en paaǥi he egkehimu te kebpelikua te taam din.
Ne wazè en iyan pulus din su kenà egkeǥamit te minsan ebunu he pelambù te tanà ne ed-engkezan dà. Kinahanglan he sevuta niw heini is nezineg niw.
Ne zutun he timpu, duen mezakel he menge mekesesalà he etew he menge menunukut te vuhis wey menge mesinupaken te kesuǥuan, ne nemenhendiyè dan te ki Jesus su ebpemineǥen dan is penurù din.

Ne utew heini ingkeepes te menge Perisiyu wey menge menunudlù te kesuǥuan he zutun daan, ne ke sikandan te, Heini si Jesus, ne ebpemekiduma kayi te menge etew he utew mesinupaken te kesuǥuan tew ne egkaan daan sikandin duma kandan.
Ne zutun impezineg ni Jesus kandan heini is sempità, ke sikandin te,

Penenglitan, is sevaha keniyu ke zuen din nenggatus he ayam he kerehidu, ne netazin is sevaha zutun, hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan din? Siguradu egkeewaan din haazà is kesiyawan wey siyew he ebpemenabtab su ebpengahaan din haazà is sevaha he netazin taman te egketuredu zin.
Ne emun egketuredu zin ne utew sikandin egkelipey. Ne edsepipiyen din haazà su ed-ulì.
Ne ke ebpekeuma sikandin diyà te valey zin ne ebpenewaǥen din is menge zuma zin wey menge siringan din ne ke sikandin te, Edlipey kiw en su neehè ku zed heini is netazin he kerehidu ku.

Ne ke si Jesus te, Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he iring din ded daan, utew zekelà is kelipey ziyà te langit ke zuen sevaha he mesinupaken he ed-iniyuǥan din is memezaat he ulaula zin, kenà dutun te kesiyawan wey siyew he menge etew he kunaan dan ke memetazeng is ulaula zan wey kenà kinahanglan he ed-iniyuǥan dan haazà is mezaat he ulaula zan.

Ne zuen pa maan sempità he impezineg ni Jesus kandan. Ke sikandin te, Duen sevaha he vahi he midtipig te sepulù he elad he selapì he mahal su pudu pelata. Hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan din ke egketezinan haazà te sengeelad? Iyan ed-ul-ulahan din is edhuna edtemtem te sulù. Ne ebpeyupasan din is baley zin, ne ebpurungan din te ebpen-ahà taman te egkeehè din.
Ne emun egkeehè din ne ebpenewaǥen din is menge zuma zin wey menge siringan din, ne ke sikandin te, Edlipey kiw en su neehè ku zed heini is selapì he netazin ku.

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus med-uman te, Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he iring kayi is kedlipey ziyà te langit te menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà emun duen sevaha he mesinupaken he ed-iniyuǥan din is memezaat he ulaula zin.
Ne impelaus ni Jesus is egkeǥiyen din, ke sikandin te, Duen sevaha he etew he zezuwa is anak din he pudu maama.

Ne migkaǥi is hazi ziyà te amey zin te, Amà, iveǥey nu en kedì is kediey he vahin kayi te menge azen tew. Ne iyan dà haazà ne mibahin dutun te amey is menge azen din dutun te zezuwa he vuuk he anak din.

Ne wazà utew meuǥet dutun ne imbelegyè en dutun te hazi is kandin he vahin ne midhipanew is ed-uwit te selapì din. Diyà sikandin medtandang te meziyù he inged ne zutun migastu zin is selapì din te wazà pulus.
Ne zutun naamin is selapì din. Ne nekeuma is utew mepait he vitil zutun te tanà, ne sikandin, wazè din en egkekuwaan te kinahanglan din.
Ne midhangyù sikandin te terebahu ziyà te sevaha he meǥinged dutun. Ne mibeǥayan sikandin te terebahu he kebpenamak te vavuy ziyà te unayan.
Egkesuatan din pezem he mahantey sikandin te minsan ukap dà he idsamak te menge vavuy, iyan, wazà dutun mibeǥey kandin.
Ne hein neuǥet dutun ne nekepurung sikandin mekeisip-isip. Ke sikandin te, Langun te menge suluǥuen te amey ku ne idsegkayè dan is egkeenen, iyan, siaken heini, ne egkeumes e en te vitil.
Iyan tumù ne ed-ulì e zed diyà te amey ku, ne iyan egkeǥiyen ku ziyà te kandin is: Amà, dekelà utew is salè ku ziyà te Megbevayà wey zini te kenikew te amey ku.
Kenà ad dait he ed-isipen nu pa maan he anak nu, kekenà, isipe e zà kenikew he sevaha te menge suluǥuen nu.

Ne iyan dà haazà neisip din ne zutun midtandang sikandin med-ulì. Ne meziyù pa sikandin ne nepantew en dutun te amey zin. Ne utew nehizu haazà is amey zin he ed-ahà kandin. Ne mibpelelaǥuy is amey zin he edsinuǥung kandin ne migkepkepan ne midhezekan sikandin te amey zin.
Amà, egkaǥi haazà is kenakan, utew zekelà is salè ku ziyà te Megbevayà wey ziyan te kenikew te amey ku. Kenà ad dait he ed-isipen nu pa maan he anak nu. Ne himuwe e zà he sevaha te menge suluǥuen nu.

Iyan, haazà is amey zin, mid-umew zin is menge suluǥuen din dutun te valey, ne ke sikandin te, Ihated niw pa zini sikan is meupiya he ugelingen, ne isun-ud niw ziyà te kandin. Sisingi niw is tezù din wey sun-uzi niw te sepatus is menge paa zin.
Ne kuwaa niw sikan is nati he vaka he impelambù ku ne lepaa niw su egkaan kiw ne edlipey kiw.
Su heini is anak ku, iring te minatey sikandin ne ǥuntaan neuyaǥan. Netazin sikandin ne ǥuntaan neturedu en. Ne zutun nebibu zan.

Ne haazà maan, ke si Jesus, is kakey he anak dutun te etew, diyà sikandin te unayan dan. Ne hein ebpelpelinggume en sikandin is ed-ulì ne nezineg din is edtambur wey is leletepak te paa te ebpemenayew.
Ne mid-umew zin is sevaha zutun te menge suluǥuen te amey zin ne mid-insà te, Hengkey is igkebibu te menge etew keniyan te valey?
Ne midtavak haazà is suluǥuen te, Nekeulì sikan is hazi nu. Ne impelapà te amey nu sikan is nati he impelambù su nekeulì sikandin he wazè ded mekeizi.
Ne zutun utew neepes haazà is kakey ne wazà mebpemenahik dutun te valey. Ne zutun mibpenaug haazà is amey zan he ednayùnayù is egkaǥi ziyà te kandin te, Laus ke man dini, Mama.

Ne midtavak haazà is anak din te, Tenuzi nu, Amà, ke sengemenu is keuǥet te kedterebahu ku kayi he iring te suluǥuen nu. Wazè nu egketenuzan he suǥù nu he wazè ku pemineǥa te minsan hengkey he timpu. Ne minsan pa zutun ne wazà a kenikew veǥayi te minsan kambing dà duen wey a mekelipeylipey zuma te menge emiǥu ku.
Iyan, heini is anak nu he nekelaga te menge azen nu tenged te kebpengumpadi zin te menge vahi, ne iyan nu mulà midlepaan te impelambù nu he nati!
Mama, egkaǥi haazà is amey zin, sikew, dini ka mulà layun duma ku. Ne is langun he azen ku, ne kenikew. Ne iyan ka teǥiǥaked te langun.
Ne kenè ta egkeeǥen is kelipey ta, su heini is hazi nu, ne iring sikandin te minatey, ne ǥuntaan neuyaǥan en. Netazin sikandin, ne ǥuntaan neturedu en.

Ne impezineg en maan ni Jesus is menge sumusundan din te selakew pa maan he sempità. Ke sikandin te, Duen sepian he etew he impezumala zin is sevaha he suluǥuen din te menge ketiǥeyunan din. Ne zuen daan etew he midsumbung dutun te sepian he haazà is impezumala, ne ebpenggestuwen din is selapì dutun te egalen din.

Ne hein nezineg haazà dutun te sepian, ne midtawag din haazà is suluǥuen din ne migkeǥiyan din te, Tutuu heini is sumbung mehitenged kenikew. Iulì nu kediey is langun he insarig ku kenikew su kenè en egkehimu he iyan ka ibpezumala kayi te menge ketiǥeyunan ku.

Ne neisip dutun te suluǥuen is, Id-awè e ves kayi te terebahu ku. Hengkey is meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan ku? Su siak, ne kenè e en ebpekehimu he edterebahu te meveǥat iring te kegkalut ne egkeeled a he ebpemumuyù te limus.
A, ke sikandin, iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan ku su wey zuen duma ku he egkepeveyaan ku ke egkeawè e en kayi te terebahu ku.
Ne zutun midtawag din te tigselimbaha is langun he nekeutang dutun te egalen din. Ne ke sikandin diyà te nehuna te, Pira is kenikew he utang diyà te egalen ku?

Ne midtavak haazà is mid-insaan te, Nenggatus he lata te lana. Ne migkaǥi haazà is suluǥuen te, Heini zed is listahan te utang nu. Pinuu ka kayi ne is insurat nu kayi he utang nu ne ilisi nu te kelimahan dà he lata.

Ne nekeuma is sevaha zutun. Ne mid-insaan dutun te suluǥuen ke pira is kandin he utang, ne midtavak sikandin te nengkelibu he vinevey he trigu. Ne migkeǥiyan sikandin te suluǥuen te, Heini zed is listahan te utang nu. Pinuu ka kayi ne ilisi nu te walu he ǥatus dà he vinevey.

Ne zutun, ke si Jesus, hein nezineg haazà dutun te egalen din ke hengkey is mid-ulaula zutun te suluǥuen din, ne nekekaǥi te, Hey, utew metau sikandin su ebpeneǥane en sikandin he zaan te keuyaǥan din keuzemà.  Ne ke si Jesus te, Is menge etew he kenà ebpemineg te menge lalag te Megbevayà, utew metau te paaǥi te kegkezeyzey zan. Iyan, is menge etew he sakup te Megbevayà, kenè dan bes mulà utew metau te paaǥi wey mezeyzey sikandan keuzemà diyà te langit.

Umba, ke si Jesus, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ǥemita niw is ketiǥeyunan niw zini te kelibutan wey metevangi is egkengeayuayu ne emun egkeuma haazà is timpu keuzemà he kenè niw en egkeǥamit is menge azen niw, edsuhulan kew te Megbevayà diyà te langit.

Benar is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he emun egkeseriǥan ka te zeisek he azen, egkeseriǥan ka zaan te zekelà he azen. Ne emun limbungan ka te minsan deisek dà, ne wey ke pe be kenà medlimbung duen te zekelè en he ebpeǥewezan kenikew.
Emun kenè ka egkeseriǥan he ibpeǥawed te menge ketiǥeyunan he kayi te kelibutan, ne kenè ke en iyan ibpeǥawed te Megbevayà te menge tutuu he ketiǥeyunan diyà te langit.
Ne emun kenè ka egkeseriǥan he ibpeǥawed te menge azen te zuma, kenè ke en iyan ebeǥayan dutun te tutuu he azen he ziyà te langit.

Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, Is uripen, kenà egkehimu he zezuwa is teǥiuripen kandin. Su emun dezuwa is ebayàbayà kandin, edtehuzen din is sevaha ne egkepeukan din is sevaha. Ne emun kenà, ne egkeepesan din is sevaha, ne ebmahalen din is sevaha. Ne iring din ded daan emun iyan mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa nu is ketiǥeyunan, su kenà egkehimu he mahal zaan diyà te ǥehinawa nu is Megbevayà.
Ne zuen dutun menge Perisiyu he iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zan is selapì. Ne hein nezineg dan haazà is penurù ni Jesus ne midsumpalit dan sikandin.

Ne zutun migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandan te, Iyan kew sikan is henduen be te meupiya is ulaula ke ziyà te etuvangan te menge etew, iyan, wazà mekeeles te Megbevayà ke hengkey is diyà te isip niw. Is ed-isipen te etew he utew mahal, ne wazè din bali ziyà te Megbevayà.

Is kedtumana te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin dengan ni Moises wey is kedtumana te menge lalag he insurat te menge ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, ne impesavut heini taman dà te timpu ni Juan Megbebewtismu. Puun dutun iyan ibpesavut diyà te langun he menge etew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen te keaǥi te ǥinhedian te Megbevayà. Ne edteǥel is minsan hentei wey meǥaan pezem sikandan mekeseled dutun te ǥinhedian.
Iyan, kenà egkehimu he edhelinen is kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises. Egkehanew pa is langit wey tanà, iyan, is minsan deisek dà he ibpenurù te kesuǥuan ne kenà egkehalin.

Ne elin daan migkaǥi ni Jesus is, ke sikandin te, Ke zuen maama he ebpengesawa te sengevevahi su mid-engkezan din is esawa zin, ebpekesalà sikandin dutun te mid-engkezan din he esawa. Ne ebpekesalà daan is maama he ebpengesawa zutun te vahi he mid-engkezan te esawa zin.

Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, Duen sevaha he etew he sepian utew. Ne haazà is sepian, utew menge mahal he manggad is idsun-ud din. Ne kada andew ne iyan dà ibpekaan kandin is utew mahal wey metaam he egkeenen.

Ne zuen daan sevaha he etew he egkeayuayu he egngezanan ki Lazaro. Ne haazà si Lazaro, ne neeneb is lawa zin te vekukang. Ne kada andew zutun ne idhated sikandin te menge zuma zin dutun te vunsuzan te valey zutun te sepian

su ebperateng he ebeǥayan sikandin te minsan menge mumu zà he egkengeulug dutun te lemisahan te sepian wey mahantey is getek din dutun. Ne is menge asu zutun, ne ebpemendilaan dan haazà is menge vekukang ni Lazaro.

Ne wazà utew meuǥet dutun ne minatey haazà is ayuayu he si Lazaro ne mid-angey sikandin te menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà ne insavuk dan diyà te uvey ni Abraham te kepuun te menge Hudiyu. Ne zutun daan he timpu ne minatey zaan haazà is sepian he etew ne inleveng sikandin.
Ne mid-uwit sikandin diyà te Iveyaan. Ne zutun ne utew sikandin nerasey ne hein nekelingahà, neehè din si Abraham, iyan, utew meziyù. Ne neehè din daan si Lazaro zutun te uvey ni Abraham.

Ne mid-umew sikandin diyà te ki Abraham, ke sikandin te, He Apù Abraham, kehizuwi a kenikew! Ipehengkayi nu pa si Lazaro wey zin egkepetiǥisi te wahig heini is bèbè ku su utew e en nerasey kayi te hapuy!

Iyan, midtavak ni Abraham haazà is mid-umew te, Apù, tentenuzi nu he hein uuyag ke pa, ne mid-em-eminan nu en is kedlipeylipey nu. Iyan, si Lazaro mulà, ne neem-eminan din en is kemeresayan. Ne ǥuntaan, si Lazaro, edlipayen; ne sikew, edresayen.
Ne ikezuwa zin daan ne kawangkawang heini is pid-eletan tew. Ne wazà ebpekelayun dini he ebpuun diyan; ne iring din ded daan dini te kenami su wazà ebpekelayun pehendiyan he ebpuun dini.
Ne zutun mid-uman megkaǥi haazà is sepian te, Ne emun iyan heeyan, Apù, ne iyan dà edhengyuen ku is ipelikù nu si Lazaro ziyà te valey te amey ku
su zuen lelima he hazi ku he maama. Ne kinahanglan he metueni zan he zaan wey zan kenà mekehendini te ubpeey te ebpenresayen.
Ne midtavak si Abraham te, Duen diyà te kandan menge surat he impesurat te Megbevayà ki Moises wey te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà dengan. Egkehimu he ebpemineǥen haazà dutun te menge hazi nu.
Ne midtavak haazà is sepian te, Kenè dan, Apù, haazà ebpemineǥen, iyan, emun duen minatey he egkevanhew he edhendiyà te kandan, ne ed-iniyuǥan dan is memezaat he ulaula zan.

Ne migkaǥi zutun si Abraham te, Emun kenè dan ebpemineǥen is menge surat ni Moises wey te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà dengan, kenè dan daan ebpemineg minsan ke zuen egkevanhew he minatey he edhendiyà te kandan.

Ne zuen migkaǥi ni Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din, ke sikandin te, Kenà egkehimu he wazà igkeawà te kedsarig te etew kedì, iyan kehizu utew te etew he pinaaǥi kandin egkeawà is kedsarig te minsan hentei he midtuu kedì, su utew meveǥat is silut kandin te Megbevayà.

Meupiya pa ziyà te kandin ke idhiket diyà te lieg din is dekelà he ǥelingan he vatu ne id-agbur ziyà te lawed te zaǥat, kenà is silut kandin emun pinaaǥi kandin egkeawà is kedsarig te minsan sevaha zà kayi te menge vatà.

Umba, mebpekevantey kew layun! Ne migkaǥi si Jesus med-uman te, Emun duen duma nu he nekesalà kenikew, ne keǥiyi nu wey sembaǥi nu, ne emun ibmesakit haazà te ǥehinawa zin ne ebuyù te pesaylu, ne peseyluwa nu.
Ne minsan kepipitu pa sikandin mekesalà kenikew te sengeandew, ne kepipitu zaan sikandin ebuyù te pesaylu ziyà te kenikew, ne peseyluwa nu sikandin.
Ne migkaǥi haazà is menge epustul diyà te ki Jesus te, Heǥeta nu is kedtuu zey.

Ne midtavak si Jesus te, Emun duen kedtuu nu he minsan iring dà kezekelà te sengevuuk he lisu te mustasa he utew zeisek ne egkekeǥiyan nu heini is dekelà he kayu te, Awè ka keniyan ne halin ka ziyà te zaǥat. Ne iyan dà haazà, ne ebpezumazuma kenikew.

Ne migkaǥi en maan si Jesus te, Penenglitan, ke zuen suluǥuen te sevaha keniyu ne iyan baal zin is ed-eradu ne emun kenà ne ed-elima te menge ayam nu. Ne emun sikan pa ed-ulì te mahapun, kenà egkehimu he egkeǥiyan nu te, Huna ka kaan ne human a.
Kenà, su iyan egkeǥiyen nu is, Penlùlù ke pa ne subai a kenikew wey a mekekaan. Ne wey ka mekekaan ke egkeipus a he egkaan.
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi si Jesus te, Ne haazà is suluǥuen, ne kenà igkezeliǥi kandin is kedtuman din su ketengdanan din is kedtuman te menge suǥù kandin te egalen din.
Ne iring kew zaan dutun. Ne emun egkepasad niw is ebpeveelan keniyu te Megbevayà, ne itaǥù niw ziyà te isip niw he menge suluǥuen kew zà te Megbevayà ne midtuman niw zà is menge suǥù din keniyu.
Ne zutun te kebpehendiyè en ni Jesus te inged he Hiruselim ne ziyà sikandin mebayà te pid-elangan te menge prubinsya he Semarya wey Geliliya.
Ne nekeuma sikandin diyà te sevaha he inged ne zuen dutun sepulù he maama he it-iten he nemeninuǥung kandin. Ne tenged te it-iten sikandan wazè dan uvayi si Jesus, kekenà, diyè dan dà te meziyù.
Ne mid-umew zan ki Jesus te, He Zatù Jesus, ikehizu key kenikew!

Ne hein neehè din sikandan ne migkaǥi sikandin te, Hendiyè kew en te menge memumuhat te Megbevayà wey zan maahà he nengeulian kew. Ne nemenhipanew zan ne zutun te kegenat dan nengeulian segugunà sikandan.
Ne is sevaha zutun, hein neehè din he wazè en it-it din, midlikù diyà te ki Jesus is ebpempemensag is edalig te Megbevayà.
Ne midluhud diyà te etuvangan ni Jesus ne utew zekelà is kebpeselemati zin kandin. Ne haazà is neulian, ne kenà Hudiyu su tigSemarya he etew.
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandin te, Kenè be sepulù kew man is nengeulian? Maan is wazà mekelikù is siyew he menge zuma nu?
Maan is iyan ke zà is tigSemarya midlikù he edalig te Megbevayà?
Ne migkeǥiyan ni Jesus te, Mama, hitindeg ke en ne hipanew kad. Is kedsarig nu te Megbevayà ne iyan nekelibri kenikew te silut.
Sengeandew zutun ne zuen menge Perisiyu he mid-insà ki Jesus te, Keenu egketuman is egkeǥiyen nu he kedhedii te Megbevayà te menusiyà? Ne midtavak si Jesus te, Kenà egkeahà te etew is kegketuman din

su kenà egkehimu he zuen etew he ebpekekaǥi te, Ahaa niw su heini en! Ne emun kenà, ne Dutun sikan is ibpahadì te Megbevayà! Su, ke si Jesus, diyè dà te ǥehinawa te etew sikan is kedhedii kandin te Megbevayà ne kenà egkeahà te mata.

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te menge sumusundan din te, Egkeuma is andew he utew zekelà pezem diyà te ǥehinawa niw he meǥaan metuman is timpu te kedlikù ku te Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan, kenè pa egkehitavù.
Ne emun duen egkaǥi keniyu he ziyà a is Kakey te Menusiyà te uvey wey ke ziyà a te meziyù ne kenè kew mebpemineg.
Su is kedlikù ku, ne iring te kilat he ebpeketayew te tivuuk he tanà, ne egkeahà te minsan hentei.
Iyan, siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, kinahanglan he egkehuna pa egkeuma is kedresaya kedì, wey is kenà kedewata te menge etew te menge penurù ku.
Ne keuzemà te timpu te kedlikù ku zini te kelibutan, ebpekeiring is menge ulaula te menge etew zutun duen te menge ulaula zengan te menge etew zuen te timpu ni Noe.

Su zengan te keazen pa ni Noe, iyan dà neisip te menge etew is kegkebibu ne migkaan dan ne mid-inum dan ne mibpees-eseweey zan taman te midseled ensi Noe zuen te utew zekelà he avang he egngezanan te arka ne hein midlapey is daǥat nengelened maamin haazà is menge etew.

Ne elin daan egkeiringan te timpu te kedlikù ku, is timpu zengan te keazen pa ni Lut. Su zutun wazà rintas te kegkebibu te menge etew te kebpemengaan wey kebpemenginum. Mibpenigudu zan he ebpememasa wey ebpememelegyà wey ebpememula wey ebpemevaley.
Ne haazà he andew te ked-awà ni Lut dutun te inged din he egngezanan te Suduma, is langun he menge etew he meǥinged dutun, ne nelimas te hapuy wey esupri he mid-ulug te Megbevayà ebpuun te langit.
Iring ded dutun keǥaan is kegketik-ew te kedlikù ku te Kakey te Menusiyà keuzemà.

Ne zutun he andew, ke si Jesus, sikan is etew he egkeserengà diyà te ǥawas te valey zin, ne ziyè pa te seled is menge azen din ne kenè en medseled dutun te valey te kegkuwa te minsan hengkey. Ne iring din ded daan is etew he egkeserengà diyà te pemuleey zin; wazè en kinahanglan he medlikù sikandin diyà te valey zin.
Tentenuzi niw ke hengkey is nehitavù duen te esawa ni Lut.

Sikan is etew he egkenuǥunan din is untung din kenà is kedsundan din kedì, ne nasì kenà ebpekeangken te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne sikan is etew he kenè din egkenuǥunan is untung din tenged te kedsundan din kedì, ebeǥayan sikandin te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Ne zutun he timpu emun egketuman is kedlikù ku te mezukilem ne ke zuen ebpehulizey he zezuwa he etew ne egkuwaan is sevaha ne is sevaha ne egketaǥak.
Ne iring ded daan dutun su ke zuen zezuwa he vahi he ebpeuǥupà te kebpenggaling, ne egkuwaan te menge velinsuǥuen ku is sevaha ne egketaǥak is sevaha.
Ne iring din ded daan ke zuen dezuwa he etew he ebpeuǥupey ziyà te pemuleey, su egkuwaan is sevaha ne is sevaha ne egketaǥak.

Ne zutun mid-insà ki Jesus is menge sumusundan din, ke sikandan te, Hendei heini egkehitavù? Ne midtavak si Jesus te, Ke hendei is minatey ne zutun daan is menge tagbis he egkaan te nemahù, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, emun utew en edsubra is kelelalung te menusiyà ne egketuman en is kedlimasa kandan te Megbevayà .
Ne zuen en maan sempità he impezineg ni Jesus te menge sumusundan din. Ibpesavut din kandan dutun he kinahanglan he kenè dan bungasa te layun ked-ampù ne kenà daan med-engked he edsarig te Megbevayà.
Ne ke sikandin te, Duen huwis diyà te sengeinged; ne haazà is huwis, ne kenà egkehandek te Megbevayà ne wazè din daan kedtahud te minsan hentei he etew.

Ne zutun te inged ne zuen daan balu he vahi he layun ebpehendutun te huwis su edhangyù he ebpetavang. Ke sikandin dutun te huwis te, Tevangi a kenikew su wey kenà meileg te kuntada ku is menge azen ku.

Ne neuǥet en haazà he kenà edseǥipaan dutun te huwis is hangyù dutun te vahi. Ne ǥeina te neuǥet en is layun kedlikùlikù dutun te vahi he edhangyù diyà te kandin, ne neisip dutun te huwis is, Minsan wazè ku kehandek te Megbevayà ne wazè ku zaan kedtahud te minsan hentei etawa,
edtevangan ku nasì heini is bahi su wey mekeengked is ed-uringer kedì.
Ne ke si Jesus te, Isipa niw is mid-ulaula zutun te huwis he kenà pezem metazeng is kedhusey zin.
Su emun nehimu he midtevangan din haazà is bahi, iyan pe be kenà tevangi te Megbevayà sikiyu is menge nengepilì din he etew he ebpenigudu ed-ampù diyà te kandin te mezukilem wey maandew.

Egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he utew meǥaan is kedtevangi zin keniyu. Kenà ebungasen is Megbevayà he edtavang keniyu. Iyan, keuzemà emun edlikù a is Kakey te Menusiyà dini te kelibutan mezelag dà is etew zutun he neketuu kedì.

Ne sengeandew maan dutun ne impezineg ni Jesus is sempità. Ne heini is sempità, ne iyan egkesuǥat is menge etew he kunaan dan ke iyan dan dà memeupiya is ulaula ne edsudien dan is langun he menge zuma he etew.
Ne ke si Jesus te, Duen dezuwa he etew he midhendiyà te zekelà he simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà su ed-ampù dan. Ne is sevaha zutun, ne Perisiyu, ne is sevaha, ne menunukut te vuhis.

Ne midhitindeg haazà is Perisiyu ne mid-ampù pinaaǥi te ǥehinawa zin, ke sikandin te, Megbevayà, ebpeselamat a kenikew su kenà a iring te zuma. Kenà a leǥezen; kenà a ebpenlimbung; kenè ku edselselaan is esawa ku. Ebpeselamat a zaan kenikew su kenà a iring keniyà te limbungan he menunukut te vuhis.
Kezezuwa a edsalang te kegkaan te sengesimana ne ibeǥey ku ziyà te kenikew is ikesepulù he vahin te langun he egketiǥeyunan ku! ke sikandin.

Iyan, haazà is sevaha he etew he menunukut te vuhis, ne mibpekeziyù sikandin is ebpekezuzungul ne egkepenempaling din is kumeng din su utew neseeng. Ne mid-ampù sikandin diyà te Megbevayà he egkaǥi te, Megbevayà, ikehizu a utew kenikew is sevaha he etew he mekesesalà!

Ne ke si Jesus dutun te, Benar is egkeǥiyen ku he haazà is menunukut te vuhis, hein mid-ulì diyà te valey zin ne wazè en isipa te Megbevayà is salè din su nepesaylu en. Iyan, kenà iring dutun haazà is gelbuwen he Perisiyu su is etew he kunaan din ke utew lavew sikandin diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà, ne ebminusen sikandin te Megbevayà, iyan, is etew he netuenan din he utew sikandin mekesesalà, ne ibpelavew sikandin te Megbevayà.

Ne sevaha maan he andew ne zuen menge etew he mid-uwit dan is menge anak dan he zezeisey pa ziyà te ki Jesus wey zin mezepeneti te palad din wey mepenubtuvazi. Ne is menge sumusundan ni Jesus, midawey zan haazà is menge etew.

Iyan, si Jesus, mid-umew zin diyà te kandin haazà is menge vatà ne ke sikandin diyà te menge sumusundan din te, Ipehendini niw te kediey heeyan is menge vatà; ne kenè niw zewaya su is etew he zuen din kedsarig he iring te kedsarig te vatà ne iyan ebpekepahadì te Megbevayà.
Benar is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke zuen etew he kenà iring is kedsarig din te Megbevayà te kedsarig te zezeisey he vatà, ne kenà egkehedian haazà is etew te Megbevayà.
Ne zuen timpu he zuen sevaha he punuan he Hudiyu he mid-insà ki Jesus te, He Zatù, utew meupiya is menge ulaula nu. Hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan ku wey a meveǥayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan?
Ne midtavak si Jesus, ke sikandin te, Maan is egkaǥi ka he meupiya is ulaula ku su sebsevaha zà is meupiya is menge ulaula zin ne iyan is Megbevayà.

Netuenan nu sikan is menge suǥù te Megbevayà he imbilinbilin kenitew he iyan is: kenè nu selselai is esawa nu; kenè ka mebunù; kenè ka mebpenakew; kenè ka medtarùtarù diyà te hukmanan; ne tehuza nu is amey nu wey iney nu.
Ne midtavak haazà is maama ziyà te ki Jesus, ke sikandin te, Menunudlù, is langun keniyan, mibenteyanan ku ne wazè ku nesupak puun pa te vatè e pa.

Ne hein nezineg ni Jesus haazà, migkeǥiyan din te, Duen nu pa kurang; iyan is: ulì ka ne ivelegyè nu is langun he azen nu, ne is halin, ipemeǥey nu ziyà te egkengeayuayu ne edsepian ka ziyà te langit. Ne ke egkeipus nu heeyan, likù ka zini wey ka mekesundan kediey.
Ne hein nezineg dutun te etew is sambag ni Jesus ne utew mibmesakit is gehinawa zin su zekelà is ketiǥeyunan din.
Ne zutun midtengtengan sikandin ni Jesus ne ke si Jesus te, Utew mereǥen te sepian he etew is kebpesakup din te Megbevayà wey mehedii sikandin te Megbevayà.
Kenè din egkehimu su melemu pa te langgam he kemilyu is kedseled din diyà te vudsi te raǥum, kenà te sepian he etew te kebpesakup din te Megbevayà wey sikandin mehedii.
Ne hein nezineg heini te menge etew, ke sikandan te, Ne emun kenà egkehimu te sepian ne kenè bes egkehimu te minsan hentei is ked-angken te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Ne midtavak si Jesus te, Kenà iyan egkehimu te etew, iyan, egkehimu mulà te Megbevayà he meveǥayi sikandan te untung he wazà pidtemanan su egkehimu zin is langun.
Ne zutun migkaǥi si Pedro te, Sikami, mid-ewaan dey is langun he menge azen dey wey key mekesunud kenikew.

Ne ke si Jesus te, Benar is egkeǥiyen ku he emun duen etew he mid-ewaan din is baley zin, is esawa zin, is menge suled din, is menge ǥinikanan din, wey is menge anak din su wey zin ikepesavut te menge etew is kedhedii kandan te Megbevayà,
ne utew zekelà is suhul te Megbevayà kandin te kemulu pa sikandin dini te kelibutan ne keuzemà te timpu te kedhukum te Megbevayà, ebeǥayan sikandin te untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Ne zutun migkeǥiyan ni Jesus haazà is sepulù wey zezuwa he menge sumusundan din he medtapid dan ne ke sikandin dutun te, Netuenan niw he edhendiyè kiw te inged he Hiruselim ne emun ebpekeuma kiw zutun ne sikan is langun he insurat he nengetagnà te ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà mehitenged kedì, ne egkengetuman en.
Siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, ne ibpalad a ziyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu ne haazà he menge etew, ne edsumpeliten e zan, ed-el-elezen e zan, ne ebpengilevan e zan.
Ebuǥelen e zan, ne human e zan edhimetayi. Iyan, seled te tetelu he andew zutun ne ebenhawen a te Megbevayà, ke si Jesus.
Iyan, haazà is menge sumusundan din, ne wazè dan mekesavut dutun te egkeǥiyen din. In-eles kandan haazà is kehuluǥan dutun ne wazè dan metueni ke hengkey haazà is ibpesavut kandan ni Jesus.
Ne hein uvey zan en diyà te inged he Hiriku ne zuen dutun lakap he ebpimpinuu ziyà te kilid te zalan ne iyan dà baal zin is edtepayà su ebpemumuyù te limus.
Ne hein nezineg dutun te lakap is dabekdabek te mezakel he menge etew he edsaǥad ne nekeinsà ke hengkey en haazà.
Ne zuen migkaǥi ziyà te kandin te, Iyan si Jesus he tigNeserit is edsaǥad.
Ne hein nezineg din haazà, ne mid-umew sikandin te, He Jesus he kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David, kehizuwi a kenikew!

Ne haazà is menge etew he edhuhuna ki Jesus, ne midawey zan haazà is etew wey med-engked sikandin, iyan, nasì en ebpekezaǥing sikandin he egkaǥi te, He kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David, kehizuwi a kenikew!
Ne zutun midteren si Jesus ne migkaǥi he ipehendutun te kandin haazà is lakap. Ne hein impeetuvang dan en ki Jesus ne migkaǥi si Jesus te,
Hengkey is egkesuatan nu he ebeelan ku? Ne midtavak haazà is lakap te, Iyan egkesuatan ku is: mekeahà is menge mata ku.
Ne migkaǥi si Jesus te, Mekeehè ke en; is kedsarig nu kediey, ne iyan igkeulii te menge mata nu.
Ne segugunà nekeahà haazà is lakap. Ne zutun midumazuma en sikandin ki Jesus is utew nekezalig te Megbevayà. Ne haazà is menge etew he nemekeahà dutun, ne nemekezalig dan daan te Megbevayà.
Ne nekeuma ensi Jesus diyà te inged he Hiriku ne zutun dan ebayà su edlaus dan pa.
Ne zuen dutun maama he tigHiriku he egngezanan ki Sekiyu. Ne haazà si Sekiyu, ne iyan egalen te menge menunukut te vuhis dutun; ne sepian daan utew sikandin.
Egkesuat pezem sikandin he mekeahà ki Jesus, iyan, kenè din egkeahà geina te nepurung en si Jesus melinguti te menge etew ne mevavà daan he etew si Sekiyu.
Ne iyan mid-ulaula ni Sekiyu is: mibpelelaǥuy ziyà te egkehunaan ne mibpemenahik te kayu he egngezanan te sikemur he egkeseǥazan ni Jesus su wey zin mepurungi te ed-ahà si Jesus ke edsaǥad dutun.

Ne hein nekeuma si Jesus dutun te puun te kayu he mibpemenehikan ni Sekiyu ne midteren ne midlingahà ne ke sikandin te, He Sekiyu, gaanggaan ke en penaug keniyan su kinahanglan he ziyan a ebpemenahik te valey nu ǥuntaan.
Ne zutun ne migaanggaan mebpenaug si Sekiyu ne midlimùlimù ki Jesus he utew egkelipey.

Ne hein nezineg haazà te menge etew is lalag ni Jesus diyà te ki Sekiyu ne wazè dan mesuati ne pesikaǥi sikandan te, Maan is ebpemenahik si Jesus diyà te valey te etew he utew mesinupaken te Megbevayà?

Ne si Sekiyu, hein nekeuma zan engki Jesus diyà te valey zin ne midhitindeg sikandin is egkaǥi te, Ibeǥey ku is ketengà kayi te ketiǥeyunan ku ziyà te menge ayuayu. Ne minsan hentei he etew he nelimbungan ku zengan, ne id-ulì ku ziyà te kandin is keheepat egketakep haazà is nekuwa ku.

Ne migkaǥi si Jesus diyà te kandin te, Sikew wey menge zuma nu zini te valey, edlibriyen kew ǥuntaan te Megbevayà te silut tenged te menge salè niw su mid-iringan niw ǥuntaan is kepuun niw he si Abraham su midtuu kew te Megbevayà.
Ne siak is Kakey te Menusiyà, iyan inhendini ku te kelibutan su wey ku melibri te silut is langun he nemekesuwey te hustu he ibayà.

Ne haazà is menge etew he nemekezineg dutun te menge lalag ni Jesus, impezineg din pa kandan is sempità. Uvey zan en te inged he Hiruselim ne tenged dutun kunaan te menge etew ke ebpuunè en si Jesus edhadì.

Ne tenged dutun migkaǥi zin heini is sempità. Ke sikandin te, Duen sevaha he prinsipi he midtawag te lavew he hadì diyà te sengeǥinhedian su edhimuwen sikandin he hadì dutun te kandin he inged. Ne emun egketapus haazà ne human ebpekeulì.
