Ne te kenè pa haazà egkeulaula, kinahanglan he edhadì dè pa si Kristu taman te timpu he ed-eminen din edaaǥa is menge kuntada zin.
Haazà is ketepusan he kuntada he id-awà ni Kristu ne iyan is kemetayen te menusiyà.

Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Is Megbevayà, ebpehedian din ki Kristu is minsan hengkey. Ne egketuenan ta he haazà is egkeǥiyen he minsan hengkey, ne wazà iragkes is Megbevayà dutun te minsan hengkey he edhedian ni Kristu.

Su emun egkesakup en keuzemà ni Kristu is langun, ne zutun ebpesakup daan si Kristu te Megbevayà he iyan kes mibeǥey kandin te keǥehem te kedhadì te langun. Ne zutun iyan edhadì te minsan hengkey is Megbevayà.

Ne heini pa zaan su emun kenà egkengevanhew is menge minatey, hengkey is pulus dutun te ulaula te menge etew he ebpebewtismu he elili te menge zuma zan he minatey en? Maan is ebpebewtismu zan ke kenà ebenhawen te Megbevayà is menge minatey?
Ne sikami zaan, hengkey is pulus din dini te kenami ke kenè kiw egkengevanhew keuzemà? Su maan is ed-entusen dey pa is utew piligru.

Su andew-andew, menge suled, egkeisip ku he kela ke edhimetayan a te menge kuntada te Megbevayà. Utew tutuu heini, menge suled; tutuu zaan he utew ku sikiyu igkelipey tenged te kedtuu niw te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.

Utew mezakel is kemeresayen ku zini te Ipisu su iring is menge kuntada ku te menge ebpekekaid he langgam he egkesuatan e zan te edaas. Ne maan is ed-entusen ku pa is iring kayi ke kenà a keuzemà egkevanhew. Su emun iyan haazà ne meupiya pa ke edtumanen ku haazà is erubasa he edhenduen te, Edlipey kiw en; ed-inum kiw ne egkaan kiw su kela ke meǥaan kiw en ebpatey ne egkehanew heini is langun.
Iyan, kenè niw ituǥut he meketuu kew te iring kayi su tarù. Tutuu iyan is erubasa he egkaǥi te, Emun ebpekiduma ka te etew he mezaat is ulaula zin ne egkeiringan nu is ulaula zin wey ked-isip din.

Likui niw is hustu he ked-isip ne engkezi niw is mezaat he ulaula. Netuenan ku he zuen duma niw ziyan he kemulu pa wazà mesayud ke hengkey is tutuu he tuluuwen mehitenged te Megbevayà. Igkeeled niw pezem heini.
Ne ke penenglitan duen etew he ed-insà ke ebmenmenuwen te Megbevayà is kebenhawa zin te menge minatey wey ke hengkey is lawa zan dutun,

ne iyan tavak ku is: kenè bes metau he ed-isip-isip haazà is etew. Su emun ibpemula ta is benì diyà te tanà, ne kinahanglan he egkehalin is lawa zutun te venì. Su egkezeetan haazà is benì ne human edtuvù.

Ne haazà is ibpemula ta, ne venì dà duen. Egkehimu he parey is ibpemula ta, ne emun kenà, ne zuma pa he ibpemula. Iyan, haazà is benì he impemula, ne kenè en iyan sikan is lawa zin dutun te kedtuvù din.
Ne zaan he midhimu te Megbevayà ke hengkey is lawa he egkehimu te kada kelasi te venì he ibpemula. Is kada venì, ne zuen kandin he lawa he egkehimu ke edtuvù en.

Ne iring din ded daan is lawa te minsan hengkey he linimbag he zuen din gehinawa su kenà ebpeked-iiring. Emun etew ne sengekelasi is lawa zin, emun langgam ne sengekelasi zaan, ne iring din ded daan is tagbis wey pait su selakew zaan.

Ne mezakel is linimbag te Megbevayà dini te tanà wey ziyà te langit. Ne pudu mekempet is menge linimbag din, iyan, kenà ebpeked-iiring-iring is kekempet te kada sevaha. Selakew is kekempet te menge linimbag din diyà te langit ne selakew zaan is kekempet te langun dini te tanà.

Sengekelasi is kekempet te kedsilà te andew, selakew is kekempet te ked-anlag te vulan, ne selakew zaan is kekempet te menge vituen. Ne minsan is menge vituen, ne kenà ebpeked-iiring-iring is kekempet dan te kada sevaha.

Ne keuzemà ke egkengevanhew is menge minatey, egkengehalin daan is menge lawa zan. Su umba idleveng is lawa te etew su egkezeetan, iyan, ke egkevanhew keuzemà kenè en maan egkezeetan te wazà pidtemanan.
Ne haazà is lawa tew, dutun te kedlevenga kayi, ne kenà meupiya he ed-ahaan ne wazè din en pulus, iyan, ke egkevanhew ne utew mekempet ne utew mezesen.

Dutun te kedlevenga kayi te lawa ne kelibutanen dà heini, iyan, ke egkevanhew, ne veǥu en maan he lawa he zait he ed-ubpà diyà te langit su midtulus en. Ke zuen lawa he kelibutanen, kinahanglan daan he zuen lawa he zait he ebpekeubpà diyà te langit.

Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Haazà is nehuna he etew he si Adan, ne mibeǥayan te Megbevayà is lawa zin te ǥehinawa su wey mekeubpà dini te tanà. Iyan, si Kristu mulà, haazà is migeraran te huziyan he Adan, iyan sikandin ebeǥey te untung he wazà pidtemanan su wey kiw mekeubpà diyà te langit.
Kenà iyan edhuna is untung he wazà pidtemanan diyà te langit, kekenà, iyan edhuna is untung ta zini te kelibutan ne human egkehimu is untung diyà te langit.
Ne haazà is nehuna he etew he si Adan, linimbag sikandin ne is limbaǥan din ne iyan is tanà, iyan, haazà is etew he ed-ilis kandin he iyan si Kristu, ne ebpuun sikandin mulà diyà te langit.

Ne sikitew is menge kevuwazan ni Adan, ne tanà daan is limbaǥan tew su tanà is limbaǥan te kandin he lawa. Iyan, sikitew zaan is menge sakup te etew he ebpuun te langit, ne ebpekeiring is lawa tew keuzemà te kandin he lawa.
Su ǥeina te nekeiring is lawa tew te lawa te nehuna he etew he tanà is limbaǥan din, kinahanglan he ebpekeiring is lawa tew zaan te lawa ni Kristu he iyan sikan is etew he ebpuun diyà te langit.

Iyan ibpesavut ku, menge suled, is: heini is menge lawa tew he zuen kemetayen, ne kenà egkehimu he egkeragkes keuzemà te langun he edhedian te Megbevayà su haazà is lawa he zuen din kemetayen, kenà egkehimu he ebeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Pemineǥa niw heini is daan he in-eles he impesavut kediey te Megbevayà. Duen duma kenitew te menge tumutuu he kenà ebpatey, asal, sikitew is langun, segugunà egkehalin is lawa tew.

Su utew meǥaan heini; iring dà te sengeperà te mata is kegkeulaula kayi keuzemà ke ibpezaǥing te Megbevayà is budyung he tuus he iyan en ketepusan he andew tew zini te kelibutan. Su ibpezaǥing haazà is budyung ne egkengevanhew is menge minatey. Egkengehalin is menge lawa zan ne kenè dan en ebpematey. Ne sikitew is uuyag pa, egkengehalin daan is menge lawa tew.

Ne emun egkehitavù en heini, sikitew is duen din lawa he egkezeetan, ebeǥayan kiw te lawa he kenè en egkezeetan. Ne heini is lawa tew he zuen din kemetayen, ne egkeilisan te lawa he wazè din en kemetayen.
Ne zutun, sikitew is duen din kemetayen, ne kenè kiw en human ebpatey ne egketuman en haazà is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Nepurung en maawà is gehem te kemetayen.
Wazè en kegkehandek tew te kemetayen su wazè en ebpatey. Wazè en kegkeseeng tew tenged te kemetayen su neilisan en te untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Umba egkehandek is menge etew te kemetayen su netuenan dan he emun ebpatey zan edsilutan sikandan tenged te mekesesalà sikandan. Ne maan is mekesesalà sikandan? Su ǥeina te nekesupak dan te kesuǥuan te Megbevayà.
Ne minsan pa zutun egkehimu he edeliǥen tew is Megbevayà su tenged te mid-ulaula zin, nezaag tew en is kemetayen pinaaǥi te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu!

Na, menge mahal ku he menge suled, geina te iyan heini, heǥeta niw is kedsarig niw te Megbevayà su wey wazà ebpekezezaat te kedtuu niw. Peniguduwi niw tumana is ebpeveelan keniyu te Nengazen; haǥù kew te taman te egkehimu niw su netuenan niw he emun iyan edtumanen niw is ebpeveelan te Nengazen, kenà egkehimu he wazà pulus te vaal niw.

Ne zuen pa id-suǥù ku keniyu mehitenged te ked-emutè niw te selapì he idtavang niw te egkengeayuayu he menge zuma tew he tumutuu. Insuǥù ku en daan heini te menge zuma tew ziyà te prubinsya he Gelasya.

Ne kada Duminggu ne kinahanglan he teǥenaha te kada sevaha keniyu is ibeǥey zin diyà te Megbevayà. Sumalà is netiǥeyunan niw ne kinahanglan he iteǥeley niw is bahin te Megbevayà. Ne tipiǥi niw heini su wey emun ebpekeuma ad diyan ne wazè en kinahanglan he ed-emutè kew pa su zaan en he naandam.

Ne emun ebpekeuma a ziyan edsuǥuen ku ziyà te inged he Hiruselim sikan is ebpilien niw he menge etew wey zan meuwit is ibeǥey niw. Ne ibpeuwit ku zaan is menge surat su wey metueni te ebeǥayan ke hengkey is tuyù dan te ed-uwit.
Ne emun kinahanglan dutun he edhendiyà a zaan te Hiruselim, ebpekezuma zan kediey.
Edhendiyan a te Kurintu emun egketapus ku is tuyù ku ziyà te prubinsya he Mesidunya su egkeisip ku he ziyà a ebayà te Mesidunya.

Ne malù a egkeuǥet ke ziyan e en te keniyu. Kenà a vuwa ed-awà diyan taman te kenè pa egketapus is tipenguzan. Ne zutun te kedlaus ku, meupiya ke edtevangan a keniyu zutun te kedhipanew ku ke hendei a ebpevayà.
Kenè ku egkesuatan he meǥaan dà is kebpenumbaley ku ziyan, kekenà, iyan netaǥù te ǥehinawa ku is egketegteǥaad a ziyan ke edtuǥut is Megbevayà.
Egkeisip ku he kayi e pa ed-ubpà te inged he Ipisu taman te Pista te Pintikusti ne human a egenat.
Su mezakel pa zini is egkesuat he ebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà ne zekelà is pulus te ked-ubpè ku kayi, asal, mezakel zaan dini is menge kuntada te Megbevayà.
Ne emun ebpekeuma ziyan si Timoteo ne purungi niw sikandin su suluǥuen daan sikandin te Nengazen he iring kediey.

Kinahanglan he edtehuzen niw sikandin, ne emun edlaus te hipenawan din ne tevangi niw sikandin, ne ipeehè niw is gaǥew niw kandin su wey mekelikù sikandin dini te kedì, su ebpeebuten ku sikandin wey is menge zuma zin he menge suled tew te kedtuu.

Ne si Epulus he suled tew zaan tenged te kedtuu, kepipira ku en sikandin keǥiyi he meupiya ke ebisitahan kew zin duma zuen te menge suled tew he mibisita ziyan. Iyan, egkaǥi sikandin te wazè pa meseled te ǥehinawa zin is kedhendiyan din. Iyan, edhendiyan sikandin ke wazà ebpekesamuk kandin.
Layun kew, menge suled, med-andam; hemeni niw te edtuu si Jesu Kristu; kenè niw ikeeled is kedtuu niw, kekenà, ipeehè niw is kelig-en te kedtuu niw.
Ne minsan hengkey is ebeelan niw, layun niw ipaahà is kebmahala niw te menge zuma niw.
Netuenan niw, menge suled, he iyan nehuna he nemeketuu ziyan te prubinsya he Gerisya ensi Istipenas. Ne wazè dan meduwazuwa te kedtevangi zan te menge zuma zan he tumutuu.
Ne tenged dutun, edhengyuen ku keniyu he pemineǥa niw is sambag te menge etew he iring engki Istipenas wey is minsan hentei he menge zuma tew he ebpurung edtuman te ebpeveelan kandan te Nengazen tew.
Utew ad neǥalew hein nekeuma si Istipenas, si Fortunato wey si Ekeyiku su henduen be te netembaran is utew ku kebulunga keniyu.
Inmeupiya sikandan te ǥehinawa ku iring te inmeupiya zaan sikandan te ǥehinawa niw. Tehuza niw is menge iring kayi he etew.

Ebpengemusta keniyu is langun he menge tumutuu te langun he menge inged dini te prubinsya he Asya. Utew zaan meheǥet is kebpengemustaha keniyu ni Ekilu wey si Priscila wey elin daan is menge tumutuu he edtiǥum diyà te valey zan dini te Ipisu.
Is langun he menge tumutuu he menge zuma ku kayi, ne ebpengemusta zan daan keniyu. Ne sikiyu zaan diyan, ne mebpelimlimuey kew.
Te kedtepusa ku kayi te surat, egkeǥiyen ku he iyan e en si Pablo is midsurat kayi. Ebpengemusta a keniyu te langun.
Ke zuen minsan hentei he wazà diyà te ǥehinawa zin si Jesus, ne verakat he siluti sikandin te Megbevayà. Maran ata, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, meǥaan ka, Jesus, medlikù.
Tuvazi kew is langun te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.
Utew kew mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku tenged te kedtuu tew ki Jesu Kristu. Iyan a si Pablo.

Siak si Pablo. Migeraran a he epustul ni Jesu Kristu tenged te iyan egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Siak wey si Timoteo he suled tew, ebpesuratan dey sikiyu is langun he menge tumutuu te Megbevayà diyan te inged he Kurintu wey is langun daan he menge etew he neǥaked te Megbevayà seled te tivuuk he prubinsya he Gerisya.
Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu ne tuvazi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
Edeliǥen tew is Megbevayà he iyan Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu; iyan sikandin hihizuwen he Amey tew wey puunà te minsan hengkey he tavang kenitew.

Edtevangan kiw zin te langun he menge seeng tew ne tenged kayi ebpeketavang kiw zaan te zuma he etew he zuen din minsan hengkey he seeng. Is idtavang tew kayi, ne iyan ded is intavang kenitew te Megbevayà.
Minsan pa te zekelà is kemeresayan he egkeantus tew tenged te nekidsevaha kiw ki Kristu, dekelà daan is tavang kenitew te Megbevayà tenged daan ki Kristu.

Emun idtuǥut te Megbevayà he mekeantus key te merasey, umba ibpaantus key zin su wey kew mezeyzey ne wey kew zaan meveǥayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne iring din ded daan emun edtevangan key te Megbevayà ne egkehimu heini he tavang din daan keniyu. Ne pinaaǥi kayi edlig-enan din is kedtuu niw wey niw zaan maantus is merasey he iring te ibpaantus kenami.

Umba kenà duwazuwa is kedsarig dey keniyu su netuenan dey he emun ed-entusen niw is merasey he iring te naantus dey zaan, ne iring din ded daan, edtevangan kew te Megbevayà iring te edtevangan key zin daan.
Su egkesuatan dey, menge suled, he metueni niw is dekelà he samuk dey hein diyè key te prubinsya he Asya. Utew merasey is penggezam kenami he kenè dey pezem egkeantus umba kunaan dey ke ibpatey zey.

Henduen be te iyan en haazà ketepusan te untung dey, iyan, umba nehitavù heini zini te kenami su wey key kenà mekesarig te kenami zà he ketau, kekenà, wey key mekesarig te Megbevayà he iyan ebpemanhew te menge minatey.

Ne midtevangan key te Megbevayà ne midlig-enan key zin, umba nelibri key ne wazè key mehimetayi. Ne netuenan dey he ebpenigudu sikandin he edtavang kenami. Dekelà is kedsarig dey he kenè key zin ed-engkezan te edtavang.
Ne kinahanglan he edtevangan key zaan keniyu pinaaǥi te ked-ampù. Ne human egkehimu he mezakel is ebpeselamat te Megbevayà tenged te ǥaǥew zin kenami tenged te ked-ampù te mezakel he menge etew.

Duen, menge suled, idantal zey ne netuenan dey he tutuu heini, ne iyan is: layun meupiya is ulaula zey ziyà te minsan hentei he etew, lavew en diyan te keniyu. Su layun key edtuman te egkesuatan te Megbevayà ne utew hustu is tuyù dey. Wazè dey ǥemita is ketau zey te etew zà duen, kekenà, iyan igkehimuwa zey te langun is mekeǥeǥehem he tavang te Megbevayà.
Iyan dey zà idtaǥù te surat emun ebpeuwitan dey sikiyu te surat is egkevasa niw wey egkesavut niw. Ne egkesuatan ku he egkepurung niw egkesavut
haazà is wazè niw pa maamin mesavut mehitenged te ed-ul-ulahan dey su wey zutun te andew te kedlikù te Nengazen tew he si Jesus, mehimu he igkelipey key keniyu iring te igkelipey zey zaan sikiyu.
Ne ǥeina te netuenan ku he siguradu nesavut niw en heini, neisip ku he edhuna a ebpenumbaley ziyan te keniyu su wey kezezuwa ku sikiyu metevangi

su iyan pezem dini te isip ku is: edtuluy a ziyan ke edhendiyà a te Mesidunya ne emun ed-ulì a ne edtuluy e zed maan diyan te keniyu su wey a zaan metevangi keniyu zutun te kedhendiyè ku te prubinsya he Hudiya.

Ne ǥeina te wazè ku heini metuman kunaan niw vuwa ke layun edhalinhalin is isip ku. Kunaan niw vuwa zaan ke iring is menge isip ku te isip te etew he iyan ebayàbayà kandin is kandin dà he mezaat he suat. Kunaan niw ke zutun te kegkaǥi ku he ebpehendiyan a ne iyan bes neseled dini te ǥehinawa ku is kenà a ebpehendiyan.
Emun tutuu is egkeǥiyen te Megbevayà, ne tutuu zaan heini is egkeǥiyen ku. Su is neseled diyà te ǥehinawa ku ne kinahanglan he edtumanen ku.

Sikami engki Silas wey si Timoteo, impenudtul zey ziyan te keniyu kes Anak te Megbevayà he iyan si Jesu Kristu. Ne netuenan niw he metinumanen sikandin te lalag din ne kenà egkehimu he kenè din edtumanen is penaad din.
Su pinaaǥi kandin edtumanen is langun he menge penaad te Megbevayà. Ne tenged kayi ebpekekaǥi kiw he venar iyan he metinumanen sikandin ne tenged kayi egkezalig is Megbevayà.
Su is Megbevayà, ne iyan edheǥet te kedtuu tew ki Jesu Kristu ne iyan sikandin mibpilì kenitew
ne mibeǥayan kiw zin te ǥehem he tuus he menge ǥaked kiw zin, ne midhimu zin he ulini kiw te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he iyan tuus he edtumanen din is minsan hengkey he penaad din kenitew.

Siluti a te Megbevayà emun kenà tutuu is egkeǥiyen ku. Netuenan din he iyan ketezengan ke maan is wazà a mekepenumbaley ziyan te Kurintu su wey kenè kew meseeng pinaaǥi te kedsusiya ku te menge ulaula niw.

Kenè dey egkesuatan he ebayàbayè key ke hengkey is edtuuwan niw su netuenan dey he meheǥet en is kedtuu niw. Egkesuatan dey zà he mehimu key he timbang niw te ebpeveelan kenitew te Megbevayà su wey kew melipey.
Ne tenged kayi, menge suled, neisip ku he kenà ad ed-uman ebpenumbaley ziyan emun iring ded dutun te nehuna he kedhendiyan ku, su zutun ingkeseeng niw is kebpenumbaley ku.
Su emun igkeseeng a keniyu ne hentei is edlipey kedì? Wazà, su egkeseeng kew man kediey.

Umba, menge suled, iyan mibeelan ku zutun is mibpeuwitan ku zà sikiyu te surat. Su kenè ku zutun egkesuatan he ebpenumbaley a ziyan su netuenan ku he sikiyu is menge etew he kinahanglan pezem he iyan igkelipey ku, ne igkeseeng ku zutun. Ne netuenan ku zaan he emun egkelipey a, egkelipey kew zaan.

Dutun te kebpeuwiti ku keniyu te surat, utew ad neseeng. Mibmesakit is gehinawa ku ne mibpeniǥis is luhè ku. Iyan, kenè ku pezem dutun tuyù is wey kew meseeng, kekenà, egkesuatan ku he metueni niw he utew kew mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku.
Ne haazà is etew he nekesalà diyan, kenà a iyan neselaan din, kekenà, iyan kew, ne emun kenà, ne iyan is duma keniyu. Kenè ku egkesuatan he utew mesekiti is gehinawa zin pinaaǥi te menge lalag ku.
Netengkaan en, menge suled, is kedsiluti niw kandin.
Ne ǥuntaan kinahanglan he peseyluwa niw sikandin. Sembaǥi niw su kela ke maawà is kedsarig din te Megbevayà te utew subra he kegkeseeng din.
Edhengyuen ku keniyu he ipeehè niw kandin he tutuu iyan is gaǥew niw kandin.
Umba mibpeuwitan ku sikiyu te surat ku su wey ku maahà ke metinumanen kew ve te langun he menge suǥù ku.

Ne ke zuen etew he ebpeseyluwen niw, ebpeseyluwen ku zaan. Su penenglitan ke zuen nekesalà diyan wey ebpeseyluwen ku, netuenan ni Kristu he iyan ketezengan ke maan is ebpeseyluwen ku su wey mebmelinew is kedezepitè niw.
Ne umba ed-ul-ulahan ku heini su wey kenè kiw meekali ni Setanas. Netuenan tew ke hengkey is mezaat he edhimuwen din pezem dini te kenitew.
Menge suled, hein midhendiyà a te inged he Truwas te kedsangyew te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, neehè ku he midhimu en te Nengazen is paaǥi wey ku ikepelaus is ebpeveelan din kedì.
Iyan, utew zutun nesemuki is gehinawa ku su kenè ku egketuredu is suled tew he si Tito. Ne tenged kayi, mid-ewaan ku is menge tumutuu he meǥinged dutun ne midlaus a ziyà te prubinsya he Mesidunya.

Ne minsan pa zutun utew zekelà is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà su tenged te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Kristu, iring kiw te menge vihag ni Kristu he ibpeehè din diyà te minsan hentei. Ne pinaaǥi kenitew ibpesavut din diyà te menge etew ke hentei sikandin diyà te minsan hendei.

Ne ǥeina te nehimu key he menge suǥù ni Kristu, iring key te veyawà he ibegey ni Kristu ziyà te Megbevayà. Is ngazeg kayi, ne ziyà mekeeneb te menge etew he egkelibri te silut wey ziyà daan te kenà egkengelibri.

Ne haazà is menge etew he kenà ebpelibri, is ibpesavut dey kandan ne henduen be te utew memahù su nesavut dan he neangken dan en is kemetayen. Ne haazà mulà is menge etew he ebpelibri ki Kristu, is ibpesavut dey kandan, ne henduen be te utew mehemut su nesavut dan he neangken dan en is untung he wazà pidtemanan. Hentei vuwa is dait te kedsengyawa kayi te tudtul?

Iyan, sikami, kenè dey ed-iringan is ulaula te mezakel he ebpenurù su ziyà te kandan henduen be te ibpenapì dan is Lalag te Megbevayà. Ne tenged te midsugù key te Megbevayà, ne tenged daan te edsusiyen key layun te Megbevayà, tutuu is tuyù dey wey egkeǥiyen dey su nekidsevaha key ki Kristu.

Kunaan niw vuwa ke idantal zey en maan heini. Kenè key iring te zuma he ebpenurù su kenè niw sikandan egkezawat emun wazà surat he igkepeehè dan he ibpesavut dutun he wazà mezaat he ulaula zan. Ne iring din ded daan kenà sikandan egkezawat te zuma he etew emun wazè dan surat he iring dutun he ziyan ebpuun te keniyu.
Sikami mulà, kenè key egkinahanglan te iring dutun. Netuenan dey he iyan kew surat dey su pinaaǥi te ulaula niw he meupiya egketuenan te minsan hentei he meupiya zaan is kenami he ulaula.

Su iring is kedtuu niw te surat he ibpesavut dutun he hustu is ulaula zey. Ne iyan mibaal kayi te surat si Kristu su midsuǥù key zin diyan wey kew meketuu. Ne zeyzey heini is surat su wazà isurat pinaaǥi te kintà ne wazà daan isurat diyà te menge edsuratan he vatu iring te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, kekenà, pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin insurat te Megbevayà diyà te ǥehinawa niw te menge etew.
Umba egkekaǥi zey he iyan kew surat dey su pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha zey ki Kristu dekelà is kedsarig dey te Megbevayà.
Kenè dey egkekaǥi he pinaaǥi te kenami he ketau egkehimu zey is minsan hengkey, kekenà, netuenan dey he ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà is kegkehimuwa zey te langun.

Su iyan sikandin ebeǥey kenami te ketau wey zey ikepenurù is beǥu he paaǥi he midtukud din te kebpekidsevaha zin te menusiyà. Ne wazà heini is beǥu he paaǥi iveǥey pinaaǥi te insurat he kesuǥuan, kekenà, imbeǥey zin heini kenitew pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Su emun iyan ta edseriǥan is kedtumana ta te kesuǥuan, ne kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan is ebperetengen ta. Iyan, ke ibeǥey kenitew is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne untung he wazà pidtemanan is ebperetengen ta.

Dutun te kedsurata zengan te Megbevayà te kesuǥuan, duen te menge edsuratan he vatu, neselikuvungan si Moises te ed-anlag he ǥehem te Megbevayà. Ne zutun nenganlag is paras ni Moises tenged te ǥehem te Megbevayà ne nekesirang te menge etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil. Ne minsan pa zutun te utew merayag haazà, naawà gihapun haazà is gehem. Iyan ibpesavut kenita pinaaǥi te kesuǥuan is: ebpatey is gimukud te menusiyà. Ne minsan pa zutun utew zekelà is gehem he impaahà te Megbevayà dutun te kedsurata zin kayi.
Emun dekelà is gehem he impaahà dutun te kebeǥaya zin te kesuǥuan, iyan pe be kenà tuwas pa he mekeǥeǥehem is kebeǥaya zin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
Emun dekelà is gehem te kesuǥuan he iyan idsiluti te menusiyà, iyan pe be kenà dekelà pa utew is gehem te paaǥi he iyan ebpekehimu he mebmetazeng is menusiyà.
Ne haazà is kesuǥuan he zekelà dengan is gehem din, nehimu en guntaan he wazè din gehem su mid-ilisan en te veǥu he paaǥi he utew pa zekelà is gehem.
Su ke zuen gehem te zaan wey naawè en haazà is daan he zuen din gehem, iyan pe be kenà dekelè pa utew is gehem te veǥu he kenà mulà egkeawà.
Ne ǥeina te ebpekesarig key he kenà heini egkeawà te minsan keenu kenè key egkehandek te kedsengyawa zey te Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne kenè key iring ki Moises su wazè dey id-eles. Su si Moises, mid-elangan din is buked din wey kenà maahà te menge zuma zin he kevuwazan ni Israyil kes ed-anlag he ǥehem he egkenaney en egkeawà.

Su zutun neelangan daan is menge kedsavut dan. Ne wazà daan mahalin heini ǥuntaan su kemulu pa neelangan is kedsavut te menge Hudiyu. Ne emun ebasa zan mehitenged te zaan he paaǥi kenè dan egkesavut. Ne emun duen kandan edtuu ki Kristu, id-awà te Megbevayà is ebpekealang te isip din ne human sikandin ebpekesavut.
Ne kemulu pa ǥuntaan is kenè dan kebpekesavut su emun ebesahan te menge Hudiyu is kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, kenè dan egkesavut su neelangan pa is isip dan.
Iyan, id-awà is ebpekealang te kedsavut te etew emun edtuuwan din is Nengazen.
Ne heini is egkeǥiyen he Nengazen, ne iyan kes Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, ne emun ed-ulinan is etew te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin nevelukasan en sikandin te kegkeuripena kandin te kesuǥuan.

Ne, menge suled, sikitew is langun, nesavut tew en he utew lavew is gehem te Nengazen tew, ne wazà ebpekealang te kedsevuta tew kayi. Ne pinaaǥi kayi te ǥehem he ebpuun te Nengazen he iyan kes Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, edhimuwen kiw zin he iring te kandin ne layun ed-iseg heini is gehem.
Nehizuwan key te Megbevayà ne midtezù key zin wey zey metuman is ebpeveelan din kenami mehitenged te kedsengyawa te veǥu he paaǥi ne tenged dutun kenà egkeawà is gustu zey te kedtumana kayi.

Sikan is menge mahawag he ulaula he meeles he ebeelan te zuma, kenè dey mulà ebeelan. Kenè key edtarùtarù ne kenè dey edhelinen is Lalag te Megbevayà, kekenà, hustu is kedsengyawa zey su wey mesavut te minsan hentei he kenà tarù is ebeelan dey. Iyan edsusi kayi is Megbevayà.
Ne is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ibpesavut dey, emun in-eles heini, iyan dà neelesan kayi is menge etew he kenà edawat te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.

Kenè dan edtuu su mid-elangan is isip dan ni Setanas he iyan ed-ezapen te menge etew kayi te kelibutan. Tenged kayi kenà egketeyawan is isip dan te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te utew kegkelavew ni Kristu. Pinaaǥi ki Kristu egkesayud ki ke hentei is Megbevayà su iyan sikandin dagwey te Megbevayà.

Kenà iyan dey ibpenurù su wey key mevantug te menge etew, kekenà, iyan dey ibpenurù su wey mevantug si Jesu Kristu he iyan Nengazen te langun. Sikami, edtevangan dey en sikiyu su wey zey metuman is suǥù ni Jesus.

Su zutun te kedlimbaǥa te Megbevayà te langun migkaǥi sikandin te, Maawà is kerusireman ne mehimu is kerayag. Ne iyan daan sikandin kes midtayew te isip dey su wey zey mesavut ke hengkey is gehem te Megbevayà he impezayag pinaaǥi ki Jesu Kristu.

Ne sikami, iring key zà te kuzen he ziniyun he neteǥuan te utew mahal. Ne pinaaǥi kayi egkesavut te menge etew he is utew zekelà he gehem he egemiten dey te utew meǥuyà is lawa, ne in-ulin kenami te Megbevayà ne kenà dini ebpuun te kenami.
Layun key ebpekeaǥi te kemereǥenan, iyan, kenà egkeawà is kedsarig dey. Henduen be te wazè dey en layun paaǥi, iyan, edsarig key ǥihapun te tavang te Megbevayà.
Ebpesipelahan key te menge kuntada zey, iyan, kenè key ed-ewaan te Megbevayà. Mibuǥel key te menge kuntada zey, iyan, wazè key zan mepatey.

Iring ki Jesus dengan, egkuntedahan key layun te menge etew, ne egkesuatan key zan te edhimatey. Umba egkeulaula heini is langun su wey metueni pinaaǥi kenami he uuyag en maan si Jesus su layun key zin edtevangan.

Su minsan keenu he timpu kenà egkeawà dini te kenami is kebpemiligru zey te menge etew he egkesuat he edhimatey kenami tenged te kedsengyawa zey te ngazan ni Jesus. Umba egkeulaula zini te kenami heini su wey metueni he uuyag en maan si Jesus su layun key zin edtevangan su wey key kenà mehimetayi.
Umba kenà egkeawà dini te kenami is kebpemiligru zey te kemetayen su edsangyew key te Meupiya he Tudtulanan, iyan, maambe en su pinaaǥi kayi egkehimu ziyan te keniyu is untung he wazè din pidtemanan.

Duen ingkesurat he lalag te etew he edhenduen te, Midtuu a te Megbevayà ne ebpenudtulen ku is impeketuu ku. Ne iring ded dutun heini is ed-ul-ulahan dey su tenged te kedtuu zey te Megbevayà ibpesavut dey is impeketuu zey.

Su netuenan dey he is Megbevayà he mibanhew te Nengazen tew he si Jesus, ebenhawen key zin daan keuzemà tenged te kebpekidsevaha zey ki Jesus ne edtulusen key zin wey key meketampu keniyu ne egkehimu kiw pudu he menge zuma zin diyà te langit.

Ne umba ed-entusen dey is langun he mereǥen su wey kew iyan mezeyzey, su emun egketukid en is mezakel he etew te ǥaǥew te Megbevayà, ne zutun ed-iseg he ebmezakel is ebpekepeselamat te Megbevayà ne egkevantug is Megbevayà.

Ne tenged kayi kenà egkeawà is pulus te kedhaǥù dey. Kada andew ne ed-iseg is kebmeǥurang wey kebmeǥuyà te lawa zey. Ne minsan pa zutun kada andew zaan ne ibpeiseg te Megbevayà is kedlig-eni zin te kedtuu zey.

Ne heini is menge kemeresayan he egkeantus dey ǥuntaan, ne meǥaan dà utew, iyan, tenged te ked-antus dey kayi zuen egkeperateng dey he utew zekelà he kegkelavew he ibeǥey kenitew keuzemà. Ne kenà ebpekesusuluwan is kemeresayan he egkeantus dey kayi te utew zekelà he wazè din pidtemanan he kegkelavew.

Su iyan netaǥù mepurung dini te ǥehinawa zey, kenà is menge vutang he egkeehè ta zini te kelibutan, kekenà, iyan is menge vutang he kenè te pa egkeahà he ziyà te langit. Su is menge vutang he egkeehè ta zini te kelibutan, ne meǥaan dà egkehanew, iyan, sikan is kenè pa egkeahà he ibeǥey te Megbevayà, ne kenà mulà egkehanew te wazà pidtemanan.

Is lawa ta, ne iring te valey he egkeubpaan ta. Ne netuenan ta he ke egkerundus heini is baley, duen baley he egkeubpaan ta ziyà te langit he iyan is beǥu he lawa he ibeǥey te Megbevayà. Kandin he vaal heini ne wazè din pidtemanan.
Ne ǥeina te utew ki edlised te zini ki pa te kelibutan, utew ta igkesuat he iveǥey en pezem kenita haazà is beǥu he lawa ta he ziyà te langit.
Su zutun te kebenhawa kenita keuzemà, kinahanglan he zuen lawa ta.

Su sikita is tumutuu he uuyag pa zini te kelibutan, edlised ki su neveǥatan ki kayi te menge kemereǥenan he egkeantus kayi te kelibutanen he lawa ta, asal kenè ta iyan egkesuatan he meewai ta heini is lawa ta, kekenà, iyan egkesuatan ta is wey meveǥayi ki en pezem guntaan dutun te veǥu he lawa he ebpuun diyà te langit, ne zutun egkeilisan is lawa he zuen din kemetayen te lawa he zuen din untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Is Megbevayà, daan ki zin he mid-andam su wey meulaula heini kenita keuzemà, ne mibeǥayan ki zin daan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he iyan tuus he edtumanen din heini.
Tenged dutun, edheǥeten tew is kedsarig tew te Nengazen. Minsan pa te kemulu kiw pa kayi te kelibutanen he lawa, ne kenè kiw pa ziyà te ed-ubpaan te Nengazen.
Su ibpeikul ta is ibayè ta zini te kelibutan pinaaǥi te kedsarig dà te Megbevayà su kenè te pa egkeahà is edungguan ta ziyà te langit.
Layun mezesen is kedsarig ta te Nengazen ne egkesuatan ta pezem he meewai ta heini is kelibutanen he lawa su wey ki mekeulì diyà te Nengazen.
Iyan, ke minsan hendei ki, ke zini ki te kelibutan wey ke ziyè ki ve te ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà, iyan utew ta egkesuati is kedtumana ta te egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Su is minsan hentei kenitew, kinahanglan he ziyà ed-etuvang keuzemà te ki Kristu su edsusiyen din is menge ulaula tew su wey mezawat te kada sevaha kenitew is suhul he zait te langun he mid-ulaula zin dini te kelibutan ke meupiya ve wey ke wazè din menge pulus.

Ne ǥeina te netuenan dey he utew mekehandekhandek keuzemà haazà is kedsusiya te Nengazen te menge ulaula te menusiyà, edhimuwen dey pezem is taman te egkehimu zey wey meketuu is menge etew. Netuenan te Megbavayà he kenà mezaat is tuyù dey, ne egkesuatan ku he metueni niw zaan heini.

Heini is menge lalag ku, kenà iyan tuyù ku kayi is wey key keniyu mezeliǥi, kekenà, egkesuatan dey he metueni niw he hustu is tuyù dey su wey zuen ketezengan he igketavak niw zutun te menge etew he iyan dan ed-ahaan is paras te etew ne kenà is meupiya he ulaula zin.

Kunaan te zuma ke ebuneǥen key, iyan, umba henduen key te ebuneǥen su utew mezesen is kedtumana zey te ebpeveelan te Megbevayà. Iyan, ke ed-isipen niw he kenè key ebuneǥen, netuenan niw he iyan ibpenigudu zey su wey kew mezeyzey.

Ne umba edhaǥù key su netuenan dey he mahal key ziyà te ǥehinawa ni Kristu. Netuenan dey he midhimetayan sikandin is sebsevaha he elili te tivuuk he menusiyà ne tenged kayi henduen be te pudu en nekeaǥi te kemetayen is tivuuk he menusiyà.

Minatey sikandin he elili te tivuuk he menusiyà su wey sikandan is menge etew he uuyag pa, kenè dan en maan med-ulaula te kandan he egkesuatan, kekenà, med-tuman dan en te egkesuatan ni Kristu he iyan midhimetayan wey nevanhew su wey melibri sikandan te silut.

Is paaǥi zey te ked-isipa te minsan hentei he etew, ne kenà iyan is paaǥi he egemiten te menge etew he wazà medtuu. Dengan, iyan heini migamit dey he paaǥi su mid-isip dey he etew zà duen si Kristu, iyan, guntaan netuenan dey he kenà etew zà duen sikandin.
Ne sikan is etew he nekidsevaha en ki Kristu, beǥu en sikandin he linimbag. Nahanew en diyà te kandin is daan he netaǥù te isip din ne mid-ilisan en heini te veǥu.
Iyan midhimu kayi is Megbevayà su pinaaǥi ki Kristu midhimu kiw zin he menge emiǥu zin. Ne mibpeveelan din daan kenami is kedhimuwa te zuma he etew he meemiǥu zin.

Iyan ibpesavut dey is: pinaaǥi ki Kristu egkehimu he edhimuwen te Megbevayà is tivuuk he menusiyà he menge emiǥu zin. Ne id-awè din diyà te isip din is menge mezaat he ulaula zan. Ne sikami, insarig din kenami is kedtudtula he egkehimu en he ebpekid-emiǥu te Megbevayà is menusiyà.
Umba midsuǥù key ni Kristu su wey pinaaǥi kenami ebpekehangyù keniyu is Megbevayà. Ne tenged ki Kristu edhengyuan dey zaan sikiyu he ituǥut niw he himuwa kew te Megbevayà he menge emiǥu zin.

Wazà minsan hengkey he mezaat he ulaula ni Kristu, iyan, midhimu te Megbevayà he iyan sikandin midsilutan tenged te salè tew su wey pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew kandin, egkehimu he ed-isipen kiw he metazeng te Megbevayà.
Ne ǥeina te nehimu key en he menge timbang te Megbevayà, edhengyuan dey sikiyu he himuwa niw he mebpulus is gaǥew zin keniyu.

Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Dutun te timpu he egkesuatan ku, mibpemineg a te ked-ampù nu; ne zutun te hustu he timpu te kedlibriya ku te menusiyà, midtevangan ku sikew. Ne iyan lalag ku keniyu is: iyan en heini timpu he egkesuatan te Megbevayà te kedtavang keniyu; iyan en heini timpu te kedlibriya zin keniyu te silut.
Egkesuatan dey he wazà igkesawey te minsan hentei te ulaula zey su wey wazà igkesudì dan te kedsengyawa zey te Lalag te Megbevayà.

Ne umba ebpurungan dey is ulaula zey su wey zey ikepaahà he menge suluǥuen key te Megbevayà te minsan hengkey he paaǥi. Ne tenged kayi ed-antus key te minsan hengkey he kemereǥenan, kemeresayan, wey menge samuk.
Mibuǥel key, mibpirisu key, mibpesipelahan key te edsinamuk. Duen timpu he utew subra is terebahu zey ne nepurang key ne nevitil key zaan.

Ne midlikayan dey is meremerik he ulaula. Hustu is kedsevuta zey te Lalag te Megbevayà; mepeseyluwen key ne metinevangen key te minsan hentei. Ed-ulinan key te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin; ibpeehè dey is gaǥew zey ziyà te langun;

ibpenurù dey is tutuu he Lalag te Megbevayà ne edtevangan key te ǥehem te Megbevayà. Pinaaǥi kayi te langun egketuusan he menge suluǥuen key te Megbevayà. Iyan kelasag dey wey lembitan dey is metazeng he ulaula.
Duen edtahud kenami ne zuen daan menge etew he kenè key zan edtehuzen. Duen edalig kenami ne zuen daan ed-ituk kenami. Duen egkaǥi he teruen key, iyan, kenà tarù is egkeǥiyen dey.

Duen egkaǥi he utew minus is pid-etawan dey, iyan, nasì dekelà is bentuǥan dey. Layun key ed-ed-edisi te kemetayen, iyan, idtuǥut pa te Megbevayà he kenè key pa mebpatey. Edsilutan key te Megbevayà wey key mepenurù, iyan, kenè key zin edhimetayan.

Mezakel is menge seeng dey, iyan, layun key egkelipey. Henduen be te utew key egkeayuayu, iyan, pinaaǥi kenami, edsepian te wazà pidtemanan is mezakel he menge etew. Henduen be te wazè dey azen, iyan, naangken dey is langun he ibeǥey te Megbevayà.
Sikiyu is menge suled ku ziyan te Kurintu, wazè dey ieles keniyu is isip dey. Layun kew mahal zini te ǥehinawa zey.
Kenè iyan minus is gehinawa zey keniyu, kekenà, iyan kew minus is gehinawa niw kenami.
Edlelaǥan ku en sikiyu he iring te menge anak ku. Kinahanglan he mahala key zaan diyan te ǥehinawa niw.
Kenè kew, menge suled, mebpekidsevaha te menge etew he kenà tumutuu su kenà egkehimu he egkesevaha is meupiya wey mezaat. Ne kenà daan egkehimu he ebpeked-amur is kerayag wey is merusirem.
Kenà daan egkeuyun si Kristu wey si Setanas ne kenà egkehimu he egkesevaha is tumutuu wey is kenà edtuu.

Ne is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà he zutun ed-ezapa sikandin, kenà egkehimu he zutun daan ed-ezapa is menge tarù he ed-ezapen. Ne iring din ded daan sikitew is tumutuu su iyan kiw iring te valey he ed-ubpaan te wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà. Su migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, Edlumunan ku sikandan ne ebpekiduma a kandan ne egkehimu he iyan a edsimbahan dan he Megbevayà ne iyan sikandan menge ǥaked ku he etew.
Ne tenged kayi migkaǥi zaan is Megbevayà te, Suwayi niw is ebpemen-azap te kenà tutuu he ed-ezapen ne sivey kew kandan. Engkezi niw is minsan hengkey he meremerik he ulaula ne edewaten ku sikiyu.
Ne egkehimu a he Amey niw ne sikiyu, menge vahi wey maama, egkehimu kew he menge anak ku. Lalag heini te mekeǥeǥehem he Nengazen te langun.

Ne ǥeina te iyan heini impenaad kenita te Megbevayà, ne edlumpiyuwen ta is menge ulaula ta su wey wazà minsan hengkey he meremerik he ulaula te lawa ta wey meremerik he isip ta. Ne ebpurungan ta is ulaula ta su wey meheǥeti is kebmetazeng ta pinaaǥi te layun ta kedtehuza kandin.
Mahala key keniyu ziyan te ǥehinawa niw su wazè dey salà te minsan hentei ziyan; wazà minsan hentei ziyan he nezeetan dey is kedtuu zin. Wazà minsan hentei ziyan he midlimbungan dey.

Kenà iyan igkeǥiya ku kayi su zuen igkesewayi ku keniyu. Nekaǥi ku he zaan he utew kew mahal zini te ǥehinawa zey. Te uuyag key pa wey minsan ke ebpatey key en ne kenè kew ǥihapun egkeawà dini te ǥehinawa zey.

Utew zekelà is kedsarig ku keniyu; dekelà layun is kebpekezalig ku keniyu. Ne tenged kayi minsan pa te mezakel is menge seeng dey, meupiya ǥihapun is ǥehinawa ku; utew zekelà is kelipey ku tenged keniyu.

Ne hein nekeuma key en dini te prubinsya he Mesidunya, wazè key ǥihapun meewai te menge seeng dey. Su nereǥenan key te mezakel he samuk. Mibpekidtebek kenami is menge kuntada zey ne ingkeipeng dey is menge tumutuu.
Iyan, is Megbevayà he metau he edlipey te egkengeseeng, midhimu zin he meupiya is gehinawa zey pinaaǥi te kebpekeuma ni Tito.

Ne kenà iyan dà ingkelipey zey is keǥalew zey ki Tito, kekenà, elin daan is tudtul zin he utew sikandin nelipey mehitenged keniyu. Netudtul zin he egkesuatan niw utew he mekepenumbaley a ziyan. Netudtul zin daan he ebuyù kew te pesaylu zini te kediey. Ne elin daan tudtul zin is: dekelà te ǥehinawa niw is kedtumana niw te egkesuatan ku. Ne tenged kayi utew zekelà is kelipey ku.

Su minsan ke pinaaǥi zutun te surat ku ne neseeng kew, neisip ku he meupiya utew te neveelan ku haazà. Hein aney, nekedsendit a su maan is neveelan ku is nehimu he ingkeseeng niw, iyan, petuluy zà naawà haazà is kegkeseeng niw.

Ne ǥuntaan nelipey ad, kenà tenged te neseeng kew, kekenà, tenged te mibpurungan niw is menge ulaula niw pinaaǥi zutun te kegkeseeng niw. Ne haazà is kegkeseeng niw, himan te Megbevayà umba inmeupiya niw haazà is surat dey.

Su is kegkeseeng he egemiten te Megbevayà, egkehimu he igkehalin te ǥehinawa te etew su wey melibri sikandin te silut. Ne kenà heini engayan he ibpekedsendit ta, iyan, is kegkeseeng te menge etew he kenà edsundan te Megbevayà, kenà igkehalin te ǥehinawa zan ne tenged kayi kenà sikandan egkeveǥayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.

Iyan, sikiyu, susiya niw is meupiya he nehimu te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kegkeseeng niw. Su pinaaǥi kayi mid-iseg en is kebpurungi niw te ulaula niw. Dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa niw he metueni te menge etew he wazè dey igkesawey te menge ulaula niw. Utew niw ingkeepes haazà is mid-ulaula zuen te nekesalà. Utew niw ingkehandek haazà su kela ke mekeragkes kew ke edsilutan sikandin te Megbevayà. Ne utew kew zaan mibulung kediey, ne mid-iseg is kedtumana niw te menge suǥù ku keniyu. Ne kenà dutun dà taman su segugunè niw midsiluti sikan is etew he mid-ulaula te mezaat. Ne ingkepeehè niw he wazà keniyu he salà dutun te neulaula zin.

Kenà iyan dà impesurati ku keniyu is mehitenged duen te etew he nekesalà wey kes neselaan din, kekenà, ebpeketistiǥus is Megbevayà he umba mibpesuratan ku sikiyu su wey niw meisipisip ke sengemenu key kemahal diyan te ǥehinawa niw.

Ne tenged kayi utew key nelipey. Ne kenà duen dà taman su nelipey key zaan tenged te nelipey si Tito. Ne iyan ingkelipey ni Tito is: pinaaǥi te menge ulaula niw he meupiya ne naawà is menge samuk diyà te isip din.
Indantal ku sikiyu ziyà te ki Tito ne wazà mebperis is kedentala ku keniyu. Layun tutuu is egkeǥiyen dey keniyu ne iring din ded daan, benar is migkaǥi ku ziyà te ki Tito mehitenged keniyu.

Umba ed-iseg kew ebmahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin su egketenuzan din is kedtumana niw te menge suǥù ku wey is kegkeǥalew niw kandin asal utew niw zutun ingkelenew kes kebpekeuma zin su nahandek kew ke zuen wazè niw metuman.
Ne tenged kayi, utew ad egkelipey su netuenan ku he ebpekepurung ad ebpekesarig keniyu.
Egkesuatan dey, menge suled, he metueni niw ke hengkey is nehimu tenged te ǥaǥew te Megbevayà diyà te menge tumutuu ziyà te Mesidunya.

Minsan dutun te nekeantus dan te utew mepait he kemeresayan, ingkelipey zan utew ǥihapun ne tenged kayi minsan pa te utew zan egkengeayuayu, utew zekelà is ingkeveǥey zan he tavang te menge zuma zan he tumutuu.
Ebpeketistiǥus a he midhimu zan is taman te egkehimu zan, ne subra pa te egkehimu zan is imbeǥey zan he ebpuun te keputian te atey zan.
Su midhengyuan key zan he tuǥuti zey sikandan he mekeuǥup kenami te kebeǥey te tavang diyà te menge tumutuu ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya.

Wazè dey peebuta he egkehimu zan is iring dutun. Inhuna zan iveǥey is tivuuk he lawa zan wey ǥehinawa zan diyà te Megbevayà, ne zutun, tenged te edtumanen dan is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, mibpevayàbayè dan daan kenami.

Ne ǥeina te iyan si Tito nemuunà te vaal ziyan te keniyu te kebpenguwaa te idtavang niw ziyà te menge tumutuu he tigHudiya, midsembaǥan dey sikandin he ipelaus din en su wey kew zin metevangi te kedhimesaza kayi te ulaula mehitenged te ǥaǥew niw.

Netuenan ku he wazà kurang niw te langun he menge ketau wey ulaula he meupiya. Dekelà is kedtuu niw; metau kew he ebpenurù; nesavut niw is tutuu he tuluuwen; ebpetebtevangè kew layun; ne zekelà is gaǥew niw kenami. Tenged kayi egkesuatan dey he wazè niw zaan kurang kayi te kebpaahaa niw te ǥaǥew niw ziyà te menge tumutuu he tigHudiya.

Kenà heini kesuǥuan ku keniyu, kekenà, ibpesayud ku keniyu is dekelà he ǥustu te zuma he menge tumutuu te kedtavang te menge zuma zan. Umba ibpesayud ku heini su wey niw meiringi. Ne pinaaǥi kayi egketuenan ku ke tutuu ve is keniyu he ǥaǥew.

Netuenan ta ke hengkey is kezekelà te ǥaǥew kenita te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Su tenged te hizu zin kenita, minsan te utew sikandin sepian diyà te langit, midhimu zin he utew sikandin ayuayu pinaaǥi te kebpeetew zin wey kebpehimatey zin. Ne tenged kayi te kegkeayuayu zin egkehimu ki he utew sepian.

Iyan sambag ku keniyu is: himesaza niw haazà is kedtiǥuma niw te selapì he mibpuunan niw zutun te nehuna he tuig. Iyan kew nehuna te kedtiǥum te selapì wey metevangi is menge tigHudiya, ne kenà duen dà taman su heini he isip te kedtavang kandan, ne ziyan ebpuun te keniyu.
Ne tenged kayi peniguduwi niw wey niw mepasad sumalà is egkehimu niw. Kinahanglan he zekelà is gustu niw te kedhimesaza kayi te vaal iring te zekelà is gustu niw hein aney te kebpuuni kayi.

Su emun dekelà is gustu niw te kebeǥaya te tavang sumalà is egkehimu niw, iyan heini igkesuat te Megbevayà su kenè din ebuyuen kenita is kenè ta igkeveǥey, kekenà, iyan ebuyuen din haazà is egkehimu ta he ibeǥey kandin.

Kenà iyan dini te isip ku is merasey kew su wey metevangi is duma he edlised, kekenà, egkesuatan ku he metevangi niw is menge tumutuu he edlised guntaan geina te sepian kew ǥuntaan. Ne keuzemà, emun iyan kew edlised ne iyan sikandan sepian, egkehimu he edtevangan kew zan daan. Pinaaǥi kayi ebpeked-iiring kew ne wazà edlised he tumutuu.

Iring heini te insurat dengan he Lalag te Megbevayà su edhenduen heini te, Haazà is etew he nekekuwa te zekelà, wazà gihapun mesubrahi is nekuwa zin. Ne haazà is etew he zeisek is nekuwa zin, wazè din daan kurang.
Dekelà is kebpeselemati zey te Megbevayà su imbeǥey zin ki Tito is dekelà he ǥustu te kedtavang keniyu iring te kenami zaan he ǥustu.

Ne hein mid-insaan dey sikandin ke egkesuatan din he edtavang keniyu utew sikandin nesuat. Ne kenà duen dà taman su zaan sikandin egkesuat he edtavang keniyu. Ne tenged kayi te suat din ed-isip edlikù diyan te keniyu.
Ibpezuma zey kandin is sevaha kayi te menge suled tew he tenged te kedhaǥù din te kedsengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, utew sikandin telehuzen te menge tumutuu te langun he menge inged.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su nepilì sikandin te menge gurupu te menge tumutuu zini he iyan eduma kenami zutun te kedhated dey kayi te idtavang diyà te egkengeayuayu. Umba iyan key edhated su wey mevantug is Nengazen ne wey zaan metueni he utew key egkesuat he edtavang.
Umba egkesuatan dey he eduma heini is suled tew su wey key kenà medudahi su kela ke zuen egkaǥi he ebpenggemiten dey heini is dekelà he selapì he idhated dey.
Su egkesuatan dey he hustu is ebeelan dey sumalà is ked-isipa kenami te Megbevayà ne kenà duen dà taman, kekenà, maahà daan te menge etew he metazeng is menge vaal zey.

Ne zuen pa suled tew he ibpezuma zey engki Tito. Mibpurungan ku sikandin susiya ne utew zekelà is gustu zin te edtavang te menge tumutuu, iyan, tuwas pa zekelà is gustu zin te edtavang keniyu ǥeina te zekelà is kedsarig din keniyu.

Si Tito, iyan timbang ku te kedhimuwa ku te kedtavang keniyu. Ne heini is menge suled tew he zezuwa he eduma kandin pehendiyan, menge suǥù sikandan te menge ǥurupu te tumutuu zini. Pinaaǥi kandan egkevantug layun si Kristu ziyà te menge etew.

Ipeehè niw kandan is gaǥew niw su wey metueni te menge tumutuu ziyà te minsan hendei he inged he tutuu iyan is gaǥew niw te menge zuma niw, ne zutun egketuenan dan he tutuu is migkaǥi zey he metinevangen kew.
Wazà kinahanglan he idsurat ku keniyu ke hengkey is hustu he ed-ul-ulahan niw te kedtavang te menge tumutuu he egkengeayuayu

su netuenan ku he zekelà is gustu niw te kedtavang. Migkeǥiyan ku is menge tumutuu he tigMesidunya he layun dekelà is gustu niw te kedtavang. Migkaǥi ku kandan he puun pa zutun te nehuna he tuig daan naandam is gehinawa niw te menge tigGerisya te kebeǥey. Ne is kezekelan kandan, hein nezineg dan heini, mid-iseg is gustu zan te kedtavang daan.

Ne ǥuntaan edsuǥuen ku ziyan heini is menge suled tew su wey kew zan metevangi te kedtumana te migkaǥi ku mehitenged keniyu su kela ke mehimu he lalag dà duen ne zutun dà taman. Iyan, netuenan ku he edtumanen niw ǥihapun ne edteǥenahan niw is idtavang niw sumalà is migkaǥi ku.

Su emun kenè niw edtumanen ne emun eduma kediey pehendiyan is menge tigMesidunya ne egkeehè dan he wazè niw teǥenaha is idtavang niw, ne egkeeled key ne egkeeled kew zaan tenged te migkaǥi ku he naandam kew en.

Ne tenged kayi neisip ku he kinahanglan he ed-insaan ku heini is tetelu he menge suled tew ke egkehimu he edhuna zan kediey pehendiyan su wey kew zan metevangi te kedteǥenaha he zaan te idtavang he impenaad niw. Ne zutun egkehimu he egketeǥane en haazà dutun te kebpekeuma ku ne egketuenan te langun he umba ebeǥey kew, kenà tenged te ebpeǥesen kew, kekenà, tenged te ebpuun diyà te keputian te atey niw is kebeǥey niw.
Kenè niw lipati heini is sempità he emun deisek is ibpemula ta, deisek daan is egkeraǥun ta, ne emun dekelà is ibpemula ta, dekelà daan is egkeraǥun ta.

Kinahanglan he ed-isipen te kada sevaha ke hengkey is egkesuatan din he ibeǥey ne iyan ibeǥey zin. Kenè ta ibeǥey is kenè ta egkesuatan he ibeǥey, ne kenè ta zaan ibeǥey emun egkeisip ta he inteǥel kenita is kebeǥaya ta, su emun ebeǥey ki, kinahanglan he ebpuun te keputian te atey ta is kebeǥaya ta zutun ne iyan haazà utew egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
Ne egkehimu te Megbevayà he ibeǥey zin kenita is subra pa zutun te egkinehenglanen ta, su wey ta layun maazen is langun he menge kinahanglan ta wey zuen ta zaan subra he igketavang ta te zuma.
Ne zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Layun dekelà is ibeǥey te Megbevayà diyà te egkengeayuayu ne kenà egkelipatan te wazà pidtemanan is ketulanged din.

Ne is Megbevayà, iyan ebeǥey te venì diyà te ebpemula su wey zuen egkeenen. Is idtavang ta te zuma ne iring te ibpemula. Ibeǥey zin daan kenita is ibpemula, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is igketavang ta te zuma, su wey zuen dekelà he uzar ta he ebpuun te metazeng he ulaula ta ziyà te zuma.
Su edhimuwen din layun he kenè ki maalang-alang te selapì su wey ta meveǥayi is edlised. Ne umba, menge suled, mezakel is ebpeselamat te Megbevayà tenged te tavang he ibpeuwit niw kenami.
Ne heini is ibeǥey niw, kenà iyan dà pulus din is kegketavangi te menge tumutuu te Megbevayà, kekenà, pinaaǥi kayi utew mezakel he etew is ebpeselamat te Megbevayà.

Ne emun egketuenan te menge etew he utew kew metulanged, ebentuǥen dan is Megbevayà tenged te kedtumana niw te menge suǥù din wey tenged te mezesen he kedtuu niw te Meupiya he Tudtulanen su midtevangan niw sikandan ne midtevangan niw zaan is duma.
Ne zutun id-ampù kew zan, ne egkehimu he utew kew mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zan tenged te zekelà he ǥagew niw kandan he imbeǥey keniyu te Megbevayà.
Ne tenged kayi ebpeselematan ta is Megbevayà tenged te kebeǥaya zin kenita te Anak din he wazà minsan hengkey he ebpekerepeng te kemahal zin.

Duen egkaǥi he siak, si Pablo, telawen a emun diyan a te keniyu, iyan, memeǥarang kun is menge lalag ku keniyu emun edlelaǥan ku sikiyu pinaaǥi te surat. Iyan, guntaan, kenà meǥarang is menge lalag ku, kekenà, edhangyù a keniyu pinaaǥi te menayù he menge lalag iring te menayù wey veliǥeǥawen si Kristu.

Idhangyù ku keniyu he purungi niw is ulaula niw su wey kenà kinahanglan he mebmeǥarang is menge lalag ku emun diyan a te keniyu. Duen duma keniyu he egkaǥi he iring a te etew zà duen he kenà dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Ne hanu man su kayi te kedhendiyan ku te keniyu emun kenè dan ebpurungan is menge ulaula zan, ne egkeehè dan ke sengemenu keǥarang is menge lalag ku.
Tutuu iyan he etew key zà duen, iyan, is paaǥi te kedsukuli zey te mezaat, ne kenà ebpuun te isip te etew zà duen.

Su is menge ketezengan, he ke và dà gumaan, he idsukul zey te mezaat, ne kenà ebpuun te etew, kekenà, mekeǥeǥehem utew su ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà. Ne heini is menge ketezengan, kenà egkesukulan te minsan hengkey he tarù he ketezengan he igkuntada te Megbavayà minsan ke utew melig-en.

Ne iyan heini egemiten dey te kedeeǥa te menge tarù he ketezengan te menge mepedeliǥen he etew he kenà egkesuat he edtuu te ibpesavut te Megbevayà. Ne minsan is ked-isipa zan te tarù, egkehimu he ed-ilisan dey su wey zan human meisip is tutuu ne pinaaǥi kayi ebpemineǥen dan is menge suǥù ni Kristu.
Ne emun ibpeehè niw en he metinumanen kew te menge suǥù ni Kristu, ne zutun edsilutan dey is minsan hentei pa he tumutuu ziyan he kenè pa egkesuat he ebpemineg te menge suǥù din.

Purungi niw isipa is nesavut niw en su zuen menge zuma niw he kunaan dan ke iyan dan dà menge hustu he suluǥuen ni Kristu. Kinahanglan he mesavut dan he sikami, hustu key zaan he menge suluǥuen ni Kristu.

Kenè en buwa kinahanglan he egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he zuen kebayàbayà ku keniyu he imbeǥey kedì te Megbevayà. Iyan, ke henduen be te utew subra is idantal ku, kenè ku igkeeled heini su wazè din iyan iveǥaya kayi te kebayàbayà dini te kediey su wey ku mezezeeti is kedtuu niw, kekenà, imbeǥey zin kediey su wey ku melig-eni is kedtuu niw.
Kenè ku egkesuatan he ibpelihandek ku keniyu is menge surat ku,
iyan, duen egkaǥi he siak si Pablo, utew a mevurut he edawey keniyu emun ebpekidlalag a keniyu pinaaǥi te surat, iyan, emun diyan a te keniyu, telawen e kun ne kenè e kun metau he egkaǥi.
Is etew he egkaǥi te iring kayi, kinahanglan he sevuta zin he is egkeǥiyen dey pinaaǥi te surat emun kenè key ziyan te keniyu, ne iyan ded ed-ul-ulahan dey emun ebpekeuma key ziyan.

Telawen key iyan te ked-iring te menge ulaula te menge zuma he etew ziyan he menge mepedeliǥen. Kunaan dan ke iyan sikandan metau egkaǥi ke hengkey is meupiya he ulaula. Utew zan tulebung! Su emun ed-iringan te menge etew is kandan he ulaula egkeǥiyen dan he utew meupiya. Iyan, ke kenà sikandan ed-iringan te menge etew egkeǥiyen dan he sayep haazà is kenà ed-iring.
Ne sikami, kenà subra is kedantal zey su iyan dey zà idantal haazà is nehimu zey te edtuman he insuǥù kenami te Megbevayà. Ne ragkes kayi is menge vaal zey hein diyan key te keniyu.

Kenà egkehimu he subra is kegemita zey te keǥehem dey emun edsembaǥan dey sikiyu. Kenè dey sikiyu pezem egkeveyveyaan ke wazè dey sikiyu mepenudtuli zengan, iyan, iyan key nehuna he nekeuma ziyan he ebpenudtul te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged ki Kristu.

Kenè dey idantal is menge vaal te zuma he etew ziyà te menge inged he zutun wazè key suǥua te Megbevayà. Iyan, geina te neragkes kew kayi te mibpeveelan kenami te Megbevayà, egkesuatan dey he emun ed-iseg en is kedtuu niw ne edtevangan key keniyu zutun te menge vaal zey ziyan te inged niw.

Ne pinaaǥi kayi egkehimu he idsangyew zey is Meupiya he Tudtulanen ziyà te menge meziyù he inged he ziyan dapit te keniyu. Su kenè dey egkesuatan he idantal zey is mibeelan te zuma he etew zutun te menge inged he wazè key zutun suǥua te Megbevayà.
Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Ke zuen etew he egkesuat he edantal, kinahanglan he iyan dà idantal zin is nengehimu te Nengazen.
Su emun edeliǥen ta is kenita he menge vaal, kenà heini egkesuatan te Megbevayà, iyan, emun duen igkezeliǥi kenita te Megbevayà iyan heini egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
Pekelalaglalag kew he entusa niw is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu minsan ke henduen be te tulebung a.

Su insavuk te Megbevayà kayi te kediey is dekelà he suat he kenè kew medsuwey te Nengazen. Iring kew te raǥa he nekeǥunan, iyan, iyan si Kristu ingkaǥun ku keniyu. Ne egkesuatan ku he wazà duma he ebpekeesawa keniyu.

Egkeipeng a keniyu su kela ke meengkezi niw is kebpurungi niw kedtumana te menge suǥù ni Kristu su kela ke mesahug is kedtuu niw te selakew he edtuuwen. Kela ke meiringi niw si Ibà dengan su mid-akalan sikandin te teruen he uled he iyan si Setanas.

Umba egkeipeng a su ke zuen ebpekeuma ziyan he selakew is ibpesavut dan mehitenged ki Jesus, ne selakew is mulin-ulin he ibpenurù dan, ne kenè dan iyan ibpesavut is tutuu he tuluuwen he impesavut dey, kekenà, selakew is ibpenurù dan, ne ed-entusen niw mulà is kandan he kebpenurù ne kenà duen dà taman su utew niw egkesuati te ebpemineg.
Ne heini is menge uvag kun lavew he epustul ni Kristu, kunaan dan ke utew zan lavew, iyan, netuenan ku he wazè e zan melevawi
su minsan ke kenà a metau he egkaǥi netuenan ku mulà ke hengkey is tutuu he tuluuwen. Ne iyan heini impesavut dey keniyu zengan te minsan keenu he timpu wey te minsan hengkey he paaǥi.

Hein impesavut ku ziyan te keniyu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen, wazà a mebpesuhul keniyu te minsan sengesintabus dà. Ne iyan benar is: mibpekeminus ku en is pid-etawan ku su wey ku sikiyu ikepelavew. Sayep ku ve heeyan?
Dutun te kebpenurua ku keniyu ne iyan midsuhul kedì is menge tumutuu ziyà te zuma pa he menge inged. Henduen be te midtekawan ku sikandan wey ku sikiyu iyan metevangi.

Ne hein diyan a te keniyu ke zuen kinahanglan ku he selapì, wazè ku vuyua ziyan te keniyu su is menge suled tew he ebpuun diyà te prubinsya he Mesidunya, imbeǥey zan kedì is minsan hengkey he egkinehenglanen ku. Sikiyu is tigGerisya, wazè ku pa sikiyu vuyui te igkeuyag ku, ne kenà daan egkehimu he ebuyù a ziyan te keniyu te minsan keenu he timpu.

Ne heini is idantal ku, kenà egkehimu he egkehalin te minsan keenu he timpu su kenà a edawat te selapì te minsan hentei he ziyan te tivuuk he prubinsya he Gerisya. Tutuu heini iring te netuenan ku he tutuu is impesavut ni Kristu.
Kunaan niw vuwa ke umba egkeǥiyen ku he kenà a ebuyù diyan te keniyu su wazà gehinawa ku keniyu, iyan, utew kew mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku. Netuenan te Megbevayà he mahal kew zini te ǥehinawa ku.
Kenè ku edlekaan heini is lalag ku he kenè ku kebuyù diyan su wey haazà is menge uvag kun lavew he epustul ni Kristu, kenè dan mekekaǥi he iring te kenami is menge paaǥi zan te kebaal.

Kenà sikandan tutuu he menge epustul ni Kristu, kekenà, tarù sikandan he menge suluǥuen ni Kristu. Edterteruan kew zan pinaaǥi te menge vaal zan ne egkeǥiyen dan he tutuu sikandan he menge epustul ni Kristu.
Ne kenè ku heini igkeinuinu su minsan si Setanas, egkehimu zin is dagwey zin he iring te utew merayag he velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebpuun te langit.
Umba, kenè ki egkeinuinu ke egkehimu zaan is menge suluǥuen ni Setanas he iring te menge metazeng he suluǥuen te Megbevayà. Iyan, keuzemà edsilutan sikandan sumalà is menge mezaat he vaal zan.

Edsublien ku te egkaǥi he kinahanglan he kenà isipa te minsan hentei keniyu he tulebung a tenged te menge lalag ku keniyu. Iyan, minsan ke ed-isipen niw he tulebung a, entusa niw te ebpemineg su wey a mekezantal te kenà utew egkeuǥet.
Heini is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu, ne kenà iyan ibpekaǥi kedì te Nengazen, su iring a te tulebung is edantal.
Ne ǥeina te zuen mezakel he idantal zan is menge ulaula zan dini te kelibutan egkehimu vuwa taman te meǥaan dà ke idantal ku zaan is kedì.
Ne ǥeina te menge uluwanen kew he etew, utew kew metau he ed-antus te menge lalag te tulebung diyà te keniyu.
Su ke zuen minsan hentei he ebmandarmandar keniyu wey ke zuen ed-aǥew te menge azen niw wey ke zuen edlimbung keniyu wey ke edlupiǥen kew zan wey ke ebuǥelen kew zan ne ed-entusen niw.

Utew zan mevurut, iyan, sikami, telawen key ne egkeeled a su haazà is menge ulaula zan keniyu he kunaan niw ke utew meupiya, wazè dey meulaula ziyan te keniyu. Ne ǥeina te wazè dan en kegkehandek te edantal ne kenà a zaan egkehandek he edantal minsan ke ebpekeiring a te tulebung.

Haazà he menge etew, egkeǥiyen dan he menge pinilì sikandan te Megbevayà su menge Hudiyu zan, menge kevuwazan ni Israyil wey menge kevuwazan te kepuun ni Israyil he si Abraham. Ne siak daan, Hudiyu a he kevuwazan daan ni Israyil wey ni Abraham.

Netuenan ku he henduen a te ebuneǥen kayi te menge lalag ku, iyan, kenà egkesabpeng is bèbè ku kayi te egkeǥiyen ku. Egkeǥiyen dan he menge suluǥuen sikandan ni Kristu. Siak, lavew e pa he metinumanen he suluǥuen ni Kristu. Utew memereǥen is ebpeveelan din kediey. Lelayun ad egkepirisu ne sikandan, kenà layun. Lelayun ad ebuǥela te menge etew he kuntada te Megbevayà, kenà te sikandan. Mezakel en is nengeeǥiyan ku he edhimetayan a pezem, kenà te sikandan.
Kelelima e en buǥela te menge Hudiyu te menge ketluan wey siyew he lagkut.

Ketetelu ad buǥela pinaaǥi te menge tuked. Midtuleng a te vatu te menge etew su edhimetayan e zan pezem. Ketetelu en daan melavu is barku he mid-untuzan ku ne zuen timpu he sengekezukileman wey sengeandew ziyà a te lawed te zaǥat is nekeǥeǥentungan dà.

Ne zutun te menge kedhipanew ku ne nengeeǥiyan ku is mezakel he menge kemereǥenan tenged te kedalem te wahig, wey tenged te menge tulisan, wey tenged te menge kuntada ku he menge zuma ku he Hudiyu wey menge kenà Hudiyu. Mezakel is menge hitavù kediey ziyà te menge inged wey ziyà te wazà meǥinged wey ziyà te zaǥat wey pinaaǥi te menge tarù he tumutuu.
Midhaǥù a is edterebahu; layun a egkepurang; layun a egkevitil; ne layun a egkemezahi. Layun a kurang te egkeenen wey layun a egkealang-alang te egkeubpaan wey ugelingen.
Ne kenà duen dà taman su andew-andew egkereǥenan a te kedumelaha ku te langun he menge gurupu te menge tumutuu ziyà te minsan hendei.
Su ke zuen tumutuu he edlised su ebmeǥuyà is kedtuu zin, ne edlised a zaan su egkeipeng a kandin. Ke zuen nepenulayan ne nekesalà, ne haazà is etew he nekepenuley kandin, utew ku igkeepes.
Kenè ku egkesuatan he edantal a, iyan, emun kinahanglan he ibpezantal a, idantal ku is menge kemeresayan he nengeeǥiyan ku su pinaaǥi kayi egketuenan niw he zekelà is kurang ku te ketau.
Is Megbevayà wey Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesus, deliǥa sikandin te wazà pidtemanan. Netuenan din he kenà tarù heini is egkeǥiyen ku.

Dengan, hein diyà a te inged he Demasku, is gubirnedur he intezù ni Hadì Eritas, midsuǥù din is menge sundaru he ventayi zan is pultahan he idselang dutun te kutà te inged su wey e zan mezakep ke egawas a zutun.
Iyan, duen menge etew he midtavang kediey ne in-ahuk e zan te zekelà he vinevey ne midheluǥan e zan diyà te sulawà he liyu te metikang he elavat he kutà dutun te inged ne nekeǥawas a zutun.
Minsan pa te wazà pulus te kedantal ku, edantal e zed gihapun. Ne ǥuntaan egkeǥiyen ku keniyu is impezayag wey is impaahà kedì te Nengazen.

Dengan, duen tumutuu he nekilala ku he mibpengelinteuwan he mekepenumbaley sikandin diyà te utew metikang he langit he ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà. Sepulù en wey heepat he tuig heini is kegkehitavù kayi. Wazè ku metueni ke nekehendiyè be is lawa zin wey ke impeehè dè be heini kandin te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te teǥeinep; iyan dà nesayud kayi is Megbevayà.

Iyan dà netuenan ku is: diyà sikandin mekeseled te utew mekempet he inged te Megbevayà ne edsublien ku te egkaǥi he wazè ku metueni ke nekehendiyè be is lawa zin wey ke impeehè dà heini kandin te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te teǥeinep; iyan dà nesayud is Megbevayà.
Ne zutun te kebpenumbaley zin diyà te langit duen nezineg din he kenà egkekaǥi pinaaǥi te kelibutanen he lalag ne kenà daan idtuǥut he egkeǥiyen te etew zà duen.
Ne egkehimu he idantal ku heini is nehitavù kandin, iyan, kenè ku iyan idantal is menge ketau ku, kekenà, iyan ku idantal haazà is ebpekepaahà te kurang ku te ketau.

Ne penenglitan ke egkesuatan ku he edantal a, kenà egkehimu he egkeǥiyen niw he wazà pulus te zantal ku su tutuu is idantal ku, iyan, kenà a edantal su kenè ku egkesuatan he isipa a te menge etew he utew lavew. Meupiya ke zutun dà ebpuun is ked-isipa zan kedì te menge ulaula ku he neehè dan wey menge penurù ku he nezineg dan.

Mibeǥayan a te Megbevayà te utew merasey he zaru su wey ku kenà ikezantal is utew meupiya he nengeehè ku ziyà te langit. Ne heini is daru, ne egemiten ni Setanas he idrasey kedì, ne pinaaǥi kayi kenà a ebpekepelavew.
Ketetelu ku en iampù diyà te Megbevayà he iawè din,

iyan, iyan tavak din kediey is, Edtevangan ku sikew wey nu maantus ne hustu en. Su zekelà is egkehimu te ǥehem ku ziyan te kenikew emun wazè nu en egkehimu, ke sikandin. Ne tenged kayi utew ku egkesuati he idantal ku is kurang ku te ketau su wey a melig-eni te ǥehem ni Kristu.

Ne meupiya en utew te ǥehinawa ku is kurang ku te ketau, is kedsumpelita wey is pesipala kediey te menge etew, wey is menge kemereǥenan wey is kemeresayan tenged te kedtuu ku ki Kristu. Su netuenan ku he emun wazè en kediey he ketau, dekelà is ibeǥey kediey ni Kristu he ketau.

Henduen a te tulebung he etew su edantal a, iyan, neteǥel a keniyu su iyan kew pezem ebeǥey te menge ketezengan ku he idtavak keniyan te menge uvag kun epustul ni Kristu. Ne minsan pa te wazà kediey he ketau wazà a ǥihapun melevawi kayi te uvag menge utew lavew he kenà tutuu he epustul ni Kristu.

Ne hein diyan a te keniyu impeehè ku keniyu he tutuu a he epustul ni Kristu su minsan nereǥenan a, mid-antus a su wey ku ikepaahà is menge singyal wey menge egkengein-inuwan he iyan tuus te tutuu he epustul.

Is kedtavang ku keniyu ne iring ded te kedtavang ku te menge tumutuu ziyà te zuma he menge inged. Asal kela ke kunaan niw ke kenè ku idtavang keniyu is kenè ku keniyu kebuyui te selapì. Emun nekesalà a keniyu pinaaǥi kayi peseyluwa a keniyu.

Ed-endaman ku en is kedhendiyan ku ne iketelu en heini is kebpenumbaley ku ziyan te keniyu. Ne iring ded te nehuna, kenà egkehimu he ebuyù a keniyu te selapì. Kenè ku egkesuatan is selapì niw, kekenà, egkesuatan ku he mahala a keniyu ziyà te ǥehinawa niw. Nehimu a he amey niw su pinaaǥi kedì neketuu kew te Megbevayà. Ne kenà egkehimu he ebuyuan is menge vatà te amey zan, kekenà, iyan ebuyù is menge vatà.
Egkelipey a utew ke igkeveǥey ku is menge azen ku wey is desen ku wey ku sikiyu metevangi. Iyan, minsan pa te mahal kew zini te ǥehinawa ku henduen be te kenà a mulà mahal ziyan te ǥehinawa niw.
Duen duma keniyu he ke sikandan te, Tutuu iyan he wazà si Pablo mebuyù te selapì, iyan, duen paaǥi zin he meeles wey kiw zin melimbungi.
Ne emun iyan heeyan egkeisip niw, ipetueni niw kedì ke hengkey he paaǥi is kegkelimbungi ku keniyu. Duen be nekuwa ku zutun te kedsuǥua ku te menge zuma ku ziyan te keniyu? Nelimbungan kew zan be?

Midhengyuan ku si Tito he medhendiyan te keniyu, ne impezuma ku zaan kandin is sevaha te menge suled tew. Midlimbungan kew zan be? Wazè niw egkekaǥi he iring kayi, su si Tito wey siak ne neked-iring is paaǥi zey wey ed-ul-ulahan dey su pudu memetazeng.

Kunaan niw vuwa ke pinaaǥi kayi te egkeǥiyen ku ibpesavut ku keniyu he wazè dey menge sayep, iyan, kenà iyan heeyan tuyù ku. Su ebpeketistiǥus is Megbevayà he heini is migkaǥi ku keniyu, ne iyan hustu he egkeǥiyen tenged te kebpekidsevaha ku ki Kristu. Ne, minahal ku he menge suled, insurat ku heini is langun, su wey meheǥet is kedtuu niw.

Egkesamuk is gehinawa ku su kela ke zutun te kebpekeuma ku ziyan ne iyan ku egkeahà diyan te keniyu is menge ulaula he kenè ku egkesuatan. Ne emun iyan haazà ne zuen ed-ul-ulahan ku zutun he kenè niw zaan egkesuatan su kinahanglan he edsewayen ku is keniyu he ulaula. Su kela ke zuen ebpekigkuntada ziyan te menge zuma zin, kela ke zuen egkesina, duen petuluy egkepauk, wey leǥezen, kela ke zuen diyan ebpenemperasà wey edsulà te zuma zin, kela ke zuen bereituk. Kela ke zuen diyan te keniyu gelbuwen, wey kela ke wazè niw kebpekid-uyun te menge tumutuu.

Egkesemukan a su kela ke zutun te kebpekeuma ku ziyan ne igkeeled ku sikiyu ziyà te Megbevayà ne kela ke utew a egkeseeng tenged te mezakel he netuenan ku zengan he nekevaal te mezaat ne wazè dan pa engkezi is menge mahawag he ulaula zan iring te kedhilavet te kenè dan esawa wey is kedtumana zan te mezaat he kebayè dan.

Iketelu en heini te kebpenumbaley ku ziyan. Ke zuen etew he ebpehusey kedì ne zuen idsumbunga zin te zuma zin he tumutuu, kinahanglan he ebentayan ta is suǥù diyà te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Ke zuen idsumbunga niw te zuma niw kinahanglan he edtistiǥusan te menge tetelu ne emun kenà ne menge zezuwa he etew.

Dutun te ikezuwa he kebpenumbelayi ku keniyu, sikiyu is memezaat is ulaula zengan, migkaǥi ku keniyu he emun kenè niw ed-engkezan haazà is memezaat he ulaula niw ne edsilutan ku sikiyu emun ebpekelikù a. Ne ed-umanan ku egkeǥiya ǥuntaan diyan te keniyu wey ziyà te minsan hentei pa he ed-ulaula te mezaat. Ke ebpekeuma a, wazà minsan hentei he ed-ulaula te mezaat he ebpekelikey te kedsiluti ku kandin.

Dutun, ne egkevenaran kew human he is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu, iyan is impekaǥi kediey ni Kristu. Ne kenà sikandin telawen, kekenà, emun duen ed-ul-ulahan din keniyu dekelà is gehem din he ibpeehè din keniyu.

Su minsan ke henduen be te wazà egkehimu ni Kristu zutun te kedrensanga kandin diyà te krus, nevanhew zed sikandin ne zuen din en beǥu en he untung pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Megbevayà. Ne sikami zaan, henduen be te wazè dey egkehimu su layun key zaan ebpekeantus te kemeresayan, iyan, pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Megbevayà he edtavang kenami, duen dey zaan beǥu en he untung ne ebpeketavang key pa keniyu.
Susiya niw is gehinawa niw wey niw metueni ke tutuu ve is kedtuu niw ki Kristu. Wazè niw ve metueni he midlumunan kew ni Kristu? Ne emun wazà, ne tarù is kedtuu niw ne wazè kew mezawat ni Kristu.
Egkesuatan ku he metueni niw he tutuu key iyan he menge epustul ni Kristu.

Id-ampù dey ziyà te Megbevayà he wazà ulaula niw he mezaat. Ne kenè dey iyan id-empua keniyu su wey metueni te menge etew he edtumanen niw is impenurù dey keniyu su maambe ke kenè niw ed-isipen he epustul key ni Kristu, asal, ed-ul-ulahan niw is hustu.
Su emun hustu is ed-ul-ulahan niw, sikami is epustul, kenà egkehimu he ibpeehè dey is keǥehem dey keniyu su wey zey zà ibpaahà is keǥehem dey ke edsupaken niw is hustu he ulaula.
Egkelipey ad emun wazè niw supak, minsan ke henduen te wazè dey keǥehem. Ne kenà duen dà taman su id-ampù dey he mepurung meheǥet is ked-ul-ulaha niw te hustu.

Umba ebpesuratan ku sikiyu te zini e pa te meziyù su ke ebpekeuma a ziyan kenè en kinahanglan he meǥamit ku is keǥehem ku te epustul te kedsilut. Imbeǥey kedì te Megbevayà heini is keǥehem. Kenà iyan imbeǥaya zin kayi te keǥehem su wey maawà is upakat niw te tumutuu, kekenà, wey meheǥet is upakat niw.

Menge suled, iyan dà heini menge lalag ku keniyu; berakat he mebmelipayen kew. Purungi niw is menge ulaula niw; tumana niw is menge sambag ku keniyu. Kinahanglan he mesevaha is gehinawa niw ne mebmelinawen is ked-ubpè niw. Su emun ebeelan niw heini, is Megbevayà he iyan puunà te ǥaǥew wey kelinew, layun eduma keniyu.
Mebpelimlimuey kew he iyan tuus he teltelesuled kew tenged te kedtuu niw.
Ebpengemusta keniyu is langun he menge tumutuu te Megbevayà dini.

Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey verakat he ipeehè keniyu te Megbevayà he mahal kew ziyà te ǥehinawa zin wey verakat daan he meheǥet is upakat niw te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Iyan a si Pablo.

Siak si Pablo is midsurat kayi. Ibpeuwit ku heini ziyan te keniyu te langun he menge tumutuu ziyan te menge inged te tivuuk he prubinsya he Gelasya. Siak wey is langun he menge tumutuu he menge zuma ku zini, ebpengemusta keniyu. Epustul a, iyan, wazà a ǥerari he epustul te etew zà duen, ne kenà daan pinaaǥi te etew zà duen is kedsuǥua kedì, kekenà, migeraran a he epustul ni Jesu Kristu wey te Amey tew he Megbevayà he mibanhew ki Jesus, ne iyan sikandan midsuǥù kedì.
Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesus wey veǥayi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.

Si Kristu, imbelavag din is untung din su wey mepalis is menge salè tew su wey kiw melibri, ne kenè tew meiringi is menge etew he ed-ulaula te mezaat te ǥuntaan he timpu kayi te kelibutan. Umba mibeelan heini ni Kristu su edtumanen din is egkesuatan te Amey tew he Megbevayà.
Berakat he zeliǥa is Megbevayà te wazà pidtemanan

Utew ku sikiyu igkeinuinu su wazè en utew meuǥet ne henduen be te nahalin en is kedtuu niw, ne is Megbevayà he iyan mibpetuu keniyu pinaaǥi te ǥaǥew ni Kristu, ed-iniyuǥan niw ne edtuuwan niw is selakew he tuluuwen he egngezanan daan te menge etew he Meupiya he Tudtulanen.

Iyan, kenà egkehimu he zuen selakew pa he tuluuwen he egngezanan te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Egkeǥiyen ku heini su zuen menge etew ziyan he ebpenurù te tarù, ne pinaaǥi kayi egkesemukan is isip niw su edhelinen dan te tarù is Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged ki Kristu.

Iyan, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke zuen minsan hentei, minsan ke sikami, wey minsan ke velinsuǥuen he ebpuun te langit, ne zuen ibpesavut din keniyu he egkeǥiyen din he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, iyan, selakew, ne kenà iyan heini is tutuu he tuluuwen he impesavut dey keniyu, ne verakat he meimpirnu sikandin.

Daan dey en keniyu heini migkaǥi, iyan, ed-umanan ku egkeǥiya ǥuntaan he ke zuen ibpesavut te minsan hentei he egkeǥiyen din he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, iyan, kenà iyan is tutuu he tuluuwen he impesavut dey keniyu, ne verakat he meimpirnu sikandin.

Kunaan niw vuwa ke iyan netaǥù te ǥehinawa ku is: egkesuat a he zeliǥa a te menge etew. Iyan, kenà iyan heini netaǥù te ǥehinawa ku, kekenà, iyan is kebpenunuata ku te Megbevayà. Kunaan niw vuwa zaan ke egkesuatan ku he ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa te menge etew is menge ulaula ku, iyan, kenà daan iyan egkesuatan ku su emun iyan egkesuatan ku, kenà egkehimu he suluǥuen a ni Kristu.
Egkesuatan ku, menge suled, he mesavut niw he heini is migngezanan he Meupiya he Tudtulanen he impesavut ku keniyu ne kenà ebpuun te etew zà duen
su wazà keǥiya kediey te minsan hentei he etew ne wazà daan ipenurù kediey te etew, kekenà, impinted kediey ni Jesu Kristu.

Nezineg niw is daan he menge ulaula ku zengan te kemulu ku pa kebenteyani te tuluuwen te menge zuma ku he Hudiyu. Is langun he menge tumutuu ki Jesus, mibpesipelahan ku su ebpeǥesen ku pezem sikandan he meengkezi zan is kedtuu zan.

Is menge zuma ku he menge Hudiyu he serenganè ku te penuiǥen, wazà nekerepeng kedì te kebenteyani ku te menge tuluuwen dey te menge Hudiyu. Ne wazà kandan kedì nekerepeng te kebenteyani te imbilinbilin he menge vetasan te ǥinepuan dey.
Ne minsan pa zutun, ingkeǥaǥew a te Megbevayà ne mibpilì e zin he suluǥuen din te wazè e pa ianak ne nehimu zin he meketuu a kandin.
Ne hein neisip din he ibpekilala zin en kediey is Anak din he si Jesus su wey ku ikepenudtul is keaǥi ni Jesus diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, wazà a mebpepenurù te minsan hentei he etew;
ne wazà a zaan medhendiyà te inged he Hiruselim su wey ku mesampit kes nengehuna he epustul ni Jesu Kristu, kekenà, midhendiyà a te prubinsya he Erabya ne zutun, midlikù a ziyà te inged he Demasku.
Ne tetelu pa zutun he tuig ne human a medhendiyà te inged he Hiruselim wey a mekepenumbaley ziyà te ki Pedro ne ziyà a te kandin taman dà te zezuwa he simana.
Ne neehè ku zaan dutun si Santiago, sikan is hazi te Nengazen tew he si Jesus, ne wazà duma he epustul he neehè ku zutun, iyan dà sikandan is dezuwa.
Tutuu heini is edtudtulen ku keniyu. Netuenan te Megbevayà he kenà tarù.
Ne zutun mibeyaan ku is prubinsya he Sirya wey Silisya.
Ne wazè e pa zutun mekilala te menge gurupu te menge tumutuu ki Jesus he ziyà te prubinsya he Hudiya.

Netudtulan dà sikandan te menge etew he siak is ebpendakep te menge tumutuu ki Jesus dutun te nengehuna he andew, ne ǥuntaan idsangyew ku en is tinuuwan he iyan ibpendekepa ku kandan su wey zan meewai.
Ne tenged dutun midalig dan is Megbevayà tenged te neketuu a ki Jesus.
Ne sepulù wey heepat pa he tuig dutun ne human a medlikù diyà te Hiruselim. Mibpezumehè key ki Bernabe ne miduma ku zaan si Tito.

Umba midhendiyà a su impinted kedì te Megbevayà haazà is kedhendiyè ku. Ne kebpekeuma zey zutun ne midtiǥum is menge egalen te menge tumutuu he iyan dan dà ne impesavut ku kandan ke hengkey is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ibpenurù ku ziyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu. Egkesuatan ku zutun he kenà maawà is pulus te nengeveelan ku en wey is kemulu ku pa ebeeli.
Iyan, nesuatan dan ded is baal ku su si Tito, is duma ku, minsan te kenà sikandin Hudiyu, wazè dan iteǥel is kedsirkunsidar kandin sumalà is insuǥù ni Moises.

Iyan, duen menge etew he kenà tutuu he menge tumutuu te tutuu he tuluuwen he midtampu kenami. Egkesuatan dan dutun he sirkunsidara si Tito. Umba midtampu zan he id-eles dan he kenè dan tutuu he tumutuu su wey zan maahà ke edtumanen tew is menge suǥù he imbilinbilin ni Moises. Su egkesuatan dan he meiring kiw te uripen pinaaǥi te kedtuman te kesuǥuan minsan te nelibri kiw en ni Jesu Kristu ne wazè en kinahanglan he ebenteyanan tew pa is kesuǥuan.
Ne wazè dey ituǥut he meveyveyai key zan te minsan hengkey he paaǥi su wey kenà meumani te tarù is tutuu he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, ne kenà egkezeetan is kedtuu niw.

Ne zutun, minsan sikan is menge etew ziyà te Hiruselim he henduen be te menge egalen te tumutuu, wazè dan ingkepenurù kediey he idheǥet te ibpenurù ku. Umba egkeǥiyen ku he henduen dan te menge egalen su wazà bali ziyà te Megbevayà te igerar kenita te menge etew. Wazà id-uman dan te kediey he ibpenurù, kekenà, nesavut dan dutun he insarig kediey te Megbevayà is kedsengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen diyà te menge etew he kenà Hudiyu iring te insarig din daan ki Pedro is kedsengyawa kayi ziyà te menge Hudiyu.

Su is Megbevayà, mid-ulinan din si Pedro wey mehimu sikandin he epustul he iyan ebpenudtul ziyà te menge Hudiyu, ne iring din ded, mid-ulinan e zin daan wey a mehimu he epustul he iyan suǥù din diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu.

Ne si Santiago, si Pedro, wey si Juan, haazà is menge egalen dutun, hein nesavut dan he insarig kediey te Megbevayà heini is baal ku, mibpekigkumusta zan kenami ki Bernabe he tuus te teltelezuma key pudu is edtuman te ebpeveelan te Megbevayà. Neuyunan dey he iyan key ebpenudtul ziyà te menge etew he kenà Hudiyu ne iyan dan ebpenudtul ziyà te menge Hudiyu.
Iyan dan dà intelaan kenami is kedtevangi zey te menge tumutuu he egkengeayuayu ziyà te Hiruselim, iyan, daan ku en heini midheǥet dini te ǥehinawa ku.

Ne malù pa neuǥet dutun nekeuma si Pedro ziyà te kenami, te ziyè key te inged he Entiyukya. Ne hein aney sikandin mekeuma, hustu is mid-ulaula zin su mid-amur he egkaan te menge tumutuu he kenà menge Hudiyu. Iyan, hein nekeuma is menge tumutuu he Hudiyu he midsuǥù ni Santiago, midlikayan din he mekekaan duma te kenà menge Hudiyu. Ne midsawey ku sikandin su utew keladu he kenà hustu is ed-ul-ulahan din. Umba midlikayan din su nahandek sikandin su kela ke ikesewayi kandin haazà is ulaula zin dutun te menge tumutuu he Hudiyu he egkaǥi he kinahanglan he ebpesirkunsidar is menge tumutuu he kenà menge Hudiyu.
Ne iring din ded daan dutun is mid-ulaula te zuma he menge tumutuu he Hudiyu su midlikey zan daan, ne minsan si Bernabe, ne neuwit daan dutun.

Ne hein nesavut ku he ed-ul-ulahan dan is supak te tutuu he impenurù te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, migkeǥiyan ku si Pedro ziyà te etuvangan te langun kandan, ke siak te, Sikew, Pedro, sikan is menge tumutuu he kenè tew zuma he Hudiyu, maan is ibpetuman nu kandan is kesuǥuan tew te menge Hudiyu? Su minsan Hudiyu ka, mid-engkezan nu en is kedtumana nu kayi he kesuǥuan, ke siak.
Ne impelaus ku haazà is lalag ku te, Sikita is etew he in-anak he Hudiyu, ne kenè ki iring te menge etew he kenà Hudiyu he egngezanan ta he menge mesinupaken.

Ne minsan pa zutun, netuenan ta he kenè ki egkeisip he metazeng te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kedtumana ta te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, kekenà, pinaaǥi zà te kedsarig ta ki Jesu Kristu. Sikita is Hudiyu, nekesarig ki zaan ki Jesu Kristu su wey pinaaǥi te kedtuu ki Jesu Kristu meisip ki zaan te Megbevayà he metazeng. Netuenan ta he kenà heini egkehimu pinaaǥi te kedtumana te kesuǥuan. Su wazà minsan hentei he ed-isipen he metazeng te Megbevayà tenged te kedtumana zin te kesuǥuan.

Guntaan, egkesuatan ta he isipa ki te Megbevayà he metazeng pinaaǥi ki Kristu. Ne pinaaǥi te kedtuu ta kandin ibpesavut kenita he mesinupaken ki ves daan he iring te kenà menge Hudiyu. Ne emun iyan heini, ne sikita is Hudiyu, egkehimu ve he ebpekekaǥi ki he pinaaǥi ki Kristu nehimu ki en he mesinupaken? Kenà daan egkehimu!
Su emun edlikuan ku ne egkeǥiyen ku he hustu he paaǥi haazà is kesuǥuan he mid-engkezan ku, igkepeehè ku pinaaǥi kayi he venar iyan he mekesesalà a su nesupak ku is kesuǥuan.

Siak, nesavut ku en he kenà a egkeveǥayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan pinaaǥi te kedtumana ku te kesuǥuan, ne tenged dutun mid-engkezan ku is kedsarig ku te kedtumana ku te kesuǥuan su wey ku iyan metuman is menge suǥù te Megbevayà.

Tenged te kedsarig ku ki Kristu, inransang a te krus duma kandin su elili ku sikandin. Minatey a, iyan, uuyag a ǥihapun su zini ed-ubpà te kediey si Kristu ne heini is kebpengungubpaan ku zini te kelibutan, pinaaǥi zà te kedsarig ku kandin te Anak te Megbevayà. Mahal a ziyà te ǥehinawa zin ne mibpehimatey sikandin he elili kediey su wey a melibri.
Kenà egkehimu he kenè ku edewaten is gaǥew te Megbevayà kedì su ke egkehimu he ed-isipen ki zin he metazeng pinaaǥi te kedtumana ta te kesuǥuan, wazè bes pulus te kebpehimatey ni Kristu!

Sikiyu is menge tigGelasya, henduen be te kenè kew metau he ed-isip-isip! Utew a egkeinuinu keniyu! Maan is ebpemineǥen niw is menge etew he ebpetuman keniyu te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises? Utew keladu is kebpenurua ku keniyu te nehimu ni Jesu Kristu kenitew pinaaǥi te kebpatey zin diyà te krus.

Duen id-insè ku keniyu. Hengkey is paaǥi te kegkezewata niw te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin? Nezawat niw ve is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin tenged te kedtumana niw te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises? Wazà, su netuenan niw he imbeǥey keniyu te Megbevayà is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin tenged dà te nezineg niw ne midtuuwan niw is tudtul mehitenged te nehimu ni Jesus.

Menge tulebung kew ves! Dutun te aney niw en kedsundan ki Jesus, midseriǥan niw is kedtavang te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, iyan, guntaan, kunaan niw vuwa ke egkepurungan is kedsundan niw pinaaǥi te keniyu za he ketau!
Wazè bes pulus te menge meupiya he tuvad keniyu tenged te kebpeketuu niw! Kenà egkehimu he wazà pulus.

Is Megbevayà, hein imbeǥey zin keniyu is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne impeehè din diyan te keniyu is menge egkein-inuwan, wazè din iyan iveeli zutun is tenged te edtumanen niw is kesuǥuan, kekenà, tenged dà te nezineg niw ne midtuuwan niw is Meupiya he Tudtulanen.

Iring din ded daan is nehitavù ki Abraham he kepuun tew zengan su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Midtuu sikandin te migkaǥi te Megbevayà ne tenged kayi, is Megbevayà, midawat din si Abraham ne mid-isip din sikandin he metazeng.

Ne sikiyu zaan, kinahanglan he sevuta niw he iyan ded heini ǥuntaan kayi te kenitew su ke zuen etew he edtuu te Lalag te Megbevayà ne nehimu en sikandin he kevuwazan ni Abraham, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, egkezawat din is impenaad te Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham.

Daan he migkaǥi is Megbevayà diyà te insurat he lalag din he minsan is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, ne ed-isipen din sikandan he metazeng emun edtuuwan dan sikandin. Impesavut din he zaan ki Abraham is Meupiya he Tudtulanen, ke sikandin te, Tenged te midtuu ka te migkaǥi ku, midtuvazan ku sikew. Ne pinaaǥi zaan kayi te kedtuu nu edtuvazan ku is tivuuk he menusiyà dini te kelibutan.

Ne midtuu si Abraham dutun te Lalag te Megbevayà, ne tenged dutun midtuvazan sikandin te Megbevayà; ne iring din ded daan ke edtuu is minsan hentei te Lalag te Megbevayà, edtuvazan daan sikandin te Megbevayà.
