Iyan, is minsan hentei mulà he edsarig te kedtumana te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, nesuǥat en te rawak te Megbevayà su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megvevayà he edhenduen te, Is minsan hentei he kenà din egkepurung egketuman is minsan hengkey he suǥù he insurat dutun te kesuǥuan, ne nesuǥat en sikandin te rawak te Megbevayà.

Ne emun iyan haazà, ne egkesavut ta he wazà minsan hentei he metazeng is ked-isipa kandin te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kedtumana te kesuǥuan su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Is minsan hentei he metazeng is ked-isipa kandin te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kedtuu zin te Lalag te Megbevayà, iyan sikandin ebeǥayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan, ke sikandin.

Iyan, ke zuen etew he egkepurung din egketuman is langun he suǥù dutun te kesuǥuan, kenè en kinahanglan he edtuu pa sikandin wey meveǥayi te untung he wazè din pidtemanan, su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Is etew he egkepurung din egketuman is langun he suǥù dutun te kesuǥuan, ebeǥayan sikandin te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.

Minsan pa te nesupak te en is kesuǥuan, nelibri ki ni Jesus te silut su midrewakan en si Jesus he elili kenitew zutun te kedrensanga kandin te krus, su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Ke zuen etew he edhimetayan ne idtaud te impasek he kayu ne tuus heini te rawak kandin te Megbevayà.

Ne umba mibpehimatey si Jesu Kristu te iring dutun su wey pinaaǥi kandin ikeveǥey zaan diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu is ketazeng he intuvad te Megbevayà ki Abraham. Ne pinaaǥi zutun sikitew is langun he edtuu ki Jesus, ebeǥayan kiw zin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he impenaad dengan te Megbevayà.

Menge suled, duen penenglitan he ibpesavut ku keniyu. Su ke zuen ibpenaad te sevaha he etew he insurat diyà te dukumintu he mibpirmahan din ne mibpirmahan daan te menge tistiǥus, ne kenà egkehimu he edhelinan wey ed-umanan haazà te minsan hentei su nelig-enan.

Ne iring din ded daan su zuen impenaad te Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham wey ziyà te kevuwazan ni Abraham he egkeuǥet pa zutun id-anak. Wazè din iyan keǥiya he zuen penaad din diyà te menge kevuwazan ni Abraham su kenà mezakel is egkeǥiyen din, kekenà, ke sikandin diyà te ki Abraham te, diyà te kevuwazan nu. Umba migkaǥi zin heini su sebsevaha zà he etew zutun te kevuwazan ni Abraham is ibpesavut din he iyan si Kristu.

Iyan ibpesavut ku kayi is: duen untung he wazè pidtemanan he impenaad te Megbevayà ki Abraham he kenà duwazuwa he edtumanen din su midlig-enan din. Daan en heini is penaad te wazè pa is kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises su neuǥet pa zutun si Moises su menge heepat pa he ǥatus wey ketluan he tuig. Ne kenà egkehimu he egkeawà is penaad te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises. Kenà egkehimu he kenè edtumanen te Megbevayà is penaad din.

Si Abraham, imbeǥey kandin te Megbevayà is untung he wazà pidtemanan tenged dà te impenaad heini kandin te Megbevayà. Iyan, emun egkehimu he ibeǥey kenita is untung pinaaǥi te kedtumana ta te kesuǥuan, kenà daan egkehimu he ibeǥey heini kenita tenged dà te impenaad heini te Megbevayà.

Ne emun iyan heini, ne hengkey is pulus te kesuǥuan? Ibpesavut ku keniyu is pulus din. In-uman te Megbevayà is kesuǥuan su wey zin ipesavut kenita ke hengkey is mezaat he ulaula ta; ne egkesuatan din he zutun dà taman is kedseriǥi te kesuǥuan te kebpekeuma te kevuwazan ni Abraham he iyan si Kristu he iyan mibpenaazan te Megbevayà. Midsuǥù te Megbevayà is menge velinsuǥuen din he ebpuun diyà te langit wey zan ikeveǥey is kesuǥuan diyà te ki Moises. Ne si Moises, nehimu sikandin he zatù te pid-elangan su imbeǥey zin daan is kesuǥuan diyà te menge etew.
Iyan, dutun te kebpenaazi te Megbevayà ki Abraham wazà kinahanglan he zuen datù te pid-elangan su sebsevaha zà dutun is nekepenaad he iyan is Megbevayà.

Ne kunaan niw vuwa ke kenà egkeuyun is kesuǥuan wey is menge penaad dengan te Megbevayà, iyan, kenà egkehimu he kenà heini egkeuyun. Su ke zuen kesuǥuan he pinaaǥi kayi egkeveǥayan kiw te untung he wazè din pidtemanan ne siguradu egkehimu kiw he metazeng pinaaǥi zaan kayi te kesuǥuan.

Iyan, impesavut kenitew te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he sikitew is tivuuk he menusiyà, sakup kiw en pudu te mezaat he kebayè tew. Ne tenged kayi, wey zà edtumana te Megbevayà is menge penaad din kenita ke edsarig kiw kandin. Wey kiw zà egkeveǥayi te untung he wazà pidtemanan ke zuen tew kedtuu.

Ne te wazè pa ipezayag kenitew he egkekuwa tew is untung pinaaǥi te kedtuu ki Jesus, iring te nepirisu kiw te kesuǥuan. Nehimu is kesuǥuan he iring te guwardya he ebantey kenitew wey kiw kenà mekeawà taman te kenè pa ibpezayag kenitew is paaǥi he iyan is kedtuuwi ki Jesu Kristu.

Nehimu zaan is kesuǥuan he iring te ed-uyamu he iyan ebayàbayà kenitew te iring te menge vatà taman dà te kebpekeuma ni Kristu su wey, ke ebpekeuma si Kristu, meisip kiw te Megbevayà he metazeng pinaaǥi te kedtuu tew kandin.
Ne ǥuntaan, te impezayag en kenitew is paaǥi he iyan is kedtuu, kenè kiw en egkeveyveyaan te kesuǥuan.
Ne ǥeina te iyan haazà, nehimu kew en pudu he menge anak te Megbevayà tenged dà te kedtuu niw ki Jesu Kristu.
Su midtuuwan niw si Jesu Kristu, ne nebewtismuwan kew he tuus te sumusundan kew zin, ne tenged dutun insun-ud niw si Kristu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, neiringan niw is menge ulaula ni Kristu.

Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he kenè niw isipa he ibpelavi te Megbevayà is menge Hudiyu, ne emun kenà, ne iyan is kenà menge Hudiyu, su ziyà te kandin neked-iiring is langun he menge etew, uripen se kenà uripen, maama se vahi, ne sikiyu zaan, neked-iiring kew ziyà te Megbevayà su neked-iiring kew he edtuu ki Jesu Kristu.
Ne ǥeina te sakup kew ni Kristu, nehimu kew en he iring te menge kevuwazan ni Abraham ne egkezawat niw zaan is impenaad te Megbevayà ki Abraham.

Penenglitan duen anak he minatey is amey zin te vatè pa utew sikandin. Ne minsan pa te sumusunud sikandin te langun he azen te amey zin he minatey, ne zutun te vatè pa sikandin, iring sikandin te suluǥuen dà su zuen pa ebayàbayà kandin.
Duen ed-uyamu kandin he ebantey zaan dutun te menge azen din taman te kenè pa egketuman is timpu he midtelaan te amey zin, ne human sikandin ebpekezawat te keǥehem te kebayàbayà te menge azen din.
Ne iring kiw zaan dutun su neveyveyaan kiw zengan te menge kenè pa hustu he tuluuwen dini te kelibutan su iring kiw pa te menge vatà is ebantey te langun dutun.

Ne hein netuman en is hustu he timpu he netagnà dengan, is Megbevayà, midsuǥù din dini te kelibutan is Anak din. Ne heini is Anak din, nehimu he etew pinaaǥi te ked-enaka kandin te vahi. Ne pinaaǥi kayi nehimu zaan sikandin he nezizalem te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises,
su wey kiw zin melibri is langun he zizalem te kesuǥuan ne wey kiw zaan mehimu he menge anak te Megbevayà.

Ne zutun wey ta metueni he anak ki iyan te Megbevayà, midsuǥù te Megbevayà he ibpeubpà dini te kenita is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he ziyà te ki Jesus, ne ibpinted din kenita he mekekaǥi ki te, Amey ku he Megbevayà.
Ne ǥuntaan kenè ki en iring te menge suluǥuen dà, kekenà, anak ki en te Megbevayà. Ne ǥeina te iyan heini, egkezawat ta is minsan hengkey he ibeǥey zin diyà te anak din.
Dengan te wazè niw pa tuuwi is tutuu he Megbevayà, neuripen kew te menge edtuuwan he kenà hustu he megbevayà.

Iyan, guntaan te nekilala niw en is Megbevayà iring te kegkekilelaa zin keniyu, maan is edlikuan niw is wazà pulus he menge tuluuwen he kenà ebpekelibri keniyu te silut? Maan is egkesuatan niw he meuripen kew en maan kayi?
Maan is ebenteyanan niw is menge andew, menge vulan, wey menge tuig he ibpetuman te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises?
Utew ku sikiyu igkeipeng su kela ke kenà ebpulus is langun he impenurù ku keniyu.

Menge suled, edhengyuan ku sikiyu he ul-ulaha niw is mid-ulaula ku su siak is Hudiyu, mid-engkezan ku en is kedseriǥi te kesuǥuan te menge Hudiyu. Nehimu a he iring keniyu zengan te kenà menge Hudiyu. Tutuu iyan he wazà a keniyu meselai, kekenà, mibpurungan a keniyu.
Netuenan niw he umba nehimu is aney ku en kebpenudtuli keniyu te Meupiya he Tudtulanen su nezeruwan a.

Ne minsan te zuen ku mezaat he zaru ne wazà a keniyu ikeremerik minsan ke heini is daru ku ne nekesamuk keniyu, iyan, midawat a keniyu iring te velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebpuun te langit. Impeiring niw is kedewata niw kedì te kedewata niw ki Jesu Kristu.
Utew a zengan keniyu ingkeǥalew, su ke egkehimu zà ne egkeluten niw is mata niw ne ibeǥey niw kedì. Iyan e en mismu ebpekekaǥi kayi mehitenged keniyu. Ne ǥuntaan, maan is nahalin en is gehinawa niw?
Maan is egkepeukan a keniyu ǥuntaan? Kela ke nehimu kew en he kuntada ku tenged dà te migkaǥi ku keniyu ke hengkey is tutuu he tuluuwen.

Haazà is menge etew he kenà tutuu is ibpenurù dan keniyu, ebpurungan kew zan, iyan, kenà meupiya is tuyù dan diyan te keniyu. Egkesuatan dan he maawà is upakat niw kediey su wey iyan niw zà sikandan mepurungi.
Utew meupiya ke ebpekid-emiǥu zan keniyu emun kenà mezaat is tuyù dan. Egkesuatan ku he kenà iyan e zà ebpekid-emiǥu keniyu. Emun kenà a ziyan, meupiya ke zuen pa ebpekid-emiǥu keniyu.

Henduen be te menge anak ku en sikiyu su minahal ku sikiyu. Iring te edlised is bahi ke ed-anak, egkereǥenan a zaan te ked-isipa ku keniyu su egkesuatan ku he meǥaan niw ituǥut he iyan ebayàbayà keniyu si Kristu.
Angin ke ziyan a te keniyu su wey ku sikiyu melelaǥi; kenè ku egketuenan ke hengkey is meupiya he idsurat ku he ibpeuwit ku ziyan su egkeipeng a keniyu.
Sikiyu is egkesuat he ebpezizalem te kedtuman te kesuǥuan, ibpesavut ku keniyu ke hengkey is kehuluǥan kayi.

Su miguǥud dutun te kesuǥuan he zuen dezuwa he anak he maama ni Abraham. In-anak haazà is sevaha ni Hagar, kes esawa zin he uripen, ne in-anak haazà is sevaha te esawa zin he kenà uripen he iyan si Sara.

Is ked-enaka te anak te vahi he uripen, ne iring ded te ked-enaka te minsan hengkey he vatà, iyan, kes ked-enaka zutun te sevaha he in-anak te vahi he kenà uripen, ne kenà egkehimu emun wazà ipenaad te Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham.

Ne sempità heini is dezuwa he vahi. Iyan kehuluǥan din is dezuwa he paaǥi he midtukud te Megbevayà te kebpekidsevaha zin te menusiyà. Si Hagar is bahi he uripen, ne iyan alung te paaǥi he imbeǥey te Megbevayà ki Moises diyà te vuntud he Siney. Iyan heini kes kesuǥuan. Su is menge anak ni Hagar, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is langun he nekesarig te kedtuman te kesuǥuan, ne menge uripen sikandan.

Diyà haazà is buntud he Siney te tanà he egngezanan te Erabya. Ne alung heini is buntud he Siney ki Hagar. Ne iyan kehuluǥan ni Hagar is inged he Hiruselim su neuripen is langun he meǥinged dutun te kedtumana te kesuǥuan.
Ne si Sara, haazà is esawa ni Abraham he kenà uripen, ne iyan kiw alung te kandin he menge anak su kenè kiw menge uripen te kesuǥuan.

Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Sikew is bahi he kenà ed-anak, lipey ka. Minsan ke wazè ka belilita, derag-ey ka te kegkelipey su minsan ke mid-ewaan ka te esawa nu, ed-ulian ke zin ne mezakel is menge kevuwazan nu kenà te vahi he zuen din esawa.

Na, menge suled, iring din ded daan, nehimu kiw en he menge anak te Megbevayà tenged te netuman din is penaad din. Iring heini zuen te ked-enaka ki Isaak ni Sara tenged te netuman is pesarig te Megbevayà diyà te ki Abraham.

Ne zutun he timpu zengan, haazà is anak ni Abraham he in-anak pinaaǥi zà te kelibutanen he paaǥi te kegkevuwad, midhimu zin he mereǥeni is hazi zin he in-anak pinaaǥi te tavang te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Ne iring din guntaan edregreǥenen kiw te menge etew he neuripen te kedtumana te kesuǥuan.

Ne hengkey is sambag te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà? Duen insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te, Ipaawè nu is bahi he uripen wey is anak din su is anak te uripen, kenà egkehimu he ebeǥayan sikandin te menge azen te amey zin. Iyan dà ebpekeangken kayi is anak te vahi he kenà uripen.
Umba, menge suled, sikitew, iring kiw te anak te vahi he kenà uripen, kenè kiw iring te anak te uripen.
Pinaaǥi te kebelukasi kenitew ni Kristu, nelibri kiw en te kedtumana te kesuǥuan. Umba, kinahanglan he edsukul kiw is mibelukasan su wey kenè kiw en maan meuripen.
Utew tutuu heini is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he ke iyan niw edseriǥan is kedsirkunsidara keniyu wey kew meluwas, ne kenè kew egketevangan ni Kristu.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su tutuu iyan he ke zuen minsan hentei he kunaan din ke ebpulus kandin is kebpesirkunsidar, kinahanglan daan he ebpurungan din te edtuman is minsan hengkey he suǥù dutun te tivuuk he kesuǥuan.
Is minsan hentei keniyu he kunaan din ke pinaaǥi te kedtumana te kesuǥuan is kebpeketezenga kandin te Megbevayà, nekesuwey en sikandin ki Kristu. Neewaan din en is gaǥew te Megbevayà kandin.
Iyan, sikami mulà, pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin wey tenged te kedtuu zey kandin, iyan ebpeebuten dey is kedhimuwa kenami he metazeng te Megbevayà.

Su emun tumutuu ki en ki Jesu Kristu, neked-iiring kiw en diyà te Megbevayà is nengesirkunsidar wey is wazà mesirkunsidar. Iyan dà duen din pulus diyà te Megbevayà is kedtuu ta kandin he egketuusan heini pinaaǥi te ǥaǥew ta te zuma ta.
Mibpurungan niw zengan te ed-ikul is hustu he ibayà. Maan is idtuǥut niw he zuen ed-eǥen keniyu wey niw kenè en metuuwi is tutuu he tuluuwen?
Kenà heini vaal te Megbevayà is kebpekesuwey niw su iyan mid-umbita keniyu wey kew meketuu.
Haazà is tarù he tuluuwen he impenurù keniyu, ne iring te tapey emun ebaal ki te supas su minsan deisek dà is id-amut dutun te zekelà he midhames he erina, egketepayan gihapun is tivuuk he supas.

Ne minsan pa zutun, dekelà is kedsarig ku te Nengazen he pinaaǥi te kedtavang din keniyu, ebpemineǥen niw zed is hustu he impenurù ku keniyu. Iyan, haazà is etew he nekesamuk te isip niw pinaaǥi te penurù din he tarù, siguradu he edsilutan sikandin te Megbevayà.

Menge suled, duen egkaǥi he wazè ku pa engkezi is penurù he kinahanglan he ebpesirkunsidar ki, iyan, emun tutuu heini, maan is kenà a ed-engkezan te ebpesipala te menge zuma ku he Hudiyu? Su emun ibpenurù ku he kinahanglan is kebpesirkunsidar, ne kenè dan egkepauk kediey minsan ke elin ku pa ibpenurù is kebpehimatey ni Jesus he elili kenitew.
Ne sikan is menge etew he edsamuk keniyu pinaaǥi te tarù he penurù dan, egkesuatan ku pezem he kenà iyan dà is kebpesirkunsidar edtumanen dan, kekenà, elin daan ul-ulaha zan is kebpekapun!

Na, menge suled, tutuu iyan he impetuu ki te Megbevayà wey ki zin melibri ne wazè en kinahanglan he ebpeuripen ki te kesuǥuan. Ne minsan pa zutun wazè ki melibri su wey iyan mebayàbayà kenita is mezaat he kebayà te lawa ta. Kinahanglan he tenged te zekelà is gaǥew tew te menge zuma tew ne medtitinevangà is kada sevaha kenitew te menge tumutuu.

Is tivuuk he kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, ne egkepurung egketuman pinaaǥi te sevaha zà he suǥù he iyan heini: Kinahanglan he purungi nu is duma nu. Isipa nu sikandin he iring te kenikew en he ǥehinawa.
Iyan, emun iyan niw zà ed-ul-ulahan is kebpepespesipelehey wey kebpeeg-eǥetà, ne egkepurung egkezeeti is upakat niw te menge tumutuu ki Kristu.
Iyan heini suǥù ku keniyu: pevayàbayè kew te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin su emun ed-ul-ulahan niw heini, kenà egkehimu he egketuman niw is mezaat he kebayà te lawa niw.
Kenà egkeuyun is mezaat he kebayà te lawa ta wey is egkesuatan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin su telekuntada heini is dezuwa, ne tenged dutun kenè ta layun egkeveelan is meupiya he egkesuatan ta.
Iyan, ke ebpesakup ki te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, kenè ki egkesakup te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises.
Egketuusan ta is menge mezaat he ulaula he egkehimu pinaaǥi te mezaat he kebayà te lawa su iyan is kedhilavet te kenè ta esawa, is meremerik wey mahawag he vaal,

is ked-ezapa te kenà hustu he ed-ezapen, wey is kegemita te ǥehem he ibeǥey ni Setanas. Ebpekigkuntada is menge etew; ebpekidtebek dan; egkesina zan; egkengepauk dan; iyan dà ed-isipen dan is kandan dà he egkesuatan. Ne ed-engkezan dan is kebpekidsevaha zan te menge zuma zan.

Egkeimahan dan is menge azen te menge zuma zan. Egkengelangut dan, ne kenè dan ed-eǥenen is menge kebayè dan he mezaat, kekenà, edtumanen dan, wey mezakel pa is ed-ul-ulahan dan he iring kayi. Ed-umanan ku te egkaǥi is migkaǥi ku he zaan he is etew he ed-ul-ulahan din is menge iring kayi, kenà sikandin ebpekeragkes te egkehedian te Megbevayà keuzemà.

Egketuusan ta zaan is menge ulaula he egkehimu pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Su emun ed-uwiten ki te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, mahal zini te ǥehinawa ta is menge zuma ta, layun ki egkelipey, melinawen layun is gehinawa ta, mepelevayen ki, beliǥeǥawen ki, metulanged ki, metinumanen ki,
kenè ki mevurut, wey egkeeǥen ta is kebayà te lawa ta. Ne emun iyan heini menge ulaula ta, kenè ta egkesupak is menge suǥù kenita te Megbevayà.

Ne is minsan hentei he migaked en ni Jesu Kristu, ne iring te inransang din en te krus is mekesesalà he lawa zin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, mid-engkezan din en is menge mezaat he kebayè din wey egkesuatan din.
Ne is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, geina te mibeǥayan ki zin te veǥu en he untung, kinahanglan he ebpevayàbayè ki zaan kandin.
Kinahanglan he kenè ki ebpelavew, kenè ki zaan ebpekidtebek te menge zuma he etew, kenè ki zaan egkesina te zuma ta.

Menge suled, ke zuen duma niw he tumutuu he netuenan niw he nesupak din is Megbevayà, sikiyu is mid-ulinan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, tevangi niw sikandin su wey zin kenà meengkezi is kedtumana zin te egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Asal, kinahanglan he utew kew mepelevayen is edtavang kandin. Mebpekevantey kew su kela ke mepenulayi kew zaan ni Setanas.
Layun kew mebpetebtevangà te uman sevaha keniyu su emun ed-ul-ulahan niw heini egketuman niw is insuǥù kenitew ni Kristu.
Ke zuen minsan hentei he kunaan din ke wazà kurang te menge ulaula zin su pudu meupiya, nelimbungan din is gehinawa zin.
Deyzey ke ebpurungan edsusiya te uman sevaha is menge ulaula zin. Ne emun meupiya, egkehimu he ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa zin. Iyan, kenè din isukud is menge ulaula te zuma zin te kandin he ulaula.
Su kinahanglan he bevaa te kada sevaha is kandin he keugelingen he bevaan.
Ne sikan is etew he ebpepenurù te Lalag te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he veǥayi zin is ebpenurù kandin te menge meupiya he nezawat din.

Kenè kew pelimbung te ulaula niw su kenè ta egkeelesan is Megbevayà te minsan hengkey he ulaula. Is ibpemula te etew, iyan daan egkeraǥun din. Ne iring din ded daan is menge ulaula te etew, su ed-ahaan heini te Megbevayà ne edsuhulan din is etew keuzemà sumalà is neulaula te uman sevaha.

Emun edtumanen te etew is kandin he egkesuatan, iyan egkezawat din is kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan. Emun edtumanen din is egkengesuatan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, ibeǥey kandin is untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Umba kenè ki ebpepepeǥul te ked-ulaula te meupiya su emun ebpeniguduwan ta heini, egkeuma is timpu keuzemà he zuen idsuhul kenita te Megbevayà he utew meupiya.
Ebpurungan ta layun is minsan hentei he etew, lavew en is menge zuma ta he tumutuu ki Kristu.
Kayi te ketepusan te surat he ibpeuwit ku ziyan, siak si Pablo is midsurat. Egketuusan niw su egkeehè niw he utew zezekelà is kedsurat ku.

Ne sikan is menge etew he egkesuatan dan he mebpesirkunsidar kew, egkesuatan dan he zeliǥa zan te menge zuma zan. Egkehandek dan te menge zuma zan he Hudiyu su kenè dan egkesuat he pesipelahi sikandan tenged te kedsarig dan te kebpehimatey ni Kristu.

Haazà is menge etew, ne ibpenurù dan he kinahanglan he mebpesirkunsidar kew sumalà is penurù te kesuǥuan, ne minsan pa zutun kenè dan ebpurungan edtumana is kesuǥuan. Umba egkesuatan dan he mebpesirkunsidar kew su wey mezalig sikandan tenged te nehimu kew he menge kabig dan.

Siak mulà, iyan ku zà ibpezalig is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he mibpehimatey he elili kenitew. Ne tenged te kebpehimatey zin, wazè e en meuripen te menge kelibutanen he kebayà, ne wazè en kayi ǥehem te kebayàbayà kediey.
Kenà ebpulus is kebpesirkunsidar ne kenà daan ebpulus is kenà kebpesirkunsidar. Iyan dekelà is pulus din is kegkehimu kenita he veǥu en he linimbag.

Is minsan hentei he ed-ikul kayi te ibayà he impenurù ku pinaaǥi kayi te surat, berakat he mehizuwi te Megbevayà wey veǥayi te melinawen he kebpekesavuk, ne kenà iyan dà sikandin, kekenà, elin daan is langun he menge tutuu he tumutuu te Megbevayà.

Puun dà guntaan, kinahanglan he wazà minsan hentei he megkaǥi he wazà iveǥey kediey ni Jesus is keǥehem te kebpenurù. Egketuusan kayi te lawa ku is kedtumana ku te menge suǥù ni Jesus. Mezakel is menge tulak te menge palì ku he nehimu te menge kuntada ni Jesus.
Menge suled, berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew is langun te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Iyan a si Pablo.

Iyan a si Pablo is teǥisurat kayi. Nehimu a he epustul ni Jesu Kristu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, midsuǥù e zin, tenged te iyan egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Ibpeuwit ku heini is surat diyan te inged he Ipisu, diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu he menge metinumanen te menge suǥù ni Jesu Kristu.
Is Amey tew he Megbevayà wey is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu, berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew zan wey tuvazi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.

Dekelà utew is kebpeselemati tew te Megbevayà he Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu su tenged te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Kristu, intuvad din kenitew ziyà te langit is minsan hengkey he meupiya pinaaǥi te ked-ulini kenitew te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
Dengan te wazè pa limbaǥa is kelibutan, mibpilì kiw en te Megbevayà. Iyan impilia zin kenitew su wey kiw mehimu he menge sakup din he wazà igkesewayi zuen.
Ne tenged te utew zekelà is gaǥew zin kenitew, dengan te wazè pa is kelibutan, mid-isip din he pinaaǥi ki Jesu Kristu edhimuwen kiw zin he menge anak din su iyan egkesuatan din wey tuyù din.
Edeliǥen tew is Megbevayà tenged te utew zekelà he mekeǥeǥehem he ǥaǥew zin he intuvad din kenitew pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew te mahal he Anak din he si Jesus.
Su tenged te utew zekelà is gaǥew zin kenitew, midlibri kiw zin te silut pinaaǥi te kedtiǥis te lengesa zutun te kebpehimatey ni Kristu, ne mibpesaylu zin is menge salè tew.
Kenà pinaaǥi te sukud is kegkeǥeǥawi zin kenitew, kekenà, utew subra is gaǥew zin kenita. Ne imbeǥey zin daan kenita is kedsavut wey ketau su wey tew metueni ke hengkey is paaǥi zin.
Ne impesavut din kenitew is daan he in-eles he edhimuwen din su iyan tuyù wey egkesuatan din. Ne mid-isip din he zaan he pinaaǥi ki Kristu
edhimuwen din heini zutun te hustu he timpu. Su mid-isip te Megbevayà he zutun edhimuwen din he sebsevaha zà si Kristu he ebayàbayà te minsan hengkey he linimbag diyà te langit wey zini te tanà.

Is langun he ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà, ne iyan kedtumana te tuyù din wey egkesuatan din. Ne tenged te iyan tuyù din, mibpilì key zin is menge tumutuu he Hudiyu wey key mehimu he menge sakup din he ebpekidsevaha ki Kristu. Iyan heini tuyù din he zaan he mid-isip din. Ne sikami is menge Hudiyu he nengehuna he nemeketuu ki Kristu, umba mibpilì key zin su iyan egkesuatan din he pinaaǥi kenami edeliǥen sikandin he utew mekeǥeǥehem.

Ne iring din ded daan diyan te keniyu su hein impesavut keniyu is tutuu he tuluuwen he iyan kes Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te kedlibriya kenitew te silut, nemeketuu kew ki Kristu, ne midhimu kew zaan te Megbevayà he menge sakup din pinaaǥi te kebeǥaya zin keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he zaan he impenaad din.

Is ked-ulini kenitew te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, ne iyan tuus kenitew he keuzemà ibeǥey zin kenitew te menge sakup din is langun he impenaad din kenitew. Ne pinaagi kayi egketuenan tew he keuzemà edhimesazen din is kedlibriya kenitew te kebpekesalè tew. Edeliǥen tew sikandin is mekeǥeǥehem!
Ne tenged kayi, menge suled, geina te netudtulan a he mezesen is kedtuu niw te Nengazen tew he si Jesus wey zekelà is gaǥew niw te minsan hentei he tumutuu kandin,
kenà egkeamin is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà tenged keniyu. Layun ku sikiyu id-ampù.

Is Megbevayà te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he iyan daan Amey tew he zait he ebentuǥen, edhengyuan ku layun sikandin he pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, ne iveǥey zin keniyu is ketau wey ipeǥawaǥawa zin keniyu is kegketueni niw te menge ulaula zin.

Id-ampù ku he iveǥey zin daan keniyu is kebpurung kedsavut su wey niw metueni ke hengkey is langun he meupiya he egkeperateng tew keuzemà tenged te midhimu kiw en he menge tumutuu zin, ne wey niw zaan metueni he utew mezakel zutun is menge meupiya he idtuvad din kenitew.

Ne id-ampù ku zaan he ipesavut din keniyu ke hengkey is kenà egkesukud he utew lavew he zekelà he ǥehem te Megbevayà he zini edterebahu te kenitew te menge tumutuu kandin. Ne iyan heini sikan is utew zekelà he ǥehem
he migamit te Megbevayà dutun te kebenhawa zin ki Kristu wey is kebpepinuuwa zin kandin diyà te egkekewanan din diyà te langit.

Ne zutun utew lavew si Kristu kenà is minsan hentei he hadì, wey egalen, wey minsan hentei he zuen din keǥehem wey kebayàbayà. Lavew pa is inggerar ki Kristu te minsan hengkey he ǥerar te minsan hentei ǥuntaan wey te wazè din pidtemanan.
Ne is Megbevayà, midhimu zin he sakup ni Kristu is minsan hengkey he linimbag. Umba midhimu zin si Kristu he egalen te minsan hengkey su wey kiw metevangi is langun he menge tumutuu.

Sikitew is edsarig ki Kristu, ne iring kiw te lawa zin ne iyan sikandin ulu tew. Ne sikitew is lawa zin, ne wazà kurang te ked-ulini zin kenitew su ziyà sikandin te minsan hendei te tivuuk he kelimbaǥan.
Dengan, henduen kew te minatey su wazè niw pa untung he wazà pidtemanan tenged te kenè kew pa zutun ebpemineg te menge suǥù te Megbevayà wey tenged te menge mezaat he ulaula niw.

Dutun he timpu mid-ikul niw is mezaat he ibayà he iyan ed-ikulen te menge etew he kuntada te Megbevayà. Midtuman kew te menge suǥù ni Setanas. Iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te menge zuen din gehem diyà te hewhewanan. Iyan daan sikandin ebayàbayà te langun he kenà ebpemineg te menge suǥù te Megbevayà.

Ne sikitew zaan, elin kiw zengan ebpen-ulaula te mezaat sumalà is mezaat he kebayà te lawa tew, wey is mezaat he isip tew. Ne tenged kayi neragkes kiw pa zutun te silut iring te zuma he menusiyà he kenà sakup te Megbevayà.
Ne minsan pa te iyan en haazà, utew zekelà is hizu te Megbevayà kenitew ne utew kiw mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin.

Ne minsan pa te iring kiw te minatey tenged te kenè tew kebpemineg te menge suǥù din, dutun te kebenhawa zin ki Kristu, inragkes kiw zin daan su wey tew maangken is untung he wazà pidtemanan. Midlibri kiw zin te silut tenged dà te ǥaǥew zin kenitew.
Ne is Megbevayà, tenged te nekidsevaha kiw ki Kristu, dutun te kebenhawa zin ki Kristu, mibanhew kiw zin daan wey kiw mekehadì duma ki Kristu ziyà te langit.
Umba mid-ulaula zin heini su wey ikepeehè din kenitew is utew lavew he kezekelà te ǥaǥew zin wey kedtavang din kenitew pinaaǥi ki Jesu Kristu te wazè din pidtemanan.
Su tenged dà te ǥaǥew zin kenita, midlibri ki zin te silut dutun te kebpeketuu ta. Wazè ki melibri pinaaǥi te kenita he vaal,

kekenà, imbeǥey zà kenita is untung he wazè din pidtemanan. Ne tenged dutun, wazà etew he igkezantal zin is kedlibriya kandin te silut su kenà iyan is kandin he ked-ul-ulaha te meupiya ingkelibri zin.
Su is kedlimbaǥa kenita he veǥu, ne iyan baal te Megbevayà. Pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha ta ki Jesus midlimbag ki zin su wey ta meulaula is meupiya he midteǥana zin en he zaan wey ta meveeli.

Sikiyu is menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu, isipa niw is daan he kebpekesavuk niw. Is menge Hudiyu, ne ebpesirkunsidar sikandan, ne egngezanan kew zan te menge etew he kenà ebpesirkunsidar, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kenè niw ebpetuusan is lawa niw sumalà is kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises.

Netuenan niw he zengan wazè niw upakat ki Kristu ne wazè kew iragkes te menge etew he pinilì te Megbevayà. Wazè kew zaan mekeambit duen te menge meupiya he impenaad te Megbevayà kandan. Wazà egkepaabut niw he tavang te Megbevayà ne kenà duen dà taman su wazè niw metueni ke hentei is tutuu he Megbevayà dini te kelibutan.

Iyan, guntaan, tenged te nekidsevaha kew en ki Jesus, sikiyu is menge etew he utew meziyù te Megbevayà dengan, impeuvey kew zin en tenged te kebpelisi keniyu te lengesa ni Jesus dutun te kebpehimatey zin.

Sikami is menge Hudiyu wey sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu, midhimu ni Kristu he melinawen en is kedepitè tew su midhimu kiw zin en he teltelezuma. Pinaaǥi te kebpehimatey zin duen te krus in-awè din is kegkekuntada tew he iring te elavat he nekepetug-elang kenitew.

Pinaaǥi te kebpehimatey zin, in-awè din is kebpetumana tew te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises ragkes is menge tulumanen su wey sikitew is dezuwa he kelasi te etew, mehimu zin he veǥu en he kelasi te etew pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew kandin, ne tenged kayi naawè en is kegkekuntada tew.

Pinaaǥi te kebpehimatey ni Kristu ziyà te krus in-awè din is kebpekunkuntedehè tew te Hudiyu wey te kenà Hudiyu, ne midhimu kiw zin he sevaha he kelasi te etew su wey tew melikui is ked-ezapa te tutuu he Megbevayà.

Midhendini si Kristu te kelibutan ne impesavut din kenitew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te kelinew. Sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu wey sikami is menge Hudiyu, impesavut din kenitew is kelinew te kedepitè tew ziyà te Megbevayà.
Tenged te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Kristu, sikami is menge Hudiyu wey sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu, ebpekeuvey kiw en ziyà te Amey tew he Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kedtavang te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.

Ne sikiyu is menge tumutuu he kenà menge Hudiyu, minsan pa te zengan wazè kew isipa he menge sakup te Megbevayà, iyan, guntaan nehimu kew en he zuma te menge pinilì din he etew. Nehimu kew en he menge anak te Megbevayà iring te minsan hentei he tumutuu kandin.

Ne sikitew is menge tumutuu, iring kiw te valey he ibpehitindeg te Megbevayà diyà te vatu. Iyan si Kristu kes batu he edtukuzan kayi te valey. Is menge epustul wey ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà, ne iyan menge tukud. Ne iyan kew menge zuma he himan kayi te valey.
Ne pinaaǥi ki Kristu neviǥeran is kebeeli kayi te valey ne egkehimu heini he valey te Nengazen he zutun sikandin ed-ezapa.
Ne sikiyu zaan is kenà menge Hudiyu, ragkes kew kayi, ne nehimu kew en daan he menge himan kayi te valey he zutun ed-ubpà is Megbevayà pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.

Ne tenged kayi te langun, siak si Pablo, is pirisu tenged te kedsundan ku ki Jesu Kristu, layun ku sikiyu id-ampù diyà te Megbevayà. Umba nepirisu a su insangyew ku is Lalag te Megbevayà diyan te keniyu te kenà menge Hudiyu.
Is Megbevayà, tenged te ǥaǥew zin keniyu, duen insarig din kediey he terebahu he iyan igkezeyzey niw. Netuenan ku he nezineg niw heini.
In-eles dengan heini, iyan, impesavut din kediey. Mehitenged kayi, duen ingkepesavut ku en keniyu pinaaǥi te surat.
Ne emun ebesahan niw heini, egketuenan niw is nesavut ku mehitenged te in-eles dengan mehitenged ki Kristu.
Dengan wazà heini ipezayag diyà te minsan hentei he menusiyà, iyan, guntaan, pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, impezayag en te Megbevayà diyà te menge epustul wey ebpemeneuven din.

Ibpesavut ku keniyu heini is in-eles dengan he sikiyu is kenà menge Hudiyu, pinaaǥi te kedtuuwi niw te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, edtuvazan kew zaan te Megbevayà te langun he meupiya he idtuvad din te menge Hudiyu. Ne idragkes kew zaan dutun te lawa ni Kristu. Ne egkezawat niw is menge penaad te Megbevayà tenged te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Jesu Kristu.
Nehimu a he suluǥuen te Megbevayà te kedsengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Tenged dà te ǥaǥew zin kediey wey pinaaǥi te ǥehem din imbeǥey zin kediey heini is ketengdanan.

Siak, lavew kediey is minsan hentei he menge tumutuu te Megbevayà. Ne minsan pa te iyan heini, midtuvazan a te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kedsuǥua zin kediey te kebpenudtul ziyan te keniyu te kenà menge Hudiyu te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te utew lavew he zekelà he kenà egketegkad he meupiya he igketuvad kenitew ni Kristu.

Ne elin daan insuǥua zin kediey su wey ku ikepesavut diyà te minsan hentei he etew ke hengkey is kedtumana zin te zaan he mid-isip din he ebeelan. Ne wazà dengan heini ipezayag su in-eles te Megbevayà he nenlimbag te minsan hengkey.

Umba wazà heini zengan ipezayag su wey ǥuntaan pinaaǥi zà te menge tumutuu ki Jesus, ibpaahà te Megbevayà diyà te menge kedesenan wey menge egalen diyà te langit ke hengkey kezekelà is ketau zin he wazè med-iring-iring.
Umba mid-ulaula zin heini su edtumanen din is mid-isip din dengan te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey. Ne nehimu zin en heini ǥuntaan pinaaǥi te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Ne ǥuntaan tenged te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Jesus wey pinaaǥi te kedsarig tew kandin, egkehimu en he ebpekeetuvang kiw te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te ked-ampù ne wazè en igkeeled tew kandin.
Ne tenged kayi te langun, kinahanglan, menge suled, he kenà igkeawà te kedsarig niw heini is kemereǥenan he egkeantus ku tenged keniyu, kekenà, lipey kew su iyan ibmeupiya niw.
Ne tenged kayi te langun he intuvad kenitew te Megbevayà, edluhuzan ku te ed-ampù is Amey tew he Megbevayà.
Is langun he menge tumutuu he zini pa te lumpad wey ke ziyè en be te langit, ne migngezanan din sikandan he pemilya zin.
Ne edhengyuan ku sikandin he puun te utew zekelà he ǥehem din, beǥayi kew zin te utew melig-en he kedtuu pinaaǥi te ked-ulini keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin,
su wey, pinaaǥi te kedtuu niw, melumuni is gehinawa niw ni Jesu Kristu. Ne idhangyù ku zaan he heǥeti zin wey lig-eni zin is kebmahala niw te minsan hentei. Umba idhangyù ku heini su wey sikiyu,
wey is minsan hentei kenitew te menge sakup te Megbevayà, iveǥey kenitew is kedsavut ke hengkey is kenà egkesukud he kebmahala kenitew ni Kristu ziyà te ǥehinawa zin.

Berakat he mesavut niw is gaǥew zin keniyu, minsan pa te kenà heini egkepurung egkesavut te minsan hentei. Egkesuatan ku heini su wey metuman diyan te keniyu is wazè din kurang he kegkeulini keniyu te Megbevayà.

Edeliǥen tew is Megbevayà su, pinaaǥi te zekelà he ǥehem din he impelumun din dini te kenitew, utew zekelà is egkehimu zin su lavew pa is egkehimu zin, kenà te minsan hengkey he egkeisip ta he ebuyuen.
Berakat he zeliǥa sikandin pinaaǥi kenitew te langun he menge tumutuu zin wey pinaaǥi ki Jesu Kristu ǥuntaan he timpu wey te wazè din pidtemanan.

Ne tenged kayi te langun, siak is pirisu tenged te midtuman ku is menge sugù te Nengazen, edhengyuan ku sikiyu he ǥeina te midhimu kew te Megbevayà he menge tumutuu zin, ul-ulaha niw is ulaula he zait he ed-ul-ulahan te tumutuu.
Kinahanglan he kenè kew pegalbu, kekenà, peketulanged kew wey mebmeinentusen kew. Ipeehè niw is gaǥew niw ziyà te kada sevaha keniyu pinaaǥi te kebmepelevayen niw.
Purungi niw is menge ulaula niw su wey kenà maawà is kegkeupakat niw he imbeǥey keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin su pinaaǥi kayi te upakat egkesevaha is gehinawa niw.

Su sikitew is langun he menge tumutuu, sevaha kiw zà he lawa, ne sevaha zà is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he ed-ulin kenitew, ne sevaha zà daan is ebperetengen tew he ketulusan tenged te midhimu kiw he menge tumutuu.
Sevaha zà is Nengazen tew he iyan si Jesus; iyan dà sikandin edtuuwan tew; sevaha zà daan is imbewtismuwi kenitew.

Sevaha zà daan is Megbevayà he Amey te minsan hentei. Iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te minsan hentei he tumutuu, ne ziyà sikandin te minsan hentei he tumutuu, ne edterebahu pinaaǥi te minsan hentei he tumutuu.
Sikitew is langun, mibeǥayan is kada sevaha kenitew te ketau sumalà is egkesuatan ni Kristu he ibeǥey kenitew.

Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Dutun te kebetuna kandin pehendiyà te langit mezakel is menge vihag din he mid-uwit din. Ne zuen daan menge ketau he impemeǥey zin diyà te menge sakup din.
Ne pinaaǥi kayi te migkaǥi he nevatun sikandin, ibpesavut kenitew te Lalag te Megbevayà he midlugtanà sikandin he zaan dini te lumpad te kelibutan.

Ne haazà is midhendini te tanà he iyan si Kristu, iyan daan sikandin nevatun pehendiyà te langit wey minsan diyà dapit te utew metikang he langit. Ne umba mid-ulaula zin heini su wey mehimu he ziyà sikandin te minsan hendei te tivuuk he kelimbaǥan.

Iyan menge ketau he imbeǥey zin kenitew is: is duma, midhimu zin he epustul; ne is duma, midhimu zin sikandan he peneuva te Megbevayà; ne is duma, ne imbeǥey zin kandan is ketau wey zan ikesangyew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen; ne is duma pa, ne imbeǥey zin kandan is ketau wey zan meuwit wey mepenurù is menge tumutuu.
Umba imbeǥey zin heini is menge ketau su wey kiw mehimani ne wey tew meulaula is ebpeveelan kenitew te Megbevayà ne wey melig-eni is kedtuu tew te menge tumutuu he iyan lawa ni Kristu.

Pinaaǥi kayi egkehimu human he egkesevaha kiw te kedtuu tew wey kegketueni tew te menge ulaula te Anak te Megbevayà. Ne zutun egkepurung egkeheǥet is kedtuu tew ki Jesus ne zutun wazà kurang te menge ulaula tew iring te wazà daan kurang te menge ulaula ni Kristu.

Dutun ne egkehimu he kenè kiw en ebpekeiring te vatà su is etew he iring dutun ne egkehalinhalin is kedtuu zin su melemu ebpeketuu te minsan hengkey he tuluuwen he ibpenurù kandin te menge teruen he etew he metau he edlimbung.

Ne sikitew mulà, kinahanglan he tutuu is ibpesavut tew ziyà te menge zuma tew tenged te mahal sikandan dini te ǥehinawa tew. Ne pinaaǥi kayi ebpekeiseg is kebpekeiring tew te minsan hengkey he ulaula ni Kristu.

Su iring kiw te lawa, ne sikandin iyan ulu. Ne sikitew is lawa, ne ebpekesarig kiw kandin te ulu. Ne is minsan hengkey he parti kayi te lawa, ne ebpekesarig daan te menge zuma zin he parti. Ne emun hustu is baal zutun te kada sevaha he parti, edtulin haazà is tivuuk he lawa pinaaǥi te kebpekedtetevangà te minsan hendei he parti zin. Ne sikitew zaan, ebpekeiseg is kebpekeiring tew te ulaula ni Kristu pinaaǥi te kebpurungi te kada sevaha te zuma zin.
Tenged te suǥù a te Nengazen, ebpeketelteleenan ku sikiyu he engkezi niw en is menge mezaat he ulaula he iyan ed-ul-ulahan te menge etew he kenà edtuu te Nengazen wey wazà pulus te ed-isipen dan.
Wazè dan hanew te hustu he ibayà ne wazè dan untung he ibeǥey te Megbevayà, geina te nengepaglung sikandan tenged te kezesen te ǥehinawa zan.
Kenè dan en igkeeled is minsan hengkey he ulaula zan he mezaat. Ne kenè dan daan ed-eǥenen is mahawag he kebayà te lawa zan, kekenà, utew zan en egkesuati is meremerik he ulaula.
Ne sikiyu mulà, dutun te kebpeketuu niw ki Kristu, kenà iyan heini sikan is impenurù keniyu.
Tutuu iyan he impesavut keniyu is keaǥi ni Kristu ne impesavut daan keniyu is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù din.
Tenged kayi engkezi niw is menge isip te zaan he kegkeetew niw su nesakup heini te zaan he menge mezaat he ulaula niw. Ebpekezezaat keniyu heini pinaaǥi te ebpemekelimbung he kebayè din.
Kinahanglan he egkepurung egkeveǥu is isip niw wey ǥehinawa niw.

Kinahanglan he edhimuwen kew he veǥu en he etew he iyan sikan is beǥu en he linimbag pinaaǥi te zagwey te Megbevayà. Egketuusan heini is beǥu he etew pinaaǥi te menge tutuu wey metazeng he ulaula he ibpeulaula keniyu te Megbevayà.
Umba, menge suled, engkezi niw is kedtarùtarù. Kinahanglan he tutuu is egkeǥiyen niw ziyà te menge zuma niw. Su nesevaha kiw he pudu parti te lawa ni Kristu.
Emun duen igkepauk niw tigkera niw is gehinawa niw su kela ke ibpekesalè niw. Ne kinahanglan he te kenè pa edsanlep is andew iawè niw en is pauk te isip niw.
Kenè niw ituǥut he pinaaǥi te pauk niw, ne mevintahai kew ni Setanas.
Is tekawen, engkezi zin is kebpenakew ne medterebahu su wey hustu he paaǥi is kegkuwaa zin te igkeuyag din ne wey metevangi zin is egkengeayuayu.

Kinahanglan he kenà ebpekezezaat is kebpemèbè niw, kekenà, iyan keǥiya niw is menge lalag he ebpekeveǥey he tavang te kedtuu te menge zuma niw su wey zekelà is pulus diyà te ebpemineg sumalà is egkinehenglanen dan.

Ne kenè niw ul-ulaha is minsan hengkey he kenà egkesuatan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin su iyan sikandin tuus diyan te keniyu he ǥaked kew te Megbevayà, wey tuus daan he keuzemà egkeuma is andew he zutun edhimesaza te Megbevayà is langun he nepuunan din en he vaal te kedlibriya zin keniyu te kebpekesalà.
Engkezi niw is kebpekunkuntedehè niw. Kenè kew meepes wey mepauk te zuma niw. Kenè kew pekid-eǥet; kenè kew ituk; kenè niw ituǥut he ibmezaat te ǥehinawa niw is minsan hengkey he ulaula te zuma niw,
kekenà, mebpepurpurungè kew te kada sevaha keniyu. Mebpehidhizuwè kew, mebpepespeseyluwè kew iring te mibpesaylu kew te Megbevayà tenged te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu.
Ne ǥeina te pinelanggè kew he menge anak te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he mekeiring kew kandin.

Kinahanglan he ipeehè niw layun he mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa niw is menge zuma niw iring te mahal kiw ziyà te ǥehinawa ni Kristu. Mibpehimatey sikandin he elili kenitew wey kiw zin melibri. Nehimu heini he pemuhat he utew mehemut, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, utew egkesuati te Megbevayà.

Ne ǥeina te menge sakup kew te Megbevayà kinahanglan he kenè niw ul-ulaha is keleleǥed wey is minsan hengkey he ulaula he meremerik. Kenè niw hileveti is kenè niw esawa. Minsan is ked-isipa wey kegkeǥiya kayi ne kenè niw ul-ulaha.
Kenè niw ǥemita is menge meremerik, mahawag, wey wazè din pulus he menge lalag, kekenà, layun dekelà is kebpeselemati niw te Megbevayà.

Su ibpesavut ku keniyu is utew tutuu. Is etew he meremerik is ulaula zin wey ke edhilavet te kenè din esawa, ne kenà sikandin egkehedian ni Kristu wey te Megbevayà. Ne iring din ded daan is leǥezen he etew su is menge vutang he igkeleǥezi zin, egkehimu he menge megbevayè din.

Su tenged kayi he menge ulaula, utew egkepeuki te Megbevayà keuzemà is menge etew he kenà ebpemineg te menge suǥù din. Ne tenged dutun, kenè niw ituǥut he meketuu kew te tarù he penurù te minsan hentei he etew pinaaǥi te menge ketezengan dan he kenà tutuu.
Kenè kew mebpekid-upakat te minsan hentei he iring kayi.

Su zengan utew merusirem is ibayè niw, iyan, guntaan neteyawan is ibayè niw su nehimu kew en he menge sakup te Nengazen. Ne tenged kayi, kinahanglan he zait is ulaula niw te ked-ikula niw te merayag he ibayà.
Su emun neteyawan te Megbevayà is isip niw, egkeulaula niw is langun he hustu wey metazeng he vaal he ibpenurù te tutuu he tuluuwen.
Purungi niw istudyuwi ke hengkey is menge ulaula he egkesuatan te Nengazen.
Is menge etew he kemulu pa ziyà te kerusireman, kenè kew medtampu kandan te ed-ulaula te menge vaal he wazè din pulus, kekenà, ipeehè niw he mezaat is menge vaal zan.
Su is menge vaal he id-eles dan, utew mekeeled-eled minsan is kebenteeni zà kayi.
Ne pinaaǥi te kerayag, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is tutuu he tuluuwen, egketuenan dan ke hengkey is ed-isipen te Megbevayà dutun te menge ulaula zan, ne zutun egkehimu he egketeyawan daan is isip dan.
Ne mehitenged kayi zuen erubasa he edhenduen te, Sikew is edlipezeng, gimerat kad; sikew is minatey, ne mevanhew kad ne egketeyawan ka ni Jesu Kristu.
Umba, menge suled, pekeventayi niw is menge ulaula niw su wey kew mehimu he menge metau, ne kenà menge paglung.
Te minsan keenu, ke zuen meupiya he egkeveelan niw, beeli niw en su ǥuntaan he timpu mezelag is ebaal te meupiya.
Kenè niw ul-ulaha is wazè din pulus he ulaula, kekenà, purungi niw sevuta ke hengkey is ebpeveelan keniyu te Megbevayà.
Kenè kew mebpelelangut te vinu su ebpekezezaat heini keniyu, kekenà, kinahanglan he egkepurung kew egkeulini te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.

Emun ebpelelelaǥè kew, gemita niw is menge lalag diyà te menge Salmo wey menge kentahan he idalig te Megbevayà, wey menge kentahan he ibpinted keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Kentahi niw is Megbevayà ne pinaaǥi kayi te menge kentahan wey te menge Salmo, medlipey kew is edalig te Megbevayà.
Peselemati niw layun te Amey tew he Megbevayà is langun he tuvad din keniyu tenged te kedsundan niw te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Mebpetetehuzè kew te kada sevaha tenged te kedtahud niw ki Kristu.
Sikiyu is menge vahi, pesakup kew te menge esawa niw iring te nesakup kew en te Nengazen.

Su is maama, duen din keǥehem te kebayàbayà te esawa zin, iring te si Kristu, duen keǥehem din te kebayàbayà kenitew te langun he menge tumutuu he iyan lawa zin. Midlibri kiw zin te silut is lawa zin.
Ne iring din ded daan kinahanglan he mebpesakup mebpurung is bahi te esawa zin iring te ebpesakup kiw ki Kristu is menge tumutuu zin.

Sikiyu is menge maama, kinahanglan he mahala niw ziyà te ǥehinawa niw is esawa niw iring te mahal kiw is menge tumutuu ziyà te ǥehinawa ni Kristu. Egketuenan tew heini su mibpehimatey sikandin he elili kenitew wey kiw zin melibri te silut,
ne wey kiw mezawat te Megbevayà. Midhimu zin heini pinaaǥi te kedlumpiyuwi zin kenitew pinaaǥi te kebewtismu wey pinaaǥi te lalag din.
Elin daan idhimuwa zin kayi su wey kiw zin mezawat he esawa zin. Ne wazè en igkesawey zin kayi te kenitew su nepurung kiw en melumpiyuwi ne utew kiw mekempet diyà te kandin.

Ne iring din ded daan is maama, ne kinahanglan he mahala zin diyà te ǥehinawa zin is esawa zin iring te kebmahala zin te keugelingen din he lawa. Su is kebmahala zin te esawa zin ne iyan ded daan kebmahala zin te keugelingen din he lawa, su is teleesawa, sevaha zà sikandan he lawa.
Wazà etew he kenè din ebmahalen is keugelingen din he lawa, kekenà, ibpekaan din ne ebpurungan din iring te kebpurungi ni Kristu te keugelingen din he lawa.
Ne iyan kiw is menge tumutuu, lawa ni Kristu.
Tenged kayi, duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Ed-ewaan te maama is iney zin wey amey zin ne ebpengesawa, ne sikandan is dezuwa, is maama wey haazà is bahi, ne egkesevaha zà.
Duen impezayag te Megbevayà kenitew kayi he utew tutuu, ne sumalà is kedsevuta ku kayi ne iyan ibpesavut din si Kristu wey sikitew is menge tumutuu.
Iyan, kenà duen dà taman su egkehimu zaan he elin egkeǥiyen din is teleesawa. Kinahanglan he mahala te maama is esawa zin ne kinahanglan daan he tehuza te vahi is kandin he esawa.
Sikiyu is menge vatà, kinahanglan he tumana niw layun is menge suǥù te menge ǥinikanan niw su ke tumutuu ki te Nengazen he si Jesus, iyan heini hustu he ulaula.
Duen insuǥù kenitew te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Tehuza niw is amey niw wey iney niw. Ne heini he suǥù, ne iyan nehuna he suǥù he midsumpulan din te penaad su
ke sikandin daan te, Emun edtumanen niw heini ne edtuvazan ku sikiyu te meupiya ne ebmeluǥayad is untung niw zini te kelibutan.

Ne sikiyu is menge ǥinikanan, kinahanglan he kenà igkepauk te menge anak niw is paaǥi niw te kebpenurù kandan, kekenà, ipenurù niw kandan is menge ulaula he zait te menge tumutuu, ne iyan niw isambag kandan is sambag he ebpuun te Nengazen tew.

Sikiyu is menge suluǥuen, purungi niw tumana is menge suǥù keniyu te menge egalen niw zini te kelibutan. Tehuza niw sikandan ne kinahanglan he ebpuun te meupiya he ǥehinawa niw is kedtumana niw te menge suǥù dan iring te iyan si Kristu edsuǥù keniyu.

Kinahanglan he layun meupiya is baal niw ne kenà dutun dà te ebentayan kew te egalen niw su kinahanglan he kenà iyan dà ebpekezalig te vaal niw is etew, kekenà, elin daan is Megbevayà su menge suluǥuen kiw zaan ni Kristu ne kinahanglan he edtumanen ta is ebpeveelan kenita te Megbevayà tenged te ebpuun te keputian te atey ta is kedtumana ta kayi. Kinahanglan he meupiya is gehinawa ta zutun te vaal ta iring te iyan ebayàbayà kenita is Megbevayà ne kenà iyan dà is egalen ta zini te kelibutan.
Su minsan ke suluǥuen ki, wey ke kenà, netuenan ta he ke meupiya is baal ta, ne meupiya zaan is idsuhul kenita te Megbevayà.

Ne sikiyu is menge egalen, iring din ded daan kayi is ul-ulaha niw ziyà te menge suluǥuen niw. Kenè kew mebpelihandek kandan su netuenan niw he sikitew is langun, ke suluǥuen ki wey ke egalen ki ve, ne zuen gihapun egalen ta ziyà te langit he iyan is Megbevayà ne wazè din ibpelavi te minsan hentei.
Menge suled, ketepusan heini he menge lalag ku keniyu: kinahanglan he lig-eni niw is kedsarig niw te Nengazen wey te lavew he zekelà he gehem din.
Gemita niw is langun he menge himan te kebpekidtebek he ibeǥey te Megbevayà su wey kew mekesukul ki Setanas emun egemiten din is ketau zin te kegkeiza zin keniyu.

Su kenà iyan edtebeken tew is menge etew zà duen, kekenà, iyan edtebeken tew is menge mezaat he kedesenan he ziyà ed-ubpà te langit wey is menge kenà egkeahà he hadì, wey menge egalen, wey menge ebayàbayà te langun he menge mezaat he etew he nesakup te kerusireman guntaan dini te kelibutan.

Umba, menge suled, gemita niw en is menge himan te kebpekidtebek he imbeǥey te Megbevayà. Su zutun emun egkeuma haazà is timpu he zutun utew mereǥen is kedtebeka te menge mezaat, ne egkesukulan niw is menge kuntada niw ne emun egketapus en haazà is tebek ne wazè kew meewai te zesen.
Ne tenged kayi, andam kew en. Layun tutuu is egkeǥiyen niw wey ed-isipen niw ne iyan heini bakes niw. Ul-ulaha niw layun is metazeng he ulaula ne iyan heini limbutung niw.
Andam kew layun te kebpenudtul te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged te kelinew he ibeǥey te Megbevayà, ne iyan heini sepatus niw.
Ne iyan utew kinahanglan is: layun kew sarig te Megbevayà ne iyan heini kelasag niw ne pinaaǥi kayi kenè kew egkesuǥat te menge egkeregreg he panà ni Setanas he iyan is menge penuley zin keniyu.
Ne zewata niw is kedlibriya keniyu te Megbevayà su iyan heini kalù niw he putew. Ne ǥemita niw layun daan is Lalag te Megbevayà su iyan heini sundang he ibeǥey keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.

Pekezesen kew ampù te minsan hengkey he timpu sumalà is ked-uwita keniyu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Buyù kew te tavang te Megbevayà ne layun kew andam ne peniguduwi niw layun te ked-ampù is langun he menge tumutuu.

Ne iampù a zaan keniyu he iveǥey kediey te Megbevayà is ketau te kebpenudtul te lalag din. Ne iampù niw zaan he kenà a mahandek, kekenà, iveǥey kediey is hustu he egkeǥiyen wey ku ikepesavut is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he in-eles dengan.

Umba nehimu a he suluǥuen te Megbevayà su wey ku ikepenudtul heini is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne tenged daan kayi te kebpenudtul ku, nehimu a he pirisu. Umba, menge suled, iampù a su wey kenà a mahandek te kebpenudtul su iyan heini ketengdanan he imbeǥey kediey te Megbevayà.
Si Tikiku is minahal tew he suled wey metinumanen he suluǥuen te Nengazen tew, iyan ebpeketudtul keniyu mehitenged te kebpekesavuk ku wey ke hengkey is egkeulaula ku kayi.
Umba edsuǥuen ku sikandin diyan su wey niw metueni ke hengkey is kebpekesavuk dey zini su wey meheǥet is kebpekesarig niw te Megbevayà.

Is Amey tew he Megbevayà wey is Nengazen tew he si Jesus, berakat he sikiyu is menge suled dey, tuvazi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk, wey ipeehè dan keniyu is kebmahala zan keniyu ziyà te ǥehinawa zan wey heǥeta zan is kedtuu niw kandan.
Berakat he ikeǥaǥew te Megbevayà is minsan hentei he kenà egkeawà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is kebmahala zin te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.

Siak si Pablo wey si Timoteo surat dey heini, menge suluǥuen key ni Jesu Kristu. Ibpeuwit heini is surat diyan te keniyu te langun he menge tumutuu ki Jesu Kristu he menge meǥinged diyan te inged he Pilipus wey te menge ebmeǥurangen niw wey menge diyekunu.
Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu, ne veǥayi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
Dekelà utew is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà tew tenged keniyu emun egkeisip ku sikiyu.
Ne emun id-ampù ku sikiyu utew a egkelipey
su egketenuzan ku is kedtevangi niw kediey te kedsengyawa ku te Meupiya he Tudtulanen puun pa te timpu zengan te kebpeketuu niw taman en guntaan.

Dutun he timpu mibpuunan te Megbevayà is meupiya he vaal zin he edhimuwen din diyan te keniyu. Ne netuenan ku he ebpeniguduwan din pa heini edhimuwa taman te egkepasad din keuzemà te andew te kedlikù ni Kristu.

Hustu iyan is ked-isipa ku keniyu te iring kayi su minsan ke pinirisu a wey ke kenà a pinirisu wey ke edsangyew a te Meupiya he Tudtulanen wey ke edtevaken ku is menge kuntada te Lalag te Megbevayà, mahal kew layun dini te ǥehinawa ku su pudu kiw ingkeǥaǥew te Megbevayà.
Ebpeketistiǥus is Megbevayà he utew zekelà is kebulunga ku keniyu su is kezekelà te ǥehinawa ku keniyu, ne iring te kezekelà te ǥehinawa ni Jesu Kristu keniyu.
Ne id-ampù ku he med-iseg is kebpepurpurungè niw, is kegketueni niw te menge ulaula te Megbevayà, wey is ketau niw te ked-isip
su wey niw layun metueni ke hengkey is hustu ne wey niw layun heini meulaula. Ne zutun wazà keuzemà igkesawey ziyan te keniyu su egkehimu kew he waǥas dutun te kedlikù ni Kristu.
Ne zutun egkeveelan niw is minsan hengkey he metazeng he ulaula tenged te ǥehem he ibeǥey ni Jesu Kristu su wey mezalig wey mevantug is Megbevayà.
Menge suled, egkesuatan ku he mesavut niw he is langun he mereǥen he nehitavù kediey, ne kenà mezaat, kekenà, meupiya, su neketavang kedì te kedsengyawa te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
Su is langun he menge sundaru he guwardya zini te turuǥan te hadì wey is minsan hentei pa kayi, ne netuenan dan he mibpirisu a tenged dà te suluǥuen a ni Kristu.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su is kezekelan te menge zuma tew he tumutuu, ingkeheǥet te kedsarig dan te Nengazen heini is kebpirisuwa kedì. Ne tenged kayi ed-iseg is sigudu zan te kedsengyawa te Lalag te Megbevayà ne kenè dan en egkehandek.

Is duma, ne iyan idsengyawa zan te impenurù ni Kristu is: tenged te nesina zan kediey ne wey e zan melevawi. Iyan, duen duma he iyan idsengyawa zan te menge penurù ni Kristu su igkesuat dan heini te ebpenudtul.
Ebpenudtul zan tenged te mahal a ziyà te ǥehinawa zan su netuenan dan he mibpilì a te Megbevayà wey ku metavak is menge kuntada te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
Iyan, is menge zuma, kenà meupiya is tuyù dan te kebentuǥa zan ki Kristu. Egkesuatan dan he melevawi e zan ne kunaan dan ke pinaaǥi kayi egkeumanan is menge samuk ku zini te pirisuwan.
Iyan, nasì ku igkelipey heini is menge vaal zan su ke hustu is tuyù dan wey minsan ke mezaat, maambe en, asal mevantug dan si Kristu.
Kenà egkeawà is kelipey ku su netuenan ku he ibpaawà a kayi te pirisuwan tenged te ked-empua niw kedì wey tenged te tavang te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he midtevangan din daan si Jesu Kristu.

Ne utew ku egkesuati, wey idsarig ku ziyà te Megbevayà he layun ku metuman is ebpeveelan din kedì su wey a kenà meeled te minsan keenu he timpu lavew en guntaan. Egkesuatan ku he mezalig si Kristu tenged kedì pinaaǥi te kebpaawaa kedì kayi te pirisuwan ne emun kenà, ne mezalig si Kristu pinaaǥi te kebpatey ku.
Ne tenged te egkesuatan ku he mezalig si Kristu, egkesuatan ku he mebmeluǥayad pa is ked-ubpaubpè ku zini te kelibutan su wey mevantug ku pa si Kristu, iyan, ke ebpatey a ne lavew pa he ibmeupiya ku.

Kenè ku egketuenan ke hendei zapit is meupiya he ebpilien ku, su egkesuatan ku he metapus en is ked-ubpaubpè ku zini te kelibutan wey a mekepekidume en ki Kristu su meupiya pa utew haazà. Iyan, ke zuen pa ebpeveelan kedì he ebpulus, meupiya zaan.
Iyan, kinahanglan he kenè e pa ebpatey wey ku sikiyu metevangi.

Ne tenged te iyan heini netaǥù dini te ǥehinawa ku, netuenan ku he kenè pa egketapus is untung ku kayi te kelibutan ne ebpekiduma e pa keniyu wey ku mepurungi te edheǥet is kelipey niw tenged te kedtuu niw.
Ne zutun, ke ebpekelikù ad diyan te keniyu egkehimu he iyan a igkeventuǥa niw ki Jesu Kristu.

Menge suled, ke minsan hengkey is egkehitavù kediey, utew kinahanglan he is menge ulaula niw, ne kenà ebpekesuwey te impenurù ni Kristu pinaaǥi te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Su emun kenè kew edsuwey kayi, minsan ke kenà a ebpekelikù diyan, egketudtulan a he nesevaha is gehinawa niw wey tuyù niw te kedhaǥù su wey metuuwi te mezakel he menge etew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen.

Ne egketudtulan a zaan he kenè kew egkehandek te menge kuntada niw. Su emun kenè kew egkehandek kandan egkesavut dan he iyan sikandan edsilutan ne iyan kew ebeǥayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan su ibpesavut kandan heini te Megbevayà.
Su is mibpeveelan keniyu te Megbevayà, ne kenà iyan dà is kedtuuwi niw ki Kristu, kekenà, elin daan is ked-entusa niw te kemeresayan tenged te kedtuu niw kandin.
Nekedreragkes kiw en is ed-antus te kemeresayan tenged te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne heini is menge kemeresayan he nehitavù kediey zengan, ne kemulu ǥuntaan kenè ku egkesuwey, sumalà is nezineg niw.

Menge suled, netuenan ku he ingkeheǥet te kedtuu niw is kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu, ne netuenan ku zaan he naawà is menge keseengan niw mehitenged te hizu zin keniyu. Ne netuenan ku zaan he neupakat kew pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, ne ebpekedhihizuwè kew wey ebpelimlimuey kew is menge tumutuu.

Ne tenged kayi te langun edhengyuan ku sikiyu he tuǥuti niw he mepurung mesevaha is isip niw wey ǥehinawa niw, ne heǥeta niw is kebmahala niw ziyà te ǥehinawa niw te menge zuma niw. Ne emun ed-ul-ulahan niw heini human egkeheǥet is kelipey ku tenged keniyu.
Kinahanglan he kenà kew mebpekidlawan ne kenè kew mebpelavew, kekenà, isipa te minsan hentei keniyu he minus is pid-etawan din kenà te zuma zin.
Kenè niw iyan dà isipa is keniyu he egkinehenglanen, kekenà, isipa niw zaan is egkinehenglanen te menge zuma niw.
Kinahanglan he iring is isip niw te isip ni Jesu Kristu.
Su minsan ke kenà egkeawà diyà te kandin is kegkemegbevayè din wazè din isipa he kenè din ed-ewaan is kebpekesavuk din te zekelà is keǥehem din he Megbevayà,
kekenà, mid-ewaan din ne mibpaanak te etew, ne nehimu he suluǥuen te Megbevayà.

Ne zutun te etew en sikandin wazà sikandin mebpelavew, kekenà, mibpezumazuma sikandin te menge suǥù kandin te Amey zin he Megbevayà minsan pa te pinaaǥi kayi inransang sikandin te krus ne zutun mibpatey.
Ne tenged kayi midhimu en sikandin te Megbevayà he utew lavew, ne migeraran din sikandin te ǥerar he lavew pa te minsan hengkey he ǥerar te minsan hentei.

Ne umba mid-ulaula heini te Megbevayà su ke egkezineg is gerar ni Jesus, ed-ezapen si Jesus te minsan hentei he linimbag he ziyà te langit wey zini te tanà, wey minsan diyà te Iveyaan. Ebpekeluhud dan kandin,
ne ebpekekaǥi zan he iyan si Jesu Kristu Nengazen te minsan hengkey. Ne pinaaǥi kayi egkevantug dan daan is Amey tew he Megbevayà.

Ne umba, menge suled, iring te layun kew ebpememineg te menge suǥù ku, ne kenà dutun dà te kebpekiduma ku keniyu, kekenà, minsan te wazà a ziyan te keniyu, ne iring din ded daan guntaan kinahanglan is uman sevaha keniyu, ne himuwa zin is taman te egkehimu zin he edumahan te kegkehandek te Megbevayà su wey mepasad haazà is nepuunan en te Megbevayà te kedlibriya zin keniyu te silut.
Su layun edtavang keniyu is Megbevayà wey niw mesuati ne wey niw mehimu is kedtumana te tuyù din diyan te keniyu.
Is langun he ebpeveelan din keniyu, tumana niw te wazà kebpeneremudtemud wey kebelivad.

Ne zutun, wazà mezaat diyan te keniyu su meupiya is ulaula niw su menge anak kew te Megbevayà he wazà igkesewayi zin keniyu, minsan te zini kew pa mekeubpà te kelibutan te teliwazà te lalung he menge etew he kenà memetazeng is menge ulaula. Iring kew te menge sulù

he edtayew kandan su ibpesavut niw kandan is lalag he ebpekeveǥey kandan te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne emun iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan niw, utew ebmeupiya is ǥehinawa ku keuzemà dutun te andew te kedlikù ni Kristu su egketuenan ku zutun he zekelà is pulus te kedhaǥù ku ziyan te keniyu.

Is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà, ne iring te pemuhat he edewaten din. Ne emun egkesuatan din pa he id-uman is kebpatey ku kayi te pemuhat, igkelipey ku pa. Ne igkelipey ku zaan is kedtuu niw iring te nelipey kew.
Ne iring din ded daan, kinahanglan he igkelipey niw zaan is kebpatey ku emun egkehitavù kediey.

Dekelà is kedsarig ku te Nengazen tew he si Jesus he meǥaan ku en egkesuǥù diyan te keniyu si Timoteo. Ne emun ebpekelikù en dini, egketuenan ku ke hengkey is kebpekesavuk niw. Ne utew heini ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa ku.
Iyan dà sikandin duma ku kayi he utew zekelà is gehinawa zin keniyu.
Is duma, ne iyan dà egkeisip dan is kandan dà he egkesuatan, ne kenà iyan is egkesuatan ni Jesu Kristu.
Si Timoteo, netuenan niw he hustu is menge ulaula zin. Iring sikandin te tutuu he anak ku te kedtevangi zin kedì te kedsengyawa kayi te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
Umba, emun egketuenan ku en ke hengkey is egkehitavù kedì kayi, egkesuatan ku he segugunè ku sikandin mesuǥù diyan.
Ne zekelà daan is kedsarig ku te Megbevayà he meǥaan a zaan ebpeketelukun kandin.

Ne elin daan kayi te isip ku he kinahanglan he ibpehendiyan ku is suled tew he si Ipepruditu, kes midsuǥù niw pehendini wey e zin metevangi. Iyan sikandin duma ku wey timbang ku kayi te ebpeveelan kedì te Megbevayà.
Umba ibpehendiyan ku su utew sikandin ebulunga keniyu ne utew inmezaat te ǥehinawa zin is nezineg niw he tudtul he nezeruwan sikandin.

Netigbak iyan sikandin is midaru umba kunaan ku ke ibpatey zin en, iyan, nehizuwan sikandin te Megbevayà. Ne nehizuwan a zaan te Megbevayà su ke mibpatey sikandin, neumanan en geina is menge seeng ku.
Umba utew ku egkesuati heini is ked-ulì din diyan su wey kew melipey te kebpekeuma zin ne pinaaǥi kayi egkeawà daan is kedì he kegkeseeng.
Umba, kinahanglan he meǥalew kew te kebpekeuma zin su suled tew sikandin tenged te kedtuu zin te Nengazen. Is langun he iring kayi he etew, tehuza niw
su hapit sikandin ebpatey wey zin metuman is ebpeveelan kandin ni Kristu. Inserakan din is untung din wey e zin metevangi su zutun he timpu kenà a keniyu egketevangan.

Na, menge suled, ketepusan heini he sambag ku keniyu. Lipey kew tenged te upakat niw te Nengazen. Maambe ke idsublì ku keniyu is daan he sambag ku su melemu zà heini, ne kela ke egkehimu he pinaaǥi kayi egkelig-enan is isip niw.
Likayi niw is menge kuntada te Megbevayà he mezaat is ulaula zan he iyan is menge Hudiyu he ebpenurù he iyan egkesuatan te Megbevayà is kebpelii niw te lawa niw.

Iyan kiw kes tutuu he menge sakup te Megbevayà, ne kenà iyan sikandan, su pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ed-azap kiw te Megbevayà ne edlipey kiw tenged te upakat tew ki Jesu Kristu. Ne kenè tew iyan edseriǥan is kelibutanen he ulaula iring te kebpesirkunsidar.

Iyan, ke egkehimu he egkeseriǥan is iring dutun, egkeseriǥan is nengeulaula ku zengan su ke zuen etew he kunaan din ke egkeseriǥan din is kedtumana zin te menge kelibutanen he tulumanen, ne egkelevawan ku pa sikandin te kedtumana kayi.

Su hein walu en he andew is ked-enaka kedì, ne midsirkunsidar a. Is menge ǥinikanan ku, ne kevuwazan sikandan ni Benjamin he anak te kepuun dey he si Israyil. Ne tudalis a he Hudiyu. Mibpurungan ku te edtuman is kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises su Perisiyu a.

Ne tuus te utew meheǥet dini te ǥehinawa ku is kedtumana ku te menge tulumanen dey te menge Hudiyu, su mibpemesipelahan ku is menge tumutuu ki Jesus. Ne sumalà te kedtumana ku te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises wazè ku netuenan he supak ku te Megbevayà.
Iyan, is langun he iring dutun he kunaan ku ke egkeseriǥan ku wey a melibri te silut, mid-engkezan ku en wey ku maangken si Kristu.

Ne kenà dutun dà taman is mid-engkezan ku, kekenà, mid-eminan ku engkezi is minsan hengkey he zekelà dini te ǥehinawa ku su wey ku mekuwa is utew pa lavew he mahal he iyan is kebpekidsevaha ku ki Jesu Kristu te Nengazen ku. Tenged kandin mid-engkezan ku is langun ne mid-isip ku heini he abper zà dini te kelibutan wey a mekepekidsevaha ki Kristu,

su wey a zaan meisip te Megbevayà he metazeng tenged ki Kristu. Wazà a meisip he metazeng pinaaǥi te kediey zà he ulaula te kedtumana te kesuǥuan, su mibpeketazeng a te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kedtuu ku ki Kristu. Heini is kebmetazeng, ne idtuvad kenita te Megbevayà emun edtuu ki ki Kristu.

Iyan dà guntaan ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa ku is kegketueni ku te menge ulaula ni Kristu wey is kebulusi kedì te ǥehem he iyan sikan is gehem he ingkevanhew zin. Egkesuatan ku he mekeambit a zaan duen te kemeresayan he mid-antus din he iyan is ked-engkezi ku te kediey he egkesuatan iring te kandin he kebelevaǥa te untung din.
Umba egkesuatan ku heini su wey mehimu he mevanhew a keuzemà.

Kenè ku iyan ibpesavut kayi he netuman en dini te kedì heini is langun wey ke nehimu e en he etew he wazè en duen igkesawey, kekenà, ebpenigudu a wey heini metuman su iyan heini tuyù ni Jesu Kristu zutun te kedhimuwa zin kedì he sakup din.

Netuenan ku, menge suled, he wazè pa heini metuman dini te kedì, iyan, mid-awè ku ziyà te isip ku is nengehuna he nengetuman ku en, ne edhimuwen ku is taman te egkehimu ku wey ku mekuwa is langun he egkesuatan te Megbevayà he mekuwa ku keuzemà.
Ebpenigudu e pa wey ku mekuwa is suhul te Megbevayà su iyan heini ketezengan ke maan is mid-umew kiw zin te ked-angken te untung he wazà pidtemanan pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Jesu Kristu.
Ne is langun te sikitew he meǥurang en te kedtuu, kinahanglan he iring kayi zaan is isip tew wey ǥehinawa tew. Iyan, emun kenè kew egkengeuyun ibpetuenan keniyu te Megbevayà is benar.
Iyan, kinahanglan guntaan he edtumanen tew is daan he impenurù kenitew te Megbevayà.
Is langun te sikiyu, menge suled, purungi niw te ed-iring heini is menge ulaula ku. Iyan niw zaan iringi haazà is menge etew he iring is menge ulaula zan te kenami he ulaula.

Dengan ku zà heini layun egkeǥiya, iyan, guntaan ed-umanan ku egkeǥiya zuma is menge luhè ku he ebpeniǥis, tenged te mezakel he menge etew he egkeǥiyen dan he sakup sikandan ni Kristu, iyan, egketuusan pinaaǥi te ulaula zan he kuntada sikandan te kebpesevuta mehitenged te kebpehimatey ni Kristu ziyà te krus.

Siguradu egkeimpirnu sikandan su iyan ebayàbayà kandan is menge mezaat he kebayà te lawa zan. Ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa zan is menge mezaat he ulaula, iyan, meupiya pezem ke igkeeled dan; ne iyan dan dà egkeisip is menge vutang he zini te kelibutan.
Ne sikitew mulà, ne iyan hustu he inged tew is diyà te langit ne utew zekelà is perateng tew te kedlikù te Menluluwas tew he ebpuun diyà te langit he iyan is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.

Ne zutun te andew, ne edhelinen din en is memeǥuyà he menge lawa tew ne edhimuwen din he iring te mekeǥeǥehem he lawa zin. Ne kayi te kedhelina zin kenitew, egemiten din is dekelà he ǥehem din he iyan ingkehimu zin he ebayàbayà te minsan hengkey.
Umba menge minahal ku he menge suled, heǥeta niw is kedtumana niw te menge suǥù te Nengazen. Utew a mibulung keniyu. Igkelipey ku sikiyu wey ibmeupiya kew te ǥehinawa ku.
Edhengyuan ku sikiyu, Ibudya wey Sintiki, he melinew is kebpekid-upakat niw su telesuled kew tenged te upakat niw te Nengazen.

Ne sikew zaan is timbang ku ziyan, egkesuatan ku he tevangi nu heini is menge vahi wey zan heini metuman su mibpenigudu zan te kedtavang kedì te kedsengyawa ku te Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Ne elin daan si Clemente wey zuen pa menge zuma niw he midtavang kedì. Is menge ngazan dan te langun, ne nekesurat en diyà te libru te Megbevayà he zutun inlista zin is mibeǥayan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
Egkeǥiyan ku sikiyu he sigudu kew lipey tenged te kebpekidsevaha niw te Nengazen, su meupiya ke zekelà layun is kelipey niw.
Kinahanglan he peketulanged kew te minsan hentei su meǥaan en edlikù is Nengazen.
Kenè niw ikeseeng is minsan hengkey he egkeulaula niw, kekenà, emun ed-ampù kew buyua niw ziyà te Megbevayà is egkinehenglanen niw ne emun ebuyù kew, ne kinahanglan he peselemati niw en he zaan.
Ne zutun wazà samuk diyà te isip niw wey ǥehinawa niw su pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Jesu Kristu ibeǥey keniyu te Megbevayà is melinawen he ǥehinawa he kenà egkesavut te minsan hentei he etew.

Ketepusan heini, menge suled, he menge lalag ku keniyu. Iyan niw itaǥù diyà te isip niw is meupiya, is dait he igkezeliǥi, is tutuu he tuluuwen, is metazeng wey hustu wey mekempet he ulaula, wey is minsan hengkey he igkehimu te minsan hentei he egketahud.

Pen-ul-ulaha niw heini is langun he impenurù ku, wey impesavut ku keniyu pinaaǥi te menge lalag ku wey pinaaǥi zaan te menge ulaula ku. Ne zutun, is Megbevayà he iyan puunà te kelinew tew te wazè din pidtemanan, iyan ed-ulin keniyu.

Utew zekelà is kelipey ku wey is kebpeselemati ku te Nengazen su nehimu en maan he ingkepeehè niw is gaǥew niw pinaaǥi kayi te impeuwit niw kedì. Kenè ku iyan ibpesavut keniyu he wazè niw gaǥew kedì dutun te nengehuna he timpu, kekenà, wazè niw pa zutun paaǥi wey niw ikepaahà is gaǥew niw.

Kenà iyan igkeǥiya ku kayi is tenged te zuen kurang ku te menge egkinehenglanen ku, su minsan ke kenà utew meupiya is kebpekesavuk ku, impenurù kedì te Megbevayà he kinahanglan he mebmeupiya ǥihapun is gehinawa ku.

Neseǥazan ku en is kegkealang-alang wey is neezenan te langun he egkinehenglanen ku. Ne neleyaman ku en heini he egkeulaula te minsan hendei wey te minsan keenu, se zuen keuyaǥan ku se wazè ku keuyaǥan, ke neeezenan a wey ke egkealang-alang a.
Egkehimu ku is minsan hengkey he ibpeulaula kedì tenged te tavang ni Kristu he iyan edlig-en kedì.
Ne minsan pa te iyan heini, utew kew metulanged su midtevangan a keniyu kayi te menge seeng ku he mezakel.

Sikiyu is menge tigPilipus, netuenan niw he zutun te kedhipanew ku puun diyan te prubinsya he Mesidunya hein aney ku en ipenudtul ziyan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen, iyan kew zà menge tumutuu he midtavang kedì. Wazà duma he gurupu te menge tumutuu he nehimu he menge timbang ku su iyan kew zà nekeveǥey kedì te selapì.
Ne hein diyè e pa te Mesidunya, diyà te inged he Tiselunika, ne layun kew ebpeuwit te tavang niw kedì.
Kenè ku iyan igkekeǥiya kayi su wey a layun mekezawat te ibeǥey niw, kekenà, egkesuatan ku he zekelà is suhul keniyu te Megbevayà.

Nezawat ku en is impeuwit niw ne utew subra is imbeǥey niw. Ne kenà ad egkealang-alang su inhated en ni Ipepruditu zini is idtavang niw kedì. Iring heini te pemuhat he utew mehemut, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, utew igkesuat te Megbevayà.
Ne is Megbevayà, iyan daan ebeǥey keniyu te langun he kinahanglan niw tenged te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Jesu Kristu su utew zekelà is ketiǥeyunan din.
Berakat he zeliǥa is Amey tew he Megbevayà te wazà pidtemanan.
Ebpengemusta a keniyu te langun he menge tumutuu ki Jesu Kristu ziyan. Is menge suled tew he zuma ku kayi, ebpengemusta zan daan keniyu.
Ne is langun he menge zuma ku he tumutuu kayi te inged, lavew en is menge suled tew he zini ed-ubpà te valey te hadì, ebpengemusta zan daan keniyu.
Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew is langun te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Iyan a si Pablo.
Siak si Pablo wey heini is suled tew he si Timoteo, ebpengemusta key keniyu ziyan. Epustul a; midsuǥù a ni Jesu Kristu su iyan egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu is menge ǥaked te Megbevayà diyan te inged he Kulusas he menge metinumanen te lalag ni Kristu. Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey veǥayi kew zin te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
Sikami, emun id-ampù dey sikiyu, layun key ebpeselemat diyà te Megbevayà he Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesus tenged keniyu,
su nezineg dey is tudtul he mezesen is kedtuu niw ki Jesu Kristu wey zekelà layun is gaǥew niw te minsan hentei he etew he ǥaked te Megbevayà.

Umba mezesen is kedtuu niw wey zekelà is gaǥew niw su kenà egkeawà is perateng niw te langun diyà te langit he inteǥana keniyu te Megbevayà. Nezineg niw heini zutun te kebpesevuta keniyu te tutuu he penurù he iyan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen.

Heini is migkaǥi he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, pinaaǥi te kedtuu kayi, mezakel en he menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei he inged is mibmeupiya is menge ulaula zan. Ne kenà duen dà taman su ed-iseg ebmezakel is menge tumutuu pinaaǥi te Meupiya he Tudtulanen, iring te layun daan ed-iseg ebmezakel is menge tumutuu ziyan te keniyu puun pa zutun te andew zengan he nezineg niw is tudtul te ǥaǥew kenitew te Megbevayà wey netuenan niw he venar iyan.
Impenurù keniyu heini ni Ipapras he minahal he zuma zey he suluǥuen ni Kristu. Metinumanen sikandin te menge suǥù ni Kristu pinaaǥi te kedtavang din kenami.
Midtudtul zin kenami he zekelà is gaǥew niw te menge zuma tew he tumutuu tenged te mid-ulinan kew te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.

Ne tenged kayi ibpenigudu zey sikiyu id-ampù puun pa zutun te andew zengan he nezineg dey is tudtul mehitenged te kedtuu niw. Layun dey id-ampù diyà te Megbevayà he veǥayi kew zin te kegkesayud te langun he ulaula he ebpeveelan din keniyu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, mehimu kew zin he mebmetau ne pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, iveǥey zin keniyu is kegketuusi te meupiya wey mezaat.

Su emun ebeelan din is iring kayi, ne human egkehimu is menge ulaula niw he zait he menge ulaula te menge etew he neǥaked te Nengazen tew, ne egkehimu zaan he layun niw egkeveeli is egkesuatan din; layun niw egkeulaula is minsan hengkey he menge meupiya he ulaula. Ne layun daan ed-iseg is kegketueni niw te menge ulaula te Megbevayà.
Ne ibeǥey zin keniyu is dekelà he ǥehem he ebpuun te zekelà he ǥehem din, ne tenged kayi te ǥehem layun niw egkeantus is kemereǥenan he zekelà is kelipey niw.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su zekelà dutun is kebpeselemat niw te Amey tew he Megbevayà tenged te kedhimuwa zin keniyu he zait he mekeambit kew zutun te langun he ibeǥey zin diyà te keniyu te menge ǥaked din he midteyawan is isip dan.

Midtevangan kiw te Amey tew he Megbevayà ne tenged kayi wazè kiw en maan meveyveyai te kerusireman, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, si Setanas . Ne ǥuntaan iyan en ebayàbayà kenitew is Anak te Megbevayà he si Jesus he utew mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa te Megbevayà.
Ne pinaaǥi kayi te Anak din, nevelukasan kiw zin te kegkeuripen kenitew ni Setanas ne mibpesaylu kiw zin te menge ulaula tew he mezaat.
Heini is Anak te Megbevayà, ne iyan kebpeǥawaǥawa te kenà egkeahà he Megbevayà. Is Anak, ne lavew sikandin te minsan hengkey he linimbag din

su pinaaǥi kandin te Anak te Megbevayà midlimbag te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey ziyà te langit wey zini te tanà, sikan is egkeahà te etew wey is kenà egkengeahà he kedesenan he zuen dan keǥehem, wey kebayàbayà, wey kedhadì. Is Anak, mibpeveelan kandin te Amey zin he Megbevayà is minsan hengkey su wey zin meǥamit heini is minsan hengkey he linimbag din.

Ne elin daan ketezengan ke maan is lavew is Anak te Megbevayà su tenged te zaan en sikandin te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey, wey pinaaǥi kandin is hustu he kebpekesavuk wey egkengeulaula te langun he linimbag.

wey tenged te iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te lawa zin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is langun he menge tumutuu kandin, wey tenged daan te iyan sikandin ebeǥey te untung diyà te langun he menge tumutuu su iyan sikandin lavew te langun he egkengevanhew ne tenged kayi iyan sikandin lavew te minsan hengkey.
Ne egkesuatan te Amey tew he Megbevayà he ke hengkey sikandin, iyan ded daan sikan is Anak din.

Ne egkesuatan din daan he pinaaǥi te Anak din meked-uliey te meupiya he kedepità sikandin wey is minsan hentei zini te tanà wey ziyà te langit. Ne pinaaǥi te kedtiǥis duen te lengesa te Anak din diyà te krus egkehimu he menge emiǥu zin is minsan hentei.
Kenè kew zengan menge emiǥu te Megbevayà, kekenà, menge kuntada kew zin su layun mezaat is menge isip niw wey ulaula niw.

Ne minsan pa te iyan haazà, midhimu kew ǥuntaan te Megbevayà he menge emiǥu zin pinaaǥi te kebpatey ni Kristu. Umba mibpehimatey si Kristu su wey kew mehimu he menge etew he wazà mezaat he ulaula ne wazà igkesumbunga keniyu keuzemà emun ibpeetuvang kew zin diyà te Amey zin he Megbevayà.

Iyan, kinahanglan he kenè niw engkezi is kedtuu te tutuu he tuluuwen, kekenà, lig-eni niw is kedtuu niw ne kenè kew medarà is ebpaabut te langun he impenaad te Megbevayà he nezineg niw zengan hein impenurù keniyu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Heini is nekaǥi he Meupiya he Tudtulanen, ne insangyew ziyà te menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei. Siak si Pablo, midsuǥù a wey ku ikesangyew is Meupiya he Tudtulanen.

Maambe ke ebpekeantus a ǥuntaan te merasey su iyan igkezeyzey niw. Igkelipey ku heini su iring te kegkerasey ni Kristu edhimesazan ku en is langun he mereǥen he ibpaantus din kediey su wey mezeyzey is lawa ni Kristu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is menge tumutuu kandin.
Nehimu a he suluǥuen wey a meketavang te menge tumutuu. Ne umba mibpilì a te Megbevayà su wey ku sikiyu metevangi is menge etew he kenà Hudiyu ne wey ku ikepurung ikepenudtul is Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne zengan, heini is Lalag, ne in-eles te Megbevayà ne wazà ipezayag diyà te menge etew, iyan, guntaan ibpezayag din en kenitew te menge tumutuu kandin

su egkesuatan din he sikitew is menge ǥaked din, ne egkesayud kiw ke hengkey is utew lavew he meupiya he edhimuwen din diyà te langun he menge etew. Ibpesayud din en kenitew he edlumunan kiw ni Kristu ne tenged kayi egketuenan tew he edtulusen kiw keuzemà.

Sikami, idsangyew zey si Kristu; edleǥuyan dey is minsan hentei, wey ebpenurù key kandan ebpurung sumalà is egkehimu zey he ketau su wey meketuu is langun ki Kristu, ne wey sikandan keuzemà ikepeetuvang diyà te Megbevayà he wazà kurang te kedtuu zan.
Siak, ebpenigudu a ebaal he edlig-enan te zekelà he zesen ni Kristu su wey metuman heini.

Umba egkeǥiyen ku heini su egkesuatan ku he metueni niw ke maan is ebpenigudu a edhaǥù tenged keniyu wey tenged daan te menge tumutuu ziyà te inged he Leudisiya wey is minsan hentei he tumutuu ziyan he iring keniyu wazè pa mekekilala kedì.

Iyan idhaǥù ku su wey melig-eni is kedtuu niw te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kegkeupakat niw wey pinaaǥi te kebmahala niw te uman sevaha keniyu. Egkesuatan ku he meheǥet is kegkesavut niw te impenurù keniyu he iyan kes impezayag te Megbevayà keniyu mehitenged ki Kristu.
Su iyan dà sikandin ebpekeveǥey te minsan hengkey he tutuu he ketau wey tutuu he kedsavut.
Egkeǥiyen ku heini su wey wazà mekekabig keniyu he minsan hentei pinaaǥi te menge ketezengan he henduen be te hustu, iyan, tarù.

Su minsan te wazà a ǥuntaan diyan te keniyu, layun ku sikiyu ed-isipa. Igkelipey ku sikiyu su netuenan ku he mibpurungan niw te ed-ulaula is meupiya he ulaula wey melig-en daan is kedtuu niw ki Kristu.
Ne ǥeina te midawat niw si Jesu Kristu he Nengazen niw kinahanglan he is menge ulaula niw, ne zait te upakat niw kandin.

Purung kew pendalid diyà te kandin; purungi niw istudyuwi is menge ulaula zin; purungi niw tuuwi sikan is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù keniyu. Ne kinahanglan he layun niw peselemati te Megbevayà is gaǥew zin keniyu.
Andam kew su kela ke zuen egkabig keniyu pinaaǥi te kebpenurù te tuluuwen he tarù ne wazè din pulus su imbilinbilin dà te menge etew. Kenà haazà hustu he tuluuwen su kenà ebpuun diyà te ki Kristu.
Umba egkeǥiyen ku heini su si Kristu, nehimu sikandin he etew. Duen din lawa, iyan, minsan pa kayi is minsan hengkey he ziyà te Megbevayà ne ziyà te kandin.

Ne sikiyu zaan, pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu, nekepurung kew en mekeazen te untung he imbeǥey keniyu ni Kristu. Ne iyan si Kristu sikan is edhadì te minsan hentei he kedesenan he zuen din keǥehem wey kebayàbayà.

Ne tenged kayi, minsan kenè kew menge Hudiyu, is midhimu keniyu te Megbevayà, ne iring duen te kedsirkunsidara zengan te menge Hudiyu su nehimu kew en he menge ǥaked te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu. Iyan, selakew heini, su kenà pinaaǥi te kebpelii te lawa zà duen, kekenà, in-awà ni Kristu is gehem te mezaat he kebayà te lawa niw.

Ne tenged kayi inleveng kew zuma kandin dutun te kebewtismuwi keniyu, ne nevanhew kew zaan duma kandin su nekidsevaha kew kandin tenged te midtuuwan niw he mekeǥeǥehem is Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin sikan is mibanhew ki Kristu.

Ne sikiyu, wazè niw pa zengan untung he wazè din pidtemanan tenged te memezaat is menge ulaula niw te kenà menge Hudiyu wey tenged te midtuman niw is memezaat he kebayà te lawa niw. Ne minsan pa zutun, mibeǥayan kew te Megbevayà te untung he wazè din pidtemanan ne nevanhew kew en duma ki Kristu. Mibpesaylu kiw te Megbevayà te langun he menge salè tew.
Ne minsan pa te wazè kiw medtuman te insurat he kesuǥuan din, pinaaǥi te kebpatey ni Kristu ziyà te krus, in-awè din is kesuǥuan ne tenged kayi wazè en igkesiluti zin kenitew.

Ne haazà is menge kedesenan he mezaat he mulin-ulin he zuen dan keǥehem te kebayàbayà, in-awà te Megbevayà is keǥehem dan, ne pinaaǥi te kedsulituwa zin kandan pinaaǥi te kebpatey ni Kristu ziyà te krus, impeehè din he wazè dan en kebpekesukul.

Umba, menge suled, kenè niw itetenged is edsudì keniyu emun kenè niw ebpezumdumahan is egkesuatan dan he ibpeulaula keniyu mehitenged te kegkaan wey ked-inum, wey mehitenged daan te kedsilibra te menge mahal he menge andew wey kedsilibra te intrada te hayag wey menge andew te kedhimeley.
Su is menge iring dutun, ne nehimu zengan he alung dà. Ne ziyè pa te huziyan is teǥialung dutun he iyan si Kristu.

Duen daan menge etew he egkaǥi he lavew sikandan tenged te zuen kun menge egkein-inuwan he impaahà kandan wey tenged te kenè dan mepelevawen. Ne ibpenurù dan he kinahanglan he ebpekeazap ki te menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà ziyà te langit. Kenè niw, menge suled, itetenged is kedsudì dan keniyu su is iring dutun he etew, ne ebpezalig dà, iyan, wazà hustu he ketezengan te kebpezalig dan su iyan ebayàbayà te isip dan is kelibutanen he kebayè dan.

Ne wazè dan en upakat ki Kristu he iyan ed-uwit kenitew. Iyan si Kristu puunà te zesen te kedtuu tew ne pinaaǥi kandin ed-iseg is kezesen te upakat tew te langun he tumutuu sumalà is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, iring te lawa tew, ne ed-iseg daan is desen din ne kenè ebpekedsusuwey pinaaǥi te kegkevagkes kayi zutun te menge uǥat din.
