Himuwa nu is taman te egkehimu nu wey nu metevangi is ebugadu he si Sinas wey si Epulus ke edhipanew zan. Susiya nu sikandan su wey wazà kurang dan.

Ipenurù nu ziyà te menge zuma nu he tumutuu ziyan he kinahanglan he iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zan is ked-ulaula zan te meupiya wey zan metevangi is menge edlised. Kenà meupiya ke zuen tumutuu he peǥulen su wazà pulus dutun.
Ebpepengemusta kenikew is langun he menge zuma ku kayi. Ipengemusta key zaan te langun he menge emiǥu zey he tumutuu ziyan. Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Megbevayà is langun.

Minahal he emiǥu zey wey timbang dey he si Pilimun. Siak si Pablo is nepirisu tenged te kedtuu ku ki Jesu Kristu wey si Timoteo he suled tew, ebpesuratan dey sikew, wey si Epiya he etevey tew tenged te kedtuu, wey si Erkipu he zuma tew he sundaru ni Kristu wey elin daan ebpesuratan dey is menge tumutuu he ziyan edsimba te valey nu.
Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu wey veǥayi kew zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk.
Sikew, suled, layun dekelà is kebpeselemati ku te Megbevayà tenged kenikew te kada ku ked-ampù;
su nezineg ku is tudtul mehitenged te mezesen he kedtuu nu te Nengazen tew he si Jesus wey mehitenged te kebmahala nu ziyà te ǥehinawa nu te langun he menge tumutuu kandin.
Ne id-ampù ku zaan he pinaaǥi te kebpekid-upakat nu kenami tenged te kedtuu tew, med-iseg is kedsavut tew te langun he meupiya he intuvad kenitew te Megbevayà tenged te nekidsevaha kiw ki Kristu.
Utew ku ingkelipey, Geli, is kebmahala nu te menge zuma tew he tumutuu. Ingkeheǥet heini te kedtuu ku su pinaaǥi kenikew nengelipey is gehinawa te menge etew ziyan he ǥaked te Megbevayà.
Ne tenged kayi te langun duen idhangyù ku kenikew. Netuenan ku he tenged te keǥehem he imbeǥey kedì ni Kristu egkehimu he edsuǥù a kenikew he himuwa nu is hustu,
iyan, tenged te utew ka mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku, edhangyù e zà kenikew. Siak, si Pablo, is meǥurang wey ǥuntaan pinirisu a zaan tenged te kedtuu ku ki Kristu,
edhengyuan ku sikew he peseyluwa nu si Unisimu. Tenged te kedtuu zin ki Kristu iring sikandin te tutuu en he anak ku su pinaaǥi kedì nehimu sikandin he tumutuu zini te pirisuwan.
Dengan wazè nu pulus ki Unisimu, iyan, guntaan edekelà utew is pulus tew kandin.
Ibpeulì ku en diyan te kenikew si Unisimu he utew ku pezem minahal.
Neisip ku he meupiya pezem ke iyan sikandin duma ku kayi su wey mehimu sikandin he iyan tavang nu kedì te kemulu e pa nepirisu zini tenged te kedsengyawa ku te Meupiya he Tudtulanen.
Iyan, kenè ku pa heini ebeelan te wazè nu pa ituǥut kediey. Kenà a ebpeǥes he ikehizu a kenikew. Su iyan meupiya is ebpuun te meliwanag he ǥehinawa is kedhimuwa nu kayi.
Kela ke iyan tuyù te Megbevayà te kedsuwaya ni Unisimu kenikew is: impaawà sikandin diyan te kenikew te wazà utew meuǥet su wey mehimu he meǥaked nu en te wazà pidtemanan.

Ne ǥuntaan kenà sikandin uripen nu zà duen, kekenà, utew pa mahal kenà is uripen su suled nu en daan tenged te kedtuu zin ki Kristu. Utew sikandin mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku ne mahal pa zaan diyan te kenikew, kenà tenged dà te uripen nu, kekenà, tenged daan te suled nu en tenged te Nengazen.
Ne emun ed-isipen a kenikew he timbang nu, iǥalewǥalew nu si Unisimu iring te kegelǥelawa nu kediey.
Ke zuen salè din diyan te kenikew wey ke zuen utang din diyà te kenikew, isipa nu he kediey.
Ahaa nu is kedsurata ku kayi: Iyan a si Pablo ebayad. Asal netuenan nu he zekelà daan is utang nu kedì su pinaaǥi kediey nekeangken ka te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
Ne tenged kayi, Geli, edhengyuan ku sikew he ikehizu a kenikew su telesuled ki pinaaǥi te kedtuu ta te Nengazen. Himuwa nu heini wey a melipey su telesuled ki pinaaǥi ki Kristu.
Dekelà is kedsarig ku kayi te kebpesurati ku kenikew su netuenan ku he ebpemineǥen a kenikew. Netuenan ku he zekelà is edhimuwen nu, kenà te idhangyù ku.
Ne zuen pa idhangyù ku he iyan is: endami a zaan te edhizeǥaan ku ziyan, su zekelà is kedsarig ku he pinaaǥi te ked-ampù niw, idtuǥut te Megbevayà he mekehendiyan a te keniyu.
Si Ipapras, is duma ku he pinirisu tenged te kedtuu ki Jesu Kristu, ebpengemusta keniyu.
Ebpengemusta zaan keniyu ensi Marcos, si Eristarku, si Dimas, wey si Lucas. Menge timbang ku sikandan kayi te ebpeveelan te Megbevayà.
Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew is langun te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Dengan duen impesavut te Megbevayà diyà te menge ǥin-epuan tew pinaaǥi te menge etew he ebpeneuven din. Mezakel is menge paaǥi te kebpeneuva kandan ne mezakel zaan is impesavut din pinaaǥi kandan.

Iyan, guntaan, duen impesavut te Megbevayà kenitew pinaaǥi te Anak din. Ne heini is Anak din, pinaaǥi kandin ne nelimbag te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey; ne midhimu sikandin te Megbevayà he Nengazen te minsan hengkey.

Pinaaǥi kayi te Anak din ibpezayag is mekeǥeǥehem he anlag te Megbevayà su neked-iring dan. Ke hengkey is Megbevayà ne iyan ded daan sikan is Anak din. Ne pinaaǥi te ǥehem te kegkaǥi kayi te Anak ebeyveyaan din is minsan hengkey he linimbag. Ne hein nepasad din en is ked-ewaa zin te menge salè tew, mid-ulì diyà te langit ne mibpinuu ziyà te egkekewanan te Megbevayà su edhadì.
Impaahà kenita te Megbevayà he utew lavew is Anak din, kenà is menge velinsuǥuen din diyà te langit, ne iring din ded daan, lavew is inggerar zin te Anak din, kenà is inggerar zin kandan.

Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà diyà te Anak din he edhenduen te, Iyan ka Anak ku ne egkeǥiyen ku kenikew he ǥuntaan ibpeehè ku he Amey a kenikew. Iyan, wazà belinsuǥuen din he migkeǥiyan din te iring dutun te minsan keenu he timpu. Ne zuen pa insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Egkehimu he iyan a Amey zin ne iyan sikandin Anak ku. Ne kenà iyan is belinsuǥuen egkeǥiyen din dutun.

Ne migkaǥi zaan is Megbevayà mehitenged te kakey he Anak din dutun te timpu te kedsuǥua zin kandin dini te kelibutan, ke sikandin te, Kinahanglan he ed-ezapen sikandin te langun he menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà.

Ne iyan mulà migkaǥi te Megbevayà mehitenged te menge velinsuǥuen din is: Menge suǥù ku zà sikandan, ne egkehimu ke edhimuwen ku sikandan he iring te keramag, ne emun kenà, ne iring te hapuy ke iyan egkesuatan ku.
Ne iyan lalag din diyà te Anak din is: Iyan ka Megbevayà ne wazà pidtemanan te kedhadì nu. Metazeng is kedumala nu te ǥinhedian nu.

Iyan egkesuatan nu is metazeng he ulaula ne igkeepes nu is mezaat he ulaula. Tenged kayi, siak is Megbevayà nu, midhimu ku sikew he lavew te menge zuma nu ne imbeǥey ku kenikew is utew zekelà he kelipey.
Ne zuen pa insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edlelaǥan din is Anak din he edhenduen te, Sikew is Nengazen, iyan ka nenlimbag te tanà, ne kenikew he velad is mibaal te langit.
Ne minsan pa te egkehanew keuzemà is langit wey tanà, kenè ka mulà egkehanew. Iring dan te manggad he egkezeetan.
Iring te kedlumpia te kumbalà, edlumpien nu is langit wey tanà ne ed-ilisan nu. Iyan, sikew, kenè ka mulà egkehalin; is untung nu ne wazè din pidtemanan.
Wazà belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he migkeǥiyan din te, Dini ke zè pa pinuu te egkekewanan ku taman te kenè ku pa ibpeluhud diyà te kenikew is menge kuntada nu.
Iyan, is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà, menge suluǥuen dà sikandan te Megbevayà. Kenè tew egkeahà, iyan, edsuǥuen din sikandan wey kiw zan metevangi is menge etew he edtulusen keuzemà.
Ne tenged kayi, kinahanglan he edhemenan tew ebpurungi is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù kenitew wey tew kenà melekai su kela ke mekesuwey kiw te tutuu he ibayà.
Su is kesuǥuan he imbeǥey zengan te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te menge velinsuǥuen din, netuenan tew he is minsan hentei he nekesupak kayi, midsilutan te Megbevayà sumalà is supak din.

Ne iring din ded daan, sikitew is menusiyà, kenè kiw zaan ebpekelikey te silut te Megbevayà emun ebey-anan tew, ne kenè tew edtumanen is impenurù kenitew mehitenged te mekeǥeǥehem he kedlibriya zin kenitew te silut. Is nehuna he nekepenudtul kayi, ne iyan en is Nengazen tew he si Jesus. Ne is menge etew he nemekezineg kandin, edtistiǥusan dan dini te kenitew he tutuu heini.

Ne is Megbevayà, midtistiǥusan din daan haazà is impenurù dan su mibeǥayan din sikandan te ǥehem wey zan ikepaahà is menge singyal, wey menge egkein-inuwan he kenà ed-iring-iring. Ne zuen daan menge ketau he imbeǥey zin diyà te menge tumutuu pinaaǥi te ked-ulini kandan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin sumalà is egkesuatan din he ebeǥayan.
Ne ibpesavut ku keniyu is kelibutan keuzemà he id-ilis te Megbevayà kayi te kelibutan tew ǥuntaan. Ne wazà pilia te Megbevayà is menge velinsuǥuen din he ebayàbayà dutun keuzemà he kelibutan,

kekenà, iyan mibpilì din is menge etew. Su zuen insurat he lalag he egkeehè ta kayi te menge surat dengan he edhenduen te, Sikew, Megbevayà, maan is kenè nu egkelipatan is menusiyà? Etew zà duen, ne maan is ebpurungan nu?
Midhimu nu he lavew kandin is menge velinsuǥuen nu, iyan, taman te mevavè dà he timpu su migkaǥi nu he zuen timpu keuzemà he kinahanglan he edtulusen wey edtehuzen is menusiyà.

Ne migkaǥi nu zaan he kinahanglan he keuzemà edhimuwen nu he mekevayàbayà sikandin te minsan hengkey. Iyan haazà insurat dengan. Ne ǥeina te migkaǥi zutun he edhimuwen te Megbevayà is menusiyà he ebayàbayà te minsan hengkey, egkesavut ta zutun he zuen timpu keuzemà he wazà minsan hengkey he linimbag he kenà egkeveyveyaan te menusiyà. Ne ǥuntaan netuenan ta he kenè pa ebpekevayàbayà is menusiyà te iring dutun.

Ne minsan pa zutun, mibpeetew si Jesus ne pinaaǥi kayi midhimu he lavew kandin is menge velinsuǥuen taman te mevavè dà he timpu su wey tenged te zekelà he ǥaǥew te Megbevayà, mebpehimatey sikandin he elili te tivuuk he menusiyà. Ne tenged kayi te kebpehimatey zin, ne nehimu en sikandin guntaan he utew telehuzen wey utew belentuǥen ne imbeǥey kandin te Megbevayà is kebayàbayà te minsan hengkey.

Is Megbevayà he nenlimbag te langun su wey mehimu is langun he igkezeliǥi kandin, ne utew hustu is kedtuǥuta zin he mekeantus si Jesus te merasey su pinaaǥi kayi impeehè din he wazà igkesawey ziyà te ki Jesus, ne egkehimu he mezakel kiw is edhimuwen din he menge anak te Megbevayà su wey kiw metulus iring te kedtulusa kandin. Nehimu si Jesus he ibayà wey kiw melibri te silut.

Si Jesus, mibpalis din en is menge salè tew. Ne ǥuntaan sikitew is nepelisan te salà wey sikandin is mibpalis te salà, sebsevaha zà is Amey tew he iyan is Megbevayà. Ne tenged kayi kenè kiw igkeeled ni Jesus, kekenà, egngezanan kiw zin te menge hazi zin.

Su zuen insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te, Sikew is Megbevayà, edtudtulan ku is menge hazi ku mehitenged kenikew. Egkentahan ku is kedalig ku kenikew ziyà te etuvangan te langun he ed-azap kenikew.
Ne ǥeina te menusiyà daan sikandin migkaǥi sikandin te, Edseriǥan ku is Megbevayà. Ne ke sikandin daan te, Heini e zed he edumahan te menge zuma ku he menge anak te Megbevayà he insarig din kedì.

Ne sikitew is menge anak te Megbevayà, menge etew kiw zà duen he zuen din kemetayen. Ne tenged kayi mibpeetew zaan si Jesus wey mehimu sikandin he iring tew. Umba mid-ulaula zin heini su wey mehimu he ebpehimatey sikandin ne wey pinaaǥi te kebpatey zin mezaag din si Setanas he iyan mibayàbayà te kemetayen,

ne wey pinaaǥi kayi metevangi kiw zin ne libriya kiw zin te kemetayen. Su zengan te wazè kiw pa libriya, kenà egkeawà dini te kenitew is kegkehandek te kemetayen ne iring te menge uripen kiw zutun te kegkehandek.
Ne kenà iyan is menge velinsuǥuen din midtevangan din, kekenà, iyan kiw zin midtevangan is menge kevuwazan ni Abraham.

Umba kinahanglan he ebpeetew sikandin su wey mehimu sikandin he iring kenitew te menge suled din te minsan hengkey he paaǥi. Ne mid-ulaula zin heini su wey mehimu sikandin diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà he iring te lavew he memumuhat tew he utew hihizuwen wey metinumanen su wey zin mepalis is menge salè tew.
Ne egkehimu en he egketevangan din is ebpenulayen ni Setanas su neseǥazan din en is kemereǥenan tenged te kebpenulaya kandin.

Ne tenged kayi, menge suled ku te kedtuu, mid-umbita kew zaan te Megbevayà wey kew mekeubpà keuzemà diyà te langit. Purungi niw isipa si Jesus. Iyan sikandin kes midsuǥù te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan wey sikandin mehimu he lavew he memumuhat he edtavang kenitew kayi te kebpesakup tew te Megbevayà.

Su si Jesus, ne mibpurung medtuman te langun he ebpeveelan kandin te Megbevayà, iring te si Moises, nepurungan din daan te edtuman is langun he mibpeveelan kandin dutun te kebeyveyai zin te valey te Megbevayà, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, menge etew he sakup te Megbevayà .
Iyan, si Jesus, ed-isipen sikandin te Megbevayà he utew pa lavew kenà si Moises, iring te lavew is ebevaley kenà te valey.
Netuenan ta he ke zuen baley ne zuen daan mibaal zutun te valey, ne is mibaal te minsan hengkey ne iyan is Megbevayà.
Ne si Moises, suluǥuen sikandin he metinumanen is kebayàbayè din te valey te Megbevayà ne nehimu is menge vaal zin he alung te ibpaahà te Megbevayà te egkeuǥet pa zutun he timpu egketuman.

Ne si Jesus mulà, Anak sikandin te Megbevayà he metinumanen is kebayàbayè din te valey. Ne iyan kiw valey zin emun edhemenan tew is kedsundan tew kandin wey is melipayen he kedteǥazi tew te langun he impenaad kenitew ni Kristu.
Su zuen insurat he lalag te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he edhenduen te, Guntaan emun egkezineg niw is lalag keniyu te Megbevayà,

kinahanglan he kenà mezesen is gehinawa niw iring te ǥehinawa niw zengan hein midsukulan niw is Megbevayà dutun te timpu he migezaman niw is ked-antus din keniyu zutun te tanà he wazà meubpai te etew.

Su migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, Minsan pa te seled te kepatan he tuig nengeehè dan is menge egkein-inuwan he mibeelan ku, ne migezaman dan pa ke hendei taman is kebpelevaya ku te menge mezaat he ulaula zan.
Umba, utew a zutun nepauk kandan, ne ke siak te, Layun egkesayep is ed-isipen dan ne kenè dan egkesuat he edtuman te menge suǥù ku.
Ne utew a nepauk ne migkaǥi ku he utew tutuu he kenè dan en ebpekeseled dutun te inteǥana ku he inged wey zan mekehimeley zuma kediey.

Umba, menge suled, susiya niw is gehinawa niw. Kinahanglan he wazà minsan sevaha keniyu he mezaat is ed-isipen din nè wazè din kedtuu, su pinaaǥi kayi egkeengkezan din is wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà.

Ne ǥuntaan te kemulu pa egkehimu he egkekuwa is keluwasan he imbeǥey kenitew te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he ebpesemsembaǥè kiw su wey kiw kenà melimbungi pinaaǥi te salà he iyan is kenà kedtuu ne wey kenà mebmezesen is gehinawa tew.
Su sikitew, emun edhemenan tew is daan he kedsarig tew ki Kristu, duen tew pudu upakat kandin.

Su iring te Lalag te Megbevayà he insurat ku en he edhenduen te, Guntaan, emun egkezineg niw is lalag keniyu te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he kenà mezesen is gehinawa niw iring te ǥehinawa niw zengan hein midsukulan niw is Megbevayà.

Ne hentei heini is menge etew he minsan nezineg dan is Lalag te Megbevayà midsukulan dan gihapun sikandin? Iyan sikandan sikan is menge etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil he mid-uwit ni Moises puun diyà te tanà he Ihiptu.

Ne hentei is menge etew he nepeukan dengan te Megbevayà seled te kepatan he tuig? Iyan ded heini is menge zuma te kevuwazan ni Israyil he mibaal te salà diyà te Megbevayà ne tenged kayi midsilutan din sikandan ne minatey sikandan dutun te tanà he wazà meubpai te etew.

Iyan ded sikandan kes menge etew he mehitenged kandan migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, Kenè dan ebpekeseled dutun te midteǥana ku he inged wey zan mekehimeley zuma kediey. Umba migkaǥi zin heini su wazè dan mebpemineg te lalag din.
Ne netuenan tew he wazè dan mekeseled dutun su wazè dan tuuwi is Lalag te Megbevayà.

Ne minsan pa zutun, wazà iawà te Megbevayà is daan he penaad din he zuen menge etew he ebpekeseled dutun te inged din wey zan mekehimeley zuma kandin. Ne tenged kayi kinahanglan he ebpekeandam kiw su wey wazà minsan sevaha kenitew he kenà edtuǥutan te Megbevayà he mekeseled dutun.

Su sikitew, nezineg tew zaan is kebpenudtula te Meupiya he Tudtulanen iring te menge ǥin-epuan tew zengan. Iyan, minsan te nezineg dan is impesavut kandan te Megbevayà, wazà pulus kayi ziyà te kandan su zutun te kegkezineǥa zan kayi, wazè dan tuuwi.

Ne sikitew mulà is nemeketuu, idtuǥut kenitew is kedseled dutun wey kiw mekehimeley zuma te Megbevayà. Iyan, wazà ituǥut te kenà edtuu su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Ne utew a nepauk ne migkaǥi ku he utew tutuu he kenè dan en ebpekeseled dutun te inteǥana ku he inged wey zan mekehimeley zuma kediey! Wazà iyan ikeǥiya zin kayi is wazè pa meteǥana haazà is kedhimeley su zaan en he nepasad din en heini puun pa te kedlimbaǥa zin te minsan hengkey.
Su zuen insurat he lalag mehitenged te ikepitu he andew he edhenduen te, Midhimeley is Megbevayà dutun te ikepitu he andew su netapus din en is langun he ebeelan din.
Ne migkaǥi en maan is Megbevayà mehitenged kayi te kedhimeley te, Kenè dan en ebpekeseled wey zan mekehimeley zuma kediey.

Tenged kayi, netuenan ta he haazà is menge etew zengan he nehuna he nemekezineg te Meupiya he Tudtulanen mehitenged kayi te kedhimeley, wazà sikandan mehimuwa te Megbevayà he mekeseled dan wey zan mekehimeley tenged te wazè dan kebpemineg. Iyan, netuenan tew zaan he zuen menge zuma pa he ebmehimuwen mulà te Megbevayà he mekeseled sikandan wey zan mekehimeley zuma kandin.

Umba egketuenan ta heini su zuen pa andew he midtelaan te Megbevayà he zutun ebpekeseled is menge etew zutun te kedhimeley he midteǥana zin. Su neuǥet pa zutun te timpu te menge tipehuna he etew he wazà medtuu, impinted te Megbevayà is lalag din diyà te ki Hadì David. Ne ke si David te, Guntaan, emun egkezineg niw is lalag keniyu te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he kenà mezesen is gehinawa niw.

Haazà is menge tipehuna he etew, angin ke mid-uwit sikandan ni Josue ne impeseled din sikandan dengan dutun te hustu en he kedhimeley he midteǥana te Megbevayà su kenè en kinahanglan he ibpesavut pa maan te Megbevayà is duma pa he andew he zutun ibpeseled pa maan is menge etew.

Ne tenged kayi, sikitew is menge sakup te Megbevayà guntaan, nesavut tew en he egkehimu kiw he ebpekeseled wey kiw mekehimeley zuma te Megbevayà iring te midhimeley is Megbevayà dutun te ikepitu he andew.
Ne is minsan hentei he ibpehimeley te Megbevayà, ed-engkezan din en is kandin he vaal iring te midhimeley is Megbevayà dutun te kegkepesaza zin te vaal zin te kedlimbag.

Umba, sikitew zaan, ebeelan tew is taman te egkehimu tew wey kiw zaan mekeseled dutun te edhimelayan he midteǥana te Megbevayà. Kenè tew ed-iringan haazà is menge etew zengan he wazà mebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà su wey wazà minsan sevaha kenitew he kenà ebmehimuwen he mekeseled dutun te edhimelayan.

Uuyag is Lalag te Megbevayà ne zekelà is gehem din. Iring te sundang he zezuwa is gerangan din he utew meǥarang, iyan, meǥarang pa is Lalag te Megbevayà kenà haazà is sundang su edlembasan din minsan is isip ta, gehinawa ta, wey tuyù ta ne igkepetuenan din kenita ke hengkey is ked-isipa kenita te Megbevayà.
Is Megbevayà, kenà sikandin egkeelesan te minsan hengkey. Egkeehè din layun is minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan ta. Ne ke minsan hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan ta, iyan sikandin edsusi.
Ne tenged kayi, menge suled, edhemenan tew is kedtuu he impenurù kenitew. Su zuen utew lavew he memumuhat he iyan datù tew he nekid-etuvang en te Megbevayà. Iyan heini si Jesus he Anak te Megbevayà.

Ne heini si Jesus is lavew he memumuhat tew, nesavut din is keǥuyè tew tenged te kememenusiyai tew su neseǥazan din he mibpenulayan sikandin dengan ni Setanas te minsan hengkey he paaǥi iring te ebpenulayan kiw zaan, iyan, wazà mulà sikandin mepenulayi.

Ne tenged kandin, wazà igkelenew te isip tew te ked-uvey zutun te etuvangan te mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà pinaaǥi te ked-ampù su utew veliǥeǥawen is Megbevayà. Ingkehizu kiw zin ne edtevangan kiw zin dutun te timpu te menge kemereǥenan.

Su ke zuen etew he ebpilien he lavew he memumuhat, idsarig kandin is ked-etuvang te Megbevayà ne iyan sikandin datù te menge etew. Ne idsarig daan kandin is menge ibeǥey ziyà te Megbevayà wey is kebpemuhat wey mepelisi is menge etew te menge mezaat he ulaula.
Ne tenged te etew zà duen sikandin he layun egkesayep, egkehimu he mepelevayen sikandin te menge zuma zin he etew he egkengesayep daan tenged te kenè dan ebpekesavut.

Ne tenged te zuen daan kandin he menge sayep, kinahanglan he zuen ibpemuhat din tenged te kandin he menge mezaat he ulaula iring te zuen daan ibpemuhat din tenged te menge mezaat he ulaula te menge zuma zin he etew.

Utew telehuzen is lavew he memumuhat, iyan, wazà minsan hentei he ebpekehimu he ebpilì te keugelingen din wey mehimu sikandin he lavew he memumuhat su iyan ebpilì kandin is Megbevayà iring te mibpilì din dengan si Arun.

Ne iring din ded daan wazà iyan si Kristu mebpilì te keugelingen din wey mehimu sikandin he mekeǥeǥehem he lavew he memumuhat tew, kekenà, iyan is Megbevayà su migkaǥi kandin is Megbevayà te, Iyan ka Anak ku. Ne egkeǥiyen ku he ǥuntaan ibpeehè ku he Amey a kenikew.
Ne zuen pa insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te, Iring ka ki Milkisidik he memumuhat dengan, su wazà pidtemanan te kegkememumuhat nu.

Ne hein kemulu pa si Jesus dini te kelibutan, ne mibpeniǥis is luhè din ne nekelelendag sikandin tenged te utew meheǥet is kebuyù din wey ked-ampù din diyà te Megbevayà he iyan ebpekelibri kandin te kemetayen. Ne tenged te zekelà is kedtahud din wey kedtumana zin te menge suǥù te Megbevayà, midineg is ked-ampù din te Megbevayà.
Su minsan pa te Anak sikandin te Megbevayà, ingkepenurù gihapun kandin is kebpeketuman te suǥù te Megbevayà pinaaǥi te menge kemereǥenan he nengeeǥiyan din.
Ne hein nepasad din en is langun he impetuman kandin te Megbevayà, nehimu sikandin he Menluluwas te langun he ebpemineg kandin su wey meveǥayi sikandan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
Ne zutun, is Megbevayà, midlilaan din sikandin he lavew he memumuhat iring te memumuhat dengan he si Milkisidik.
Dekelè pa is ibpesavut ku pezem keniyu mehitenged te kegkememumuhat ni Milkisidik wey ni Jesus, iyan, mereǥen he edseysayen su kenè niw en egkesavut. Henduen be te kenè en ed-uteng diyà te isip niw.

Neuǥet en is kebpeketuu niw ki Jesus, ne engayan kew en pezem he menge menunudlù, iyan, kenà egkehimu su kinahanglan he ebpekepepenurù kew pa ebpekepeuman wey niw mesavut is menge melemu zà he tuluuwen he ebpuun te Lalag te Megbevayà. Henduen te kemulu kew pa edsusu su kenè niw pa egkelutang te egkaan is mezesen he egkeenen, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is menge mezalem he ebpuun te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà .
Emun deisek ki pa he vatà ne iyan dà egkezawat ta is gatas, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kenè te pa egketuenan is penurù mehitenged te metazeng he ulaula.

Ne emun meǥurang ki en ne egkesepè te en is mehunit he egkeenen, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, mezalem en is igkepenurù kenita ne metau ki en he ed-isip-isip, ne egketuusan te en ke hengkey is meupiya wey ke hengkey is mezaat he ibayà.

Ne tenged dutun, menge suled, netengkaan en is ked-istudyuwi tew zuen te menge nehuna he melemu he tuluuwen he impenurù kenitew mehitenged ki Kristu. Kinahanglan he edlaus kiw en dutun te ked-istudyu te menge penurù he zait te menge etew he mezesen en is kedtuu zan. Kenè tew ed-ul-ulitan te ed-istudyu is menge nehuna he impenurù kenitew iring te ked-engkezi te kedsarig te menge ulaula he wazà pulus, wey is kedtuu te Megbevayà.
Kenè tew ed-ul-ulitan is ked-istudyu te kebpemewtismu, wey is kedewata te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, is kegkevenhawa kenita keuzemà, wey is kedsusiya te Megbevayà keuzemà te tivuuk he menusiyà,
kekenà, emun idtuǥut te Megbevayà, edlaus kiw en te ked-istudyu te menge penurù he zait te menge etew he mezesen en is kedtuu zan.

Su penenglitan duen menge etew he neteyawan te Megbevayà is isip dan. Nesavut dan en ke hengkey is ibeǥey kenitew ziyà te langit, ne nekeambit dan en te ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, ne netuenan dan en is meupiya he impesavut te Megbevayà, ne neehè dan daan is egkehimu te ǥehem he ibpaahà te Megbevayà keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu. Ne emun ed-iniyuǥan dan heini kenè en egkehimu he ibpelikù dan ibpeuman wey zan meiniyuǥi is mezaat he menge ulaula zan. Henduen be te in-uman dan iransang diyà te krus is Anak te Megbevayà ne edhimuwen dan he sumpelita sikandin te menge etew.

Su sikitew is menusiyà, ne iring kiw te tanà. Ne is tanà he layun ed-uzani ne memelambeg is menge pinemula zuen, ne zekelà is pulus kayi ziyà te teǥitanà. Ne is etew he iring dutun te tanà, edtuvazan sikandin te Megbevayà.

Iyan, ke zuen tanà he iyan dà ebpeketuvù duen is menge zuǥiyen he sagbet wey menge hilemunen, ne wazè din pulus, ne ed-engkezan, ne ebinsulan te teǥitanà. Ne iring din ded daan is etew he iring kayi te tanà su edsilutan te Megbevayà.

Na, menge minahal ku he menge suled, minsan pa te iring kayi is menge lalag ku keniyu, netuenan ku he meupiya pa mulà is egkezungguan niw su netuenan ku he zekelà is pulus te kedlibriya keniyu te Megbevayà.

Su kenà egkehimu he kenà metazeng is kedsusiya keniyu te Megbevayà; su kenà egkehimu he egkelipatan din is langun he meupiya he mid-ulaula niw tenged te mahal sikandin diyà te ǥehinawa niw su midtevangan niw is menge zuma tew he tumutuu ne minsan guntaan wazè niw engkezi is kedtevangi niw kandan.

Ne is kada sevaha keniyu, egkesuatan dey he kenè niw zaan engkezi is kedhaǥù niw taman te kedlikù ni Jesus dutun te ketepusan he timpu keuzemà su wey zutun metuman diyan te keniyu is langun he meupiya he ebpeebuten tew.
Kinahanglan he kenè kew mebpetetapul, kekenà, iringi niw is menge etew he meinentusen he edtuu te Megbevayà su tenged kayi egkezawat dan is impenaad te Megbevayà.

Isipa niw si Abraham. Dutun te kebpenaazi kandin te Megbevayà, is Megbevayà, ne wazà duma he ngazan he neǥamit din te kedlig-eni zin te penaad din, kekenà, migamit din is kandin he keugelingen he ngazan su wazà lavew kandin.
Ne pinaaǥi te kandin he ngazan migkaǥi sikandin diyà te ki Abraham te, Kenè en ebperis he edtuvazan ku sikew te meupiya ne ebmezakel utew is menge kevuwazan nu.
Ne si Abraham, utew sikandin meinentusen he edsarig te Megbevayà taman te netuman te Megbevayà is penaad din kandin.

Ne emun duen penaad te etew zà duen, iyan idlig-en din te penaad din is: duen lavew kandin he ibpepirma zin zutun te penaad din. Ne emun iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan din dutun te husayen, ebpeketuu te lalag din is ebpemineg dutun te penaad din.
Ne egkesuatan dengan te Megbevayà he mesavut te menge etew he mibpenaazan din he kenà duwazuwa he edtumanen din is penaad din kandan, ne tenged kayi midlig-enan din is penaad din.

Ne zuen dezuwa he ulaula te Megbevayà he kenà egkehalin te minsan hentei. Is sevaha, ne iyan is penaad din, ne is sevaha, ne iyan is kedlig-eni zin te penaad din. Ne pinaaǥi kayi te zezuwa egkesavut ta he kenà egkehimu he kenè din edtumanen is penaad din. Ne tenged kayi, sikitew is nemekeaput diyà te kandin, utew meheǥet is kedsarig tew kandin ne tenged kayi edhemenan tew is kebpeebuta tew te langun he meupiya he impenaad din kenitew.

Ne utew mezesen wey nelig-enan heini is kebpeebuta tew he edtumanen te Megbevayà is penaad din su iyan edseriǥan tew is Megbevayà. Ne si Jesus, ne nehimu en sikandin he zatù tew ne ziyè en sikandin te etuvangan te Megbevayà. Ne nehimu en si Jesus he lavew he memumuhat tew he wazè din pidtemanan he iring te memumuhat dengan he si Milkisidik.

Su heini si Milkisidik, ne hadì sikandin dengan te inged he Selim, wey memumuhat sikandin he ed-azap te lavew he Megbevayà. Ne zuen timpu zutun he si Abraham, mibpekidtebek te menge hadì he kuntada zin ne mibpenhimetayan din. Ne zutun te ked-ulì ni Abraham, midsinuǥung sikandin ni Milkisidik, ne migkaǥi ni Milkisidik pinaaǥi te kebpenuvadtuvad he edtuvazan si Abraham te Megbevayà te meupiya he tuvad.

Ne si Abraham, imbeǥey zin diyà te ki Milkisidik is ikesepulù he vahin te langun he nengetavan din. Ne heini is ngazan he Milkisidik, dezuwa is kehuluǥan din. Is egkehuna ne hadì he ebpekeveǥey te ketazeng. Ne tenged te hadì sikandin te inged he Selim, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kelinew, elin daan kehuluǥan din is hadì he ebpekeveǥey te kelinew.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su wazà guǥud ke hentei is amey zin wey iney zin wey menge kepuun din, ne wazà daan guǥuza is kegkeetew zin wey is keaǥi te kemetayen din. Umba heini si Milkisidik, ebpekeiring sikandin te Anak te Megbevayà su iring te wazè din puunà, ne wazè din ketepusan, ne wazà pidtemanan te kegkememumuhat din.
Isipa niw he utew lavew si Milkisidik su is kepuun tew he si Abraham, imbeǥey zin kandin is ikesepulù he vahin te netavan din dutun te kebpekezaag din te menge hadì.

Ne is menge memumuhat te menge Hudiyu he menge kevuwazan ni Levi, ne menge kevuwazan daan sikandan ni Abraham. Ne insuǥù kandan te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises he kuwaa zan is ikesepulù he vahin te langun he ketiǥeyunan te menge zuma zan he Hudiyu minsan pa te menge kevuwazan daan heini ni Abraham.

Iyan, si Milkisidik, kenà mulà sikandin kevuwazan ni Levi ne minsan pa zutun midawat din is ikesepulù he imbeǥey kandin ni Abraham ne zutun, si Abraham, is mibpenaazan te Megbevayà, mibpenubtuvazan ni Milkisidik.
Ne netuenan te minsan hentei he is etew he ebpenubtuvazan din is sengeeetew en, ne lavew sikandin kenà haazà is etew he ebpenubtuvazan din.

Ne is menge memumuhat he kevuwazan ni Levi, ne edewaten dan is ikesepulù ne ebpatey zan gihapun, iyan, si Milkisidik he mibeǥayan dengan ni Abraham te ikesepulù, sumalà is kedsevuta ta zutun te Lalag te Megbevayà, iring te kemulu pa sikandin uuyag.

Ne si Levi, iyan kepuun te langun he menge memumuhat te menge Hudiyu, ne egkesavut ta zaan he zutun te kebeǥaya ni Abraham te ikesepulù diyà te ki Milkisidik, nekeveǥey zaan si Levi ziyà te ki Milkisidik.
Su zutun te kebpeked-uma ni Abraham wey si Milkisidik wazè pa zutun ianak si Levi, kekenà, diyè pa sikandin te lawa ni Abraham he apù din.

Ne netuenan ta he zutun te kebeǥaya te Megbevayà te kesuǥuan diyà te menge Hudiyu, midtendek din is menge memumuhat he iyan is menge kevuwazan ni Levi he iyan ed-uwit te kesuǥuan. Ne emun egkehimu he ebmetazeng is menusiyà pinaaǥi te kandan he menge vaal, wazè en kinahanglan he zuen pa maan memumuhat he iring ki Milkisidik. Iyan, duen en mibpilì te Megbevayà he selakew en he memumuhat. Ne heini, ne kenà iring ki Arun he kevuwazan ni Levi, kekenà, iring sikandin ki Milkisidik.
Ne emun ed-ilisan is menge memumuhat, kinahanglan he ed-ilisan daan is kesuǥuan he mibenteyanan dan.

Ne is Nengazen tew he si Jesus he iyan memumuhat he nekeilis te zaan he menge memumuhat, kenà sikandin kevuwazan ni Levi su kevuwazan ni Huda. Ne te langun he menge kevuwazan ni Huda, iyan dà sikandin nehimu he memumuhat. Ne wazà ipesavut ni Moises dengan he zuen kevuwazan ni Huda he egkehimu he memumuhat.
Ne keladu en utew he emun mid-ilisan en is menge memumuhat he kevuwazan ni Levi ne mid-ilisan daan is kesuǥuan su zuen selakew en he memumuhat he iring ki Milkisidik.
Ne wazà heini is beǥu himuwa he kelibutanen he memumuhat pinaaǥi te menge kelibutanen he kesuǥuan, kekenà, midhimu sikandin he memumuhat tenged te mekeǥeǥehem sikandin su wazè din kemetayen.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he zutun migkeǥiyan sikandin te Megbevayà te, Memumuhat ka he wazà pidtemanan te kegkememumuhat nu iring te kegkememumuhat ni Milkisidik.
Ibpesavut kenitew kayi he is daan he kesuǥuan, in-awè en te Megbevayà su wazè din pulus ne kenà ebpeketavang kenitew te menusiyà,

su kenà egkehimu he ed-isipen kiw he metazeng pinaaǥi te kedtumana kayi. Ne tenged kayi, imbeǥey en kenitew te Megbevayà is meupiya pa he egkeseriǥan he paaǥi. Ne pinaaǥi kayi, egkehimu he pinaaǥi te ked-azap tew ebpekeetuvang kiw en te Megbevayà.

Ne kenà duen dà taman su utew zeyzey heini is beǥu he paaǥi su zutun te kedhimuwa te Megbevayà ki Jesus he memumuhat, mibpenaazan sikandin te Megbevayà. Iyan, hein nehimu zengan he memumuhat is menge kevuwazan ni Levi, wazà sikandan penaazi te Megbevayà.

Iyan, si Jesus mulà, mibpenaazan te Megbevayà su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Siak is Megbevayà, impenaad ku he egkehimu ka he memumuhat ne wazà pidtemanan te kegkememumuhat nu, ne kenè en heini ebperis.
Ne tenged kayi te penaad te Megbevayà, pinaaǥi ki Jesus egkesiguru tew he utew pa meupiya heini is beǥu he paaǥi he midtukud te Megbevayà te kedlibriya zin kenitew kenà is daan.
Ne kenà duen dà taman su haazà is menge memumuhat dengan he menge kevuwazan ni Levi, kinahanglan he utew zan mezakel su emun ebpatey is duma kandan, kinahanglan he ed-ilisan dutun te zuma.
Iyan, si Jesus, wazà pidtemanan mulà te kandin he untung ne kenà sikandin egkeilisan he memumuhat.

Ne tenged kayi, egkehimu te minsan keenu he timpu he edlibriyen din te silut is minsan hentei he menge etew emun pinaaǥi kandin ed-aput sikandan diyà te Megbevayà su wazà pidtemanan te untung din, ne layun din egkehimu te edtavang sikandan diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà.

Iyan si Jesus lavew he memumuhat he egkinehenglanen tew su wazà igkesewayi te menge ulaula zin, wazè din salà, ne wazè din sayep. Ne kenà sikandin iring te menge mekesesalà he menusiyà, ne midhimu sikandin te Megbevayà he lavew te minsan hentei ziyà te langit.

Kenà sikandin iring te menge zaan he lavew he memumuhat su wazà kinahanglan he ebpemuhat sikandin andew-andew iring kandan. Su andew-andew ebpemuhat dan. Edhuna zan ebpemuhat tenged te kandan he keugelingen he salà, ne human dan ebpemuhat tenged te menge salà te menge etew. Iyan, si Jesus mulà, kesevaha zà is kandin he kebpemuhat ne wazè din en umani. Midhimu zin heini zutun te kebpehimatey zin diyà te krus.

Haazà is nengehimu he menge lavew he memumuhat pinaaǥi te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, ne layun duen igkesewayi kandan. Iyan, neuǥet pa zutun nehimu is Anak te Megbevayà he memumuhat tenged te kebpilia kandin te Megbevayà wey tenged te penaad te Megbevayà he nekeilis te zaan he kesuǥuan. Ne heini si Jesus he Anak te Megbevayà he wazà igkesewayi kandin, nehimu en sikandin he memumuhat he wazà pidtemanan is kegkememumuhat din.

Ne iyan kehuluǥan te langun he impesavut ku en keniyu is: duen tew en lavew he memumuhat he iring kayi ne iyan si Jesus. Impepinuu en sikandin diyà te utew lavew he pinuuwà su ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan te mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà diyà te langit.
Edtumanen din is kegkememumuhat din diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà, diyà te tutuu he valey he ed-ezapan he wazà beeli te etew, kekenà, mibeelan te Megbevayà su ziyà te langit.

Is lavew he memumuhat dini te kelibutan, insuǥù kandin is kebpemuhata te menge ibpelengesa wey is kebeǥaya te menge halad diyà te Megbevayà. Ne iring din ded daan kinahanglan he zuen daan ibpemuhat te kenitew he lavew he memumuhat.

Iyan, dutun te kemulu pa sikandin dini te kelibutan, kenà egkehimu he memumuhat sikandin su puun pa te zengan dà taman guntaan duen menge memumuhat he ebpemuhat sumalà is insuǥù kandan dutun te kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises.

Alung dà is kandan he vaal su ed-iringan dan dà haazà is tutuu he ebpeiringan kandan he ziyà te langit. Netuenan ta heini su zutun te kebeeli ni Moises te simbahan he terapal he iyan dengan baley te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan, migkeǥiyan sikandin te Megbevayà te, Purungi nu te ed-iring is simbahan diyà te langit he impeehè ku kenikew ziyà te vuntud.

Ne is baal ni Jesus te memumuhat, ne lavew pa utew he meupiya, kenà is baal te menge memumuhat dini te kelibutan. Ne iring din ded daan, meupiya pa utew is beǥu he paaǥi he ed-ikulen din wey kiw mezawat te Megbevayà, kenà is daan he paaǥi. Su heini is beǥu, ne neviǥeran te tuwas pa he meupiya he penaad te Megbevayà.
Haazà is nehuna he paaǥi, ne kenà ebpeketavang kenitew. Su ke neketavang haazà is nehuna kenè en kinahanglan he ed-ilisan pa maan te veǥu.

Iyan, wazà mesuat is Megbevayà te menge ulaula te menge etew he nekesundan duen te nehuna he paaǥi su zuen insurat he Lalag te Nengazen he edhenduen te, Duen timpu keuzemà he zutun edhimuwen ku is beǥu en he paaǥi wey ku mezawat is langun he menge etew he kevuwazan ni Israyil.

Ne heini is beǥu he paaǥi, ne kenà iring te nehuna he paaǥi he imbeǥey ku ziyà te menge lukes dan dengan te ked-eǥaka ku kandan dutun te kebpeewaa ku kandan dutun te tanà he Ihiptu. Wazè dan tumana is menge suǥù ku zutun te nehuna he paaǥi ne tenged kayi mid-iniyuǥan ku sikandan, ke sikandin.

Ne mid-uman megkaǥi is Nengazen te, Is beǥu he paaǥi he edtukuzen ku wey ku mezawat is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, ne iyan heini: is menge suǥù ku, ne idsurat ku ziyà te ǥehinawa zan wey ziyà te isip dan ne egkesuatan dan human te edtuman heini. Ne human a egkehimu he Megbevayà dan ne egkehimu sikandan he menge ǥaked ku.

Ne tenged kayi, dutun he timpu keuzemà kenè en kinahanglan te minsan hentei he ebpepenurù te zuma zin mehitenged kedì, ne kenè en daan kinahanglan dutun he zuen pa maan etew he edseysey ziyà te zuma zin ke hentei a is Megbevayà su zutun egketuenan te minsan hentei, lavew se kenà lavew, ke hentei a.
Ne egkehizuwan ku sikandan, ne ebpeseyluwen ku sikandan te mezaat he mid-ulaula zan, ne edlipatan ku en is menge salè dan, ke sikandin.

Ne ǥeina te migkaǥi te Megbevayà he zuen beǥu en he paaǥi, egkesavut tew he kenè en ebpulus haazà is daan. Ne ke zuen minsan hengkey he zaan en he kenè en egkeǥamit ne ed-engkezan en su ed-ilisan te veǥu.
Ne zutun te nehuna he paaǥi te kebpekidsevaha te Megbevayà te menusiyà, impenurù te Megbevayà is paaǥi te ked-ezapa zan kandin wey ke ebmenmenuwen is kebeeli te simbahan dini te kelibutan.

Impehitindeg dan is simbahan he valey he terapal ne zezuwa is ruǥu zutun. Is sevaha, ne iyan kes egngezanan te mahal he ruǥu. Ne zutun dan isavuk is sulù, wey is lemisahan he zutun isavuk is supas he ibpemuhat diyà te Megbevayà.
Duen kurtina zutun te idselang te valey he terapal ne zuen daan kurtina he intaltal zutun te mid-elangan te zezuwa he ruǥu. Ne heini is ikezuwa he ruǥu ne iyan kes egngezanan te utew mahal he ruǥu.

Ne is seled kayi, insavuk dan dutun kes pemuhatà he vulawan he zutun edtutunga is beyewà. Ne zutun daan isavuk kes kavan he mid-epizan te vulawan. Tuus heini is kavan te zaan he paaǥi he midtukud te Megbevayà. Diyà te seled dutun te kavan ne egkeahà is bulawan he umuy he zutun itaǥù kes keuyaǥan he mana. Ne zutun daan te seled te kavan egkeahà kes tuked ni Arun he mibpeneringsing wey kes dezuwa he melumpipi he vatu he zutun isurat te Megbevayà kes kesuǥuan.

Ne insihung haazà is kavan dutun te zezuwa he ledawan te menge mekeǥeǥehem he kedesenan he iyan tuus he zutun is Megbevayà. Mibekar zan is pakpak dan ne intezung dan dutun te vulawan he vangkù he zutun ebpelisa te Megbevayà is menge salà te menge etew. Ne kayi zà taman heini su kenè en egkehimu he id-amin ku te edseysey is langun kayi.
Ne hein naandam dan en is langun kayi ne kada andew edseled is menge memumuhat dutun te nehuna he ruǥu he egngezanan te mahal he ruǥu su edtumanen dan is ebpeveelan kandan.

Iyan, haazà is sevaha he ruǥu he egngezanan te utew mahal he ruǥu, iyan dà ebpekeseled dutun is lavew he memumuhat. Ne kesevaha zà sikandin edseled dutun te sengetuig. Ne emun ed-ahuk sikandin dutun, kinahanglan he ed-uwiten din is lengesa he ibpemuhat wey mepalis is menge salè din wey is menge salà he wazà tuyua te langun he menge zuma zin he kevuwazan ni Israyil.

Iyan heini ulaula te menge memumuhat dutun te simbahan, ne pinaaǥi kayi ibpesavut kenitew te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he te kemulu pa kinahanglan he egemiten haazà is egkehuna he ruǥu he egngezanan te mahal he ruǥu, kenè pa ebpekeseled is menge etew zà duen dutun te utew mahal he ruǥu.

Ne alung heini he ibpesavut kenita he is menge ibpemuhat dutun he menge langgam wey is menge halad, kenà heini ebpekeawà te menge salà te menge etew he ed-azap dutun su nesavut dan he pinaaǥi kayi wazè dan pa himuwa he metazeng.

Su heini he paaǥi te ked-ezapa te Megbevayà, ne pinaaǥi zà te menge suǥù mehitenged te vetasan te kegkaan, ked-inum, kebpenlùlù, wey kedhemesa te lawa he paaǥi he insuǥù te Megbevayà. Menge suǥù heini he edtumanen te menge etew pinaaǥi zà te lawa wey tenged dà te insuǥù ne kenà tenged te iyan diyà te ǥehinawa zan. Ne is pulus kayi te paaǥi, ne taman dà heini kayi te timpu ǥuntaan te ked-ilisi te Megbevayà kayi te veǥu he paaǥi.

Ne ǥuntaan nekeuma en si Kristu, ne nehimu sikandin he lavew he memumuhat mehitenged kayi te veǥu he paaǥi he meupiya kenà kes daan. Ne midseled sikandin diyà te meupiya pa wey lavew pa he simbahan he wazà beeli te etew zà duen su kenà dini te kelibutan.

Ne kesevaha zà is kedseled din dutun te utew mahal he ruǥu te simbahan he ziyà te langit ne kenè en ed-uman. Ne wazà sikandin mekeseled dutun tenged te kebpelengesa zin te lengesa te menge ayam dà duen, iring te menge kambing wey menge nati he vaka, kekenà, nekeseled dutun tenged te impelengesa zin is kandin he lengesa. Ne tenged kayi te kebpemuhata te lawa zin, midhimu zin he wazà pidtemanan te kedlibriya zin kenita te silut.

Dengan, sumalà is impenurù te kesuǥuan, ke zuen etew he mibmeremerik tenged te mid-uvayan din is minatey, kinahanglan he ebpetiǥisan sikandin te lengesa te ibpemuhat he vaka wey kambing, wey igmuk te edtutungen he nati he vaka. Ne pinaaǥi kayi egkepelisan sikandin dutun te kegkeremeriki te lawa zin.

Ne emun egkehimu he egkelumpiyuwan haazà pinaaǥi zà te lengesa te menge vaka wey kambing, iyan pe be kenà utew pa lavew is egkelumpiyuwan pinaaǥi te lengesa ni Kristu. Su pinaaǥi te tavang te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he wazè din pidtemanan, impemuhat ni Kristu ziyà te Megbevayà is kandin he lawa; ne wazà igkesewayi kandin. Ne pinaaǥi te kebpelisi kenita te lengesa zin, in-awè din is menge salè ta wey is kebpekesarig ta te menge ulaula he wazè dan pulus. Ne tenged kayi ebpekeazap ki en te wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà.

Ne tenged kayi zaan nehimu en si Kristu he zatù tew su wey zin metukud is beǥu en he paaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew te Megbevayà. Ne pinaaǥi kayi, is langun he midhimu te Megbevayà he meketuu, egkezawat dan is langun he meupiya he wazè din pidtemanan he impenaad te Megbevayà. Umba egkehimu heini su pinaaǥi te kebpatey ni Kristu nengepalis is langun he menge mezaat he ulaula he nehimu te menge etew zutun te timpu he nengesakup sikandan te nehuna he paaǥi.

Ne penenglitan, duen etew he mibaal te dukumintu ne migkaǥi zin dutun te dukumintu he emun ebpatey sikandin duen menge azen din he ibpepengevilin din te menge zuma zin. Ne zutun te kebpatey zin kinahanglan he zuen ebpeketistiǥus he tutuu iyan he minatey en haazà is etew, ne human ebpekezawat dutun te menge azen din haazà is migkaǥi zutun te dukumintu.
Emun kemulu pa uuyag haazà is teǥiazen, ne kenè pa edtumanen haazà is migkaǥi zutun te dukumintu. Iyan, emun ebpatey en, human edtumana haazà.
Ne iring din ded daan haazà is nehuna he paaǥi he midtukud te Megbevayà su kinahanglan dutun he zuen lengesa he tuus te edhimetayan he langgam ne human egketuman haazà is paaǥi.

Ne tenged kayi, hein aney ipenurù ni Moises diyà te langun he menge etew is langun he ibpetuman kandan te Megbevayà dutun te kesuǥuan, migkuwa zin is lengesa te menge nati he vaka he impemuhat, ne mid-emutan din te wahig. Midhames din dutun is bulvul te kerehidu he midtinà te meriǥà wey is subpang te kayu he egngezanan te hisup. Ne mibpirikan din dutun is libru he zutun isurat is kesuǥuan wey mibpirikan din daan is langun he menge etew.

Ne migkeǥiyan din dutun is menge etew te, Tuus heini is lengesa te paaǥi he midtukud te Megbevayà wey kiw zin mezawat, ne kinahanglan he ebpurungan tew te edtuman heini su insuǥù te Megbevayà, ke sikandin.
Ne iring din ded daan mibpirikan ni Moises is simbahan he valey he terapal wey is langun he taǥù dutun he egemiten dan te ked-ezapa zan te Megbevayà.

Impenurù te kesuǥuan he kinahanglan he ebpelisan te lengesa is hapit minsan hengkey he egemiten dan te ked-azap. Ne iring din ded daan wey zà egkepesaylu is menge salà te menge etew ke zuen ibpelengesa.

Ne haazà is simbahan te menge Hudiyu zini te kelibutan wey is menge ǥelemiten dan te ked-azap, ne menge alung dà te tutuu he simbahan diyà te langit. Ne egkepelengesahan is kelibutanen he simbahan pinaaǥi te kelibutanen he pemuhat, iyan, haazà is diyà te langit, ne kinahanglan he lavew pa he meupiya is ibpemuhat dutun.

Dutun te kebpemuhat ni Kristu, wazè sikandin medseled diyà te utew mahal he ruǥu te simbahan he zini te kelibutan su alung dà heini te tutuu he simbahan he ziyà te langit. Iyan midselezan din kes tutuu he simbahan he ziyà te langit ne ǥuntaan iyan sikandin datù tew he edtavang kenitew ziyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà.

Ne is lavew he memumuhat te menge Hudiyu, ne kada tuig edseled sikandin dutun te utew mahal he ruǥu zutun te simbahan dini te kelibutan su ibpemuhat din is lengesa te langgam. Iyan, si Kristu mulà, wazà melelayun is kebpemuhata zin te lawa zin

su emun iyan haazà egkinehenglanen, puun pa te kedlimbaǥa te kelibutan, ne utew mezakel is kebpekeantus din te kebpehimatey. Iyan, wazà iyan haazà kinehenglana su iyan mid-ulaula zin kayi te timpu he meǥaan en egketapus is kelibutan is: midlepew sikandin wey zin maawà is salè tew pinaaǥi te kebpemuhata zin te keugelingen din he lawa. Ne kesevaha zà is kedhimuwa zin kayi.
Imbanglis te Megbevayà diyà te menusiyà is kebpatey te kesevaha, ne egkeipus dutun te kebpatey zin ne edsusiyen te Megbevayà is menge ulaula zin.

Ne si Kristu zaan, kesevaha zà is kebpehimatey zin he iyan kebpemuhata zin te lawa zin wey zin maawà is menge salà te utew mezakel he menge etew. Ne ed-uman pa ebulus si Jesus dini te kelibutan, kenà te ked-ewaa zin te menge salè tew, kekenà, edhimesazen din is kedlibriya zin te langun he utew zekelà is perateng dan kandin.

Ne egkesavut te en he is kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, ne alung dà; ne is langun he meupiya he egkehimu pinaaǥi ki Kristu, ne iyan hustu he impaalung dutun te kesuǥuan. Su insuǥù dutun te kesuǥuan he kinahanglan kada tuig, ne layun edhimuwa is menge kebpemuhat. Ne tenged kayi egkesavut ta zaan he pinaaǥi kayi te kebpemuhat kenà egkehimu he ebmetazeng is menge etew.

Su emun pinaaǥi zutun he paaǥi nelumpiyuwan is menge ulaula te menge ed-azap, ne wazè en kinahanglan he ed-uman dan pa ebpemuhat su nengepesaylu en pezem is menge salè dan ne egkesavut dan dutun he kenè en sikandan edsilutan tenged te menge mezaat he ulaula zan.
Ne ǥeina te kada tuig dutun, kinahanglan gihapun he ed-uman dan ebpemuhat ne netuenan dan he wazè bes maawà is menge salè dan.
Su kenà egkehimu te minsan hengkey he paaǥi he igkeawà te menge salè tew is lengesa te menge vaka wey menge kambing.

Ne egketuenan ta heini su zutun te timpu zengan he nekeuma si Kristu zini te kelibutan, migkaǥi sikandin diyà te Amey zin he Megbevayà te, Kena iyan is menge ibpemuhat he ayam egkesuatan nu, kekenà, midlimbag nu is lawa he egkeǥamit ku, ne iyan heini egkesuatan nu he ibpemuhat.
Su kenè nu iyan egkesuatan is kebpemuhata zan te menge ayam he edtutungen wey is lengesa te menge ayam he ibpemalis te menge salè dan.

Ne tenged kayi migkaǥi si Kristu ziyà te Megbevayà te, Iyan impengetuvang ku kenikew su edtumanen ku en is egkesuatan nu sumalà is insurat he tagnà mehitenged kedì dutun te insurat he lalag nu,  ke sikandin.

Midhunaan din te egkaǥi he kenà egkesuatan te Megbevayà is menge halad wey menge kebpemuhat he edtutungen wey is lengesa te menge ayam he ibpemalis te salà. Ne migkaǥi zin heini minsan pa te intelaan heini te kesuǥuan.

Ne mid-umanan din te egkaǥi te, Iyan impengetuvang ku kenikew su edtumanen ku en is egkesuatan nu. Ne tenged kayi egkesavut tew he mid-ilisan te Megbevayà is daan he paaǥi te kebpemuhat ne iyan in-ilis dutun is kebpemuhata te lawa ni Kristu.
Ne ǥeina te midtuman ni Jesu Kristu is egkesuatan te Megbevayà, nengepalis is menge salè tew pinaaǥi te kesevaha zà he kebpemuhata zin te keugelingen din he lawa.

Ne zutun te zaan he paaǥi te ked-azap, is menge memumuhat he Hudiyu, ne andew-andew ziyè dan te simbahan edhithitindeg is edterebahu su edtumanen dan is baal zan te kebpemuhat. Ne heini is menge kebpemuhat dan, ne kenà gihapun ebpekeawà te menge salà te menge etew.

Iyan, si Kristu mulà, kesevaha zà sikandin mebpemuhat, ne naawà dutun is menge salè tew ne kenè en heini kinahanglan he ed-umanan pa maan te minsan keenu. Ne tuus te netapus din en heini is terebahu zin su mibpinuu sikandin diyà te lavew he pinuuwà te egkekewanan te Megbevayà su edhadì.
Ne kemulu pa sikandin dutun guntaan su edteǥazan din is timpu keuzemà he zutun egkevakus te Megbevayà is langun he menge kuntada zin wey sikandin mekehadì.
Ne tenged kayi te kesevaha zà he kebpemuhat din diyà te Megbevayà, sikitew is mibpelisan din te salà, midhimu kiw zin he metazeng te wazà pidtemanan.
Ne zuen daan ibpenurù kenitew te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin dutun te insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te,

Siak is Nengazen, iyan heini veǥu en he paaǥi he edtukuzen ku zutun te menge sakup ku keuzemà wey ku sikandan mezawat. Idsurat ku is menge suǥù ku ziyà te ǥehinawa zan wey ziyà te isip dan, ke sikandin.
Ne mid-uman sikandin megkaǥi te, Is menge salè dan wey is menge mezaat he ulaula zan, edlipatan ku, ne kenè ku en maan ed-isipen.
Ne zutun, geina te nengepesaylu zin en heini is langun, wazè en kinahanglan he zuen pa ibpemuhat he id-awà te menge salè ta.
Ne, menge suled, tenged te mibpehimatey si Jesus ne impetiǥis is lengesa zin, wazè en kegkelenew ta te kedseled pinaaǥi te ked-ampù dutun te utew mahal he ruǥu he seled te kurtina.
Su si Jesus, midhimu zin is ibayè ta pinaaǥi te kebpemuhata te lawa zin, ne heini is ibayà, ne ebpekeveǥey te untung he wazè din pidtemanan.
Ne kenà duen dà taman su zuen te en utew lavew he memumuhat he ebayàbayà kenitew te menge sakup te Megbevayà.

Ne tenged kayi, ed-etuvang ki en te Megbevayà, ne kenà tarù is ked-ezapa ta kandin. Edheǥeten ta is kedtuu ta ne kenè ki eduwazuwa. Su netuenan ta he nepelisan ki en te lengesa ni Jesus ne netuenan ta zaan he in-awà kayi is menge salè ta. Nengebewtismuwan kiw en he tuus te kedlumpiyuwi kenitew te Megbevayà.
Edhemenan tew is meheǥet he kebperateng te kedtulusa kenitew keuzemà te wazà duwazuwa su netuenan tew he metinumanen is Megbevayà ne edhimuwen din is impenaad din kenitew.
Kenà tew ed-ewaan dini te ǥehinawa tew is kebpepurpurungè tew su wey layun mahal zini te ǥehinawa tew is minsan hentei, ne wey layun mehimu te uman sevaha kenitew is menge meupiya he ulaula.

Kenè tew ed-engkezan is kedtiǥum tew te ked-azap te Megbevayà; kenè tew ed-iringan is duma he menge tumutuu he mid-engkezan dan en is kedsimba, kekenà, edtiǥum kiw su wey kiw mekepesemsembaǥà. Utew heini kinahanglan, lavew en emun egketuusan ta he meǥaan en is kedlikù te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.
Ne emun nesavut te en is tutuu he tuluuwen, iyan, edtuyuen te pa maan is layun ked-ulaula te mezaat he ulaula, wazè en minsan hengkey he kebpemuhat he edewaten te Megbevayà wey maawà is salè ta.
Is etew he iyan heini ulaula zin, ne iyan egkepengkusan din is mekelimlimezang he hukum kandin wey is utew meinit he hapuy he iyan idsilut te Megbevayà dutun te langun he edsukul kandin.

Su is minsan hentei zengan he wazè din tehuza is kesuǥuan he imbilinbilin ni Moises, emun edtistiǥusan heini te minsan tetelu wey ke zezuwa ve he tistiǥus, ne kenà egkehizuwan, kekenà, edhimetayan sikandin.

Ne emun iyan haazà, wey pe be kenà utew meveǥat is idsilut dutun te etew ǥuntaan he edsumpeliten din is hizu kandin te Anak te Megbevayà. Utew meveǥat is idsilut kandin su igkepesavut din pinaaǥi zutun te mid-ulaula zin he wazà pulus dutun te lengesa ni Jesus he ibpalis pezem kandin he iyan tuus te veǥu en he paaǥi te kebpekidsevaha te Megbevayà te menusiyà. Meveǥat is silut kandin su edsumpeliten din is beliǥeǥawen he Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.

Su netuenan tew he migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, Iyan a ebales, iyan a edsilut kandan tenged te menge ulaula zan he mezaat. Ne zuen daan insurat he lalag he edhenduen te, Edsusiyen te Megbevayà is menge ulaula te menge sakup din.
Ne emun iyan edsilut is Megbevayà he wazè din kemetayen, ne utew mekehandekhandek haazà is idsilut din!
Isipa niw is timpu zengan hein sikan kew pa meteyawi te tutuu he tuluuwen ne midtuuwan niw. Utew mezakel is kemereǥenan he nengeeǥiyan niw, iyan, nekeantus kew ne wazà haazà ikeawà te kedtuu niw.
Mibpesipelahan kew ne midlupiǥan kew ziyà te etuvangan te mezakel he menge etew, ne zuen timpu he mid-unungan niw is menge zuma niw te menge pesipala kandan su nehizuwan niw.

Ne nehizuwan niw, ne midtevangan niw is menge tumutuu he nengepirisu. Ne minsan pa te mibpen-ileg te menge etew is langun he menge azen niw, midlipey kew gihapun su netuenan niw he zuen azen niw he utew pa meupiya ziyà te langit he kenà egkeileg diyà te keniyu te wazè din pidtemanan.
Umba, menge suled, kenè niw engkezi is kedsarig niw su emun meheǥet is kedsarig niw te Megbevayà, egkezawat niw is suhul zin he utew meupiya.
Kinahanglan he meinentusen kew wey niw metuman is egkesuatan te Megbevayà ne human niw egkezawat is impenaad din keniyu.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Meǥaan en is kebpekeuma te edteǥazan niw ne kenà egkehimu he ebpekelimpas sikandin.

Ne haazà is menge sakup ku he nengehimu en he metazeng tenged te kedtuu zan kedì, ebeǥayan ku sikandan te untung he wazè din pidtemanan. Iyan, ke zuen minsan hentei kandan he edsuwey tenged te kegkehandek, utew ku igkeepes, ke sikandin.
Iyan, sikitew, menge suled, kenè kiw iring te menge etew he edsuwey ne edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà su mezesen mulà is kedtuu tew ne pinaaǥi kayi nelibri kiw en te silut.

Emun duen kedtuu ta te Megbevayà, egketuenan ta he egkezawat ta is meupiya he ebperetengen ta. Pinaaǥi te kedtuu ta, egketaǥù dini te ǥehinawa ta is kedewata ta keuzemà te menge vutang he wazè te pa maahà.
Is menge tipehuna he etew, nezeliǥan sikandan te Megbevayà tenged te midtuuwan dan sikandin.
Netuenan ta he is minsan hengkey he egkeahà he midlimbag te Megbevayà, ne nehimu pinaaǥi zà te lalag din. Ne tenged kayi egketuenan ta he is minsan hengkey he egkeahà ne ziyà ebpuun te kenà egkeahà.

Si Abel zengan, tenged te kedtuu zin te Megbevayà ne nehimu zin is utew pa meupiya he pemuhat kenà te impemuhat te kakey zin he si Kain. Ne tenged kayi te kedtuu ni Abel mid-isip te Megbevayà sikandin he metazeng su midawat te Megbevayà is impemuhat din. Ne minsan pa te zengan dà minatey si Abel zuen ketudluanan din kenitew tenged te mezesen is kedtuu zin.

Ne si Inuk daan. Tenged te kedtuu zin wazà sikandin mebpatey su midtulus sikandin te Megbevayà ne kenè en sikandin egkeahà dini te kelibutan su ziyè en sikandin te Megbevayà. Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he ibpesavut he te wazè pa tulusa si Inuk, nesuat is Megbevayà te menge ulaula zin.

Is etew he wazè din kedtuu te Megbevayà, kenà egkehimu he egkesuatan te Megbevayà is menge ulaula zin. Su is etew he ebpetavang te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he edtuuwen din he zuen Megbevayà, ne kinahanglan daan he edtuuwen din he edtuvazan te Megbevayà te meupiya is minsan hentei he edhaǥù he ebpen-ahà te paaǥi wey sikandin mekepekid-emiǥu te Megbevayà.

Ne zuen daan kedtuu ni Noe su hein midleǥuyan sikandin te Megbevayà te limas he egkehitavù, midtuuwan din, minsan te wazè din pa maahà haazà is limas. Ne mibeelan din is dekelà he avang he egngezanan te arka ne hein midlapey is daǥat, nelibri sikandin wey is pemilya zin ne wazè dan melened. Ne pinaaǥi zutun te kedtuu zin, impesavut din he zait he edlimasen te Megbevayà is tivuuk he mekesesalà he menusiyà. Ne zutun mid-isip sikandin te Megbevayà he metazeng tenged te midtuuwan din is migkaǥi te Megbevayà.

Ne si Abraham daan, duen kandin he kedtuu. Su neketuu sikandin te Lalag te Megbevayà he ewai zin is inged din ne medhendiyà te selakew en he tanà he impenaad te Megbevayà he ibeǥey ziyà te kandin wey ziyà te menge kevuwazan din. Ne zutun mid-ewaan din is kandin he inged minsan pa te wazè din hanew zutun te tanà he impenaad kandin.

Ne hein nekeuma sikandin dutun te tanà, midtuuwan din he egkeuma is timpu keuzemà he idata kandin te Megbevayà haazà is tanà. Ne minsan pa zutun, is ed-ubpaan din dutun, ne menge lawig dà he mid-etepan te terapal he henduen te kenà sikandin meǥinged dutun te tanà. Ne iring din ded daan is mid-ulaula zutun te anak din he si Isaak wey is apù din he si Hakub, minsan pa te impenaad daan kandan te Megbevayà he egkeangken dan haazà is tanà.
Su si Abraham, ne iyan hustu he ebperetengen din he inged sikan is inged diyà te langit he kenà egkezeetan te wazè din pidtemanan. Ne iyan mibpelanu wey mibaal kayi is Megbevayà.

Ne si Sara zaan is esawa ni Abraham, duen kandin he kedtuu su minsan te wazà sikandin mekeanak wey utew en sikandin meǥurang, mibmeǥingey ǥihapun tenged te kedtuu zin te Megbevayà. Umba mibmeǥingey sikandin su midtuuwan din is penaad kandin te Megbevayà he egkeuma is timpu he ed-anak sikandin.

Ne is esawa zin he si Abraham he utew en meǥurang daan he kenè en pezem egkehimu he ebmeǥingey si Sara pinaaǥi kandin, nevuwad gihapun ne nehimu sikandin he kepuun te utew mezakel he menge etew. Iring sikandan te pantad diyà te zaǥat wey te menge vituen diyà te langit su kenè en egkengevilang.

Ne heini sikandan he neketuu te Megbevayà, pudu zan minatey te wazè dan pa mezawat haazà is impenaad kandan te Megbevayà he egkeangken dan haazà is tanà. Ne minsan pa zutun te wazè dan pa mezawat haazà is impenaad te Megbevayà, wazè dan engkezi is kedtuu zan su netuenan dan he egkeuǥet pa zutun egkezawat dan is ebperetengen dan he impenaad te Megbevayà. Ne ingkepesavut dan he kenà sikandan hustu he meǥinged dini te kelibutan su iyan hustu he inged dan is langit.
Ne is menge etew he iring kayi ǥuntaan, kenè dan ed-isipen he iyan hustu he inged dan heini is kelibutan, kekenà, ebperetengen dan he zuen selakew he inged he iyan hustu he inged dan.
Ensi Abraham, wazè dan daan isipa he iyan hustu he inged dan haazà is mid-ewaan dan su emun iyan haazà, egkehimu he ed-ulì dan dutun.

Su ebpen-ahaan dan is inged he utew pa meupiya, kenà haazà is mid-ewaan dan su iyan ebperetengen dan is egkeubpaan dan he inged diyà te langit. Ne ǥeina te iyan haazà, ne mid-angken sikandan te Megbevayà ne netuenan ta he kenè din igkeeled is kegngezani zan kandin he Megbevayà dan su mid-andam din en is inged he egkeubpaan dan.

Netuenan ta he impenaad te Megbevayà ki Abraham he pinaaǥi te anak din he si Isaak egkehimu he utew mezakel is kevuwazan din. Ne hein migezaman te Megbevayà is kedtuu ni Abraham, migkeǥiyan din si Abraham he ipemuhat din si Isaak. Iyan, utew zekelà is kedtuu ni Abraham te penaad te Megbevayà ne tenged dutun wazè din isipa he kenà egkehimu he kenè din ibpemuhat si Isaak.
Su neisip ni Abraham he ke ebpatey si Isaak, egkehimu he ebenhawen te Megbevayà. Ne henduen be te nevanhew iyan si Isaak dutun su neisip ni Abraham he kenè en ebperis he ebpatey sikandin.
Ne si Isaak daan, midtuu sikandin te penaad kandin te Megbevayà su mibpenubtuvazan din is menge anak din si Hakub wey si Esau.

Ne si Hakub, midtuu zaan sikandin te Megbevayà su zutun te meǥaan din en kebpatey, mibpenubtuvazan din is menge apù din he menge anak ni Jose ne zutun mid-usazey ziyà te tuked din ne mid-azap din is Megbevayà.

Ne si Jose zaan tenged te kedtuu zin, dutun te meǥaan din en kebpatey, netagnè din is ked-awà te langun he menge kevuwazan te lukes din he si Israyil ziyà te tanà te Ihiptu. Ne intelaan din daan dutun he ke egenat dan en, uwita zan daan is lawa zin te minatey.

Ne sikan daan is menge ǥinikanan ni Moises, ne zekelà is kedtuu zan te Megbevayà. Su minsan pa te insuǥù te hadì he edhimatayan is langun he menge vatà he maama te menge Hudiyu, wazè dan mahandek ne zutun te ked-enaka ki Moises in-eles dan sikandin seled te tetelu he vulan su wey kenà sikandin mehimetayi su neehè dan he utew mekempet sikandin he vatà.

Ne si Moises, duen daan kedtuu zin te Megbevayà, su hein meǥurang en sikandin, mid-ewaan din is meupiya he kebpekesavuk din diyà te valey te anak te hadì te Ihiptu, ne wazà sikandin mesuat he ed-umawen he anak te anak he vahi te hadì.
Su iyan din midtumù he merasey sikandin duma te menge etew he sakup te Megbevayà, kenà te kedlipey pinaaǥi te menge salà dini te kelibutan he egkehitavù te mevavè dà he timpu.

Neisip din he tuwas pa he meupiya is ked-entusa zin te kedlupiǥi kandin tenged te kedsarig din te mibpilì he hadì he ibpevulus te Megbevayà keuzemà, kenà is dekelà he ketiǥeyunan he egkekuwa zin diyà te Ihiptu. Su iyan hustu he edteǥazan din is langun he meupiya he ibeǥey kandin te Megbevayà keuzemà.

Ne tenged te kedtuu zin mid-awà sikandin dutun te Ihiptu su wazè din ikehandek is kepauk te hadì te Ihiptu. Ne minsan pa te utew mereǥen is egkengeseǥazan din wazà sikandin medlikù su henduen be te egkeehè din he eduma kandin is Megbevayà he kenà egkeahà.

Ne tenged te kedtuu zin midtuman din is Pista te Kedlevayi ne insuǥù din he ebpelisan te lengesa te nati he kerehidu is gemawan te menge valey te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil. Umba midhimu zin heini su wey kenà mehimetayi is menge penganey he anak dan te velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ibpepenhimatey te langun he menge penganey he anak te menge etew ziyà te Ihiptu.

Ne is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, pinaaǥi te kedtuu zan te Megbevayà, nekerapas dan te zaǥat he egngezanan te Meriǥà he impedsuwey te Megbevayà, ne neiring te tanà he memazà haazà is imbayè dan. Iyan, is menge tig-Ihiptu he edal-as kandan, ne nengelened dan pudu su imped-uliey te Megbevayà haazà is daǥat he impedsuwey zin.

Ne zuen daan kedtuu te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil, su hein nemekeuma zan dutun te ingkutà te inged he Hiriku ne kada andew seled te pitu he andew ed-elingkus dan dutun te kutà, ne zutun migevà te Megbevayà haazà is kutà.

Duen dutun te inged he Hiriku bahi he meremerik is ulaula zin he egngezanan ki Rahab. Ne minsan pa zutun, hein nekeuma is ed-eles-eles he menge suǥù ni Moises he edsusi te kelig-en dutun te inged, midtuu si Rahab te Megbevayà ne midtevangan din haazà is menge etew. Ne neuǥet pa zutun hein migerà is menge zuma zin he wazà medtuu te Megbevayà, wazà sikandin iragkes tenged te kedtuu zin te Megbevayà.

Kayi ku zà edtemana heini is guǥud su emun ibpelaus ku pa kenè en egkampet is timpu emun eguǥuzen ku pa keniyu is kedtuu te menge zuma pa he menge etew iring ki Gidyun, si Barak, si Samsun, si Hipti, si David, si Samuel wey is ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà.

Su pinaaǥi te kedtuu zan te Megbevayà nengezaag te zuma kandan is menge sundaru te menge zekelà he inged. Ne is menge zuma pa, metazeng is kedhedii zan te menge sakup dan, ne is duma pa, nezawat dan is impenaad kandan te Megbevayà, ne is duma, nezaag dan is ebpekekaid he erimaung ne wazè dan mekaǥat.

Ne is duma pa, tenged te kedtuu zan, wazè dan metutung te utew meinit he hapuy, ne is duma pa, wazà sikandan mehimetayi te menge kuntada zan. Ne is duma he utew meǥuyà, nehimu sikandan he utew mezesen pinaaǥi te kedtuu zan. Nehimu zan he utew mevurut te kebpekidtebek ne nengezaag dan is menge sundaru te menge kuntada zan.

Ne zuen daan menge vahi zengan he zekelà is kedtuu zan ne pinaaǥi kayi nevanhew is menge anak dan he minatey en. Ne zuen pa zaan menge tumutuu zengan te Megbevayà he midakep, ne minsan pa te midrasey sikandan taman te kebpatey, wazè dan medlekà te kedtuu zan su wey sikandan keuzemà egkevanhew zutun te tuwas pa he meupiya he untung.
Duen pa tumutuu zengan he utew mid-eled-eled ne mibuǥel, ne is duma pa ne midhiketan ne mibpirisu.

Duen daan mibpenhimetayan pinaaǥi te kedtulenga te vatu. Ne zuen pa zaan midliwazà tempeza, ne zuen pa zaan mibpenhimetayan pinaaǥi te tibas. Ne is duma pa, ne tenged te kenè dan ked-engkezi te kedtuu zan, ne iyan dà ugelingen dan is lundis te kerehidu wey kambing. Utew zan nengeayuayu. Mibpemesipelahan wey midlupiǥan sikandan te menge etew.

Is menge mezaat he etew zini te kelibutan, kenè dan dait he ebpekiduma kayi te menge utew metazeng he etew! Ne is duma kayi te menge etew he tumutuu, ne nengeewaan dan is baley zan ne ziyè dan mengetazintazin te tanà he wazà ubpai te etew, wey ziyà te menge vuntud. Ne ziyè dan mekeubpà te menge surung diyà te menge pangpang wey te menge vudsi te tanà.
Ne utew igkelipey te Megbevayà is menge etew he iring kayi, iyan, minsan pa zutun wazè dan pa zutun mezawat is penaad kandan te Megbevayà.
Su zuen meupiya pa utew he paaǥi he mid-isip te Megbevayà su mid-isip din he wey zin edtumana haazà is menge penaad din kandan ke ebpekeragkes kiw zutun te menge etew he edawat te menge penaad din.

Ne sikitew zaan, menge suled, kayi te kedtuu tew te Megbevayà, ne iring kiw te ebpelumlumbeey. Ne ǥeina te utew mezakel is menge tumutuu zengan he nekepaahà kenitew he metinumanen is Megbevayà, kinahanglan he ed-engkezan tew en is minsan hengkey he ebpekesanggen kenitew te edlumbà wey is kenà hustu he ulaula he henduen be te layun tew egkeulaula, ne ebpekezesen kiw te ebpelelaǥuy taman te ebpekeuma kiw ziyà te edungguan tew.

Edhemenan ta is kedsarig ta ki Jesus su iyan sikandin puunà te kedtuu ta ne pinaaǥi zaan kandin egkeheǥet is kedtuu ta. Mid-antus din is kedrensanga kandin dutun te krus. Ne wazè din ikeeled haazà is kedhimetayi kandin, kekenà, mid-isip din he utew zin igkelipey is egkeulaula zin emun egkeipus haazà is ked-antus din. Ne ǥuntaan mibpinuu en sikandin dutun te utew lavew he pinuuwà su ziyà te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà.

Ne si Jesus, ne utew merasey is impeseǥazan kandin tenged te kebpesipelahi kandin te menge lalung he etew. Tenged kayi isipa niw layun sikandin su wey kenà maawà is kedhamen niw te kedsarig niw, ne kenè kew edtepulen te ked-ulaula te meupiya.
Su netuenan niw he zutun te kedsukuli niw te mezaat he ulaula, wazà minsan hentei keniyu he midhimetayan tenged te kedtuu zin.

Kela ke nelipatan niw en is sambag te Megbevayà diyà te keniyu te menge anak din su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Sikew, anak ku, emun edsewayen ku sikew, purungi nu susiya is menge ulaula nu. Ne emun ebmensuwen ku sikew kinahanglan he kenà heini igkeawà te kedhamen nu kedsarig kediey.
Su is minsan hentei he mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku, edsewayen ku, ne is minsan hentei he ed-engkenen ku he anak ku, ebpenuruen ku pinaaǥi te merasey wey sikandin memansu, ke sikandin.
Umba, ke minsan hengkey is mereǥen he egkeulaula niw ǥuntaan, entusa niw, su pinaaǥi kayi ebpenuruen kew te Megbevayà su menge anak kew zin. Ne wazà anak he kenà ebmensuwen te amey zin.
Emun kenè kew ebmensuwen te Megbevayà kenè kew tutuu he menge anak din, kekenà, iring kew te ingkeǥingey zà.

Su minsan is amey ta zini te kelibutan, emun ebmensuwen ki zin ne ebpekepevayàbayè ki ǥihapun kandin, wey pe be kenà mehimu he ebpekepevayàbayè ki zaan te Amey ta ziyà te langit? Su pinaaǥi kayi egkeangken ta is untung he wazè din pidtemanan.

Is amey ta zini te kelibutan, ne seled te mevavè dà he timpu is kebmensuwa zin kenita sumalà is neisip din he meupiya. Ne, is Amey ta ziyà te langit, iyan ibmensuwa zin kenita su wey ki metevangi ne wey ki zaan mehimu he mebmetazeng he iring kandin.

Ne emun ebmensuwen ki te Megbevayà, kenè ta egkesuatan su merasey is egkeulaula ta. Iyan, emun egkepasad haazà is kebmensuwa zin kenita, ne pinaaǥi kayi nemansu ki en te Megbevayà, ne metazeng en is menge ulaula ta, ne zutun utew melinew is kebpekesavuk ta.
Umba, menge suled, heǥeta niw is kedsarig niw, ne hemeni niw en is kedtuu niw.
Peniguduwi niw te ed-ikul is hustu he ibayà su wey kenà luyahi is menge zuma niw he mehugkà is kedtuu zan, kekenà, melig-eni is kedtuu zan.
Himuwa niw is taman te egkehimu niw su wey melinew is kebpekidepitè niw te minsan hentei ne wey niw metuman is metazeng he ulaula su emun kenè ki metazeng kenè ta is Megbevayà egkeahà keuzemà.

Bantey kew su kela ke zuen duma keniyu he kenà edawat te ǥaǥew te Megbevayà. Su is iring kayi he etew, ne ebpekeiring te sagbet he ebpemeǥas te mepait he ebpekehilu. Ebpekesamuk sikandin te menge tumutuu ne mezakel he etew is ebpekeiring kandin te ed-ulaula te mezaat.

Bantey kew su wey wazà minsan sevaha keniyu he meremerik is ulaula zin wey ke ed-iniyuǥan din be is Megbevayà su iring kayi si Esau zengan. Is ketenged din te kegkekakey he anak, inliwè din te keenen he sengepegkaan dà.

Ne neuǥet dutun neisip din he meupiya ke iyan sikandin is kakey penubtuvazi te amey zin wey metuvazi sikandin te Megbevayà, iyan, wazà mehimu su kenè en egkehimu he edhewien din pa maan is inliwè din en, minsan pa te nekesineǥew sikandin is edhangyù.

Is paaǥi te ked-uvey ziyà te Megvevayà he impenurù kenitew, ne kenè en iring te paaǥi te menge kevuwazan dengan ni Israyil. Su iyan mid-uvayan dan is egkeehè dan su ziyà te vuntud he Siney he utew meregreg. Merusirem dutun tenged te kivel ne utew mevendes is keramag.
Egkezineg dan is budyung wey is mezaǥing he laǥeng te Megbevayà. Ne hein nezineg te menge etew haazà is laǥeng, midhangyù dan he med-engked haazà is egkaǥi su utew mekehandekhandek.
Su utew zan ingkehandek is migkaǥi zin he ke sikandin te, Ke zuen minsan hentei, minsan is ayam niw he ed-uvey pa kayi te vuntud, ne kinahanglan he edhimetayan pinaaǥi te kedtulenga te vatu.
Ne haazà is neehè dan dutun, ne utew mekehandekhandek ne minsan si Moises, nekaǥi zin he migkerker sikandin tenged te kegkehandek din.

Iyan, sikitew mulà, kenà iring dutun is ked-uvey tew te Megbevayà su iring te ed-uvayan tew is buntud he Siyun he zutun is inged te Megbevayà he wazè din kemetayen. Iyan haazà kes inged he Hiruselim diyà te langit he zutun nengetiǥum is egkengelipey he edliblibuwen he menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà.

Iring te mid-uvayan tew en is pengenayan he menge anak te Megbevayà he inlista is menge ngazan dan diyà te langit. Ne mid-uvayan tew en is Megbevayà he iyan edsusi te menge ulaula te tivuuk he menusiyà. Mid-uvayan tew zaan is gimukud te langun he menge etew he menge metazeng he minatey en he netapus en is kedlibriya kandan te mezaat he ulaula.

Mid-uvayan tew zaan si Jesus he iyan datù tew he midhimu te veǥu en he paaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew te Megbevayà. Pinaaǥi te lengesa zin nengepelisan is menge salè tew. Tuus is lengesa zin te ǥaǥew kenitew te Megbevayà he utew haazà meupiya kenà te lengesa ni Abel zengan su is lengesa ni Abel, iyan tuus te silut te Megbevayà .

Umba, purung kew pemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà ne kenè kew sukul. Su is menge etew zengan he wazè dan pemineǥa is Lalag te Megbevayà he insuǥù kandan ni Moises dini te kelibutan, emun wazà sikandan mekelikey te silut te Megbevayà, iyan kew pe be mekelikey te silut emun kenè niw ebpemineǥen is egkeǥiyen din te ebpuun te langit.
Dengan, migkerker is tanà tenged te utew mezaǥing he laǥeng te Megbevayà; iyan, migkaǥi zin he zuen timpu keuzemà he ed-umanan din ibpekerker, kenà iyan dà is tanà, kekenà, ragkes is langit.
Ne iyan kehuluǥan kayi te menge lalag he edhenduen te, ed-umanan din ibpekerker is: id-awè din is minsan hengkey he egkewaleng su wey iyan dà metaǥak is minsan hengkey he kenà egkewaleng.

Umba, kinahanglan he zekelà is kebpeselemati tew kandin su iyan kiw menge sakup te ǥinhedian din he kenà egkehanew te wazè din pidtemanan. Kinahanglan he ed-azap kiw kandin te paaǥi he iyan egkesuatan din. Ne edtehuzan tew sikandin duma is kegkehandek;
su is Megbevayè tew, iring te utew meinit he hapuy is kedsilut din.
Kinahanglan he peniguduwi niw is kebmahala niw ziyà te ǥehinawa niw te menge zuma niw he tumutuu.

Kenè niw lipati he kinahanglan he ibpeehè niw is gaǥew niw ziyà te menge etew he kenè niw kilala. Gelǥelawa niw ziyà te valey niw su zuen dengan menge etew he zuen menge meǥeliyug dan, iyan, wazè dan metueni he menge velinsuǥuen bes haazà te Megbevayà he ebpuun diyà te langit.

Kenè niw lipati is kedtavang niw te menge tumutuu he pirisu. Purungi niw sikandan he iring te iyan kew nepirisu. Tevangi niw zaan is menge tumutuu he ebpesipelahan he iring te iyan is keugelingen niw he lawa nepesipelahan.

Kinahanglan he tehuza niw te langun is ked-es-esawa niw. Kinahanglan he wazà minsan hentei he edselselaan din is esawa zin. Edsilutan te Megbevayà is etew he meremerik is ulaula zin wey is etew he edselselaan din is esawa zin.
Bantey kew su kela ke utew subra is suat niw te selapì. Kinahanglan he imeupiye en te ǥehinawa niw is naazen niw, su migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, Kenè ku sikiyu ed-ewaan ne kenè ku sikiyu ed-engkezan.
Umba, menge suled, dekelà is kedsarig ta te Megbevayà ne ebpekekaǥi ki te, Iyan edtavang kedì is Megbevayà, umba kenà a egkehandek te minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan te etew zà duen dini te kediey.

Kenè niw lipati is menge egalen niw te nengehuna he timpu he nekepenurù keniyu te Lalag te Megbevayà. Isipa niw is meupiya he nehimu pinaaǥi te menge ulaula zan ne iring kandan hemeni niw is kedtuu niw ki Jesu Kristu.
Su si Jesu Kristu, ne kenà egkehalin. Iyan ded sikandin gihapun dengan, wey ǥuntaan, wey keuzemà te wazè din pidtemanan.

Umba, kenè niw tuuwi is menge selakew he tuluuwen he kenà iyan kes tutuu he impenurù keniyu. Iyan hustu he ibmelig-en te kedtuu tew is kedtevangi kenitew te Megbevayà, ne kenà iyan is kedlikayi te menge egkeenen he indawey te kesuǥuan su wazà heini ikezeyzey te menge etew he ebantey kayi.
Sikitew is menge tumutuu ki Kristu, duen tew en ingkepemuhat, iyan, haazà is menge memumuhat he Hudiyu he ziyà ebpemuhat te simbahan he ziyà te Hiruselim, wazè dan ketenged te kegkaan kayi.

Netuenan niw he emun duen ibpemuhat te menge Hudiyu su ebpelisan dan is menge salè dan, ne is lengesa te ibpemuhat, ed-uwiten te lavew he memumuhat diyà te seled te utew mahal he ruǥu zutun te simbahan, iyan, is lawa te ibpemuhat ne ed-uwiten dan pehendiyà te ǥawas te inged ne zutun dan edtutunga.
Iring din ded daan is neulaula ki Jesus su midhimetayan sikandin diyà te ǥawas te inged ne nehimu is lengesa zin he ibpalis te menge salè tew te menusiyà.

Umba, menge suled, egawas kiw zaan te inged ne edhendiyè kiw en te kandin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kenè tew en edseriǥan is kedtumana te menge tuluuwen te menge Hudiyu, kekenà, iyan dà edseriǥan tew si Jesus . Edsundanan tew sikandin ne kenè tew igkehandek is ked-entusa tew te kedsudia kenitew tenged te kedtuu tew kandin.
Su kenà ebpedayun is kebpekeubpè tew kayi te kelibutan, kekenà, ebperetengen tew pa is tutuu he inged tew keuzemà he iyan ed-ubpaan tew te wazè din pidtemanan.
Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he pinaaǥi ki Jesus he memumuhat tew, iyan tew layun ibpemuhat diyà te Megbevayà is kedeliǥa tew kandin. Layun tew ibpaahà diyà te Megbevayà is kebpeselamati tew kandin.
Kenè niw lipati is kebpurung niw te minsan hentei he zuma niw, ne mebpetebtevangè kew su is ulaula he iring kayi, ne iring te pemuhat he egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Tumana niw is suǥù te menge egalen niw te menge tumutuu ne ipeehè niw is kedtehuza niw kandan su iyan sikandan ed-elima keniyu te edtuu, ne zuen timpu keuzemà he edsusiyen te Megbevayà ke metinumanen dan be is ed-elima keniyu. Emun ebpemineǥen niw is suǥù dan, utew ibmeupiya te ǥehinawa zan is baal zan. Ne emun kenè kew ebpemineg, utew mereǥen is baal zan ne egkehimu zaan heini he idlised niw.
Menge suled, iampù key layun keniyu. Netuenan dey he wazà igkesawey te menge ulaula zey su iyan dà egkesuatan dey he meveeli zey is layun meupiya.
Ne iampù a zaan keniyu wey a meǥaan ipeulì te Megbevayà diyan te keniyu.

Is Megbevayà, mibanhew zin is Nengazen tew he si Jesus. Midtiǥis is lengesa zin he iyan tuus te veǥu wey wazà pidtemanan he paaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew te Megbevayà. Ne tenged dutun nehimu si Jesus he mekeǥeǥehem he ed-elima kenitew te menge kerehidu zin.

Berakat he pinaaǥi ki Jesu Kristu, is Megbevayà he ebeǥey te kelinew, beǥayi kew zin te minsan hengkey he tavang wey niw tumana is egkesuatan din. Berakat daan he himuwa kiw zin he menge etew he utew zin egkesuati is menge ulaula. Edeliǥen tew si Jesu Kristu te wazà pidtemanan.
Menge suled, edhengyuan ku sikiyu he entusa niw is kebpemineg kayi te langun he menge lalag ku keniyu su kenà utew meluǥayad heini is insurat ku.
Iyan daan tudtul ku keniyu is: impeǥawas en te pirisuwan is suled tew he si Timoteo. Emun petuluy ebpekeuma sikandin dini edumahan ku ke ebpekehendiyan a.
Ipengemusta a keniyu te langun he menge egalen niw wey te langun he menge sakup te Megbevayà diyan. Is menge suled tew zini te Italya, ne ebpengemusta zaan sikandan keniyu.
Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew is langun te Megbevayà.
Iyan a si Santiago is teǥisurat kayi. Suluǥuen a te Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Kemusta kew is langun he menge ǥaked te Megbevayà he nekedsusuwey zini te tungkup te kelibutan.
Menge suled, mebmelipayen kew emun merasey is egkeulaula niw tenged te idtuǥut te Megbevayà he zuen ebarangbarang he penggezam te kedtuu niw kandin.
Su nesavut niw en he emun egkeantus niw is penggezam, egkeviǥeran is ked-antus niw.
Ne utew zaan kinahanglan he kenà mehugkà is kebpurung niw ked-antus su emun ebpurung ki ed-antus te merasey egkehimu ki he metau wey wazà igkesewayi kenita wey wazà kurang te kedtuu ta te Megbevayà.

Ne ke zuen minsan hentei keniyu he egkereǥenan su kenè din egketuenan ke hengkey is meupiya he paaǥi, mebuyù te ketau ziyà te Megbevayà, ne ebeǥayan sikandin su metulanged sikandin ne kenè ki zin edewayen ke ebuyù ki.

Ne emun ebuyù kew te ketau ziyà te kandin kinahanglan he edtuu kew he egkezawat niw te wazà duwazuwa. Su is etew he eduwazuwa, egkehalinhalin layun is isip din. Iring sikandin te vaǥel ziyà te zaǥat he minsan hendei zà duen hiyupa te keramag.
Is etew he iring kayi, kinahanglan he kenè din isipa he ibeǥey kandin te Megbevayà is ebuyuen din
su zuwazuwa is ed-isipen din; kenè din edseriǥan is Megbevayà, ne kenà daan egkeseriǥan is minsan hengkey he ulaula zin.
Kinahanglan he mebmelipayen is egkeayuayu he tumutuu emun ibpelavew sikandin te Megbevayà.
Kinahanglan he mebmelipayen daan is sepian he tumutuu emun ibpekevavà sikandin te Megbevayà; su is sepian, egkeawà daan sikandin keuzemà iring te kevukad te sagbet.

Edsilaan is sagbet te andew he utew meinit, ne egkelay-ub, ne egkeǥangu is kevukad din, ne kenè en maan dutun meupiya he ed-ahaan. Ne iring din ded daan is sepian he etew su egketik-ew sikandin ebpatey ne egkeengkezan din is kebpen-ehè din te ketiǥeyunan.

Utew zeyzey is etew he ebpurung ed-antus te penggezam kandin su emun egkeahà he hustu is kedtuu zin, ebeǥayan sikandin te untung he wazà pidtemanan he iyan impenaad te Megbevayà diyà te langun he ebmahalen dan sikandin diyà te ǥehinawa zan.
Emun egkepenulayan is minsan hentei kenitew, kenè tew ed-isipen he iyan nekepenuley kenitew is Megbevayà, su kenà egkepenulayan is Megbevayà, ne kenè din daan ebpenulayen is minsan hentei.
Egkepenulayan is etew emun ed-eǥaken sikandin te mezaat he kebayè din.
Ne emun edtumanen din is suat din, ebpekesalà sikandin. Ne iyan dutun pangkus te etew ke ebpeniguduwan din is ked-ulaula te mezaat is kemetayen.
Menge minahal ku he suled, kenè niw tuuwi is kenà tutuu. Kenà ebpenuley is Megbevayà.

Is minsan hengkey he ibeǥey kenitew he meupiya he wazè din kurang, ne ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà he iyan nenlimbag te langun he edsiǥa ziyà te langit. Egkengehalinhalin heini, iyan, is Megbevayà, kenà mulà sikandin edhalin, ne kenà egkehalin te minsan hengkey.
Tenged te iyan egkesuatan din midhimu kiw zin he menge anak din pinaaǥi te kebpesevuta zin kenitew te tutuu he tuluuwen. Egkesuatan din he iyan kiw edhimuwen din he lavew te langun he menge linimbag.

Kenè niw lipati, menge minahal ku he suled, he is minsan hentei kenitew, kinahanglan he layun andam he ebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà ne kenè ta ipetuwas is kenita zà he lalag ne kenè ki zaan melemu he egkepauk.
Su emun egkepauk ki kenè ta zutun egketuman is egkesuatan te Megbevayà.
Engkezi niw en is minsan hengkey he meremerik he ulaula wey is kelelalung. Pesakup kew te Megbevayà; hemeni niw is lalag din he impesavut en keniyu su iyan ebpekelibri keniyu te silut.
Kinahanglan he edtumanen niw is Lalag te Megbevayà. Emun ebpemineǥen niw zà is lalag din ne kenè niw edtumanen, henduen be te edterteruen niw is gehinawa niw.
Su ke zuen minsan hentei he taman dà te kebpemineg te Lalag te Megbevayà, iyan, kenè din edtumanen, iring sikandin te etew he ed-alung diyà te peǥelungan.
Egkeehè din is dagwey zin, iyan, meǥaan dà. Ne egkelipatan din dutun ke hengkey is neehè din.

Iyan, ke zuen etew he ebpurungan din ed-istudyuwi is kesuǥuan he wazè din kurang he iyan ebpekelibri kenitew, ne kenè din edlipatan, kekenà, edtumanen din, edtuvazan te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan din.
Emun iyan isip te etew is hustu is ked-ezapa zin te Megbevayà, iyan, kenè din edtengkaan is kegkaǥikaǥi zin, wazà pulus te ked-azap din su neterteruan din dà is gehinawa zin.
