Is etew he hustu is ked-azap din te Megbevayà, edlikayan din is menge mezaat he ulaula he iyan ed-ul-ulahan te menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada te Megbevayà. Meupiya mulà is ulaula zin. Ebpurungan din is menge edlised he menge ilu he vatà wey menge valu he vahi. Iyan heini egkesuatan te Amey tew he Megbevayà he paaǥi te ked-ezapa tew kandin.
Menge suled, geina te menge tumutuu ki ki Jesu Kristu, is mekeǥeǥehem he Nengazen, kinahanglan he pedrerepenga ta is kedtehuza ta te langun he menge etew.
Penenglitan duen edseled diyà te simbahan niw he sepian he edsisising te vulawan ne utew mahal is bisti zin. Ne zuen daan edtampu he egkeayuayu ne nenggeremisey is kandin he bisti.

Ne edtehuzan niw heeyan is meupiya is bisti zin ne ke sikiyu te, Kayi ka te meupiya he vangkù. Iyan, haazà mulà is egkeayuayu, egkeǥiyan niw zà te, Kayi ka hitindeg, wey ke, Dini ka pinuu te saag uvey te kedì he vangkù.
Kenè be mezaat heeyan he ulaula su kenè niw ebpedrerepengen is kedtahud niw te menge zuma niw he tumutuu su kunaan niw ke hustu ke ebmahalen ta is sepian ne kenà is egkeayuayu.

Pemineǥa niw, menge minahal ku he suled, is ibpesavut ku keniyu. Duen mibpilì te Megbevayà he egkengeayuayu. Ne minsan deisek is ketiǥeyunan dan midhimu te Megbevayà he zekelà mulà is kedsarig dan kandin ne iyan sikandan edtuvazan din pinaaǥi te kedhadì din sumalà is penaad din diyà te langun he ebmahalen dan sikandin diyà te ǥehinawa zan.
Iyan, sikiyu mulà, wazè niw kedtahud dutun te egkengeayuayu. Hentei is ebpenlupig keniyu? Iyan is menge sepian. Ne hentei is edsumbung keniyu ziyà te etuvangan te huwis?
Hentei is edsumpalit te mahal he ngazan ni Jesus he iyan teǥiǥaked kenitew? Iyan is menge sepian.

Utew meupiya is ed-ul-ulahan niw emun edtumanen niw is lavew he suǥù te Nengazen he egkevasa niw ziyà te insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te, Kinahanglan he mahala nu is duma nu; isipa nu sikandin he iring te kenikew en he ǥehinawa.
Iyan, emun duen niw ibpelavi, ebpekesalè kew. Ne sumalà is impenurù dutun te kesuǥuan te Megbevayà he imbilinbilin ni Moises, mesinupaken kew.
Su minsan ke sevaha zà duen te menge suǥù te kesuǥuan is egkesupak te etew, ed-isipen gihapun te Megbevayà he mesinupaken sikandin he iring te nesupak din is langun he menge suǥù.

Su is migkaǥi te, Kenè nu selselai is esawa nu, ne iyan daan migkaǥi te, Kenè ka pemumunù. Ne minsan wazè nu selselai is esawa nu, ke nekevunù ka nesupak nu en is tivuuk he kesuǥuan su sebsevaha zà is teǥisuǥù dutun te langun he menge suǥù.

Duen selakew en he kesuǥuan he ebpekelibri kenita wey ki kenà mekesalà ne iyan heini kesuǥuan he idhukum kenita keuzemà te Megbevayà. Ne tenged kayi kinahanglan he ebpurungan ta is menge lalag ta wey ulaula ta su wey kenè ta mesupak haazà is kesuǥuan.
Su is Megbevayà, kenè din keuzemà egkehizuwan is etew he wazè din hizu te zuma zin. Iyan, is etew mulà he hihizuwen, wazà kinahanglan he egkehandek sikandin su kenà sikandin edsilutan te Megbevayà.

Menge suled, wazà pulus te kedtuu te minsan hentei ziyà te Megbevayà emun kenà egketuusan is kedtuu zin pinaaǥi te menge ulaula he meupiya. Is kedtuu he iring dutun, ne kenà tutuu, ne kenà din igkelibri te silut.
Su penenglitan duen menge suled tew he tumutuu ne edlised sikandan tenged te wazè dan igkekuwa te bisti wey egkekaan.
Ne emun egkeǥiyan tew zà sikandan te, Ehè kew zà. Berakat he mekekuwa kew te egkeenen niw wey igkebisti niw, iyan, kenè tew sikandan edtevangan, wazà pulus te migkaǥi tew.
Iring din ded daan is etew he egkeǥiyen din he edtuu sikandin, iyan, kenà meupiya is menge ulaula zin. Egkesavut ta zutun he kenè bes tutuu is kedtuu zin.

Ne ke zuen egkaǥi te, Edtuu zà is sevaha te Megbevayà wey melibri sikandin te silut ne is duma, ne ed-ulaula te meupiya wey sikandin melibri, ne pudu hustu. Iyan, iyan tavak ku zutun te zezuwa is: kinahanglan he edtuu ki, iyan, kenà egkehimu he tutuu is kedtuu ta te Megbevayà ke kenà egketuusan haazà is kedtuu ta pinaaǥi te menge ulaula ta he meupiya. Kinahanglan he ibpeehè ta is kedtuu ta pinaaǥi te menge ulaula ta.

Emun midtuu ki he sebsevaha zà is Megbevayà utew meupiya heeyan, iyan, kenè pa hustu su minsan is menge mezaat he mulin-ulin, midtuu zan daan te iring keniyan, iyan, egkerkeren dan te kegkehandek su netuenan dan he edsilutan sikandan keuzemà.
Utew kenà metau he ed-isip is etew he iring dutun. Ebpenuruen ku sikiyu he is kedtuu ta, emun kenà egketuusan pinaaǥi te menge ulaula ta he meupiya, ne kenà ebpekelibri kenita te silut.

Hengkey is paaǥi he impetimaan te kepuun tew he si Abraham he iyan impeketezenga kandin te Megbevayà? Iyan is menge ulaula zin dutun te kedtumana zin te insuǥù kandin te Megbevayà te kebpemuhata zin pezem te anak din he si Isaak.
Netuenan ta he pinaaǥi te kedtuu zin, midtuman din is insuǥù kandin ne pinaaǥi zaan te kedtumana zin kayi, neheǥet is kedtuu zin te Megbevayà.

Ne tenged dutun egkesavut ta he utew tutuu sikan is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Midtuu si Abraham te Megbevayà, ne tenged dutun te kedtuu zin, mid-isip sikandin te Megbevayà he metazeng. Ne migeraran sikandin he Emiǥu te Megbevayà.
Ne tenged dutun egkesavut ta he ed-isipen ki he metazeng te Megbevayà ke zuen menge ulaula ta he meupiya he tuus te kedtuu ta ne kenà tenged te kedtuu zà he wazè din tuus.

Ne iring dutun daan is kedtuu ni Rahab, is bahi zengan he mezaat is dengeg din. Umba mid-isip sikandin he metazeng te Megbevayà su zuen meupiya he mid-ulaula zin su impeseled din te valey zin is menge suǥù ni Josue, ne midtevangan din sikandan wey zan mekepelaǥuy pinaaǥi te selakew en he ibayà.

Is lawa te etew, emun wazè din en gehinawa, egketuusan ta he minatey en ne wazè din en pulus. Ne iring din ded daan is kedtuu te minsan hentei su emun kenè egkezumahan haazà is kedtuu te menge ulaula he meupiya, wazà daan pulus dutun te kedtuu zin.
Menge suled, deyzey ke kenà mezakel keniyu is egkesuat he ebpenurù, su sikami is ebpenurù, utew meheǥet keuzemà is kedsusiya kenami te Megbevayà, kenà te ebpepenurù kenami.

Sikitew is menusiyà, layun kiw egkesayep te mezakel he paaǥi. Ne ke zuen etew he kenà egkesayep pinaaǥi te kegkaǥi zin, wazè en igkesewayi kandin. Egkeveyveyaan din is tivuuk he lawa zin wey kenà mekeulaula te mezaat.
Egkekangan ta is kudà su wey ta meveyveyai ke hendei ta ibpepevayà.
Ne minsan is utew zekelà he barku he egkeuwit te mevendes he keramag, egketandang ta is ibayè din pinaaǥi te utew zeisek he pengawid din.

Ne iring din ded daan is dilà te etew su minsan pa te utew zeisey egkeǥamit gihapun te kedentala te zekelà he ibpezalig. Ne iring daan dutun is ketelunan su minsan pa te utew meluag egkevinsulan gihapun te zeisek he hapuy.

Ne iring daan te hapuy is dilà te etew su ebpekezezaat ne iyan puunà te minsan hengkey he mezaat he ulaula. Pinaaǥi te zilà egkeeneb te mezaat is tivuuk he isip ta wey ǥehinawa ta. Iyan ebpekerasey kenita te tivuuk he untung ta; iring te hapuy he ziyà ebpuun te Impirnu.
Netuenan ta he egkeveyveyaan te etew is minsan hengkey he linimbag su zuen nelayam he menge langgam, menge tagbis, menge pait, wey minsan menge uled.
Iyan, wazè pa etew he nekevayàbayà te zilè din. Utew lalung is dilè ta ne kenà egkeeǥen. Iring te hilu su ebpekezezaat.
Egemiten ta is dilè ta emun ebpeselematan ta is Amey tew he Nengazen, ne nasì ta zaan egemita ke ebpenrewakan ta is menge zuma ta he midlimbag te Megbevayà he iring te zagwey zin.
Utew heini igkeinuinu su sebsevaha zà is puunà te kedrawak wey kebpeselamat! Menge suled, kenà heini meupiya.
Emun penenglitan duen kalut, kenà egkehimu he zutun ebpuun is wahig he meupiya wey is wahig he mepait.

Menge suled, emun ebeǥas is kayu he igira kenà egkehimu he ulivu is beǥas din. Ne emun ebeǥas is gawed he paras kenà egkehimu he igira is beǥas din. Ke zuen kalut he zutun ebpuun is wahig he mepait, kenà egkehimu he zutun ebpuun is wahig he kenà mepait.

Is minsan hentei keniyu he metau wey zekelà is selevutan, ipeehè din pinaaǥi te meupiya he ulaula zin. Kinahanglan he kenà sikandin mepelevawen dutun te kebpaahaa zin te ketau zin pinaaǥi te menge meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan din.
Iyan, emun egkesina sikandin wey mepelevawen, kinahanglan he kenè din izantal is ketau zin wey is meupiya he ulaula zin su tarù is ketau he iring dutun ne ebpekesupak te tutuu he tuluuwen.
Kenà haazà sikan is ketau he ebpuun te Megbevayà, kekenà, dini zà ebpuun te kelibutan. Kenà iyan is ketau he ibeǥey te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, kekenà, ebpuun te mezaat he mulin-ulin.
Ke zuen menge etew he egkesina wey mepelevawen, utew zan egkesemuki ne ed-ul-ulahan dan is minsan hengkey he mezaat.

Is etew he ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà is ketau zin, wazà igkesewayi kandin. Melinew is kedepitè din te zuma he etew, ebpurungan din is menge zuma zin; kenà sikandin mevurut, kekenà, mepezumdumahan. Hihizuwen wey metulanged sikandin; wazè din ibpelavi he minsan hentei ne kenà uvag dà is kedtuu zin.
Iring te venì is kelinew. Ibpemula te menge menhuhusey ne iyan egkeraǥun dutun is metazeng he menge ulaula.
Hengkey is puunà te menge kesevaan wey tebek diyan te keniyu? Iyan is menge mezaat he kebayè niw he ebpekigkuntada te meupiya he ulaula.

Duen egkesuatan niw he kenè niw egkekuwa ne tenged dutun ebpekeisip kew te kebpemumunù. Duen egkeimahan niw, iyan, kenè niw egkeangken ne tenged dutun ebpekidsavè kew wey ebpekidtebek kew. Umba kenè niw egkekuwa is egkesuatan niw su kenè niw ebuyuen diyà te Megbevayà.
Ne minsan ke ebuyuen niw ziyà te kandin, kenè din ibeǥey su mezaat is tuyù niw te kebuyua niw kayi. Iyan ketezengan te kebuyù niw is wey niw metuman is mezaat he kebayè niw.

Kenè kew metinumanen te pesarig niw ziyà te Megbevayà. Wazè niw ves metueni he emun iyan niw egkesuatan is mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan te menge kuntada te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan, ne menge kuntada kew zaan te Megbevayà. Is minsan hentei he iyan egkesuatan din is mezaat he ulaula zini te kelibutan, mibpekigkuntada sikandin te Megbevayà.
Kenè niw isipa he kenà tutuu sikan is insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Is gehinawa he imbeǥey kenita te Megbevayà, nehimu he mezesen is kegkesuati zin te mezaat he ulaula,

iyan, mezesen pa utew is tavang kenita te Megbevayà. Ne tenged dutun duen insurat he lalag din he edhenduen te, Egkuntedahan te Megbevayà is mepelevawen, iyan, edtevangan din mulà is ebpesakup kandin.
Ne tenged dutun, pesakup kew te Megbevayà. Sukuli niw si Setanas ne ebpelaǥuy keniyu.

Aput kew ziyà te Megbevayà ne ed-uvayan kew zin. Sikiyu is mekesesalà, engkezi niw is menge ulaula niw he mezaat. Sikiyu is uvag dà is kedtuu zan, pelumpiyuwi niw te Megbevayà is isip niw wey ǥehinawa niw.
Meseeng kew tenged te menge ulaula niw he mezaat; medluǥib kew wey medsineǥew kew; kenè kew engit, kekenà, erang kew; kenè kew medlipey, kekenà, mebmezaat is gehinawa niw.
Pesakup kew te Megbevayà, ne ibpelavew kew zin.

Menge suled, kenè kew mebpesudsudiey wey mebpesewsewayà su is edsudì wey edsawey te zuma zin he tumutuu, ne iring te edsudien din wey edsewayen din is lavew he suǥù. Ne emun edsewayen ta haazà is suǥù, kenè ta edtumanen, kekenà, edsumpeliten ta.

Sebsevaha zà is ebpuunan te kesuǥuan he iyan is Megbevayà ne sebsevaha zà daan is duen din keǥehem te kedhukum te menge ulaula te menusiyà ne iyan ded daan is Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin edsilut ne iyan daan ebpekelibri te silut. Iyan, sikita mulà, wazè ta keǥehem te kedhukum te minsan hentei.
Pemineg kew, sikiyu is egkaǥi te, Guntaan ne emun kenà ne keeselem, edhendiyè ki te sevaha he inged. Ne zutun ki ebpetiǥayun taman te sengetuig wey ki mekemanggad.
Turebung kew su minsan is keeselem dà he hitavù, kenè ta egketuenan. Is untung ta zini te kelibutan, ne utew mevavà ne iring te menipis he ǥapun he egketik-ew egkeahà ne egketik-ew zaan egkeawà.
Meupiya pa ke egkaǥi ki te, Emun idtuǥut kenita te Nengazen he kenè ki pa ebpatey, ebeelan ta is iring dutun.
Iyan, sikiyu mulà, memepedeliǥen su idantal niw is ed-ul-ulahan niw, ne mezaat is iring dutun.
Tentenuzi niw he ke netuenan te minsan hentei kenitew ke hengkey is meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan ne kenè din ed-ul-ulahan, nekesalà sikandin diyà te Megbevayà.
Pemineg kew zaan, sikiyu is sepian. Sineǥew kew; erang kew, su utew merasey is egkeulaula niw keuzemà.
Egkeredak en is menge ketiǥeyunan niw. Egketketen te ipes is manggad niw.

Midtangis is menge selapì niw wey vulawan su wazè niw ǥemita he idtavang. Ne is tangis, iyan tuus te keleleǥed niw ne tenged dutun utew mepait is silut keniyu keuzemà te andew te kedlimasa te menusiyà; su midtipiǥan niw is dekelà he kewasa kayi te menge ketepusan he andew.

Is selapì he wazè niw isuhul te edterebahu ziyà te menge tanè niw, ne iyan idsumbunga zan keniyu ziyà te Megbevayà. Is sumbung keniyu te nemenlegtey ziyà te menge luti niw, nezineg en te utew mekeǥeǥehem he Nengazen.
Dini te kelibutan utew meupiya is kebpekesavuk niw ne edlipey kew layun, iyan, iring kew ǥuntaan te nati he ibpelambù he edlepaan su kunaan niw ke kenè kew egkesaut te andew te kedsilut.
Su impesilutan niw wey mibunù niw is menge metazeng he etew, minsan pa te wazè dan medsukul keniyu.

Ne sikiyu is menge zuma ku he tumutuu, kinahanglan he meinentusen kew taman te kedlikù te Nengazen. Su is ebasuk, ebpekeantus te kedtaǥad din taman te edsebpet en is impemula zin diyà te tanè din. Edteǥazan din is uzan he ebpetuvù te pinemula zin wey is ebpeketesan te pinemula zin.
Ne sikitew zaan, kinahanglan he ed-entusen tew is kebpeketaǥad tew. Edheǥeten tew is kedsarig tew su meǥaan en is andew te kedlikù te Nengazen.
Kenè kew, menge suled, meked-eepesà su wey kenè kew mesiluti te Megbevayà. Meǥaan en ebpekeuma is edsusi te menge ulaula ta; iring te ziyè en te ǥemawan.
Menge suled, ed-iringan ta is kebmeinentusen te menge ebpeneuven dengan te Megbevayà su zutun te kebpesevuta zan te Lalag te Nengazen nekeantus dan te kemeresayan.

Netuenan ta he utew sikandan deyzey su nekeantus dan te merasey. Netuenan niw en is kebmeinentusen dengan ni Hob wey is kedtuvazi kandin te Megbevayà dutun te nepasad en is penggezam kandin. Hihizuwen wey veliǥeǥawen is Nengazen.

Menge suled, ebeleuzan ku sikiyu he emun duen ibpesarig niw kenè niw heǥeta pinaaǥi te kebpengulivet wey kedsesapà. Kenè kew medsesapà pinaaǥi te kegemita niw te minsan hengkey ziyà te langit wey zini te tanà te kebenara niw te menge lalag niw. Uya zà wey wazà is gemita niw su wey kenè kew mesiluti te Megbevayà.
Ke zuen minsan hentei keniyu he egkeseeng, kinahanglan he med-ampù. Ke zuen egkelipey, megkanta sikandin te kedalig te Megbevayà.
Ke zuen egkezeruwan, kinahanglan he tewaǥa zin is menge ebmeǥurangen te menge tumutuu wey zan ikeampù wey meitisi sikandin te lana he ebpengumawen dan is ngazan te Nengazen.
Is ked-ampù dan, emun hustu is kedsarig dan te Megbevayà, ne iyan igkeulii te egkezeruwan su ebewian sikandin te Nengazen, ne egkepesaylu sikandin te menge salè din.
Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he petudtudtulè kew te menge salè niw su wey iampù te kada sevaha is duma zin ne wey meulii is egkengezeruwan. Utew mekeǥeǥehem is ked-ampù te metazeng he etew.
Si Elias dengan, etew zà sikandin he iring kenitew. Ne minsan pa zutun mezesen is ked-ampù din he kenà med-uzan ne wazà iyan mekeuzan taman te tetelu he tuig wey tengà.
Ne mid-ampù en maan, ne mid-uzan te mereǥes ne human meketuvù is menge pinemula.
Menge suled, ke zuen sevaha keniyu he egkesuwey zin wey egkelipatan din is tutuu he tuluuwen ne zuen ebpeketavang kandin wey mekelikù,
tentenuzi niw he is neketavang kandin, nehimu en he paaǥi wey melibri sikandin te silut. Ne pinaaǥi zutun egkepesaylu is utew mezakel he menge salà dutun he etew.

Iyan a si Pedro is teǥisurat kayi. Epustul a ni Jesu Kristu, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, suǥù din . Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu is nengaaram te Megbevayà he nemekedsuwey ziyà te ǥawas te inged niw. Is duma keniyu, ne ziyà mekepelaǥuy te prubinsya he Puntu, is duma, ne ziyà te menge prubinsya he Gelasya wey Kepedusya, wey Asya, wey Bitinya.

Nengaaram kew te Megbevayà he Amey tew sumalà is kebayè din dengan he iyan is: edhimuwen kew zin he metazeng pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin wey kew mehimu he menge sakup ni Jesu Kristu ne wey kew zaan mepesaylu tenged te kebpelisi keniyu te lengesa ni Jesus. Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew zin wey mebmelinawen kew utew.

Utew zekelà is kebpeselemati tew te Megbevayà he iyan Amey te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Su tenged te zekelà is hizu zin kenitew, mibeǥayan kiw zin te veǥu en he untung. Ne ǥuntaan ebpekeperateng kiw he egkevanhew kiw keuzemà su mibanhew zin si Jesu Kristu.
Ne elin daan egkeperateng tew is utew meupiya he idtuvad din kenitew. Inteǥana zin en heini ziyà te langit ne zutun kenà egkeredak, kenà egkezeetan, ne kenà daan egkehanew.
Kenitew en haazà is inteǥana zin. Tenged te nekesarig kiw kandin, nelig-enan kiw te ǥehem te Megbevayà te kemulu kiw pa edtaǥad te kedtulusa zin kenitew keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu.
Ne tenged dutun ebpekelipey kew en minsan pa te egkeseeng kew zè pa ǥuntaan tenged te mezakel he menge kemeresayan he egkeantus niw.

Is kedtuu niw, ne iring te vulawan su egezaman is bulawan pinaaǥi te hapuy su wey ikepaahà ke tutuu ve. Umba idtuǥut te Megbevayà he mekeantus kew te merasey su wey pinaaǥi te kemeresayan meǥezami is kedtuu niw ke tutuu ve wey ke kenà. Mahal pa is kedtuu niw kenà is bulawan su melemu egkezeeti is bulawan. Ne emun tutuu is kedtuu niw, edeliǥen kew, ebentuǥen kew, wey edtehuzen kew keuzemà emun ibpeǥawaǥawa en si Jesu Kristu.
Utew mahal sikandin diyan te ǥehinawa niw minsan wazè niw pa maahà. Ne edsarig kew kandin minsan pa te kenè niw en sikandin egkeahà guntaan. Ne utew man dekelà is kelipey niw he kenà igkeseysey
su egkezawat niw en guntaan is kedlibriya keniyu te silut he iyan ebperetengan niw tenged te midtuu kew kandin.
Is ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà, mibpurungan dan istudyuwi is kedlibriya zin kenita te silut wey netagnè dan heini is kedtuvazi zin kenita.

Mid-istudyuwan dan ke keenu wey ke egkemenumenu is kegketuman kayi, su in-ulin heini kandan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he ebpuun diyà te ki Kristu. Impesavut din kandan he zuen menge kemeresayan he egkeantus ni Kristu zini te kelibutan ne emun egketapus haazà edhimuwen sikandin he utew lavew.

Impezayag kandan te Megbevayà he kenà kandan he ibmeupiya haazà is netagnè dan dutun, kekenà, kenitew ǥuntaan. Ne ǥuntaan impesavut en keniyu is tutuu mehitenged dutun te netagnè dan. Duen menge etew he midsuǥù te Megbevayà su wey zan metudtul keniyu is Meupiya he Tudtulanen. Mid-ulinan sikandan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he midsuǥù te Megbevayà. Ne heini is impesavut dan keniyu, minsan is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà ziyà te langit, egkesuatan dan he mesavut dan heini.

Ne ǥeina te iyan haazà, kinahanglan he ed-andam ki wey ki mekepurung mekeisip-isip su wey ta layun mepurungi is kedsunud ta te Nengazen. Kinahanglan he iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa ta is kebperateng ta te utew meupiya he ibeǥey te Megbevayà kenita keuzemà dutun te andew te kebpeǥawaǥawa ni Jesu Kristu.

Geina te menge anak ki te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he edtumanen ta is menge suǥù din; kenè ta iyan ebpezumdumahan is mezaat he kebayè ta he edtumanen ta layun dengan hein wazè te pa metueni is tutuu he tuluuwen.
Ne ǥuntaan kinahanglan he wazà igkesewayi te menge ulaula tew iring te wazà igkesewayi te menge ulaula te Megbevayà he iyan nengelintau wey kiw meketuu.
Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Kinahanglan he wazà igkesewayi te menge ulaula niw su wazà igkesewayi te kedì he menge ulaula.

Ne ǥeina te mibpetavang ki te Amey ta he Megbevayà kinahanglan he utew meheǥet is kedtehuza ta kandin te zini ki pa ed-ubpà te kelibutan. Iyan sikandin edsusi te menge ulaula te menusiyà sumalà is mid-ulaula te kada sevaha ne wazè din ibpelavi he minsan hentei.

Netuenan ta he utew mahal is imbelukas din kenita. Su nengeuripen ki zengan te menge ulaula he wazà pulus he imbilinbilin kenita te menge kepuun ta. Sikan is imbelukas din kenita, ne kenà iring te selapì wey vulawan he egkeawà is bali zin.
Iyan imbelukas din si Kristu he impelengesa he utew mevali. Iring sikandin te nati he kerehidu he wazà igkesawey zuen he impemuhat.
Te wazè pa limbaǥa is kelibutan, daan en si Kristu he intezù te Megbevayà wey mehimu he Menluluwas tew. Ne kayi te timpu ǥuntaan, impezayag sikandin wey kiw mevelukasi.

Pinaaǥi kandin neketuu kiw te Megbevayà. Mibanhew sikandin te Megbevayà ne midhimu zin sikandin he utew lavew. Ne tenged kayi iyan edseriǥan tew ǥuntaan is Megbevayà ne ebpekeperateng kiw he edhimuwen kiw zin daan he utew lavew.

Ne ǥeina te nemeketuu kew en te tutuu he tuluuwen nengelumpiyuwan kew en te mezaat he ulaula ne kenà tarù is kebmahala niw te menge zuma niw he tumutuu. Minsan pa zutun, heǥeta niw pa is kebmahala niw ziyan te ǥehinawa niw te kada sevaha te menge zuma niw.
Su mid-umanan ki limbaǥa te Megbevayà ne veǥu ki en maan he etew pinaaǥi te wazà pidtemanan he Lalag te Megbevayà he iyan ebpekeveǥey te untung.

Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Is menusiyà, geina te mevavè dà utew is untung din, iring sikandin te sagbet. Su is kempet din, ne iring te kevukad te sagbet. Meǥaan egkeǥangu is sagbet, ne egkengeulug is kevukazan din.
Iyan, is Lalag te Megbevayà, kenà mulà egkehanew te wazà pidtemanan. Ne is Lalag te Megbevayà, ne iyan impesavut keniyu
Ne ǥeina te veǥu ki en he etew, ed-iniyuǥan te en is minsan hengkey he kebpesipala wey is kedtarùtarù. Kinahanglan he kenà tarù is kedsundan ta te Megbevayà; kenè ki egkesina ne kenè ki ebpemenulà.

Ed-iring ki zuen te vatà he kemulu pa edsusu he layun egkesuat te ǥatas. Kinahanglan he layun ki ed-inum te ǥatas he iyan is waǥas he Lalag te Megbevayà su wey layun mebmezesen is kedtuu ta taman te timpu keuzemà he edtulusen ki te Megbevayà.
Su neǥezaman niw en he utew veliǥeǥawen keniyu is Nengazen tew.

Pevayàbayè kew en te Nengazen tew he si Jesus he iyan ebeǥey te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Iring sikandin te vatu he pengawid te valey he kenà edewaten te menge pandey. Wazà sikandin dewata te menge etew, iyan, iyan sikandin mibpilì te Megbevayà su utew sikandin mahal.

Ne sikitew zaan is mibeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan, ebpevayàbayè kiw kandin wey kiw zaan mehimu he iring te menge vatu he pengawid te valey he zutun ed-ezapa is Megbevayà. Ne zutun te valey zin edhimuwen kiw zin en he menge memumuhat he mibpilì din. Ne zutun, pinaaǥi te kedtavang ni Jesu Kristu, ebpekepemuhat kiw ne iyan pemuhat he egkesuatan din is: ed-ezapen tew sikandin pinaaǥi te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.

Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Duen mibpilì ku he hadì he iring sikandin te vatu he mahal utew. Idsavuk ku sikandin diyà te inged he Siyun. Iring sikandin te melig-en he vatu he ebpeuntuzan te valey. Is minsan hentei he edsarig kandin, kenè en egkeanggà, su iyan sikandin sikan is tutuu he edseriǥan. Iyan heini insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà.

Ne heini is hadì he iring te vatu, mahal utew sikandin dini te kenita te nekesarig en kandin, iyan, is langun he kenà edtuu, netuman pinaaǥi kandan is insurat he tagnà he edhenduen te, Sikan is batu he pengawid te valey, mid-engkezan te menge pandey. Ne heini, nehimu en guntaan he vatu he iyan dà ebpekepurung te valey.

Ne zuen daan tagnà he netuman he edhenduen te, Iyan haazà sikan is batu he nesipà te menge etew; iyan haazà nekeseligkat kandan. Wazè dan medtuu te Lalag te Megbevayà ne tenged dutun, sumalà is netagnà, nekeurambak sikandan su iyan imbanglis te Megbevayà dutun te kenà edtuu.

Iyan, sikitew mulà, pinilì kiw zin. Menge memumuhat kiw te mibpilì he hadì he iyan si Kristu. Iyan kiw menge sakup din; iyan kiw menge ǥaked din he etew. Umba mibpilì kiw zin su wey tew mesangyew is tudtul te utew egkein-inuwan he menge vaal zin. Iyan sikandin nengelintau wey kiw meketuu wey kiw maawà dutun te kerusireman. Ne ǥuntaan edteyawan kiw zin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, utew en meupiya is kedtuvazi zin kenitew .
Su zengan kenè kiw menge sakup te Megbevayà ne ǥuntaan menge sakup kiw zin en. Dengan wazè tew hanew zutun te hizu te Megbevayà, iyan, guntaan impezayag din en kenitew.

Menge minahal ku he suled, kenè en hustu he inged tew heini is kelibutan su menge humuhulevungà kiw zà dini. Ne tenged dutun edhengyuan ku sikiyu he kenè niw pezumdumahi is menge mezaat he kebayè niw su ebpekesanggen heini te kedsundan niw te Megbevayà.

Kinahanglan he utew metazeng is menge ulaula niw su wey maahà te menge etew he kenà tumutuu. Su minsan ke egkeǥiyen dan he mezaat is ulaula niw, egketuenan dan gihapun he meupiya is ed-ul-ulahan niw ne ebpekezalig dan te Megbevayà keuzemà te andew te kebulusi zin te menusiyà.
Kinahanglan he edtumanen niw is midtukud he velaud diyan te inged niw su iyan heini egkesuatan te Nengazen. Ebpesakup ki te lavew he hadì su iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te langun.
Ebpesakup ki zaan te gubirnedur su iyan midsuǥù te lavew he hadì wey zin siluti is menge mesinupaken ne wey zin daan deliǥa is menge metazeng.
Umba edhengyuen ku heini su egkesuatan te Megbevayà he is menge mepedeligen he wazà mekesavut te hustu, meehè dan is menge metazeng he ulaula tew. Ne pinaaǥi kayi ebpekeengked dan is edsudì kenitew.

Ne ǥeina te nelibri kiw en te Megbevayà, egkehimu he iyan kiw en ebayàbayà te ed-ul-ulahan tew, iyan, kinahanglan he kenè tew edhimuwen is kelibriyanan tew he pesangil wey kiw mekeulaula te mezaat. Su minsan pa te nelibri kiw en, kinahanglan he menge suluǥuen kiw ǥihapun te Megbevayà.
Edtehuzen tew is langun he menge etew; ebmahalen tew is langun he menge suled tew te kedtuu. Igkehandek ta is ked-ulaula te kenà egkesuatan te Megbevayà; edtehuzen ta is keǥehem te lavew he hadì.

Sikita is suluǥuen, ebpesakup ki te egalen ta ne hustu is kedtehuza ta kandin. Kenè ta iyan dà ebpezumdumahan is egalen he metulanged wey meupiya is ulaula zin, kekenà, ebpezumdumahan ta zaan is melemu he egkepauk.
Su edtuvazan ki te Megbevayà emun tenged te kedtumana ta te egkesuatan din, egkeantus ta is kedresaya kenita te egalen ta minsan pa te wazè ki mekesalà.

Iyan, kenè ki zait he edtuvazan te meupiya emun iyan igkeentusa ta te kedsiluti kenita is mezaat he ulaula ta. Iyan, ke ebpekeantus ki te merasey te wazà mezaat he mid-ulaula ta, edtuvazan ki te Megbevayà.
Nekeantus si Kristu te merasey wey ki melibri te silut. Ne nehimu sikandin he petug-iringan he kinahanglan he edsunuzen ta. Umba mibpetuu kenitew is Megbevayà su wey tew si Kristu meiringi.
Wazà minsan hengkey he salà he neveelan ni Kristu. Wazà minsan hengkey he tarù he migkaǥi zin.

Hein edsumpeliten sikandin duen te kedrensanga kandin wazà sikandin medtavak te mezaat; wazà sikandin mebpenrawak. Is kebelesi zutun te edrasey kandin, insarig din diyà te Megbevayà he iyan kes metazeng is kedhukum din.

Iyan si Kristu midsilutan tenged te menge salè tew zutun te kedrensanga kandin diyà te krus. Umba iyan sikandin midsilutan su wey tew meengkezi is menge mezaat he ulaula ne wey tew iyan meulaula is metazeng. Is menge palì din dutun, ne iyan nekevawì kenitew.
Iring kiw zengan te menge ayam he kerehidu he nengetazin, iyan, guntaan impeulì kiw en diyà te Megbevayà he iyan bekidu he metau he ebantey kenitew.

Sikiyu zaan is menge vahi, kinahanglan he pesakup kew te esawa niw ne zutun minsan ke kenè dan edtuu te Lalag te Megbevayà kela ke ebpeketuu zan ded ke egkeehè dan is menge ulaula niw he memeupiya. Su iyan heini egkehimu he wali niw kandan.
su egkeehè dan is kedtahud niw te Megbevayà wey is ulaula niw he wazà igkesewayi zuen.

Sikiyu is menge vahi, kenè niw isipa he iyan ibmekempet niw is pinaaǥi te utew subra he kedeyzeyani niw te vulvul niw wey te kedsul-uva niw te menge mahal he vutang iring te vulawan wey mahal he bisti.

Su kinahanglan he iyan ibmekempet niw is meupiya he ulaula he ebpuun te ǥehinawa niw he iring te menayù he kegkaǥi, wey is melinawen he ulaula su is kekempet he iring kayi, ne kenà mulà egkeawà, ne utew mahal ziyà te Megbevayà.
Is menge vahi zengan he midsarig te Megbevayà, iyan heini kandan he inmekempet. Mibpesakup sikandan te menge esawa zan

he iring ki Sara he mibpesakup daan te esawa zin he si Abraham. Neisip din he egalen din si Abraham. Ne sikiyu is menge vahi ǥuntaan, egkehimu kew he iring te menge anak ni Sara emun ed-iringan niw is ulaula zin he metazeng wey ke kenè niw idtuǥut he egkesamuk is isip niw te kegkehandek.

Sikita zaan is maama, kinahanglan he ebpurungan ta wey edtehuzen ta is esawa ta. Su minsan pa te meluya is lawa zan kenà is kenita, iring sikandan kenita su imbeǥey zaan kandan te Megbevayà is untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne tenged kayi kinahanglan he edtehuzen ta sikandan su wey pemineǥa te Megbevayà is kebpengampù ta.

Duen pa egkeǥiyen ku keniyu te langun ne iyan is: kinahanglan he mesevaha is isip niw wey ǥehinawa niw. Mebpepurpurungè kew wey megiǥineǥawè kew su iring kew en te teltelesuled. Kinahanglan he memetulanged kew wey kenè kew menge mepelevawen.

Ke zuen ebpesipala keniyu kenè niw velesi te mezaat. Ke zuen edrawak keniyu kenè niw zaan penrewaki, kekenà, belesi niw te meupiya. Su umba midhimu kew te Megbevayà he menge tumutuu su wey kew zin metuvazi te meupiya.
Duen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Sikan is egkesuat he meupiya is ked-ubpè din dini te kelibutan wey layun melipey, kinahanglan he kenà mezaat is kebpemèbè din ne kenà edtarùtarù.
Engkezi zin en is memezaat he ulaula ne layun meupiya is menge ulaula zin. Layun din pen-ahaa is melinawen he kedepitè dan te menge zuma zin.
Su iyan ebentayan te Megbevayà is memetazeng he etew; ebpemineǥen din is ked-ampù dan. Iyan, egkuntedahan din mulà is ed-ulaula te mezaat.
Wazà edhilavet keniyu ke edhamen kew te ked-ulaula te meupiya.
Iyan, minsan ke ebpekeantus kew te kebpesipala tenged te metazeng is ed-ul-ulahan niw, medlipey kew. Kenè kew mahandek te etew zà duen ne kenè kew meseeng.
Layun niw isipa he iyan egalen niw si Kristu. Layun niw endama is tavak ke zuen ed-insà keniyu ke maan is ebpekesarig kew te Megbevayà.

Mebmetinehuzen kew is edtavak wey menayù is kegkaǥi niw. Kinahanglan he wazà salà he netaǥù diyà te ǥehinawa niw te menge sumusundan ni Kristu su emun wazà ulaula niw he mezaat egkeeled is edsudì keniyu tenged te egkeǥiyen dan.
Deyzey ke ebpekeantus ki te merasey tenged te metazeng is ulaula ta, ke iyan intuvad kenita te Megbevayà, kenà ke ebpekeantus ki te merasey tenged te mezaat is ulaula ta.

Kesevaha zà is kebpehimatey ni Kristu wey mepesaylu is menge salè tew. Mibpehimatey su wey mehimu sikandin is metazeng he elili tew te kenà memetazeng wey kiw mehimu he menge ǥaked te Megbevayà. Nepatey is lawa zin, iyan, nevanhew sikandin
ne mibeyaan din minsan is nengepirisu he ǥimukud te nemematey zengan ne midweliyan din sikandan.

Iyan heini menge etew zengan he wazà mebpemineg te Megbevayà dutun te timpu zengan hein ebpelevayen din dà is memezaat he ulaula zan taman te nepasad ni Noe is kebeeli zin te arka. Walu zà he etew is nekeseled dutun te arka wey zan melibri te wahig.

Ne iyan teǥialung kayi te wahig is kebewtismu he ebpekelibri kenitew te silut. Ne haazà is kebewtismu, ne kenà iyan is kedlumpiyuwi te lawa tew ziyà te wahig, kekenà, iyan is kedhengyui tew te Megbevayà he maawè din is menge salè tew. Egkehimu heini tenged te mibanhew zin si Jesu Kristu.

Diyà si Jesus med-ulì te langit ne ǥuntaan diyà sikandin ebpimpinuu te zapit te egkekewanan te Megbevayà tuus te utew lavew sikandin. Iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te langun he menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà wey te menge kedesenan wey te minsan hentei ziyà te langit he zuen din gehem.

Ne netuenan ta he si Kristu, hein dini pa te kelibutan, nekeantus sikandin te merasey. Tenged dutun kinahanglan he andam kew zaan te ked-antus te merasey su is etew he ebpekeantus te merasey, egkeawè en diyà te kandin is suat din te ked-ulaula te mezaat.
Ne tenged kayi, puun dutun taman te kebpatey zin egkehimu he kenè din en human edtumanen is mezaat he kebayà te lawa zin, kekenà, iyan din edtumanen is egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Su kinahanglan he kenè niw en maan ul-ulaha sikan is mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan he egkesuatan te menge etew he wazà medtuu te Megbevayà. Su zengan meremerik is ulaula niw; mezaat is egkesuatan te lawa niw; lelenguten kew ne mezaat is kelenganan he ibpelepew niw ziyà te menge keemuran he zutun kew ebpenginum. Utew kew egkeepesi te Megbevayà su kenà tutuu he megbevayà is ed-ezapen niw.
Iyan, guntaan, is menge etew he kenà edtuu te Megbevayà, utew zan egkeinuinu su maan is kenè kew en edtampu kandan te ed-ulaula te utew memezaat wey memahawag ne tenged dutun edsumpeliten kew zan.
Keuzemà ke ziyà sikandan ibpeetuvang te Megbevayà ed-insaan din sikandan ke maan is mid-ulaula zan te mezaat. Andam en sikandin te kedsusi te nengeulaula te nemematey en wey te menge uuyag pa.

Sikan is menge etew he nemematey en, impesavut en kandan dengan is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he ebpuun diyà te Megbevayà su wey meveǥayi sikandan te untung he wazà pidtemanan minsan pa te kenè dan egkelikayan is kebpatey te lawa zan su iyan silut te Megbevayà diyà te tivuuk he menusiyà.

Kenè en utew egkeuǥet is ketepusan te kelibutan. Ne tenged dutun, kinahanglan he hustu is ked-isip-isip niw. Kinahanglan daan he purungi niw is menge ulaula niw su wey mehustu is ked-ampù niw ziyà te Megbevayà.

Kinahanglan he iyan lavew he edhemenan niw is kebmahala niw ziyà te ǥehinawa niw te minsan hentei he zuma niw he tumutuu su emun ebmahalen ta is menge zuma ta melemu ki zà ebpekepesaylu te menge salè dan kenita.
Kinahanglan he utew kew metulanged is ebpepemenahik te menge humehulevungà diyan te valey niw.

Is minsan hengkey he ketau he imbeǥey te Megbevayà diyà te kada sevaha keniyu, kinahanglan he ǥemita zin wey metevangi is menge zuma zin he tumutuu su wey hustu is kegemita niw te minsan hengkey he intavang keniyu te Megbevayà.

Sikita is edwali, kinahanglan he is kedwali ta, ne utew hustu he iring te iyan en edwali is Megbevayà. Sikita is edtavang, ne kinahanglan he kenè ta edlipatan he is idtavang ta, ne ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà su wey pinaaǥi te ǥehem ni Jesu Kristu iyan mevantug is Megbevayà te minsan keenu su iyan dait he edeliǥen wey zait he ebayàbayà te wazà pidtemanan.
Minahal ku he menge suled, kenè kew meinuinu tenged te utew merasey he penggezam he egkeantus niw en tenged te kedtuu niw. Su emun tumutuu ki, ebpekeantus ki layun te merasey.

Kenè kew meinuinu, kekenà, lipey kew utew su pinaaǥi kayi ebpekeambit kew te menge kemeresayan he naantus ni Kristu ne tenged dutun utew kew zaan egkelipey keuzemà ke ibpezayag din kenitew haazà is bulawan he ed-ulian.
Utew kew zeyzey ke edsudien kew tenged te menge sumusundan kew ni Kristu su tuus heini he mid-ulinan kew te mekeǥeǥehem he Mulin-ulin he iyan is Megbevayà.
Kinahanglan he kenè niw iyan igkerasey is kedsiluti keniyu tenged te kebpemumunù, kebpemenakew, ked-ulaula te minsan hengkey he mezaat, wey te kebpenhilavet dutun te wazè niw ketenged.
Iyan, ke iyan niw ibpekeantus te merasey is tenged te neketuu kew ki Kristu, kenè niw haazà ikeeled, kekenà, utew zekelà is kebpeselemati niw te Megbevayà su neǥaked kew ni Kristu.

Iyan heini, menge suled, timpu he pinaaǥi te merasey he egkeulaula ebpuunan te Megbevayà is kedsusiya zin te menge ulaula te menusiyà. Edhunaan din edsusiya is menge sakup din. Ne emun iyan kiw zin is menge tumutuu edhunaan din, utew pa merasey is egketemanan te menge etew he kenà ebpemineg te Meupiya he Tudtulanen he impesavut kandan te Megbevayà.

Su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Emun mereǥen he edlibriyen te silut is menge metazeng he etew, iyan pe be melibri sikan is menge etew he edsukul te Megbevayà wey memezaat is ulaula!

Ne tenged dutun, menge suled, ke ebpekeantus kew en te merasey su iyan intuvad keniyu te Megbevayà, isarig niw is gehinawa niw ziyà te kandin he iyan metinumanen he nenlimbag wey hemeni niw is memeupiya he ulaula.

Sikiyu is ebmeǥurangen te menge tumutuu, duen idhangyù ku keniyu su ebmeǥurangen a zaan. Nekevantey a te kedresaya zengan ki Kristu ne iring keniyu, ebpekeseled a zaan te vulawan he ed-ulian he ibpeǥawaǥawa keuzemà.

Ne iyan idhangyù ku keniyu is: purungi niw elimahi is menge tumutuu he insarig keniyu te Megbevayà. Iring sikandan te menge kerehidu zin. Iyan kew edumala kandan, kenà iring te ebpeǥesen kew, kekenà, kinahanglan he ebpuun te meliwanag he ǥehinawa niw su iyan haazà egkesuatan te Megbevayà. Kinahanglan he kenà iyan dà id-elimahi niw kandan is tenged te edsuhulan kew zan, kekenà, tenged te egkesuat kew he edtavang kandan.
Kenè kew medhadìhadì kandan te insarig keniyu, kekenà, eǥaka niw sikandan su wey iyan kew zan edsunuzen te menge meupiya he ulaula.
Ne emun edlikù si Jesus, sikan is lavew he ed-elima te menge kerehidu te Megbevayà, duen idsuhul zin keniyu he iyan is kebpekeambit niw te utew zin kegkelavew he kenà egkehanew.

Sikiyu menge menguhed, edhengyuan ku sikiyu he pevayàbayè kew te menge ebmeǥurangen. Kinahanglan he kenè kew mepelevawen, kekenà, mebpetebtevangè kew su zuen insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà he edhenduen te, Kuntada te Megbevayà is mepelevawen, iyan, igkehizu zin is kenà ebpelavew.
Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he kenè kew mepelevawen, kekenà, pevayàbayè kew te Megbevayà he mekeǥeǥehem ne edhimuwen kew zin he utew lavew keuzemà te hustu he timpu.
Isarig niw ziyà te kandin is minsan hengkey he seeng niw su iyan sikandin ed-elima keniyu.
Med-andam kew, mebantey kew su is kuntada tew he si Setanas, edriǥuriǥu en he iring te erimaung he edhiniǥer su ebpen-ahà te edewiyen din.
Sukuli niw sikandin, ne hamen kew sarig te Megbevayà su netuenan niw he is menge zuma niw he tumutuu zini te tivuuk he kelibutan, ebpekeantus dan daan te merasey he iring te egkeantus niw.

Mevavè dà is ked-antus niw ne edheǥeten te Megbevayà is kedsarig niw kandin. Ebiǥeran kew zin, edlig-enan kew zin wey ebeǥayan kew zin te zesen. Iyan sikandin puunà te minsan hengkey he tavang kenitew. Midhimu kiw zin he tumutuu su wey pinaaǥi te kebpekidsevaha tew ki Kristu mekeambit kiw te wazà pidtemanan he utew kegkelavew zin.
Berakat he zeliǥa sikandin te wazà pidtemanan su iyan sikandin mekeǥeǥehem.

Mid-uǥupan a ni Silvanu te edsurat kayi. Suled tew sikandin he utew egkeseriǥi. Iyan insurati ku keniyu kayi su wey ku meheǥet is kedtuu niw. Ibpesavut ku keniyu he impenurù ku en keniyu he tutuu is gaǥew te Megbevayà keniyu. Ne kenè niw heini lipati.
Ebpengemusta keniyu is menge tumutuu zini te inged he Bebilunya. Pinilì sikandan te Megbevayà iring te pinilì kew zin daan. Ebpengemusta zaan keniyu si Marcos he iyan iring te tutuu he anak ku.
Mebpelimlimuey kew. Mebmelinawen is gehinawa te uman sevaha keniyu he nekidsevaha ki Kristu.

Iyan a si Simon Pedro is teǥisurat kayi. Suluǥuen a ni Jesu Kristu wey epustul zin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, midsuǥù e zin . Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu is langun he neketuu ki Jesu Kristu. Megbevayà he Menluluwas tew sikandin. Geina te wazè din ibpelavi he minsan hentei, midhimu kew zin he tumutuu kandin iring te midhimu key zin daan he tumutuu.
Berakat he ikeǥaǥew kew utew te Megbevayà wey mebmelinawen is gehinawa niw pinaaǥi te kegkesevuta niw te Megbevayà wey te Nengazen tew he si Jesus.

Pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Megbevayà edtevangan kiw zin te mezakel he paaǥi wey kiw meketuman te menge suǥù din kayi te ked-ubpè tew zini te kelibutan. Umba egkehimu heini su impekilala en kenitew si Jesu Kristu he iyan mibpetuu kenitew wey kiw mekeambit te ketazeng din wey te utew zin kegkelavew.

Iyan heini kedtumana zin te penaad din he utew zekelà wey mahal is idtuvad din kenitew. Umba impenaad din heini su wey mekeiring is menge ulaula tew te menge ulaula te Megbevayà ne mekelikey kiw zini te kelibutan te kedtumana te menge mezaat he kebayè tew su ebpekezezaat heini kenitew.

Ne ǥeina te iyan heini intavang din kenitew kinahanglan he edhimuwen ta is taman te egkehimu ta su wey meheǥeti is kedtuu ta kandin te menge meupiya he ulaula. Ne is menge meupiya he ulaula, kinahanglan he edheǥetan ta te kegkesevuta te hustu.
Ne is kedsavut, edheǥetan ta te edtengkaan he ed-ul-ulahan. Ne haazà daan, edheǥetan ta te kebmeinentusen. Ne is kebmeinentusen, edheǥetan ta te kebpevayàbayè ta te Megbevayà.
Ne haazà daan, edheǥetan ta te kegiǥineǥawè tew ne is kegiǥineǥawè tew, edheǥetan ta zaan te kebmahala ta te menge zuma ta.
Ne emun ed-iseg layun is ked-ul-ulaha niw kayi te langun, kenà egkehimu he kenà utew zekelà is pulus te kedtuuwi niw te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Iyan, ke zuen tumutuu he kenà ed-ulaula kayi, henduen be te nelakap is isip din su kenè din egkesavut is hustu. Nelipatan din en buwa he nepelisan en sikandin te menge zaan he ulaula zin he mezaat.

Menge suled, geina te mibpilì kiw ne midhimu kiw te Megbevayà he menge tumutuu kandin, edhimuwen tew is taman te egkehimu tew wey maahà he tutuu iyan is kebpilia zin kenitew wey is kedhimuwa zin kenitew he menge tumutuu zin. Su emun iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan tew kenè kiw ebpekesuwey te hustu he ibayà,
ne zekelà is kelipey tew keuzemà su egkeǥalew is Megbevayà kenitew zutun te kebpeseleza zin kenitew zutun te wazà pidtemanan he ǥinhedian te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he iyan Menluluwas tew.
Minsan pa te nesavut niw en heini is langun wey meheǥet en is kedtuu niw te tutuu he tuluuwen, kinahanglan he layun ku heini ibpezineg keniyu.
Su taman te kemulu e pa zini te kelibutan meupiya ke igkepezineg ku keniyu heini su wey kenè niw melipati.
Netuenan ku he meǥaan e en egkeumuri sumalà is impesavut kedì te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Ne tenged kayi edhimuwen ku is taman te egkehimu ku su wey kenè niw melipati is impenurù ku.

Sikan is impenurù dey keniyu mehitenged te egkeulaula keuzemà ke edlikù is Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu he utew zekelà is gehem din, ne kenà heini tetezemen dà he midhimu te etew zà duen. Netuenan dey su nemesahan dey en is mekeǥeǥehem he anlag din.

Duma key zin dengan hein impaahà te Amey tew he Megbevayà is mekeǥeǥehem he anlag din wey is utew zin kegkelavew. Nezineg dey is lalag te mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà he migkaǥi te, Iyan heini sikan is Anak ku he utew ku minahal; ingkesuat ku utew sikandin, ke sikandin.
Nezineg dey is laǥeng te Megbevayà he ziyà ebpuun te langit hein miduma key zengan ni Jesus pehendiyà te vuntud he mibulusan te Megbevayà.

Ne utew zutun neheǥet is kedtuu zey te nengetagnà dengan te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà mehitenged ki Jesus ne kinahanglan he purungi niw zaan tuuwi. Su is impenurù dan, ne iring te sulù he ebpenganlag diyà te merusirem taman te kenè pa egkeriwaswas. Ne emun egkeriwaswas en, egketeyawan kiw te mekevugwas, he ke và dà egkeǥiya egkeuma is kegketuman te kedlikù ni Jesus .
Ne kinahanglan utew he sevuta niw he wazà etew he hustu is kedseysey zin te penurù he insurat te ebpemeneuven dengan te Megbevayà emun wazà ipesavut kandin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.

Su heini is penurù, wazà diyà dà mebpuun te isip te etew zà duen, kekenà, impinted te Megbevayà. Mid-ulinan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin is ebpemeneuven dengan, ne is menge lalag dan, iyan impekaǥi kandan te Megbevayà.

Duen dengan menge teruen he etew he uvag kun ebpeneuven te Megbevayà ne iring din ded daan, duen menge etew he edlepew ǥuntaan he ebpenurù te tarù diyan te keniyu. Sayep is ibpenurù dan te meeles ne ebpekezezaat heini te upakat niw te menge tumutuu. Ibpenurù dan he kenà Nengazen tew si Jesus he iyan pezem mibelukas kandan ne tenged dutun egketik-awan sikandan ke edsilutan dan.
Ne minsan pa zutun mezakel is edsunud te meremerik he menge ulaula zan, ne pinaaǥi zutun egkesawey kiw is edsunud te tutuu he tuluuwen su kunaan te menge etew ke zuma tew sikandan.
Tenged te suat dan te selapì, ebpenepian kew zan pinaaǥi te penurù dan he tarù. Daan en he midteǥana is silut kandan; andam en is Megbevayà te kedsilut kandan.

Su wazà pesegdana te Megbevayà minsan is menge velinsuǥuen din dengan he nekesalà, kekenà, intimbag din diyà te Iveyaan. Ne ziyè dan pa te utew merusirem he mibakus te kedina su idtaǥad sikandan taman te andew te kedsilut.

Wazà daan pesegdana te Megbevayà is tivuuk he menusiyà dengan su impelapey zin is daǥat ne nengelened is langun he wazè dan kedtahud kandin. Iyan dà midlibri zin si Noe he nekepenurù te metazeng he ulaula wey zuen pa pitu he etew he midlibri zin daan.

Elin daan midsilutan dengan te Megbevayà is menge etew ziyà te menge inged he Suduma wey Gumura. Iyan dà meǥinged dutun he midlibri zin ensi Lut su metazeng mulà si Lut. Nerasey si Lut he ed-isip-isip te meremerik he ulaula te menge mesinupaken he zuma zin. Andew-andew utew mezaat he ulaula is egkengezineg din wey egkengeehè din ne zutun utew mibmesakit is gehinawa zin. Ne tenged dutun te utew menge lalung mibinsulan te Megbevayà is inged dan su wey mesavut te minsan hentei ke hengkey is kedsiluti zin keuzemà dutun te menge etew he kenà ebpemineg te menge suǥù din.

Iyan, is menge etew mulà he ed-azap te Nengazen, metau sikandin he edtavang kandan wey kenè dan mekesalà ke ebpenulayen sikandan. Metau zaan sikandin he ebakus te menge nemematey he lalung su wey itaǥad sikandan taman te andew te kedsiluti zin kandan.

Utew meveǥat keuzemà is kedsiluti zin dutun te menge etew he ebpeniguduwan dan te edtuman is menge meremerik he kebayà te lawa zan wey edsumpeliten dan is minsan hentei he zuen din keǥehem. Ne heini is migkaǥi ku he menge etew he ebpenurù te tarù, utew zan memevurut wey memepelevawen. Kenè dan edtehuzen is menge kedesenan diyà te langit, kekenà, edsumpeliten dan.

Ne minsan is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he lavew pa is gehem dan kenà dutun te menge teruen he menunudlù, kenè dan mulà ebpekeaku he edsudì te menge kedesenan emun idsumbung dan is menge kedesenan diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà.

Iyan, heini is menge teruen he menunudlù, kenè dan egkeisip he igkehandek heini su zaan he ulaula zan is kedsudì. Iring sikandan te menge langgam he wazà keeled he iyan intuvad kandan is kedekepa wey kedhimetayi kandan. Edsumpeliten dan is kenè dan egkesavut. Ne iyan egkezungguan dan is kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan.

Utew merasey is silut he egkeantus dan keuzemà iring te merasey zaan is ibpeantus dan te menge etew. Iyan kelenganan he egkesuatan dan is kedtumana zan te minsan maandew pa te minsan hengkey he meremerik he kebayà te lawa zan. Igkeeled niw wey igkesudii sikandan keniyu su minsan ke ebpekidtuǥen dan keniyu ziyà te menge keemuran niw utew zan egkesuati is kedtarùtarù keniyu.

Egkeeriǥan dan te minsan hentei he vahi; kenà egkepenù is suat dan te mezaat he ulaula. Ebpeeyatan dan is menge etew he kenè pa ebpekesavut te hustu. Utew zan leǥezen, iyan, kenà egkehimu he kenà sikandan egkesilutan te Megbevayà.

Nengetazin en is isip dan su midsuwey zan en te tutuu he ibayà. Iyan ibayà he ed-ikulen dan is mezaat he paaǥi zengan ni Belaam he anak ni Busur. Iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa ni Belaam is selapì he idsuhul kandin ke mezaat is ed-ul-ulahan din.
Duen kudè din he asnu he kenà pezem ebpekekaǥi, iyan, impekaǥi te Megbevayà ne indawey zin ki Belaam haazà is mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan ne tenged dutun wazà melaus ni Belaam is ketuturebungi zin.

Ne haazà is menge etew he ebpenurù te tarù, iring sikandan te kalut he nemezahan. Iring sikandan te ǥapun he ebpegwisen te keramag su wazè dan menge pulus. Inteǥana te Megbevayà is egkeubpaan dan diyà te Impirnu he utew merusirem.

Uvag mezalem is menge lalag dan, iyan, wazà pulus te egkeǥiyen dan. Duen menge etew he ed-engkezan dan pezem is menge zaan he zuma zan he ed-ulaula te sayep, iyan, ebpenulayen sikandan dutun te menge menunudlù pinaaǥi te meremerik he kebayà te lawa zan.

Egkeǥiyen dutun te menge menunudlù he egkelibri ki pinaaǥi te kedsunuza kandan su idtuǥut kun kenita is minsan hengkey he ulaula, iyan, nasì nengeuripen pa sikandan te menge ulaula he ebpekezezaat su netuenan ta he uripen is etew te minsan hengkey he ebpekevayàbayà kandin.

Ke zuen menge etew he nekesavut en mehitenged te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu, egkelibri zan en pezem te mezaat he ulaula zini te kelibutan he ebpekezezaat kandan. Iyan, ke egkepenulayan sikandan ne edlikuan dan en maan haazà is daan he kegkeuripena kandan te mezaat he ulaula, tuwas pa he merasey is egketemanan dan.
Meupiya pa ke wazè dan meturedu is paaǥi te kegkehimu kandan he metazeng, kenà te neturedu zan ne mid-iniyuǥan dan ne wazè dan medtuman te suǥù kandan te Megbevayà he impesavut kandan.
Netuman en pinaaǥi kandan sikan is erubasa he edhenduen te, Migkaan te asu is in-utè din ne sikan is neziǥù he vavuy, midtunè en maan.
Minahal he menge suled ku, ikezuwa en heini te kebpesurati ku keniyu. Iyan tuyù ku kayi te kezezuwa ku kebpesurati keniyu is: wey kew mekeisip te hustu pinaaǥi kayi te menge sambag ku keniyu.
Egkesuatan ku he meisip-isip niw is menge lalag he insurat dengan te ebpemeneuven te Megbevayà wey is suǥù te Nengazen tew he Menluluwas tew he imbeǥey zin kenitew pinaaǥi kenami te menge epustul.
Idhuna ku keniyu ibpesavut he keuzemà te ketepusan he timpu duen ebpemenlepew he menge etew he iyan ebayàbayà kandan is menge mezaat he kebayè dan. Edsumpeliten kew zan he egkaǥi te,

Hendei vuwa si Kristu su impenaad din dengan he edlikù dini te kelibutan, iyan, kenè key ebpeketuu te iring dutun su puun pa te timpu zengan te kebpatey te menge tipehuna he kepuun tew taman en guntaan, wazà mahalin is minsan hengkey; iyan ded gihapun genat dà te kedtukuza te kelibutan taman en guntaan.

Is egkaǥi te iring kayi, iyan edlipatan dan is: dengan midlimbag te Megbevayà is langit pinaaǥi zà te lalag din, ne is tanà daan, midlimbag din pinaaǥi te wahig ne impelepew zin is tanà puun dutun te wahig.
Ne pinaaǥi zaan te wahig, midlimas dengan te Megbevayà is tivuuk he menusiyà dini te lumpad.

Ne haazà is Lalag te Megbevayà he iyan inlimbag din dengan, pinaaǥi zutun midteǥenahan din en is langit wey tanà su wey melimas din te hapuy keuzemà dutun te andew te kedsusiya zin wey kedsiluti zin te menge etew he wazè dan kedtahud kandin.
Minahal ku he menge suled, tentenuzi niw he ziyà te Megbevayà, neked-iring is sengeandew zà wey is nengkelibu he tuig su ziyà te kandin meǥaan dà utew haazà is dezuwa.

Kunaan te zuma ke edlanganlangan is Nengazen su maan is kenè din edtumanen is pesarig din he edlikù sikandin. Kenà sikandin edlanganlangan, kekenà, utew sikandin mepelevayen keniyu su kenè din egkesuatan he zuen minsan sevaha he kenà egkelibri te silut. Egkesuatan din he meiniyuǥi te langun is menge ulaula zan he mezaat.

Ne minsan pa zutun, edtumanen gihapun te Megbevayà is kedlimasa zin te kelibutan. Egketik-awan is menusiyà he iring te kegketik-awi kandan te tekawen. Dutun he andew egkezineg is kerekatak ne egkehanew is langit. Egkeǥevà ne egkeamin egketutung is minsan hengkey. Egkevinsulan is tivuuk he kelibutan wey is langun he taǥù din.
Ne ǥeina te zuen andew keuzemà he zutun egkehanew is langun te iring kayi, kinahanglan he ebpurungan tew is kedsunud tew te Megbevayà para wazà igkesewayi kenitew.

Su edteǥazan ta is andew te kedlimasa te Megbevayà te kelibutan. Edhimuwen ta is taman te egkehimu ta su wey meǥaan metuman. Dutun he andew egkeamin egketutung is langit, wey egkengetunew is langun te utew meinit.
Iyan, sikitew mulà, ebperetengen ta is beǥu en he tanà wey langit he impenaad kenitew te Megbevayà. Iyan dà ebpekeubpà dutun is memetazeng is ulaula zan.

Na menge suled, geina te kemulu tew pa edteǥazi haazà is andew, kinahanglan he ebpurungan tew edtengkai is menge ulaula tew su wey wazà igkesewayi kenitew te Megbevayà ne wey melinew is kedepità te uman sevaha kenitew ziyà te kandin.

Kenè niw lipati he iyan ibpelevaya te Megbevayà kenitew su wey melibri ki te silut din. Iyan daan heini impesavut keniyu te emiǥu tew he si Pablo zutun te surat he impeuwit din keniyu. Impinted heini kandin te Megbevayà.

Ibpenurù din layun is andew te kedlimas diyà te langun he menge surat din. Duen daan ibpenurù ni Pablo he mereǥen he edsevuten ne is menge etew he kenà edsavut te hustu wey wazà meheǥet is kedtuu zan, edhelinen dan haazà is memereǥen ne nesayep is kedseysaya zan duen iring te nesayep daan is kedseysaya zan te zuma he insurat he Lalag te Megbevayà. Ne tenged dutun edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà.

Minahal ku he menge suled, geina te netuenan niw en heini he zaan, andam kew su wey kenè kew meketuu te menge tarù he ibpenurù te menge lalung he etew ne egkelipatan niw is tutuu he tuluuwen he midtuuwan niw.

Kinahanglan he pinaaǥi te kegkeǥeǥawi keniyu te Nengazen tew wey Menluluwas tew he si Jesu Kristu, med-iseg is kedsevuta niw te ibpesavut din. Berakat he iyan sikandin edeliǥen guntaan wey te wazà pidtemanan.

Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu mehitenged ki Kristu. Migeraran sikandin te Lalag he ebpekeveǥey te wazà pidtemanan he untung. Daan en sikandin te wazè pa tukuza is kelibutan. Ne minsan pa zutun neehè dey sikandin ne nekepemineg key te migkaǥi zin. Neehè dey ne neǥewezan dey sikandin.

Hein mibulus dini te kelibutan heini is puunà te untung, neehè dey ne tenged dutun egkeǥiyen dey keniyu is neehè dey. Edseyseyen dey keniyu is migeraran te untung he wazè din pidtemanan. Daan sikandin he zuma te Amey tew he Megbevayà ne zutun mibpeǥawaǥawa kenami zini te kelibutan.
Edtudtulen ku en keniyu haazà is neehè dey wey nezineg dey ziyà te kandin su wey kew mebpekid-upakat kenami su nekid-upakat key zaan te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Anak din he si Jesu Kristu.
Ne tenged dutun ebpesuratan ku sikiyu te iring kayi su wey meheǥet is kelipey tew.
Ibpesavut ku keniyu is impesavut kenami te Anak te Megbevayà he is Megbevayà, iyan sikandin puunà te kerayag ne wazà minsan hengkey he merusirem diyà te kandin.

Emun egkaǥi ki he nekid-upakat ki te Megbevayà, iyan, diyè ki pa te kerusireman, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, mezaat pa is menge ulaula ta , teruen ki. Teruen ki pinaaǥi te menge lalag ta wey pinaaǥi te menge ulaula ta.

Emun merayag mulà is ibayè tew iring te merayag is Megbevayà, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, emun mibpesakup kiw te Megbevayà, egkeupakat kiw ne layun kiw edlumpiyuwi te minsan hengkey he salè tew pinaaǥi te kebpelisi kenitew te lengesa ni Jesus he Anak te Megbevayà.
Emun egkaǥi ki he wazè ta salà, tarù is ebpetuuwan ta te ǥehinawa ta ne kenè ki ves edtuman te tutuu he tuluuwen.

Emun idtug-an ta ziyà te Megbevayà is menge salè ta, kenà egkehimu he kenè ki zin ebpeseyluwen su metazeng sikandin ne metinumanen te pesarig din. Edlumpiyuwan ki zin te langun he menge ulaula ta he kenà metazeng.
Iyan, ke egkaǥi ki he wazè ki mekesalà, henduen be te migkaǥi ki he teruen is Megbevayà ne wazè ki mebpezumazuma te lalag din.

Sikiyu is iring te menge anak ku, iyan ibpesurati ku keniyu is: wey meheǥeti is kedtuu niw wey kew kenà mekesalà. Iyan, ke zuen ebpekesalà he minsan hentei kenitew, duen datù tew he edtavang kenitew ziyà te etuvangan te Amey tew he Megbevayà. Iyan datù tew si Jesu Kristu he utew metazeng.
Iyan sikandin impemuhat tenged kenitew wey mepalis is menge salè tew, ne kenè kenitew zà he salà is egkepalis, kekenà, is menge salà daan te tivuuk he menusiyà.
Egketuenan tew he emiǥu kiw en te Megbevayà ke edtumanen tew is menge sugù din kenitew.
Iyan, ke zuen egkaǥi te, Emiǥu e en te Megbevayà, ne haazà is egkaǥi, kenè din edtumanen is menge suǥù te Megbevayà, teruen sikandin. Kenà sikandin ebpezumazuma te tutuu he tuluuwen.

Ne ke zuen etew he edtumanen din is menge suǥù te Megbevayà, neheǥet en is kebmahala zin te Megbevayà diyà te ǥehinawa zin. Sikan is etew he egkaǥi he nekidsevaha sikandin te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he metazeng is menge ulaula zin iring te metazeng is menge ulaula ni Jesus. Emun iyan heini ed-ul-ulahan ta, netuenan ta he nekidsevaha ki te Megbevayà.

Minahal ku he menge suled, kenà beǥu heini is idsuǥù ku keniyu su zengan dà. Ne insuǥù en heini keniyu hein aney kew medtuu. Ne heini he suǥù, ne iyan ded sikan is lalag he impesavut kenitew he mahala tew is minsan hentei he zuma tew.

Ne minsan pa te zaan heini he suǥù, henduen be te sikan pa isuǥù kenitew su impaahà ni Kristu he tutuu heini is suǥù wey ibpeehè niw zaan ǥuntaan. Egkeawè en kayi te kelibutan is kerusireman ne egketeyawan kiw en te tutuu he tuluuwen.
Ke zuen etew he egkaǥi he midteyawan te Megbevayà is isip din, iyan, ebpekigkuntada sikandin te zuma zin, kemulu pa sikandin diyà te kerusireman.
Is etew mulà he ebmahalen din is duma zin, iyan sikandin kes edteyawan is isip din te Megbevayà, ne kenè din ibpekesalà is menge ulaula zin.

Iyan, is etew he ebpekigkuntada te zuma zin, kemulu pa is isip din diyà te kerusireman ne mezaat pa is menge ulaula zin. Iring sikandin te etew he kenè din egketuenan ke hendei sikandin ebpekepevayà su ziyè pa sikandin te kerusireman.
Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu, menge anak ku, su nengepesaylu en is menge salè niw tenged ki Kristu.

Sikiyu is menge meǥurang, umba ebpesuratan ku sikiyu su nehimu kew en he menge emiǥu ni Kristu. Daan en sikandin te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey. Sikiyu is menge menguhed, ebpesuratan ku sikiyu su nezaag niw en si Setanas.

Sikiyu is menge vatà, ebpesuratan ku sikiyu su menge emiǥu kew en te Amey tew he Megbevayà. Iyan ibpesurati ku keniyu te menge meǥurang is: tenged te emiǥu kew en ni Kristu. Daan en sikandin te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey. Iyan ibpesurati ku keniyu te menge menguhed su meviǥer en is kedtuu niw ne kenà egkeawà diyan te isip niw is Lalag te Megbevayà, wey nezaag niw en si Setanas.

Kinahanglan he kenà iyan dekelà dini te ǥehinawa ta is menge ulaula te menge etew zini te kelibutan he menge kuntada te Megbevayà, kinahanglan daan he wazà minsan hengkey zini te kelibutan he iyan dekelà dini te ǥehinawa ta. Su ke zuen etew he iyan dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is iring dutun, kenà egkehimu he iyan mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin is Amey tew he Megbevayà.

Su is minsan hengkey he mezaat he ulaula zini te kelibutan, iring te menge mezaat he kebayà, is menge mezaat he vutang he egkeahà wey egkesuatan te menge etew wey is kebpezalig dan tenged te menge azen he nekuwa zan, kenè man heini ebpuun te Amey tew he Megbevayà, kekenà, dini zà ebpuun te kelibutan.

Egkehanew keuzemà is kelibutan wey egkehanew zaan is minsan hengkey he mezaat he egkesuatan te menge etew, iyan, sikan is edtuman te egkesuatan te Megbevayà, kenà mulà egkehanew, kekenà, duen din untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Menge anak ku, meǥaan en egketapus heini is timpu. Nezineg niw en he keuzemà duen edlepew he egeraran te Kuntada ni Kristu. Guntaan duen en mezakel he menge kuntada ni Kristu ne tenged dutun netuenan ta he meǥaan en iyan egketapus heini is timpu.

Ne heini is menge kuntada ni Kristu, kenè tew sikandan tutuu he menge zuma su umba mid-ewaan kiw zan. Angin ke tutuu zan he zuma tew su wazè kiw zan geina ewai. Tenged te ked-awè dan egketuenan ta he kenè dan tutuu he menge zuma tew.
Sikiyu mulà, mibpeulinan kew ni Kristu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne tenged dutun nesavut niw te langun is tutuu he tuluuwen.

Kenè ku iyan ibpesurati keniyu is tenged te wazè niw mesavut ke hengkey is tutuu he tuluuwen, kekenà, tenged te nesavut niw en wey tenged te wazà minsan hengkey he tarù he ziyà ebpuun te tutuu he tuluuwen.

Hentei man is teruen? Iyan sikan is egkaǥi he kenà iyan si Jesus mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì. Is egkaǥi kayi, ne iyan kuntada ni Kristu su egkeǥiyen din he kenà tutuu he ed-ezapen is Amey tew he Megbevayà ne egkeǥiyen din daan he kenà si Kristu Anak te tutuu he Megbevayà.

Ne ke zuen etew he kenè din edewaten is Anak te Megbevayà, kenè din daan edewaten is Amey tew he Megbevayà. Ne iring din ded daan ke zuen etew he midawat din en is Anak te Megbevayà, nezawat din en daan is Amey tew he Megbevayà.

Is tuluuwen he impenurù keniyu hein aney kew medtuu, kinahanglan he edhemenan niw su emun edhemenan niw kenà egkehimu he kenè kew layun egkesevaha te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey te Anak din he si Jesu Kristu.
Su iyan impenaad kenitew ni Kristu is untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Ebpesuratan ku sikiyu wey kew med-andam su zuen menge etew he tarù is ibpetuuwan dan pezem keniyu.

Iyan, sikiyu, wazà kinahanglan he zuen selakew pa he ebpenurù keniyu su mibpeulinan kew en ni Kristu te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Pinaaǥi zutun egkesavut niw is langun he ibpesavut keniyu ni Kristu. Tutuu mulà ne kenà tarù haazà is ibpesavut din keniyu umba kinahanglan he hemeni niw is kebpekidsevaha niw kandin sumalà is impenurù en keniyu.
Ne tenged kayi te langun, menge anak ku, hemeni niw is kebpekidsevaha niw ki Kristu su wey kenè kew mahandek ne kenè kew egkeeled keuzemà dutun te kedlikù din.
Netuenan te en he metazeng si Kristu. Netuenan ta zaan he minsan hentei he metazeng is menge ulaula zin, nehimu en sikandin he anak te Megbevayà.

Utew kiw mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa te Amey tew he Megbevayà su ahaa niw man migngezanan kiw zin en he menge anak din ne menge anak kiw zin en iyan. Is menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada te Megbevayà, kenè kiw zan egkekilala he menge anak kiw te Megbevayà su kenè dan daan egkekilala ke hentei sikandin.

Menge minahal ku he menge emiǥu, menge anak kiw en te Megbevayà ne kenè tew pa egketuenan ke hengkey is egketemanan te kegkeenaka kenitew te Megbevayà. Iyan, netuenan tew he ke edlikù si Kristu, egkehimu zutun is kenitew he zagwey he iring te kandin he zagwey su zutun egkeehè tew human is tutuu he zagwey zin.
Is minsan hentei he ebperateng te kedlikù ni Kristu, layun din ebpurungi is menge ulaula zin su wey wazà mezaat iring te wazà daan mezaat he ulaula ni Kristu.
Ke zuen nekesalà, nesupak din is kesuǥuan te Megbevayà su is ulaula he egngezanan te salà ne iyan is minsan hengkey he ulaula he supak te kesuǥuan te Megbevayà.
Netuenan niw en he umba mibpeetew si Kristu su wey zin maawà is menge salè tew. Ne netuenan niw zaan he wazà minsan sevaha he salà he nehimu zin wey egkehimu zin.

Ne tenged dutun is minsan hentei he edhemenan din is kebpekidsevaha zin ki Kristu, kenà egkehimu he layun sikandin ed-ulaula te mezaat. Sikan is etew he layun ed-ulaula te mezaat, wazè din metueni ke hentei si Kristu ne wazè din tuuwi sikandin.

Menge anak ku, kinahanglan he kenè niw pemineǥa is minsan hentei he teruen he ebpenurù pezem keniyu. Iyan tutuu is: ke zuen etew he ed-ulaula te hustu ne iyan sikandin metazeng he etew iring te metazeng si Kristu.

Ke zuen etew he layun ed-ulaula te mezaat ne sakup sikandin ni Setanas su layun daan si Setanas ed-ulaula te mezaat puun pa te kedlimbaǥa te kelibutan. Umba midhendini te kelibutan is Anak te Megbevayà su wey zin ikeawà is gehem te menge ulaula ni Setanas.

Is minsan hentei he nehimu en he anak te Megbevayà, kenè en sikandin egkesuat he ed-ulaula te mezaat su midsempù en man te Megbevayà. Geina te iyan Amey zin is Megbevayà kenà egkehimu he layun sikandin ed-ulaula te mezaat.

Ne ke zuen etew he kenà metazeng is menge ulaula zin, tuus heini he kenà sikandin anak te Megbevayà. Ne kenà daan anak te Megbevayà is minsan hentei he kenè din ebmahalen is duma zin. Pinaaǥi kayi egketuusan ta ke hentei is menge anak te Megbevayà wey ke hentei is menge sakup ni Setanas.
Kinahanglan he ebmahalen tew te kada sevaha is menge zuma tew. Iyan heini impenurù kenitew hein aney kiw meketuu.
Kenè tew ed-iringan si Kain su sakup sikandin ni Setanas ne mibunù din is hazi zin. Umba mibunù din su mezaat is kandin he ulaula ne metazeng mulà is menge ulaula te hazi zin.
Menge suled, kenè kew meinuinu emun ebpekigkuntada keniyu is menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada te Megbevayà.

Netuenan tew he zengan iyan egkeperateng tew is kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan. Ne netuenan tew zaan he ǥuntaan duen tew en untung he wazà pidtemanan. Umba netuenan tew heini su utew en mahal zini te ǥehinawa tew is menge zuma tew. Is minsan hentei he kenà mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin is menge zuma zin, kemulu pa sikandin ebpekeperateng te kemetayen he wazà pidtemanan.

Is minsan hentei he ebpekigkuntada te zuma zin, mid-isip sikandin te Megbevayà he iring te teremunù; ne netuenan ta he ke zuen etew he egkesuat he ebunù wazè pa sikandin mekeangken te untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Umba netuenan tew en he utew zekelà is kebmahala kenitew te Megbevayà diyà te ǥehinawa zin su mibpehimatey si Jesu Kristu he elili kenitew. Ne sikitew zaan, kinahanglan he edtevangan tew is menge zuma tew he tumutuu minsan ke ibpatey ta haazà is kedtavang.
Ke zuen minsan hentei kenitew he egkehimu he edtevangan din is duma zin he edlised, iyan, kenè din edtevangan, kenà egkehimu he mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin is Megbevayà.
Menge mahal ku he anak, kinahanglan he kenà menge lalag dà is kebmahala ta te menge zuma ta, kekenà, kinahanglan he ibpeehè ta is kebmahala ta kandan pinaaǥi te menge ulaula ta.
Su emun ed-ul-ulahan tew heini, egketuenan tew he menge anak kiw iyan te tutuu he Megbevayà. Ne tenged dutun kenè en kinahanglan he egkeeled ki ziyà te etuvangan din
minsan pa te iyan diyà te isip ta is: dait ki he edsilutan. Umba kenè ki egkeeled su iyan lavew he egkeseriǥan is hukum te Megbevayà, kenà is hukum te isip ta su netuenan din is minsan hengkey.
Ne emun netuenan ta he wazè en igkesiluti zin kenita, egkehimu en he zekelà is kedsarig ta ke ed-ampù ki ziyà te kandin.
Ibeǥey zin kenita is ebuyuen ta su edtumanen ta is menge suǥù din wey ed-ul-ulahan ta is egkesuatan din.
Ne iyan insuǥù din kenitew is: kinahanglan he edtuuwan tew is Anak din he si Jesu Kristu wey ebmahalen tew te kada sevaha is menge zuma tew sumalà is insuǥù daan dengan ni Jesus.

Is minsan hentei he edtuman te menge suǥù te Megbevayà, nekidsevaha sikandin te Megbevayà ne ziyà te kandin ed-ubpà is Megbevayà. Egketuenan ta he zini te kenita ed-ubpà is Megbevayà su mid-ulinan ki te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.

Menge minahal ku he suled, kenè niw petuluy tuuwi is etew he egkaǥi he mid-ulinan sikandin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Gezami niw zè pa wey niw metueni ke ebpuun be te Megbevayà is ed-ulin kandin. Umba egkeǥiyen ku heini su mezakel en is menge ebpenurù te tarù he midlepew zini te kelibutan he mid-ulinan sikandan te teruen he mulin-ulin.

Is minsan hentei he mulin-ulin he egkaǥi he mibpeetew si Jesus is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì, ne ziyà ebpuun haazà is mulin-ulin te Megbevayà. Pinaaǥi kayi egketuusan niw is mulin-ulin he ebpuun te Megbevayà.

Iyan, ke zuen mulin-ulin he egkaǥi he wazà mebpeetew si Jesus is mibpilì te Megbevayà, ne kenà ebpuun haazà is mulin-ulin diyà te Megbevayà, kekenà, diyà ebpuun te kuntada ni Kristu. Nezineg niw en he zuen edlepew he mulin-ulin he ebpuun te kuntada ni Kristu. Ne egkeǥiyen ku keniyu he zini en guntaan haazà te kelibutan.

Sikiyu, menge anak ku, gaked kew en te Megbevayà ne nezaag niw en is menge teruen he mulin-ulin su lavew pa he mekeǥeǥehem is Megbevayà he ziyà ed-ubpà te kenitew, kenà si Setanas he ziyà ed-ubpà te menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada te Megbevayà.

Haazà is menge etew he mid-ulinan te teruen he menge mulin-ulin, kuntada man sikandan te Megbevayà wey supak te Megbevayà is ibpenurù dan. Ne tenged dutun ebpemineǥen sikandan te menge etew zini te kelibutan he kuntada zaan te Megbevayà.

Iyan, sikitew mulà, gaked kiw te Megbevayà ne tenged dutun ebpemineg te ibpenurù tew is minsan hentei he emiǥu te Megbevayà. Iyan, is minsan hentei he kenà gaked te Megbevayà, kenà ebpemineg te ibpenurù tew. Pinaaǥi kayi egketuusan tew ke hentei is mid-ulinan te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he ebpenurù te tutuu wey ke hentei is mid-ulinan te teruen he mulin-ulin.

Minahal ku he menge suled, kinahanglan he ebpurung kiw egiǥineǥawè su ziyà ebpuun te Megbevayà is gaǥew. Is minsan hentei he zekelà is gaǥew zin te menge zuma zin, ne iyan nehimu en he anak te Megbevayà wey emiǥu te Megbevayà.
Is minsan hentei he wazè din gaǥew te menge zuma zin, wazè din hanew te menge ulaula te Megbevayà su is minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà, ne iyan kebpaahaa zin te ǥaǥew zin.
Impehendini te Megbevayà is sebsevaha zà he Anak din te kelibutan su wey pinaaǥi kandin mekeangken kiw te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Iyan haazà kebpaahaa zin te ǥaǥew zin kenitew.
Is tutuu he ǥaǥew, kenà iyan is kebmahala tew te Megbevayà, kekenà, iyan is kebmahala zin kenitew wey is kebpehendiniya zin te Anak din su wey pinaaǥi te kebpehimatey zin mepesaylu is menge salè tew.
Menge minahal ku he suled, geina te iring dutun is utew zekelà he ǥaǥew kenitew te Megbevayà, kinahanglan he utew zaan dekelà is gaǥew te kada sevaha kenitew ziyà te menge zuma zin.
Wazè pa etew he nekeahà te Megbevayà, iyan, emun egiǥineǥawè kiw, ed-ubpà dini te kenitew is Megbevayà, ne egkeheǥet is kebmahala ta te Megbevayà dini te ǥehinawa ta.
Mibpeulinan ki zin te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne tenged dutun egketuusan ta he nekidsevaha ki kandin wey impeubpè din dini te kenita is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.
Sikami is menge epustul, netuenan dey he impehendini te Megbevayà is Anak din su wey melibri is menusiyà te silut. Umba netuenan dey su neehè dey sikandin ne edtudtulen dey is neehè dey.
Ne ke zuen minsan hentei he egkaǥi he edtuuwan din he Anak te Megbevayà si Jesus, diyà ed-ubpà te kandin is Megbevayà ne nekidsevaha sikandin te Megbevayà.

Ne tenged dutun nesavut tew en he utew zekelà is gagew kenitew te Megbevayà ne umba ebpekesarig kiw. Is minsan hengkey he ed-ul-ulahan te Megbevayà, ne iyan kebpaahaa zin te ǥagew zin. Is minsan hentei he layun dekelà is gagew zin te menge zuma zin, meheǥet is kebpekidsevaha zin te Megbevayà, ne ziyà te kandin ed-ubpà is Megbevayà.

Edheǥetan din is kebmahala tew kandin dini te ǥehinawa tew su wey wazè tew kehandek keuzemà dutun te andew te kedsusiya zin te nengeulaula te tivuuk he menusiyà. Umba kenè kiw egkehandek su iring te metazeng is menge ulaula ni Kristu, metazeng daan is kenitew he ulaula zini te kelibutan.

Ne is minsan hentei he ebmahalen te Megbevayà, wazà kinahanglan he egkehandek sikandin te Megbevayà. Ne ǥeina te wazà kurang te kebmahala kenitew te Megbevayà in-awè din en is kegkehandek tew kandin. Umba egkehandek is etew su egkeperateng din is silut kandin te Megbevayà, iyan, sikan is etew he egkehandek te Megbevayà, wazè pa meheǥet diyà te isip din is kebmahala kandin te Megbevayà.
Umba utew en mahal sikandin dini te ǥehinawa tew su nehuna kiw zin he mibmahal ziyà te kandin he ǥehinawa.

Ke zuen minsan hentei he egkaǥi he utew mahal ziyà te ǥehinawa zin is Megbevayà, iyan, ebpekigkuntada sikandin te zuma zin, teruen sikandin. Su kenà egkehimu he ebmahalen din is Megbevayà he wazè din maahà ke kenè din daan ebmahalen is duma zin he neehè din en mulà.
Su insuǥù kenitew te Megbevayà he is minsan hentei he tutuu is kebmahala zin te Megbevayà, kinahanglan daan he ebmahalen din is duma zin.

Anak en te Megbevayà is minsan hentei he edtuu he iyan si Jesus mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì. Ne emun ebmahalen din diyà te ǥehinawa zin is Amey tew he Megbevayà ebmahalen din daan is menge zuma zin he anak te Megbevayà.
Emun hustu is kebmahala ta te Megbevayà wey is kedtumana ta te menge suǥù din, egketuenan ta he hustu zaan is kebmahala ta te menge zuma ta he anak te Megbevayà.
Is hustu he kebmahala ta te Megbevayà, ne iyan is kedtumana ta te menge suǥù din. Ne kenà mereǥen he edtumanen is menge suǥù din
su sikitew is langun he nehimu en he menge anak te Megbevayà, egkezaag tew en si Setanas he iyan ebayàbayà dini te kelibutan; ne iyan ibpekezaag tew kandin is kedtuu tew ki Jesus.
Hentei is ebpekezaag ki Setanas? Iyan dà sikan is midtuu he Anak te Megbevayà si Jesus.

Iyan si Jesu Kristu sikan is midsuǥù te Amey zin dini te kelibutan. Egketuusan heini pinaaǥi te wahig wey lengesa. Kenà heini egketuusan pinaaǥi zà te wahig he iyan is kebewtismuwi kandin , kekenà, pinaaǥi zaan te lengesa he iyan is kedtiǥis te lengesa zin dutun te kedrensanga kandin te krus . Iyan ebpenistiǥus kayi zini te kenitew is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, su tutuu layun is egkeǥiyen din.
Tetelu is ebpenistiǥus mehitenged ki Jesu Kristu.
Is sevaha, ne iyan is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin; is sevaha pa, ne iyan is kebewtismuwi ki Jesu Kristu, ne is sevaha pa, ne iyan is kedtiǥis te lengesa zin. Ne neuyun is kedtistiǥus kayi te tetelu.
Egkevenaran ki te kebpenistiǥus te menge etew zà duen, iyan, lavew pa he mezesen is kebpenistiǥus te Megbevayà ne midtistiǥusan din he Anak din si Jesus.

Is minsan hentei he edtuu he Anak te Megbevayà si Jesus, nevenaran sikandin te kebpenistiǥus te Megbevayà. Is minsan hentei he kenà edtuu te kebpenistiǥus te Megbevayà, ed-isipen din he teruen is Megbevayà su wazè din tuuwi is kebpenistiǥus te Megbevayà mehitenged te Anak din he si Jesus.
Is Megbevayà, imbeǥey zin kenitew is untung he wazà pidtemanan; ne ziyà ebpuun heini is untung te Anak din he si Jesus. Iyan heini sikan is kebpenistiǥus kenitew te Megbevayà.
Is minsan hentei he nekidsevaha te Anak te Megbevayà, duen din en untung he wazà pidtemanan. Is minsan hentei he wazà mebpekidsevaha te Anak te Megbevayà, wazè din untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Sikiyu is nemeketuu en te Anak te Megbevayà, ebpesuratan ku sikiyu wey niw metueni he zuen niw en untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Sikitew is nemeketuu, dekelà is kebpekesarig tew ke ed-ampù kiw ziyà te Megbevayà. Netuenan tew he ke zuen minsan hengkey he ebuyuen tew he kenà supak te egkesuatan din, ibeǥey zin kenitew.
Layun sikandin ebpemineg kenitew ke ed-ampù kiw ne tenged dutun netuenan tew zaan he ibeǥey zin is ebuyuen tew.

Ke zuen minsan hentei he neehè din he nekesalà is duma zin, iyan, is rimeǥas dutun te salà, ne kenà kemetayen, ne kinahanglan he iampù din ne is Megbevayà, ibeǥey zin is untung he wazà pidtemanan dutun te nekesalà. Iyan egkeǥiyen ku kayi is etew he nekesalà he kenà kemetayen is rimeǥas dutun te salè din. Duen salà he iyan rimeǥas dutun is kemetayen. Kenè ku iyan egkeǥiyen he id-ampù tew is etew he nekesalà te iring dutun.
Salà is minsan hengkey he mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan, ne zuen salà he kenà iyan rimeǥas dutun is kemetayen.
Netuenan tew he wazà minsan hentei he nehimu he anak te Megbevayà he layun ed-ulaula te mezaat su edlig-enan sikandin te Anak te Megbevayà ne kenè en sikandin egkehilevetan ni Setanas.
Netuenan tew he menge anak kiw te Megbevayà, iyan, is langun he menge kuntada te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan, ebeyveyaan sikandan ni Setanas.

Netuenan tew zaan he midhendini en te kelibutan is Anak te Megbevayà ne imbeǥey zin kenitew is kedsavut wey kiw mehimu he menge emiǥu te tutuu he Megbevayà. Nekidsevaha kiw te tutuu he Megbevayà su nekidsevaha kiw te Anak din he si Jesu Kristu. Iyan sikandin tutuu he Megbevayà, iyan sikandin puunà te untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Menge anak ku, likayi niw is ked-ezapa te minsan hengkey he kenà iyan is tutuu he Megbevayà.

Siak is meǥurang, ebpesuratan ku sikew is bahi he pinilì te Megbevayà wey is menge anak nu. Utew kew mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku ne kenà dini zà te kedì he ǥehinawa, kekenà, mahal kew zaan diyà te langun he neketuu te tutuu he tuluuwen.
Umba minahal zey sikiyu su ǥeina te midhamen kiw en te tutuu he tuluuwen ne heini is tutuu he tuluuwen, kenà egkeawà dini te kenitew te wazà pidtemanan.

Is Amey tew he Megbevayà wey si Jesu Kristu he Anak din, berakat he meǥeǥawi zan kenitew, ikehizu kiw zan, ne veǥayi kiw zan te melinawen he kebpekesavuk. Egkehimu heini su midhamen kiw te tutuu he tuluuwen wey ebmahalen tew is menge zuma tew.
Nelipey ad utew su zuen menge anak nu he edtuman te tutuu he tuluuwen sumalà is insuǥù kenitew te Amey tew he Megbevayà.
Ne tenged dutun, Bayi, edhengyuen ku he egiǥineǥawè kiw. Kenà beǥu heini he suǥù is idsurat ku kayi, su zaan heini zuen te aney tew en kedtuu.
Su emun egiǥineǥawè kiw, egketuman tew is menge suǥù te Megbevayà. Su iyan suǥù din kenitew is: kinahanglan he egiǥineǥawè kiw.

Mezakel is nemenlepew he ebpenurù te tarù dini te kelibutan. Egkeǥiyen dan he si Jesus is mibpilì te Megbevayà he ibpahadì, wazà sikandin mehimu he etew. Is minsan hentei he iyan haazà egkeǥiyen dan, teruen sikandin wey kuntada ni Kristu.
Andam kew wey kenà maawà diyan te keniyu is midheǥuan niw su wey kenà meterini keuzemà is suhul te Megbevayà keniyu.

Ke zuen etew he ed-engkezan din is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù ni Kristu su iyan edhemenan din is tarù he tuluuwen he in-uman din dutun, wazà sikandin mebpekidsevaha te Megbevayà. Is minsan hentei mulà he edhemenan din is tutuu he tuluuwen, iyan sikandin mibpekidsevaha te Amey tew he Megbevayà wey is Anak din.

Ke zuen ebpekeuma he minsan hentei he ebpenurù te tuluuwen ne kenè din iyan ibpenurù is tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù ni Kristu, kenè niw ipepemenahik diyan te valey niw. Kenè niw zaan igalewǥalew sikandin.
Su minsan ke igalewǥalew niw zà sikandin, egketevangan niw sikandin dutun te ulaula zin he mezaat.
Mezakel pezem is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu, iyan, kenè ku egkesuatan te edsurat. Egkesuatan ku he ebpenumbaley a ziyan wey kiw mekedlelalag ne wey meheǥet is kelipey tew.
Ebpengemusta keniyu is menge anak te suled nu he vahi zini he pinilì daan te Megbevayà.
Siak is meǥurang, ebpesuratan ku sikew, Gayu, is emiǥu ku he utew ku minahal.
Minahal ku he suled, id-ampù ku sikew ziyà te Megbevayà he mebmeupiya is kebpekesavuk nu wey iveǥey kenikew is meupiya he lawa iring te imbeǥey zin daan kenikew is mezesen he kedtuu.
Nelipey a utew zutun te kebpekeuma zini te menge suled tew he ebpuun diyan su midtudtulan e zan he utew meheǥet is kedhemeni nu te tutuu he tuluuwen wey uyun kun daan dutun is menge ulaula nu.
Iyan utew ku igkelipey is kegkezineg ku te tudtul he edtuman en te tutuu he tuluuwen is menge anak ku te kedtuu.
Minahal ku he suled, utew ka veliǥeǥawen su mibpurungan nu is menge suled tew he midtuluy ziyan minsan te sikan nu pa sikandan mekilala.

Mibpenudtul zan te menge tumutuu zini hein midtiǥum key he utew zekelà is gaǥew nu kandan. Emun ed-uman dan edtuluy ziyan tevangi nu en maan sikandan te paaǥi he egkesuatan te Megbevayà wey zan mekelaus dutun te kedhipanew zan.
Su midhipanew zan wey zan mekesangyew te impenurù ni Kristu, iyan, kenè dan ebpetavang te kenà menge tumutuu.
Ne tenged dutun kinahanglan he iyan ki is tumutuu ebeǥey ziyà te kandan su wey ki meketavang dutun te kedsengyawa zan te tutuu he tuluuwen.
Mibpesuratan ku is menge tumutuu ziyan, iyan, si Diyutripis, kenè din ebpemineǥen is menge suǥù ku. Iyan egkesuatan din is: iyan dà sikandin ebayàbayà.

Emun ebpekehendiyan a, edseyseyen ku keniyu is langun he mezaat he ed-ul-ulahan din, su kenà tutuu is menge memezaat he lalag din he ebpemekesuǥat kenami. Ne kenà duen dà taman su kenè din ed-elimahan is menge zuma ta he tumutuu ke ebpekeuma zan. Ne kenè din daan idtuǥut he ed-elimahan sikandan te menge zuma zin he tumutuu ziyan. Is ed-elima mulà kandan, kenè din idtuǥut he edtampu zan te kedsimba niw.

Minahal ku he suled, kenè ta iyan ed-iringan is mezaat he ulaula he iring dutun, kekenà, iyan ta ed-iringan is meupiya he ulaula. Is minsan hentei he meupiya is menge ulaula zin, neǥaked sikandin te Megbevayà. Is minsan hentei mulà he mezaat is ulaula zin, wazà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is Megbevayà.
Nezeliǥan si Dimitriyu te langun he menge etew. Egkeehè dan pinaaǥi te menge ulaula zin he edtumanen din is tutuu he tuluuwen. Edeliǥen dey zaan sikandin ne netuenan nu he tutuu is egkeǥiyen dey.
Mezakel pa pezem is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu, iyan, kenè ku egkesuatan te edsurat.
Egkesuatan ku he kenè en utew egkeuǥet edhendiyan a ne human ki ebpekedlalag.
Berakat he melinawen is kebpekesavuk niw ziyan. Is menge emiǥu nu zini, ebpengemusta zan kenikew. Ipengemusta a zaan te langun he menge emiǥu ta ziyan.

Siak si Hudas is suled ni Santiago wey is suluǥuen ni Jesu Kristu. Sikiyu is midhimu te Amey tew he Megbevayà he menge tumutuu he menge minahal zin he midlig-enan ni Jesu Kristu, iyan kew ebpesuratan ku.
Berakat he mehizuwi kew, mebmelinawen kew, wey ikeǥaǥew kew te Megbevayà.

Minahal ku he menge suled, minsan pa te iyan aney he egkesuatan ku is ebaal a te surat he ibpeuwit ku ziyan wey ku ikeseysey ziyan te keniyu is kedlibriya kenitew te Megbevayà, iyan, utew en guntaan epiki he ebpesuratan ku sikiyu wey ku sikiyu mesembaǥi. Kinahanglan, menge suled, he pekezesen kew sukul te menge etew he edhelinen dan pezem is tutuu he tuluuwen he imbeǥey te Megbevayà. Haazà is tuluuwen, imbeǥey zin kenitew te menge ǥaked din ne kinahanglan he kenè en ed-umanan te minsan hentei.

Umba kinahanglan he egkeǥiyen ku heini su zuen menge etew he nekeamur keniyu, iyan, id-eles dan he kenà hustu is edtuuwan dan. Wazè dan kedtahud te Megbevayà; edhelinen dan pezem is tutuu he tuluuwen su ibpenurù dan he egkehimu ke ed-ul-ulahan tew is meremerik su utew kun beliǥeǥawen is Megbevayà ne ebpeseyluwen kiw zin gihapun. Kenè dan edtuu he si Jesu Kristu, iyan dà egalen tew wey Nengazen tew. Dengan dà isurat te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà ke hengkey is silut kandan.

Netuenan niw en is egkeǥiyen ku, iyan, ed-umanan ku pa egkeǥiya ziyan te keniyu wey niw kenà melipati.
