Dengan midlibri te Megbevayà is menge pinilì din he etew ne impeǥuwè din sikandan diyà te ǥinhedian he Ihiptu, iyan, dutun te nekeǥuwè dan en, mibpenhimetayan din is duma kandan he wazà medsarig kandin.

Isipa niw zaan is menge velinsuǥuen din dengan diyà te langit. Mid-engkezan dan is ketengdanan he imbeǥey zin kandan ne mid-ewaan dan is hustu he ed-ubpaan dan. Tenged dutun mibpirisu zin sikandan diyà te utew merusirem. Mibakus din te kedina he kenà egkezeetan te wazà pidtemanan su idtaǥad sikandan taman te kenè pa egkeuma is andew keuzemà te kedsiluti zin kandan.

Isipa niw zaan is menge meǥinged dutun te menge inged he Suduma wey Gumura wey is menge inged he uvey zutun. Neiringan dan haazà is menge velinsuǥuen su utew subra is mezaat he menge ulaula zan. Is menge maama zutun, ne kenà iyan dà is menge vahi midhilevetan dan, kekenà, neked-eeriǥè dan is pudu menge maama ne tenged dutun midsilutan sikandan te hapuy ne nehimu haazà he petizaan te Megbevayà te langun keuzemà he edsilutan din te hapuy he kenà egkeevukan.

Ne iring din ded daan haazà is menge etew he ebpenurù te tarù diyan te keniyu. Edtumanen dan is meremerik he ulaula he egkeǥiyen dan he impenurù kandan pinaaǥi te teǥeinep. Kenè dan ebpesakup te Megbevayà ne edsumpeliten dan is menge kedesenan diyà te langit.

Ne minsan si Miguel, sikan is lavew he velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà, kenà sikandin ed-ulaula te iring dutun su hein minatey zengan si Moises, mibpelewanà si Miguel wey si Setanas ke hentei is ebpekeangken te lawa ni Moises. Ne wazà mekeǥehem si Miguel he edsulà ki Setanas. Iyan dà lalag din kandin is: Iyan edsawey kenikew is Megbevayà.

Iyan, haazà is menge etew mulà he ebpenurù te tarù, edsumpeliten dan is kenè dan egkesavut. Iring sikandan te menge leew he langgam he kenà ebpekeisip-isip su is ulaula he egkesuatan te lawa zan, iyan edtumanen dan ne iyan haazà ebpekezezaat kandan.

Kehizu zan! Mid-iringan dan is mid-ulaula zengan ni Kain. Mid-iringan dan is paaǥi ni Belaam he utew sayep su minsan netuenan dan he mezaat is ed-ul-ulahan dan, ed-ul-ulahan dan gihapun su susuaten sikandan te selapì. Iring te midsukul si Kuri te Mebevayà, midsukul zan daan ne edsilutan sikandan iring te midsilutan daan si Kuri.

Ebpekezezaat sikandan te zengeg niw ke edtampu zan te keemuran niw su kenè dan mulà egkeeled dutun te kedtumana zan te mezaat he kebayè dan ke ebpekidtuǥen dan keniyu. Iyan dà egkeisip dan is kandan dà he egkesuatan. Wazè dan menge pulus; iring sikandan te menge ǥapun he wazà duen uzan he mibpagwis te keramag. Iring sikandan te menge kayu he kenà ebpemeǥas minsan pa te iyan en pezem timpu te kebpemeǥas. Ne umba kenà ebpekepemeǥas su nepiley en ne neǥangu.

Iring daan sikandan te utew zezekelà he vaǥel ziyà te zaǥat ke zuen bagyu su iring is menge mekeeled-eled he ulaula zan te meremerik he vuràburà he ebpenlepew ziyà te veyvey. Iring sikandan te menge vituen he nekesuwey te hustu he nesevukan dan su kenè en egkeseriǥan is ibpenurù dan. Midteǥana te Megbevayà is utew merusirem he egkeubpaan dan te wazà pidtemanan.

Si Inuk, sikan is ikepitu he lapis he kevuwazan ni Adan, netagnè din dengan haazà is menge etew su migkaǥi sikandin te, Keuzemà ebpekeuma is Nengazen he edumahan te liblibuwen he menge velinsuǥuen din

su edsusiyen din is nengeulaula te minsan hentei he etew. Edsilutan din is minsan hentei he lalung he wazè dan kedtahud te Megbevayà tenged te menge kelelalung he mid-ulaula zan wey tenged te kedsumpelita zan te Megbevayà.

Ne haazà is menge etew he netagnà ni Inuk, menge perelivak wey perevasul sikandan. Iyan dan edtumanen is menge memezaat he kebayè dan. Memepelevawen dan, iyan, edigdiǥen dan is menge zuma he etew su wey zan melimbungi.
Tentenuzi niw, menge suled, is netagnà dengan te menge epustul he midsuǥù te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu.
Ke sikandan te, Keuzemà te ketepusan he menge andew ebpenlepew is menge etew he edsumpalit keniyu. Iyan edtumanen dan is menge kebayè dan he supak te Megbevayà.
Ne haazà is menge etew he netagnè dan, iyan igkevahinbahin niw te menge tumutuu. Iyan dà egkeisip dan is egkesuatan dan dini te kelibutan ne wazà diyà te kandan is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.

Ne sikiyu mulà, menge minahal ku he suled, peniguduwi niw is kebpetebtevangè niw su wey meheǥet is kedtuu niw te tuluuwen he impetuuwan kenitew te Megbevayà. Pekezesen kew ampù pinaaǥi te ǥehem he ibeǥey te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin.

Layun niw isipa is utew zekelà he ǥaǥew keniyu te Megbevayà dutun te kedteǥazi niw te timpu keuzemà he zutun ibpaahà kenitew te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu is dekelà he hizu zin su zutun kenè kiw zin edsuwayan te wazà pidtemanan.
Is menge etew he zuwazuwa pa is kedtuu zan, ipeehè niw kandan is hizu niw kandan.

Tevangi niw sikandan wey zan melibri te silut, iring te kedsekelawa niw ziyà te hapuy te egketutung. Is menge zuma he utew zekelà is salè dan, ipeehè niw zaan kandan is hizu niw, iyan, andam kew su kela ke mepenulayi kew zaan pinaaǥi te meremerik he ulaula zan.

Utew zekelà is kebpeselemati tew te Megbevayà. Iyan metau he edtavang kenitew su wey kenè kiw mekesuwey ziyà te kandin. Iyan metau he id-etuvang kiw keuzemà kandin diyà te vulawan he ed-ulian he wazà igkesewayi kenitew he utew zekelà dutun is kelipey tew.

Edeliǥen tew sikandin su iyan dà sikandin Megbevayà; iyan sikandin Menluluwas tew pinaaǥi te Nengazen tew he si Jesu Kristu. Iyan sikandin egkevantug; iyan sikandin hadì; iyan sikandin mekeǥeǥehem; iyan sikandin ebayàbayà dengan te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey, wey ǥuntaan, wey keuzemà te wazà pidtemanan.

Iyan heini kedtudtula te impezayag ni Jesu Kristu. Insarig heini kandin te Megbevayà wey zin daan ikepesavut diyà te menge suluǥuen te Megbevayà ke hengkey is meǥaan en he egkengeulaula. Impesavut heini ni Kristu pinaaǥi te kedsuǥua zin te velinsuǥuen din diyà te kediey te suluǥuen din he si Juan.
Ne siak, id-amin ku idsurat is langun he neehè ku. Is migkaǥi te Megbevayà wey is tutuu he tuluuwen he impesavut kediey ni Jesu Kristu, idsurat ku kayi.
Edtuvazan te Megbevayà is ebasa kayi te libru wey edtuvazan din daan is ebpemineg te kebesaha kayi ne edtuman te insuǥù kayi. Su utew en meǥaan is kegketuman te langun kayi te netagnà.

Siak si Juan, ne ebpesuratan ku is pitu he gurupu te menge tumutuu he ziyà te prubinsya he Asya. Ibpengumew-umew ku he ikeǥaǥew kew te Megbevayà, wey te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin, wey ni Jesu Kristu, ne iveǥey zan daan keniyu is melinawen he kebpekesavuk. Is Megbevayà, daan en sikandin te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey; kemulu pa sikandin guntaan wey kenà sikandin egkehanew te wazà pidtemanan. Is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he ziyà ed-ubpà te etuvangan te pinuuwà te Megbevayà, ne pitu is gehem din. Si Jesu Kristu, iyan egkeseriǥan is lalag din. Iyan sikandin kes nehuna he zuen din beǥu en he untung pinaaǥi te kegkevenhawa kandin. Iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te menge hadì dini te kelibutan. Dekelà is gehinawa zin kenitew. Midlibri kiw zin te silut te menge salè tew pinaaǥi te kebpaaǥas din te lengesa zin.
Midhimu zin he iyan kiw edhedian din wey iyan kiw memumuhat he iyan kebpemuhat tew is ked-ezapa tew te Megbevayà he Amey zin. Tehuza sikandin wey medhadì sikandin te wazà pidtemanan!

Ebpekeuma si Jesu Kristu he ziyà egkeahà te menge ǥapun. Egkeahà sikandin te tivuuk he menusiyà ragkes is menge etew he mibpilak kandin dengan. Ne is langun he kelasi te menusiyà dini te kelibutan, ebpekesineǥew zan tenged kandin su egkehandek dan te silut. Metuman heini is langun.

Is Nengazen tew he Megbevayà he mekeǥeǥehem he zaan en te wazè pa limbaǥa is minsan hengkey, iyan ded sikandin guntaan wey minsan keuzemà te wazà pidtemanan. Ke sikandin te, Iyan a sikan is alpa wey umiga, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kes puunà wey egkepengkusan te minsan hengkey.

Iyan a si Juan is sevaha he suled niw tenged te kedtuu ku ki Jesus. Iring keniyu nekeantus a zaan te menge kemeresayan su sakup a zaan te ǥinhedian din. Tenged te ingkepauk te gubirnu is kebpenudtul ku te Lalag te Megbevayà wey is kebpenurù ku te impesavut ni Jesus, impesivey a ne ziyà a ibpeubpà te sengepupulu he egngezanan te Patmus.

Ne zutun te sevaha he andew he Duminggu, utew mezesen is ked-uwita kedì te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin ne zuen impeehè din kedì. Diyà te egkeiniyuǥan ku nezineg ku is egkaǥi he iring te vudyung su utew mezaǥing,

ne ke sikandin te, Is egkeehè nu, isurat nu ne ibpeuwit nu ziyà te pitu he menge gurupu te menge tumutuu he ziyà te menge inged he Ipisu, Ismirna, Pirgemu, Tiyetira, Sardis, Piledilpya, wey ziyà daan te inged he Leudisiya.
Ne midlilingey ku wey ku maahà ke hentei is egkaǥi ne neehè ku is pitu he sulù he vulawan.
Ne ziyà te teliwazà dutun te menge sulù, duen neehè ku he henduen be te etew. Meluǥayad is kumbalè din ne mibevanda te vulawan.
Is ulu zin wey vulvul zin, ne utew meputì su iring te manggad he meputì. Is mata zin, ne henduen be te egkeregreg.
Ne is menge paa zin, ne henduen be te ǥalang he midlangga he midlimbasan. Ne is laǥeng din, ne henduen be te zeǥurus te utew mezakel he menge wahig.
Ne ziyà te kewanan din migewezan din is pitu he vituen. Ne edlepew ziyà te vèbè din is sundang he zezuwa is gerangan din he utew meǥarang. Ne is buked din, henduen te edsiǥa he andew he utew merayag.

Ne hein neehè ku sikandin, nekelangkeb a ziyà te etuvangan din ne henduen a te minatey. Ne indampè din kediey is kewanan he palad din ne ke sikandin te, Kenè ka mahandek su iyan a sikan is puunà wey kes egkepengkusan te langun.
Iyan a kes Megbevayà he wazè din kemetayen. Mibpehimatey a ne ǥuntaan kenà ad maan ebpatey te minsan keenu. Iyan a ebayàbayà te menge minatey, ne zuen ku zaan keǥehem diyà te Iveyaan.
Isurat nu is ibpeehè ku kenikew, is egkeehè nu he egkeulaula ǥuntaan wey is egkeulaula pa keuzemà.

Ibpesavut ku kenikew is in-eles dengan he kehuluǥan kayi te pitu he vituen he neehè nu he egewezan ku te kewanan he velad ku wey is kehuluǥan kayi te pitu he sulù he vulawan. Is pitu he vituen, iyan alung te pitu he velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebantey te pitu he gurupu te menge tumutuu. Ne heini is pitu he sulù, ne iyan sikan is pitu he gurupu te menge tumutuu.

Ne impelaus din is lalag din te, Pesurati nu is belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebantey te menge tumutuu he ziyà te inged he Ipisu, ne isurat nu is menge lalag ku ziyà, ke sikew te, Siak si Jesus is egawed te pitu he vituen diyà te kewanan ku he velad ne iyan a zaan edhipanew kayi te teliwazà te pitu he sulù.

Netuenan ku is langun he menge ulaula niw; netuenan ku he edhaǥù kew ne meinentusen kew te kemereǥenan tenged te kedtuu niw. Netuenan ku zaan he kenè niw idtuǥut he zuen menge lalung he etew he menge zuma niw, su sikan is menge etew he migkaǥi he menge epustul sikandan ni Jesus, migezaman niw ne zutun netuenan niw he kenà tutuu he menge epustul sikandan.
Netuenan ku he ed-antus kew te mereǥen tenged te kedtuu niw kediey ne minsan pa zutun kenè niw ed-isipen he ed-engkezan niw is kedtumana niw te menge suǥù ku.
Iyan, duen netuenan ku he ulaula niw he kenà meupiya su hein aney kew meketuu, dekelà is gehinawa niw kediey, ne ǥuntaan malù en edeisek is gehinawa niw kediey.

Tentenuzi niw sikan is kedekelaa niw zengan kediey ziyà te ǥehinawa niw; iniyuǥi niw is mezaat he ulaula ne ul-ulaha niw is meupiya he mid-ulaula niw zengan su emun kenà, ebeyaan ku sikiyu. Ne id-awè ku is sulù niw ziyà te selevukè din emun kenè niw edlikuan is daan he ulaula niw.
Duen daan egkesuatan ku he ulaula niw su igkepauk niw is menge mezaat he ulaula te menge Nikuleyta he igkepauk ku zaan.

Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg kayi te egkeǥiyen te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu! Is etew he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, edtuǥutan ku he mekekaan sikandin te veǥas te kayu he iyan puunà te untung he wazà pidtemanan he ziyà te ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà.

Ne ke sikandin maan te, Pesurati nu is belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebantey te menge tumutuu ziyà te inged he Ismirna, ke sikew te, Iyan heini menge lalag ku te puunà te langun ne egkepengkusan daan te langun. Minatey a ne nevanhew.

Netuenan ku is kegkeantus niw te kemeresayan; netuenan ku he egkengeayuayu kew. Ne minsan pa zutun sepian kew utew pinaaǥi te kedtuu niw. Netuenan ku he kenà benar is id-ituk keniyu te menge etew he egkaǥi he menge Hudiyu zan, iyan, kenà sikandan tutuu he Hudiyu su mibpekid-upakat dan ki Setanas.

Kenè kew mahandek te meǥaan niw en igkerasey. Si Setanas, meǥaan din en ibpepirisu is duma keniyu su ebpenulayen kew zin. Ne seled te sepulù he andew ebpekeantus kew te kemereǥenan. Mebmetinumanen kew te menge suǥù ku taman te kemetayen su ebeǥayan ku sikiyu te kuruna he iyan is untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg kayi te egkeǥiyen te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu. Is etew he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, kenè en egkeragkes te silut he iyan is ikezuwa he kemetayen.

Ne ke sikandin maan te, Pesurati nu is belinsuǥuen he impevantey te Megbevayà diyà te menge tumutuu he ziyà te inged he Pirgemu, ke sikew te, Siak si Jesus is egkaǥi; iyan a sikan is duen din sundang he zezuwa is gerangan din he meǥarang utew.

Netuenan ku he sakup ni Setanas is inged niw. Ne minsan pa zutun midhemenan niw is kedtuu niw kedì ne wazè niw engkezi is menge penurù ku minsan dutun te kedhimetayi ki Entipas dengan. Metinumanen sikandin he ebpenudtul te menge lalag ku, ne midhimetayan sikandin diyan te inged niw he nesakup ni Setanas.

Duen nepipira he menge ulaula niw he kenè ku egkesuatan, su zuen duma keniyu he edsunuzen dan is impenurù dengan ni Belaam. Su si Belaam, impenurù din dengan ki Balak is paaǥi wey mepenulayi is menge kevuwazan ni Israyil. Iyan is kegkaan te impemuhat diyà te kenà tutuu he megbevayà wey is kedhilavet te kenè dan esawa.
Ne zuen daan duma keniyu he edtuuwan dan is menge penurù te menge etew he Nikuleyta.
Iniyuǥi niw heini is mezaat he ulaula su emun kenà, meǥaan ku en sikiyu ebeyai ne edtebeken ku heini is menge etew. Iyan gumaan ku heini is sundang dini te vèbè ku he iyan is lalag ku .

Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg te egkeǥiyen te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu. Is etew he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, ebeǥayan ku sikandin te in-eles ku pa he egkeenen he mana he ziyà ebpuun te langit. Ne ibeǥey ku zaan kandin is meputì he vatu he insurat dutun is beǥu en he ngazan. Iyan dà egkesayud te ngazan dutun is ebeǥayan.

Ne ke sikandin maan te, Pesurati nu is belinsuǥuen he impevantey te Megbevayà diyà te menge tumutuu he ziyà te inged he Tiyetira. Ke sikew te, Siak is egkaǥi, ne Anak a te Megbevayà; is menge mata ku, ne henduen be te egkeregreg, ne is menge paa ku, ne henduen be te ǥalang he midlimbasan.

Netuenan ku is menge ulaula niw, dekelà is gehinawa niw kediey. Mezesen is kedtuu niw. Metinumanen kew te menge suǥù ku wey meinentusen kew te mereǥen. Netuenan ku zaan he edhuna he mezakel is menge ulaula niw he meupiya ǥuntaan kenà te mid-ulaula niw he meupiya zengan te aney kew en meketuu.

Ne minsan pa zutun, duen ulaula niw he kenè ku egkesuatan su sikan is bahi he si Hisibil he egkeǥiyen din he ebpeneuven sikandin te Megbevayà, idtuǥut niw he ibpenurù din is mezaat he ulaula ziyà te menge suluǥuen ku. Egkaǥi sikandin he kenà supak te Megbevayà is kedhilavet te kenè niw esawa wey is kegkaan te impemuhat diyà te menge kenà tutuu he megbevayà.
Neuǥet en is ked-entusa ku kandin wey zin meiniyuǥi is ulaula zin he mezaat, iyan, kenè din ed-iniyuǥan.

Ne ǥuntaan, ibpehizeǥè ku su ebpigedahan ku sikandin te zaru. Ne sikiyu is edtampu kandin te memahawag he vaal, ebpigedahan ku zaan sikiyu te kemeresayan he utew mepait emun kenè niw ed-iniyuǥan haazà is menge ulaula zutun te vahi.

Ne is menge sumusundan din, edhimetayan ku. Is menge tumutuu ziyan te langun he menge inged, egketuenan dan he iyan a nesayud ke hengkey is diyà te isip wey ǥehinawa te etew. Ibeǥey ku ziyà te kada sevaha is engayan he igkeveǥey kandin sumalà te menge ulaula zin.

Ne sikiyu is duma ziyan te Tiyetira he wazà mekezawat te penurù dutun te vahi, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, wazè niw zewata is egngezanan te menge mezalem he penurù ni Setanas, wazè en duma pa he ebpeveelan ku keniyu.
Iyan dà is: hemeni niw is netuenan niw en taman te ebpekeuma a.

Sikiyu is ebpekezaag ki Setanas wey edtuman te egkesuatan ku taman te kemetayen, is keǥehem he insarig kediey te Amey ku he Megbevayà, idsarig ku zaan keniyu. Ebpeveyveyaan ku keniyu is langun he menge inged diyan te kelibutan. Utew mezesen is ked-uwita niw kandan; egkengezaag niw is menge inged ne wazà ebpekesukul keniyu.
Ibeǥey ku zaan keniyu is mekevugwas.
Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg kayi te egkeǥiyen te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu.

Ne ke sikandin maan te, Pesurati nu is belinsuǥuen he impevantey te Megbevayà diyà te menge tumutuu he ziyà te inged he Sardis. Ke sikew te, Iyan a si Jesu Kristu is egkaǥi; iyan a ebayàbayà te Wagas he Mulin-ulin he pitu is gehem din. Ne iyan a zaan egawed te pitu he vituen. Netuenan ku is menge ulaula niw. Mezakel is egkaǥi he zuen niw en untung he wazà pidtemanan, iyan, kenè kew en edsunud kediey.
Kenè kew lipezeng, kekenà, lig-eni niw is egkesamà he zesen te kedtuu niw su henduen be te egkeawè en. Netuenan ku he utew zekelà is kurang niw su is menge ulaula niw, kenà egkesuatan te Megbevayà.

Kenè niw lipati is impenurù keniyu he midawat niw zengan, kekenà, hemeni niw ne ewaa niw ziyà te ǥehinawa niw is kenè niw kedtuu. Su emun kenè niw ed-iniyuǥan is menge ulaula niw he mezaat, ebeyaan ku sikiyu zutun te timpu he kenà a keniyu ebpeebuten su iring te tekawen is kebpekeuma ku.
Deisey kew zà diyan te Sardis is wazà mevuringi is bisti zin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, wazà medtampu te mezaat he ulaula. Ne ebpekezuma kew kedì he edsun-uzan te meputì su zait kew he ebpekiduma kedì.

Is minsan hentei he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, edsun-uzan sikandin te meputì ne kenè ku ebpenasen is ngazan din diyà te libru he zutun isurat is menge ngazan te ebeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne ziyà te etuvangan te Amey ku he Megbevayà wey is menge velinsuǥuen din, ed-engkenen ku sikandin he ǥaked ku.
Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg te egkeǥiyen te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu ku!

Ne ke sikandin en maan te, Pesurati nu is belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebantey te menge tumutuu ziyan te inged he Piledilpya. Ne ke sikew te, Siak si Jesus is egkaǥi; iyan a sikan is egkeseriǥan he mibpilì te Megbevayà. Imbeǥey kedì is keǥehem te kedhadì te ǥinhedian ku iring te kedhadì dengan ni Hadì David. Ne emun duen ebpuwasan ku wey mekeseled dutun te ǥinhedian ku , kenè en egkelekevan te minsan hentei. Ne emun duen etew he edlekevan ku, kenè en daan egkepuwasan te minsan hentei.

Netuenan ku is menge ulaula niw. Ne minsan pa te pirapira kew zà he leǥas, metinumanen kew te menge lalag ku ne wazè niw engkezi is kedtuu niw kediey. Umba, is gemawan he ibayè niw, mibpuwasan ku en ne kenè en egkelekevan te minsan hentei, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, wazè en ebpekesanggen keniyu te ibpeulaula ku keniyu .

Ne haazà is menge etew he egkaǥi he menge Hudiyu sikandan, tarù is egkeǥiyen dan su menge sakup sikandan ni Setanas. Edhimuwen ku he mekeluhud sikandan diyan te etuvangan niw. Ne zutun egketuenan dan he iyan kew mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku.
Ne tenged te metinumanen kew te suǥù ku he med-antus kew, ebentayan ku sikiyu wey kew kenè en ebpekesaǥad te limas he egkeantus te tivuuk he menusiyà he ibpenggezam kandan.
Meǥaan e en ebpekeuma. Hemeni niw is tutuu he tuluuwen he netuenan niw su wey kenà igkeveǥey ziyà te zuma is suhul he ibeǥey keniyu ke ebpekezaag kew ki Setanas.

Is minsan hentei he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, edhimuwen ku sikandin he metahud su edhimuwen ku sikandin he iring te tukud diyà te valey ziyà te langit he zutun ed-ezapa is Megbevayè ku ne kenà haazà is tukud igkeawà dutun. Ne idsurat ku ziyà te kandin is ngazan te Megbevayè ku wey is ngazan te inged te Megbevayà he iyan sikan is inged he veǥu he Hiruselim he ebpenaug he ebpuun te Megbevayà diyà te langit wey elin daan idsurat ku ziyà te kandin is beǥu he ngazan ku.
Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg te egkeǥiyen te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin diyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu.

Ne ke sikandin maan te, Pesurati nu is belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebantey te menge tumutuu ziyà te inged he Leudisiya, ne ke sikew te, Siak si Jesus is egkaǥi; migeraran a te Metinumanen wey Egkeseriǥan su venar is egkeǥiyen ku. Pinaaǥi kedì midlimbag te Megbevayà is minsan hengkey.
Nesayud a te langun he menge ulaula niw. Kenè kew meinit ne kenè kew zaan meǥenew, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kenè kew menge kuntada ku ne kenè kew zaan menge sakup ku .
Angin pezem ke meinit kew ne emun kenà, ne meǥenew kew, iyan, geina te meǥelimendew kew zà, idrepu ku sikiyu.

Egkaǥi kew te, Sepian kiw ne meupiya is kebpekesavuk tew ne wazè tew en kurang te minsan hengkey. Ne minsan pa zutun, wazè niw metueni he mekehizuhizu kew utew su egkengeayuayu kew te kedtuu; nengelakap is isip niw wey nengelevasan kew su wazè niw menge metazeng he ulaula.

Umba, edsembaǥan ku sikiyu he pemesaha niw zini te kediey is waǥas he vulawan he migezaman diyà te hapuy, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, hustu he kedtuu , ne tutuu en human he sepian kew. Ne pemasa kew zaan diyà te kediey te meputì he bisti wey maawà is kegkeeled niw tenged te kegkelevasi keniyu. Ne pemasa kew zaan te ibawì te kegkelakap niw su wey mehustu is ked-ehè niw.
Is langun he menge etew he mahal zini te ǥehinawa ku, edsewayan ku wey edsilutan ku su wey mepenurù sikandan. Ne tenged dutun purungi niw is ulaula niw wey iniyuǥi niw is ulaula niw he mezaat.
Pemineg kew su zini ad te ǥemawan niw is ebpenelehuzan. Ke zuen etew he ebpekezineg kediey ne ebpuwasan e zin, edseled a ne egkaan a zuma kandin, ne egkaan daan sikandin duma kediey.
Is minsan hentei he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, ibeǥey ku kandin is ketenged te kebpinuu he zurug kedì diyà te pinuuwè ku te kedhadì iring te nekezaag a zaan ki Setanas ne mibpinuu a he zurug te Amey ku.
Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg te egkeǥiyen te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin diyan te menge tumutuu.  ke sikandin.

Ne zutun selakew en maan is impaahà kediey te Nengazen. Neehè ku is gemawan diyà te langit he nepuwasan. Ne zuen dutun egkaǥi ziyà te kediey ne haazà is egkaǥi ne iyan ded sikan is nezineg ku hein aney he henduen is kezaǥing din te vudyung he edaǥing. Ne ke sikandin te, Hendini ka te zivavew ne ibpeehè ku kenikew is kinahanglan he egkeulaula keuzemà.
Ne zutun impehendiyà a te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Ne hein diyè e en te langit, neehè ku is pinuuwà te edhadì ne zuen ebpimpinuu zutun.
Ed-ilak-ilak is paras din ne henduen be te menge mahal he vatu he haspi wey kurnalina. Ne mid-elingkus dutun te pinuuwà is belugtu he meilem he utew merayag su iring te mahal he vatu he ismiralda.

Ne zuen daan dutun keluwaan wey heepat he pinuuwà he nekeelingkus dutun te pinuuwà te edhadì. Ne zutun ebpememinuu is keluwaan wey heepat he ebmeǥurangen. Meputì is bisti zan ne zuen insuup diyà te ulu zan he menge kuruna he vulawan.

Ne haazà is pinuuwà te edhadì, egkeserasab is kilat dutun ne henduen te edsendaǥen is beransì. Ne ziyà te etuvangan dutun te pinuuwà is pitu he sulù he meregreg he iyan sikan is pitu he ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he edsuǥuen te Megbevayà.

Ne zutun daan te etuvangan te pinuuwà neehè ku is henduen be te meluag he zaǥat he iring te ispihu su utew metingew. Ne ziyà te teliwazà, iyan, ebpekeelingkus daan dutun te pinuuwà, duen heepat he linimbag he kedesenan he neeneb te mata is menge lawa zan diyà te egkesineruwan wey egkeiniyuǥan.
Is sevaha zutun te linimbag, ne iring te erimaung; is ikezuwa ne iring te vaka; is iketelu ne iring te etew is paras din; ne is ikeepat, ne iring te vanug he edlayang.

Ne heini is heepat he linimbag, heenem is pakpak te uman sevaha kandan. Neeneb te mata is lawa zan wey is diyà te zizalem te pakpak dan. Ne te maandew wey mezukilem, iyan dà baal zan is kenè en egkepangkus he kegkanta. Ke sikandan te, Waǥas, waǥas, waǥas is Megbevayà. Nengazen sikandin he ebpekehimu te minsan hengkey. Iyan sikandin sikan is Megbevayà he zengan, guntaan, wey keuzemà te wazà pidtemanan.
Ne haazà is heepat he linimbag, emun ebentuǥen dan wey edtehuzen dan wey ebpeselematan dan is wazà pidtemanan he Megbevayà he ebpimpinuu zutun te pinuuwà te edhadì, edlangkeb sikan is

keluwaan wey heepat he ebmeǥurangen diyà te etuvangan din ne ed-ezapen dan is wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà. Ne haazà is menge kuruna zan, idsavuk dan dutun te etuvangan te pinuuwà su ibeǥey zan diyà te Megbevayà. Ne zutun te kedsevuka zan dutun, edhabet dan egkaǥi te,
He Nengazen dey he Megbevayà, dait ka he edeliǥen, dait ka he edtehuzen. Mekeǥeǥehem ka su nenlimbag ka te minsan hengkey. Nesuat ka he edlimbag ne pinaaǥi kayi nehimu is langun.

Ne haazà is ebpimpinuu ziyà te pinuuwà te edhadì, neehè ku he egewezan din diyà te kewanan he velad din is midlulun he velesahan. Midsuratan is pesiziveluyà dutun te velesahan ne zuen pitu he tiyap he impezeket dutun su wey kenà meebriyi.

Ne zutun neehè ku is utew mezesen he velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà ne mibensag sikandin he egkaǥi te, Hentei is dait he ed-abri kayi te velesahan? Hentei is dait he id-awè din heini is menge tiyap su wey mevasa heini?
Ne wazà naahà diyà te langit, dini te tanà, wey ziyà te zizalem te tanà he zait he ed-abri zutun te velesahan wey ebasa zutun.
Umba mibmesakit is gehinawa ku ne midsineǥew a su wazà naahà he zait he ed-abri wey ebasa zutun te velesahan.

Ne zutun migkeǥiyan a te sevaha zutun te menge meǥurang. Ke sikandin te, Kenè ka sineǥew su si Jesus, sikan is migeraran he erimaung he kevuwazan ni Huda wey kevuwazan ni Hadì David, iyan sikandin nekezaag ki Setanas, umba zuen din ketenged te ked-abri te velesahan wey te ked-ewaa te pitu he menge tiyap dutun.

Ne zutun duen neehè ku zutun te teliwazà te pinuuwà te edhadì wey te heepat he menge linimbag he kedesenan wey te menge ebmeǥurangen. Iyan neehè ku zutun is: duen edhithitindeg he nati he kerehidu ne neehè ku zaan dutun te lawa zin is menge tulak te palì din te kedhimetayi kandin dengan. Pitu is sungey zin wey pitu zaan is mata zin he iyan is pitu he ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin he edsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ibpeeneb din te tivuuk he kelibutan.
Ne haazà is nati he kerehidu, mid-uvey ne migkuwa zin sikan is belesahan he ziyà te kewanan he velad te ebpimpinuu zutun.

Ne hein nekuwa zin en haazà is belesahan, sikan is menge heepat he linimbag wey is menge keluwaan wey heepat he ebmeǥurangen, midlangkeb dan diyà te etuvangan dutun te nati he kerehidu su ed-ezapen dan. Ne zuen arpa te uman sevaha zutun te menge ebmeǥurangen ne zuen egewezan dan he menge lediyà he vulawan he nepenù te veyewà he edtutungen su wey zuen mehemut he evel ne iyan kehuluǥan dutun is menge ked-ampù te menge etew he ǥaked te Megbevayà.

Ne egkanta zan te veǥu en he kentahan, ke sikandan te, Dait ka he egkuwa te velesahan wey ed-awà te menge tiyap din su mibpehimatey ka ne imbelukas nu is lengesa nu te menge etew wey maangken sikandan te Megbevayà. Ebpemuun sikandan diyà te minsan hengkey he kepuun wey kineǥiyan wey tribu wey ǥinhedian.
Midhimu nu he iyan dan edhedian nu; ne midhimu nu zaan he menge memumuhat sikandan he iyan kebpemuhat dan is ked-ezapa zan te Megbevayà tew. Ne ibpahadì nu sikandan diyà te kelibutan.

Ne zutun mibpenlangulangu a ne nezineg ku is kegkanta te menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà. Utew zan mezakel su edliblibuwen. Ne zutun dan mebpemenhitindeg te nekeelingkus dutun te pinuuwà te edhadì duma sikan is menge linimbag wey menge ebmeǥurangen.

Ne migkanta zan is langun ne utew mezaǥing is kegkanta zan. Ke sikandan te, Is nati he kerehidu he mibpehimatey, dait sikandin he edeliǥen su dekelà is gehem din, dekelà is naazen din, dekelà is ketau zin, dekelà is desen din. Ebentuǥen dey, edtehuzen dey wey edeliǥen dey sikandin!

Ne zutun nezineg ku is kegkanta te langun he menge linimbag he ziyà te langit, dini te tanà wey ziyà daan te zizalem te tanà wey ziyà te zaǥat. Ne migkanta is langun he linimbag he ziyà te minsan hendei. Ke sikandan te, Is ebpimpinuu ziyà te pinuuwà te edhadì wey is nati he kerehidu, deliǥa sikandan, tehuza sikandan, wey ventuǥa sikandan te wazà pidtemanan su iyan dan mekeǥeǥehem!
Ne zutun midtavak sikan is heepat he linimbag, ke sikandan te, Metuman heini. Ne zutun midlangkeb en maan haazà is menge ebmeǥurangen ne mid-azap dan.

Ne zutun mibantey a ne in-awà dutun te nati he kerehidu haazà is egkehuna zutun te pitu he tiyap dutun te velesahan, ne nezineg ku is migkaǥi te sevaha zutun te heepat he linimbag, ke sikandin te, Na, genat ke en! Ne iring te beransì is daǥing dutun te kegkaǥi zin.

Ne zutun neehè ku ziyà te etuvangan ku is kudà he meputì he midlepew ne is ed-untud dutun, duen egewezan din he panà. Ne mibeǥayan sikandin te kuruna he tuus te kebpekezaag din. Ne zutun midhipanew haazà su ebpenulitu te menusiyà.
Ne zutun in-awà te nati he kerehidu is ikezuwa he tiyap dutun te velesahan, ne nezineg ku he migkaǥi haazà is ikezuwa he linimbag, ke sikandin te, Genat ke en!

Ne zutun midlepew is sevaha pa he kudà he utew meriǥà. Is ed-untud dutun, intuǥut kandin he mehimu zin he mekedtetebek is tivuuk he menusiyà su wey mekebpepetayà is menge etew. Ne zuen imbeǥey kandin he melayat he sundang.

Ne hein in-awà dutun te nati he kerehidu haazà is iketelu he tiyap dutun te velesahan, nezineg ku he migkaǥi is iketelu he linimbag, ke sikandin te, Genat ke en! Ne neehè ku zutun he midlepew is kudà he meitem ne zuen timbangan he igkulang te ed-untud dutun.

Ne zutun henduen be te zuen migkaǥi ziyà te teliwazà duen te heepat he menge linimbag. Ke sikandin te, Tetelu zà he salmun te veǥas he trigu is egkepemasa te inendawen te sengeetew. Ne sengeǥantang dà wey tetelu he salmun te veǥas he sibada is egkepemasa te inendawen daan te sengeetew, iyan, kenè nu helina is bali te lana wey vinu.
Ne in-awà dutun te nati he kerehidu is ikeepat he tiyap dutun te velesahan ne nezineg ku he egkaǥi is ikeepat he linimbag, ke sikandin te, Genat ke en!

Ne mid-ehè ku ne midlepew zutun is kudà he meputìputì is kekelawag din. Si Kemetayen is ngazan te ed-untud dutun ne si Impirnu is ngazan dutun te edtinundug kandin. Ne imbeǥey kandan te zezuwa is kebayàbayà dutun te ikeepat he vahin te tivuuk he menusiyà wey zan mehimetayi pinaaǥi te gira wey vitil wey ebpenhalin he zaru wey ebpemekekaid he menge langgam.

Ne in-awà dutun te nati he kerehidu haazà is ikelima en he tiyap dutun te velesahan. Ne neehè ku zutun te zizalem te vangkù he pemuhatà is menge ǥimukud te menge etew he midhimetayan tenged te kedtuu zan te Lalag te Megbevayà wey tenged daan te kedsengyawa zan dutun te lalag.

Ne mibpekezaǥing dan is edhangyù, ke sikandan te, Sikew is mekeǥeǥehem he Nengazen, waǥas ka wey metinumanen ka! Sengemenu keluǥayad is kebpeketaǥad dey taman te kenè nu pa ebelesan te silut is menge etew ziyà te kelibutan tenged te kedhimetayi zan kenami?

Ne zutun impemeǥey ziyà te uman sevaha kandan is meputì he kumbalà. Ne migkeǥiyan sikandan te Nengazen he medhimeley zan dè pa taman te egkeamin egkevunù is menge zuma zan daan he suluǥuen te Megbevayà he edhimetayan daan iring kandan.

Ne neehè ku he id-awà dutun te nati he kerehidu is ikeenem he tiyap dutun te velesahan. Ne zutun midlinug he utew mezesen ne mibmeitem is andew ne henduen be te manggad he saku he meitem utew. Ne mibmeriǥà is bulan he iring te lengesa.
Ne nengeulug dini te tanà is menge vituen he iring te menge mehilew he veǥas te kayu he igira emun egkesuǥat te keramag ne egkengeulug.
Ne zutun nahanew is langit iring te velesahan he edlulunen ne is uman buntud wey is uman pulu ziyà te zaǥat, naawà dutun te nesevukan dan.

Ne zutun, is minsan hentei he etew, is menge hadì diyà te kelibutan, is menge velentuǥen he etew, is menge egalen te menge sundaru, is menge sepian wey is menge zekelà is keǥehem din, wey minsan daan is menge uripen wey kenà uripen, mid-eles dan diyà te menge vudsi wey ziyà te zizalem te menge zekelà he vatu ziyà te menge vuntud.

Ne mibpemengulahì dan diyà te menge vuntud wey menge vatu. Ke sikandan te, Lilizi key su wey key kenà maahà te ebpimpinuu ziyà te pinuuwà te edhadì he ziyà te langit ne wey key zaan kenà meumahi te pauk te nati he kerehidu.
Su neuma en is timpu te kedsiluti zan kenami te menusiyà ne wazà ebpekesukul kandan.

Neipus haazà neehè ku is heepat he velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà. Ebpemenhitindeg is kada sevaha kandan diyà te heepat he pesaǥì te kelibutan ne ed-elangan dan is heepat he keramag diyà te kelibutan su wey kenà mekeremaǥi is tanà wey is daǥat wey is menge kayu.

Ne zutun neehè ku zaan is sevaha pa he velinsuǥuen he ziyà ebpuun te zapit te edsilaan ne igkulang din is tiyap te wazè din kemetayen he Megbevayà. Ne haazà is heepat he velinsuǥuen he insarig kandan is kedèdeeti te tanà wey zaǥat, migkeǥiyan din sikandan.
Mezaǥing is kegkaǥi zin te, Kenè niw pa pendèdeeti is tanà wey zaǥat wey menge kayu taman te kenè dey pa egkesevukan te tiyap is menge vuked te menge suluǥuen te Megbevayè tew.

Ne nezineg ku zutun is kezakel te menge etew he edsevukan te tiyap, ne nenggatus wey kepatan wey heepat he libu sikandan langun. Ne ebpemuun sikandan diyà te sepulù wey zezuwa he kepuun te menge kevuwazan ni Israyil.

Te menge kevuwazan ni Huda, ne sepulù wey zezuwa he libu sikandan is midtiyapan. Te menge kevuwazan ni Rubin, ne sepulù wey zezuwa he libu. Te menge kevuwazan ni Gad, ne sepulù wey zezuwa zaan he libu.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Asir, ne sepulù wey zezuwa zaan he libu. Te menge kevuwazan ni Neptali, ne sepulù wey zezuwa zaan he libu. Te menge kevuwazan ni Menasis, ne sepulù wey zezuwa he libu.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Simeon, ne sepulù daan wey zezuwa he libu. Te menge kevuwazan ni Levi, ne sepulù wey zezuwa he libu zaan. Te menge kevuwazan ni Isekar, sepulù wey zezuwa he libu.
Te menge kevuwazan ni Sebulun, sepulù wey zezuwa he libu. Te menge kevuwazan ni Jose, sepulù wey zezuwa he libu. Te menge kevuwazan ni Benjamin, sepulù wey zezuwa he libu is midtiyapan daan.

Ne neipus haazà ne neehè ku is utew medmezakel he menge etew he kenè en egkevilang tuus te utew mezakel. Diyè dan ebpuun te minsan hendei he ǥinhedian wey tribu wey kepuun wey minsan hengkey he kineǥiyan. Diyè dan ebpemenhitindeg te etuvangan te pinuuwà te Megbevayà wey ziyà te etuvangan te nati he kerehidu. Midsun-uzan sikandan te meputì ne ebpemengulangkulang dan te zehunen he menge subpang.
Mibpekezaǥing dan is egkaǥi te, Deliǥa is Megbevayè tew he mibpinuu ziyà te pinuuwè din te kedhadì wey zeliǥa zaan is nati he kerehidu su nelibri kiw zan te silut!

Ne zutun daan ebpemenhithitindeg is langun he menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà. Neelingkusan dan haazà is pinuuwà te edhadì wey te menge ebmeǥurangen wey te heepat he linimbag. Ne heini is menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà, midlangkeb dan dutun te etuvangan te pinuuwà te edhadì su ed-ezapen dan is Megbevayà.

Ne migkaǥi zan te, Benar iyan su zait is Megbevayè tew he edeliǥen wey ebentuǥen wey edtehuzen wey ebpeselematan su iyan dà sikandin lavew he metau, iyan sikandin mekeǥeǥehem wey mezesen; deliǥa sikandin te wazà pidtemanan!
Ne zutun migkeǥiyan a te sevaha zutun te menge ebmeǥurangen, ke sikandin te, Hentei heini is mibpenun-uzan te meputì wey hendei zan ebpememuun?

Ne midtavak a te, Iyan ka nesayud. Ne ke sikandin te, Heini is menge etew, ebpemekeuma sikandan he ebpuun dutun te zekelà he kemeresayan diyà te lumpad te kelibutan. Mibpemìpian dan is menge bisti zan diyà te lengesa te nati he kerehidu wey zan mehimu he meputì, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, nepalis en is menge salè dan .

Umba, diyè dan edhitindeg te etuvangan te pinuuwà te Megbevayà. Andew wey mezukilem ne ziyè dan te simbahan te Megbevayà ne edtumanen dan dutun is egkesuatan din. Ne is Megbevayà he ziyà ebpimpinuu te pinuuwè din te kedhadì, iyan edlingahaan dan.
Kenè dan en egkengevitil; ne kenè dan en egkengemezahan; kenè dan en daan egkengetutung te andew wey minsan hengkey he utew meinit.

Su is nati he kerehidu he ziyà te teliwazà te pinuuwà te edhadì, iyan sikandin ed-elima kandan. Ibpeturedu zin kandan is ebpuunan te menge wahig he ebpekeveǥey te untung he wazà pidtemanan. Ne is Megbevayà, id-awè din en is keseengan kayi te menge etew, ke sikandin.
Ne hein in-awà te nati he kerehidu kes ikepitu he tiyap dutun te velesahan, naawà is egkengezineg diyà te ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà diyà te langit seled te liwazà te uras.
Ne zutun neehè ku sikan is pitu he menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebpemenhitindeg diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà, ne mibeǥayan is kada sevaha kandan te vudyung.

Ne zuen pa zutun selakew he velinsuǥuen he zuen din bulawan he lediyà ne mid-uvey ne midhitindeg dutun te uvey te vangkù he pemuhatà. Dekelà is mehemut he veyewà he imbeǥey kandin dutun wey zin ikeamut dutun te menge ampù te menge tumutuu ziyà te vulawan he pemuhatà.

Ne is evel zutun te veyewà he midtutung he in-amut te menge ampù te menge tumutuu, midhendiyà te zivavew he ebpuun dutun te lediyà he egewezan te velinsuǥuen he ebpemenhitindeg diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà.

Ne zutun, sikan is belinsuǥuen, mibpenù din is lediyè din te menge vaǥa he ebpuun dutun te pemuhatà ne intimbag din haazà is lediyà diyà te tanà puun dutun te langit. Ne zutun mibpemeransì, ne zuen utew memezaǥing, ne egkeserasab is kilat, ne midlinug.
Ne zutun mid-andam haazà is pitu he menge velinsuǥuen su edhiyupen dan en is menge vudyung dan.

Ne is egkehuna zutun te menge velinsuǥuen, midhiyup din is budyung din. Ne zutun, giyew wey hapuy he nesahug te lengesa is nengeulug diyà te tanà. Ne netutung dutun is iketelu he vahin te kelibutan. Netutung is iketelu he vahin te menge kayu wey naamin metutung is menge sagbet.
Ne zutun, midhiyup te ikezuwa he velinsuǥuen haazà is kandin he vudyung, ne zuen intimbag diyà te zaǥat he henduen be te zekelà he vuntud he neregreg.

Ne mibaluy he lengesa is iketelu he vahin te zaǥat. Ne neǥerà is iketelu he vahin te minsan hengkey he linimbag he egeǥehinawa ziyà te zaǥat. Ne nahanew zaan is iketelu he vahin te langun he menge ed-untuzan diyà te zaǥat.

Ne zutun midhiyup te iketelu he velinsuǥuen is kandin he vudyung ne ebpuun te langit neulug is dekelà he vituen he egkeregreg he iring te sulù ne ziyà meketanà haazà te iketelu he vahin te menge wahig wey ziyà te iketelu he vahin te menge kalut.
Is ngazan dutun te vituen ne Mepait. Ne mibmepait is iketelu he vahin te menge wahig diyà te kelibutan. Ne mibpatey is mezakel he menge etew tenged dutun te wahig su mibmepait utew.

Ne zutun midhiyup te ikeepat he velinsuǥuen is budyung din. Ne nesuǥat is iketelu he vahin te andew, wey is iketelu he vahin te vulan, wey is iketelu he vahin te menge vituen. Ne tenged kayi naawà is kerayag te iketelu he vahin te menge vituen. Ne seled te iketelu he vahin te timpu te kada andew, mibmerusirem utew. Ne iring din ded daan seled te iketelu he vahin te timpu te kada kezukileman.

Ne zutun te kemulu ku pa kebantey nezineg ku is egkeǥiyen te vanug he edlayang he utew mibpeketikang diyà te udtuwan. Ne ketetelu sikandin megkaǥi te mezaǥing he lalag, ke sikandin te, Kehizu utew te menge meǥinged diyà te kelibutan. Ne mid-uman sikandin megkaǥi te, Utew mekehandekhandek is egkeulaula su meǥaan en edhiyupa te tetelu pa he velinsuǥuen is menge vudyung dan!

Ne midhiyup dutun te ikelima he velinsuǥuen is budyung din ne zutun neehè ku is bituen, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, belinsuǥuen he ziyè en te tanà su neulug he ebpuun te langit. Ne imbeǥey ziyà te kandin is yawi he ebpekepuwas te vitu he wazà pidtemanan is kezalem din.

Ne mibpuwasan din haazà is bitu he wazà pidtemanan is kezalem ne zutun midlepew is evel he iring te evel te utew zekelà he selsalan ne mibmerusirem is tanà wey neelangan is kedsilà te andew tenged te evel he zutun ebpuun te vitu.
Ne zutun te evel nenlepew is menge terapan ne midlatun dan diyà te tanà. Ne imbeǥey kandan is bisa te kegkaǥat dan he iring te visa te kegkaǥat te venayew.
Intelaan kandan he kenè dan dèdeeti is sagbet wey is minsan hengkey he edtuvù wey is menge kayu, kekenà, iyan dan dà edèdeetan is menge etew he wazà metiyapi is buked dan te tiyap te Megbevayà.
Intuǥut kandan is kedresaya zan te menge etew seled te lelima he vulan, iyan, wazà ituǥut kandan is kedhimatey. Is kedresaya zan te menge etew, ne iring te kesakit te egkeǥaten te venayew.
Ne zutun he timpu egkesuat is menge etew he mebpatey sikandan, iyan, kenà egkehimu. Utew zekelà is gustu zan he mebpatey, iyan, dutun, kenè dan en ebpatey.
Is menge terapan, henduen te menge kudà he ed-untuzan te ebpekidtebek. Ne zutun te menge ulu zan duen henduen be te menge kalù he vulawan. Ne iring te vuked te etew is buked dan.
Ne is bulvul zan, ne henduen be te vulvul te vahi. Ne is menge ngipen dan, ne henduen be te ngipen te erimaung.

Duen menge hun-ap dan he iring te limbutung he putew. Ne is daǥing te pakpak dan emun edlayang dan, ne henduen be te zaǥing te mezakel he menge kelisa he eguyuzen te kudà he ebpelumpat emun ebpehendiyà te edtebekan.
Is ikug dan, ne iring te ikug te venayew su edhereg ne pinaaǥi te ikug dan egkerasey zan is menge etew te seled te lelima he vulan.

Duen hadì he ebayàbayà kandan, iyan sikan is belinsuǥuen he mibpuwas duen te vitu he wazà pidtemanan is kezalem din. Ne ziyà te kineǥiyan he Hibriyuhanen iyan ngazan din si Ebedun, ne ziyà te Gerisyahanen, si Epeliyun, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, sikan is ebpekezezaat .
Ne neipus haazà is nehuna he nehitavù he mekehandekhandek; dezuwa pa zutun is wazè pa mehitavù.
Ne zutun midhiyup te ikeenem he velinsuǥuen is budyung din. Ne nezineg ku is egkaǥi he ziyà ebpuun te heepat he sungey he ziyà te vulawan he pemuhatà he zutun te etuvangan te Megbevayà.
Ke sikandin diyà te ikeenem he velinsuǥuen te, Ipaawè en is heepat he velinsuǥuen he mibpusasan diyà te zekelà he Wahig he Yupratis!

Ne zutun impaawè en haazà is heepat he velinsuǥuen. In-andam sikandan he zaan ne impetaǥad sikandan taman kayi he uras, wey andew, wey vulan, wey tuig. Umba in-andam sikandan su wey zan mehimetayi is iketelu he vahin te tivuuk he menusiyà.
Intazem diyà te kediey is kezakel zutun te menge sundaru zan he egkukudà. Menge zezuwa he ǥatus he libu he libu sikandan.

Ne zutun te impaahà kediey, neehè ku is menge sundaru wey menge kudà. Nelimbutungan haazà is egkukudà te meriǥà he iring te hapuy, wey meilem wey mekelawag daan he iring te esupri. Is menge ulu zutun te menge kudè dan, ne iring te ulu te erimaung. Ne is menge vèbè dan, ne edlepawan te hapuy wey evel wey esupri.
Ne pinaaǥi zutun te hapuy, wey evel, wey esupri he edlepew zutun te vèbè te menge kudà, migerè dan is iketelu he vahin te tivuuk he menusiyà.
Su zutun te vèbè te menge kudà is gehem dan te kedhimatey wey ziyà daan te menge ikug dan su is menge ikug dan, ne iring te menge uled su zuen ulu zutun, ne ebpekekaid te menge etew haazà is ikug.

Ne is nesamà dutun te menge etew, langun te sikandan he wazà mepatey zutun te ebpemekekaid he menge kudà, wazè dan engkezi is ked-ezapa zan te mibeelan dan he menge ledawan he vulawan, wey selapì wey ǥalang wey vatu wey kayu. Heini is menge ledawan, ne kenà ebpekeahà, kenà ebpekezineg ne kenà daan ebpekehipanew. Wazà daan engkezi zutun te menge etew is ked-ezapa zan te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin.
Ne wazè dan daan iniyuǥi is kebpemumunù, kinaagman, meremerik he ulaula, wey is kebpenakew zan.

Ne zutun neehè ku is sevaha pa he mekeǥeǥehem he velinsuǥuen he ebpenaug he ebpuun te langit. Midtaved diyà te kandin is gapun ne mibpeyungan is ulu zin te velugtu. Iring te kedsiǥa te andew is buked din ne is menge paa zin, ne henduen be te menge tukud he regreg.
Ne ziyà te velad din egewezan din is nevekar en he zeisek he velesahan. Is kewanan he paa zin, ne ziyè din iǥiek te lawed te zaǥat ne is givang, ne ziyà te tanà.
Ne mibpekezaǥing sikandin is ed-umew ne is kezaǥing te egkeǥiyen din ne henduen te hiniǥer te erimaung. Ne zutun te ked-umew zin, mibales te pitu he veransì he utew mezaǥing.
Ne zutun te kebales te veransì, idsurat ku pezem is nezineg ku, iyan, nezineg ku is egkaǥi ziyà te langit te, Ieles nu is ibpesavut kayi te pitu he veransì ne kenè nu isurat.
Ne zutun, sikan is belinsuǥuen he neehè ku he edhithitindeg he ziyà is sevaha he paa zin te tanà ne is sevaha ziyà te zaǥat, imbayew zin diyà te langit is kewanan he velad din.
Ne impepirmahan din is egkeǥiyen din te wazà kemetayen he Megbevayà he nenlimbag te langit wey tanà wey zaǥat wey nenlimbag daan te langun he taǥù kayi. Ke sikandin te, Kenè en heini ebpekesendud!

Ne emun edhiyupen dutun te ikepitu he velinsuǥuen is budyung din, ne human dutun ed-ul-ulaha te Megbevayà is tuyù he in-eles din sumalà is migkaǥi zin dengan diyà te menge ebpeneuven din he menge suluǥuen din.

Ne zutun mid-uman megkaǥi zini te kediey sikan is nezineg ku he egkaǥi ziyà te langit. Ke sikandin te, Hendutun ka te velinsuǥuen he ziyà egiek is sevaha he paa zin te tanà ne is sevaha ziyà te zaǥat. Ne kuwaa nu is belesahan he igkulang din he neebriyan en.

Ne midhendutun a te velinsuǥuen ne mibuyù ku haazà is deisek he velesahan. Ne migkeǥiyan e zin te, Kuwaa nu ne keena nu. Meemis utew he iring te teneb diyà te vèbè nu, iyan, emun diyè en te ǥetek nu ne utew mepezes.
Ne migkuwa ku haazà is deisek he velesahan diyà te velad din, ne migkaan ku ne meemis iyan diyà te vèbè ku su iring te teneb, iyan, hein neeveleng ku, ne mibmepezes utew ziyà te ǥetek ku.

Ne zutun duen migkaǥi zini te kediey, ke sikandin te, Kinahanglan he iuman nu ipenudtul is ibpepenudtul kenikew te Megbevayà he egkeulaula te mezakel he menge hadì wey menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei he ǥinhedian wey minsan hengkey he kineǥiyan.

Ne zutun, imbeǥey kedì is idsukud he iring te tuked, ne zuen migkaǥi kediey te, Hendiyè ka ne sukuza nu is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà wey is bangkù he pemuhatà dutun, ne vilanga nu is menge etew he edsimba zutun.

Iyan, is lama he ziyà te ǥawas te valey, kenè nu sukuza su imbeǥey haazà diyà te menge etew he kenà menge Hudiyu. Ne edtekutakan dan is inged he Hiruselim he zutun edsimbaha is Megbevayà. Ne seled te kepatan wey zezuwa he vulan is kedtekutaki zan dutun.

Ne edsuǥuen ku zutun is dezuwa he ibpewali ku. Egkukumbalà sikandan te manggad he saku ne ebpenudtulen dan is ibpekaǥi kandan te Megbevayà seled te nengkelibu wey zezuwa he ǥatus wey keneman he andew.

Ne haazà is dezuwa he etew he menwewali, iyan sikan is netagnà dengan he zezuwa he etew he iring te zezuwa he kayu he ulivu wey zezuwa he sulù he ziyà mekesavuk te etuvangan te Nengazen he ebayàbayà te tivuuk he kelibutan.

Ne heini is dezuwa, ke zuen ebpesipala kandan, diyà te vèbè dan edlepew is hapuy ne egkeamin egketutung is menge kuntada zan. Ne pinaaǥi kayi edhimetayan dan is minsan hentei he egezam kandan ebpesipala.

Ebeǥayan sikandan te ǥehem su wey zan kenà ikepevayà is menge ǥapun su wey kenà ebpekeuzan dutun te timpu te kebpenudtula zan te Lalag te Megbevayà. Ne zuen daan gehem dan wey zan mehimu he lengesa is wahig diyà te menge kalut. Ne zuen daan gehem dan wey zan mesiluti is menge etew pinaaǥi te minsan hengkey he vangkit te minsan keenu he timpu he egkesuatan dan.

Ne heini is dezuwa he menwewali, emun egketapus dan is kebpenudtula zan te Lalag te Megbevayà, edtebeken sikandan te langgam he ziyà ebpuun te vitu he wazà pidtemanan is kezalem din. Ne egkezaag sikandan dutun te langgam, ne edhimetayan din sikandan.
Ne ziyà ibperey-as haazà is lawa zan te kersada ziyà te zekelà he inged he zutun iransang te krus is Nengazen dan. Ne zuen insempità he menge ngazan dutun te inged, ne iyan is Suduma wey Ihiptu.

Is langun he kelasi te menge etew te minsan hengkey he kineǥiyan wey kepuun wey ǥinhedian, ne ed-ehaan dan is menge lawa zutun te zezuwa seled te tetelu wey liwazà he andew ne kenè dan idtuǥut he ikeleveng haazà is dezuwa.

Utew igkelipey te menge etew is kedhimetayi zutun ne edsilibrahan dan ne ebpevegbeǥayà is kada sevaha kandan te menge ǥasa. Umba edsilibrahan dan su haazà is dezuwa he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, mibeelan dan is ingkengerasey te menge etew ziyà te kelibutan.

Ne zutun hein neipus haazà is tetelu wey liwazà he andew, haazà is dezuwa he menwewali, mibeǥayan sikandan te Megbevayà te ǥehinawa ne nevanhew ne midhitindeg dan. Ne utew nengehandek is langun he nekeahà dutun.

Ne zutun nezineg dutun te zezuwa he menwewali is mezaǥing he egkaǥi ziyà te langit he edhenduen te, Hendini kew en te langit. Ne zutun mibatun sikandan pehendiyà te langit he nevukusan sikandan te ǥapun. Ne nengeahà haazà te menge kuntada zan dutun.

Ne segugunà midlinug te utew mezesen. Ne nengerundus is ikesepulù he vahin te menge valey zutun te inged. Ne neǥerà zutun te linug is pitu he libu he menge etew. Ne utew nengehandek dutun is menge etew he naawas dutun te linug ne midalig dan is mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà he ziyà te langit.
Ne zutun neipus haazà is ikezuwa he mekehandekhandek he hitavù, iyan, meǥaan ebpekesunud dutun is iketelu.

Ne zutun midhiyup te ikepitu he velinsuǥuen is budyung din ne ziyà te langit nezineg is memezaǥing he laǥeng he edhenduen te, Is kedhedii te tivuuk he menusiyà, ne ziyè en guntaan te Nengazen tew wey ziyà te hadì he mibpilì din. Ne heini he hadì, ebpekehadì sikandin te wazà pidtemanan.
Ne zutun, haazà is keluwaan wey heepat he menge ebmeǥurangen he ebpimpinuu zutun te etuvangan te Megbevayà, mibpemenlangkeb sikandan ne mid-azap dan is Megbevayà,

ne ke sikandan te, Sikew is Megbevayè dey wey Nengazen dey, iyan ka ebayàbayà te langun. Megbevayè ka zengan wey ǥuntaan. Ebpeselematan dey sikew su migamit nu is dekelà he ǥehem nu ne ǥuntaan mibpuunan nu en is kedhadì nu ziyà te kelibutan.

Utew nengepauk kenikew is menge kuntada nu, iyan, netuman en is andew te kedsiluti nu kandan wey is andew te kedsusiya nu te nengeulaula te nemematey en. Iyan en heini timpu te kedsuhuli nu te menge suluǥuen nu he menge ebpeneuven wey kedsuhuli nu zaan te langun he menge ǥaked nu he etew, se zekelà is pid-etawan din, se zeisek is pid-etawan din, is langun he edtahud kenikew. Iyan heini zaan timpu te kedèdeeti nu te langun he menge etew he midezaat te kelibutan!

Ne ziyà te langit mibpuwasan is simbahan he Valey te Megbevayà ne naahà dutun te seled is kavan he midteǥuan duen te insurat he menge pesarig te Megbevayà. Ne zutun neserasab is kilat, ne zuen utew memezaǥing, ne mibpemeransì, ne midlinug, ne mibpenggiyew te utew zezekelà.

Ne zutun neehè ku ziyà te langit is kebpeelunga te egkeulaula. Neehè ku is bahi he midsun-uzan te andew ne ziyà te zizalem te paa zin is bulan, ne insuup diyà te ulu zin is kuruna he sepulù wey zezuwa he vituen.
Meǥingey sikandin ne ed-anak en ne ebpekeerang su ebeliliten.

Ne zutun duen pa impaahà kedì diyà te langit he kebpeelunga te egkeulaula. Duen utew zekelà he meriǥà he uled he egngezanan te deragun he iyan si Setanas. Pitu is ulu zin ne sepulù is sungey zin. Ne zuen kuruna ziyà te kada sevaha zutun te pitu he ulu zin.

Ne pinaaǥi te ikug din neǥuyud din is iketelu he vahin te menge vituen diyà te langit ne nemeketimbag haazà diyà te tanà. Ne zutun edhithitindeg haazà is uled te etuvangan dutun te vahi he ed-anak su emun idlusad en haazà is id-anak din, ne egkeenen dutun te uled.

Ne zutun inlusad is batà he maama. Ne haazà is batà, edhedian din keuzemà is langun he menge ǥinhedian dini te kelibutan ne wazà ebpekesukul kandin dutun te kedhadì din. Ne haazà is batà, midsekelew te Megbevayà ne mibatun din diyà te langit, diyà te pinuuwà te kedhadì din.

Ne haazà is bahi, nekepelaǥuy pehendiyà te tanà he kenà ed-ubpaan te etew, diyà te ed-eputan he mid-andam he zaan te Megbevayà. Ne zutun ed-elimahan te Megbevayà haazà is bahi seled te nengkelibu wey zezuwa he ǥatus wey keneman he andew he repeng te tetelu wey liwazà he tuig.

Ne zutun he timpu zuen gira ziyà te ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà diyà te langit. Si Miguel, is sevaha he velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà wey is menge sakup din he velinsuǥuen, edtebeken dan sikan is dekelà he uled he egngezanan te deragun. Ne haazà is uled wey is menge velinsuǥuen din, mibpekidtebek dan daan,
iyan, nezaag haazà is uled ne sikandin wey is menge velinsuǥuen din, wazè en tuǥuti te Megbevayà he mekeseled dan pa maan diyà te langit, umba,

midsegseg haazà is dekelà he uled puun te langit. Ne haazà he deragun, iyan si Setanas, sikan is mezaat he mulin-ulin he mid-ekalan din is tivuuk he menusiyà. Ne sikandin wey is langun he menge velinsuǥuen din, intimbag sikandan pehendini te tanà.

Ne zutun, nezineg ku is utew mezaǥing he egkaǥi ziyà te langit he edhenduen te, Guntaan egketuman en is kedlibriya te Megbevayà te menusiyà. Impeehè en te Megbevayà is keǥehem din te kedhadì. Is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà, impeehè din en is ketenged din te kedhadì. Su midsegseg en pehendiyà te tanà si Setanas, is edsumbung te menge suled tew. Iyan sikandin midsumbung kandan diyà te Megbevayà tew te maandew wey te mezukilem.

Heini is menge suled tew, nezaag dan en si Setanas tenged te kedtiǥis te lengesa te migeraran he impemuhat he nati he kerehidu, wey tenged te insangyew zan is tutuu he tuluuwen, wey tenged daan te wazè dan iyan menuǥuni is untung dan, kekenà, mibpehimatey zan tenged te kedtuu zan.

Sikiyu is menge meǥinged diyà te langit, medlipey kew. Iyan, sikiyu is diyan te tanà wey ziyan te zaǥat, kehizu niw! Su kes mezaat he mulin-ulin he si Setanas, mibpenaug en diyan te keniyu. Ne utew sikandin nererengiti su netuenan din he mevavè dà utew is nesamè din he timpu te kedlalunglalung.
Ne hein netuenan dutun te deragun he zini sikandin itimbag te tanà, midtelukunan din sikan is bahi he iney zuen te vatà he maama.

Ne haazà is bahi, mibeǥayan te Megbevayà te zezuwa he pakpak te zekelà he vanug su wey mekelayang wey mekeaput diyà te tanà he kenà ed-ubpaan te etew, ne zutun ed-elimahan sikandin seled te tetelu wey liwazà he tuig ne zutun kenè en egkekeizan dutun te uled.
Ne zutun, haazà is uled, impelepew zin diyà te vèbè din is dekelà he wahig su wey maanud haazà is bahi,
iyan, midtevangan te tanà haazà is bahi ne mibeka is tanà ne nehimu is dekelà he vitu ne zutun mekeahuk haazà is wahig he ebpuun dutun te vèbè te uled he deragun.

Ne zutun utew nepeuki te deragun haazà is bahi, ne mibeyaan din is menge zuma he anak dutun te vahi su edtebeken din sikandan. Iyan sikandan is langun he metinumanen te menge suǥù te Megbevayà wey metinumanen daan te tutuu he tuluuwen he impenurù ni Jesus.
Ne zutun diyà mekehitindeg haazà is deragun te veyvey te zaǥat.

Ne zutun neehè ku is mekehandekhandek he langgam he egaun puun diyà te zaǥat. Sepulù is sungey zin wey pitu is ulu zin. Ne zuen kuruna he insuup diyà te kada sevaha he menge sungey zin, ne ziyà te kada ulu zin ne zuen insurat he ngazan he idsupak din te Megbevayà.

Ne haazà is langgam he neehè ku, ne iring te liyupardu; ne is menge paa zin ne iring te paa te biyir, ne is bèbè din ne iring te vèbè te erimaung. Ne is gehem te deragun wey is kebpekehadì din, wey is keǥehem din te kebayàbayà, ne imbeǥey zin dutun te langgam.

Nepelian is sevaha he ulu zutun te langgam ne henduen be te midhimetayan dengan haazà is ulu, iyan, neulian en haazà is gerabi he palì dutun ne uuyag en maan haazà is ulu. Ne tenged dutun is tivuuk he menusiyà, midsundanan dan haazà is langgam su utew zan ingkeinuinu.

Ne is tivuuk he menusiyà, ed-ezapen dan haazà is deragun tenged te kebeǥaya zin te keǥehem din dutun te langgam he utew mekehandekhandek. Ne mid-azap dan daan haazà is langgam, ne ke sikandan te, Wazà ebpekelavew te langgam; ne wazà daan ebpekesukul kandin.

Ne mibpesagdan te Megbevayà haazà is langgam he mekekaǥi sikandin te utew memezaat he ibpegalbu he menge lalag he ebpekesumpalit te Megbevayà. Ne midtuǥutan daan sikandin he mekevayàbayà seled te kepatan wey zezuwa he vulan.
Ne ebpengeǥiyen din is menge lalag he utew memezaat he idsumpalit din te Megbevayà wey ebpekesupak te ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà diyà te langit wey ebpekesupak daan te menge meǥinged diyà te langit.

Ne midtuǥutan daan haazà is langgam he tebeka zin is menge etew he ǥaked te Megbevayà ne nezaag din dè pa sikandan. Ne imbeǥey kandin is kebayàbayà diyà te minsan hengkey he tribu wey minsan hengkey he kepuun, wey menge etew he minsan hengkey is kineǥiyan dan, wey is minsan hengkey he ǥinhedian.

Ed-ezapen haazà is langgam te langun he menge etew zini te kelibutan he wazà ikesurat is ngazan dan diyà te libru he zutun ilista is menge etew he ebeǥayan te untung. Iyan haazà kes libru zuen te nati he kerehidu he zengan dà imbanglis is kebpehimatey zin te wazè pa tukuza is kelibutan.
Is minsan hentei keniyu, mebpemineg kayi!

Is menge etew he imbanglis kandan is kebpirisuwa kandan ne siguradu egkepirisu sikandan. Ne is menge etew he imbanglis kandan he ǥumaan is idhimatey kandan, gumaan iyan is idhimatey kandan. Kinahanglan he sikitew is menge tumutuu te Nengazen, edsarig kiw kandin wey ed-antus kiw te kemereǥenan.

Ne zutun selakew en maan he langgam is neehè ku. Midlepew haazà he ebpuun diyà te zizalem te tanà. Dezuwa is sungey zin su iring te nati he kerehidu, iyan, emun egkaǥi, ne is kegkaǥi zin ne iring te kegkaǥi zuen te utew zekelà he uled he egngezanan te deragun.

Ne haazà he langgam, iyan kes ebpeneuven ni Setanas ne migamit din is gehem duen te nehuna he langgam he iyan midsuǥù kandin. Ne mibpeǥes din is tivuuk he menusiyà he ezapa zan sikan is nehuna he langgam he neulian duen te palì din he hapit din ibpatey.
Utew zekelà is menge egkein-inuwan he mibeelan dutun te langgam he ikezuwa su minsan hapuy he ebpuun te langit, impepenaug din wey maahà te menge etew.

Ne pinaaǥi te menge egkein-inuwan he intuǥut kandin he ibpeulaula ziyà te etuvangan dutun te nehuna he langgam, ed-ekalan din is tivuuk he menusiyà dini te kelibutan. Ne zutun edsuǥuen din is menge etew he veeli zan is ledawan dutun te nehuna he langgam ne ezapa zan. Haazà is nehuna he langgam, midtibas duen te sundang, iyan, wazà mebpatey.

Ne intuǥut daan he mehimu zutun te ikezuwa he langgam he mekeǥeǥehinawa haazà is ledawan dutun te nehuna he langgam ne tenged dutun ebpekekaǥi haazà is ledawan ne egkepatey zin daan is minsan hentei he kenà ed-azap kandin.
Ne is langun he menge etew, lavew se kenà lavew, sepian se kenà sepian, uripen se kenà uripen, mibpeǥes din sikandan merkahi ziyà te kewanan he velad dan ne emun kenà ne ziyà te vuked dan.
Ne is minsan hentei he kenà ebpemarka zutun te marka he iyan ngazan dutun te nehuna he langgam wey lumiru te ngazan din, kenè dan ebpekepemasa ne kenè dan daan ebpekepemelegyà.

Iyan dà ebpekesavut dutun is etew he mibeǥayan te Megbevayà te ketau. Sikan is uluwanen, egkesavut din is kehuluǥan dutun te lumiru te langgam su lumiru haazà te menusiyà. Ne haazà is lumiru, ne heenem he ǥatus wey keneman wey heenem.

Ne zutun neehè ku is buntud he Siyun ne zutun edhithitindeg sikan is nati he kerehidu ne zuma zin daan dutun is nenggatus wey kepatan wey heepat he libu he menge etew. Ne haazà is menge etew, insurat diyà te menge vuked dan is ngazan dutun te nati wey is ngazan daan te Amey zin he Megbevayà.

Ne zutun nezineg ku is egkaǥi ziyà te langit ne is kegkaǥi zin, henduen be te zeǥurus te utew mezakel he menge wahig wey iring te utew mezaǥing he veransì. Haazà is egkaǥi he nezineg ku, ne henduen be zaan te menge zaǥing te utew mezakel he ebpemen-arpa.

Ne haazà is menge etew, diyè dan te etuvangan te pinuuwà te Megbevayà wey te etuvangan duen te heepat he menge linimbag he kedesenan wey te menge ebmeǥurangen. Ne migkanta zan dutun is beǥu he kentahan. Iyan dà netau zutun he egkanta te kentahan, haazà is nenggatus wey kepatan wey heepat he libu he etew he mibelukasan dini te lumpad te kelibutan duen te nati he kerehidu.

Iyan haazà he menge maama he wazè dan mekesalà pinaaǥi te kedhilavet te kenè dan esawa su utew lumpiyu is menge ulaula zan ne wazè dan suwayi sikan is nati he kerehidu te minsan hendei sikandin ebpevayà. Mibelukasan sikandan puun duen te perayan he iyan is tivuuk he menusiyà wey zan mehimu he iyan nepengilizan dutun wey ikeveǥey sikandan diyà te Megbevayà wey ziyà te nati he kerehidu.
Ne wazà minsan keenu sikandan mezineg he edtarùtarù ne wazà neveelan dan he minsan hengkey he mezaat.

Ne zutun neehè ku en maan is selakew en maan he velinsuǥuen he edlayang he utew mibpeketikang diyà te udtuwan. Ibpesavut din dutun is Meupiya he Tudtulanen he kenà egkehanew te minsan keenu. Impesavut din haazà te tivuuk he menusiyà, diyà te menge etew te minsan hengkey he kineǥiyan wey minsan hendei he ǥinhedian, wey tribu, wey kepuun.

Ne mibpekezaǥing is egkaǥi te, Tehuza niw is Megbevayà wey ventuǥa sikandin su neuma en is timpu te kedsusi zin te menge ulaula te tivuuk he menusiyà! Ezapa niw is Megbevayà he iyan nenlimbag te langit wey tanà wey zaǥat wey menge puunà te wahig!

Ne zuen daan ikezuwa he velinsuǥuen he nekesunud dutun te nehuna ne migkaǥi sikandin te, Na, nezeetan en! Utew nezeeti is dekelà he inged he Bebilunya! Midlangut din te vinu zin is tivuuk he menusiyà, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, impenurù din te tivuuk he menusiyà is ked-ezapa te menge ledawan!

Ne midlepew is iketelu he velinsuǥuen he midsunud dutun te nehuna he zezuwa ne mibpekezaǥing is egkaǥi te, Is minsan hentei he etew he ed-ezapen din haazà is langgam wey ledawan duen te langgam, ne ebpemarka sikandin diyà te vuked din, ne emun kenà, ne ziyà te velad din,

ne ibpeinum kandin is binu te pauk te Megbevayà, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, silut kandin te Megbevayà, ne heini is mepait he vinu, midtaǥey en te Megbevayà diyà te tasa he iyan sikan is meinit he pauk din. Ne haazà is menge etew, edresayen sikandan diyà te meregreg he esupri ziyà te Impirnu. Ne egkeahà haazà dutun te nati he kerehidu wey te menge velinsuǥuen te Megbevayà.

Ne haazà is hapuy he idrasey kandan, ed-evel te wazà pidtemanan ne te maandew wey mezukilem kenà egkeengked is kedresaya kandan su ed-ezapen dan kes langgam wey kes ledawan duen te langgam ne ebpemarka sikandan te tuus duen te ngazan te langgam.
Ne tenged dutun, sikan is menge etew he neǥaked te Megbevayà, sikan is ebpememineg te menge suǥù te Megbevayà wey edtuman te menge lalag ni Jesus, kinahanglan he med-antus sikandan.

Ne zutun nezineg ku is egkaǥi ziyà te langit te, Isurat nu heini: Utew mulà meupiya is egkengeulaula te menge etew he ebpatey ke menge tumutuu sikandan te Nengazen. Benar iyan, egkaǥi is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin. Utew zan en egkengelipey su wazè en igkehaǥù dan ne ebpekehimeley sikandan. Ne zutun edsuhulan sikandan tenged te menge meupiya he menge vaal zan.

Ne zutun neehè ku is gapun he utew meputì, ne zutun te ǥapun duen ebpimpinuu he henduen be te iyan sikan is Kakey te Menusiyà. Duen bulawan he kuruna he insuup diyà te ulu zin ne egawed te ǥarab he utew meǥarang.

Ne zutun duen selakew he velinsuǥuen he migawas dutun te simbahan diyà te langit. Mibpekezaǥing sikandin is egkaǥi ziyà te ebpimpinuu ziyà te ǥapun, ke sikandin te, Gemita nu en is garab nu su iyan en heini timpu te kegarab su is kelibutan, iring te kamet he nelutuan en is pinemula zuen!
Ne zutun, haazà is ebpimpinuu zutun te ǥapun, migamit din haazà is garab din, ne midraǥun ziyà te kelibutan.
Ne zutun neehè ku is selakew en maan he velinsuǥuen he migawas dutun te simbahan he ziyà te langit ne zuen daan kandin he egewezan he meǥarang he ǥarab.

Ne ziyà te pemuhatà he ziyà te simbahan, migawas is selakew pa he velinsuǥuen. Iyan sikandin belinsuǥuen he impevantey te hapuy zutun. Ne mibpekezaǥing sikandin is egkaǥi ziyà te nesunuzan din he velinsuǥuen he zuen din meǥarang he ǥarab. Ke sikandin te, Gemita nu en heeyan is garab nu ne reǥuna nu is menge paras diyà te pemuleey he iyan is kelibutan su nengelutuan en is menge paras dutun.

Ne zutun migamit haazà is belinsuǥuen te ǥarab din dini te lumpad te kelibutan ne midraǥun din is menge paras, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, iyan is langun he menge etew he kuntada te Megbevayà. Ne is neraǥun din, in-ahuk din diyà te zekelà he vudsi he zutun egkeresa is beǥas te paras. Ne is kehuluǥan dutun te vudsi ne iyan is pauk te Megbevayà diyà te menge kuntada zin.

Ne migunas haazà is beǥas te paras dutun te vudsi he ǥawas te inged ne ebpuun dutun te vudsi midtudà is lengesa taman te tetelu he ǥatus wey keluwaan he kilumitru is netudaan ne sengemitrus wey tengà is kezalem din.

Ne zutun neehè ku ziyà te langit is selakew pa he utew zekelà he egkein-inuwan he iyan kebpeelunga te egkeulaula. Duen pitu he velinsuǥuen ne is kada sevaha kandan, ne egkulangan te idrasey zin te menusiyà. Ne emun egkeulaula en heini ne egketapus en is idsilut kandan te Megbevayà dini te kelibutan.

Ne neehè ku zutun is henduen be te zaǥat he ispihu he nesahug te hapuy. Ne neehè ku zaan is menge etew he nemekezaag te mekehandekhandek he langgam su wazè dan sikandin ezapa. Wazè dan med-azap dutun te ledawan din ne wazè dan daan mebpemarka te lumiru te ngazan din. Dutun dan ebpemenhithitindeg te uvey te zaǥat he ispihu. Ne zuen egewezan dan he menge arpa he imbeǥey kandan te Megbevayà.

Ne egkentahan dan is kentahan duen te suluǥuen te Megbevayà he si Moises he iyan sikan is kentahan he idalig dutun te nati he kerehidu. Ke sikandan te, Sikew is Megbevayà, mekeǥeǥehem ka he Nengazen te langun. Utew zekelà wey utew egkein-inuwi is langun he menge vaal nu! Hadì ka te langun he menge ǥinhedian. Metazeng wey tutuu is menge ulaula nu!

Ne edtehuzen ka te langun he menge etew ne ebentuǥen dan is ngazan nu te Nengazen. Su iyan ke zà waǥas he Megbevayà. Edhendiyà te kenikew is langun he menge etew te minsan hendei he ǥinhedian ne ed-ezapen ke zan su nevantug en is menge vaal nu he memetazeng.
Ne neipus haazà, neehè ku he nepuwasan is simbahan diyà te langit ne ziyà te seled din, neehè ku is ruǥu he zutun is tuus te ǥehem te Megbevayà.
Ne zutun te simbahan migawas sikan is pitu he velinsuǥuen he egkulangan te pitu he menge ibpenrasey te menusiyà. Midsun-uzan sikandan te manggad he utew meputì ne vevakes sikandan te vulawan.
Ne is sevaha zutun te heepat he linimbag he kedesenan, imbeǥey zin dutun te pitu he velinsuǥuen is pitu he menge vulawan he lediyà he nepenù te pauk te wazè din pidtemanan he Megbevayà.

Ne zutun nepenù is simbahan te evel he ebpuun te anlag wey ǥehem te Megbevayà. Ne zutun wazà ebpekeseled dutun te simbahan taman te kenè pa egketapus haazà is kepipitu he kedresaya te menusiyà he ibpaaǥi te pitu he velinsuǥuen.

Ne zutun nezineg ku is ebensag diyà te simbahan diyà te langit ne ke sikandin dutun te pitu he menge velinsuǥuen te, Kuwaa niw en ne iitis niw ziyà te lumpad te kelibutan is taǥù keniyan te pitu he lediyà he iyan is pauk te Megbevayà!

Ne haazà is egkehuna he velinsuǥuen, mid-ulaan din dini te kelibutan is lediyà he ziyà te kandin. Ne zutun, is menge etew he mibpemarka te tuus duen te langgam wey mid-azap dan haazà is ledawan dutun te langgam, midtuvuan sikandan te menge memahù wey utew memesakit he menge vekukang.

Ne haazà is ikezuwa he velinsuǥuen, mid-ulaan din diyà te zaǥat is lediyè he ziyà te kandin ne mibaluy is daǥat he lengesa he iring te lengesa te etew he minatey. Ne zutun mibpematey is minsan hengkey ziyà te zaǥat he zuen din gehinawa.
Ne haazà is iketelu he velinsuǥuen, is lediyà he ziyà te kandin, mid-ulaan din diyà te menge wahig wey ebpuunan te menge wahig ne mibaluy he lengesa haazà is menge wahig.
Ne nezineg ku zutun is belinsuǥuen he impevantey te menge wahig, ke sikandin te, Sikew is waǥas he Megbevayà he zengan wey ǥuntaan, metazeng heini is kedsiluti nu te menusiyà
su mibpenhimetayan dan is menge tumutuu kenikew wey menge ebpeneuven dengan ne ǥuntaan ibpeinum nu kandan is lengesa su iyan hustu he ibales nu kandan!
Ne zutun nezineg ku is egkaǥi ziyà te pemuhatà he edhenduen te, Sikew is mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà he Nengazen te langun, benar iyan he metazeng wey hustu is kedsiluti nu te menusiyà!
Ne zutun haazà is ikeepat he velinsuǥuen, mid-ulaan din diyà te andew is lediyà he ziyà te kandin. Ne haazà, nehimu is andew he ebpeketutung te menusiyà.

Ne ǥeina te nengetutung is menge etew zutun te utew meinit, midsumpalit dan is Megbevayà su iyan sikandin ebayàbayà dutun te kedresaya kandan, iyan, wazè dan iniyuǥi is memezaat he ulaula zan ne wazè dan daan bentuǥa is Megbevayà.

Ne haazà is ikelima he velinsuǥuen, is lediyà he ziyà te kandin, mid-ulaan din diyà te pinuuwà te kedhadì te mekehandekhandek he langgam. Ne mibmerusirem utew is ginhedian dutun te langgam. Ne tuus te utew merasey is silut te menge etew, egkesepè dan en is dilè dan tenged te utew mesakit.
Ne minsan pa zutun wazè dan iniyuǥi is memezaat he menge ulaula zan, kekenà, midsumpalit dan nasì is Megbevayà he ziyà te langit tenged dutun te utew mesakit he menge vekukang.

Ne haazà is ikeenem he velinsuǥuen, mid-ulaan din is lediyà he ziyà te kandin diyà te zekelà he wahig he egngezanan te Yupratis ne nemezahan dutun haazà is wahig su wey maandam is ibayà te menge hadì he ziyà ebpuun te zapit te edsilaan.

Ne neehè ku zutun is tetelu he menge utew memekehandekhandek he mezaat he mulin-ulin he henduen be te vakbak. Midlepew is sevaha he ebpuun duen te vèbà te zekelà he deragun he iyan si Setanas, ne is sevaha, diyà medlepew puun te vèbà duen te langgam, wey is sevaha zuen medlepew te vèbà te ebpeneuven ni Setanas.

Menge mezaat he mulin-ulin haazà he zuen dan gehem te kebaal te egkengein-inuwan. Midsuǥù sikandan su ibpetiǥum kandan is menge sundaru te langun he menge hadì dini te kelibutan su zutun te egkevantug he andew te kedsilut, egkengezaag sikandan te Megbevayà he Nengazen te langun.

Ne zutun nengetiǥum te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin is menge hadì wey is menge sundaru zan diyà te tanà he migngezanan te Ermegidun te kineǥiyan he Hibriyuhanen. Purungi niw pemineǥa heini, ke si Jesu Kristu, su iring te kebpekeuma te tekawen is kedlikù ku. Is etew he kenà edlipezeng ne ed-endamen din is bisti zin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, ebpeebuten e zin , egkelipey sikandin dutun su kenà sikandin egkelevasan, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kenà sikandin dutun egkepeel-elezan.

Ne zutun, is ikepitu he velinsuǥuen, mid-ulaan din diyà te keramag is lediyà he ziyà te kandin ne nezineg ku is egkaǥi he ziyà ebpuun te pinuuwà te edhadì he ziyà te simbahan, ke sikandin te, Netapus en!
Ne zutun nezineg ku is utew memezaǥing ne neserasab is kilat ne mibpemeransì ne midlinug te utew mezesen. Sikan pa meseǥazi te etew haazà is linug he utew mezesen he iring dutun!

Ne kes dekelà he inged he Bebilunya, neǥevà te tetelu he vahin ne nengerundus is langun he menge inged diyà te minsan hendei he ǥinhedian. Ne wazà dutun melipati te Megbevayà is inged he Bebilunya he impeinum din te menge meǥinged dutun is binu he ziyà te tasa zin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, impeǥezaman din kandan is utew mekelimlimezang he pauk din.
Ne nengehanew is langun he menge pulu ziyà te zaǥat. Ne nengehanew zaan is langun he menge vuntud.

Ne mid-uzanan te utew zekelà he ǥiyew is menge etew. Is keveǥat te kada sevaha zutun te ǥiyew, ne menge kelimahan he kilu. Ne is menge etew, midsumpalit dan is Megbevayà tenged dutun te ǥiyew he insilut din kandan su utew nerasey sikandan dutun.

Ne migkeǥiyan a te sevaha zutun te pitu he menge velinsuǥuen he egkulang dutun te pitu he menge lediyà, ke sikandin te, Hendini ka su ibpeehè ku kenikew is kedsiluti zuen te nevantug he vahi he ebpelelevag he ebpinuu ziyà te mezakel he menge wahig.
Nekehilavet kandin is menge hadì diyà te kelibutan. Ne is binu zin, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, is ked-ezapa zin te menge ledawan, ingkelangut te menge meǥinged diyà te kelibutan.

Ne zutun pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin mid-uwit a zuen te velinsuǥuen diyà te tanà he kenà ed-ubpaan te etew ne neehè ku zutun kes bahi. Ed-untud sikandin diyà te langgam he meriǥà. Ne haazà is langgam, insurat diyà te lawa zin is mezakel he menge gerar he utew supak te Megbevayà. Ne pitu is ulu zutun te langgam wey sepulù is sungey zin.

Ne haazà is bahi, ne midsun-uzan te utew mahal su meriǥà wey merudtem he manggad. Ne mideyzeyanan is lawa zin te vulawan wey menge mahal he vatu wey menge pirlas. Ne zutun te velad din is bulawan he tasa he nepenù te vinu he iyan is menge memahawag wey memeremerik he ulaula zin dutun te kebpelelevag din.

Ne zuen insurat dutun te vuked din he ngazan he in-eles is kehuluǥan din he edhenduen te, Kes nevantug he inged he Bebilunya he iyan iney, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, puunà te minsan hentei he vahi he ebpelelevag wey minsan hengkey he mahawag he meremerik he ulaula zini te lumpad te kelibutan.
Ne neehè ku he nelangut haazà is bahi te lengesa te menge tumutuu he midhimetayan din tenged te kedtuu zan ki Jesus. Ne utew a neinuinu te kegkeahaa ku zutun te vahi.

Iyan, migkeǥiyan a zutun te velinsuǥuen, ke sikandin te, Maan is egkeinuinu ka? Ibpesavut ku kenikew is in-eles he kehuluǥan mehitenged keniyan te vahi wey keniyan te langgam he pitu is ulu zin ne sepulù is sungey zin he ed-untuzan keniyan te vahi.

Heeyan is langgam he egkeehè nu, ne zini sikandin te kelibutan dengan, iyan, wazè en guntaan. Ne meǥaan en maan edlepew he ebpuun te vitu he wazà pidtemanan is kezalem din, ne zutun te kedlepew zin, id-agbur sikandin diyà te Impirnu su edsilutan. Ne is langun he menge etew he zengan te wazè pa limbaǥa is kelibutan, wazà isurat is menge ngazan dan diyà te libru he zutun ilista is langun he ebeǥayan te untung, utew zan egkengeinuinu zutun te ked-ehè dan te langgam. Iyan igkengeinuinu zan su haazà is langgam, dengan uuyag ne minatey en guntaan, iyan, egkevanhew zed.

Egkesavut heini te etew he uluwanen. Is kehuluǥan duen te pitu he ulu zutun te langgam, ne pitu he menge vuvungan he zutun ebpinuu haazà is bahi, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, sikan is nevantug he inged. Ne kenà duen dà taman su haazà is pitu he ulu ne pitu zaan he hadì.
Minatey en is lelima zutun te menge hadì, ne edhadì pa ǥuntaan is sevaha, ne wazè pa medhadì is sevaha, iyan, emun edhadì en haazà ne meǥaan dà utew is kedhadì din ne egkeawè en.
Ne is kehuluǥan dutun te langgam he zengan uuyag ne ǥuntaan minatey, ne ikewalu sikandin he hadì he edsunud dutun te pitu he hadì. Ne edsilutan sikandin daan keuzemà diyà te Impirnu.
Ne haazà is sepulù he sungey, ne iyan kehuluǥan dutun is sepulù pa he hadì he wazè pa medhadì. Haazà is sepulù he hadì wey haazà is langgam, ebeǥayan sikandan te keǥehem te kedhadì te meǥaan dà.
Sevaha zà is tuyù dutun te sepulù he hadì ne edtevangan dan is langgam pinaaǥi te zesen dan wey keǥehem dan te kedhadì.

Edtebeken dan sikan is nati he kerehidu ne egkezaag sikandan dutun te nati su egalen sikandin te minsan hentei he egalen wey hadì te minsan hentei he hadì. Ne is menge etew he edumahan dutun te nati, ne migeraran sikandan te menge impetuu wey menge pinilì, wey menge metinumanen he menge sumusundan te Megbevayà.

Ne zutun mid-uman megkaǥi haazà is belinsuǥuen diyà te kedì, ke sikandin te, Haazà is menge wahig he neehè nu he zutun ebpinuu sikan is bahi, ne iyan kehuluǥan dutun is menge ǥinhedian wey kepuun wey utew medmezakel he menge etew he kenà ed-iring-iring is kineǥiyan dan.

Ne haazà is neehè nu he sepulù he sungey wey haazà is langgam, ne egkuntedehan dan haazà is bahi he ebpelelevag ne ed-eǥawen dan is menge azen din ne edlevasan dan sikandin ne egkeenen dan is sapù din ne ebinsulan dan sikandin.

Umba ed-ul-ulahan dan haazà su is Megbevayà, midhimu zin he egkesuatan dan te edtuman is tuyù te Megbevayà. Ne tenged dutun sevaha zà is egkeisip dan ne idtavang dan te langgam is keǥehem dan te kedhadì taman te egkengetuman is nengetagnà he menge Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne haazà is bahi he egkeehè nu, ne iyan kehuluǥan din sikan is nevantug he inged he edlingahaan te menge hadì diyà te lumpad te kelibutan.

Ne hein nepasad dutun te velinsuǥuen is egkeǥiyen din, neehè ku is selakew pa he velinsuǥuen he ebpenaug pehendiyà te tanà he ebpuun te langit ne utew zekelà is keǥehem din. Ne utew merayag is ked-anlag din ne neenlaǥan din is minsan hendei zini te lumpad te kelibutan.

Ne mibpekezaǥing is egkaǥi te, Neǥerè en. Nepurung mezeeti is dekelà he inged he Bebilunya! Ne nehimu en guntaan he ubpeey te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin wey menge mezaat he kedesenan. Egkeubpaan haazà is inged te minsan hengkey he mezaat wey meremerik he tagbis.

Umba neulaula heini su is bahi he iyan is inged he Bebilunya, impeinum din te langun he menge etew ziyà te langun he menge ǥinhedian is binu he iyan is ked-ezapa zin te menge ledawan. Is menge hadì diyà te tivuuk he kelibutan, ne midtampu zan dutun te memahawag he menge vaal zin. Ne is menge ebpemetiǥayun diyà te kelibutan, midsepian dan pinaaǥi te suat dutun te vahi te menge utew mahal!

Ne zutun nezineg ku is selakew pa he egkaǥi ziyà te langit, ke sikandin te, Sikiyu is menge ǥaked ku he etew, awè kew en keniyan te inged! Kenè kew medtampu te menge ulaula he mezaat keniyan te vahi su kela ke mekeragkes kew te menge silut ku kandin.
Su emun idtambù is menge salè din ne ebpekesungkul ziyà te langit tenged te utew medmezakel, ne wazà melipati te Megbevayà is menge vetasan din he utew mezaat.

Is mid-ulaula zin keniyu he pesipala, iyan daan ul-ulaha niw kandin asal kezezuwa niw tekepa is menge vales niw kandin. Teǥayi niw is tasa zin te pauk te Megbevayà he ibpeinum kandin he kezezuwa edtekepa is kebpekelangut din kenà te impeinum din keniyu.

Utew subra is kebpurungi zin te kebpekesavuk din ne ǥuntaan iyan bales kandin is kegkeseeng wey is merasey he kebpekesavuk. Su kenà sikandin ed-engked he ebpegalbu, ke sikandin diyà te isip din te, Bai a ne kenà a valu. Kenà egkehimu he egkeumahan a te kemereǥenan.

Ne tenged te iyan haazà neisip din, ne zutun te sengeandew, egkeumahan sikandin te kemeresayan. Su edsilutan sikandin te zaru, vitil, wey kemetayen; ne egkepurung sikandin egketutung su is Megbevayà he mekeǥeǥehem he Nengazen te langun, iyan edsilut kandin.

Ne is menge hadì dini te kelibutan he midtampu zutun te mezaat he ulaula zin he iyan is ked-ezapa zin te menge ledawan, ebpekesineǥew ne ebpekelelendag sikandan dutun emun egkeehè dan en is evel zutun te kebinsuli kandin.

Ne ebpekeziyù dan is ebpantew su egkehandek dan su kela ke meragkes sikandan dutun te kedèdeeti zutun te inged. Ne ke sikandan te, Kehizu nu, sikew is utew zekelà he inged he Bebilunya su seled te sengeuras neumahan ka te silut!
Ne is menge ebpemetiǥayun dini te kelibutan, ebpemekesineǥew zan daan ne edlelendag dan tenged dutun te inged su wazè en ebpememasa te menge ibelegyè dan.

Wazè en ebpekepemasa te ibpemelegyè dan he vulawan, pelata, menge mahal he vatu wey pirlas, meupiya he manggad he meputì wey meriǥà wey manggad he sida, menge mehemut he kayu, menge vutang he mibeelan te mahal he kayu, wey vatu wey ǥalang wey putew, wey marpil, wey vatu he marmul,

menge perehemut he egkekaan wey edtutungen, menge mehemut he sulù, menge vinu, lana, erina, wey parey he trigu, menge vaka, menge kerehidu, menge kudà, wey menge kelisa, wey minsan menge etew he uripen.

Ne is menge ebpemetiǥayun, egkaǥi zan dutun te vahi he iyan is inged he Bebilunya, ke sikandan te, Nepurung mezeeti is langun he menge meupiya he ed-engkenen nu pezem. Ne nezeetan en daan is ketiǥeyunan nu wey igkelipey nu, ne haazà, kenè nu en maan egkeahà, ke sikandan.

Ne haazà is menge ebpemetiǥayun he insepian dan is kebpemetiǥayun dan dutun te inged, ebpekeziyù dan daan is ebpantew su egkehandek dan su kela ke meragkes dan dutun te kedèdeeti zutun he inged. Ebpekesineǥew zan ne edlelendag dan.

Ne ke sikandan te, Kenuǥun utew te zekelà he inged! Is menge meǥinged dutun, ne nebistiyan te mahal he manggad he meputì wey meriǥà wey merudtem. Ne mideyzeyanan dan is lawa zan te vulawan wey menge mahal he vatu wey pirlas.

Iyan, seled te sengeuras dà, naamin mezeeti is langun he ketiǥeyunan dan! ke sikandan. Ne is menge kepitan te barku wey is menge pesehiru wey menge edterebahu zutun te menge barku wey is langun he ebpemetiǥayun pinaaǥi te zaǥat, ne ebpekeziyù dan is ebpantew ne emun egkeehè dan is evel zutun te kebinsuli zutun te inged,
ebpekezaǥing dan is egkaǥi te, Wazè pa inged he ebpekelavew keniyan te zekelà he inged!

Ne tuus te utew ebmesakit is gehinawa zan, ebukbukan dan te eliyavuk is ulu zan. Ne edsineǥew zan ne edlelendag dan ne ke sikandan te, Kenuǥun utew te zekelà he inged! Su insepian is ketiǥeyunan din te langun he teǥiǥaked te menge barku ziyà te zaǥat. Ne ǥuntaan, seled dà te sengeuras, nepurung mezeeti is langun he menge valey zutun! ke sikandan.

Ne sikiyu is menge meǥinged diyà te langit, lipey kew tenged te limas kayi te zekelà he inged. Lipey kew zaan is menge tumutuu wey menge epustul wey ebpeneuven te Megbevayà su midsilutan te Megbevayà haazà is inged tenged te menge pesipala zin keniyu!
