Ne zutun duen belinsuǥuen he mekeǥeǥehem ne mibitbit din is batu he iring kezekelà te ǥelingan ne intimbag din diyà te zaǥat. Ne ke sikandin te, Iring kayi is kegkepurung kegkezeeti te zekelà he inged he Bebilunya ne kenè en maan egkeahà te minsan hentei.

Kenè en maan egkezineg kayi te inged is ebpememulalà wey ebpememudyung wey ebpemeng-arpa. Ne kenè en maan egkeahà kayi is minsan hengkey he pandey. Ne is daǥing te ebpenggaling ne kenè en maan egkezineg kayi.

Ne kenè en maan egketeyawan heini is inged te minsan hengkey he sulù. Ne is kegkaǥikaǥi te vahi wey maama he sikan pa meked-esawa, ne kenè en maan egkezineg kayi te inged. Utew nengevantug diyà te tivuuk he kelibutan is menge ebpemetiǥayun kayi ne mid-ekalan is menge etew ziyà te langun he menge ǥinhedian pinaaǥi te kinaagman te menge veyilan dutun.

Midsilutan is dekelà he inged he Bebilunya su zutun mid-aǥas is lengesa te menge etew he ǥaked wey ebpeneuven te Megbevayà. Ne is langun he nevunù dini te tivuuk he kelibutan, ne pinaaǥi zaan kayi te inged.

Ne nepasad haazà, nezineg ku ziyà te langit is utew meǥurub he henduen be te utew mezakel he menge etew he egkaǥi te, Deliǥa is Megbevayà su iyan sikandin mekeǥeǥehem, iyan sikandin dekelà is bentuǥan din, iyan sikandin Menluluwas.

Metazeng wey hustu is kukuman din su midsilutan din haazà is nevantug he ebpelelevag he vahi he pinaaǥi te meremerik he vaal zin, neeneb is tivuuk he kelibutan te ked-ezapa te menge ledawan. Midsilutan sikandin te Megbevayà su midhimetayan din is menge suluǥuen te Megbevayà.
Ne mid-uman dan megkaǥi te, Deliǥa is Megbevayà! Haazà is inged, kenà egkeawà te minsan keenu is ked-evel zutun te inged.

Ne zutun nemenlangkeb haazà is keluwaan wey heepat he ebmeǥurangen wey haazà is heepat he linimbag he kedesenan, ne mid-azap dan is Megbevayà he ebpimpinuu zutun te pinuuwè din te kedhadì. Ne ke sikandan te, Benar! Deliǥa is Megbevayà!

Ne zutun nezineg ku is egkaǥi he henduen be te ebpuun dutun te pinuuwà te Megbevayà, ne ke sikandin te, Sikiyu is menge suluǥuen te Megbevayè tew, wey sikiyu is edtahud kandin, deisek is pid-etawan se zekelà is pid-etawan, deliǥa niw is Megbevayà!

Ne nezineg ku is kegkaǥi zutun te utew medmezakel he menge etew he iring te zeǥurus te utew zekelà he evaǥa wey henduen daan te egkengelilid he ruǥung. Ke sikandan te, Deliǥa is Megbevayà su is Megbevayè tew he mekeǥeǥehem he Nengazen, ne iyan sikandin edhadì!
Edlilipey kiw utew ne edeliǥen tew sikandin tenged te zekelà he ǥehem din! Su iyan en heini timpu he kegketuman te eseweey te nati he kerehidu. Is ed-esewaan te nati, ne mibistiyan en.

Ne is esawa te nati, mibeǥayan te ketenged te kebisti te manggad he meputì he merayag utew. (Ne haazà is meputì he manggad, ne iyan kehuluǥan din is menge metazeng he ulaula te menge etew he ǥaked te Megbevayà.)

Ne migkeǥiyan a zutun te velinsuǥuen, ke sikandin te, Isurat nu heini: Utew zeyzey is langun he ibpemetelavuk dutun te eseweey te nati he kerehidu. Ne impelaus din haazà is lalag din te, Iyan heini tutuu he menge Lalag te Megbevayà!

Ne zutun midlangkeb a ziyà te etuvangan din su ed-ezapen ku pezem, iyan, mibensaǥan e zin te, Kenà a kenikew ezapa su siak wey sikew wey is langun he menge zuma nu he edtuu te tuluuwen he impenurù ni Jesus, neked-iiring kiw zà he menge suluǥuen te Megbevayà. Iyan nu zà ezapa is Megbevayà! Umba migkaǥi zin haazà su sikan is ibpekaǥi te Megbevayà dutun te menge ebpeneuven te Megbevayà, ne iyan sikan is tuluuwen he impenurù ni Jesus.

Ne zutun neehè ku is langit he nepuwasan ne zuen dutun kudà he meputì ne egkeseriǥan wey metinumanen is ed-untud dutun. Metazeng is kedhukum din ne metazeng daan is kebpekidtebek din te menge kuntada zin.

Is menge mata zin, ne henduen be te egkeregreg. Ne mezakel is menge kuruna he insuup diyà te ulu zin. Ne zuen ngazan he insurat diyà te kandin he iyan dà sikandin nesayud ke hengkey is kehuluǥan dutun.
Ne is kumbalè din ne henduen be te intereb diyà te lengesa. Ne migeraran sikandin he Lalag te Megbevayà.
Ne ebpemeninundug kandin is utew medmezakel he menge sundaru he ebpuun diyà te langit. Ebpemen-untud dan daan te meputì he menge kudà ne nengesun-uzan dan te meputì he manggad he utew lumpiyu.

Ne midlepew ziyà te vèbè din is sundang he utew meǥarang ne egemiten din haazà te kedsulituwa zin te langun he menge ǥinhedian dini te lumpad te kelibutan. Utew mezesen is kebayàbayè din kandan ne ibpeehè din is rerangit kandan te mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà. Henduen sikandin te egkeres te menge kuntada zin, su ke và dà beǥas te paras is menge etew ne henduen sikandin te egkeres te veǥas te paras.
Diyà te kumbalè din wey ziyà te vuvun din ne zuen insurat he ǥerar he iyan is: Hadì te langun he menge hadì wey Egalen te langun he menge egalen.

Ne zutun neehè ku is belinsuǥuen he ziyà edhithitindeg te teliwazà te andew ne mibpekezaǥing sikandin is ed-umew te langun he menge tagbis he ziyà edlayang te zivavew, ne ke sikandin te, Tiǥum kew en is menge tagbis wey kew mekekaan te idlavung he ibpekaan keniyu te Megbevayà!

Amur-amur kew wey kew mekekaan te sapù te menge hadì, menge kepitan, wey menge sundaru! Kaan kew te menge lawa te kudà wey is menge egkukudà kayi! Kaan kew te lawa te langun he menge etew, uripen se kenà uripen, dekelà is pid-etawan din se minus is pid-etawan din! ke sikandin.

Ne zutun neehè ku sikan is mekehandekhandek he langgam wey is menge hadì dini te lumpad he edumahan te langun he medmezakel he menge sundaru zan. Mid-amur-amur zan su edtebeken dan haazà is ed-untud te meputì he kudà wey is menge sundaru zin he ebpuun te langit.

Ne midakep haazà is langgam ne midakep daan kes ebpeneuven ni Setanas, sikan is mibpaahà te menge egkein-inuwan diyà te etuvangan te langgam. (Pinaaǥi zutun te menge egkein-inuwan mid-ekalan din wey meketuu te langgam haazà is langun he menge etew he midtiyapan te tiyap duen te langgam wey mid-azap te ledawan te langgam.) Ne sikan is langgam wey kes ebpeneuven ni Setanas, intimbag sikandan he uuyag pa ziyà te ranew he egkeregreg te esupri.

Ne midhimetayan is menge sundaru zan pinaaǥi te sundang he eguwà te vèbà dutun te ed-untud te meputì he kudà. Ne haazà is menge tagbis, utew zan nengehantey zutun te menge lawa zutun te menge sundaru.
Ne zutun, neehè ku is belinsuǥuen he ebpenaug he ebpuun te langit ne igkulang din is utew zekelà he pusas wey is yawi zuen te vitu he wazà pidtemanan is kezalem din.

Ne midakep din sikan is dekelà he uled he deragun he iyan ded sikan is uled dengan he iyan daan kes mezaat he mulin-ulin he si Setanas ne mibpusasan din. Ne kenà ibpaawà haazà seled te nengkelibu he tuig.

Ne intimbag din si Setanas diyà te vitu he wazà pidtemanan te kezalem din. Ne migkendeduwan din ne midtuusan din su wey kenà mepuwasi. Umba mibeelan haazà su wey kenà meekali ni Setanas is menge etew te menge ǥinhedian dini te lumpad taman te kenè pa egketapus is nengkelibu he tuig. Ne emun egketapus haazà is nengkelibu he tuig, ibpaawè dè pa si Setanas te meǥaan dà utew he timpu.

Ne zutun neehè ku is menge pinuuwà te edhadì. Ne is ebpememinuu zutun, mibeǥayan sikandan te keǥehem te kedhukum wey kebeǥey te kukuman. Neehè ku zaan is menge ǥimukud te menge etew he midhimetayan tenged te insangyew zan is Lalag te Megbevayà wey is impenurù ni Jesus. Wazè dan med-azap duen te langgam wey te ledawan te langgam, ne wazè dan daan mebpetiyap te tiyap te langgam diyà te vuked dan wey ke ziyè be te velad dan. Nengevanhew sikandan ne impehadì sikandan duma ki Kristu seled te nengkelibu he tuig.

Ne haazà is kegkevenhawa kandan ne iyan sikan is egkehuna he kegkevanhew te menge minatey. (Ne haazà is samà te menge etew he minatey, kenè dan pa egkevanhew taman te kenè pa egketapus is nengkelibu he tuig.)

Utew egkengelipey wey edtuvazan te Megbevayà haazà is egkengevanhew zutun te egkehuna he kegkevanhew. Kenè dan en ebpekeragkes duen te ikezuwa he kemetayen he iyan sikan is ranew he regreg. Menge memumuhat sikandan he ed-azap te Megbevayà wey ki Kristu. Ne ebpekehadì dan duma ki Kristu seled te nengkelibu he tuig.
Ne emun egketapus haazà is nengkelibu he tuig ne ibpaawè dè pa si Setanas dutun te pirisuwan din.

Ne egawas sikandin dutun wey zin meekali is menge etew ziyà te langun he menge ǥinhedian dini te tivuuk he kelibutan. Iyan haazà sikan is migngezanan te Gug wey Magug. Edtiǥumen sikandan ni Setanas wey zan mekepekidtebek te Megbevayà. Utew zan mezakel su henduen dan te pantad diyà te veyvey te zaǥat.

Mid-eneb dan is tivuuk he lumpad te kelibutan ne midlingutan dan is inged he utew ingkesuat te Megbevayà he zutun is menge sundaru te Megbevayà he iyan is menge tumutuu kandin. Iyan, mid-uluǥan sikandan te hapuy he ebpuun te langit ne naamin dan nengeǥerà.

Ne zutun, is mid-akal kandan he si Setanas, intimbag sikandin diyà te ranew he egkeregreg te esupri he zutun itimbag sikan is langgam wey kes ebpeneuven ni Setanas ne zutun edresayen sikandan te maandew wey mezukilem te wazà pidtemanan.
Ne zutun neehè ku is dekelà he meputì he pinuuwà te edhadì ne neehè ku zaan is ebpimpinuu zutun.Naawà is langit wey tanà diyà te etuvangan din ne nahanew ne kenè en maan sikandan egkeahà.

Ne neehè ku is langun he menge minatey, deisey is pid-etawan din se zekelà is pid-etawan din he ziyà ebpemenhithitindeg te etuvangan te pinuuwà te edhadì. Ne mibekar is menge libru ne mibekar zaan is libru he zutun ilista is egkengeveǥayan te untung. Ne mibpemekar zaan is menge zuma he menge libru he zutun isurat is mid-ulaula te menge etew hein uuyag dan pa su edhukuman sikandan tenged te mid-ulaula zan su nekesurat dutun te menge libru.
Nekelepew is menge minatey he ziyà ebpuun te zaǥat wey ziyà te tanà he ziyà is menge ǥimukud dan te Iveyaan. Ne midhukuman sikandan langun tenged te mid-ulaula zan.
Ne zutun, is langun he ebpuun te ed-ubpaan te menge minatey, in-agbur is lawa zan wey ǥimukud dan diyà te ranew he egkeregreg. (Ne haazà is ranew ne iyan kes ikezuwa he kemetayan.)
Is minsan hentei zutun he wazà ilista is ngazan din diyà te libru te untung, in-agbur zaan sikandin diyà te ranew he egkeregreg.
Ne zutun neehè ku is beǥu en he langit wey tanà su nahanew en is nehuna he langit wey nehuna he tanà ne wazè en maan daǥat.

Ne zutun neehè ku is inged te Megbevayà he Veǥu he Hiruselim he idlugtanà he ebpuun te Megbevayà diyà te langit. Utew mekempet haazà is inged su is kekempet din ne iring te kekempet te vahi he ed-esewaan he nepurungan mebistiyi.

Ne nezineg ku is egkaǥi he utew mezaǥing diyà te pinuuwà te edhadì, ne ke sikandin te, Mid-amur en human is Megbevayà diyà te menusiyà. Ed-amur sikandin kandan ne egkehimu sikandan he menge gin-etawan din. Iyan sikandin duma zan wey ed-ezapen dan he Megbevayà.

Ebpemunasen din en is menge luhà diyà te menge mata zan ne zutun wazè en maan ebpatey, ne wazè en maan ebpekesineǥew wey ebpekelelendag. Ne wazè en maan minsan hengkey he ibpekeantus su nahanew en man is nehuna he kelibutan.

Ne migkaǥi haazà is ebpimpinuu zutun te pinuuwà te edhadì, ke sikandin te, Guntaan edhimuwen ku he veǥu is minsan hengkey! Ne ke sikandin diyà te kedì te, Isurat nu heini is egkezineg nu; egkeseriǥan wey tutuu heini he lalag.

Ne ke sikandin en maan te, Netuman en heini is langun. Siak, iyan a kes alpa wey umiga, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kes puunà wey egkepengkusan te minsan hengkey. Ke zuen egkemezahan, ibpeinum ku sikandin diyà te serebseb he zutun ebpuun is wahig he ebpekeveǥey te untung he wazà pidtemanan ne kenè ku sikandin ibpevayad.
Ke zuen minsan hentei he ebpekezaag ki Setanas, ne edhimuwen ku sikandin he anak ku ne egkehimu a zaan he Megbevayè din.

Iyan, sikan is egkehandek he edsundan kedì wey is menge kenà metinumanen, is menge etew he memahawag is ulaula, is menge memumunù, wey is menge meremerik is betasan, is menge keteuwan he etew, wey menge ed-azap te kenà tutuu he Megbevayà wey is langun he teruen he menge etew, iyan egketemanan dan is id-agbur sikandan diyà te ranew he nepenù te egkeregreg he esupri he iyan ikezuwa he kemetayen, ke sikandin.

Ne zutun mid-uvayan a te sevaha zutun te pitu he velinsuǥuen he sikan is nen-ulà te pitu he lediyà he nepenù te pitu he huziyan en he idrasey te menusiyà, ne ke sikandin te, Duma ka kedì su ibpeehè ku kenikew is ed-esawaan te nati he kerehidu.

Ne zutun, pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Waǥas he Mulin-ulin mid-aǥak a te velinsuǥuen pehendiyà te utew metikang he vuntud. Ne impeehè din kediey is inged te Megbevayà he iyan sikan is inged he Hiruselim he idlugtanà he ebpuun te Megbevayà diyà te langit.
Ne haazà he inged, ne utew merayag su zutun ed-anlag is gehem te Megbevayà. Edsinlang haazà is inged iring te mahal he vatu he haspi he edlahus dutun is mata ta.

Utew metikang is elavat dutun te inged ne sepulù wey zezuwa is pultahan din ne zuen belinsuǥuen te Megbevayà he ebantey zutun te kada pultahan. Ne midsuratan is menge pultahan te menge ngazan te sepulù wey zezuwa he kepuun he menge kevuwazan ni Israyil.

Heepat he pesaǥì is elavat dutun te inged ne ziyà te kada elavat ne zuen tetelu he pultahan. Diyà te zapit te edsilaan ne tetelu he pultahan ne ziyà te zapit te edsenlepan ne tetelu zaan. Diyà te zapit te zivavà ne tetelu zaan ne ziyà te zapit te zizayà ne tetelu zaan he pultahan.

Ne is elavat dutun te inged, ne sepulù wey zezuwa is impepinuuwan dutun he zekelà he vatu. Ne midsuratan haazà is menge vatu te menge ngazan te sepulù wey zezuwa he menge epustul zuen te nati he kerehidu.
Ne haazà is belinsuǥuen he ebpekidlalag kedì, egkulang sikandin te vulawan he mitrusan su edsukuzan din haazà is inged wey is elavet dutun wey haazà is menge pultahan.

Ne haazà is inged, is sukud dutun te velevaǥan din ne iring te sukud te petindeg din su nepesaǥì is kegkeveeli zin. Ne midsukud dutun te velinsuǥuen haazà is inged ne zezuwa he libu wey heepat he ǥatus he kilumitru is petindeg din. Ne iring din ded daan is belevaǥan din wey is ketikang din.
Ne midsukud din daan is ketikang dutun te elavat ne menge keneman he mitrus is ketikang din sumalà is paaǥi tew te kedsukud su iyan migamit din.
Ne haazà is elavat ne hinimu te mahal he vatu he haspi. Ne haazà is inged ne hinimu te vulawan he utew waǥas su edlahus is mata ta zutun.

Is menge vatu he mibpepinuuwan dutun te elavat, ne mideyzeyanan te mezakel he menge memekempet he menge mahal he vatu. Haazà is nehuna he vatu ne haspi, is ikezuwa ne sepiru, is iketelu ne kelsidunya, is ikeepat ne ismiralda,

is ikelima ne serdunika, is ikeenem ne kurnelina, is ikepitu ne krisulita, is ikewalu ne birilu, is ikesiyam ne tupasyu, is ikesepulù ne krisuprasu, is ikesepulù wey sevaha ne hesintu, ne is ikesepulù wey zezuwa ne emetista.

Ne haazà is sepulù wey zezuwa he pultahan, ne sepulù wey zezuwa he pirlas su is kada pultahan, ne hinimu te sevaha he pirlas, ne is kersada zutun te inged, ne vulawan he utew waǥas su iring te ispihu he edlahus is mata ta.

Ne wazè ku naahà he valey he simbahan dutun te inged. Wazà kinahanglan is baley he simbahan dutun su is Megbevayà he mekeǥeǥehem he Nengazan te langun wey is nati he kerehidu, dutun en te kandan edsimba is langun.
Ne kenè en daan kinahanglan is anlag te andew wey vulan he idtayew zutun su haazà is inged, ed-enlaǥan en te mekeǥeǥehem he anlag te Megbevayà; sikan is nati he kerehidu ne iyan sulù dutun.
Ne haazà is inged, ne egketeyawan te anlag din is langun he menge etew zutun he kelibutan. Ne is menge hadì te menge ǥinhedian dutun, ed-uwiten dan dutun te inged is ketiǥeyunan dan.
Is menge pultahan dutun te inged, ne kenè en edlekevan te minsan keenu he timpu su emun maandew ne ebpuwasan, ne wazà dutun mezukilem.
Ne ed-uwiten dutun seled te inged is menge mahal he azen wey is menge ketiǥeyunan te langun he menge ǥinhedian.

Iyan, wazà minsan hengkey he mezaat wey is minsan hentei he ebpenurù te tarù wey is etew he ed-azap te ledawan he ebpekeseled dutun. Iyan dà ebpekeseled dutun is menge etew he inlista is menge ngazan dan dutun te libru te nati he kerehidu he zutun idlista is ebpemeǥayan te untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Ne, impaahà kediey zutun te velinsuǥuen is wahig he egngezanan te Wahig he Ebpekeveǥey te Untung. Ne haazà is wahig ne utew metingew iring te ispihu. Ne ziyà ebpuun haazà te pinuuwà te Megbevayà he iyan sikan is pinuuwà te nati he kerehidu.

Ne haazà is wahig, diyà edtudà te teliwazà te kersada zutun te inged. Ne te pesiziveluyà he veyvey zutun te wahig egkeahà is menge kayu he ebpekeveǥey te untung. Ne haazà is kayu, sepulù wey zezuwa he kelasi is beǥas din ne kada vulan ebpemeǥas te sengekelasi. Ne is dahun dutun, ne vawì he ebpekeulì te menge etew he sakup te menge ǥinhedian dini te lumpad.
Ne haazà is inged, wazà dutun minsan hengkey he midrewakan te Megbevayà. Ne zutun is pinuuwà te Megbevayà he iyan pinuuwà te nati he kerehidu. Ne ed-ezapen is Megbevayà te menge suluǥuen din.
Egkeehè dan is paras din ne haazà is menge suluǥuen, edsuratan is menge vuked dan te ngazan din.
Wazè en dutun mezukilem ne wazè en kinahanglan he zuen pa sulù wey silà te andew su iyan sulù dan is Megbevayà he Nengazen te langun, ne edhadì sikandan te wazà pidtemanan.

Ne migkeǥiyan a zutun te velinsuǥuen, ke sikandin te, Heini is menge lalag he nezineg nu, utew venar ne tutuu he egkengetuman. Is Megbevayè tew he Nengazen te langun, imbeǥey zin is Waǥas he Mulin-ulin diyà te ebpemeneuven din ne midsuǥù din is belinsuǥuen din wey zan ikepaahà diyà te menge suluǥuen din ke hengkey is meǥaan en he egkeulaula.
Ne egkaǥi si Jesus te, Meǥaan e en ebpekeuma! Utew egkengelipey is langun he edtuman te menge lalag ku he impezayag keniyu kayi te libru.

Ne siak si Juan is nekezineg wey nekeahà te langun he insurat ku kayi. Ne hein neipus ku te ed-ahà wey ebpemineg is langun kayi, midlangkeb a zutun te etuvangan te velinsuǥuen he mibpaahà kedì kayi te langun su ed-ezapen ku pezem.

Iyan, mibensaǥan e zin, ke sikandin te, Kenà a kenikew ezapa su siak wey sikew, wey is menge zuma nu he ebpeneuven te Megbevayà wey is langun he edtuman te menge lalag kayi te libru, neked-iiring kiw zà he menge suluǥuen te Megbevayà. Iyan nu zà ezapa is Megbevayà, ke sikandin.
Ne impelaus din haazà is lalag din te, Kenè nu ieles heini is impezayag kenikew he menge lalag kayi te libru su meǥaan en egkengetuman heini is langun.

Ne zutun he timpu, ke sikandin, sikan is mezaat pa is ulaula zin, ipepenigudu en sikandin ibpevaal te mezaat. Ne sikan is meremerik pa is ulaula zin dutun, ipepenigudu en sikandin ibpevaal te meremerik. Ne sikan is metazeng is ulaula zin dutun, ipepenigudu en ibpevaal te metazeng, ne haazà is etew he midhimu te Megbevayà he sakup din, ipepenigudu zutun sikandin te kebpesakup din te Megbevayà.
Pemineg kew, ke si Jesus, meǥaan e en ebpekeuma ne zutun edsuhulan ku is kada sevaha sumalà is mid-ulaula zin.
Iyan a sikan is alpa wey umiga, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, kes ebpuunan wey kes egkepengkusan te minsan hengkey, ke si Jesus.

Utew egkengelipey haazà is langun he ebpìpian dan is ugelingen dan, he ke và dà egkeǥiya, ibpepalis dan is menge salè dan su wey utew meputì su emun ebeelan dan haazà, ebeǥayan sikandan te ketenged te kegkaan te veǥas dutun te kayu he ebpekeveǥey te untung wey te kedseled dutun te menge pultahan te inged.

Iyan, diyè dà te meziyù is mekeeled-eled is baal zin, wey is menge keteuwan, is memeremerik is ulaula, is menge memumunù, is ebpemenimba te menge ledawan wey is langun he menge etew he ebpenurù te tarù wey is etew he limbung is ulaula zin.

Siak si Jesus, midsuǥù ku ziyan te keniyu te menge tumutuu is belinsuǥuen ku wey zin metudtul heini is langun. Iyan a sikan is kevuwazan te hadì dengan he si David. Iyan a sikan is iring te mekevugwas, kes bituen he ed-anlag ke egkepkepawè en , ke si Jesus.

Ne kes Waǥas he Mulin-ulin wey kes egkeesawa te nati he kerehidu, ed-umew zan is egkaǥi te, Tuu kew en. Ne sikan is nekezineg kayi, ne kinahanglan he med-umew zaan he egkaǥi te, Tuu kew en. Is minsan hentei keniyu he egkemezahan, wey is minsan hentei he egkesuat, dewata zin en he wazà bayad is wahig he ebpekeveǥey te untung he wazà pidtemanan.

Siak si Juan. Ebpetizeenan ku is minsan hentei he nekezineg kayi te impezayag kediey he ibpesavut kayi te libru. Ke zuen minsan hentei he ed-umanan din te minsan hengkey heini is ibpesavut, id-uman te Megbevayà te silut kandin is menge idrasey he nekaǥi kayi te libru.

Ne ke zuen minsan hentei he id-awè din kayi te ibpesavut he impezayag kediey is minsan hengkey, id-awà daan te Megbevayà is kandin he vahin dutun te veǥas duen te kayu he ebpekeveǥey te untung he nekaǥi kayi. Ne id-awà daan diyà te kandin is ketenged din te ked-ubpà dutun te inged te Megbevayà he nekaǥi kayi te libru.
Si Jesus he iyan ebpirma kayi te langun, ke sikandin te, Benar iyan he meǥaan e en ebpekeuma! Ne ke siak te, Uya, Jesus he Nengazen dey, hendini ke en!
Sikiyu is langun he menge ǥaked te Megbevayà, ikeǥaǥew kew te Nengazen tew he si Jesus. ���
